div.seg: Awarek de kuen e dhienh ci Yecu Kritho dhieeth, ee Wen e Dabid, wen e Abraɣam.
Abraɣam aci Yithak dhieeth; ku dhieth Yithak Jakop; ku dhieth Jakop Juda ku wɛɛtwuun;
ku dhieth Juda Peredh ku Dhera e Tamar; ku dhieth Peredh Kedhron; ku dhieth Kedhron Aram;
ku dhieth Aram Aminadab; ku dhieth Aminadab Nacon; ku dhieth Nacɔn Thalmon;
ku dhieth Thalmon Boadh e Rakab; ku dhieth Boadh Obed e Ruth; ku dhieth Obed Jethe;
ku dhieth Jethe Dabid malik. Ku dhieth Dabid malik Tholomon ne tiiŋ waan ci kɔn aa tiiŋ de Uria;
ku dhieth Tholomon Rekoboam; ku dhieth Rekoboam Abija; ku dhieth Abija Atha;
ku dhieth Atha Jekocapat; ku dhieth Jekocapat Joram; ku dhieth Joram Udhia;
ku dhieth Udhia Jotham; ku dhieth Jotham Akadh; ku dhieth Akadh Kedhekia;
ku dhieth Kedhekia Manathe; ku dhieth Manathe Amon; ku dhieth Amon Jothia;
ku dhieth Jothia Jekonia ku wɛɛtwuun, cit man e run waan jɔte kɔc leereke Babulon.
Na ɣɔn, aci kɔc thok e jot leereke Babulon, ke Jekonia dhieth Calathiel; ku dhieth Calathiel Dhorobabel;
ku dhieth Dhorobabel Abiud; ku dhieth Abiud Eliakim; ku dhieth Eliakim Adhor;
ku dhieth Adhor Thadok; ku dhieth Thadok Acim; ku dhieth Acim Eliud;
ku dhieth Eliud Eleadhar; ku dhieth Eleadhar Mathan; ku dhieth Mathan Jakop;
ku dhieth Jakop Jothep mony e Mari, nyan waan dhieth Yecu, cɔl Kritho.

Yen kuen guop ka, kuen e dhieth ebɛn, cak e Abraɣam aɣet Dabid acik yiic thieer ku ŋuan; ku kuen e dhieth cak e Dabid aɣet jon ci kɔc jɔt leereke Babulon acik yiic thieer ku ŋuan; ku kuen e dhieth cak e jon ci kɔc jɔt leereke Babulon aɣet Kritho acik yiic thieer ku ŋuan.
Dhienh e dhieethe Yecu Kritho ki: Thieŋ de Mari man aci kɔn lueel keke Jothep; na wen, aŋootki ke ke ken guɔ reer etok, ke yok ade yic meth ne kede Weidit Ɣer.
Ku Jothep monyde ee raan piɛth, go piɔu cien luɔi lueel en en e kɔc niim, ku ade piɔu luɔi bi en e pɔl ke kuc kɔc.

Ku te ŋoot en ke ciet ekake e yepiɔu, di, ke tunynhial e Bɛnydit tul tede yen ke e nyuoth, lueel, yan, Jothep, wen e Dabid, du riɔc e luɔi bi yin Mari noom bi aa tiiŋdu; ke ci yok e yeyac ee Weidit Ɣer kek aa dhieth en.
Ku abi mɛwa dhieeth, ku aba cak rin, an, YECU; luɔi bi en kɔcken kony ne karɛcken.
Ku kake acike looi kedhie, e luɔi bi jam aa yic jam ɣɔn cii Bɛnydit lueel ne thoŋ e nebi, yan,
Tieŋki, dhueny ken kɔn yok keke moc abi meth yok, ago mɛwa dhieeth, Ku abik meth cak rin, an, Emanuel; (te puke yen e thoŋda, yen aye, Nhialic ee tɔu keke wook).
Na wen, aci paac e ninic, en Jothep, ke jɔ looi cit man ci tunynhial e Bɛnydit e lɛk en, go tiiŋde noom;
ku ken nin ke yen, te ŋoot en ke ken wendɛn e kɛɛi yen dhieeth; ku jɔ cak rin, an, YECU.
Na wen, aci Yecu guɔ dhieeth e Bethlekem de Judaya e akool ke Kerod malik, ke roor pelniim ke ke jɔ bɛn ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, abiki Jeruthalem,
bik ku thiecki, yan, Nu nou en e mɛnh wen ci dhieeth, an, ee malik de Judai? Wok e cieerde tiŋ ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, ku wok e bɔ buk bɛn lam.
Na wen, aci malik Kerod ekene piŋ, go piɔu diɛɛr, ku diɛɛr Jeruthalem ebɛn ne yen etok.
Na wen, aci banydit ke ka ke Nhialic tɔ kut keniim kedhie keke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ne kɔc yiic, ke ke thieec e te bi Kritho dhieeth thin.
Agoki yɔɔk, yan, E Bethlekem de Judaya; yen aci nebi gɔɔr ɣɔn ale, yan,
Ku yin, Bethlekem, yin wun nu piny de Juda, Yin cie mɛnh koor e bany ke Juda yiic; Bɛnydit abi bɛn bei ne yiyic, Bɛny bi kɔckien e Yithrael aa tiit.
Go Kerod roor pelniim cɔɔl ke kuc kɔc, ku jɔ ke cok e thieec en keek e akool e tule cieer.
Go ke tuɔɔc Bethlekem, lueel, yan, Lak cok e luɔp wek mɛnhthiine; ku te ca wek e yok, ke we tɔ ya yine thok, ke yɛn dueer bɛn ba bɛn lam ayadaŋ.
Na wen, acik kede malik piŋ, ke ke jel, ku jɔke wat e cieer waan cik tiŋ ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, be ke wat tueŋ, a le yen kɔɔc e ɣot nɔm nhial te nu meth thin.
Te ci kek cieer tiŋ, ke ke jɔ piɔth miɛt aret diite.
Na wen, acik bɛn ɣot, ke ke tiŋ mɛnhthiine keke Mari man; goki rot cuat piny, ku lamki; ku te ci kek weuken liep niim, ke miɔcki e kaŋ, adhaap ayi wɛɛl ee nyop ago tol ŋireŋir, ayi wɛɛl daŋ cɔl mer.
Na wen, acike wɛɛt e Nhialic, an, ciki keniim be dhuony te nu Kerod, ke ke jɔ jal lek paanden tekki e kueer daŋ.

Na wen, acik jal, di, ke tunynhial e Bɛnydit tul tede Jothep ke e nyuoth, lueel, yan, Jɔt rot, nom mɛnhthiine keke man, kɔt lɔ paan e Rip, ku tɔuwe etɛɛn aɣet te ban yi yien thok; Kerod abi mɛnhthiine kɔɔr luɔi bi en e nɔk.
Go ro jɔt, ku jɔt mɛnhthiine keke man ɣɔnakɔu, jel le Rip;
ku jɔ tɔu etɛɛn a thouwe Kerod; luɔi bi jam aa yic jam ɣɔn cii Bɛnydit lueel ne thoŋ de nebi, yan, Rip yen acan wendi cɔɔl thin.

Na wen, aci Kerod e tiŋ nɔn ci e geet e roor pelniim, go gɔth e agonh rac, go kɔc tooc, ku tɔ mithwat nu Bethlekem nak kedhie, ayi mith nu bɛi ruup kedhie, cak ne mith ci runken aa rou ayi mith lɔ e kecok, cit man ci en e cok e lop en en tede roor pelniim.
Ago kene guɔ aa yic ke ci lueel e nebi Jeremia, yan,
Rol aye piŋ e Rama, Akieeu ku dhieeu ku dhuoor dit, Racel ee mithke dhieu, Ku reec luŋ luke ye, luɔi liiu kek.
Na wen, aci Kerod guɔ thou, ke tunynhial e Bɛnydit tul te Jothep ke e nyuoth e Rip,
ku yook, yan, Jɔt rot, jɔt mɛnhthiine keke man, lɔ paan e Yithrael; kɔc waan kɔɔr naŋ nɛk kek mɛnhthiine acik guɔ thou.
Go ro jɔt, ku jɔt mɛnhthiine keke man, ku bik paan e Yithrael.
Na wen, aci piŋ nɔn ceŋ Arkeleo piny e Judaya e nyin e wun Kerodic, ke riɔc e lɔ etɛɛn; ku acii Nhialic wɛɛt tei ke e nyuoth, go enɔm bɛ pɔk piny biak de Galili,
bi ku tɔu panydiit cɔl Nadhareth; luɔi bi jam aa yic jam ci lueel e nebii, yan, Abi cɔl raan e Nadhareth.
Na ɣɔn e akoolke ke Jɔn Baptith bɔ, ke guiir wel e jɔɔr e Judayayic,
ke ye lueel, yan, Pɔkki wepiɔth; ciɛɛŋ de paannhial e guɔ thiɔk.
Ku raane ee raan waan lueel nebi Yithaya, yan, Rol e raan cot e jɔɔric, Yan, Luɔiki caar e Bɛnydit, Taki kuɛɛrke lɔ cit.
Ku Jɔn guop ee lupɔ ci cueec e nhiem e thɔrɔl cieŋ, ku ye yeyic duut e thiooth; ku ken ee cam ee kɔyɔm keke kiec nu roor.
Go raan ebɛn lɔ biic te nu yen, Jeruthalem ayi Judaya ebɛn, ayi kɔc nu e Jordan yɔu ebɛn;
agoke baptith ne yen e wɛɛr cɔl Jordan, agamki karɛc cik wooc.
Na wen, aci kɔc juec tiŋ, kɔc ke Parithai keke Thadokai, ke ke bɔ bike bɛn baptith ne yen, ke ke jɔ yɔɔk, yan, Wek mith ke karac, eeŋa e yook week, an, bak kat e agonh bi bɛn?
Yen aa wek luɔk ne luɔi piɛth, luɔi bi roŋ ne puŋdepiɔu;
ku duoki e lueel e wepiɔth, an, Wok de waarda Abraɣam; wek yɔɔk, yan, Nhialic yen adueer mith ke Abraɣam cak ne kɔike.
Ku enɔɔne yep e guɔ taau te nu mei ke tiim; tim ebɛn tim reec luɔk ne mith piɛth aye yiɛp piny, ku cuɛte mɛɛc.
Yɛn di, wek a baptith e piu tei ne kede puŋdepiɔu; ku raan bɔ e yacok ee raan ril e yɛn, yɛn cii roŋ ne luɔi ban wɛɛr ke yencok muk; yen abi we baptith ne Weidit Ɣer ku ne mac;
amuk ken ee yen rap kɔl e yeciin, ku abi yiɛɛude nap abi lipelip, ago rɛɛpke kuot e adhaanic, ku nyop ayiɛl e many cie leu ne nak.
Na ɣɔn, ke Yecu bɔ bei e Galili, bi Jordan te nu Jɔn, bi bɛn baptith ne yen.
Go Jɔn, an, jiɛi, yan, Ba te nuo yɛn, ku yɛn adi ci baptith e yin?
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Pal enɔɔne; apiɛth ale, luɔi bi wok luɔi piɛth thol ebɛn. Go gam.
Na wen, aci guɔ baptith, ke Yecu bɔ bei e piu yiie enɔɔnthiine; na wen, di, ke tenhial liep eyie en, ago Wei ke Nhialie tiŋ ke ke loony piny ke cit guop guuk, bi ku nyuuc e yenɔm;
ku bɔ rol paannhial, rol lueel en, an, Wendien nhiaar ki, ekene, Wen miɛt ɛn piɔu wo yen.
Na wen, ke Yecu thel Weidit leere jɔɔric, lɔ them e jɔŋdiit rac.
Na wen, aci cam rɛɛc e cool yiic kathierŋuan ku wɛɛr yiic kathierŋuan, ke jɔ cɔk nɔk.
Go jɔŋ e kɔc them bɛn, bi ku yook, yan, Te ee yin Wen e Nhialic, ke yi yook kuurke bik rot tɔ ye kuiin ci pam.
Go bɛɛr, yan, Aci gɔɔr, yan, Raan acii bi piir ne kuin etok, abi piir ne jam ebɛn jam bɔ bei a Nhialic thok.
Na wen, ke leere jɔŋdiit rac panydiit ɣeric, ku tɛɛu nhial e luaŋdiit e Nhialic nɔm,
go yɔɔk, yan, Te ee yin Wen e Nhialic, ke yi cuate rot piny; aci gɔɔr, yan, Abi tuuckɛnnhial gam thon ne kedu; Agoki yi mɔk nhial e kecin, Ke yi cii yicok bi yuop e kuur kɔu.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Aci bɛ gɔɔr, yan, Du Bɛnydit Nhialicdu du them.
Go jɔŋdiit rac bɛ lɛɛr e kuurdit nɔm, kuurdiit ci nɔm ɣet ya, ku nyuth ciɛɛŋ ke piny nɔm ebɛn keke dhueeŋden;
go yɔɔk, yan, Kake kedhie aba ke gam yin, te ci yin ro cuat piny ku lam ɛn.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Nyni, Catan; aci gɔɔr, yan, Ye Bɛnydit Nhialicdu lam, ku yen ee luooi etok.
Go jɔŋdiit rac pɔl, ku jɔ tuucnhial bɛn bik bɛn kony.
Na wen, aci Yecu e piŋ nɔn ci Jɔn mac, ke jel le Galili;
go Nadhareth pɔl, bi ku reer e Kapernaum, paan nu e wɛɛryɔu, anu aken e Dhebulun keke Naptali;
luɔi bi jam aa yic jam ɣɔn lueel nebi Yithaya, yan,
Piny e Dhebulun keke piny e Naptali, Te lɔ abapdit, e Jordan nɔm lɔŋtui, Galili de Juoor, Kɔc waan e reer tecol Acik ɣɛɛr diit e piny tiŋ,
Ku kɔc waan e reer paan e thuɔɔu ku yek reer e atiep de thuɔɔuwic, Ɣɛɛrepiny aci tuol tede keek.
Kek e akoolke kek aa ciɛke Yecu guieer e wel, aa ye lueel, an, Pɔkki wepiɔth; ciɛɛŋ de paannhial e guɔ thiɔk.
Na wen, te ciɛthe Yecu e wɛɛryɔu wɛɛr e Galili, ke tiŋ kɔc kaarou, raan keke manhe, Thimon raan cɔl Petero, keke Andereya manhe, ke ke deeny bɔi dit wiir; luɔi ee kek kɔc e dep.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Baki e yacok, ku we ba tɔ ye kɔc e kɔc deep.
Goki bɔɔiken pɔl enɔnthiine, ku kuanyki cok.
Na wen, aci jal etɛɛn le tueŋ, ke tiŋ kɔc kɔk kaarou, raan keke manhe, Jakop wen e Dhebedayo keke Jɔn manhe, anuki abelic keke wuonden Dhebedayo, arukki bɔɔiken; go keek cɔɔl,
goki abel dap pɔl enɔnthiine ku pɛlki wuonden, ku kuanyki cok.
Go Yecu piny e Galili caath ebɛn, aye kɔc wɛɛt e luekkɛn e Nhialic yiic, ke ye ke guieer welpiɛth ke ciɛɛŋ, ku tɔ juai waar e kɔc gup juai ebɛn, ayi tetok ebɛn tetok nu kɔc gup.

Ago rinke ɣet piny e Thuria ebɛn; goki kɔc tok bɛɛi te nu yen kedhie, kɔc cii juai dɔm, juan kithic, ayi kɔc ci cuii gup ne ke cath ke keek, ayi kɔc cii jɔɔk rac dɔm, ayi kɔc cii nok dɔm, ayi kɔc ci duany; go ke tɔ waar.
Go kuany cok e kut ditt e kɔc bɔ Galili, ku Dekapoli, ku Jeruthalem, ku Judaya, ku Jordan nɔm lɔŋtni.
Na wen, aci kut e kɔc tiŋ, ke lɔ dhial e kuurdit nɔm; na wen aci nyuc piny, ke kɔckɛn e piooce ke ke bɔ te nu yen;
go yethok tueer, weet keek, yan,
Thieithieei e kɔc kuany nyiin ne weiken; ciɛɛŋ de paannhial ee keden.
Thieithieei e kɔc e dhiau; abike luk piɔth.
Thieithieei e kɔc e rot tɔ kor; abik piny lɔɔk lak.
Thieithieei e kɔc ee cɔk nɔk ku ye reu ke nɔk ne baŋ de piathepiɔu; abike tɔ kueth.
Thieithieei e kɔc e piɔth dap kok; abik kokde piɔu yok.
Thieithieei e kɔc lɔ piɔth wai; abik Nhialic tiŋ.
Thieithieei e kɔc e kɔc maat; abike tɔ ye wɛɛt ke Nhialic.
Thieithieei e kɔc ee yɔŋ ne baŋ de piathepiou; ciɛɛŋ de paannhial ee keden.
Thieithieei e week, te lɛte kɔc week, ku te yɔŋe kɔc week, ku te ciek kek wethook e jam rac ebɛn, jam lueth, ne baŋdi.
Yak piɔth miɛt abak dɔl e dɔl rac, ariopdun adit paannhial; acik nebii aa yɔŋ yikya nebii ɣɔn kɔn bɛn ke we liu.
Wek ee amilɔ de piny nɔm; ku te ci amilɔ guɔ liɛɛr ethuaat, ke bi bɛ wac adi? Acin piathdɛn be nu, ee ke ye cuat wei tei, ago dum e kɔc cok.
Wek ee ɣɛɛrepiny e tiɔp nɔm. Panydiit ci yik e kuurdit nɔm acii dueer leu ne thien.
Ayi kɔc koth manyealath, aciki e tuɛɛl e aduŋdit thar, ayek tuɛɛl nhial e kedaŋ nɔm; ago kɔc nu ɣoot aa riaau kedhie.
Yak ɣɛɛrdun tɔ riau aya e kɔc niim, abik luɔiduon piɛth aa tiŋ, agoki Wuoorduon nu paannhial aa lɛc nɔm.
Duoki e lueel e wepiɔth nɔn can bɛn ba loŋ bɛn riɔɔk ayi nebii; acie luɔi ban keek bɛn riɔɔk, ee luɔi ban keek bɛn tɔ ye yith en aa ba yɛn.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te ŋoote tenhial ayi piny ke ke ken guɔ nyai, ka cin gut tok ku acin te thiin ci ɣɔɔt bi nyaai ne loŋic, te ŋoote kaŋ ke ke kene thol kedhie.

Yen ka, raan bi cook tok dhɔŋic ne eokke yiie eok ke loŋ, acakaa eook thiinakaŋ tei, ku bi kɔc aa wɛɛt e yen, yen eraane yen abi aa raan koor aret e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic; ku raan bi keek aa looi ku ye kɔe wɛɛt e ke, yen eraane yen abi tɔ dit e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicie.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Te kɛn wek kɔc woor ne piathepiɔu kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr keke Parithai, ke we cii bi lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic anandun.
Wek e jam piŋ jam ci lɛk kɔc thɛɛr ɣɔn, yan, Du raan daŋ nak abi thou; ku raan nak raan dan adueer riɔɔc e guieer bi loŋde guiir.

Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan ebɛn raan ci ɣɔric gɔth keke mɛnhkene, ka dueer riɔɔc e guieer bi loŋde guiir; ku raan yook mɛnhkene, an, Yin piɔl piɔu, adueer riɔɔc e jany bi e jɔɔny e loŋ nɔm; ku raan lueel en, an, Yin ee dhɔn, adueer riɔɔc e giɛna deyic mac.
Yen tede ka, te bii yin ke ba gam Nhialic tede lam, ago yinɔm tak etɛɛn, an, mɛnhkui adɛ wek jam,
ke yi jɔ ke ba gam Nhialic pɔl etɛɛn tede lam, ku jel, kanki mat lueel weke mɛnhkui; na ele, ke yi be bɛn, ku game Nhialic kedu.
Dapki mat weke raan dɛ wek ater, te ŋuɔɔt wek e we nu kueer etok; ke raan dɛ wek ater acii yi bi yien bɛny e loŋ guiir, ku cii bɛny e loŋ guiir yi yien cawic, ke yi cii bi cuat aloocic.
Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Yin cii bi bɛn bei etɛɛn anandu, te ŋoot yin e yi ken kaŋ cool, acin miliim toŋ dɔŋ.
Acak piŋ nɔn ci e lɛk kɔc thɛɛr ɣɔn, yan, Du lɔ weke tiiŋ lei;
ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan ebɛn raan e tik woi, ago ye dɔm ŋɔɔŋ, ka ye guɔ lɔ keke yen e yepiɔu.
Ku na nyin cuenydu, te tɔ yen yin loi kerac, ke tuke bei, cuate wei; apiɛth tede yin luɔi bi toŋ de ka ke yinguop riaak, ke guopdu ebɛn ke cii bi cuat e giɛnayic.
Ayi ciin cuenydu, te tɔ yen yin loi kerac, ke tem, cuate wei; apiɛth tede yin luɔi bi toŋ de ka ke yinguop riaak, ke guopdu ebɛn ke cii bi cuat e giɛnayie.
Aci lueel ɣɔn aya, yan, Raan pɔk keke tiiŋde, ke gɛm awarek de pɔk.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan pɔk keke tiiŋde, ke tik ken roor kɔɔr, ka ci tiiŋde tɔ lɔ keke mony lei; ku raan bi tiiŋe bɛ thiaak, tiiŋ cii monyde pɔl, ka ci lɔ keke tiiŋ lei.
Cook daŋ, acak piŋ nɔn ci e lɛk kɔe thɛɛr ɣɔn, yan, Du guutguut e lueel elueth, ye Bɛnydit luoi ke ci yin guutguut kɔn lueel.
Ku yɛn alɛk week, yan, Du guutguut e lueel anandu; du e lueel ne paannhial, yen aye thoonydiit e Nhialie;
ku dit e lueel e piny aya, ee ke ye Nhialic ecok dhɔɔr; ayi Jeruthalem, du e lueel, ee panydiit e Malik dit.
Ayi yinɔm, du e lueel e guutguutduyic, yin cii nhiem tok dueer tɔ ɣer, ku cii dueer tɔ col ayadaŋ.
Yak jamdun tɔ ye, Ɣɛɛ, Ɣɛɛ, tei; ku, Ei, Ei; jam war ejame ee kerac yen e bii en.
Acak piŋ nɔn ci e lueel, yan, Nyin ee nɔm nyin, ku lec ee nɔm lec.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Duoki kerac e ŋeny; raan biak gem cuenydu, ke wɛle gem daŋ aya.
Ku na de raan de piɔu luɔi gɔɔny en yin e loŋic, le lupɔduon thiine noom, ke jɔ yien lupɔduon dit aya.
Ku raan e yin dhiɛl tɔ lɔ e kaam cit mail tok, ke yi lɔ weke yen e mail kaarou.
Miɔc raan lip yin, ku raan de piɔu dhɛn tede yin, ke yi du yinɔm wel wei e yen.
Acak piŋ nɔn ci e lueel, yan, Nhiaar raan rɛɛr ke yin, ku man raan dɛ wek ater.
Ku yɛn alɛk week, yan, Yak kɔe dɛ wek ater nhiaar, yak lɔŋ ne biak de kɔc e week yɔŋ;
yen aba wek aa wɛɛt ke Wuoorduon nu paannhial; yen aye akɔlde tɔ bɔ bei e kɔc niim kɔc rac ayi kɔc piɛth, ku ye deŋde tɔ tueny te nu kɔc piɛthpiɔth ayi te nu kɔc racpiɔth.
Ku te ya wek kɔc nhiaar kɔc nhiaar week kapac, bi we riop eeŋo? acakaa kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut, ciki e looi cit man ekene aya?
Ku te ya wek mithekɔckun thieee kapac, de luɔi gok yak looi pei? acakaa Juoor ciki e looi cit man ekene aya?
Yak aa kɔe ci piɔth dikedik, acit man e Wuoorduon nu paannhial, ci piɔu dikedik.
Yak rot tiit, duoki luɔiduon piɛth e looi e kɔe niim, ke bik tiŋ; na luɔiki wakle, ke we cin niim ariopdun tede Wuoorduon nu paandhial.

Yen ka, te miɔɔe yin kɔe e dhueeŋdu, ke yi du kaaŋ tɔ koth e yinɔm tueŋ. cit man e luɔi de kɔe deyiie aguk, e luek ke Nhialic yiic ku ciɛɛr yiic, ke ke bi leec e kɔc. Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acik ariopden guɔ yok.
Ku yin, te miɔɔc yin kɔc e dhueeŋdu, du ciin camdu e tɔ ŋic keduon e looi e ciin cuenydu;
ago dhueeŋduon ee yin kɔc miɔɔc ago ya ke ci moony; na miak, ke Wuoordun, raan e ke ci moony tiŋ, ka bi yin cuoot e e kɔc niim.
Ku ten ee yin lɔŋ, yin cii bi ciet kɔc deyiic aguk; anhiaarki kɔɔc kɛɛc kek e luek ke Nhialic yiic ku aguuk ke ciɛɛr, te ye kek lɔŋ, ke ke bi tiŋ e kɔc. Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acik ariopden guɔ yok.
Ku yin, te lɛŋ yin, ke yi lɔ ɣonduon ee yin lɔŋ thin, ku te ci yin ɣot thiook, ke yi laŋ Wuoorduon raan nu te ci thiaan; na miak, ke Wuoordun raan e ke ci thiaan tiŋ, ka bi yi cuoot e kɔc niim.
Ku te laŋ wek, duoki wel e nyɔɔkic ne ɣɔric, cit man e juoor kuc Nhialic; ayek lueel e kepiɔth, an, bi keden aa piŋ ne baŋ de jam juec luelki.
Yen duo wek rot e tɔ cit keek; Wuoordun aŋic ke dak week te ŋuɔɔt wek ke we ken en lip.
Yen aa wek lɔŋ wakle: Waada nu paannhial, Tɔ rinku rieuwe.
Tɔ ciɛɛŋdu bɔ, Tɔ kede piɔndu ee looi e piny nɔm, Acit man e ye looi paannhial.
Miɔc wook ekoole ne kecam kɔɔrku;
Ku ye wook pal kany cath e wook, Acit man pɛl wok kɔc cath e kanykuɔ.
Ku du wook e lɛɛr e themic, Ye wo luok ne kerac; Ciɛɛŋ ee kedu, riɛl ee kedu, Dhueeŋ ee kedu, aɣet athɛɛr. Amen.
Ku na yak kɔc pal ka cik wooc, ke Wuoorduon nu paannhial abi week aa pɔl aya.
Ku te ca wek kɔc e pal ka cik wooc, ayi Wuoordun aya acii we bi aa pal ka cak wooc.

Ku cook daŋ, te ya wek cam rɛɛc, duoki wenyin e kuaany cit man e kɔc deyiic aguk; ayek kenyin tɔ rac, e luɔi bi kek aa tic e kɔc niim nɔn ee kek kɔc reec cam. Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acik ariopden guɔ yok.
Ku yin, te ee yin cam rɛɛc, ke yi tɔc yinɔm e miok, ku piny yinyin;
ke yin cii bi aa tic e kɔc niim nɔn ee yin raan reec cam, yin bi tic e Wuoordun nɔm tei Wuoorduon nu te ci thiaan; ke Wuoordun raan e ke ci thiaan tiŋ, abi yin cuoot e kɔc niim.
Duoki rot e kuɛt weukun e piny nɔm, te ye kɔm keek riɔɔk ku yek keth, ku te ye cuɛɛr ɣot pil kɔu ku kuelki.
Yak rot kuɛt weukun paannhial, te cin kɔm bi ke riɔɔk ku ciki ye keth, ku te cin cuɛɛr bi ɣot pii kɔu ku kuelki;
te nu weukun, yen abi piɔndun nu thin aya.
Many e guop riaau yen aye nyin; ku na piɛth nyindu, ke yin ɣer guop ebɛn.
Ku na rac nyindu, ke yin col guop ecut. Ku na teɣeer nu e yiguop, te cool en, ke cuɔl e yinguope bi ciet ŋo?
Acin raan dueer rot tɔ ye lim de bany kaarou; ka bi tok maan, ku dhiɛɛr tok; ku abi tok dɔm, ku tɔ tok cin naamde. Wek cii rot dueer tɔ ye liim ke Nhialic ku liim ke weu ayadaŋ.
Yen a yɔɔk ɛn week, an, Duoki e diɛɛr e weikun ne ke bak aa cam, ku ne ke bak aa dek; ku duoki e diɛɛr e wegup, ne ke bak aa cieŋ. Wei ciki piɛth awarki kecam, ku raan guop cii piɛth awar lupɔ?
Wɔiki diɛt nhial; aciki e com, ku aciki e tem, ku aciki rap e kuot e adhɛn yiic; ku Wuoorduon nu paannhial yen aye keek tɔ cam. Ku week, caki ŋuan e keek aret?
Ku eeŋa e weyiic, raan dueer bɛɛrde ŋuak e kaam tok, ne diɛɛr ee yen diɛɛr?
Ku eeŋo diɛɛr wek e kede lupɔ? Wɔiki agurbiok nu roor, cil ciil kek; acin luɔi loiki, ku acin alɛɛth wiki;
ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Acakaa Tholomon keke dhueeŋde ebɛn aken ro piɔth cit man e tok e kake yiic.
Ku na ye Nhialic wɛɛl roor piɔth ale, wɛɛl nu ekoole, ku miak ke cuɛte mɛɛc, cii we bi piɔth e pioth war piothden aret, wek kɔc dɛk e gam?
Yen duo wek e diɛɛr, yan, Buk ŋo cam? ku, yan, Buk ŋo dek? ku, yan, Buk ŋo cieŋ?
Kake kedhie aye Juoor ke kɔɔr; ku aŋic Wuoorduon nu paannhial nɔn kaar wek kake kedhie.
Kanki ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aa kɔɔr, keke piath e yenpiɔu; ku kake kedhie abike ya juak nyin tede week.
Yen duo wek e diɛɛr ne kede miak; miak ahi diɛɛr e ka ke yenguop. Kool tok abi kuɛth e jam rɛɛcde yetok.
Duoki kɔc e jɔɔny, ke we cii bi aa jɔɔny.
Jany aa wek kɔc jɔɔny, yen abi wek aa jɔɔny aya; ku them aa wek kaŋ them, yen abi week aa them aya.
Ku eeŋo woi yin wɛɛlthiin nu e mɛnhkui nyin, ku cii tim dit e tiŋ tim nu e yinyin guop?
Ku ba mɛnhkui yɔɔk adi, yan, Tɔ ya miit wɛɛlthiin nu e yinyine bei, ku tiŋ, tim dit ka e yinyin guop?
Yin ee raan deyic aguk, kɔn tim diit nu e yinyin bɛɛi bei; na ele, ke yin bi daai egɔk ku yin dueer wɛɛlthiin nu e mɛnhkui nyin dap bɛɛi bei.
Kepiɛth ee kɔc rieu duoki e yien jɔk, ayi waŋguurkuon tuc e ɣoocden duoki kcek e cuat e kudhuur niim, ke ke cii ke bi dum e kecok, agoki keniim bɛ puk, guutki week.
Yak lip, ke we bi miɔɔc; yak koor, ku abak yok; yak ɣot tɔɔŋ thok, ku abi liep week.
Raan ebɛn raan e kedaŋ lip, ke yok; raan e kedaŋ kɔɔr, ke yok; ku raan tɔŋ ɣot thok, ke liepe yen.
Ee raanou ne weyiic, te lipe mɛnhde knin tede yen, ke bi gam kɔɔi?
ku na lip rɛc, ke bi gam kerac?
Ku te ŋiɛc wek mithkun miɔɔc e kapiɛth, ku wek kɔc rac, ku na Wuoorduon nu paannhial, cii kɔc lip en bi nnɔɔc ne kapiɛth awar week aret?
Yen tede ka, kaŋ kedhie ka kaarki nɔn bi kɔc keek aa luoi week, ke wek aya yak ke luooi wakie; kene ee loŋ ku ye nebii.
Tɛkki e kalthok, thoŋ kooric; kal adit thok, ku kueer alaauwic kueer lɔ te nu riaak, ku kɔc e teek thin ajuecki.
Ku kal akoor thok, ku kueer ajonyic, kueer lɔ te nu piir, ku kɔc e ye yok aliki.
Yak rot tiit ne nebii aluɛth, kɔc e bɛn tede week aceŋki del ke thok, ku keyiic thin ayek aŋuooth ci wath.
Abak ke ŋic e kakɛn ee kek luɔk. De kɔc e enap yok e kuɔɔth yiic, ku yek mith ke ŋaap yok e thilic?
Yen aye tim piɛth ebɛn luɔk e mith piɛth, ku lok tim rac ne mith rac.
Tim piɛth acii dueer luɔk e mith rac, ayi tim rac, acii dueer luɔk e mith piɛth.
Tim ebɛn tim cie luɔk e mith piɛth, ke yepe piny, ku cuɛte mɛɛc.
Yen aba wek keek aa ŋic ne kakɛn ee kek ke luɔk.
Acie raan ebɛn raan e ye lueel, an, Bɛnydit, Bɛnydit, yen bi lɔ ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic; ee raan e kede piɔn e Waar looi, Waar nu paannhial, yen abi lɔ.
Kɔc juec abik ɛn yɔɔk ekoole, yan, Bɛnydit, Bɛnydit, kenku cɔɔr ne rinku, ku kenku jɔɔk rac cieec ne rinku, ku kenku luɔi ril juec looi ne rinku?
Ku aba keek yɔɔk, yan, Wek kuoc anandi; jalki e yalɔɔm, wek kɔc e kerac looi.
Yen ka, raan ebɛn raan e welkiene piŋ, ku ye ke looi, yen aba thɔɔŋ keke raan pelnɔm, raan e ɣonde yik e kuur nɔm;
na miak, ke deŋ lɔ piny, ku bɔ amool, ku put yom dit, abik wit e ɣone; go cuo wieek, en eɣone, luɔi ci keerkeerde wec abi ɣet e kuur nɔm.
Ku raan ebɛn raan e welkiene piŋ, ku cii keek e looi, yen aba thɔɔŋ keke raan piɔlpiɔu, raan e ɣonde yik e liɛɛt nɔm;
go deŋ lɔ piny, ku bɔ amool, ku put yom dit, abik wit e ɣone; ago wiik, wiik e wiik dit.
Na wen, aci Yecu welke thol, ke kɔc e ke gai ne weetde;
aye keek wɛɛt cit man e raan cath ke riɛl, ku acii cit man e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr.
Na wen, aci bɛn piny e kuur nɔm, ke kuut dit ke kɔc ke ke bioth ecok.
Na wen, ke raan ci wɛth dɔm ke bɔ, bi ku gut enɔm piny e yenɔm, ku lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, te de yin piɔu luɔi tɔ yin a waar, ke yin dueer ɛn tɔ waar.
Go Yecu yecin riɛny tueŋ, jiɛk, ku lueel, yan, Anu e yapiɔu; waar guon. Go wɛnhde waar enɔnthiine.
Go Yecu lom thok, an, Du lek raan daŋ mathdhieen; jel tei, lɔ nyuothe rot bɛny e ka ke Nhialic, ku gam ke ci Mothe lueel, an, bi aa gam, abi aa ŋiny bi kek e ŋic.
Na wen, aci Yecu lɔ Kapernaum, ke bɛny de cok alathkeer kabɔt bɔ tede yen, bi ku lɛŋ,
yan, Bɛnydit, lim e ya luooi adhɔt piny ɣoot, ke ci duany, aci cuil guop aret.
Go lueel, yan, Yɛn bi lɔ ba lɔ tɔ dem.
Go bɛny alathker bɛɛr, yan, Bɛnydit, yɛn cie raan roŋ woke luɔi bi yin lɔ ɣondi; lueel tei e yithok, ke limdi bi dem.
Ku yɛn ee raan nu e bɛny cok aya, ku dɛ alathkeer e yacol; aguɔ ŋɛk yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ, kelɔ; ku yɔɔk daŋ, yan, Ba, ke bɔ; ku yɔɔk limdi, yan, Loi kene, ago looi.
Na wen, aci Yecu e piŋ, ke gai, ago kɔc kuany ecok yɔɔk, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acakaa Yithrael nɔm ebɛn, yɛn ken gam ditt cit ekene kɔn yok.
Ku a lɛk week, yan, Kɔc juec abik bɛn ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, ku te ye akɔl lɔ piny, bik ku nyucki piny ne Abraɣam etok, ku Yithak, ku Jakop, e ciɛɛŋ de parmhialic;
ku wɛɛt ke ciɛɛŋ abike cuat tecool nu biic ya; tɛɛn abi dɛ dhieeu ku ŋeny de lec.
Go Yecu bɛny alathker yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ, cit man ci yin e gam, e tɔu aya tede yin. Ago limde dem e thaare guop.
Na wen, aci Yecu bɛn ɣon e Petero, ke tiŋ dhiɔm de Petero adhɔt piny ke juai.
Na wen, ke jiɛk cin, go juai pal piny; go ro jɔt, le keek luoi kecam.
Na ɣɔn theen, aci akɔl lɔ piny, ke ke bii kɔc juec tede yen, kɔc de gup jɔɔk rac; go jɔɔk cieec e kɔc gup ne jam de yenthok, ku tɔ kɔc tok dem kedhie;
ago jam aa yic jam ɣɔn ci lueel e nebi Yithaya, yan, Yen guop aci tetokkuɔ noom, ku aci juɛikuɔ jɔt.
Na wen, aci Yecu kuut dit ke kɔc tiŋ e yeŋeŋ, ke yook kɔc, an, Jelku lok lɔŋtui.
Na wen, ke raan tok bɔ, raan e loŋ gɔɔr, bi ku yook, yan, Bɛny e weet, yin ba kuany cok te de yen te le yin thin.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Awaan adeki ɣootkɛn ci wec piny, ku diɛt nhial adeki ɣoot, ku Wen e raan acin te kɛn en enɔm.
Ku yook e raan daŋ e kɔckɛn e piooce yiic, yan, Bɛnydit, pal ɛn e ya kɔn lɔ la waar tɔɔu.
Go Yecu yook, yan, Kuany acok; pal kɔc ci thou e ke thiak kɔckɛn ci thou.
Na wen, aci lɔ e abelic, ke kuany cok e kɔckɛn e piooce.
Na wen, ke gok diit e amaŋ jɔt rot wiir, arek abi abel kum e apiɔɔk; ku anin.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn tede yen, bik ku packi, luelki, yan, Bɛnydit, kony wook; wok thou.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo riaac wek, wek kɔc dɛk e gam? Na wen, ke jɔt rot, go yom dit jɔɔny ku jieeny wɛɛr; goki lɔ diu aret.
Go kɔc gai, luelki, yan, Ee raan cit ŋo ekene, acakaa yom ayi wɛɛr ke ke piŋ loŋde?
Na wen, aci ɣet lɔŋtui, te nu piny de Gadarai, ke ram keke kɔc kaarou kɔc de gup jɔɔk rac, abiki bei e rɛŋ yiic, ee kɔc gai piɔth aret, yen a cin en raan dueer teek e kueere.
Na wen, ke ke cot, yan, Eeŋoda ne yin, yin Yecu, Wen e Nhialic? Ci bɛn ene ke akool e ke ŋoot, ba wo bɛn leeŋ piɔth?
Ku ade luny diit e kudhuur etɛɛn, amec ke keek emaath, ke ke nyuath.
Go jɔɔk rac lɔŋ, an, Te cieec yin wook biic, pal wook, buk jal ke wo lɔ e luny e kudhuuric.
Ago keek yɔɔk, yan, Laki. Na wen, acik bɛn bei, ke ke lɔ e luny e kudhuuric; ku jɔ luny e kudhuur ebɛn riŋ eriprip ke ke lɔ piny agoryɔu, lek rot dɛɛny wiir, agoki thou e piu yiic.
Go kɔc wen e keek tiit goki kat jelki lek panydit, lek kaŋ guiir kedhie, ku guiirki ka ke kɔc de gup jɔɔk.
Na wen, ke panydit ebɛn ke ke lɔ biic bik bɛn rɔm ne Yecu; na wen, acik tiŋ, ke laŋki, yan, bi jal pinyden.
Na wen, ke lɔ e abelic, go wɛɛr teem, ku jɔ hɛn panydɛndit guop.
Na wen, ke ke bii raan te nu yen, raan ci duany, adhɔt piny e laŋarep nɔm; go Yecu gamden tiŋ, ku yook raan ci duany, yan, Pale yipiɔu piny, mɛnhdi; karɛcku acike pal yin.
Na wen, ke kɔc toktook e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr yiic, ke luelki e keyac, yan, Raane alat Nhialic.
Go Yecu ka luelki e kepiɔth guɔ ŋic, ago lueel, yan, Eeŋo tak wek kerac e wepiɔth?
Ee kenou piɔl e keek, te luɛɛl ɛn en, an, Karɛcku acike pal yin; ku te luɛɛl ɛn en, an, Jɔt rot, cathe?
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ba wek e ŋic nɔn ciɛthe Wen e raan ke riɛl e piny nɔm riɛl bi en karac pɔl, (ago raan ci duany yɔɔk, an), Jɔt rot, jɔt laŋarepdu, lɔ ɣondu.
Go rot jɔt, ku jel le ɣonde.
Na wen, aci kuut ke kɔc e tiŋ, ke ke gai, ku lecki Nhialic, Raan ci riɛl cit ekene gam kɔc.
Na wen, aci Yecu jal etɛɛn, ke tiŋ raan cɔl Mathayo, arɛɛr e maktap de atholboyic; ago Ɣecu yɔɔk, yan, Kuany acok. Go ro jɔt, ku kuɛny cok.
Na wen, te reere Yecu ɣoot ke cam, ke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut e ke jɔ bɛn, ku kɔc e kerac looi, bik ku nyucki piny ne yen etok, yen keke kɔckɛn e piooce.
Na wen, aci Parithai e tiŋ, ke ke thiec kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Eeŋo ciɛme Bɛnyduon e weet keke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ku kɔc rac?
Na wen, aci Yecu e piŋ, ke ke yook, yan, Kɔc piɔl gup aciki akiim e kɔɔr, ee kɔc tok gup tei.
Laki tei, kaarki cooke thar abak yok, yan, Yɛn kɔɔr kokdepiɔu, acie ke bi nɔk en kaar; yɛn e cii bɔ ba kɔc piɛth piɔth bɛn cɔɔl, bik kepiɔth puk, ee kɔc e kerac looi kek aa ba bɛn cɔɔl.
Na ɣɔn, ke kɔcpiooce Jɔn ke ke bɔ te nu yen, bik ku luelki, yan, Eeŋo ye wok cool e reec wok cam, wok woke Parithai, ku kɔckuon e piooce aciki cam e rɛɛc?
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Dueer wɛɛt rieec emony thieek aa dhiau, te ŋoote mony thiek ke tɔu ke keek? Akool abik bɛn, akool bi mony thiek jɔt e keyiic, yen abi kek cam rɛɛc.
Acin raan e lupɔ ci piac ɣɔɔc kaac e lupɔ thɛɛr kɔu; na loi yen aya, ke ke ci piac ɣɔɔc jɔ lupɔ thɛɛr tɔ rɛɛt, go te ye rɛɛt go dit awar man waan.

Ayi wany ci piac dhiim acie taau e atheep thɛɛr yiic; na loi yen aya, ke atheep abik yiic rɛɛt, ago wany lɔ wei, ku riaak atheep; wany ci piac dhiim aye tau e atheep ci piac looi yiic, agoki tɔu apiɛth kedhie.
Na wen, aguiir keek ekake, ke bɛny tok bɔ, ku gut enɔm piny e yenɔm, ku lueel, yan, Nyandi aci thou enɔnthiin wene; ku ba tei, thanye yicin e yeguop, ku abi bɛ ɣɔɔr.
Go Yecu rot jɔt, ku kuɛny cok, ayi kɔckɛn e piooce aya.
Na wen, ke tik bɔ, tiiŋ e riɛm cool e kueer e yeguop e run kathieer ku rou, go bɛn e yekɔu cieen, bi ku jiɛk lupɔde thok;
aye lueel e yepiɔu, an, Te jak ɛn lupɔde tei, ke yɛn bi dem.
Go Yecu rot puk; na wen, aci e tiŋ, ke lueel, yan, Rom yipiɔu, nyane; gamdu aci yi tɔ piɔl. Go tiiŋe dem e thaar mane guop.
Na wen, aci Yecu bɛn ɣon e bɛny awen, ke tiŋ kɔc e kɛŋ kooth ku kut e kɔc awou,
go ke yɔɔk, yan, Nyaiki; nyanthiine aken thou, anin tei. Agoki dɔl guop.
Na wen, aci kut e kɔc ciɛɛc biic, ke lɔ ɣot, le ku dɔm cin; go nyanthiine rot jɔt.
Go jame tɛɛi e pinye nɔm ebɛn.
Na wen, aci Yecu jal etɛɛn, ke coor kaarou ke ke biɔth ecok, ke ke cot, luelki, yan, Wen e Dabid, tɔ yipiɔu kok weke wook.
Na wen, aci bɛn ɣot, ke coor e ke bɔ te nu yen; go Yecu ke thieec, yan, Gamki nɔn duɛɛr ɛn ekene leu e luɔi? Goki lueel, yan, Ɣɛɛ, Bɛnydit.
Go ke jak nyiin, ku lueel, yan, Acit man e gamduon ca wek gam, e tɔu tede week.
Goke liep nyiin. Na wen, ke ke lom Yecu thook aret, yan, Duoki lek raan daŋ mathdhieen.
Ku keek, te ci kek jal, ke ke tɔ rinke tɛɛi e pinye nɔm ehɛn.
Na wen, ajelki, ke ke bii raan te nu yen raan cin ethok ten ee jam, ku ade guop jɔŋ rac.
Ku te ci jɔŋ rac cieec bei e yeguop, ke jam en raan wen cin ethok ten ee jam: go kuut ke kɔc gai, luelki, yan, Akene kɔn tiŋ en ke cit ekene paan e Yithrael.
Aci Parithai lueel tei, yan, Aye jɔɔk rac cieec bei ne riɛl e bɛnyditt e jɔɔk rac.
Go Yecu pɛɛnydit lɔ caath yiic kedhie ayi bɛi kedhie, aye kɔc wɛɛt e luekken yiic, ku ye welpiɛth ke ciɛɛŋ guiir, ku ye juai tɔ dem e kɔc yiic ebɛn, ayi jɔɔk nu e kɔc gup ebɛn.
Na wen, aci kuut ke kɔc tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu kok keke keek, luɔi ci kek dak, ku luɔi ci kek thiai cit man e thok cin raan e ke tht.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce yɔɔk, yan, Rɛɛp ci luɔk ajuecki, ku kɔc e luui aliki.
Yen laŋ wek Bɛnyditt e rɛɛp ci luɔk, yan, bi kɔc e luui tuɔɔc e rap yiic rɛɛpkɛn ci luɔk.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl, kɔc kathieer ku rou, ke ke gɛm riɛl bi kek jɔɔk rac cieŋ, bik ke cieec bei, ku gɛm keek riɛl bi kek juai tɔ dem ebɛn ayi jɔɔk nu e kɔc gup.
Rdh ke tuuc kathieer ku rou, ki; mɛnh tueŋ, ee Thimon, acɔl Petero, ku Anderaya manhe; Jakop wen e Dhebedayo, ku Jɔn manhe;
ku Pilip, ku Bartholomayo; ku Thoma, ku Mathayo raan e atholbo tɔ kut; ku Jakop wen e Alapayo, ku Lebbia, rinkɛn cieen acɔlke Thaddayo;
ku Thimon raan e Kanaan, ku Judath Yithkariɔt, raan e nyiin en aya.
Kɔcke kathieer ku rou aci Yecu ke tooc, ku yook keek, yan, Duoki rot yiɛl e kueer e Juoor, ayi panydiit e Thamaria ebɛn duoki lɔ thin, dhiɛlki lɔ te nu amɛl ci maar amɛl ke dhien e Yithrael.
Ku te la wek, yak wel guiir, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial aci guɔ thiɔk.
Taki kɔc tok dem, taki kɔc cii wɛth dɔm taki ke waar gup, kɔc ci thou taki ke jɔt rot abik piir, cieecki jɔɔk rac bei e kɔc gup; we ci miɔɔc edhueeŋ, yak miooc edhueeŋ aya.
Duoki adhaap e muk e atheepkun yiic, ayi riet, ayi giriic, duoki keek e muk;
ayi kuth ne kede kueer duoki ke muk, duoki alniuut muk kaarou, ayi war, ayi thieec, duoki ke muk; raan e luui ee roŋ ke kedɛn e cam.
Ku panyditt aa wek lɔ thin ebɛn, ayi wut, yak kɔc luɔp, an, Raan piɛth akou? Ku jaki reer ne yen aɣet te ba wek jal etɛɛn.
Ku te la wek ɣot, ke thiecki.
Ku ten ee yen ɣon piɛth egɔk, ke we tɔ athiɛɛidun rɛɛr keke yen; ku te cii en e ɣon piɛth, ke we tɔ athiɛɛidun puk enɔm week.
Ku na de raan reec week tɔ ye kamaan, ku reec welkun piŋ, te jal wek e ɣone ayi panyditte, ke we jɔ abuui tɛŋ wei e wecok.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ketuc bi paan e Thodom yok ku paan e Gomora ekool e guieereloŋ, acii bi kit keke ketuc bi panydiite yok.
Tieŋki, wek tuɔɔc abak ciet man e amɛl ci lɔ e aŋuooth yiic; yen aa wek pɛl cit man e karac, ku yak gup cien akɔɔk cit man e guk.
Ku yak rot tiit e kɔc; abik week aa lɛɛr e looŋ niim, ku we bi aa dui e wɛt e luɛkkɛn e Nhialic yiic;
yeka, ku we bi bɛɛi e mudhiir niim ayi maliik niim ne biakdi, aguɔki aa caatɔɔkɛn e keek tɔ jany, ku yek Juoor tɔ jany ayadaŋ.
Ku te ci we yien kɔc, duoki e diɛɛr ne jam ba wek jam ku ne wel bak lueel; ke bak lueel abi gam week e thaar mane guop.
Ku acie week ee jam, ee Wei ke Wuoordun kek ee jam e wegup.
Raan abi manhe yien kɔc lek nɔk abi thou, ku wun meth abi mɛnhde yien kɔc lek nɔk abi thou; ku mith abik ater cak ne warken niim ayi marken niim, agoki ke tɔ nak.
Ku we bi maan e kɔc kedhie ne baŋ de rinki; ku raan e yepiɔu ruut aɣet te bi kaŋ thok, yen abi kony wei.
Ku te yɔŋ kek week e panydiite, jaki kat lak panydiit daŋ; wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, We cii pɛɛnydit ke Yithrael bi thol e nɛm, te ŋoote Wen e raan ke ken kɔn bɛn.
Raanpiooce acii raan weet en e woor, ayi lim acii bɛnyde e woor.

E loi tede raanpiooce te thoŋ en keke raan weet en, ku e loi tede lim te thoŋ en keke bɛnyde. Te ci kek bɛny de dhien lat tɔki ye Beeldhebub, ciki kɔc ke dhiende bi aa lat aret awar luɔi ee kek bɛnyden lat?
Yen duo wek e riɔɔc e keek; acin ke ci kum, ke cii bi liep nɔm; ku acin ke ci moony, ke cii bi ŋic.
Ke ya lɛk week tecol, yak lueel teɣer; ku ke yak piŋ e yicic, yak guiir e ɣoot niim.
Ku duoki e riɔɔc e kɔc nak raan guop tei, ku ciki wei ke raan leu e nak; aŋuan luɔi ba wek aa riɔɔc ne Raan e wei ke raan leu e nak ayi raan guop aya e giɛnayic.
Amɔr kaarou, ciki dueere ɣaac e maliim tok? Ku acin amɔɔr toŋ bi loony piny ke kuc Wuoordun.
Acakaa nhim ke weniim ayeke kueen nyiin kedhie.
Yen duo wek e riɔɔc, wek war amɔr juec e piath.
Yen tede ka, raan ebɛn raan bi a gam e kɔc niim, yen aba gam ayadaŋ e Waar nɔm Waar nu paannhial.
Ku raan ebɛn raan bi a jai e kɔc niim, yen aba jai ayadaŋ e Waar nɔm Waar nu paannhial.
Duoki e lueel nɔn e ba yɛn ba mat bɛn taau e piny nɔm; yɛn ecii bɔ ba mat bɛn taau e piny ncm, ee tɔŋ en aba bɛn taau.
Yɛn aa bɔ ba raan bɛn yiek piɔu ater keke wun, ku ba duet bɛn yiek piɔu ater keke man, ayi nyan ci thiaak keke man monyde;
ku kɔc de ater ne raan abik aa kɔc ke dhiende guop.
Raan nhiaar wun ayi man awar nhieer nhiɛɛr en ɛn, ka cii roŋ keke yɛn; ku raan nhiaar wende ayi nyande awar nhieer nhiɛɛr en ɛn, ka cii roŋ keke yɛn.
Ku raan reec timde jɔt, tim ci riiu nɔm, ku reec a biɔɔth cok, ka cii roŋ keke yɛn.
Raan yok weike abi weike mɔɔr; ku raan mar weike ne biakdi abi weike yok.
Raan dɔm week ke dɔm ɛn aya, ku raan dɔm ɛn, ke dɔm raan e toc ɛn.
Raan dɔm nebi e luɔi ee yen nebi, ka bi ariop de nebi yok; ku raan dɔm raan piɛthpiɔu ne luɔi ee yen raan piɛthpiɔu, ka bi ariop de raan piɛthpiɔu yok.
Ku raan bi mɛnh tok e miththiike yiic miɔɔc e biny deyic piu lir tei dek ke, ne luɔi ee yen raanpiooce, wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, ariopde acii bi dak anande.
Na wen, aci Yecu kɔckɛn e piooce kathieer ku rou thol e weet, ke jel etɛɛn le kɔc wɛɛt ku guiir keek wel e pɛɛnykɛndit yiic.
Ku Jɔn, te ci en luɔi de Kritho piŋ waan tɔu en e aloocic, ke toc kɔckɛn e piooce kaarou,
lek Bɛnydit thieec, yan, Ee yin e raan waan, an, ba bɛn, ku de raan daŋ buk tiit?
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Lak lɛkki Jɔn ka piɛŋki ku ka tieŋki:
Coor ayinki, ku ŋol aciɛthki apiɛth, kɔc de gup wɛth acik gup waar, miŋ apiŋki, kɔc ci thou acike jat nhial ka cik piir, ku kɔc kuany nyiin ayeke guieer welpiɛth.
Ku thieithieei e raan cii bi tɔ diu piɔu ne kedi.
Na wen, ajelki, ke Yecu cak jam keke kut e kɔc ne kede Jɔn, yan, E we lɔ e jɔɔric lak ŋo tiŋ? Ee aruoor nieŋe yom, yen e lak tiŋ?
Ku e we lɔ biic lak ŋo tiŋ? Ee raan ceŋ lupɔ lɔ nip? Tieŋki, kɔc ceŋ lupɔ lɔ nip atɔuki e ɣoot ke maliik yiic.
Ku e we lɔ biic lak ŋo tiŋ? Ee nebi? Yeka, wek yɔɔk, yan, Ee raan diit war nebi aret.
Kene ee raan ci jam gɔɔr ne kede, yan, Tiŋ, yɛn toc tunydi e yinɔm tueŋ, Raan bi kueerdu looiyic apiɛth te ŋoot yin wei.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ne kɔc ci dhieeth e diaar, acin raan ci ro jɔt raan war Jɔn Baptith e dit; ku raan koor cin naamde raan nu e ciɛɛŋ de paannhialic yen adit awar en.
Ɣɔn kɔne Jɔn Baptith bɛn aɣet ci enɔɔne tɔŋ ril aye lɛɛr ciɛɛŋ de paannhial, go kɔc e tɔŋ lɛɛr aruprup agoki ciɛɛŋ rum.
Nebii kedhie ayi loŋ aake ye kaken guiir aɣet te bi Jɔn bɛn.
Ku na dɛki piɔth nɔn ba wek cooke gam, ke raane yen aye Elija, raan waan, an, bi bɛn.
Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Ku ba rem de enɔɔne thɔɔŋ ke ŋo? Aba thɔɔŋ ke miththii rɛɛr e thuk yiic, ke ke cɔl mathken,
luelki, yan, Wok e kaaŋ kuoth week, ku wek ken coŋ; ku wok e dhiau e weniim, ku wek ken dhuoor.
Jɔn e bɛn ke ye cam rɛɛc ku reec dek, go kɔc lueel, yan, Ade guop jɔŋ rac.

Wen e raan e bɛn ke ye cam ku ye dek, go kɔc lueel, yan, Tiŋ raane, ee mamith ku ye raan e dek e mɔu aret, ku ye mɛthe e kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ku kɔc e kerac looi! Ku pɛlenɔm aye tɔ ye yic tei ne mithke.
Na wen, ke jɔ pɛɛnydit jɔɔny pɛɛnydit ci tedit e luɔidɛn ril looi thin, ne rɛɛc reec kek kepiɔth puk.
Yan, Amawoou ne yin, yin Karadhin! Amawoou ne yin, yin Bethaida! Tee ci luɔi ril looi e Turo ku Thidon, cit man ci ke looi e weyiic, adi cik kepiɔth puk ɣɔn thɛɛr, ku ceŋki cuɛl ku rɛɛrki e aropic.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Ketuc bi Turo yok ayi Thidon acii bi kit keke ketuc bak yok ekool e guieereloŋ.
Ku yin, Kapernaum, yin ci jat nhial aɣeet yin paannhial, ku yin bi bɛɛi piny aɣeet yin paan e kɔc ci thou; tee ci luɔi ril looi e Thɔdom cit man ci ke looi e yiyic, adi ci tɔu aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Ketuc bi piny e Thɔdom yok acii bi kit keke ketuc ba yok ekool e guieereloŋ.
E akoolke go Yecu bɛɛr ku lueel, yan, Yin lɛɛc nɔm, yin Waar, Bɛnydiit e paannhial ku piny, e luɔi ci yin kake mɔny kɔc pelniim, ku kɔc de niim, ku nyuothe ke miththiithuet.
Ee yic, Waar, aci piath tede yin aya.
Kaŋ kedhie aci Waar ke taau e yacin, ku acin raan ŋic Wende, ee Waar etok; ayi Waar acin raan ŋic en, ee Wende etok, ku raan nu e Wende piɔu nɔn bi en e nyuoth en.
Baki te nuo yɛn, wek kɔc nɛk luɔi ril wedhie, ayi kɔc ci duɔɔny e kathiek ɣɛɛcki, ke we ba gam lɔŋ ba wek lɔŋ.
Damki luɔidi, ku yak rot piɔɔc e yɛn; yɛn ŋic reer emaath, ku yɛn ee rot tɔ koor; ke we bi lɔŋ yok e wepiɔth.
Luɔidi ee luɔi cii ril, ku ke ya gam kɔc bik ɣaac ee kepiɔl.
Na wen, ke Yecu lɔ cath e dum yiic ekool e thabath; ku kɔckɛn e piooce aci cɔk ke nɔk, agoki rap gɔl e dhuŋ, ku camki ke.
Na wen, aci Parithai ke tiŋ, ke ke yook, yan, Tiŋ, kɔckuon e piooce aloiki ke ci pɛn kɔc ekool e thabath.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Kɛnki kueen e awarekic ne ke ci Dabid looi, ɣɔn nɛke cɔk en, ayi kɔc cath ne yen;
luɔi le yen ɣon e Nhialic, le ku ciɛm kuiin ci pam kuiin ci gam Nhialic, ku akene pal en luɔi dueer en ke cam, ayi kɔc cath ne yen, ee ka ke bany ke ka ke Nhialic kapac?
Ku kɛnki kueen e loŋic ayadaŋ, yan, ekool e thabath bany ke ka ke Nhialic bany nu luaŋdiit e Nhialic ayek loŋ de thabath dhɔŋic, ku acin ke yek wooc?
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan ki ene, raan war luaŋdiit e Nhialic e dit?
Ku tee we ci jame ŋic thar, yan, Ee kokdepiɔu yen kaar, ku acii ke bi nɔk yen kaar, adi kɛnki kɔc jɔɔny kɔc cin ke cik wooc.
Wen e raan ee Bɛnydiit e thabath aya.
Na wen, aci jal etɛɛn, ke lɔ luaŋdɛn e Nhialic;
ku ade raan ci cin riɔu etɛɛn. Goki thieec, yan, Ci pal kɔc, an, bik kɔc aa tɔ dem e akool ke thabath? Kɔɔr kek luɔi bi kek e gaany.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ee raanou nu e weyiic, raan de amal tok, ku te loony en e adhum thuthic ekool e thabath, ke cii bi dɔm, ku jot bei?
Piath e raan wɛɛr piath e amaal awar ŋo? Yen tede ka, luɔi ee raan kepiɛth looi aye pal kɔc e akool ke thabath.
Na wen, ke yook raan, yan, Riɛnye yicin tueŋ. Go riɛny tueŋ; ago bɛ piath acit ciindɛn daŋ.
Go Parithai lɔ biic, lek loŋ guiir kapac ne kede, ne luɔi bi kek e nɔk.
Na wen, aci Yecu e ŋic, ke ric rot etɛɛn; ago kuany cok e kuut dit ke kɔc, go ke tɔ dem kedhie,
ku jɔ ke lom thook, ke ciki bi tɔ ŋic kɔc;
luɔi bi jam aa yic jam e lueel nebi Yithaya ɣɔn, yan,
Tieŋki mɛnh e ya luooi, mɛnh ca lɔc; Mɛnhdien nhiaar, yɛn mit piɔu woke yen; Weiki aba ke taau e yeguop, Ku abi loŋ guieer Juoor.
Aci bi aa teer, ku cie coot; Ku acin raan bi e piŋ rol e kuɛɛr yiic.
Aruoor ci nyiɛɛcic acii bi dhoŋ kɔu, Ku alanh tol acii bi tɔ liu, Aɣet te bi en guieereloŋ tɔ bɔ, ago tiam.
Ku rinke abi Juoor ke aa ŋɔɔth.
Na wen, ke raan de guop jɔŋ rac biiye te nu yen, ku ye cɔɔr, ku cin ethok te jam; ago tɔ dem, arek abi raan wen ci cɔɔr ku cin ethok te jam abi jam ku dɛɛi.
Go kut e kɔc gai kedhie, luelki, yan, Cie Wen e Dabid ekene?
Na wen, aci Parithai e piŋ, ke ke luel, yan, Raane ee jɔɔk rac cieec bei ne riɛl e Beeldhebub tei, yen bɛnydiit e jɔɔk rac.
Go Yecu ke cik tak ŋic, ku yook keek, yan, Paan e gɔm etok ee riak abi aa jɔɔric; ku panydit ayi ɣot, te gɔm en etok, ka cii bi kɔɔc;
ku Catan, te ci en Catan cieec bei, ka ye gɔm etok; bi paandɛn cieŋ jɔ kɔɔc adi?
Ku te cieec ɛn jɔɔk rac bei ne riɛl e Beeldhebub, ku na mithkun, yek ke cieec bei ne ŋa? yen abi kek aa banykuon e week jɔɔny.
Ku ten aa yɛn jɔɔk rac cieec bei ne Wei ke Nhialic, ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aci bɛn tede week.
Dueer raan lɔ ɣon e raan ril adi, le ku yɛk kake, te ŋoot en ke ken raan ril kɔn duut? Adueer kɔn duut, ku jɔ ɣonde yak.
Raan reec mat ke yɛn, ka de ater ke yɛn; ku raan reec kueny keke yɛn etok, ka thiei kaŋ wei.
Yen a yɔɔk ɛn week, yan, Ken ee kɔc wooc ebɛn ku lɛt ee kɔc lueel ebɛn abi pal kɔc; ee lɛt ee kɔc Weidit lat etok yen acii bi pal kɔc.
Ku raan lek Wen e raan jam rac, ka bi pal en; ku raan lek Wei Dit Ɣer jam rac, ka cii bi pal en, ayi e pinye nɔm, ayi piny bi lɔɔk bɛn.
Yak tim tɔ piɛth, ku taki mithke piɛth ayadaŋ; ku be, yan, cak e tiŋ, ke we tɔ tim nhiany, ku taki mithke nhiany ayadaŋ; tim aye ŋic ne mithke.
Wek mith ke karac, duɛɛrki kapiɛth aa lueel adi, ku yak kɔc rac piɔth? Ke ye piɔu thiɔɔŋ nɔm yen aye thok lueel.
Raan piɛth piɔu ee kapiɛth bɛɛi bei ne kakɛn piɛth nu e yepiɔu; ku bii raan rac piɔu karac bei ne kakɛn rɛc nu e yepiɔu.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Jam ɣɔric ebɛn jam bi kɔc aa lueel, keden abik lueel ekool e guieereloŋ.
Welku kek abi yi tɔ cin yeth gaak, ku welku kek abi yi tɔ yike yeth gaak.
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk ne kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai ke beerki, yan, Bɛny e weet, wok kɔɔr gok buk tiŋ tede yin.
Go bɛɛr ku yook keek, yan, Rem rac piɔu e dieer lei kɔɔr akɔɔr gok bi tiŋ; ku acin gok bi gam en, ee gok e nebi Jona tei.
Acit man e tɔuwe Jona e rɛc dit yac e cool yuc kadiak ku wɛɛrwakɔu kadiak, yen acit tau bi Wen e raan tɔu e pinyic e cool yiic kadiak ku wɛɛrwakɔu kadiak.
Kɔc ke Ninebe abik rot jɔt ekool e guieereloŋ keke rem de enɔɔne, agoki yiek yeth gaak; acik kepiɔth puk ne guieer ci Jona ke guieer wel; ku tieŋki, raan ki ene, raan war Jona.
Tiiŋ malik nu te lɔ wowic abi rot jɔt keke rem de enɔɔne ekool e guieereloŋ, ago yiek yeth gaak; aci bɛn e piny thar bi pɛl e Tholomon nɔm bɛn piŋ; ku tieŋki, raan ki ene, raan war Tholomon.
Jɔŋ rɛɛc col, te ci en bɛn bei e raan guop, ke cath te cin piu, akɔɔr te bi en lɔŋ, ku cii yok.
Na wen, ke lueel, yan, Yɛn bi anɔm dhuony ɣondien waan ba yɛn bei thin. Na wen, aci bɛn, ke yok akene ɣap, ku ci napic ku ci yic dikedik.

Go lɔ, le jɔɔk kɔk diec kadherou jɔɔk war en e rac, agoki bɛn, ku leki e raan guop, ku jɔki ɣap thin, ago tau de raane taudɛn cieen ago rac awar taudɛn tueŋ waan. Yen abi ciet tau de rem de enɔɔne rem rac piɔu.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke jam keke kut e kɔc, ke man ku mithekɔcken ke ke kaac biic, akɔɔrki jam bi kek jam e yen.
Go raan tok yɔɔk, yan, Tiŋ, moor ki keke mithekɔckun akɛɛcki biic, akɔɔrki jam bi kek jam e yin.
Go bɛɛr ku yook raan jam ke yen, yan, Eeŋa ee maar? ku ee yiŋa ee mithekɔckukɔ?
Go yecin riɛny tueŋ te nu kɔckɛn e piooce, ku lueel, yan, Maar ki! ku mithekɔckuɔ ki!
Raan ebɛn raan bi kede Waar piɔu aa looi, Waar nu paannhial, yen aye mɛnhkai, ku ye nyankai, ku ye maar.
Ekoole guop, ke Yecu jel ɣoot, le nyuc e wɛɛryɔu.
Na wen, aci kuut dit ke kɔc gueer te nu yen, ke lɔ e abelic, le ku nyuuc; ku kaac kut e kɔc biic ebɛn.
Go ke lɛk kajuec ne kɛŋ, ku lueel, yan, Tieŋki, raan e lɔ domic le com;
ku te cum en, ke kɔth kɔk e ke loony e kueer kec, go diɛt bɛn ku tholki keek e cam.
Ku loony kɔth kɔk te nu kur, te cin tiɔm dit; agoki dap goŋ, luɔi cin en tiɔm dit nu.
Na wen, aci akɔl ruɛl, ke ke biɔɔr, ku yomki, ne baŋ cin kek mei.
Ku loony kɔk e kuɔɔth yiic; go kuɔɔth cil, ku nyiicki ke.
Ku loony kɔk e tiɔm piɛthic, agoki luɔk, kɔk nyin tok abi bɔt bɛɛi, ku kɔk nyin tok abi thierdhetem bɛɛi, ku kɔk nyin tok abi thierdiak bɛɛi.
Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Na wen, ke kɔcpiooce e ke bɔ, bik ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋo jiɛɛm yin we keek e kɛŋ?
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Week, aci gam week luɔi ba wek kacithiaan ŋic ka ke ciɛɛŋ de paannhial, ku akene gam keek.
Raan ebɛn raan de nɔm kaŋ, ka bi gam kɔk, ku abi dɛ kajuec aret; ku raan ebɛn raan cin nɔm kaŋ, acakaa ke cath ke yen abi nyaai tede yen.
Yen a jam ɛn wo keek e kɛŋ; luɔi dɛɛi kek, ku ciki daai, ku luɔi piŋ kek, ku ciki piŋ, ku ciki jam e yokic.

Jam ci Yithaya caar ɣɔn aci aa yic e keyiic, jam e lueel, yan, Te ya wek piŋ, ke we bi aa piŋ, ku we cii wel bi aa yok yiic anandun. Ku te ya wek daai, ke we bi aa daai, ku we cii kaŋ bi aa gɔɔk anandun.

Kɔcke acik piɔth guɔ cuai, Ku ayek piŋ e piŋ e miŋ e keyith, Ku acik kenyin niɛɛn; Ke ke cii bi aa daai e kenyin, Ku ciki bi aa piŋ e keyith, Ku ciki wel bi yok yiic e kepiɔth, Agoki kepiɔth puk, Aguɔ keek tɔ dem.
Ku thieithieei e wenyiin, luɔi dɛɛi kek; ku thicithieei e weyith, luɔi piŋ kek.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Nebii juec ku kɔc piɛthpiɔth juec acik kɔɔr e kepiɔth luɔi bi kek kaŋ tiŋ ka tieŋki, ku akenki ke tiŋ; ku akɔɔrki luɔi bi kek kaŋ piŋ ka piɛŋki, ku akenki ke piŋ.
Jaki kaaŋ piŋ kaaŋ de raan e cum.
Te piŋe raan jam de ciɛɛŋ, ku cii e yokic, ke jɔŋ diit rac bɔ, ago ke ci com e yepiɔu gɔp. Ke ci com e kueer kec ka.
Ku ke ci com te nu kur, yen aye raan piŋ jam, go dap gam enɔnthiine ke mit piɔu;
ku acin meeidɛn nu e yepiɔu, ee tɔu tethiinakaŋ tei; na miak, te ci keril dhal en ro cak ayi yoŋ yɔŋeye ne biak de jam, ke jɔ piɔu dap diu.
Ku ke ci com e kuɔɔth yiic, yen aye raan piŋ jam; na wen, ke diɛɛr e ka ke pinye nɔm, ku mɛth ee juec de weu raan math, ke ke nyiic jam, go aa ke cii lok.
Ku ke ci com e tiɔm piɛthic, yen aye raan piŋ jam, ago yokic; go luɔk, kɔk nyin tok abi bɔt bɛɛi, ku kɔk nyin tok abi thierdhetem bɛɛi, ku kɔk nyin tok abi thierdiak bɛɛi.
Go ke lɛk kaaŋ daŋ. Yan, Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial aye thɔŋ raan ci kɔth piɛth wɛɛr e domdeyic;
na wen, te niine kɔc, ke raan de ater ke yen bɔ, go wɛɛl roor wɛɛr e agamɔyic cil, ku jel.
Na wen, aci agamɔ cil, ku guɛthki, ke wɛɛl roor tiec aya.
Go liim ke bɛny de baai bɛn tede yen, bik ku thiecki, yan, Bɛny, kɛne kɔth piɛth wɛɛr e domduyic? Wɛɛl roor e jɔ bɛn tenou?
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Raan de wok ater yen aa loi ekene. Go liim thieec, yan, De yipiɔu luɔi bi wok ke lɔ kuɛny bei?
Go jai, yan, Ɣei; te kuɛny wek wɛɛl roor bei, ke we bi agamɔ woth bei keke wal etok.
Palki e ke cil etok kedhie aɣet kool e tem; ku kool e tem, ke yɛn bi kɔc tem yɔɔk, yan, Kanki wɛɛl roor kuɛny bei, ku duotki keek abike nyop; ku dhɛɛthki agamɔ e adhandiyic.
Go ke lɛk kaaŋ daŋ, lueel, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit nyin toŋ de matharda, ci raan noom, ku com domde;
ku ye nyin koor e nyin ebɛn; ku na miak, te ci en cil, ke ye gok awar wal kedhie, ago ya tim, aye diɛt nhial bɛn ku yek nyuc e keerke.
Go ke lɛk kaaŋ daŋ, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit luɔu ci tik noom, go ke liaap keke akop wac, cit aduuk kadiak, aɣet te bi en tuak ebɛn.
Kake kedhie aci Yecu ke lɛk kuut ke kɔc e kɛŋ; ku jam cinic kaaŋ acin ke ci lɛk keek;
luɔi bi jam aa yic, jam ci lueel e nebi, yan, Yɛn bi athok liep e kɛŋ; Yɛn bi kaŋ lueel ka ci moony te ɣɔn ciɛke piny.
Na wen, aci Yecu kut e kɔc tɔ jel, ke lɔ ɣot, go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn te nu yen, bik ku luelki, yan, Wɛɛre wook kaaŋ thar, kaaŋ e wɛɛl roor ci wɛɛr domic.
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Raan e weer kɔth piɛth ee Wen e raan;
ku dom yen aye piny nɔm; ku kɔth piɛth kek aye mith ke ciɛɛŋ; ku wɛl roor kek aye mith ke jɔŋ diit rac,
ku raan de ater raan e weer keek ee jɔŋ diit rac; ku kool e tem yen aye thok de piny de enɔɔne; ku kɔc tem kek aye tuucnhial.
Acit man ci wɛl roor kuany ku nyop ke mɛɛc, yen abi ciet thok de piny de enɔɔne.
Wen e raan abi tuuckɛn nhial tooc, ku abik kaŋ kuɛny bei e ciɛɛŋdeyic kedhie ka ye kɔc tɔ loi kerac ayi kɔc e kerac looi,
agoki ke cuat e pul depe mac thin; tɛɛn abi dhieeu nu thin keke ŋeny de lec.
E akoolke kɔc piɛthpiɔth abik a riauriau cit man akɔl e ciɛɛŋ de Wuondenic. Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Kaaŋ daŋ, ki: Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit weu piɛth ci thiaan domic; na wen, aci raan ke yok, ke ke thiɛɛn, ku jel, jɔ ka cath ne yen lɔ ɣaac kedhie ne miɛt mit en piɔu ke keek, go dome ɣɔɔc.
Kaaŋ daŋ ki: Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit man e ajalap, akɔɔr guet ci lakelak cɔl perl;
na wen, aci perl tok yok ɣoocde atuc aret, ke jel, le ka cath ne ycn ɣaac kedhie, ago perle ɣɔɔc.
Kaaŋ daŋ ki: Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit bɔi diit ci taau wiir, go rec kith yuc dɔm ebɛn;
na wen, aci thiaŋ, ke thelki biic e wɛɛryɔu, ku jɔki nyuc, goki kapiɛth kuot e dioony yiic, ku cuɛtki karac wei.
Yen abi ciet thok de piny. Tuucnhial abik bɛn, agoki kɔc racpiɔth pɔc bei ne kɔc piɛthpiɔth yiic,
ku cuɛtki keek e pniic pni depe mac thin; tɛɛn abi dhieeu nu thin, keke ŋeny de lec.
Go Yecu ke thieec, yan, Cak kake yok yiic kedhie? Goki lueel, yan, Ɣɛɛ, Bɛnydit.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Yen tede ka, raan ebɛn raan e loŋ gɔɔr raan ci wɛɛt ne kede ciɛɛŋ de paannhial, yen acit raan e bɛny de baai, raan e kaŋ bɛɛi bei ne weuke yiic ayi ka ci piac yok ayi kathɛɛr.
Na wen, aci Yecu kɛŋke thol, ke jel etɛɛn,
bi paanden, bi ku weet kɔc luaŋdɛn e Nhialic, arek abik gai, ku luelki, yan, Raane e yok pɛlenɔme tenou, ayi luɔi rilke?
Cie wen e aten e tiim looi en eraane? man cii cɔl Mari? ku mithekɔcken, ciki ye yi Jakop, ku Jotheth, ku Thimon, ku Judath?
Ku nyiirekɔcken, ciki e tɔu ne wook kedhie? Ku na eraane e yok ekake kedhie tenou?
Goki piɔth diu ne yen. Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Nebi acin te cii yen e rieu, ee paande etok, ku dhiende guop.
Ku acin luɔi ril juec ci looi etɛɛn ne baŋ de rɛɛc reec kek gam.
Ɣɔn e akoolke, ke Kerod teterarke piŋ rin ke Yecu,
go awuutke yɔɔk, yan, Raane ee Jɔn Baptith; aci ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic; yen a luuiye luɔi rilke ne yen.
Kerod aaci Jɔn dɔm, ku duut, go taau e aloocic ne biak de Kerodiath, tiiŋ de Pilip manhe.
Aci Jɔn lɛk en, yan, Akene pal yin, luɔi bi en reer ke yin.
Ku aa de piɔu luɔi nɛk en en, ku aa riɔc e kut e kɔc tei, aye kɔc tɔ ye nebi yen Jɔn.
Na wen, aci akool e dhieethe Kerod tɔ ye ahith, ke nyan e Kerodiath cɔŋ e kɔc niim, go Kerod piɔu miɛt.
Na wen, ke lek en lek guutguut, yan, Na de ke ba lip, ka ba gam yin.
Ku nyane, te ci e kɔn wɛɛt e man, ke lueel, yan, Game yɛn nɔm de Jɔn Baptith etene e athaanic.
Na wen, ke malik dhiau piɔu; ku ne baŋ de guutguut wen ci lueel, ku ne baŋ de kɔc rɛɛr e yen etok tede cam, ke yook, an, bi gam en.
Go raan tooc, le Jɔn kiɛp nɔm wei e aloocic.
Go nɔmde bɛɛi e athaanic, gɛme duet; go jɔ lɛɛr te nu man.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn, bik ku nomki guop, lek tɔɔu; na wen, ke ke jɔ lɔ lek lɛk Yecu.
Na wen, aci Yecu e piŋ, ke jel etɛɛn e abel, le e jɔɔric etok; ku te ci kuut ke kɔc e piŋ, ke biɔthki cok, ke ke bɔ bei e pɛɛnydit yiic aciɛthki e kecok.
Go Yecu lɔ biic, ku tiŋ kut ditt e kɔc, ago piɔu kok ke keek, ku tɔ kɔc dem kɔc tok e keyiic.
Na ɣɔn theen, ke kɔckɛn e piooce e ke bɔ tede yen, bik ku luelki, yan, Etene ee jɔɔric, ku akɔl e guɔ thei; yɔɔke kut e kɔc, an, bik jal, lek e bɛi yiic, lek ro ɣɔc kecam.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Aciki bi dhil jal; week, miacki keek e kecamki.
Goki lueel, yan, Wok de kuiin ci pam kadhic tei etene, ku rec kaarou.
Go lueel, yan, Yienki ke yɛn.

Go kut e kɔc yɔɔk, yan, bik nyuc e wal niim, ku nom kuiin ci pam kadhic, ku rec kaarou, go nhial lieec, ku lueel, yan, Thieithieei, go kuiin waak yiic, ku gɛm ke kocpiooce, go kɔcpiooce ke gam kut e kɔc.
Goki cam kedhie, abik kuɛth. Ku kuanyki ka lɔ thueithuei, ka ci kɔc both, agoki dioony thiɔɔŋ kathieer ku rou.
Kɔc wen cam aake cit agum kadhieny de roor, ku nu diaar ku mith ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ke Yecu dhil kɔckɛn e piooce tɔ lɔ e abelic enɔnthiine, bik lɔ lɔŋtui e yenɔm tueŋ, te look en kuut ke kɔc tɔ jel.
Na wen, aci kuut ke kɔc tɔ jel, ke lɔ nhial e kuurdit nɔm etok, le lɔŋ. Na ɣɔn theen, ke tɔu etɛɛn etok.
Ku nu abel e wɛɛric cil enɔɔne, e lɔ jaŋjaŋ ne apiɔɔk, apeen yom.
Na wen, te kɔɔre piny nɔn ŋeep en rot, ke Yecu lɔ te nu keek ke cath e piu niim.
Na wen, aci kɔcpiooce ye tiŋ ke cath e piu niim, ke ke pau piɔth, agoki lueel, an, Ee jɔk; agoki kiu ne riɔɔc.
Go Yecu jam ke keek enɔnthiine, lueel, yan, Palki rot piny; ee yɛn, duoki riɔc.
Go Petero puk nɔm, yan, Bɛny, ten ee yen yin, ke yi yook ɛn ke ya bi lɔ tede yin e piu niim.
Go lueel, yan, Ba. Na wen, aci Petero bɛn biic e abelic, ke cath e piu niim, an, le tede Yecu.
Na wen, aci yom tiŋ adit, ke riɔc; go duɛɛr diir, ku jɔ coot, yan, Bɛnydit, luak ɛn.
Go Yecu ecin riny enɔnthiine, dɔm, ku yook, yan, Yin ee raan dɛk e gam, eeŋo e yin piɔu wil e kaamic?
Na wen, acik bɛn abeiic, ke yom kaac.
Go kɔc nu e abelic bɛn bik ku lamki, luelki, yan, Ee yic, yin ee Wen e Nhialic.
Ku te ci kek ɣet lɔɔk, ke ke bɔ piny de Genedharet.
Na wen, aci kɔc ke paane e ŋic, ke ke tooc kɔc e pinye nɔm ebɛn, lek kɔc tok bɛɛi te nu yen kedhie;
agoki lɔŋ nɔn bi kek lupɔde jak thok tei; go kɔc ebɛn kɔc e jak en agoki gup waar eliŋliŋ.
Na wen, ke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e ke bɔ te nu Yecu keke Parithai, abiki e Jeruthalem, bik ku thiecki, yan,
Na kɔckuon e piooce, eeŋo e kek loŋ dhɔŋic, loŋ ci yien wook e kɔc thɛɛr? Aciki kecin e piny, te ciɛm kek kuin.
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Ku week, eeŋo ya wek loŋ de Nhialic dhɔŋic aya ne loŋduon thɛɛr?
Aci Nhialic lueel, yan, Ye wuur rieu keke moor; ku, yan, Raan e jam rac lueel e kede wun ayi man, ne thou e thonde.
Ku week ayak lueel, yan, Raan yook wun ayi man, yan, Ke e di ci yok tede yɛn, aca gam Nhialic;
ka cin ke ci wooc, te cii en wun e rieu ayi man. Yen aca wek jam e Nhialic tɔ ye ɣɔric ne loŋduon thɛɛr.
Wek kɔc de yac aguk, ee yic ee ke lueel Ɣithaya ne kedun, yan,
Jure ee rot cuot tethiɔk ke yɛn ne keliep, ku yek a rieu e kethook; Ku piɔnden amec keke yɛn.
Lam lɛm kek ɛn ee keɣɔric tei, Ne weet ee kek kɔc wɛɛt e looŋ ke kɔc tei.
Na wen, aci kut e kɔc cɔɔl, ke yook keek, yan, Piɛŋki, abak yok e wepiɔth;
yan, Ke ye lɔ e raan thok acie yen e raan tɔ rac; ee ke ye bɛn bei e raan thok, yen aye raan tɔ rac.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn te nu yen, bik ku yookki, yan, Ŋic nɔn ci Parithai piɔth diu, wen ci kek jame piŋ?
Go bɛɛr, yan, Wal ebɛn wɛɛl kene piith e Waar nu paannhial, abi woth bei keke meeide.
Palki keek; ayek coor thel coor. Ku te thele cɔɔr cɔɔr, ka bik loony e adhumic keek kaarou.
Go Petero bɛɛr, yan, Wɛɛre wook kaaŋe thar.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Ŋuɔɔtki ke we cii kaŋ ŋic ayadaŋ?
Ŋuɔɔtki e we kuc cooke, yan, Kedaŋ ebɛn ke lɔ e raan thok e jɔ lɔ yieec, ke jɔ cuat biic.
Ku ka bɔ bei e raan thok ayek bɛn bei e raan piɔu; ku keek aye raan tɔ rac.
Kak ee bɛn bei e raan piɔu ki, Karɛc ee raan ke tak, naŋ de raan, kɔɔr e dieer lei, dhoom, kuel, ciekethok, lɛɛt rac;
kak ee raan tɔ rac ka; ku cam cieme raan ke ken ecin piny, acie yen ee raan tɔ rac.
Go Yecu jal etɛɛn, le piny biak de Turo keke Thidon.
Na wen, ke tik bɔ e piny biake, tiiŋ de Kanaan, bi ku coot, yan, Tɔ yipiɔu kok we yɛn, Bɛnydit, yin Wen e Dabid; nyandi acii jɔŋ rac dɔm e dom rac.
Ku acin ke ci bɛɛr, acakaa jam tok aliu. Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn ku laŋki, yan, Ciec, akuany wocok ke cot.
G bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn aa cii tuce kɔc kɔk, yɛn a tuce amɛl ci maar amɛl ke dhien e Yithrael tei, keek kapac.
Na wen, ke tik bɔ ku lɛm, yan, Bɛnydit, kony ɛn.
Go bɛɛr, yan, Acii piɛth te noom wok kuin e nuth, ku denyku jɔk.
Go lueel, yan, Ee yic, Bɛnydit; ku jɔk ayek cam ne kak athueithuei ci loony piny te ye banyken cam thin.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Yin etiiŋe, gamdu adit; yin ci kede piɔndu yok. Go nyande guop waar e thaar mane guop.
Go Yecu jal etɛɛn, le tethiɔk ke wɛɛr e Galili; go lɔ e kuurdit nɔm, le ku nyuc piny etɛɛn.
Go kuut dit ke kɔc bɛn te nu yen, aciɛthki ne aduɛɛny, ku coor, ku miŋ, ku ŋol, ku kɔc juec kɔk, agoki ke taan piny e Yecu cok; go ke tɔ dem,
arek abi kut e kɔc gai, te ci kek miŋ tiŋ ajamki, ku tiŋki ŋol acik piath, ku aduɛɛny aciɛthki, ku coor adɛɛiki; goki Nhialic de Yithrael leec.

Go Yecu kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl, ku lueel, yan, Yɛn e piɔu kok woke kut e kɔc, e luɔi ci kek tɔu ne yɛn nhi acik aa diak enɔɔne, ku acin ke cik cam; ku luɔi ban keek tɔ jel e cɔk aliu e yapiɔu, ke ke cii cɔk bi tiaam kueer.
Go kɔcpiooce thieec, yan, Buk kuin dit yok tenou e jɔɔric, kuin bi kut ditt pek etɛɛn tɔ kueth?
Go Yecu ke thieec, yan, Kuiin ci pam kuiin cath ne week, yekdi? Goki lueel, yan, Ayek dherou, ku rec thii toktook.
Go kut e kɔc yɔɔk, yan, bik nyuc piny.
Na wen, ke nom kuiin ci pam kadherou, ku rec, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Thieithieei, go ke waak yiic, gɛm ke kɔckɛn e piooce, go kɔcpiooce ke yien kut e kɔc.
Goki cam kedhie, abik kuɛth; ku kuanyki kak athueithuei ci loony piny ka cii kɔc both, ku thiaŋki dioony kadherou.
Ku kɔc wen ci cam ayek agum kaŋuan ke roor, ku nu diaar ku mith ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ke tɔ kut e kɔc jel, ku le e abelic, ago bɛn e Magdala thok.
Na wen, ke Parithai bɔ keke Thadokai, bik bɛn them, akɔɔrki gok bi bɛn nhial.
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Te ci akɔl thei, ka yak lueel, yan, Piny abi piath; tenhial aci thiɛth.
Na miak, ka yak lueel, yan, Deŋ ajot ekoole; tenhial aci thiɛth ku arieel anu. Wek kɔc de yac aguk, we ŋic nhial woiyic aguɔki piny ŋic tau bi en tɔu; ku ŋiny ba wek tau de run ŋic adhal week!
Rem racpiɔu rem e dieer lei kɔɔr akɔɔr gok; ku acin gok bi nyuoth en, ee kede nebi Jona tei. Go ke nyaaŋ piny, ku jel.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce ɣet lɔŋtui, ke ke ci kuin ci pam ruooi.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Yak rot tiit e luɔu de Parithai keke Thadokai.
Goki teer kapac, ku luelki, yan, Ee luɔi ken wok kuin bɛɛi, en aa lueel en en.
Na wen, aci Yecu ye ŋic, ke ke yook, yan, Wek kɔc dɛk e gam, eeŋo tɛɛrki wapac, luɔi cin en kuin cak bɛɛi?
Kɛnki kaŋ guɔ ŋic, ku kɛnki weniim tak ne kuiin ci pam kadhic keke agum de kɔc kadhic, ku dioony kadi cak kuany?
Ayi kuiin ci pam kadherou keke agum de kɔc kaŋuan, ku dioony kadi cak kuany?
Eeŋo ca wek e ŋic, nɔn cii en e kede kuin en e lɛk ɛn e week, yan, bak rot tiit e luɔu de Parithai keke Thadokai?
Na wen, ke jɔki ŋic nɔn e cii en ke yook, an, bik rot tht ne luɔu de kuin, ee weet en e lueel, weet de Parithai keke Thadokai.
Na wen, aci Yecu bɛn piny de Kaithareia Pilipi, ke thiec kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Ɣe kɔc lueel, yan, aa ŋa, yɛn Wen e raan?
Goki lueel, yan, Ne kɔc kɔk, yan, Jɔn Baptith; ku ne kɔk, an, Elija; ku ne kɔk, an, Jeremia, ku nɔn ee yen raan toŋ de nebii.
Go ke thieec, yan, Ku na week, yak lueel, yan, aa ŋa?
Go Thimon Petero bɛɛr, yan, Ɣin ee Kritho, Wen e Nhialic piir.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook, yan, Thieithieei yin, Thimon BarJona; acie raan cath keke riŋ ku riɛm en e nyuth yin ekene, ee Waar nu paannhial.
Ku yin yɔɔk, yan, Yin Petero, ku kanithɔdi aba yik e kuure nɔm; ku acii riɛl e paan e thuɔɔu bi tiaam.
Ku yin ba gam mukthɛɛr ke ciɛɛŋ de paannhial; ku ke ba duut e piny nɔm, abi tɔu ke ci duut paannhial; ku ke ba lony e piny nɔm, abi tɔu ke ci lony paannhial, kaŋ kedhie.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce lom thook, ke ciki bi lɛk raan daŋ nɔn ee yen Kritho.

Ekoole aci Yecu kɔckɛn e piooce gɔl e nyuuth luɔi bi en dhil jal le Jeruthalem, ku luɔi bi en kajuec guum tede roordit ku banydit ke ka ke Nhialic, ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku bi nɔk abi thou, ku bi ro bɛ jɔt ekool ee kek diak.
Na wen, ke Petero dɔm Bɛny cin, go jɔ jɔɔny, yan, Acie yen, Bɛnydit; yin cii kene bi yok anandu.
Go ro puk, ku yook Petero, yan, Waane rot e yakɔu cieen, Catan; yɛn ci piɔu rac woke yin; yin ken yipiɔu tuom ka ke Nhialic, ee ka ke kɔc tei.
Na wen, ke Yecu yook kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Na de raan de piɔu luɔi bi en a kuany cok, ke nyaŋ rot, ku jɔt timdɛn ci riiu nɔm, ku biɔɔth acok.
Raan ebɛn raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en weike kony, ka bi ke mɔɔr; ku raan ebɛn raan mar weike ne biakdi, ka bi ke yok.
Te ciɛme raan piny nɔm ebɛn, ku mɛɛr weike, ke piathde akou? Bi raan ŋo gaam wɛɛr en weike?
Wen e raan abi bɛn ne dhueeŋ de Wun keke tuuckɛn nu nhial, ago raan riɔp ebɛn ne ke roŋ ne luɔide.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ade kɔc kɔk kaac etene, kɔc cii thuɔɔu bi thieep, te ŋoot kek ke ke ken Wen e raan tiŋ abɔ e ciɛɛŋdeyic.
Na wen, aci nhi lɛɛr kadhetem, ke Yecu nom Petero, ku Jakop, ku Jɔn manhe, ku leer keek e kuurdit nɔm kapac, kuurdiit baar;
go yeguop puk aye guop daŋ e keniim; go nyin lɔ riauriau cit man e akɔl, ku ɣer lupɔde ewic cit ɣɛɛrepiny.
Na wen, ke Mothe ku Elija e ke tul tede keek, ke ke jam e yen.
Go Petero bɛɛr, yook Yecu, yan, Bɛnydit, apiɛth nɔn tɔu wok ene; te ci yin gam, ke wo bi kɛɛt yik kadiak etene; tok ee kedu yin, ku tok ee kede Mothe, ku tok ee kede Elija.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke jam, ke luan ɣer ewic kum ke piny; ku jɔ rol bɛn e luatic rol luel en, yan, Wendien nhiaar ki, wendien mit e yapiɔu aret; yak kake piŋ.
Na wen, aci kɔcpiooce e piŋ, ke ke gut keniim piny, acik piɔth pau.
Go Yecu bɛn, bi ku jiɛk keek, lueel, yan, Jatki rot, duoki riɔc.
Te ci kek kenyiin jat nhial, go cien raan tiŋki, ee Yecu etok.
Na wen, abik piny e kuurdit nɔm, e ke lom Yecu thook, yan, Duoki de raan lɛkki ke cak tiŋ, aɣet te bi Wen e raan ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Go thieec e kɔcpiooce, yan, Eeŋo ye kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e lueel, yan, bi Elija dhil kɔn bɛn?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Elija abi dhil kɔn bɛn eyic, ago kaŋ bɛ puk tɔ ke piɛth kedhie.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Elija aci guɔ bɛn, ku akucki, agoki luoi kede piɔnden ebɛn. Yen acit guom bi Wen e raan kaŋ guum ka bik luoi yen aya.
Ago kɔcpiooce ŋic nɔn jiɛɛm en ne kede Jɔn Baptith.
Na wen, acik bɛn te nu kut e kɔc, ke raan tok bɔ tede yen, bi ku tuk emiɔl e yenɔm, lueel, yan,
Bɛnydit, tɔ yipiɔu kok we wendi; ade guop nok, ku aci kiet guop arac; ee cool e wiik mɛɛc, ku cool e wiik e piu yiic.
Ku aca yien kɔckuon e piooce, ku akenki leu e luɔi bi kek en tɔ dem.
Go Ɣecu bɛɛr, yan, Rem cin gam oou, rem e loŋ yalic oou! Ba reer e weyiic e run kadi? Ba kakun guum e run kadi? Bɛɛiki tede yɛn.
Go Yecu jɔŋ rac jɔɔny, go jal e yeguop, go meth guop waar enɔnthiine guop.
Na wen, ke kɔcpiooce e ke bɔ tede Yecu kapac, bik ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋo ken wok e leu ne ciec cieec wok e bei?

Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ne baŋ de cien gamdun; ku wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te dɛ wek gam cit nyin toŋ e wɛɛl cɔl matharda, ke we dueer kuurdiite yɔɔk, yan, Cuɔte rot cieen ya, ku adueer rot cuɔt; ku acin ke caki bi leu.
Ku jɔŋ lɛn cit ekene ee rɛɛc lɔ biic, e lɔŋ etok keke mɔl ee raan mɔl e kecam.
Na wen, te reer kek e Galili, ke ke yook e Yecu, yan, Wen e raan abi nyiɛɛn yine kɔc;
ku abik nɔk, go rot bɛ jɔt ekool ee kek diak. Agoki piɔth dhiɛɛu wei aretdiite.
Na wen, acik bɛn Kapernaum, ke kɔc e weu ke Nhialic tɔ kut ke ke bɔ tede Petero, bik ku thiecki, yan, Bɛnydun cii weu ke Nhialic e kut?
Go, an, Ɣɛɛ, aye ke kut. Na wen, aci bɛn ɣot, ke Yecu kɔn thieec, yan, Luel wudi, Thimon? yan, Mahik ke piny nɔm yek atholbo kɔɔr tede yiŋa ayi guaaric? Tede wɛɛtken, ku ye tede kɔc lei?
Go Petero lueel, yan, Tede kɔc lei. Go Yecu lueel, yan, Ku wɛɛtken ayeke pɔl, cie yen?
Ku enɔɔne, ke ke cuku bi tɔ diu piɔth, lɔ wiir, dɛɛnye alabithɔ, ku nom rɛc ci kɔn dɔm; ku te ci yin e liep thok, ke yin bi rialdit yok; en aba noom, ku game keek, abi aa kedi yɛn ku kedu yin aya.
Ekoole guop, ke kɔcpiooce ke ke bɔ tede Yecu, bik ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋa dit e ciɛɛŋ de paannhialic?
Go Yecu mɛnhthiinakaŋ cɔɔl, ku tɛɛu e keyiic cil,
ku lueel, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te kɛn wek rot puk, abak ciet niiththiiakaŋ, ke we cii bi lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de paannhialic.
Yen ka, raan ebɛn raan e ro tɔ koor cit man e mɛnhthiine, yen adit e ciɛɛŋ de paannhial.
Ku raan dɔm menhthiin toŋ cit emɛnhe ne rinki, ke dɔm ɛn;
ku raan bi mɛnh tok e miththiike yiic tɔ loi kerac, mith ci a gam, adueer ŋuan tede yen, te ci pil e guar mac e yeyeth, ku jɔ mou wiir e aluŋic.
Amadinoou e kɔc ke piny nɔm ne biak de ka ye kɔc tɔ loi kerac! ka ye kɔc tɔ loi kerac abik dhil bɛn; ku amadinoou e raane raan e kedaŋ bɛɛi ke ye kɔc tɔ loi kerac!

Ku na yicin ku nɔn ee yen yicok, na ci yi tɔ loi kerac, ke teeme bei, cuate wei; luɔi bi yin lɔ te nu piir, acakaa yin e ye ŋɔl ku yi cath we ciin tok, yen aŋuan tede yin, ne luɔi bi yi cuat mɛɛc many bi dep aɣet athɛɛr, ke yi cath we cin kaarou ku cok kaarou.

Ku yinyin, te ci en yi tɔ loi kerac, ke ŋuete bei, ku cuate wei; luɔi bi yin lɔ te nu piir, ke yi cath we nyin tok, yen aŋuan tede yin, ne luɔi bi yi cuat e giɛna deyic mac, te ciɛk yin cath we nyin kaarou.
Tieŋki rot, ke we cii mɛnh tok e miththiike yiic bi kuoc theek; wek yɔɔk, yan, Tuuckɛn nhial ayek Waar woi nyin ecaŋɣɔn Waar nu paannhial.
Wen e raan aa bɔ bi ke ci maar bɛn kony wei.
Yak lueel wakdi? Na de raan de thok kabɔt, ku mar tok e keek roor, ke raane cii thok kathierdheŋuan ku dheŋuan bi nyaaŋ piny, ku le e kurdit niim, le ke ci maar kɔɔr?
Ku na te le yen e yok, wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Amit piɔu ne biak de thɔke awar miɛt mit en piɔu ne biak de thierdheŋuan ku dheŋuan ken maar.
Yen acit Wuoorduon nu paannhial, aliu e yepiɔu luɔi bi mɛnh tok maar e miththiike yiic.
Ku na mɛnhkui, te ci en yi wac kedaŋ, ke yi lɔ, lɛke yen ke ci wooc tedun waarou; te ci en yi piŋ thok, ke we ye wepiɔth jɔ yok weke mɛnhkui.
Ku te reec en yi piŋ thok, ke yi lɔ weke raan tok ayi kɔc kaarou, ago jam lɔ gɔk ebɛn e caatɔɔ thook kaarou ayi diak.
Ku te reec en keek piŋ thook, ke yi lɛke kanithɔ; ku te reec en kanithɔ piŋ thok, ke tɔ cit jur kuc Nhialic tede yin ku cit raan e atholbo tɔ kut.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, Te de yen ke bak duut e piny nɔm, ke abi duut paannhial; ku te de yen ke bak dɔk e piny nɔm, ke abi dɔk paannhial.
Wek bɛ yɔɔk, yan, Na de kɔc kaarou e weyiic, kɔc mat kethook e piny nɔm, ne ke bik lim, ka bi luoi keek ne Waar nu paannhial.
Ku te nu kɔc kaarou ayi diak, kɔc ci gueer ne rinki, ya ka, e keyiic cil etɛɛn.
Na wen, ke Petero bɔ te nu yen, bi ku thieec, yan, Bɛnydit, bi mɛnhkai a wac kaŋ raandi, ku ba pɔl? Raandherou?
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Yin ca yook, yan, Raandherou; yin yɔɔk, yan, Raandherou raanthierdherou.
Yen a thɔŋ ciɛɛŋ de paannhial keke malik tok, malik kɔɔr luɔi bi en weu kueen yiic keke liimke.
Na wen, aci kuɛn gɔl, ke lim tok biiye tede yen, raan cath ke kany dit aret, agum de talantɔɔn kathieer. (Talantɔn tok awar agum de jinii.)
Ku te cin en ke cut en, ke yook e bɛnyde, yan, bi rot ɣaac, yen ku tiiŋde, ku mithke, ku ka cath ne yen kedhie, ka bi en ke kaŋ cool.
Na wen, ke lime cuɛt rot piny, ku lɛŋ, yan, Bɛny, pale yipiɔu piny, kaŋ kedhie aba ke cuol yin.
Go bɛny de lime go piɔu kok keke yen, ku jɔ pɔl, pɛl kany.
Na wen, ke lɔ biic, yen elime guop, le ku yok raan toŋ e wɛɛtkɛn ee kek liim, raan cath ke kanyde, kany baŋ, cit jini tok tei; go dɔm, ku min rol, lueel, yan, Cuole yɛn kanydien cath ke yin.
Go raan wen ee kek liim etok go ro cuat piny e yecok, ku lɛŋ, yan, Pale yipiɔu piny, kaŋ kedhie aba ke cuol yin.
Go cuo gam; go lɔ ku tɛɛu e aloocic, aɣet te bi yen kany cool.
Na wen, ke wɛɛt kɔk ee kek liim, te ci kek ke ci looi tiŋ, ke ke diu piɔth, goki bɛn ku lekki bɛnyden ka ci looi ebɛn.
Na wen, aci bɛny e cɔɔl, ke yook, yan, Yin ee lim racpiɔu, yin ca pal ekanydiite ebɛn, ne biak ci yin a lɔŋ;
ku yin, cii piɔu dueer dhil kok weke raanduon aa wek liim etok, cit man can piɔu kok woke yin?
Go bɛnyde gɔth, ku gɛm kɔc e kɔc leeŋ wei, aɣet te bi en kaŋ cool kedhie, ka kɛɛny tede yen.
Yen acit ke bi Waar nu paannhial luoi week, te kɛn wek rot pɔl wapac e wepiɔth thin, ŋɛk e mɛnhkene pal ka ci wooc.
Na wen, aci Yecu welke thol, ke jel e Galili, le piny de Judaya nu e Jordan nɔm lɔŋtui;
ku kuany cok e kuut dit ke kɔc; go ke tɔ dem etɛɛn.
Na wen, ke Parithai ke ke bɔ te nu yen aya, bik bɛn them, goki thieec, yan, Ci pal raan luɔi bi en pɔk keke tiiŋde ne baŋ de kerieec ebɛn?
Go bɛɛr, yok keek, yan, Kɛnki kueen e awarekic, yan, Acieŋ e cak kɔc ɣɔn thɛɛr, aa ke ciɛk moc ku tik,
ago lueel, yan, Yen abi raan wun pɔl ku pɛl man, ago jɔ mat keke tiiŋde; agoki aa guop tok keek kaarou?
Yen ka, aciki be aa rou, ayek guop tok. Ku enɔɔne, ke cii Nhialic matic, e cii raan tekic.
Goki thieec, yan, Eeŋo e Mothe e lueel, yan, bi raan tik gam awarek de pɔk, jɔn pɔk ke ye.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ne baŋ de riɛl aa wek piɔth riɛl, yen aa pɛle Mothe week, an, bak pɔk ne dieerkun; ku ɣɔn ciɛke kaŋ, aa cii tɔu aya.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan ebɛn raan bi pɔk keke tiiŋde, tiiŋ ken lɔ keke mony daŋ, ago tiiŋ daŋ thiaak, ka ci lɔ keke tiiŋ lei; ku raan thiak tiiŋ wen cii monyde pɔl, ka ci lɔ keke tiiŋ lei.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce lueel, yan, Na ye yen ee tau tɛuwe raan keke thŋde, ka cii piɛth luɔi bi raan thieek.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Jame aci dueere muk e kɔc kedhie, ee kɔc ci yien en kapac, keek adueer e muk.
Rooc kɔk anuki, kɔc ci dhieeth ke ke ye rooc e marken yac; ku nu rooc kɔk, kɔc ci roc e kɔc; ku nu rooc, kɔc ci rot roc ne biak de ciɛɛŋ de paannhial. Raan dueer jame leu e muk, ke muk.
Na wen, ke miththiaakaŋ ke ke biiye tede yen, an, bi ecin thany e kegup, ku lɛŋ: go kɔcpiooce ke jɔɔny.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Palki miththiaakaŋ, duoki ke pen bɛn te nuo yɛn; ciɛɛŋ de paannhial ee kede kɔc cit keek.
Go ecin thany e kegup, ku jɔ jal etɛɛn.
Na wen, ke raan tok bɔ tede yen, bi ku thieec, yan, Bɛny piɛth bɛny e weet, ba kepiɛth ŋo looi, ban dɛ piir athɛɛr?
Go yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo tɔ yin a piɛth? Acin raan piɛth nu, ee tok tei, yen Nhialic. Ku na kɔɔr nɔn bi yin lɔ te nu piir, ke yi dot cok ke loŋ.
Go thieec, yan, Ee cokou? Go Yecu lueel, yan, Du raan nak abi thou, Du lɔ weke tiiŋ lei, Du kuel, Du raan ciɛk thok e lueth,
Ye wuur rieu keke moor, ku, yan, Nhiaar raan rɛɛr keke yin, acit man nhiɛɛr yin rot.
Go dhuŋe lueel, yan, Kake kedhie aa ya ke muk ɣɔn aa yɛn meth aɣet ci enɔɔne; eeŋo ŋoot ke dak tede yɛn?
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Na kɔɔr nɔn hi yin piɔu dikedik, ke yi lɔ, ɣaace weuku, ku niiɔc kɔc kuany nyiin, ku yin bi dɛ weu ci kueet paannhial; ku ha, kuany acok.
Na wen, aci dhuŋe jame piŋ, ke jel, ke ci piɔu diu; ne luɔi ee yen raan juec e kake.
Go Yecu kɔckɛn e piooce yɔɔk, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Lɔ le raan e ciɛɛŋ de paannhialic ee duɛɛr dhal tede raan juec e kake.
Ku wek bɛ yɔɔk, yan, Teek teeke thɔrɔl e hipɔ nyin, yen apiɔl ne lɔ le raan juec e kake e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce e piŋ, ke ke gai aretdiite, luelki, yan, Eeŋa dueere jɔ kony wei?
Go Yecu ke woi, ku yook keek, yan, Kene ee ke dhal kɔc: ku Nhialic ee kaŋ leu kedhie.
Go Petero bɛɛr, yook, yan, Tiŋ, wok ki, wok ci kaŋ nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku kuanyki yicok; ku buk jɔ dɛ ŋo?

Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Wek kɔc ci a kuany cok, kool bi kaŋ bɛ cak, kool hi Wen e raan reer e thoony de dhueeŋde nɔm, ke wek aya we bi reer e thony niim kathieer ku rou, ke we guiir loŋ de dhien ke Yithrael kathieer ku rou.

Ku raan ebɛn raan ci ɣoot nyaaŋ piny, ku nyieeŋ mithakecken piny, ayi nyiirakecken, ayi wun, ayi man, ayi tiiŋde, ayi mithke, ayi dumke, ne biak de rinki, ka bi kaŋ yok ka ci ŋuak nyin raanbɔt, ku abi piir athɛɛr lɔɔk lak.
Ku kɔc juec nu tueŋ abik wɛɛn cieen; ku wɛɛn kɔc nu cieen tueŋ.
Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial athoŋ ke raan e bɛny de baai, raan ci riɛɛl biic miak etɛɛn, le kɔc kɔɔr, kɔc bi luui e weu e domdeyic, dom e tim cɔl enap.
Na wen, aci weu giim keke kɔc lui, yan, kool tok ke raan abi dɛ denarion tok, (yen acit giriic kadiak), ke ke tɔ lɔ domic.
Go bɛ lɔ biic te cit thaar kadiak akol, ku tiŋ kɔc kɔk akɛɛcki e thuuk thok, ke ke cin niim luɔi;
go ke yɔɔk, yan, Laki domic ayadaŋ, ke we ba miɔɔc ne kepiɛth. Goki lɔ.
Na wen, ke be lɔ biic tecit thaar kadhetem akol, ayi tecit thaar kadheŋuan, ku jɔ looi kecit ken awen.
Na ɣɔn theen, tecit thaar kathieer ku tok akol, ke lɔ biic, le ku yok kɔc kɔk akɛɛcki ke ke cin niim luɔi, go ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo kaac wek ene ecaŋawen, ke we cin niim luɔi?
Goki lueel, yan, Ee luɔi cin en raan ci wo tɔ lui e weu. Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Laki domic week aya; ke we bi miɔɔc e kepiɛth.
Na wen, aci akɔl lɔ piny, ke bɛny de dom yook wukilde, yan, Cɔl kɔc lui, ku game keek ariopden, aba gɔl ne kɔc e bɔ cieen, le guoot e kɔc e bɔ tueŋ.
Na wen, ke kɔc e ke bɔ, kɔc wen e cak luɔi tecit thaar kathieer ku tok, ku jɔke gam denariɔn tok raan ebɛn.
Na wen, ke kɔc e kɔn lɔ e luɔiyic ke ke bɔ, ayek lueel e kepiɔth, an, bike miɔɔc ne kewar kede kɔc awen; goke gam denariɔn tok tei raan ebɛn.
Na wen, acik kaken noom, ke ke dok e keyac ne bɛny de baai,
luelki, yan, Kɔc e bɔ cieene aake lui e thaar tok tei, ku aci ke kieet e wook, wok kɔc ci akɔl guum, ayi tuoc de piny.
Go bɛɛr, yook raan tok e keek, yan, Math, yin kɛn cam; e wo ken jam giim wen ne kede denariɔn tok?
Nom kedu, ku lɔ; yɛn de piɔu luɔi ban raan e bɔ cieene miɔɔc, acit man miaac ɛn yin aya.
Kene pal ɛn nɔn ban ke nu yapiɔu looi ne kaki? Rac nyin, ne baŋ de piath e yɛnpiɔu?
Yen tede ka, kɔc e bɔ cieen abik wɛɛn tueŋ; ku ween kɔc e bɔ tueŋ cieen. Kɔc ci cɔɔl ajuecki, ku kɔc ci lɔc aliki.
Na wen, aciɛth ke lɔ Jeruthalem, ke Yecu cɔl kɔcpiooce kathieer ku rou kapac kueer, ku yook keek, yan,
Tieŋki, wo lɔ Jeruthalem; ku Wen e raan abi nyiɛn banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku abik yiek yeth gaak, an, bi nɔk,
ku yinki Juoor lek geet, ku lek dui e waat, ku lek piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu; ku ekool ee kek diak abi ro bɛ jɔt.
Na wen, ke man wɛɛt ke Dhebedayo bɔ te nu yen keke wɛɛtke, bi ku tuk emiɔl e yenɔm, ade ke kɔɔr tede yen.
Ago thieec, yan, Eeŋo kɔɔr? Go lueel, yan, Tɔ wɛɛtkiene kaarou rɛɛr e ciɛɛŋduyic, tok e baŋ cuenydu, ku tok e baŋ camdu.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Wek kuc ke liɛpki. Duɛɛrki dek leu e biny ban dek e ye, ku duɛɛrki baptith leu baptinh bi a baptith? Goki lueel, yan, Adueerku leu.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, We bi dek e binydi ne yic, ku we bi baptith e baptinh ci a baptith; ku reer e baŋ cuenydi ku baŋ camdi acie kedien ba yien kɔc, ee kede kɔc cii Waar kɔn lueel, an, bi aa keden.
Na wen, aci kɔc kathieer e piŋ, ke ke diu piɔth e wɛɛtke kaarou.
Go Yecu ke cɔɔl te nu yen, ku lueel, yan, We ŋic banydit ke Juoor, yan, ayek kɔcken cieŋ e ciɛɛŋ ril, ayi kɔckɛn dit, ayek keek cieŋ.
Ku acii bi tɔu aya ne weyiic: ku raan ebɛn raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en dit e weyiic, e tɔ rot e raan e kakun looi;
ku raan ebɛn raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en lɔ tueŋ e weyiic, e tɔ rot e limdun;
cit man e Wen e raan, aa cii bɔ luɔi bi yen aa luoi kaŋ, e luɔi bi en ka ke kɔc aa looi, yen a bi yen, ku luɔi bi en weike gaam e weer bi en kɔc juec wɛɛr bei.
Na wen, ajelki e Jeriko, ke kuany cok e kut diit e kɔc.
Ku ade coor kaarou rɛɛr e kueer kec; na wen, acik e piŋ nɔn teeke Yecu kueer, ke ke cot, yan, Tɔ yipiɔu kok we wook, yin Bɛnydit, wen e Dabid.
Agoke jɔɔny e kut e kɔc, yan, Miɛmki; agoki coot awar cɔt awen, luelki, yan, Tɔ yipiɔu kok we wook, yin Bɛnydit, wen e Dabid.
Go Yecu kɔɔc, ku cɔɔl keek, ku thieec keek, yan, Eeŋo kaarki ke ba luoi week?
Goki lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, e luɔi bi yin wo liep nyiin.
Go Yecu piɔu kok keke keek, ku jiɛk kenyiin; agoki dap yin enɔnthiine, ku kuanyki cok.
Na wen, acik thiɔk e Jeruthalem, ku acik ɣet Bethpage, te lɔ kuurdiit cɔl Olip, ke Yecu toc kɔcpiooce kaarou,
ku yook keek, yan, Laki paan nu e weniim tueŋ, ke we bi muni yok enɔnthiine, ke mac, ku de cok mɛnhde; luɔnyki keek, ku bɛɛiki ke te nuo yɛn.
Ku na de raan de ke lek week, ke luɛlki, yan, Akɔɔr Bɛnydit ke; ku abi ke tɔ lɔ enɔnthiine.
Kene aci looi ebɛn, e luɔi bi jam aa yic, jam ci lueel e nebi, yan,
Yɔɔkki nyan e Dhiɔn, Yan, Tiŋ, malikdu abɔ te nu yin, E ro tɔ koor, ku acath e muni kɔu, Ku ciɛth e dau kɔu dan e muul.
Go kɔcpiooce lɔ, lek kaŋ looi acit man ci Yecu e lɛk keek,
ku biiki muul keke dande, ku tɛɛuki lupɔɔken e kekɔɔth, go nyuc e kekɔɔth.
Go tedit e kut e kɔcic goki lupɔɔken thiɛth kueer; ku tem kɔc kɔk keer ke tiim, ku thiethki ke kueer.
Go kut e kɔc cath tueŋ keke kut e kɔc biɔth ke cieen goki ya coot, yan, Odhana e tɔu ke wen e Dabid! Thieithieei e raan bɔ ne rin ke Bɛnydit! Odhana e tɔu tenhial ya!
Na wen, aci ɣet Jeruthalem, ke panydit lɔ waawaa ebɛn, go kɔc thiec, yan, Eeŋa ekene?
Go kut e kɔc lueel, yan, Kene ee Yecu, nebi de Nadhareth de Galili.

Go Yecu lɔ e luaŋditt e Nhialicic, le ku cieec kɔc biic kedhie kɔc e kaŋ ɣaac ku kɔc e kaŋ ɣɔɔc luɛɛk, ku puk pɛɛm piny pɛɛm ke kɔc e weu waar yiic, ayi kak ee kɔc reer kɔc e guk ɣaac, aci ke pɔk piny;
ku yook keek, yan, Aci gɔɔr, yan, Ɣondi abi aa cɔl ɣon e lɔŋ; ku week, acak tɔ ye ɣon e kɔc e kaŋ rum.
Go coor bɛn te nu yen luɛɛk ayi ŋol, ago ke tɔ dem.
Na wen, aci banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr kadit ci looi tiŋ, ku tiŋki mith acotki e luaŋditic, ke yek lueel, yan, Odhana e tɔu ke Wen e Dabid, agoki piɔth diu aret,
ku thiecki, yan, Ke lueel mithke ci piŋ? Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Ɣɛɛ; kɛnki kɔn kueen e awarekic anandun, yan, Yin e lɛcdu tɔ ye dikedik ne miththiike thook ayi mith ŋoot e ke thuet?
Go ke nyaaŋ piny, ku jel panydit le Bethani, le niin etɛɛn.
Na ɣɔnmiak etɛɛn, ke dhuny enɔm panydit, ke ci cɔk nɔk.
Na wen, ke tiŋ tim ŋaap e kueer kec, go bɛn te nu yen, go cien ke yok e yenom, ee yith tei kapac. Go yɔɔk, yan, E cin mith bi bɛ aa tɔu e yinɔm athɛɛr! Go ŋaap riɔu enɔnthiine.
Na wen, aci kɔcpiooce e tiŋ, ke ke gai, ku luelki, yan, Ŋaap e go guɔ dap riɔu adi?

Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Na cathki e gam, ku caki piɔth wiel e kaamic, ke we cii kene bi looi tei, ke ci luoi ŋaap, ku na yɔɔkki kuurdiite aya, yan, Tɔ ro nyiɛɛiye, deenye yi wiir, ka dueere looi.
Ku na de ke bak lim te laŋ wek, ku gamki, abak keek aa yok.
Na wen, aci bɛn e luaŋdiit e Nhialicic, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic keke kɔcdit ke kɔc yiic ke ke bɔ te nu yen, te weet en kɔc, bik ku thiecki, yan, E riɛlou looi yin ekake? Ku eeŋa e gɛm yin eriɛle?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Ku we ba thiec cook tok aya, ku te ca wek e lɛk ɛn, ke we ba lɛk riɛl luɔɔi ɛn ekake.
Yan, Baptinh e Jɔn, e bɔ enou? e bɔ tenhial, ku e bɔ tede kɔc? Goki tɛɛr kapac, yan, Te lueel wok en, yan, Aa bɔ tenhial, ka bi wo thieec, yan, Eeŋo daŋ kɛn wek e gam?
Ku te lueel wok en, yan, Aa bɔ tede kɔc; wok riɔc e kut e kɔc; ayek Jɔn tɔ ye nebi kedhie.
Goki kede Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Akucku. Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ayi yɛn aya, we ca bi lɛk riɛldi, riɛl luɔɔi ɛn ekake.
Ku luɛlki wakdi, week? Ŋadi ade wɛɛtke kaarou; go bɛn tede mɛnh tueŋ, bi ku yook, yan, Wendi, lɔ lni domdi ekoole, dom e enap.
Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn cii lɔ; na wen, ke look epiɔu puk, go lɔ.
Go bɛn tede wen cieen, bi ku yook cit man awen. Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn lɔ, waar; ku cii lɔ.

Ee mɛnhou e keyiic kaarou, mɛnh e loi kede piɔn e wuonden? Goki lueel, yan, Ee mɛnh tueŋ. Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut keke akɔɔrroor kek a kɔn lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic e week.
Jɔn e hɛn tede week e kueer e piathepiɔu, ku rɛɛcki gam; ku gam kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ayi akɔɔrroor; ku week, te ca wek e tiŋ, ke wek ken wepiɔth bɛ puk, abak gam.

Piɛŋki kaaŋ daŋ; Raan anu ke ye bɛny de baai; na wen, ke pith dom e tim cɔl enap, go geeu e kal, ku wec te bi mith ke tiim aa nyiith yiic, ku yik aloocdiit baar, go kuɛi kɔc bi en aa tiit, ku jɔ keny paan mec.
Na wen, aci luɔk de tiim thiɔk, ke toc liimke tuc ke kɔc e dom tiit, yan, bik ka ci luɔk noom tede keek.
Na wen, ke kɔc e dom tiit ke ke dɔm liimke, duiki tok, ku nakki tok, ku biookki tok e kur.
Na wen, ke be liim kɔk tooc, liim juec awarki kɔc awaan; goki luoi keek acit man awaan.
Na wen cieen, ke tuc wende keek, lueel, an, Abik wendi rieu.
Ku te ci kɔc e dom tiit wende tiŋ, ke luelki kapac, yan, Wen bi kaŋ lɔɔk lak, ki; bak nakku, agoku kedɛn, an, bi lɔɔk lak, agoku dɔm abi aa keda.
Goki dɔm, cuɛtki biic domic, ku nakki.
Na miak, abɔ bɛny de dom, bi ŋo luoi kɔc e dom tiite?
Goki lueel, yan, Abi ke nɔk e naŋ tuc, kek kɔc racpiɔthe, ago domdɛn e enap taau e kɔc kɔk cin, kɔc bi dom aa tiit, kɔc bi yen aa yien mith ke tiim ekooldɛn ee kek luɔk.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Kɛnki kɔn kueen e kacigɔɔr yiic anandun, yan, Kuur cii kɔc yik alooc rɛɛc, Yen guop aye tɔ ye kuur e aguk nɔm; Ee luɔi de Bɛnydit ekene, Ku ye ken e wo tɔ gai?
Yen a yɔɔk ɛn week, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic abi nyaai tede week, ago gam jur daŋ, jur e luɔk e mith roŋ ne yen.
Ku raan bi loony e kuure nɔm abi dhuɔŋ; ku raan bi kuure loony e yenɔm, abi mot abi ciet abuui.
Na wen, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic keke Parithai, te ci kek kaaŋe piŋ, ke ke ŋic nɔn jiɛɛm en e keden.
Na wen, akɔɔrki dom dɔm kek en, ke ke riɔc e kut e kɔc, e luɔi ee kek e tɔ ye nebi.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, ku be jam ne kaaŋ, lueel, yan,
Ciɛɛŋ de paannhial acit malik tok, malik ci thieŋ de wende lueel,
go liimke tooc lek kɔc cɔɔl kɔc ci kɔn lɛk thieek; goki rɛɛc bɛn.
Na wen, ke be liim kɔk tooc, lueel, yan, Lɛkki kɔc ci kɔn lɛk thieek, yan, Tieŋki, yɛn e kecamdit guik; mioorki ku ɣɔkkien cuɛi kɔk acike nɔk, ku kaŋ acik thok kedhie; baki e thieekic.
Goki lueel, yan, Eeŋoda thin, ku jelki, lɔ tok domde, ku lɔ tok tede ɣoocde;
go kɔc ci doŋ goki himke dɔm, ku kurki keek, ku nakki keek.
Na wen, aci malik e piŋ, ke goth; ku tooc tɔɔŋke, lek kɔc e kɔc nɔke nɔk, ku nyop panydɛnditt e mac.
Na wen, ke yook liimke, yan, Thieek aci guik egɔk, ku kɔc waan ci lɛk aa ke cii roŋ e bɛn bi kek bɛn.
