Yen la wek e kuɛɛr dit yiic, ku kɔc bak yok ebɛn, jaki ke cɔɔl e thieekic.
Agoki lɔ biic kek liimke, leki e kuɛɛr dit yiic, agoki kɔc kut kɔc cik yok kedhie, kɔc rac ayi kɔc piɛth; go thieek jɔ thiaŋ ke kamaan.
Na wen, aci malik bɛn ɣot bi kamaan bɛn tiŋ, ke tiŋ raan etɛɛn raan ken lupɔ de thieek taau eyekɔu;
go thieec, yan, Math, eeŋo bi yin ene, ke yi cin lupɔ de thieek? Go lɔ lik.
Na wen, ke malik yook liimke, yan, Duotki cok ku yecin, ku jatki, cuatki tecol biic ya; dhieeu abi nu etɛɛn keke ŋeny de lec.
Kɔc ci cɔɔl ajuecki, ku kɔc ci lɔc aliki.
Go Parithai jal lek loŋ kieet kapac e luɔi bi kek e deep e jamic.

Goki kɔckɛn e piooce tuoc en, ne kɔc ke Kerod etok, agoki lueel, yan, Bɛny de weet, yin ŋicku nɔn ee yin yic, ku nɔn ee yin kɔc wɛɛt ne kueer e Nhialic eyic, ku acin raan bi yin riɔɔc e yen; yin cii kɔc e woi gup biic.
Yen lek yin wook, ke luel e yipiɔu. Ci pal wook nɔn bi wok Kaithar aa kuot atholbo, kuɔ cie yen?
Go Yecn rac de kepiɔth ŋic, go lueel, yan, Eeŋo thɛm wek ɛn, wek kɔe de yac aguk?
Nyuothki yɛn wenh atholbo. Goki wenh cɔl denariɔn bɛɛi yinki yen.
Go keek thieec, yan, Raan ci gɔɔre eeŋa, ku jam ci gɔɔr ee kede ŋa?
Goki lueel, yan, Ee Kaithar. Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Yak Kaithar yien ka ke Kaithar, ku yak Nhialic yien ka ke Nhialic.
Na wen, acik e piŋ, ke ke gai, ku palki, ku jelki.
Ekool mane guop, ke Thadokai ke ke bɔ te nu yen, kɔc e ye lueel, yan, Acin jon bi kɔc rot jɔt nu; goki thieec,
yan, Bɛny de weet, aci Mothe lueel, yan, Te thouwe raan, ke cin mith, ke mɛnhkene abi tiiŋde lɔɔk thiaak, go mɛnhkene dhieeth nɔm.
Ku enɔɔne, mith kadherou aake nu e woyiic, wɛɛt ke raan tok; na wen, ke wen dit thiek, ku jɔ thou, ke cin meth, go tik nyaŋ manhe.
Ayi wen lɔ e yecok aya, ayi wen ee kek diak aya, aɣet wen ee kek dherou, acik thou kedhie, ke ke cin mith.
Na wen, ke tik look thou aya e kecok cieen kedhie.
Ku enɔɔne, ekool e jonerot e kɔc, ke tiiŋe bi aa tiiŋ de raanou e keyiic kadherou? Aci aa keden kedhie.
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Acak wooc, ne kuny kuoc wek kacigɔɔr, ku kuocki riɛldiit e Nhialic aya.
Ekool e jonerot e kɔc, kɔc aciki ye thieek, ku cike ye thiaak, ayek ciet tuuc ke Nhialic paannhial.
Ku ne kede jon bi kɔc ci thou ro jɔt, kɛnki jam kueen jam ci lɛk week e Nhialic, yan,
Yɛn ee Nhialic de Abraɣam, ku ya Nhialic de Yithak, ku ya Nhialic de Jakop? Nhialic acie Nhialic de kɔc ci thou, ee Nhialic de kɔc piir.
Na wen, aci kuut ke kɔc e piŋ, ke ke gai ne weetde.
Na wen, aci Parithai e piŋ nɔn ci en Thadokai tɔ mim, ke ke kut keniim.
Go raan tok e keek, ee bɛny de loŋ, go thiec kaŋ, them en en, yan,
Bɛny e weet, cook diit e loŋic ee cookou?
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Nhiaar Bɛnydit Nhialicdu ne piɔndu ebɛn, ku ne weiku ebɛn, ku ne nɔmdu ebɛn.
Cook tueŋ ka, cook diit e loŋ.
Ku ke lɔ e yecok acit en, yan, Nhiaar raan rɛɛr ke yin cit man nhiɛɛr yin rot.
Loŋ ebɛn keke nebii anookki e cokke kaarou kɔɔth.
Na wen, aci Parithai keniim kut, ke ke thieec Yecu,
yan, Yak lueel adi ne kede Kritho? Ee wen e ŋa? Goki lueel, yan, Ee wen e Dabid.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo e Dabid e tɔ ye Bɛnydit ne riɛl e Weidit, lueel, an,
Bɛnydit aci Bɛnydiendit yɔɔk, yan, Rɛɛre e ciin cuenydi, Aɣet te ban kɔc dɛ wek ater tɔ ye ke bi yin yicok aa dhɔɔr?
Ku enɔɔne, te ci Dabid e tɔ ye Bɛnydit, ke jɔ aa wende adi?
Ku acin raan leu kede e beer, acin jam tok, ku acin raan dueer e bɛ thiec kaŋ aya, gɔl ekool mane guop.
Na wen, ke Yecu yook kuut ke kɔc, ku yook kɔckɛn e piooce,
yan, Kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai ayek reer e thoony e Mothe nɔm.
Yen mɔk wek kaŋ kedhie ka luelki, ku jaki keek aa looi; ku duoki luɔiden dɔmic; ayek kaŋ lueel, ku aciki keek e looi.
Ayek kathiek duut, kathiek bi kɔc doony, ku tɛɛuki keek e kɔc keet; ku keek gup ayek ke rɛɛc jak e kecin, acakaa cin toŋ thiine.
Ayek luɔiden looi ebɛn ke ke bi tiŋ e kɔc; ayek wɛlkɛn yek cieŋ tɔ laau yiic, ku tɔki lupɔɔken dit thook,
ku nhiaarki tepiɛth ee kɔc reer ekool e kecamdit, ayi tepiɛth ee kɔc reer e luek ke Nhialic yiic,
ku nhiaarki thiec ee kɔc ro thieec e thuk yiic, ku kɔɔrki luɔi bi keek aa cɔɔl e kɔc, yan, Rabi, Rabi.
Ku week, duoki rot e tɔ cɔl, yan, Rabi; ee tok en aye Bɛnyduon e weet, yen Kritho; ku wek ee mith ke raan tok wedhie.
Ku e cin raan yak tɔ ye wuoordun e piny nɔm; ee tok en aye Wuoordun, Raan nu paannhial.
Ku duoki rot e tɔ cɔl, yan, Bɛnydit; ee tok en aye Bɛnyduon dit, yen Kritho.
Ku raan dit e weyiic abi aa raan e kakun looi.
Raan e ro tɔ dit, yen abi tɔ koor; ku raan e ro tɔ koor, yen abi tɔ dit.
Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! wek e kɔc guoor biic e ciɛɛŋ de paannhial; wegup wek cie lɔ thin, ku kɔc kɔɔr lɔ thin acaki ke ye pal lɔ thin ayadaŋ.
Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! we ye ɣoot ke dieerthum cam, ku jaki kaŋ aa moony ne lɔŋduon aa wek lɔŋ, lɔŋ baar; yen aba wek ketuc gok yok ekool e guieereloŋ.

Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! we ye abapdit caathic ku caathki piny nɔm luɔi ba wek raan tok tɔ puk epiɔu e weetdun, ku te ci en epiɔu puk, ke yak tɔ ye wen e giɛna awar week aret.
Amawoou ne week, wek coor e kɔc wɛt kueer, ayak lueel, yan, Raan luel guutguut ne luaŋdht e Nhialic, ee ke cin naamde; ku raan luel guutguut ne adhaap nu e luaŋditic, ke kedaŋ anu e yeyeth.
Wek dhan ku coor! ee kenou dit e keyiic, adhaap en dit, ku dit luaŋdiit e Nhialic, luaŋ e adhaap tɔ ɣeric?
Ku yak lueel, yan, Raan luel guutguut ne yiŋ de lam, ee ke cin naamde; ku raan luel guutguut ne ke ci gam Nhialic ke nu e yiŋ de lam nɔm, ke kedaŋ anu e yeyeth.
Wek dhan ku coor! ee kenou dit e keyiic, ee ke ci gam Nhialic yen dit, ku dit yiŋ de lam, ee ke ye ke ci gam Nhialic tɔ ɣeric?
Yen tede ka, raan luel guutguut ne yiŋ de lam, ke luel guutguut ne yen, ku ne ka nu e yenɔm kedhie aya.
Ku raan luel guutguut ne luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ke luel guutguut ne yen, ku ne Raandiit e reer thin aya.
Ku raan hiel guutguut ne paannhial, ke luel guutguut ne thoonydiit e Nhialic, ku ne Raandiit e reer e yenɔm aya.

Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! we ye wal juaar, yi mint, ku anith, ku kumin, ku we ye ka ke loŋ pɔl, ka cit guieereloŋ, ku kokdepiɔu, ku gam, ka de naamden awarki wɛl awen; kake adi cak ke dhil aa looi, ku caki kak awen e pɔl ayadaŋ.
Wek coor e kɔc wɛt kueer, kɔc e kɔm dhiɛɛm wei, ku yak thɔrɔl liek.
Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! we ye abiny rɔɔth kɔu ayi aduok abik ɣɛɛr, ku keyiic thin acik thiaŋ e cam de kalei, ku kuny ee raan ro kuoc muk.
Yin Parithai cɔɔr! kɔn abiny cothic thin ayi aduok abik yiic ɣɛɛr, ke ke bi kɔɔth ɣɛɛr ayadaŋ.

Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! wek cit rɛŋ ci coth kɔɔth e wɛɛl ɣer, rɛŋ ci tɔ ye kɔɔth lakelak biic, ku keyiic thin acik thiaŋ e yom ke kɔc ci thou, keke kenhiany ebɛn.
Ayi week aya, wek e ro tɔ ye kɔc piɛthpiɔth e kɔc niim e baŋ biic, ku weyiic thin, wek e yac thiaŋ e rueeny keke rɛɛc aa wek loŋ rɛɛc piŋ.
Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! wek ee rɛŋ ke nebii yik, ku yak rɛŋ ke kɔc piɛthpiɔth looi abik lak,
ku yak lueel, yan, Te e wo nu te waan nu kuarkuɔ, adi kenku mat ne keek etok ne leu de riɛm de nebii.
Luɛl luɛɛl wek en aya, yen aya wek rot tɔ ye caatɔɔ ne kede nɔmdun, luɔi aa wek mith ke kɔc ɣɔn kur nebii.
Ken e ye kuarkun them, jaki thiɔɔŋ nɔm week.
Wek karac, wek mith ke deŋakook, bak poth wakdi e loŋditon ci guiir, an, bi we taau e giɛnayic?

Yen tede ka, tieŋki, yɛn tuc nebii week, ku kɔc pelniim, ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr; ku we bi kɔk e keek nɔk abak ke piaat e tiim ci riiu niim kɔɔth; ku we bi kɔk e keek dui e wɛt e luekkuon e Nhialic yiic, ku yaŋki keek e panydit ku panydit;

luɔi bi riɛm piɛthic ebɛn riɛm ci leu e piny nɔm, luɔi bi e kut nɔm e weyieth, gɔl e riɛm de Aabel raan piɛthpiɔu aɣet riɛm de Dhakaria wen e Barakia raan cak nɔk e kaam de luaŋditt e Nhialic keke yiŋ de lam.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Kake kedhie abike kut niim e reme yeth.
Agai Jeruthalem oou, Jeruthalem oou, wun e nebii nɔk, ku ye kɔc biɔɔk e kur, kɔc ci tuoc yin! Nin yekdi nin e dɛ yɛn piɔu luɔi ban mithku kum cit man e ajith mithke kum e yewok, ku rɛɛcki?
Tieŋki, ɣondun aci nyaŋ week ke ci riaak.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, We cii a bi bɛ tiŋ, aɣet te ba wek e lueel, yan, Thieithieei e raan bɔ e rin ke Bɛnydit.
Na wen, aci Yecu lɔ biic, ke jel luaŋdiit e Nhialic; go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛn te nu yen, bik e bɛn nyuoth ɣoot ke luaŋditt e Nhialic.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Caki kake woi kedhie? Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acin kuur toŋ bi doŋ e kuur daŋ nɔm etene, kuur cii bi dɛɛny piny.
Na wen, te reer en e kuur e Olip nɔm, ke kɔcpiooce ke ke bɔ te nu yen kapac, bik ku luelki, yan, Lɛke wook, bi kake looi nɛn? Ku ke bi kɔc bɛndu ŋic ee kaŋo, ayi thok de piny?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Tiɛtki rot ke cin raan bi week math.
Kɔc juec abik bɛn e rinki, bik ku luelki, yan, Yɛn Kritho ki; agoki kɔc juec math.
Ku we bi tɔɔŋ piŋ ku piɛŋki jam de tɔɔŋ; tiɛtki rot ke we cii bi diɛɛr; kake abik dhil tic kedhie, ku ŋoot thok de piny.
Jure abi tɔŋ yien jure, ku yin paane tɔŋ paane; ku cɔŋdit abi nu, ayi jɔɔk e kɔc thol, ayi nieŋ e piny ro niɛŋ, abik nu tɛɛn ku tɛɛn.
Ku kake kedhie acitki kɛc e tik kac te kɔɔr en dhieth.
E akoolke ke we bi yien kɔc, kɔc bi we luoi kerac, ku nakki week abak thou; ku we bi maan e juoor ebɛn ne baŋ de rinki.
Kɔc juec ahik piɔtii din e akoolke, agoki rot nyiɛɛn kapac, ku manki rot kapac.
Ku nebii aluɛth abik rot jɔt ke ke juec, agoki kɔc juec math.
Ku nhieer nu e kɔc juec piɔth abi liɛɛr, ne ŋueŋ bi kerac enyin ŋuak.
Ku raan bi epiɔu ruut aɣet te bi kaŋ thok, yen abi kony wei.
Ku welpiɛthke wel ke ciɛɛŋ abike guieer kɔc ke piny nɔm ebɛn, agoki aa caatɔ e juoor niim kedhie; ku jɔ thok de kaŋ bɛn.
Te ca wek kenhiɛɛny e kaŋ riɔɔk tiŋ, ke ci lueel e nebi Danyel, te ca wek e tiŋ a kaac teɣeric (raan kuen jam tɔ yokic apiɛth),
ke kɔc nu Judaya e ke kɔt leki e kurdit yiic;
ku raan nu e ɣot nɔm nhial e cii bɔ piny bi kaŋ bɛn bɛɛi bei ɣonde;
ayi raan nu e domic, e cii enɔm dɔk le lupɔɔke diec.
Ku amawoou e dieer liac ayi dieer thuat e akoolke!
Yak lɔŋ e baŋ e kat kat wek, ke cii bi nu rut, ku cii bi nu e kool e thabath aya.
E akoolke ketuc dit abii kɔc yok ketuc cin ke kit e ye, gɔl te ɣɔn ciɛke piny aɣet ci enɔɔne, ku acin ke cit en bi lɔɔk nu aɣet athɛɛr.
Ku te kene akoolke teem kɔɔth, ka cin kɔc dueere luok; ku ne baŋ de kɔc ci lɔc, akoolke abike teem kɔɔth.
E akoolke, te de yen raan yook week, yan, Tieŋki, Kritho ki ene, ku, yan, Ye ka etɛɛn, ke duoki gam.
Kritho aluɛth abik ro jɔt keke nebii aluɛth, ku abik gook dit aa nyuoth kɔc, ayi kagai dit; ku adueerki kɔc ci lɔc gup cɔk niim wei, te ci kek e leu.
Tieŋki, aca kɔn lɛk week.
Ku enɔɔne, te lek kek e week, yan, Tieŋki, ye ka, e jɔɔric, ke we duoki lɔ; ku na luelki, yan, Tieŋki, ye ka, e ɣotic thin ya, ke duoki gam.
Acit man e wil e deŋ ee bɛn te ye akɔl thok bɛn, ago piny riaau aɣet te ye akɔl lɔ piny; yen abi ciet bɛn e Wen e raan aya.
Te nu ke ci thou, yen ee te bi cuɔɔr guɛɛr thin.
Na ele enɔnthiine, te ci ketuc e akoolke thok, ke akɔl abi cuɔl, ku pɛɛi acii bi ruɛl, ku kuɛl ahik lony nhial, ku riɛl dit ke tenhial abike niɛŋ;
na ele, ke gok bi Wen e raan ŋic abi jɔ tic tenhial, ago juoor ke piny nɔm ebɛn agoki keyoth biɔɔk ke ke dhiau, ku abik Wen e raan tiŋ a bɔ e luaat yiic nhial ke cath ke riɛl dit ku dhueeŋ dit.
Na ele, ke bi tuuckɛn nhial tooc ne kaaŋ kok aret, lek kɔc ci lɔc kut niim, kɔc nu te lɔ rut, ku wowic, ku ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, ku ten ee akɔl lɔ piny, gɔl e nhial baŋ tok aɣet nhial baŋ tni.
Jaki kaaŋ piŋ apiɛth, kaaŋ de tim ŋaap; te ci keerde guɔ aa tieu, ke nyok, yen aya wek e ŋic nɔn ci ruel thiɔk.
Yen acit ekene ayadaŋ, te tieŋ wek kake kedhie, ke jaki ŋic nɔn ci en guɔ thiɔk, aci ɣeet e ɣoot thook.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Rem de enɔɔne aci bi thok, te ŋoote kake kedhie ke ke ken tic.
Tenhial abi nyai ayi piny, ku welki aciki bi nyai ananden.
Ku ne kede ekoole ayi ethaare acin raan ŋic en, acakaa tuuc nu paannhial aciki ŋic, ee Waar etok, en aŋic e.
Ku acit man e akool ke Noa ɣɔn thɛɛr, yen abi ciet bɛn de Wen e raan aya.
Acit man ɣɔn thɛɛr ŋoot amooldit wei, kɔc aake ye cam ku dekki, ku thiekki ku tɔki duetken thiak, aɣet akool e le Noa e abelic,
ku kucki aɣet bɛn ci amooldit bɛn, bi ku jɔt keek wei kedhie; yen abi ciet bɛn e Wen e raan aya.
Ekoole kɔc kaarou abik nu domic; tok abi jɔt, ku nyieeŋe tok piny.
Dieer guar kaarou; tok abi jɔt, ku nyieeŋe tok piny.
Yen aa wek rot tiit; wek kuc thaar bi Bɛnydun bɛn thin.
Jaki kene ŋic, yan, Te e bɛny de baai ŋic thaar bi cuɛɛr bɛn thin wakou, adi ci yin, ku adi ken ɣonde pɔl abi thuur kɔu.
Ku week, yak rot coc aya; thaar yak lueel, yan, cii en bɔ, en a bi Wen e raan thin.
Eeŋa ye lim ŋic kaŋ dot, lim pelnɔm, lim cii bɛnyde taau e dhiende nɔm, bi kɔc aa yien kedɛn e cam e akoolnyiin?
Thieithieei e lime, lim bii bɛnyde yok ke lui aya, te ci en bɛn.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Abi taau e kake niim kedhie.
Ku te ee yen lim rac, en elime, go lueel e yepiɔu, yan, Bɛnyda e gaau e bɛnde;
go wɛɛtkɛn ee kek liim jɔ aa dui, ku jɔ aa cam ku dek keke kɔc e rot tɔ wit mɔu etok;
ke bɛny de lime abi bɛn ekool cii ye tit tlun, ku abi bɛn e thaar kuc,
ago nyaai e kaŋ yiic, ku tɔ yok kedɛn tuc keke kɔc de yac aguk etok; dhieeu abi nu etɛɛn keke ŋeny de lec.
E akoolke, ciɛɛŋ de paannhial abi jɔ thɔɔŋ ke dhueec kathieer dhueec ci mɛckɛnkealath noom, ku leki biic lek mony thiek loor.
Ku dhic e keyiic apelki niim, ku dhic ayek dhan.
Duet dhan acik mɛckɛnkealath noom, ku cin miok mukki;
ku duet pelniim amukki miook e aguutken yiic keke mɛckɛnkealath etok.
Na wen, ke mony thiek gaau, ku nak nin keek kedhie, agoki nin.
Na wen, e wɛɛric cil, ke raan cot, yan, Tieŋki, mony thiek ka bɔye! Laki biic lak luɔɔrki.
Goki ro jɔt kek dhueec kedhie, ku cothki mɛckɛnkealath.
Na wen, ke duet dhan yook duet pelniim, yan, Miacki wook ne miookkun; mɛckuɔnkealath akɔɔrki liu.
Go duet pelniim puk nɔm, luelki, yan, Ei; kaŋ abik wo dak ne week etok; aŋuan luɔi ba we lɔ tede kɔc e kaŋ ɣaac, lak ro ɣɔɔc.
Na wen, alek ɣooc, ke mony thiek bɔ; go kɔc wen ci ro coc goki lɔ e thieekic ne yen etok; go ɣot gaar.
Na wen, e kake cok, ke dhueec kɔk e ke bɔ ayadaŋ, bik ku luelki, yan, Bɛny, bɛny, liepe wo ɣot.
Go puk nɔm, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Wek kuoc.
Yen tiɛt wek rot, wek kuc akool ayi thaar bi Wen e raan bɛn.
Acit man e raan e keny paan mec, ago liimke cɔɔl, liim ke yenguop, ku tɛɛu weuke e kecin.
Go raan tok gam talentɔɔn kadhic (acit agum de jinii kadhic), ku gɛm raane rou, ku gɛm raane tok; aci ke gam raan ebɛn ne kede deerde; ku jɔ keny.
Na wen, ke raan wen ci gam talentɔɔn kadhic, ke lɔ, go kaŋ ɣɔɔc ne keek, ago talentɔɔn kadhic kɔk yok ayadaŋ e ɣoocic.
Ayi raan ci gam rou aya, ke yok ren kɔk ayadaŋ.
Ku lɔ raan ci gam tok, le piny wec, ku thiɛɛn weu ke bɛnyde.
Na wen, aci akool juec lɛɛr, ke bɛny de liimke bɔ, ku jɔ weu kueen keke keek.
Go raan ci gam talentɔɔn kadhic bɛn ke muk talentɔɔn kadhic kɔk, go lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin ci talentɔɔn kadhic taau e yacin; tiŋ, yɛn ci talentɔɔn kadhic kɔk yok ayadaŋ.
Go bɛnyde yɔɔk, yan, Apiɛth, yin ee lim piɛth ŋic kaŋ dot; yin e kalik dot apiɛth, yin ba taau e kajuec yiic; yin bi piɔu miɛt weke bɛnydu etok.
Go raan ci gam talentɔɔn kaarou bɛn aya, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin ci talentɔɔn kaarou taau e yacin; tiŋ, yɛn ci talentɔɔn kaarou kɔk yok ayadaŋ.
Go bɛnyde yɔɔk, yan, Apiɛth, yin ee lim pieth ŋic kaŋ dot; yin e kalik dot apiɛth, yin ba taau e kajuec yiic; yin bi piɔu miɛt weke bɛnydu etok.
Na wen, ke raan bɔ raan ci gam talentɔn tok, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin ca ŋic nɔn ee yin raan ril, yin ee tem te ken yin kɔn com thin, ku yin ee kuany te ken yin kɔn pok thin;
aguɔ riɔɔc, guɔ lɔ ku thiaan talentɔndu piny; ŋo di, kedu ki.
Go bɛnyde puk nɔm, yan, Yin ee lim rɛɛc adaak rot, yin ŋic ɛn nɔn aa yɛn tem te kɛn ɛn kɔn com thin, ku ŋic nɔn aa yɛn kuany te kɛn ɛn kɔn pok thin;
adi ci weuki dhil tuɛɛl e kɔc cin kɔc e weu waar yiic, na wen, aca bɛn, adi ca kaki yok acik ro ŋuak.
Jaki talentɔn noom tede yen, ku gamki raan de talentɔɔn kathieer.
Raan ebɛn raan de nɔm kaŋ abi gam kɔk, ago kuɛth e kaŋ; ku raan cin nɔm kaŋ, acakaa ke cath ke yen abi noom tede yen.
Ku lim cin piathdɛn ci bɛɛi jaki cuat tecol biic ya; dhieeu abi nu etɛɛn keke ŋeny de lec.
Te bi Wen e raan ke cath keke dhueeŋde, ku bɔ tuucnhial ɣerpiɔth kedhie ne yen etok, ka bi jɔ nyuc e thoonyde nɔm, thoonydɛn e dhueeŋ;
go juoor kut niim kedhie e yenɔm; go ke pɔɔc, jure ku jure, cit man e tin e thok tiit ee amɛl poc e bɔɔth yiic;
ku abi amɛl taau e baŋ cuenyde, ku tɛɛu bɔɔth e baŋ camde.
Na ele, ke Malik abi kɔc nu e baŋ cuenyde yɔɔk, yan, Baki, wek kɔc ci thieei e Waar, bak lakki ciɛɛŋ ci guiek week te ɣɔn ciɛke piny;
yɛn aa cii cɔk nɔk, aguɔki a miɔɔc e kecam; yɛn aa ci yal, aguɔki ya tɔ dek; yɛn aa ye kaman, aguɔki ya taau ɣot;
yɛn aa cin kɔu lupɔ, aguɔki ya gam lupɔ ciɛŋ; yɛn aa tok, aguɔki ya neem; yɛn aa ci mac, aguɔki bɛn tede yɛn.
Ku abi kɔc piɛthpiɔth puk nɔm, thiecki, yan, Bɛnydit, e yi cuk tiŋ nɛn, ke yi nɛk cɔk, agoku yi miɔɔc? ku ci yal, agoku yi tɔ dek?
E yi cuk tiŋ nɛn ke yi ye kaman, agoku yi taau ɣot? ku cine kɔu lupɔ, agoku yi gam lupɔ ceŋ?
E yi cuk tiŋ nɛn ke yi tok, ku mac yi, agoku bɛn te nu yin?
Ku abi malik puk nɔm, yook keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Nɔn ca wek e luoi raan toŋ de mithekɔckuɔnke, acakaa raan koor e keek kedhie, ka cak luoi yɛn.
Na ele, ka bi kɔc yɔɔk aya kɔc nu e baŋ cam, yan, Jalki te nuo yɛn, wek kɔc de gup aciɛɛn, laki mɛɛc, many e dep athɛɛr, many ci looi ne kede joŋditt rac keke tuucke;
yɛn aa cii cɔk nɔk, ku acin kecam cak yinn ɛn; yɛn aa ci yal, ku wek e ken ɛn tɔ dek;
yɛn aa ye kaman, ku wek e ken ɛn gam ɣot; yɛn aa cin kɔu lupɔ, ku wek e ken ɛn gam lupɔ ciɛŋ; yɛn aa tok, ku mac ɛn, ku kɛnki ya neem.
Ku abik puk nɔm aya, yan, Bɛnydit, e yi cuk tiŋ nɛn ke yi ci cɔk nɔk, ku ci yal, ku ye kaman, ku cine kɔu lupɔ, ku yi tok, ku mac yi, ku kenku yi kony?
Na ele, ka bi jɔ pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Nɔn kɛn wek e luoi raan toŋ koor e kɔcke yiic, ka kɛnki luoi yɛn.
Ku kɔcke abik lɔ lek kedɛn tuc yok ke bi ceŋ athɛɛr; ku lɔ kɔc piɛthpiɔth te nu piir athɛɛr.
Na wen, aci Yecu welke thol kedhie, ke yook kɔckɛn e piooce, yan,
Aŋiɛcki nɔn bi aliith looi te ci nin thok kaarou aluth col Winythok, ku Wen e raan abi nyiɛɛn, go piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku roordit e kɔc yiic, agoki gueer e kalic kal e bɛnyditt tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic bɛny cɔl Kaiapath,
lek kethook mat luɔi bi keke Yecu dɔm ecueer, lek nɔk.
Ku yek lueel, yan, Acuku bi dɔm ekool e aliith, ke kɔc e ke cii bi lɔ waawaa.
Na wen, te nu Yecu Bethani, ɣon e Thimon raan de guop wɛth,
ke tik bɔ tede yen acath ke aguun ci cueec e kuur cɔl alabathar, aguun deyic miok ci tuom, ɣoocde atuc aret, go luooŋ e yenɔm, te reer en tedc cam.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce e tiŋ, ke ke diu piɔth aret, luelki, yan, Thiei thiei en kaŋ wei ee kaŋo?
Mioke adi ci ɣaac e weu juec, ku gɛmeke kɔc kuany nyiin.
Na wen, aci Yecu e piŋ, ke ke yook, yan, Eeŋo juot wek tiiŋe? aci ya luoi luɔi piɛth.
We de kɔc kuany nyiin e weyiic ecaŋdun; ku yɛn cie tɔu e weyiic ecaŋdi.
Ku luuŋ luuŋ en miok e yaguop, ee kede tau bi a tɔɔu, yen a looi en en.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Baai ebɛn te bi welpiɛthke aa guiir thin e piny nɔm ebɛn, ayi kene aya ke cii tiiŋe looi abi lueel ne taŋ bi kɔc kede aa tak.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ e kɔc kathieer ku rou jel, raan cɔl Judath Yithkariɔt, le tede banydit ke ka ke Nhialic,
le ku thieec keek, yan, Bak a gam ŋo ke ba lɔ nyien week? Goki weu giim ne yen etok, riet kathierdiak.
Na wen, ekool mane guop, ke jɔ kool piɛth kɔɔr, kool bi en e nyiɛɛn.
Na wen, ekool tueŋ e akool ke kuin cinic lnɔn, ke kɔcpiooce e ke bɔ tede Yecu, bik ku thiecki, yan, Ee tenou nu e yipiɔu te bi wo kaŋ guik, te bi yin Winythok cam thin?
Go lueel, yan, Laki panydit te nu ŋadi, ku jaki yɔɔk, yan, Aci Bɛny e weet lueel, yan, Kooldi e guɔ thiɔk; yɛn bi Winythok lɔ looi ɣondu woke kɔckien e piooce.
Go kɔcpiooce lɔ looi acit man ci Yecu ye lɛk keek; goki Winythok guik.
Na ɣɔn theen, ke nyuc tede cam keke kɔcke kathieer ku rou;
na wen, aciemki, ke lueel, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Raan tok e weyiic abi a nyiɛɛn.
Goki piɔth dhiau aret, ku jɔki Bɛnydit thieec raan ebɛn, e ŋɛk, an, Ee yɛn, Bɛnydit?
Go puk nɔm, yan, Raan gem keke yɛn etok e aduokic, yen guop yen abi a nyiɛɛn.
Wen e raan alɔ, cit man ci e gɔɔr e kede; ku amawoou ne raan bi Wen e raan nyiɛɛne! adueer ŋuɛɛn tede yen, te kene ye dhieeth, en eraane.
Na wen, ke Judath, raan e nyiin en, ke thieec, yan, Ee yɛn, Rabi? Go yɔɔk, yan, Ye ka, ci lueele.
Na wen, aciemki, ke Yecu kuany kuin ci pam, go thieei, ku wɛɛkic, ku yin kɔcpiooce, lueel, yan, Namki, camki; guopdi ki.
Go biny noom, ku thieei, ku jɔ yien keek, lueel, yan, Dɛkki wedhie e yen;
riɛmdi ki, riɛm de loŋ ci piac mac, riɛm ci leu ne baŋ de kɔc juec, ne nyiɛɛi hi karɛcken nyaai.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Yɛn cii bi bɛ dek ne mith ke enapke, aɣet te bi akool bɛn, akool ban deŋde bɛ gɔl woke week etok e ciɛɛŋ de Waaric.
Na wen, acik din e Nhialic kiit, ke ke lɔ biic lekki kuurdiit e Olip.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, We bi niim mum wedhie e baŋdi elewakou; aci gɔɔr, yan, Yɛn bi raan e tiit yup, go luny e thok agoki thiei roor.
Ku na miak, te can ro bɛ jɔt, ke yɛn hi kɔn lɔ tueŋ e week Galili.
Go Petero puk nɔm, lueel, yan, Na cak kɔc niim mum kedhie ne baŋdu, ke yɛn, yɛn cii nɔm bi mum anandi.
Go Yecu lɛk en, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Elewakɔu guop, te ŋoot ajith ke ken kin, ke yin bi a jai etaiwei raandiak.
Go Petero lueel, yan, Na ya cak dhil thou woke yin etok, ke yin ca bi jai etaiwei. Ku yen aa lueel kɔcpiooce kedhie ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ke Yecu bɔ te cɔl Gethemane keke keek etok, ku yook kɔcpiooce, yan, Yɔkki e we rɛɛr etene, yɛn lɔ lɔŋ etɛɛn.
Go Petero noom keke wɛɛt ke Dhebedayo kaarou, ku jɔ piɔu dhiau abi piɔu jiɛth aret.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Yɛn dhiau piɔu aret, aɣet te ban thook; rɛɛrki ene, ku yienki ne yɛn etok.
Go ro cuɔt tueŋ emaath, ku gut enɔm piny, ku lɛŋ, an, Yin Waar, na leuwe, tɔ binye waan ɛn; ku acie kede piɔndi, e kede piɔndu.
Go bɛn te nu kɔcpiooce, ku yok keek a nin, go Petero thieec, yan, Ee kaŋo, caki thaar tok dueer leu ne yin ne yɛn etok?
Yienki ku laŋki, ke we cii bi lɔ e themic; wei aye lɔ thin eyic, ku ye guop en akɔc.
Go bɛ jal raanrou, le lɔŋ, yan, Waar, na ci binye dhal luɔi bi en a waan, te kɛn ɛn kɔn dek e ye, ke yi tɔ kede piɔndu loi.
Go bɛn ku be ke yok anin, aci nin ke nɔk.
Go ke nyaaŋ piny, ku be jal, le lɔŋ raandiak, ku jiɛɛm e jam awen.
Na wen, ke bɔ te nu kɔckɛn e piooce, bi ku yook keek, yan, Yɔkki e we nin tethiinakaŋ, abak lɔŋ; tieŋki, thaar e guɔ thiɔk, ke Wen e raan anyiine ku yine kɔc e kerac looi.
Jatki rot, loku; raan nyiin ɛn ki, aci ɣeet.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke jam, di, ke Judath bɔ, ee raan toŋ de kɔc kathieer ku rou, ku bɔ kut diit e kɔc ne yen etok, amukki abatɛɛu ku thieec, abiki tede banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit e kɔc yiic.
Na wen, ke raan wen bi e nyiɛɛn, ke gɛm keek ŋiny bi kek e ŋic, lueel, yan, Raan ba ciim, ka ee yen guop; cok e dam wek en.
Go bɛn tede Yecu enɔnthiine, bi ku lueel, yan, Thieithieei, Rabi; go ciim aret.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Math, loi ke bi yin. Na wen, ke ke bɔ, bik ku pɛɛrki Yecu e dom.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ de kɔc cath ne Yecu, ke riny ecin, weeth abataude bei, go lim tok yup, lim de bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, kip yic wei.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Pɔke abataudu tede; kɔc kedhie kɔc e abatau noom abik thou ne abatau.
E ye lueel e yipiɔu nɔn can Waar dueer leu e lɔŋ enɔɔne, ka bi ɛn gam rɛm ke tuucuhial awarki thieer ku rou?
Ku kacigoɔɔr dueerki aa yith adi, ke luel en, an, bi kaŋ dhil nu aya?

E thaar mane guop, ke Yecu yook kuut ke kɔc, yan, E we bɔ biic cit man e ka yin raan tɔŋ, raan e kaŋ rum, ke we muk abatɛɛu ku thieec, bak a bɛn dɔm? E akoolnyiin kedhie yɛn e reer wo week etok luaŋditt e Nhialic, ke ya weet, ku wek ken a dɔm.
Ku kake acik tic kedhie, luɔi bi kacigɔɔr aa yith, ka ke nebii. Na wen, ke nyieeŋe kɔcpiooce piny kedhie, ku kɔtki.
Na wen, ke kɔc wen dɔm Yecu, ke thelki leerki te nu Kaiapath, bɛnyditt tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, te ci kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr gueer thin ayi roordit.
Go Petero kuany cok temec aɣeet en kaldht e bɛnydht tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, ku le thin, le nyuc keke kɔc cath e bɛny cok, ke bi thok bi jam thok bɛn tiŋ.
Na wen, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit ku kɔc nu e loŋic kedhie, ke ke kɔɔr caatɔɔ aluɛth, an, bik Yecu cak thok, ke bi nɔk;
ku acin ke cik yok, ciɛk, an, de caatɔɔ juec ci bɛn, ka yek aluɛth, acin ke cik yok. Na wen, ke caatɔɔ aluɛth e ke jɔ bɛn kaarou cieen,
bik ku luelki, yan, Aci mɛnhe lueel, yan, Yɛn cath wo riɛl duɛɛr ɛn luaŋdiit e Nhialic jap piny, ku bɛ yik e nin kadiak.
Go bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ro jɔt, ku lueel, yan, Cin ke bɛɛre? Eeŋo ke jieeny ecaatɔɔke yin?
Go Yecu mim. Na wen, ke lueel bɛnydiit tueŋ, yan, Yin ta luel guutguut ne rin ke Nhialic piir, lɛke wook nɔn ee yin Kritho guop, Wen e Nhialic.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Aci tiiŋic; ku wek yɔɔk aya, yan, Ekool wadaŋ, ke we bi Wen e raan tiŋ arɛɛr e baŋ cueny de riɛldit, ku bi e luaat niim luaat nhial.
Na wen, ke bɛnydiit tueŋ ke ret lupɔɔke yiic, ku lueel, yan, Aci Nhialic lat; eeŋo daŋ koorku caatɔɔ kɔk? Tieŋki, wek ci lɛtde piŋ, lɛt lɛt en Nhialic.
Luɛlki wakdiaa? Goki bɛɛr, yan, Aci roŋ ke thuɔɔu.
Goki ŋuoot nyin, ku guutki e kecin; ku mɛŋ kɔc kɔk e kecin,
ku luelki, yan, Caar e woniim, yin Kritho; eeŋa e biak yin?
Ku rɛɛr Petero biic e kalditic; go nyan tok bɛn tede yen, bi ku lueel, yan, Yin aya, yin aa nu weke Yecu de Galili.
Go jai e kɔc niim kedhie, yan, Akuoc yen ke luel.
Na wen, aci lɔ biic le e kat thar, ke tiŋ nyan daŋ, go lɛk kɔc nu etɛɛn, yan, Raane aa nu keke Yecu de Nadhareth ayadaŋ.
Go bɛ jai ke luel guutguut, yan, Raane akuoc.
Na wen, etethiine, ke kɔc kaac etɛɛn ke ke bɔ tede Petero, bik ku luelki, yan, Ee yic, yin ee raan toŋden aya; yin cii thoŋdu nyuɔɔth.
Go mel jɔ cam, ku luel guutguut, yan, Raane akuoc. Na wen, ke ajith kiu enɔnthiine.
Go Petero jam de Yecu tak, jam wen ci lueel, an, Te ŋoot ajith ke ken kiu, ke yin bi a jai etaitai raandiak. Go lɔ biic, le dhiau e dhien tuc.
Na ɣɔnmiak aru piny, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic kedhie ku roordit e kɔc yiic ke ke mɛt kethook Yecu kapac, an, bik tɔ nak;
na wen, ke dutki, ku thelki, yinki Pontio Pilato mudhiir.
Na wen, ke Judath, raan e nyiin en, te ci en e tiŋ nɔn ci loŋde guɔ teem, an, bi nɔk, ke dɔm tieel, go riet kathierdiak bɛ pɔk niim banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit,
go lueel, yan, Yɛn e kedaŋ wooc, e nɔn can riɛm de raan nyiɛɛn raan cin kerɛɛc cath ke yen. Goki lueel, yan, Eeŋoda thin? Ee kedu yin yitok.
Go riet dɛɛny piny luaŋ ɣeric, ku jel, le ro nook.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic riet noom, ku luelki, yan, Aciki roŋ e luɔi bi ke taau te ye weu ke Nhialic kueet thin, luɔi ee kek weu ke riɛm.
Agoki kethook mat, ku ɣɔcki dom ne keek, dom de raan e tony cueec, an, bi kɔc lei aa thiɔk thin.
Yen aye dome tɔ ye dom de riɛm, aɣet ci ekoole.
Go jam aa yin jam ɣɔn lueel nebi Jeremia, yan, Agoki riet kathierdiak noom, ɣooc de raan waan ci ɣoocde lueel, raan waan ci kɔc ke Yithrael ɣoocde lueel;
ku gɛmki keek e kede dom de raan e tony cueec, cit man ci Bɛnydit e lɛk ɛn.
Na wen, ke Yecu kaac e mudhiir nɔm; go mudhiir thieec, yan, Ye malik de Judai? Go Yecu lueel, yan, Yen ka ke ci lueele.
Ku te ci e gaany e banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit, go cien ke ci bɛɛr.
Go Pilato thieec, yan, Kɛne juec e ka gɔɔnye ke yi piŋ?
Ku acin ke ci bɛɛr, acakaa jam tok aliu; arek abi mudhiir gai aret.
Ku ciɛɛŋ anu ɣɔn ekool e ahith, an, bi mudhiir raan toŋ ci mac aa luony kut e kɔc, raan nu e kepiɔth.
Ku ade raan ci mac e akoolke raan ci rin tic, cɔl Barabath.
Na wen, aci kɔc gueer, ke ke thieec Pilato, yan, Eeŋa nu e wepiɔth raan ba luony week? Ee Barabath, ku ye Yecu, raan cɔl Kritho?
Aci ŋic nɔn ee yen tiɛɛl yen e yin kek e yen.
Na wen, te reer en e thoony de guieereloŋ nɔm, ke thok bɔ tede tiiŋde, yan, Du de ke luoiye raan piɛthpiɔuwe; yɛn e kajuec guum ekoole ne baŋde ke ya nyuoth.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit agoki kut e kɔc weŋ, an, bik Barabath lip, ku tɔki Yecu nak.
Go mudhiir bɛɛr, thieec keek, yan, Ee raanou nu e wepiɔth e keyiic kaarou, raan ba luony week? Goki lueel, yan, Barabath.
Go Pilato ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo ba jɔ luoi Yecu, raan cɔl Kritho? Goki lueel kedhie, yan, Tɔ pieete e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Go mudhiir ke thieec, yan, Ee kaŋo, ee kerɛɛc ŋo ci looi? Goki coot aret awar cɔt awen, yan, Tɔ pieete e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.

Na wen, aci Piiato e tiŋ nɔn cin en luɔi bi en e leu, ku dueer anuɔɔn bɛɛi tei, ke nom piu, ku piny ecin e kut e kɔc niim, ku lueel, yan, Yɛn liu e riɛm e raaneyic, raan cin kerɛɛc cath ke ye; ee kedun wapac.
Go kɔc bɛɛr kedhie, yan, Ne riɛmde nu e woyieth, ayi mithkuɔ yieth.
Na wen, ke luny Barabath keek; ku jɔ Yecu tɔ dui e waat, ku yin kɔc, bi piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Go alathkeer ke mudhiir goki Yecu dɔm leerki kal e mudhiir, ku kutki rem de alathkeer ebɛn e yenɔm.
Goki lupɔɔke luony bei, ku yikki kɔu alulut thith baar.
Na wen, acik gol e kuɔɔth nai, ke tueelki e yenɔm, ku tɛɛuki wai de aruoor e ciin cuenyde; ku tukki kemiɔl e yenɔm, bniki, luelki, yan, Thieithieei, Malik de Judai!
Goki ŋuoot guop, ku nomki aruoor, yupki nɔm.
Na wen, acik en geet, ke ke jɔ alulut wen luony bei e yekɔu, ku beki lupɔɔke taau, ku thelki biic lek piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Na wen, alek biic, ke ke yok raan e Kurene, cɔl Thimom; goki dhil tɔ jɔt timdɛn ci riiu nɔm.
Te ci kek ɣet te cɔl Golgotha, yen aye Tede apet e thoŋda,
ke miɔcki e mɔn ci wac, ci liaap keke keth; na wen, aci thieep, ke reec dek.
Goki piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, ku tekki lupɔɔke, ne deeny deeny kek gɛk; luɔi bi jam aa yic jam ɣɔn ci lueel e nebi, yan, Acik lupɔɔki tɛk rot kapac, ku deenyki gɛk e kede alulutdi.
Goki nyuc piny, ku titki etɛɛn.
Ku tueelki gɔnyde nhial, gɔny ci e gaany, aci gɔɔr ale, yan, KENE EE YECU MALIK DE JUDAI.
Ku ade kɔc ci piaat e yen etok kaarou, kɔc e kaŋ rum, tok e baŋ cuec, ku tok e baŋ cam.
Go laat e kɔc wen e teek etɛɛn, ke ke lek keniim,
luelki, yan, Yin e mɛnh e luaŋdiit e Nhialic dhuoor piny, ku bɛye yik e nin kadiak, luak rot! Ten ee yin Wen e Nhialic, ke yi bɔ piny e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku get guop ne banydit ke ka ke Nhialic aya, keke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku roordit, luelki, yan,
E kɔc kɔk luok; ku cii ro leu ne luak. Na ye malik de Yithrael, ne bɔ piny enɔɔne e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, ka buk gam.
E ro thany Nhialic, ne luɛk enɔɔne, te kɔɔr en en; ne luɛl ee yen e lueel, an, Yɛn ee Wen e Nhialic.
Ayi kɔc e kaŋ rum aya, kɔc wen ci piaat ne yen etok, acik lat ne jam toŋ mane.
Na wen, e thaar kadhetem, ke piny jɔ guɔ cuɔl ebɛn, aɣet thaar kadheŋuan.
Ku te cit thaar kadheŋuan, ke Yecu cot e rol dit, yan, Eli, Eli, lama thabakthani? yen aye kene, yan, Nhialicdi, Nhialicdi, eeŋo pɛl yin a wei?
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk e kɔc kaac etɛɛn, te ci kek e piŋ, ke luelki, yan, Raane acɔl Elija.
Go raan tok e keek dap kat, ku noom ken ee piu jooc, ku jool e mɔn ci wac, ku tɛɛu e wai aruoor nɔm, yin en le dek.
Go kɔc kɔk lueel, yan, Jɔ pɔl, jɔku woi nɔn bi Elija bɛn bi bɛn luok.
Na wen, aci Yecu bɛ coot e rol dit, ke jɔ weike pɔl, thook.
Ku jɔ lupɔ diit nu e luaŋdiit e Nhialicic rɛɛt erou, gɔl nhial aɣet piny; go piny ro niɛŋ, go kuurdit yiic pak;
ku liep rɛŋ rot; go gup juec ro jɔt, gup ke kɔc ɣerpiɔth kɔc ci thou;
na miak, aci Yecu ro jɔt, ke ke bɔbei e rɛŋ yiic, lek panydiit ɣeric lek ku tulki e kɔc juec niim.
Na wen, ke bɛny de rem, keke kɔc cath ne yen, kɔc tit Yecu, te ci kek nieŋ ci piny ro niɛŋ tiŋ, ku tiŋki ka ci looi, agoki riɔɔc aret, ku luelki, yan, Ee yic, kene ee Wen e Nhialic!
Ku nu dieer juec etɛɛn adɛɛiki temec, dieer wen ci Yecu biaath cok Galili, ke ke ye kede looi;
dieer de yiic yi Mari Magdalene, ku Mari man Jakop keke Jothe, ku man wɛɛt ke Dhebedayo.
Na wen, aci akɔl thei, ke raan juec e kaŋ bɔ, raan de Arimathaya, cɔl Jothep, ku ye raanpiooce Yecu aya.
Go lɔ te nu Piiato, le guop de Yecu lip. Go Pilato kɔc yɔɔk, an, bi guop gam en.
Na wen, aci Jothep guop noom, ke jɔ deer e lupɔ ɣer cɔl linon,
ku le tɔɔu e raŋ de yenguop, raŋ e piɛc wec e kuuric; go kuur dit tok lɔɔr tɛɛu e raŋ thok, ku jɔ jal.
Ku nu Mari Magdalene etɛɛn, keke Mari daŋ, ke ke rɛɛr e raŋ lɔɔm.
Na ɣɔnmiak, e kool lɔ e kool e Guiɛɛk cok, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku Parithai ke ke gueer e Pilato nɔm,
luelki, yan, Bɛny, acuk tak nɔn ci aluenhe ye lueel waan ŋoot en ke piir, yan, Ee nhi kadiak, ke yɛn bi ro bɛ jɔt.

Jɔ kɔc thɔn enɔɔne, bik raŋ aa tiit apiɛth, aɣet kool ee kek diak, ke kɔckɛn e piooce ke ke cii bi bɛn, bik bɛn kual, ku yookki kɔc, yan, E ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic; ke mɛth cieen abi mɛth tueŋ waan woor.
Go Pilatɔ ke yɔɔk, yan, Wek cath we kɔc e tiit; laki, cok e dɔt wek en, e don ŋiɛcki.
Goki lɔ, lek raŋ tɔ cok e doteye, ku botki kuur thok, ku tɛɛuki kɔc e tiit etɛɛn aya.
Na wen, aci akool e thabath guɔ thok, te kɔɔre piny ru ekool tueŋ wen aa kool dherou, ke Mari Magdalene bɔ keke Mari daŋ, bik raŋ bɛn tiŋ,
Na wen, ke piny nieŋ rot aret; ku bɔ tuny nhial e Bɛnydit piny paannhial, bi ku lɔɔr kuur wei e raŋ thok, ku jɔ reer e yenɔm.
Acit nyin wil e deŋ, ku lupɔde aɣer ewic cit alath;
ago kɔc e tiit agoke lath gup ne riɔɔc wen ci kek riɔɔc e yen, abik ciet kɔc ci thou.
Go tunynhial bɛɛr, yook diaar, yan, Duoki riɔc; aŋiɛc nɔn kaar wek Yecu, raan waan ci piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Aliu etene; e ro jɔt cit man waan ci en e lueel. Baki, tieŋki te waan tɔɔce Bɛnydit thin.
Ku jaki dap lɔ, lɛkki kɔckɛn e piooce nɔn ci en ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic; ku tieŋki, akɔn lɔ tueŋ e week Galili; abak tiŋ etɛɛn; yeka, aca lɛk week.
Goki dap jal e raŋ nɔm, ariɔcki tei, ku amitki piɔth ayadaŋ, goki kat lek jam lɛk kɔckɛn e piooce.
Na wen, aciɛthki kueer, ke ke lɔ kɔckɛn e piooce lɛk jam, ke Yecu ram ke keek, go lueel, yan, Thieithieei week! Goki bɛn ku dɔmki cok, lamki.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Duoki riɔc; lak lɛkki mithekɔckuɔ, yan, bik lɔ Galili, tɛɛn en abi kek a tiŋ.
Na wen, aleki, ke kɔc kɔk e kɔc e tiit ke ke bɔ panydit, bik ku nyuthki banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ka ci looi kedhie.
Na wen, acik gueer ne roordit etok, ke ke mat loŋ, goki alathkeer gam weu juec,
ku luelki, yan, Jaki lueel, yan, Kɔckɛn e piooce acik bɛn wakɔu, bik ku kualki guopde, ke wo nin.
Ku na ci mudhiir kene piŋ, abuk weŋ, agoku week tɔ cin diɛɛr ba wek diɛɛr.
Goki weu noom, ku loiki ke cit man ci ke wɛɛt; ku jame aci thiei e Judai yiic, ku tɔu aɣet ci ekoole.
Na wen, ke kɔcpiooce kathieer ku tok ke ke jel lek Galili, lek te nu kuurdiit ci Yecu kɔn lɛk keek.
Na wen, acik e tiŋ, ke lamki; ku ŋit kɔc kɔk piɔth.
Go Yecu bɛn, bi ku yook keek, yan, Riɛl ebɛn aci gam ɛn paannhial ayi piny nɔm.
Yen la wek, lak juoor aa wɛɛt kedhie, abik aa kɔcpiooce, ku baptithki keek ne rin ke Waada, ku Wende, ku Weidit Ɣer;
yak ke wɛɛt, bik kaŋ aa dot kedhie ka ca thɔn week; ku ya ki, yɛn ee cool e tɔu wo week e akoolyniin kedhie, aɣet thok bi piny thok. Amen.
Gol e welpiɛth ki, welpiɛth ke Yecu Kritho, wen e Nhialic.
Acit man ci e gɔɔr e awarek de nebi Yithayayic, yan, Tiŋ, yɛn tooc tunydi e yinɔm tueŋ, Raan bi kueerdu lɔ looi;
Rol e raan cot e jɔɔric, yan, Luɔiki caar e Bɛnydit apiɛth, Luɔiki kuɛɛrke abik lɔ cit.
Go Jɔn bɛn, raan e kɔc baptith e jɔɔric, ku ye kɔc guieer ne baptinh e puŋdepiɔu ne pal bi karac pɔl.
Na wen, ke kɔc ke piny e Judaya kedhie, ku kɔc ke Jeruthalem, ke ke lɔ biic te nu yen; goke baptith ne yen kedhie e kiir cɔl Jordanic, ku gamki karɛcken.
Ku ye Jɔn lupɔ cieŋ lupɔ ci cueec e nhim ke thɔrɔl, ku ye thionh e dɛl cieŋ e yethar, ku ye kɔyɔm cam ku ciɛm miok de kiec nu roor.
Ku ye guiir, an, Ade raan bɔ e yacok cieen, raan ril e yɛn, ku yɛn ci roŋ ne luɔi duɛɛr ɛn guŋ dak thionh e wɛɛrke.
Yɛn e we baptith e piu: ku raane abi we baptith ne Weidit Ɣer.
Na wen, e akoolke, ke Yecu bɔ Nadhareth de Galili, ago baptith e Jɔn e Jordanic.
Na wen, enɔntoŋ e bi en biic e piu yiice, ke woi tenhial aci yeyic liep, ku tiŋ Weidit abɔ piny nhial leki e yeguop acit guop guuk.
Ku bɔ rol paannhial, yan, Yin ee Wendien nhiaar, Yɛn mit piɔu wo yin aret.
Na wen, e tethiine, ke dap lɛɛr e jɔɔric e Weidit.
Ku jɔ lɔ tɔu e jɔɔric e nhi kathierŋuan, ke ye Catan them; ku ye tɔu keke lai roor etok; ku ye luooi e tuucnhial.
Na ɣɔn, aci Jɔn mac, ke Yecu bɔ Galili, ke ye welpiɛth ke Nhialic guiir,
aye lueel, yan, Piny e thok, ku ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aci guɔ thiɔk: pɔkki wepiɔth, ku gamki welpiɛth.
Na wen, aciɛth e wɛɛryɔu wɛɛr e Galili, ke tiŋ Tliimon ku Andereya manhe e Thimon ke ke deeny bɔi wiir: luɔi ee kek kɔc e dep.
Go Yecu keek yɔɔk, yan, Baki e yacok, ke we ba tɔ ye kɔc e kɔc deep.
Goki bɔɔiken dap pɔl enɔnthiine, ku kuanyki cok.
Na wen, aci lɔ tueŋ tethiinakaŋ, ke tiŋ Jakop wen e Dhebedayo keke Jɔn manhe, kɔc nu e abelic ayadaŋ, arukki bɔɔiken.
Go keek cɔɔl enɔnthiine: goki wuonden Dhebedayo nyaaŋ e abelic keke kɔc e luui e weu, ku biɔthki cok.
Goki lɔ Kapernaum; na wen, ekool e thabath, ke dap lɔ luaŋ e Nhialic le weet.
Goki gai ne weetde: luɔi ee yen keek wɛɛt cit man e raan cath ke riɛl, ku acii cit man e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr.
Na wen, ke raan anu e luaŋdɛn e Nhialicyic raan de guop jɔŋ rac; go rel,
yan, Yec! Eeŋoda ne yin, yin Yecu de Nadhareth? ci bɛn ba wo bɛn riɔɔk? Yin ŋiɛc nɔn ee yin Raan Ɣerpiɔu de Nhialic.
Go Yecu jɔɔny, yan, Lɔ lik, ku ba bei e yeguop.
Na wen, aci jɔŋ rac raan tɔ lɔ juɔkiaŋ, ke jɔ coot e rol dit, bi bei e yeguop.
Goki gai kedhie, arek abik rot thieec kapac, yan, Ee kaŋo ekene? ee weet ŋo ekene weet ci piac bɛne? acakaa jɔɔk rac aye ke yɔɔk ne riɛl, agoki kede piŋ,
Go rinke tic enɔnthiine e wuot ke Galili ebɛn wuot thiɔk.
Na wen, acik bɛn biic luaŋ de Nhialic, ke ke dap lɔ ɣon e Thimon ku Anderaya, aciɛthki ne Jakop ku Jɔn.
Ku dhiɔm de Thimon adhɔt piny ke juai; agoki kede dap lɛk Yecu.
Go bɛn, bi ku dɔm cin, jɔt nhial; go juai pal piny enɔnthiine, go kaken looi.
Na ɣɔn theen, te ci akɔl lɔ piny, ke ke bii kɔc tede yen kɔc tok kedhie, ayi kɔc cii jɔɔk rac dɔm.
Ku panydit ebɛn acik gueer ɣot thok.
Go kɔc tok juec tɔ dem kɔc de gup jɔɔk kith yiic, ku cieec jɔɔk rac e kɔc gup kɔc juec; ku pen jɔɔk rac jam, luɔi ci kek e ŋic.
Na ɣɔnmiak, aŋoot piny ke col, ke jɔt rot, le biic, ku jel le jɔɔric te cin kɔc, le lɔŋ etɛɛn.
Go Thimon ku kɔc wen cath ne yen goki biɔɔth cok;
na wen, acik en yok, ke luelki, yan, Yin kɔɔr raan ebɛn.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Loku bɛi thiɔk, ke ya bi wel aa guiir etɛɛn aya; yen aa ba yɛn.
Go wel lɔ guiir e luek ke Nhialic yiic piny e Galili nɔm ebɛn, ku ye jɔɔk rac cieec.
Na wen, ke raan bɔ tede yen, raan de guop wɛth. ke lɛŋ, ku tuk emiɔl e yenɔm, lueel, yan, Te de yin piɔu luɔi bi yin a tɔ waar, ka duɛɛre looi.
Go Yecu piɔu kok ke yen, go ecin riny, ku jiɛk guop, lueel, yan, Anu e yapiɔu; waar guop.
Go wɛth jal e yeguop enɔnthiine, ku jɔ guop waar.
Go lom thok aret, ku tɔ jel enɔnthiine,
yook, yan, Tit rot, e cin ke lɛke raan daŋ: lɔ kueerdu, nyuoth rot bɛny e ka ke Nhialic, ku game ka cii Mothe thɔn, ne baŋ de waar ci yin guop waar, abi aa ŋiny bi kek e ŋic.
Ku yen, te ci en lɔ biic, ke jɔ jam lueel aret, abi thiei e piny nɔm, arek acin te dueere Yecu bɛ lɔ panydit e kɔc nyiin, ku ye tɔu roor e jɔɔric: go kɔc bɛn te nu yen e baai nɔm ebɛn.
Na wen, aci nin liaakaŋ lɛɛr, ke be lɔ Kaperuaum, go kɔc piŋ nɔn nu yen ɣoot.
Go kɔc juec dap gueer ɣot, arek acin te laau be nu, acakaa ɣot thok aya, acin te laau: go ke guieer wel.
Na wen, ke kɔc e ke bɔ kɔc bii raan ci duany tede yen, aɣɛɛce e kɔc kaŋuan.
Na wen, aci cien te ɣeet kek e Yecu lɔɔm, ne baŋ de kut e kɔc, ke ke ŋany ɣot nɔm biak nu yen: na wen, aci ɣot nɔm ɣɔɔr, ke ke jɔ laŋarep luai piny, laŋarep wen dhɔte raan e yenɔm.
Te ci Yecu gamden tiŋ, ke yook raan ci duany, yan, Mɛdhe, karɛcku acike pal yin.
Ku ade kɔc kɔk rɛɛr etɛɛn kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, kɔc wen jam e kepiɔth, yan,
Eeŋo jiɛɛme raane aya? ee Nhialic lat; eeŋa dueer pal e karac leu, cie Nhialic etok?
Na wen, ke ŋic Yecu enɔnthiine nɔn jiɛɛm kek aya e kepiɔth, go ke yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo tɛɛrki e wepiɔth wakya?
Ee kenou piɔl e keek, yan, te yɔɔk ɛn raan ci duany, yan, Karɛcku acike pal yin; ku te luɛɛl ɛn en, yan, Jɔt rot, jɔt laŋarepdu, cathe?
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ba wek e ŋic nɔn ciɛthe Wen e raan ke riɛl e piny nɔm riɛl bi en karac pɔl (ke yook raan ci duany, yan,)
Yin yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot, jɔt laŋarepdu, lɔ paandit
Go rot jɔt enɔnthiine, ku jɔt laŋarepde, ku jel e kɔc niim kedhie; arek abik gai kedhie, ku pionyki Nhialic, luelki, yan, Ke cit ekene akenku kɔn tiŋ ananda.
Na wen, ke be lɔ biic le e wɛɛryɔu; ku bɔ kut e kɔc ebɛn te nu yen, go ke wɛɛt.
Ku te teek en kueer, ke tiŋ Lebi wen Alapayo, arɛɛr ten ee miriic guaaric noom thin, go yɔɔk, yan, Kuany acok. Go rot jɔt, ku kuɛny cok.
Na wen, ke Yecu rɛɛr ten ee cam ɣon e Lebi, ku rɛɛr kɔc juec ne yen etok ku kɔckɛn e piooce, kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ku kɔc e kerac looi: luɔi juec kek, ku yek kuany cok.

Na wen, aci kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai e tiŋ acam keke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ku kɔc e kerac looi, ke ke thiec kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Eeŋo ciem en keke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ku kɔc e kerac looi? Na wen, aci Yecu ye piŋ, ke ke yook, yan, Kɔc piɔl gup aciki akiim e kɔɔr, ee kɔc tok tei: yɛn ecii bɔ ba kɔc piɛthpiɔth bɛn cɔɔl, ne puŋ bi kek kepiɔth puk, ee kɔc e kerac looi, kek aba bɛn cɔɔl.
Ku kɔcpiooce Jɔn keke kɔcpiooce Parithai aake ye cam rɛɛc: goki bɛn tede yen, bik ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋo ye kɔcpiooce Jɔn cam rɛɛc ayi kɔcpiooce Parithai, ku cii kɔckuon e piooce cam e rɛɛc?
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Dueer wɛɛt rieec e monythiek cam aa rɛɛc, te ŋoote monythiek ke rɛɛr ke keek? Te ŋoot kek e ke cath e monythiek, aciki cam dueer aa rɛɛc.
Ku akool abik bɛn, kool bi ke monythiek jɔt e keyiic, yen abi kek cam jɔ aa rɛɛc e akoolke.
Ku acin raan e lupɔ kene kɔn cieŋ kac e lupɔ thɛɛr kɔu: na loi en aya, ke lupɔ ci piac looi abi lupɔ thɛɛr tɔ rɛɛtic, go te ye rɛɛt tɔ dit awar man waan.

Ku acin raan e wany ci piac dhiim taau e atheep thɛɛr yiic: na loi en aya, ke wany ci piac dhiim abi atheep reet yiic, go wany lɔ wei, ku riaak atheep: wany ci piac dhiim aye taau e atheep ci piac coŋ yiic.
Na wen, ke tek e dum ke rap yiic ekool e thabath: go kɔckɛn e piooce goki rap jɔ dhoŋ, te ciɛth kek.
Go Parithai thieec, yan, Tiŋ, eeŋo looi kek ke ci pɛn kɔc ekool e thabath?
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Kɛnki kɔn kueen e awarekic ne ke cii Dabid looi, ɣɔn dɛk kaŋ tede yen, nɛk cɔk en, yen ku kɔc cath ne yen?

Luɔi ci en lɔ ɣon e Nhialic, ɣɔn ee Abiathar bɛnyditt tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, go kuin ci gam Nhialic cam kuin ci pam, kuin cii raan daŋ dueer cam, ee bany ke ka ke Nhialic kapac, aci cam, ku miɔɔc kɔc cath ne yen aya?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Thabath aci cak ne baŋ de raan, ku acie raan en e cak ne baŋ de thabath.
Yen tede ka, Wen e raan ee Bɛnyditt de thabath ayadaŋ.
Na wen, aci bɛ lɔ luaŋ de Nhialic; ku ade raan etɛɛn raan ci ciin tok riɔu.
Agoki woi guop, nɔn bi en e tɔ dem ekool e thabath, ke bik lɔ gaany.
Go lɛk raan ci cin riɔu, yan, Jɔt rot, kaace cil.
Go keek thieec, yan, Ee kenou ci pal kɔc ekool e thabath, ee luɔi de kepiɛth, ku ye luɔi de kerac? ee kunydewei, ku ye naŋ de kɔc? Goki lɔ diu.
Na wen, aci keek lieec ke ci ŋeeny, e piɔu diu ne riɛl ril kek piɔth, ke jɔ raan yɔɔk, yan, Riny yicin. Go riny: go cin bɛ piath cit man e ciin daŋ.
Go Parithai lɔ biic, lek kethook mat ne kɔc ke Kerod etok, ne naŋ bi kek e nɔk.
Go Yecu rot riic etɛɛn keke kɔckɛn e piooce le e abapdit nɔm: ku kuany cok e kut diit e kɔc bɔ Galili: ku bɔ kut diit e kɔc e Judaya,
ku ne Jeruthalem, ku ne Edom, ku ne Jordan nɔm lɔŋtui, ku ne piny thiaak ke Turo ku Thidon, abiki tede yen, luɔi ci kek ka dit e looi piŋ.
Go lɛk kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, bi abel thiine ye tiit, ne baŋ de kut e kɔc, ke ke ci ye bi nyiɛɛc:
luɔi ci en kɔc juec tɔ dem, arek acik rot cuot te nu yen, bik bɛn jak guop, kek kɔc de gup jɔɔk kedhie.
Ku jɔɔk rɛc col, te de en te ci kek e tiŋ, ke ke cuɛt rot piny e yenɔm, ku cotki, yan, Yin ee Wen e Nhialic.
Go ke cok e lom en kethook, ke ciki bi tɔ ŋic.
Na wen, ke lɔ e kuurdit nɔm, le ku cɔɔl kɔc nu e yepiɔu: goki lɔ tede yen.
Go thieer ku rou lɔc, kɔc bi ya tɔu ne yen, ku bi keek aa tooc bik wel aa lɔ guiir,
ku bik aa cath ne riɛl bi kek juai tɔ waar, ku bik jɔɔk rac aa cieec:
ku jɔ Thimon cak bɛɛŋ, yan, Petero;
ku Jakop wen e Dhebedayo, ku Jɔn manhe e Jakop; go keek cak bɛɛŋ, yan, Boanergeth, yen aye Wɛɛt ke maaredeŋ:
ku Anderaya, ku Pilip, ku Bartholomayo, ku Mathayo, ku Thoma, ku Jakop wen e Alapayo, ku Thadayo, ku Thimon raan e Kanaan,
ku Judath Yithkariɔt, raan bi e nyiɛɛn aya. Go bɛn ku le ɣot.
Na wen, ke kut e kɔc be gueer, arek acin te man dueere kɔc cam e kuin.
Na wen, aci mathke ye piŋ, ke ke lɔ biic lek dɔm: ayek lueel, yan, jiɛɛm wei.
Ku aci kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e lueel, kɔc bɔ e Jeruthalem, yan, Ade guop Beeldhebup, ku, yan, Ee jɔɔk rac cieec ne riɛl e bɛnydiit e jɔɔk rac.
Go keek cɔɔl te nu yen, ku yook keek e kaaŋ, yan, Catan dueer Catan cieec adi?
Ku miric ceŋ piny, te tek en eyic ater, ka cii dueer kɔɔc.
Ayi dhien, te tek en eyic ater, ka cii dueer kɔɔc en edhiene.
Ku Catan aya, te jɔt en rot ku ciek rot ater, ago eyic tek, ka cii dueer kɔɔc, thok bi en thok adueer thiɔk.
Acin raan dueer lɔ ɣon e raan ril, ku yiɛk weuke, te ŋoot en ke ken raan ril kɔn duut; na ci e kɔn duut, ke jɔ ɣonde yak.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Karɛc cik wooc abike pal mith ke kɔc, ayi lɛt ebɛn lɛn bi kek Nhialic aa lat, abike pal keek kedhie:
ku raan bi Weidit Ɣer aa lat acii bi pɔl etaitai, kerɛɛc dit anu e yeyeth aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr:
luɔi ci kek e lueel, yan, Ade guop jɔŋ rac.
Na wen, ke mithekɔcken e ke bɔ ne man, bik ku kɛɛcki biic, agoki tuoc raan, le ye cɔɔl.
Ku rɛɛr kut diit e kɔc e yelɔɔm; agoki lɛk en, yan, Tiŋ, moor ku mithekɔckun ka, biic, akɔɔrki yin.
Go bɛɛr, yan, Eeŋa ye maar, ku ee yiŋa ye mithekɔckuɔ?
Go kɔc rɛɛr e yelɔɔm lieec, ku lueel, yan, Maar, ki, ku mithekɔckuɔ ki!
Raan ebɛn raan bi kede Nhialic piɔu aa looi, raane yen eye mɛnkhai, ku ye nyankai, ku ye maar.
Na wen, ke be weet gɔl e wɛɛryɔu. Ku kut diit e kɔc acik gueer te nu yen, go lɔ e abelic, ku reer e abelic wiir; ku nu kut diit e kɔc ebɛn e wɛɛryɔu biic.
Go ke wɛɛt e kajuec ne kɛŋ, ku yook keek ne weetde, yan,
Piɛŋki: raan cum, di, e lɔ biic le com:
na wen, a cum, ke nyin kɔk e ke loony e kueer kec, ku bɔ diɛt nhial bik ku camki ke.
Ku loony kɔk piny de kuur, te cin tiɔm dit; goki dap goŋ, luɔi cin en tiɔm dit:
na wen, aci akɔl ɣeet nhial, ke ke biɔɔr; goki yom, luɔi cin kek mei.
Ku loony kɔk e kuɔɔth yiic, go kuɔɔth cil, goki ke nyiɛɛc, agoki cuo lok.
Ku loony kɔk e tiɔm piɛthic, goki luɔk, acik cil agoki kenyiin ŋuak; ku jɔki luɔk abi nyin tok thierdiak aa bɛɛi, ku bii nyin daŋ thierdhetem, ku bii nyin daŋ bɔt.
Go lueel, yan, Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Na wen, aci doŋ etok, ke kɔc rɛɛr e yelɔɔm ku kɔc kathieer ku rou ke thiecki ne kede kaaŋ awen.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Aci gam week luɔi ba wek kecithiaan ŋic, kede ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic: ku tede kɔc nu biic, kaŋ kedhie ayeke looi ne kɛŋ:
luɔi bi kek aa daai, ku ciki kaŋ e gɔɔk apiɛth; ku luɔi bi kek aa piŋ, ku ciki kaŋ e yok yiic; ke cii bi dɛ te bi kek kepiɔth puk, abi karɛcken pal keek.
Go ke thieec, yan, Kuocki kaaŋe? ku bak kɛŋ kedhie ŋic adi?
Raan cum ee jam en com.
Ku kɔcke ee ka nu e kueer kec, te ye jam com thin; na wen, acik piŋ, ke Catan bɔ enɔnthiine, bi ku jɔt jam wen ci com e kepiɔth.
Ku kɔcke aya ee ka ci com e piny de kuur; kɔcke, te ci kek jam piŋ, ke ke dap gam ke ke mit piɔth;
ku acinki thaar mei, goki yok e ke tɔu e ninke; na miak, te bi ketuc dhal keek ayi yoŋ ne baŋ de jam, ke ke dɔk rot cieen enɔnthiine.
Ku kɔc kɔk ee ka ci com e kuɔɔth yiic; kɔcke ee kɔc ci jam piŋ,
na wen, ke diɛɛr ee kek diɛɛr e ka ke pinye nɔm, ayi mɛth ee juec de weu keek math, ayi ŋɔɔŋ de ka kɔk, ke ke lɔ thin, ku nyiicki jam, agoki cuo lok.
Ku kɔc kɔk ee ka ci com e tiɔm piɛthic; ayek kɔc e jam piŋ, ku gamki, ku lokki, tok abi thierdiak bɛɛi, ku bii tok thierdhetem, ku bii tok bɔt.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Manyealath bi ya bɛɛi ku tɛɛuwe e diony thar, ayi laŋarep thar, ku cii bi aa taau e kedaŋ nɔm nhial?
Acin ke ci thiaan, ke cii bi tic rial; ku acin ke ci looi ecueer, ke cii bi tic egayak.
Na de raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Yak rot tiit ne ke yak piŋ: them aa wek kaŋ them, en abi aa thɛm week: ku wek kɔc e kaŋ piŋ, we bi ŋuak e kaŋ.
Raan de nɔm kake, abi miɔɔc: ku raan cin nɔm kake, acakaa ke cath ke yen abi noom tede yen.
Go lueel, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic acit weer ci raan kɔth wɛɛr piny;
ku ye nin ku ye rot jɔt wakɔu ku akol, go kɔth cil, ku ditki, ke kuc dit dht kek.
Piny ee rap bɛɛi yetok; ee thok kɔn goŋ, na miak ke guath, na miak, ke rap dit nyin lok e yenɔm.
Na wen, aci rap guɔ luɔk, ke dap menyjel tɔ lɔ, luɔi ci kool e tem bɛn.
Go lueel, yan, Buk ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic thɔɔŋ ke ŋo? ku buk thɔɔŋ e kaaŋ ŋo?
Acit nyin toŋ de matharda, nyin koor e kɔth kedhie e piny nɔm, te come ye;
ku te ci e com, ke cil, abi dit, abi wal woor kedhie, go keer dit tany; arek abi diɛt nhial aa reer e atiepdeyic.
Go keek guieer ne kɛŋ juec cit ekake, cit man leu kek keek e piŋ:
ku acin wel ci guieer keek wel cin yiic kaaŋ: na wen, ke weer kɔckɛn e piooce kɛŋ thaar kedhie kapac pei.
Na wen, ekoole guop, te ci akɔl thei, ke yook keek, yan, Lok teemku lɔŋtui.
Goki kut e kɔc tɔ jel, ku jɔki tɔ cath ke keek e abelic e guopdɛne. Ku nu abeel thii kɔk ne yen etok aya.
Na wen, ke gok de amaŋ dit bɔ, go apiɔɔk thɛc e abelic, arek abi abel duɛɛr thiaŋ.
Ku yenguop atɔu e abel thar cieen, anin e kɔm nɔm: agoki pɔɔc, ku thiecki, yan, Bɛny, thon thou wok cin kedu thin?
Go paac, go yom jɔɔny, ku yook wɛɛr, an, Lɔ lik, pale rot piny. Go yom kɔɔc, ku lɔ wɛɛr diu aret.
Go ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo riaac wek wakya? Ŋuɔɔtki e we cin gam?
Goki riɔɔc e riɔɔc dit, ku thiecki rot kapac, yan, Ee raan cit ŋo eraane, raan piŋe yom kede ayi wɛɛr?
Agoki ɣet lɔŋtui, piny de Gadarai.
Na wen, aci bɛn bei e abeiic, ke ram enɔnthiine ke raan de guop jɔŋ rac raan bɔ bei e rɛŋ yiic,
raan ee reer te nu rɛŋ: ku acin raan dueer e mac, acakaa yen e mac e kuat:
aye cool e rekeye ne joth ku kuɛɛt, go kuɛɛt aa tuɛɛny ku dhuuŋ joth, ku acin raan cath ke riɛl bi en e tɔ loi nɔm.
Ku e akoolnyiin kedhie, wakɔu ku akol, ee tɔu e kuurdit kɔɔth ku te nu rɛŋ, ke ye coot, ku ye rot ŋuɛɛt e kɔi.
Na wen, ke tiŋ Yecu temec, go bɛn ke riŋ, bi ku lɛm;
ku coot e rol dit, yan, Eeŋodi wo yin, Yecu, yin Wen e Nhialic diit aret? Yin yɔɔk ne rin ke Nhialic, yan, Du ya leŋ wei.
Ne yook ci en e yɔɔk, yan, Ba bei e raan guop, yin jɔŋ rac.
Go thieec, yan, Cɔl yi ŋa? Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn cɔl Remdit: luɔi juec wok.
Go lɔŋ aret, an, cii ke bi ciɛɛc biic e pinye.
Ku ade luny diit e kudhuur e kuurdit thar etɛɛn, ke ke nyuath.
Go jɔɔk rac ebɛn goki lɔŋ, yan, Tɔ wo lɔ te nu kudhuur buk lɔ e kegup.
Go ke pal lɔ. Na wen, ke jɔɔk rac e ke bɔ bei e raan guop, lek e kudhuur gup: go luny ebɛn lɔ guluŋ piny wiir, aa ke cit agum kaarou: agoki mou wiir.
Go kɔc wen e kudhuur nyuaath goki kat, lek lueel panydit ayi baai. Goki lɔ biic lek ke ci looi tiŋ, nɔn ee yen ŋo.
Goki bɛn te nu Yecu, ku tiŋki raan wen de guop jɔɔk, ke rɛɛr, ku ceŋ lupɔ, ke ci nɔm piath, yen raan wen cath ke rem diit e jɔɔk rac; goki riɔɔc.
Na wen, ke kɔc wen ci e tiŋ, ke ke guiirki luɔi wen ci luoi raan wen de guop jɔɔk, ku guiirki ne kede kudhuur aya.
Goki jɔ lɔŋ, an, bi jal pinyden.
Na wen, ale e abelic, ke raan wen de guop jɔɔk rac ke lɛŋ, an, bi tɔu ke yen etok.
Go cuo gam, ku yook, yan, Lɔ paandu tede kɔckun, ku lɛke keek kadit cii Bɛnydit luoi yin, ku kok ci en piou kok ke yin.
Go jal, ku jɔ kɔc guieer e Dekapoli luɔi ditt cii Yecu luoi yen; go kɔc gai kedhie.
Na wen, aci Yecu wɛɛr bɛ teem e abel, aci ɣet lɔɔk, ke kut ditt e kɔc gueer te nu yen; ku anu e wɛɛryɔu.
Na wen, ke bɛny tok bɔ bɛny toŋ de luaŋ de Nhialic, cɔl Jairo; na wen, aci e tiŋ, ke cuɛt rot piny e yecok,
go lɔŋ aret, yan, Nyandien thiine aci tiaam akɔɔr thuɔɔu; yin laŋ, an, Ba, thany yicin e yeguop, ka bi guop waar, ago piir.
Go lɔ keke yen, ku kuany cok e kut diit e kɔc, goki giŋ.
Na wen, ke tiiŋ tok bɔ, tiiŋ de tedɛn ee cool e wat e riɛm e run kathieer ku rou,
ku aci kajuec guum kak e looi akim juec, go weuke thol kedhie, ku acin teŋuan ci yok, arek abi jɔ lɔ ke dit en tetok.
Na wen, aci kede Yecu piŋ, ke bɔ e kut e kɔcic e yekɔu cieen, bi ku jiɛk lupɔde.
Aye lueel, yan, Na cakaa yɛn e jak lupɔɔke tei, ke yɛn bi guop pial.
Go awaŋdɛn e bi riɛm bei thin go lɔ ŋeu enɔnthiine; go yok e yeguop nɔn ci en dem e jɔŋde.
Na wen, ke dap ŋic en Yecu nɔn ci riɛl bɛn bei e yeguop, go rot puk e kut e kɔcic, ku thieec, yan, Eeŋa e jak lupɔɔki?
Go kɔckɛn e piooce goki thieec, yan, Kɛne kut e kɔc tiŋ aci yin giŋ, ku ba jɔ thieec, yan, Eeŋa e jak ɛn?
Go kɔc caath nyiin, ke bi raan tiŋ raan e loi kene.
Go tiiŋe bɛn, ke riɔc ku lɛthe, aŋic ke ci luoi yen, bi ku cuɛt rot piny e yenɔm, jɔ guieer yith ebɛn.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Nyane, gamdu aci yi tɔ waar; lɔ tei e cien kedaŋ, yin bi guɔp pial e jɔŋdu.
Te ŋoot en ke jam, ke kɔc e ke bɔ ɣon e bɛny de luaŋ de Nhialic, kɔc bi e bɛn lueel, yan, Nyandu e thou: eeŋo ŋoot yin ke yi jut Bɛny e weet?
Na wen, aci Yecu jam piŋ, jam wen ci lueel, ke dap bɛny de luaŋ de Nhialic yɔɔk, yan, Du riɔc, gam tei.
Ku acin raan ci pɔl a kuany ecok, ee Petero etok, ku Jakop, ku Jɔn manhe e Jakop.
Goki bɛn ɣon e bɛny e luaŋ de Nhialic, go kɔc tiŋ alek yɔŋyɔŋ, dhiauki ku kiuki.
Na wen, aci lɔ e kalic, ke yook keek, yan, Eeŋo la wek yɔŋyɔŋ wakya, ke we dhiau? meth aken thou, anin tei.
Goki dɔl guop. Na wen, ke ke tɔ lɔ biic kedhie, ku jɔ lɔ keke wun meth ku man ku kɔc wen cath ne yen, lek ɣot te nu meth thin.
Go meth dɔm cin, ku yook, yan, Talitha kumi; te puke yen e thoŋda, alueel, yan, Nyanthiine, yin yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot.
Go duet rot jɔt enɔnthiine, ku ciɛth: runke athieerki ku rou. Goki gai e gai dit.
Go ke cok e lom en kethook, ke cii bi dɛ raan bi kene ŋic: ku lueel, yan, Miacki e kecam.
Na wen, ke jel etɛɛn, le paanden; ku kuany cok e kɔckɛn e piooce.

Ku te ci kool e thabath bɛn, ke jɔ weet luaŋ de Nhialic: go kɔc juec, te ci kek e piŋ, goki gai, ku luelki, yan, Raane e yok kake tenou? ku, yan, Pɛlenɔm ci yien en ee pɛlenɔm cit ŋo? ku luɔi diit cit ekene, luɔi ee looi e yecin e bɔ tenou?
Kene cie aten e tiim, wen e Mari, ku ye manhe e Jakop, ku Jotheth, ku Judath, ku Thimon, ku nyurakecken ciki tɔu ne wook etene? Goki piɔth diu ne yen.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Nebi acin te cii e bi rieu, ee paanden etok, ku kɔcken yiic, ku dhiende.
Ku acin luɔi ril dueer looi etɛɛn, e yecin thany e kɔc tok gup kɔc liaakaŋ tei, tɔ ke dem.
Go gai ne rɛɛcdɛn reec kek gam. Go baai kuanyic ke weet kɔc.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce kathieer ku rou cɔɔl, ku jɔ keek tooc rene ku rene; ku gɛm keek riɛl bi kek jɔɔk rac cieŋ;
ku yook keek, yan, E cin ka ke kueeric mɔkki, ee thieec etok; e cin kuin, e cin athep, ku cin weu e kiithic;
yak war cieŋ e wecok; ku duoki aluluut kaarou e cieŋ.
Ku yook keek, yan, Baai ebɛn, te la wek ɣot, jaki tɔu e ɣone aɣet te ba wek jal etɛɛn.

Ku na de kɔc reec week nyuooc, ku reecki kedun piŋ, te jal wek etɛɛn, ke we jɔ abuni nu e wecok teŋ, abi aa caatɔ de ater ke keek. Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ketuc bii Thɔdom yok ayi Gomora ekool e guieereloŋ acii bi kit keke ketuc bii panydiite yok.
Goki lɔ biic, lek wel guiir, an, bi kɔc kepiɔth puk.
Ku jɔki jɔɔk rac cieec ke ke juec, ku tɔcki kɔc juec ne miok, kɔc de gup juai, ago ke tɔ dem.
Na wen, ke malik Kerod piŋ kede; rinke acik tic; go lueel, yan, Jɔn Baptith aci rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, yen a tɔuwe riɛldit e yeguop, riɛl e kaŋ looi.
Ku lueel kɔc kɔk, yan, Ee Elija. Ku ne kɔk, yan, Ee nebi, ku acit raan toŋ e nebii yiic.
Ku Kerod, te ci en e piŋ, ke lueel, yan, Jɔn guop, yen aci rot jɔt, raan waan ca kiɛp nɔm wei.
Kerod guop aci kɔc tooc lek Jɔn dɔm, go mac e aloocyic ne baŋ de Kerodiath, tiiŋ de Philip manhe: luɔi ci en e thiaak.
Aci Jɔn lɛk Kerod, yan, Akene pal yin luɔi dueer yin thŋ de mɛnhkui noom.
Go Kerodiath Jɔn mɔk ater, akɔɔr luɔi nɛk en en; ku ken leu e nak:
luɔi riɔɔce Kerod e Jɔn, aŋic nɔn ee yen raan piɛthpiɔu ku ɣeerpiɔu, go ya dot apiɛth. Na wen, aye yen piŋ, aa ye kajuec looi; go kede aa piŋ ne piɔnmit.
Na wen, ke kool piɛth biiye piny: Kerod, ekool e dhiethe ye, aci banyke luoi kecamdit, ke bany e piny cieŋ, ku bany ke tɔŋ, ku kɔc dit ke Galili;
na wen, aci nyan e Kerodiath bɛn ɣot, bi ku coŋ, ku koc Kerod nyin ayi kɔc rɛɛr ne yen etok ten ee cam; go malik duet yɔɔk, yan, Lip ɛn e ke nu yiniɔu, ka ba gam yin.
Go guutguut lueel, yan, Te de yen ke ba lip, aba gam yin, aɣet biak toŋ de ciɛɛŋdi.
Go lɔ biic, le ku thieec man, yan, Eeŋo ba iip? Go lueel, yan, Nɔm de Jɔn Baptith.
Go dap bɛn ɣot enɔnthiine te nu malik, bi ku lip, yan, Yɛn kɔɔr nɔn bi yin a gam nɔm de Jɔn Baptith e athaanic enɔnthiine.
Go malik piɔu dhiau aret, ku ne baŋ de guutguut wen ci lueel, ku ne baŋ de kamaan rɛɛr ne yen etok ten ee cam, ka cin piɔu luɔi bi en jai.
Go malik alathker tooc enɔnthiine, alathker e ye tht, yook, yan, Bɛɛiye nɔmde: go lɔ ku kip nɔm wei e aloocyic.
Na wen, ke bii nɔmde e athaanic, bii ku gɛm duet; ku jɔ duet gam man.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce ye piŋ, ke ke jɔ bɛn, bik ku nomki guopde, lek taau e raŋic.
Na wen, ke tuuc e ke gueer te nu Yecu; ku jɔki guieer kaŋ kedhie, ka cik looi ebɛn, ayi weet ci kek weet.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Baki e jɔɔric wapac, bak yok e we lɔŋ tethiinakaŋ. Ade kɔc juec bɔ ku ade kɔc juec lɔ, arek acin tedɛn e cam cik yok.
Goki jal kapac e abel leki e jɔɔric.
Na wen, ke ke tiŋ kut e kɔc e ke jel, go kɔc juec ke ŋic, goki kat e kecok e pɛɛnydit yiic kedhie, lek tɛɛn, agoki ke woor.
Na wen, aci Yecu bɛn bei e abelic, ke tiŋ kut ditt e kɔc, go piɔu kok ke keek, nɔn tɔu kek cit man e thok cin niim raan e ke tiit. Go ke jɔ wɛɛt e kajuec.
Na wen, aci akɔl thiɔk ke thei, ke kɔckɛn e piooce e ke bɔ te nu yen, bik ku luelki, yan, Piny ee jɔɔric, ku akɔl e guɔ thiɔk ke thei:
tɔ ke jel, leki dhaar thiɔke niim ku bɛi, lek rot ɣɔc kecam.
Go bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Miacki keek e kecamki. Goki thieec, yan, Wu buk kuin ci pam lɔ ɣɔɔc e jinii kathieer, ku gɛmku keek bik cam?
Go ke thieec, yan, Cathki ne kuiin ci pam kadiaa? Lak tieŋki. Na wen, acik e ŋic, ke jɔki lueel, yan, Ayek dhiec, ku rec kaarou.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Taki ke nyuc piny kedhie reme pei ku reme pei, e wɛl tɔc niim.
Goki nyuc e ke deyiic aber, ee dɛ aber de bɔt, ku de aber de thierdhic.
Na wen, ke kuany kuiin ci pam wen kadhic ku rec kaarou, go tenhial lieec, ku leec, go kuiin ci pam waak yiic: ku yin ke kɔcpiooce bik ke lɔ taau e kɔc niim; ku jɔ rec kaarou tɛk keek kedhie.
Goki cam kedhie, abik kuɛth.
Goki kuin athueithuei wen ci doŋ kuany, ayi dhuɔth de rec ci doŋ, abik dioony thiɔɔŋ kathieer ku rou.
Ku kɔc wen cam kuiin ci pam ayek agum kadhieny de roor.
Na wen, ke jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce dhil tɔ lɔ e abelic enɔnthiine, yan, bik kɔn lɔ lɔɔk lek Bethaida, te look en kut e kɔc tɔ jel yenguop.
Na wen, aci kɔc tɔɔŋ, ke jel le e kuurditic le lɔŋ.
Na wen, aci piny guɔ cuɔl, ke abel tɔu e wɛɛric cil, ku tɔu biic etok.
Go keek tiŋ, acik duɛɛr lan e gɛɛr, luɔi bi yom e keniim tueŋ. Na wen, te kɔɔre piny nɔn ŋeep en rot, ke bɔ tede keek, ke cath e piu niim; bi ku, yan, bɛɛric:
na wen, atiŋki ke cath e piu niim, ke tɔki ye aciek, agoki kiu:
acik tiŋ kedhie, agoki niim mum. Go dap jam ke keek, yook keek, yan, Mɔkki rot: ee yɛn; duoki riɔc.
Go lɔ e abelic te nu kek; go yom kɔɔc: goki gai aret e gai cin nɔm gaide;
kede kuiin ci pam akenki guɔ yokic, acik niim riɛl.
Na wen, acik ɣet lɔɔk, ke ke bɔ piny de Genetharet, ku jɔki abel mac e wɛɛryɔu.
Na wen, acik bɛn bei e abelic, ke jɔ kɔc ŋic enɔnthiine,
goki kat lek piny biake wiin ebɛn, ku jɔki kɔc tok ɣaac e laŋareepken yiic, bik ke bɛn lɛɛr te ci kek e piɛŋ thin.

Ku bɛi ee yen e ke lɔ thin ebɛn, nɔn ee kek wot, ku nɔn ee kek pɛɛnydit, ku nɔn ee kek bɛi nu rɛɛr, ke jɔki kɔc tok aa taau piny e thuk yiic, goki lɔŋ luɔi bi kek lupɔde jak, acakaa lupɔ thok tei: go kɔc kedhie kɔc wen ci e jak goki waar.
Na wen, ke Parithai gueer te nu yen, keke kɔc kɔk kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, kɔc e bɔ Jeruthalem,
ku acik kɔc kɔk e kɔckɛn e piooce tiŋ ke ke ye kuin cam e ke rac cin, yen aye cin kene piny.
Ku Parithai, keke Judai ebɛn, aciki ye cam, te ŋoot kek e ke ken kecin piny aret, amukki ciɛɛŋ thɛɛr e kɔc dit:
ku te ye kek bɛn e thuukic, te ŋoot kek e ke ken waak, ke ke cie cam: ku kajuec kɔk anuki, ka cik dɔm, ku yek ke dot apiɛth, cit man e wɛk de biiny, ku wɛk de tony, ku athɛn ke malɔɔŋ, ku biook.
Na wen, ke Parithai ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ke thiecki, yan, Na kɔckuon e piooce, eeŋo reec kek cieŋ e ciɛɛŋ thɛɛr e kɔc dit, ku yek knin cam ke ke ken kecin kɔn piny?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ee yic en ke waan lueel nebi Yithaya ne kedun, wek kɔc de yac aguk, cit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Kɔcke ayek a rieu e kethook, Ku amecki piɔth ne yɛn.
Lam ee kek a lam ee ɣɔric tei, Ku weetdɛn ee kek weet ee looŋ ke kɔc tei.
We ye loŋ de Nhialic pɔl, ku yak ciɛɛŋ thɛɛr e kɔc dot aril, ke cit wɛk de tony, ku biny, ku kajuec kɔk cit ekake ayak ke looi.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Thieithieei, rɛɛc aa wek loŋ de Nhialic rɛɛc, luɔi ba wek ciɛɛŋduon thɛɛr aa dot!
Aci Mothe lueel, yan, Ye wuur rieu keke moor; ku, yan, Raan e wun lɛk kerac ayi man, ke nakki abi thou:
ku week ayak lueel, yan, Te yooke raan wun ayi man, yan, Ke duɛɛr gam yin, ke bi yi muk, aci aa Korban, yen aye, Ke ci gam Nhialic;
ke we cii raan be pɔl e luoi lni en wun kedaŋ, ayi man;
aguɔki jam e Nhialic tɔ cin naamde ne ciɛɛŋduon thɛɛr: ku yak kajuec cit ekake looi ayadaŋ.

Go kut e kɔc ebɛn cɔɔl te nu yen, ku jɔ ke yɔɔk, yan, Piɛŋki kedi week wedhie, ku mɔkki e wepiɔth: acin ken e lɔ e raan guop, ke wen nu biic, ke dueer raan tɔ rac: ee ka bɔ bei e raanic thin, kek aye kak e raan tɔ rac.
Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Na wen, aci jal e kut e kɔcic le ɣot, ke kɔckɛn e piooce ke thiecki ne kaaŋe.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ŋuɔɔtki ke we kuc kaŋ ayadaŋ? Kɛnki kene yokic, yan, Acin ke ye lɔ e raan guop, ke wen nu biic, ke dueer raan tɔ rac:
luɔi ken en lɔ e yepiɔu, alɔ e yeyac tei, go bɛ lɔ biic e yomic? Ke e lueel en en, ee ke e tɔ yen kecam piɛth eben.
Go lueel, yan, Ke bɔ bei e raanic, yen aye raan tɔ rac.
E raanic thin, e raan piɔu thin, yen aye taŋ rac bɛn bei, kɔɔr e dieer lei, dhoom, naŋ nɛke raan raan akur,
kuel, wui de kalei, luɔi de kerac, rueeny, kɔɔr e kerac, tiɛɛl, lɛɛt rac, luɔi ee raan rot tɔ dit, cin cine raan nɔm:
karɛcke kedhie ayek bɛn bei e raanic thin, agoki raan tɔ rac.
Na wen, ke jɔt rot etɛɛn, jel le piny de Turo ku Thidon. Go lɔ ɣot, ku acin piɔu luɔi bi raan e ŋic; ku acii dueer thiaan.
Ade tiiŋ de nyandɛn thiin cii jɔŋ rac dɔm; na wen, aci kede piŋ, ke jɔ guɔ bɛn enɔnthiine, bi ku cuɛt rot piny e yecok.
Ku tiiŋe ee Giriki, jurden acɔl Thurapoinike. Go lɔŋ luɔi bi en jɔŋ rac cieec bei e nyande guop.
Go yɔɔk, yan, E mith e ke ye kɔn kuɛth; aci piɛth te noome raan kuin e mith, deny jɔk.
Go bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Ee yic, Bɛnydit, ku jɔk nu e tharabeth thar ayek cam tei ne athueithuei e both mith.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Ne baŋ de jame, jɔ lɔ; jɔŋ rac e jal e nyandu guop.
Na wen, aci lɔ ɣonde, ke yok nyande atɔu piny e laŋgarep nɔm, ke ci jɔŋ rac jal e yeguop.
Na wen, ke be jal piny de Turo, ku jɔ Thidon reetic, bii wɛɛr e Galili, teek piny de Dekapoli.
Goki raan bɛɛi te nu yen, raan miŋ, ku cie jam apiɛth; goki lɔŋ, an, bi ecin thany e yeguop.
Go bɛɛi bei e kut e kɔc yiic yetok, ku tɛɛu ecin e yeyith, go ŋuut, ku jiɛk liep;
na wen, ke liec paannhial, ku wei aret, ku yook, yan, Eppatha, yan, Liep rot.
Go yith liep enɔnthiine, ku lony ke wen e liep duut, go jɔ jam e ka piŋ yiic.
Go ke lom thook, an, E cin raan daŋ lɛkki yen; ku lum lom en kethook aret, yen aye kek jam lɔ thiai piny aret.
Acik gai e gai cii them ethok, ku luelki, yan, Aci kerieec tiiŋic ebɛn; acakaa miŋ aye ke tɔ piŋ, ku tɔ kɔc cin thook jam.
Na ɣɔn e akoolke, aci kut ditt e kɔc bɛ gueer, ku cinki kecam, go Yecu kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl tede yen, ku yook keek, yan,
Yɛn e piɔu kok wo kut e kɔc, luɔi ci kek tɔu ne yɛn nin acik aa diak enɔɔne ku acinki kecam:
ku te ta yɛn keek jel lek paanden, ke ke ken kethook jak, ka bike tiaam kueer; kɔk e keyiic aake bɔ temec.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛɛr, yan, Ee tenou bi raan kecam yok, kecam bi kɔcke tɔ kueth e jɔɔric etene?
Go ke thieec, yan, Ee kuiin ci pam kadiaa cath ne week? Goki, yan, Ee dherou.
Go kut e kɔc yɔɔk bik nyuc piny: na wen, ke kuany kuiin ci pam kadherou, ku jɔ Nhialic leec, go ke waak yiic, ku gɛm keek kɔckɛn e piooce, bik ke taau e kɔc niim; goki ke taau e kut e kɔc niim.
Ku ciɛthki ne rec thii toktook: na wen, ke ke thieei, ku jɔ ke yɔɔk, bik ke taau e keniim ayadaŋ.
Goki cam, abik kuɛth: goki kak athueithuei wen ci doŋ kuany e dioony yiic kadherou.
Ku kɔc wen ci cam acitki agum kaŋuan: ku jɔ ke tɔ jel.
Go lɔ e abelic enɔnthiine keke kɔckɛn e piooce etok, ku bi paan e Dalmanutha.
Na wen, ke Parithai e ke bɔ, bik ku gɔlki teer ne yen, akɔɔrki kegok gɛiye tede yen kegok bɔ nhial, them kek en.
Go wei nhial aret, ku lueel, yan, Eeŋo kɔɔr rem de enɔɔne kegok gɛiye? wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acin kegok gɛiye bi gam rem de enɔɔne.
Go ke nyaaŋ piny, ku be lɔ abelic, jel le lɔɔk.
Na wen, acik kuin ruooi; ku acin ke cath ke keek e abelic, ee kuin tok tei kuin ci pam.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Yak cath aŋiɛcki, yak rot tiit e luɔu de Parithai, ayi luɔu de Kerod.
Goki jam kapac, luelki, yan, Ee luɔi cin wok niim kuin.
Na wen, aci Yecu ye ŋic, ke thieec keek, yan, Eeŋo tɛɛrki ne cin cien wek niim kuin? Ŋuɔɔtki e we kuc kaŋ, ku caki kaŋ e piŋ? ŋuɔɔtki e we ril piɔth?
We de nyin, ku caki ye daai? ku we de yith, ku caki ye piŋ? ku caki weniim e tak?
Waan waak ɛn kuiin ci pam yiic kadhic e agum kadhieny de kɔc yiic, cak dioony kuany kadiaa, dioony ci thiaŋ ne kak athueithuei? Goki lueel, yan, Thieer ku rou.
Ayi waan can kuiin waak yiic kadherou e agum kaŋuan de kɔc yiic, cak dioony kuany kadi, dioony ci thiaŋ ne kak athueithuei? Goki lueel, yan, Dherou.
Go ke thieec, yan, Ŋuɔɔtki ke we cii kaŋ e piŋ?
Goki bɛn Bethaida. Na wen, ke ke bii cɔɔr tede yen, ku jɔki lɔŋ ke bi jak.
Go cɔɔr dɔm cin, ku thel bei wutic; na wen, ke ŋuut nyin, ku thɛny ecin e yeguop, ku thieec, yan, De ke ci tiŋ?
Go enyin jɔt, ku lueel, yan, Yɛn woi kɔc, ee luɔi aa yɛn ke tiŋ acit tiim, ke ke cath.
Na wen, ke be ecin thany e yenyin, ku tɔ jɔt enyin. Go nyin bɛ lɔ teden, ku jɔ kɔc woi egɔk kedhie.
Go tɔ lɔ paande, ku lueel, yan, Du lɔ wutic, ku du lek raan daŋ nu wutic ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ke Yecu jel keke kɔckɛn e piooce lek bɛi ke Kaidhareia de Pilip: go kɔckɛn e piooce thieec kueer, yan, Ye kɔc lueel, an, aa ŋa?
Goki bɛɛr yan, Jɔn Baptith: ku ye kɔc kɔk lueel, yan, Eiija; ku lueel kɔc kɔk, yan, Raan toŋ de nebii.
Go ke thieec, yan, Na week, yak lueel, yan, aa ŋa? Go Petero bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Yin ee Kritho.
Go ke lom thook, yan, E cin raan lɛkki yen.

Na wen, ke ke jɔ gɔl e weet, yan, Wen e raan abi kajuec dhil guum, ku bi dhil rɛɛc e roordit, ku banydit ke ka ke Nhialic, ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku bi dhil nɔk, na miak, aci nhi aa diak, ka bi rot bɛ jɔt.
E jame lueel a piŋ raan ebɛn. Na wen, ke Petero dɔm Bɛny cin, ku jɔ jɔɔny.
Go rot puk, ku woi kɔckɛn e piooce, ku jɔ Petero jɔɔny, lueel, yan, Lɔ e yakɔu cieen, Catan: acie ka ke Nhialic kek tuɔɔme e yipiɔu, ee ka ke kɔc tei.
Go kut e kɔc cɔɔl keke kɔckɛn e piooce, ku yook keek, yan, Na de raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en a biɔɔth cok, e ye rot nyɔŋ, ku jɔt timdɛn ci riiu nɔm, ku jɔ a kuany cok.
Raan ebɛn raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en weike kony, ka bi weike mɔɔr; ku raan ebɛn raan bi weike mɔɔr ne biakdi, ku ne biak de welpiɛth, ka bi weike kony.
Ku piathde akou tede raan, te ciɛm en piny nɔm ebɛn, ku mɛɛr weike?
Ku ye ŋo dueer raan gaam wɛɛr en weike?
Ku raan ebɛn raan e yaar e kedi ku ne welki e remeyic rem e dieer lei kɔɔr, ku ye rem e kerac dap looi, ke Wen e raan abi yaar e kede aya, te bi yen ne dhueeŋ de Wun keke tuucnhial ɣerpiɔth.
Go lɛk keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ade kɔc kɔk e kɔc yiic kɔc kaac etene, kɔc ci thuɔɔu bi thieep, te ŋoot kek ke ke ken ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic tiŋ ke bɔ keke riɛldit.
Na wen, aci nin aa dhetem, ke Yecu nom Petero, ku Jakop, ku Jɔn, leer keek e kuurditt baar nɔm kapac pei: go yeguop puk aye guop daŋ e keniim:
go lupɔɔke lɔ riauriau, abik ɣɛɛr ewic, awar ɣɛɛr dueere raan lupɔɔ tɔ ɣer.
Na wen, ke Elija tul e kelɔm keke Mothe: ku ajamki ne Yecu.
Go Petero bɛɛr, ku lek Yecu, yan, Bɛny, apiɛth nɔn tɔu wok ene: jɔku kɛɛt yik kadiak, ee tok kedu, ku tok kede Mothe, ku tok kede Elija.
Akuc loŋ piɛth adi ci lueel; acik guɔ riɔɔc aret.
Na wen, ke luat bɔ kum ke piny: ku bɔ rol e luatic, rol lueel en, yan, Wendien nhiaar ki, ekene: yak kede piŋ.
Na wen, e tethiine, acik piny liaap, ke cin raan cik bɛ tin, ee Yecu etok keke keek.
Na wen, abiki piny e kuurdit nɔm, ke ke lom Yecu thook, yan, E cin raan lɛkki ka cak tiŋ, te ŋoote Wen e raan ke ken rot guɔ jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Goki jame muk e keyac, ke ke ye rot thieec kapac, yan, Jon jɔte raan rot e kɔc ci thou yiic ee kaŋo?
Goki thieec, yan, Eeŋo ye kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e lueel, yan, bi Elija dhil kɔn bɛn?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Elija abi kɔn bɛn eyic, go kaŋ bɛ puk tɔ ke piɛth kedhie: ku ci gɔɔr adi ne kede Wen e raan, nɔn bi en kajuec dhil guum, ku dhal guop?
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Elija e guɔ bɛn, ku acik luoi kede kekpiɔth, cit man ci e gɔɔr ne kede.
Na wen, acik bɛn te nu kɔcpiooce, ke ke tiŋ kut diit e kɔc acik keek tuɔɔk, ku tiŋki kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr aguiirki ne keek.
Na wen, etethiine, aci kut e kɔc e tiŋ, ke ke gai aret, goki riŋ ke lɔ te nu yen lek mɔɔth.
Go kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr thieec, yan, Eeŋo guiɛɛrki ne keek?
Go raan tok e kut e kɔc yiic bɛɛr, yan, Bɛny e weet, yɛn e wendi bɛɛi tede yin, wen cii jɔŋ rac dɔm jɔŋ cin thok;
ku te de en te dɔm en en, ke deeny piny erup: ago ayɔk gut e yethok, ku reem elec, go lɔ ke nɔl: guɔ lɛk kɔckuon e piooce luɔi bi kek e cieec; ku akenki leu e ciec.
Go bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Rem reec gam oou! ba ceŋ e weyiic e run kadi? ba kedun guum e run kadi? bɛɛiki te nuo yɛn.
Goki bɛɛi te nu yen: na wen, aci jɔŋ rac e tiŋ, ke jɔ meth tɔ lɔ juɔkiaŋ; go wiik en meth, ku dɛɛl rot piny abi ayɔk gut e yethok.
Go wun thieec, yan, Ye run di run e dɔme kene ye? Go lueel, yan, Te waan ee yen meth.
Ku aye cool e cuat mɛɛc ayi piu yiic, an, nɛk: ku na de ke duɛɛre leu, ke yi kok piɔu we wook, ago wo kony.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Te ŋic yin gam, kaŋ ayeke leu kedhie tede raan e gam.
Go wun meth coot enɔnthine, go piu lony e yenyin, ku lueel yan, Aca gam, Bɛnydit; kony ɛn ne kuny kuoc ɛn gam.
Na wen, aci Yecu kut e kɔc tiŋ nɔn bi kek e ke riŋ etok, ke jany jɔŋ rac, yook, yan, Yin jɔŋ miŋ cin thok, yin yɔɔk, yan, Ba bei, ku du be lɔ e yeguop.
Go kiu, ku tɔ meth lɔ juɔklaŋ, ku jɔ bɛn bei: go guɔ ciet raan ci thou; arek abi tedit e kɔc e lueel, yan, Aci thou.
Go Yecu meth dɔm cin, ku jɔt nhial; ago rot jɔt.
Na wen, aci bɛn ɣot, ke thieec kɔckɛn e piooce pei kapac, yan, Eeŋo ken wok e leu e ciec?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ke cit ekene acin ke dueer e tɔ bɔ bei, ee lɔŋ etok keke rɛɛc reece raan cam.
Na wen, acik jal etɛɛn, ke ke jɔ teek e Galili; ku acii kɔɔr luɔi bi en dɛ raan bi e ŋic.
Ee kɔckɛn e piooce wɛɛt, yook keek, yan, Wen e raan aci taau e kɔc cin, ku abik nɔk; na miak, aci nɔk, ka bi rot bɛ jɔt e nin ee kek diak.
Ku akenki jame yokic, ku acik riɔɔc e thiec thieec kek en.
Goki bɛn Kapernaum; na wen, anu ɣoot, ke ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo e tɛɛrki wapac wen kueer?
Goki lɔ lik: luɔi ee yen dit en e teerki kapac kueer.
Go nyuc piny, ku cɔɔl kɔc kathieer ku rou; ku yook keek, yan, Na de raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en lɔ tueŋ, ke ye tɔu e kɔc cok cieen kedhie, abi aa mɛnh e kɔc luooi kedhie.
Ku noom mɛnhthiinakaŋ, tɛɛu e keyiic cil: na wen, ke boom, ku yook keek, yan,
Raan ebɛn raan bi mɛnhthiin tok dɔm, mɛnh toŋ cit mɛnhe, ne baŋ de rinki, ka ye yɛn e dɔm; ku raan dɔm ɛn, acie yɛn e dɔm, ee raan e toc ɛn yen e dɔm.
Go Jɔn lueel, yan, Bɛny e weet, wo e raan tiŋ aciec jɔɔk rac ne rinku, raan cii wook e kuany cok: agoku peen, luɔi cii en wook e kuany cok.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Duoki pen: acin raan bi luɔi dit looi ne rinki, ku dueer a dap lɛk kerac.
Raan cin ater ke wook en aye raanda.
Raan bi week miɔɔc e biny e piu ka dɛkki ne rinki, luɔi aa wek kɔc ke Kritho, wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Aci bi tɔu ke cin ariopde.
Ku raan bi mɛnh tok e miththiike yiic tɔ wac kaŋ mith gam ɛn, adueer ŋuan tede yen, te mɛce gok dht e pii e guar e yeyeth, ku cuɛte wiir.

Ku na yicin, te tɔ en yi wac kaŋ, ke tɛɛme wei: adueer ŋuan tede yin, te le yin tede piir ke yi cin ciin tok, ne luɔi bi yin cath we cin kaarou, ago lɔ giɛna (en aye terɛɛc etaiwei,) tede many cii dueere leu ne nak anande,
te cii thiende e thou, ku cii mac e nɔk anande.
Ayi yicok, te tɔ en yi wac kaŋ, ke tɛɛme wei: adueer ŋuan tede yin, te le yin tede piir, ke yi cin cook tok, ne luɔi bi yin dɛ cok kaarou, ku bi yi cuat e giɛnayic,
te cii thiende e thou, ku cii mac e nɔk anande.
Ayik yinyin, te tɔ en yi wac kaŋ, ke tuke bei: adueer ŋuan tede yin, te le yin e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic weke nyin tok, ne luɔi bi yin cath we nyin kaarou, ku bi yi cuat e giɛnayic;
te cii thiende e thou, ku cii mac e nɔk anande.
Raan ebɛn abi tɔ wac e mac, ku ke ci lam ebɛn ku nak abi tɔ wac e amiiɔ.
Amilɔ yen apiɛth: ku na ci amilɔ guɔ liɛɛr ethuat, bak tɔ wac e ŋo? Yak dɛ amilɔ e weyiic, ku yak reer ediu wapac.
Na wen, ke jel etɛɛn, bi piny de Judaya e Jordan nɔm lɔŋtui; go kuut ke kɔc bɛ gueer te nu yen; go keek bɛ wɛɛt, cit man e taudɛn thɛɛr.
Na wen, ke Parithai e ke bɔ tede yen, bik ku thiecki, yan, Piɛth te pɔke raan keke tiiŋde? them kek en.
Go bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Ci Mothe we lɛk ŋo?
Goki lueel, yan, Mothe ee raan pal gaar gɛɛr en awarek de pɔk, ku bi pɔk keke yen.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Ne baŋ de riɛl e wepiɔth en aa gɛɛr en loŋe.
Ku te ɣɔn ciɛke piny, moc ku tik en aye cuɛc e cueece Nhialic keek.
Yen abi moc wun pɔl ku pɛl man, ku mɛt ke tiiŋde:
agoki aa guop tok keek kaarou: yen a cii kek be aa rou, acik aa guop tok.
Yen ka cii Nhialic jɔ mat, e cin raan e ke paak.
Na wen, areerki ɣoot, ke beye kɔckɛn e piooce thieec ne kede jame.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Raan pɔk ke thŋde, ku jɔ tiiŋ daŋ thiaak, ka ye lɔ ke tiiŋ lei:
ayi tik, te pɛl en monyde, ku beye thiaak e mony daŋ, ka ye lɔ ke mony lei.
Na wen, ke ke jɔ miththiiakaŋ bɛɛi te nu yen, bi ke bɛn jak: go kɔcpiooce ke jɔɔny:
na wen, aci Yecu ye tiŋ, ke diu piɔu aret, ku yook keek, Palki miththiiakaŋ e ke bɔ te nuo yɛn; duoki ke pen: ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ee kede kɔc cit keek.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Raan reec ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic noom cit man e mɛnhthiinakaŋ, ka cii bi lɔ thin etaiwei.
Go ke boom, ku thieei keek, ku thɛny ecin e keniim.
Na wen, aloony kueer, ke raan tok bɔ ke riŋ, bi ku tuk emiɔl e yenɔm, ku jɔ thieec, yan, Bɛny piɛth e kɔc wɛɛt, eeŋo ba looi ke ban piir athɛɛr lɔɔk lak?
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Eeŋo tɔ yin ɛn e raan piɛth? acin raan piɛth nu, yen aye Nhialic.
Yin ŋic cok ke loŋ, yan, Du lɔ weke tiiŋ lei, du raan daŋ nak abi thou, du ye kual, du kɔc e cak thook, du kɔc e cam, ye wuur rieu keke moor.
Go bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Bɛny e weet, kake kedhie aca ke ya dot ɣɔn aa yɛn meth aɣɔl ci enɔɔne.

Na wen, ke woi Yecu guop, ku nhiɛɛr, go yɔɔk, yan, Ee tok en a dak yin: lɔ, ɣaace kaku kedhie, ku miɔc kɔc kuany nyiin, ke yin bi dɛ weu piɛth paannhial: ku ba, jɔt timduon ci riiu nɔm, ku kuany acok.
Go piɔu rac ne jame, ku jɔ jal, ke ci piɔu diu; luɔi ee yen raan juec e kake.
Na wen, ke Yecu ciɛɛth kɔc nyiin, ku yook kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Ee keril etor oou, luɔi bi kɔc de weu juec lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic!
Go kɔcpiooce gai ne welke. Go Yecu bɛ bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Wathii, ee keril etor oou, luɔi bi kɔc e weu juec ŋɔɔth lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic!
Luɔi bi thɔrɔl teek e hipɔ nyin, yen apiɔl ne luɔi bi raan de weu juec lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic.
Goki gai e gai rac, ku thiecki rot kapac, yan, Ka ye ŋa dueere kony wei?
Go Yecu ke caath nyiin, ku lueel, yan, Kene adhal kɔc, ku acii Nhialic dhal: kerieec ebɛn aye Nhialic leu.
Na wen, ke jɔ Petero lɛk en, yan, Tiŋ, wo ci kaŋ nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku kuanyku yicok.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acin raan ci ɣonde nyaaŋ piny, ku nyieeŋ mithakɔcken piny, ku nyiirakɔcken, ku wun, ku man, ku tiiŋde, ku mithke, ku dum, ne biakdi, ku ne biak de welpiɛth,
ku cii kaŋ bi bɛ yok, ka ci kenyin ŋuak raanbɔt enɔn piir ene, ɣoot, ku mithekɔcken, ku nyiirakɔcken, ku marken, ayi mithke, ayi dum, keke yoŋ bi kɔc e yɔŋ; na miak e piny bi bɛn, ke yok piir athɛɛr.
Ku kɔc juec nu tueŋ abik lɔ cieen; ku lɔ kɔc nu cieen tueŋ.
Na wen, aciɛthki kueer, ke ke lɔ Jeruthalem; ku cath Yecu e keniim tueŋ: agoki gai; ku ariɔcki te kuɛny kek ecok. Go kɔc kathieer ku rou bɛ cɔɔl te nu yen, ku jɔ keek lɛk ka bi yok,
yan, Tieŋki, wo lɔ Jeruthalem, ku Wen e raan abi yien banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr; agoki loŋde teem, an, nak, ku jɔki yien Juoor:
ku abik geet guop, ku ŋuutki, ku duiki e waat, ku jɔki nɔk abi thou; ku abi rot bɛ jɔt ekool ee kek diak.
Na wen, ke Jakop bɔ keke Jɔn, ke wɛɛt ke Dhebedayo, bik te nu yen, ku luelki, yan, Bɛny e weet, na de ke buk lip tede yin, akɔɔrku nɔn bi yin e looi.
Go ke thieec, yan, Ee kaŋo ke kaarki nɔn ban e luoi week?
Goki lueel, yan, Pale wo reer ne dhueeŋduyin, tok e baŋ cuenydu, ku tok e baŋ camdu.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Wek kuc ke liɛpki. Duɛɛrki dek ne biny aa yɛn dek thin, ku dueere we baptith ne baptinh ci ya baptith?
Goki lueel, yan, Adueerku leu. Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, We bi dek ne biny dɛk ɛn thin eyic; ku baptinh ci ya baptith, ke we bi baptith aya:
ku reer e baŋ cuenydi ayi baŋ camdi acie kedien gam kɔc: ee kede kɔc ci e guiek keek.
Na wen, aci kɔc kathieer e piŋ, ke ke jɔ piɔth diu ne Jakop ku Jɔn.
Go Yecu ke cɔɔl te nu yen, ku yook keek, yan, We ŋic kɔc wen ci tɔ ye bany ceŋ piny e Juoor niim, nɔn ee kek kɔc cieŋ e ciɛɛŋ ril; ku kɔc dit e keyiic aye keek cieŋ.
Ku acii bi tɔu aya e weyiic: ku raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en dit e weyiic, en abi aa raan e week luooi:
ku raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en lɔ tueŋ e weyiic, en abi aa lim e kɔc kedhie.
Acakaa Wen e raan aa cii bɔ luɔi bi ye luooi e kɔc, ee luɔi bi en kɔc aa luooi, yen aa bi yen, ku luɔi bi en weike gam bi kɔc juec bɛn waar.
Goki bɛn Jeriko: na wen, te jel en e Jeriko keke kɔckɛn e piooce ku kut diit e kɔc, ke cɔɔr cɔl Bartimayo, wen e Timayo, arɛɛr e kueer kec, ke lip.
Na wen, aci ye piŋ nɔn ee yen Yecu de Nadhareth, ke jɔ coot, yan, Yecu, wen e Dabid, tɔ yiniɔu kok weke yɛn.
Go jɔɔny e kɔc juec, yan, Lɔ lik; go coot e cɔt war cɔt wen aret, yan, Wen e Dabid, tɔ yiniɔu kok weke yɛn.
Na wen, ke kaac, en Yecu, lek kɔc, an, Calki. Goki cɔɔl, ku yookki, yan, Rit yipiɔu, jɔt rot, aci yi cɔɔl.
Go lupɔde cuat wei, ku jɔt rot, bi tede Yecu.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, thieec, yan, Eeŋo kɔɔr ke ba luoi yin? Go cɔɔr lueel, yan, Raboni, ee luɔi ban yin, yen akaar.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ; gamdu aci yi tɔ dem. Go dap yin enɔnthiine, ku jɔ kuany cok kueer.
Na wen, acik thiɔk e Jeruthalem, ku acik ɣet Bethpage ku Bethani, te lɔ kuurdiit cɔl Olip, ke toc kɔc kaarou e kɔckɛn e piooce yiic,
yook keek, yan, Laki paan nu e weniim tueŋ; ku te ca wek lɔ thin, ke we bi mɛnh e muul dap yok enɔnthiine, mul cin raan ci kɔn lɔ e yekɔu ecaŋɣɔn; jaki lony, ku bɛɛiki.
Ke na de raan thiec week, yan, Eeŋo luoiki ekene? ke luɛlki, yan, Akɔɔr Bɛnydit; ka bi dap tɔ biiye.
Goki jal, lek ku yokki mɛnh e muni amac ɣot thok biic e apɔkkuɛɛr thok; agoki lony.
Ku thiec keek e kɔc kɔk e kɔc kaac etɛɛn, yan, Ee kaŋo ke luɔny wek mɛnh e muul?
Goki lɛk keek cit man ci Yecu ye lɛk keek: goki ke pɔl.
Goki mɛnh e muni bɛɛi te nu Yecu, ku thiethki lupɔɔken e yekɔu; ku jɔ lɔ e muul kɔu.
Go kɔc juec lupɔɔken thiɛth piny kueer; ku tem kɔc kɔk keer ke tiim, ku thiethki ke kueer.
Ago kɔc wen cath tueŋ ku kɔc cath e yecok cieen, agoki ya coot, yan, Othana! thieithieei raan bɔ ne rin ke Bɛnydit!
Thieithieei ne ciɛɛŋ bɔ, cieɛŋ de waada Dabid! Othana tenhial ya!
Go Yecu lɔ Jeruthalem, le luaŋdiit e Nhialic; na wen, aci kaŋ caath nyiin ebɛn, ku ci akɔl guɔ thei, ke jɔ jal le Bethani keke kɔc kathieer ku rou.
Na ɣɔnmiak, te ci kek bɛn bei e Bethani, ke nɛk cɔk.
Na wen, ke jɔ tim cɔl ŋaap tiŋ temec, ade nɔm yith, go bɛn, nɔn de ke bi en yien yok e yenɔm: na wen, ke bɔ, go cien ke ci yok, ee yith kapac; pɛɛi ee ŋaap ŋuɔl aŋoot wei.
Go bɛɛr, yook, yan, E cin raan bi mithku bɛ ya cam aɣet athɛɛr. Ku piŋ kɔckɛn e piooce.

Goki bɛn Jeruthalem: ku le luaŋditt e Nhialic, le ku gɔl kɔc e ciec biic kɔc e kaŋ ɣaac ku kɔc e kaŋ ɣɔɔc e luaŋditic, ago pɛɛm ke kɔc e weu waar yiic pɔk yiic piny, ayi pɛɛm wen reere kɔc e guk ɣaac;
go jai, yan, acin raan bi tony aa ɣaac e luaŋdiit e Nhialicyic.
Go ke wɛɛt, yook keek, yan, Kene gɔɔr, yan, Ɣondi abi tɔ ye ɣon e lɔŋ kede juoor ebɛn? Ku week, acak tɔ ye ruŋ e kɔc e kaŋ rum.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr goki piŋ, ku kɔɔrki naŋ bi kek e nɔk: acik riɔɔc e yen, luɔi ci kut e kɔc gai ebɛn ne weetde.
Na theen, ke jel e panyditic.
Na ɣɔnmiak, te teek kek, ke ke tiŋ ŋaap waan aci riɔu ayi meeide.
Go Petero enɔm tak ku lueel, yan, Rabi, tiŋ, ŋaap waan cien, aci guɔ riɔu.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Yak Nhialic gam.
