Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Raan yook kuurdiite, yan, Tɔ ro nyiɛɛiye, ku cuɛteyi e abapditic; ku cii piɔu wiel, ku gam egɔk nɔn bi ka lueel aa yith, ka bi kedɛn e lueel yok.
Yen a lɛk ɛn e week, yan, Te de yen ka bak aa lip, te ya wek lɔŋ, yak gam nɔn ca wek ke guɔ loom, ku abak ke yok.
Ku te kaac wek, ke we laŋ, ku ade raan ci we wac kedaŋ, ke palki; ke Wuoorduon nu paannhial ke bi we pal ke cak wooc ayadaŋ.
Ku na rɛɛcki ye pɔl, ke Wuoorduon nu paannhial ke cii ka cak wooc bi pal week ayadaŋ.
Goki bɛ bɛn Jeruthalem: na wen, aciɛth luaŋditt e Nhialic, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ke ke bɔ tede yen, keke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku roordit;
bik ku thiecki, yan, Ee riɛlou looi yin ekake? ku ye ŋa e gɛm yin eriɛle looi yin ekake?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, We ba thieec aya ne cook tok, ku bak kedi bɛɛr, ke we ba lɛk riɛl luɔɔi ɛn ekake.
Yan, Baptinh e Jɔn, e bɔ paannhial, ku e bɔ tede kɔc tei? Jaki kedi bɛɛr.
Goki wel tɛɛr kapac, yan, Na luelku, yan, Aa bɔ paannhial; ka bi lueel, yan, Ka ye ŋo kɛn wek en gam?
Ku na luelku, yan, Aa bɔ tede kɔc; acik riɔɔc e kɔc; kɔc kedhie ayek Jɔn tɔ ye nebi egɔk.
Goki bɛɛr, lekki Yecu, yan, Akucku. Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Ayi yɛn aya, aca bi lɛk week yen riɛl luɔɔi ɛn ekake.

Go jam gɔl ke keek e kaaŋ. Yan, Raan e dom piith e tim cɔl enap tim de mith mit, go geeu e rɔk, ku wec te bi mith ke tim nyiith yiic, ku yik aloocdiit baar, go taau e kɔc cin kɔc bi dom aa tiit, ku jɔ keny paan mec.
Na wen, e pɛɛi e luɔk de tiim, ke tuc lim tok kɔc wen tit dom, an, bi kaŋ noom tede kɔc tit dom ne ka ci luɔk domic.
Goki dɔm, ku duiki, ku tɔki dɔk enɔm e yecin.
Go ke bɛ tuoc lim daŋ; goki biɔɔk e kur, ku duiki nɔm, ku tɔki jel, ke cik laat e lɛɛt rac.
Go daŋ bɛ tooc; agoki nɔk abi thou: ku him kɔk juec; ayek kɔk dui, ku nɛkki kɔk.
Na wen, nɔn ŋoot en ke cath ke wendɛn tok, wen nhiɛɛr, ke jɔ tuoc keek e kɔc cok cieen, alueel, yan, Abik wendi rieu.
Na wen, ke kɔc wen tit dom ke jɔki lueel kapac, yan, Kene ee mɛnh bi kaŋ lɔɔk lak; bak lok nakku, ke kaŋ abik aa kakuɔ.
Agoki dɔm, ku nakki, ku jɔki cuat e dom kec biic.
Eeŋo bi bɛny de dom jɔ looi? abi bɛn bi kɔc tit dom bɛn nɔk, ku jɔ dom yien kɔc kɔk.
Acakaa cook ci gɔɔre kɛnki kueen, yan; Kuur ci yiik rɛɛc, Yenguop aci tɔ ye kuur e aguk nɔm:
Ee luɔi de Bɛnydit ekene, Ka ye kegai tede wook?
Goki piɔth dɛ luɔi dɔm kek en; ku acik riɔɔc e kut e kɔc; acik guɔ ŋic nɔn e lueel en ekaaŋe ne keden: agoki pɔl, ku jelki.
Na wen, ke ke jɔ kɔc kɔk ke Parithai tuoc en, keke kɔc ke Kerod, lek deep e wel yiic.

Na wen, e ke bɔ, bik ku luelki, yan, Bɛny e weet, yin ŋicku nɔn ee yin yic, ku acin raan bi yin riɔɔc e ye; yin cii kɔc e woi gup biic tei, yin ee kɔc wɛɛt e kueer e Nhialic ne yic. Ci pal wook nɔn bi wok Kaithar aa kuot atholbo, kuo cie ye?
Buk aa miooc, ku cuku bi aa miooc? Ku aci aguk nu e keyac ŋic, go lueel, yan, Eeŋo thɛm wek ɛn? Bɛɛiki rial, ba bɛn tiŋ.
Goki bɛɛi. Go keek thieec, yan, Raan ci gɔɔre ee ŋa, ku jam ci gɔɔr ee kede ŋa? Goki lueel, yan, Ee kede Kaithar.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Yak Kaithar yien ka ke Kaithar, ku yak Nhialic yien ka ke Nhialic. Goki gai ne yen aret.
Na wen, ke Thadokai ke ke bɔ tede yen, kɔc e ye lueel, yan, cin jon bi kɔc rot jɔt nu; bik ku thiecki, yan,
Bɛny e weet, Aci Mothe gaar wook, yan, Te thouwe manhe e raan, ku nyieeŋ tik piny, ku cin mɛnh ci nyaaŋ piny, ke manhe look tiiŋ de yen noom, ago mith lɔɔk dhieth manhe.
Wɛɛt ke raan tok anuki kadherou: go mɛnh tueŋ tik thiaak, ku jɔ thou ke cin mɛnh ci nyaaŋ piny.
Na wen, ke mɛnh wen ee kek rou jɔ tik noom, ku thou, ke cin mɛnh ci nyaaŋ piny; ayi mɛnh wen ee kek diak ayadaŋ:
agoki lɔ ne tik keek kedhie kadherou, ku cin mith cik nyaaŋ piny. Na wen, e kecok cieen, ke tik look thou ayadaŋ.
Ku enɔɔne, kool e jonerot e kɔc, te ci kek rot jɔt, ke bi aa tiiŋ de ŋa e keyiic? acik lɔ ne yen keek kedhie kadherou, an, ee tiiŋden.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Cie yen wac aa wek kaŋ wooc, yen kuny kuoc wek kacigɔɔr, ayi riɛldiit e Nhialic?
Te jɔt kek rot e kɔc ci thou yiic, ka ciki ye thieek ku cike ye thiaak; ayek ciet tuucnhial nu paannhial.
Ku ne kede kɔc ci thou, jon jɔt kek rot, kɛnki kueen e awarek de Motheyic, luɔi ci Nhialic jam keke yen e tim cekic, yan, Yɛn ee Nhialic de Abraɣam, ku ya Nhialic de Yithak, ku ya Nhialic de Jakop?
Acie Nhialic de kɔc ci thou, ee Nhialic de kɔc piir: we ye kaŋ wooc aret.
Na wen, ke raan bɔ, raan toŋ de kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku te ci en keek piŋ ke ke lop rot, ku ŋic nɔn ci Bɛny keden ŋiec bɛɛr, ke jɔ thieec, yan, Ee cookou nu tueŋ e cok ke loŋ yiic kedhie?
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Cook nu tueŋ e cok yiic kedhie ki, yan, Pieŋki, wek Yithrael, Bɛnydit Nhialicda ee Bɛnyditt tok.
Ku yin bi Bɛnydit Nhialicdu aa nhiaar ne piɔndu ebɛn, ku ne weiku ebɛn, ku nɔmdu ebɛn, ku riɛldu ebɛn. Cook nu tueŋ ki.
Ku cook ee kek rou acit en, ale, yan, Yin bi raan rɛɛr ke yin aa nhiaar cit man nhiɛɛr yin rot. Cook daŋ war ekake aliu.
Go raan e loŋ gɔɔr lueel, yan, Ee yen, Bɛny e weet, yin e yic lueel, nɔn ee yen Nhialic tok ee nu, ku acin daŋ ee kek rou ee yen etok:

ku nhieer nhiɛɛre raan en e yepiɔu ebɛn, ku yenɔm ebɛn, ku weike ebɛn, ku riɛlde ebɛn, ku nhieer nhiɛɛr en raan rɛɛr ke ye acit man nhiɛɛr en rot, yen adit awar ka ci gam Nhialic, an, bi ke nyop, ayi ka ci lam ku nak keek kedhie.
Na wen, aci Yecu ye tiŋ nɔn ci en ŋiec bɛɛr, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Yin cii mec weke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic. Na wen, e kake cok, ke cin raan ci nyin riɛl, lop en e kaŋ.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, weet en kɔc luaŋdiit e Nhialic, lueel, yan, Eeŋo ye kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e lueel, yan, Kritho ee wen e Dabid?
Dabid guop aci lueel ne Weidit Ɣer, yan, Bɛnydit aci Bɛnydiendit yɔɔk, yan, Nyuc e baŋ cuenydi, Aɣet te ban kɔc dɛ wek ater Tɔ ye kɔm ee yin yicok dhɔɔr.
Dabid guop aye tɔ ye Bɛnydit, ku ye wende adi? Go kut diit e kɔc kede piŋ ke ke mit piɔth.
Go keek yɔɔk e weetdeyin, yan, Yak rot tiit e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, kɔc nhiaar cath ke ke ceŋ lupɔɔ bar, ku nhiaarki thiec e thuk yiic,
ku nhiaarki tepiɛth ee reer e luek ke Nhialic yiic, ayi tepiɛth ee reer e akool ke kecamdit:
kek ee kɔc e ɣoot ke dieer thum cam, agoki kerɛɛcden aa thiaan ne luɔi ee kek lɔŋ e lɔŋ baar; kɔcke abik ketuc gok yok.
Na wen, ke nyuc piny te nu ken ee kaŋ juaar thin, ku jɔ daai te cuɛte kut e kɔc weu e ken ee kaŋ juaar thinic: go kɔc juec kɔc ci bany goki weu juec cuat thin.
Na wen, ke tiiŋ tok bɔ tiiŋ thuom kuany nyin, bi ku cuɛt kathiiakaŋ thin kaarou, te mɛte keyiic, abik ciet miliim tok.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl, ku yook keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Tiiŋ thuoom kuany nyine aci kajuec cuat thin, awar kɔc kedhie kɔc e kaŋ cuat e ken ee kaŋ juaar thinic:
kek acik kaŋ cuat thin ne kuɛthden; ku yen etiiŋe, ne daŋ dɛk en e kaŋ aci kake cuat thin kedhie, ayi ka dueer en ke piir kedhie.
Na wen, a le biic luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ke leke raan toŋ de kɔckɛn e piooce yen, yan, Bɛny e weet, tiŋ kur lak oou ku tiŋ ɣoot lak oou!
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook, yan, Ci ɣoot ditke tiŋ? Acin kuur toŋ bi doŋ e kuur daŋ nɔm, ke cii bi dhuoor piny.
Na wen, a reer e kuur e Olip nɔm biak te lɔ luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ke thieec Petero ku Jakop ku Jɔn ku Anderaya teden kapac,
yan, Lɛke wook, e nɛn en bi kake jɔ tic? ku bi kɔc ŋic ne ŋo ekool kɔɔr ekake thok kedhie?
Go Yecu jam gɔl, yan, Yak rot tiit ke cin raan bi we math.
Kɔc juec abik bɛn ne rinki, bik ku luelki, yan, Ya ki? ku bik kɔc juec math.
Ku te ya wek tɔɔŋ piŋ ku piɛŋki jam e tɔŋ lueel e kɔc thook, ke we duoki ye diɛɛr: kek abik dhil tic, ku ŋoot thok de kaŋ wei.
Jure abi tɔŋ yien jure, ku yin paane tɔŋ paane: ku piny abi rot niɛŋ tɛɛn ku tɛɛn; cɔŋdit abi aa nu, ayi kak e kɔc tɔ diɛɛr: kake ayek ciet kɛc de tiiŋ kɔɔr dhieth.
Ku week, yak rot tiit: we bi aa lɛɛr e looŋ niim; ku leere week e luek ke Nhialic yiic, ku we bi aa dui; ku we bi bɛɛi e bany ceŋ piny niim ayi mahik niim ne biakdi, bak aa caatɔɔki e keniim.
Ku welpiɛth abike dhil kɔn guieer juoor ebɛn.
Ku te ye kek week thel, leerki week e loŋ nɔm, ke we duoki diɛɛr e ke bak lueel: ku jam ebɛn jam bi gam week e thaare yen abak lueel: acie wek jam, ee Weidit Ɣer kek jam.
Ku raan abi mɛnhkene yien kɔc lek nɔk, ku yine wun meth mɛnhde; ku mith abik rot jɔt kɔc e dhieth keek, ku tɔki ke nak.
Ku we bi aa maan e raan ebɛn ne baŋ de rinki: ku raan e yepiɔu ruut a thooke kaŋ, yen abi kony wei.

Te ca wek kenhiɛɛny e kaŋ riɔɔk tiŋ, kenhiɛɛny ci lueel e nebi Danyel, te ca wek e tiŋ ke kaac te cii en dueer kɔɔc, (raan kuen ne ye cok e piŋ en e,) ke kɔc nu Judaya e ke kɔt ke ke lɔ e kuurdit yiic:
ku raan nu e ɣot nɔm nhial e cii lɔ piny, le ɣot, le kaŋ bɛɛi bei ɣonde:
ayi raan nu domic e cii enɔm dɔk le lupɔde diec.
Ku amawoou e dieer liac ayi dieer thuat e akoolke!
Ku yak lɔŋ e baŋ e kat kat wek ke cii bi nu rut.
Akoolke abik aa kool ke ketuc e kɔc dhal, ketuc cin ke kit e yen, gɔl te ɣɔn ciɛke Nhialic kaŋ aɣet ci enɔɔne, ku acin ke cit en bi lɔɔk nu aɣet athɛɛr.
Ku tee Bɛnydit ken akoolke tɛm kɔɔth, adi cin kɔc bi luok: ku ne baŋ de kɔc ci lɔc, kɔc waan ci meek, en aci yen akoolke tɛm kɔɔth.
E akoolke, te de en raan yook week, yan, Tieŋki, Kritho ki ene; ku, yan, Ye ka etɛɛn; ke duoki gam:
Kritho aluɛth abik rot jɔt ayi nebii aluɛth, ku abik kagook dit nyuoth kɔc, ayi kagai dit, arek abik kɔc ci lɔc duɛɛr cɔk niim wei aya, te de yen te bi kek e leu.
Ku week, yak rot tiit: tieŋki, we ca kɔn lɛk kaŋ kedhie.
Ku ne akoolke yiic, te ci ketuc e kɔc dhal wan, ke akɔl abi cuɔl, ku pɛɛi acii bi bɛ ɣɛɛr,
ku kuɛl nu nhial abik loony piny, ku karil nu tenhial abik rot niɛŋ.
Na ele, ka bik Wen e raan tiŋ abɔ e luaat yiic acath keke riɛldit ku dhueeŋdit.
Na ele, ka bi tuuckɛnnhial tooc, lek kɔckɛn ci lɔc kut niim te bi yom ke put keyiic ŋuan, te gɔle guute piny thar thin aɣet te guute tenhial thar thin.
Jaki rot tɔ weete e kaaŋ de tim cɔl ŋaap: te ci keerde guɔ kɔc, ago yith nyok, ka ŋiɛcki nɔn ci ruel guɔ thiɔk;
en acit ŋiny ba wek e ŋic aya, te tieŋ wek kake ke ke tiec, ka ŋiɛcki nɔn ci en guɔ ɣeet ayi ɣoot thook.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Rem de enɔɔne acii bi nyai, te ŋoote kake ke ke ken tic kedhie.
Tenhial abi nyai ayi piny: ku welki aciki bi nyai.
Ku ne kede ekoole ayi thaare acin raan ŋic en, acakaa tuuc nu paannhial aciki ŋic, ayi Wende aya, ee Waada yetok, yen aŋic e.
Yak rot tiit, yak yin ku yak lɔŋ: luɔi kuoc wek akool nɔn bi yen aa nɛn.
Acit nɔn dhie kenye raan, ku nyieeŋ ɣonde piny, ku gɛm himke riɛl, ku gɛm raan ebɛn luɔide, ku yook raan tit kalthok, yan, Ye yin.
Yen aa wek yin: luɔi kuoc wek te bi bɛny de ɣot bɛn, nɔn ee yen theen, ku nɔn ee yen wɛɛric cil, ku nɔn ee yen te kiu ajith, ku nɔn ee yen te ci piny ru;
ke cii we bi yok anin, te dɛp en bɛn ethiau.
Ku ke lɛk week, yen a lɛk raan ebɛn, yan, Yak yin.
Na wen, aŋoot nin kaarou wei ke bi aa ahith de Winythok, ku bi aa akool ke kuin cinic luɔu; ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e ke kɔɔr luɔi bi kek e dɔm ecueer, lek nɔk:
ku jɔki lueel, yan, Acuku bi dɔm ekool e ahith, ke awuoou de kɔc cii bi lɔ pat.

Na wen, te nu Yecu Bethani ɣon e Thimon raan de guop wɛth, ku reer ten ee cam, ke tik bɔ ke muk gul ci cueec e kuur cɔl alabatha, gul deyin miok ci tuom cɔl narad, ɣoocde atuc aret: go gul bany thok ku luuŋ miok e yenɔm.
Ku ade kɔc etɛɛn kɔc ci piɔth diu aret, agoki lueel, an, Eeŋo thueec en emioke aya?
Mioke adi ci ɣaac e weu war riet kabɔt ku thierdhic, ku gɛme ke kɔc kuany nyiin. Goki tik gɔk aret.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Palki e tɔu; eeŋo juotki yen? aci luɔi piɛth looi e yaguop.
We de kɔc kuany nyiin e weyiic ecaŋɣɔn, ku te de yen koolduon yak tak, ka duɛɛrki keek aa luoi kepiɛth: ku yɛn cie raan bi tɔu wo week ecaŋɣɔn.
Ke dueer leu e luɔi aci looi: aci kɔn bɛn tueŋ bi guopdi bɛn tɔc ne kede tau bi a tɔɔu.
Ku wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te bi welpiɛthke aa guiir e piny nɔm ebɛn, ayi ke cii tiiŋe looi abi aa lueel aya, ne taŋ bi kɔc kede aa tak.
Na wen, ke Judath Yithkariɔt, raan toŋ de kɔc kathieer ku rou, ke jel le tede bany ke ka ke Nhialic, le Yecu nyiɛn keek.
Na wen, acik e piŋ, ke ke jɔ piɔth miɛt, ku luelki, an, bik gam weu. Go te bi en e nyiɛɛn kɔɔr ekool piɛth bii piny bɛɛi.
Na ɣɔn, ne kool tueŋ e akool ke knin cinic luɔu, kool ee kek nyɔŋamaal de Winythok nɔk, ke thieec kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Ee tenou kɔɔr te bi wo guik thin, te bi yin Winythok cam?
Go kɔc tooc kaarou e kɔckɛn e piooce yiic, ku yook keek, yan, Laki panydit, ku we bi rɔm e mony ɣɛɛc tony e piu: jaki kuany cok;
ku ɣon bi en lɔ thin, ke we bi raan de ɣot yɔɔk, yan, Aci Bɛny e weet lueel aleyɔɔ, yan, Ɣon e kamaan akou, te ban Winythok cam woke kɔckien e piooce?
Ku abi we nyuoth ɣon diit nu nhial ɣon nu kaŋ thin ku ci guik: jaki kakuɔ guik etɛɛn.
Go kɔcpiooce jal, lek panydit, lek ku yokki ke cit man wen ci e lɛk keek: agoki kede Winythok guik.
Na ɣɔn theen, ke bɔ keke kɔc kathieer ku rou.
Na wen, areerki ke ke cam, ke lueel Yecu, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Raan tok e weyiic abi a nyiɛɛn, raan ciem wok etok enɔɔne.
Agoki piɔth dhiau aret, ku jɔki thieec, ŋɛk e kɔn thiec, ku be ŋɛk thiec, yan, Ee yɛn?
Go bɛɛr, yook keek, Ee raan tok e thieer ku rou yiic, raan gem wok etok e athaanic.
Wen e raan alɔ eyin, acit man ci e gɔɔr ne kede; ku amawoou ne raane raan nyiin Wen e raan! adi piɛth tede eraane tee keneye dhieeth.
Na wen, aciemki, ke nom kuin ci pam, go thieei, ku wɛɛkic, ku jɔ gam keek, lueel, yan, Ŋaki, camki: guopdi ki, ekene.
Na wen, ke nom biny, ku te ci en thieithieei lueel, ke gɛm keek: agoki dek e ye kedhie.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Riɛmdi ki, ekene, riɛm de loŋ ci piac mac, riɛm ci leu ne biak de kɔc juec.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Yɛn cii bi bɛ dek ne mith ke enap, te ŋoot ekool wadaŋ kool ban bɛ dek e ke e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic.
Na wen, acik dit kut, ke ke jɔ lɔ biic lek kuur e Olip.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, We bi niim num wedhie ne baŋdi: luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Yɛn bi tin e thok dui, go thok thiei roor.
Ku na miak, te can rot bɛ jɔt, ke we ba wat Galili.
Go Petero lueel, yan, Na cak kɔc niim mum kedhie, ke yɛn cii nɔm bi mum.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ekoole, elewakɔu, te ŋoot ajith ke ken kiu raanrou, ke yin bi a jai etaiwei raandiak.
Go ŋak nɔm aretdiite, yan, Na ya cak dhil thou woke yin, ke yin ca dueer jai. Ku yen aye jamden aya kedhie.
Na wen, ke ke bɔ te cɔl Gethemane: go kɔckɛn e piooce yɔɔk, yan, Yɔkki e we rɛɛr ene, te laŋ ɛn.
Ku le keke Petero ku Jakop ku Jɔn, ku jɔ guɔ gai aret, abi duɛɛr thook.
Go lɛk keek, yan, Yɛn e piɔu jiɛth aret, aba duɛɛr thou: rɛɛrki ene, ke we yien.
Go rot cuɔt tueŋ emaath, le ku cuɛt rot piny, ku jɔ lɔŋ, yan, Na duɛɛre ye leu, ke yi tɔ thaar wan ɛn.
Go lueel, yan, Abba, Waar, yin ee kaŋ leu kedhie; nyaaiye binye tede yɛn: ku acie kede yɛnpiɔu, ee kede yinpiɔu.
Go bɛn, ku yok keek anin, go Petero thieec, yan, Thimon, nine? kɛne thaar tok leu e yin?
Yienki, ku laŋki, ke we cii bi lɔ e themic: wei ee lɔ thin eyin, ku guop yen akɔc.
Go bɛ jal, le lɔŋ, aluel wel mane gup.
Na wen, ke be enɔm puk, ku be ke yok anin, acik thiai; ku akucki beer bi kek e bɛɛr.
Go bɛ bɛn raandiak, bi ku yook keek, yan, Yɔkki e we nin tethiinakaŋ abak lɔŋ: e guɔ loi; thaar aci bɛn; tieŋki, Wen e raan anyiine, ku yine kɔc e kerac looi.
Jatki rot, loku: tieŋki, raan nyiin ɛn e guɔ ɣeet.

Na wen, etethiine, te ŋoot en ke jam, ke Judath bɔ, raan toŋ de kɔc kathieer ku rou, ku bɔ kut diit e kɔc ne yen etok, ke ke muk abatɛɛu ku thieec, ke ke bɔ tede banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku roordit.
Ku raan nyiin en aci keek kɔn wɛɛt, yan, Raan ba ciim, ka yen aye yen; jaki dɔm, jatki, ku dɔtki apiɛth.
Na wen aci bɛn, ke jɔ lɔ tede yen enɔnthiine, le ku lueel, yan, Rabi, Rabi; go ciim alal.
Goki dɔm e kecin, mukki aril.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ de kɔc wen kaac etɛɛn, ke miit abatau bei, ku kip lim de bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, arek abi ŋniɛth yic wei.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Cak bɛn bei acit man e ka yin raan tɔŋ raan e kaŋ rum, ke we muk abatɛɛu ku thieec, bak a bɛn dɔm;
Yɛn ee cool e reer wo week luaŋdiit e Nhialic ke ya weet, ku wek ken a dɔm: ku kacigɔɔr abik dhil aa yith tei.
Goki nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku kɔtki.
Ku ade dhuŋ toŋ biɔth ecok, aci lupɔ linon cuat e yekɔu aya, ku cin lupɔ daŋ ceŋ: na wen, ke dɔm dhuɔk;
go lupɔ linon nyaaŋ piny, ku kɔt e keek, ke cath e yekɔu.
Na wen, ke ke thel Yecu leerki te nu bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic: ku gueer banydit ke ka ke Nhialic kedhie te nu yen, ayi roordit ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr.
Go Petero biɔɔth cok temec, aɣeet en e kalic kal de bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic; go reer keke awuut ke bany, ke ɣɔc mɛɛc.
Na wen, ke banydiit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc nu e loŋic ebɛn ke ke kɔɔr jam de caatɔ jam de ater ke Yecu, bik tɔ nak; goki kɛn yok.
Caatɔɔ juec aake lueel kakɛn elueth, ku kakɛn luelki akenki rɔm.
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk e ke jɔt rot tɔki rot e caatɔɔ, ku jɔki cak thok, luelki, yan,
Acuk piŋ ke lueel, yan, Luaŋdiit e Nhialice luaŋ ci yik e kɔc cin aba jap piny, ku ba daŋ bɛ yik e akool kadiak, luaŋ cii bi yik e kɔc cin.
Ayi kaken aya akenki rɔm.
Na wen, ke bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke jɔt rot e kɔc yiic cii, ku thieec, yan, Cin ke bɛɛre? ee kaŋo ke lueel kɔcke ne kedu?
Go lɔ lik, acin ke ci bɛɛr. Go bɛnydiit tueŋ bɛ thieec, yan, Ye Kritho, Wen e Nhialic Cath ke Athiɛɛi?
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Ee yɛn: ku we bi Wen e raan tiŋ ke rɛɛr e baŋ cueny de riɛl dit, ku bi e luaat yiic luaat nu nhial.
Na wen, ke bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke ret lupɔɔke yiic, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Eeŋodaŋ koorku caatɔɔ kɔk?
We ci lɛt piŋ lɛt lɛt en Nhialic: E wek wakdiaa? Goki yiek yeth gaak, yan, roŋ ke thuɔɔu.
Ku jɔ kɔc kɔk ŋuoot guop ku kumki nyin, ku jɔki biɔɔk, ku yookki, yan, Lɛke wook ke bi tic: ku meeŋ awuut ke bany e kecin.
Na wen, te reere Petero biic e kalic, ke nyan tok bɔ nyan toŋ de dueet e bɛnydiit tueŋ luooi;
go Petero tiŋ ke ɣɔc, go toom guop, ku lueel, yan, Ayi yin aya, yin ee cath weke Yecu, raan e Nadhareth.
Go jai, yan, Yɛn kuc ke luel, ku kɛn piŋ aya. Ago lɔ biic le e katic: ku jɔ ajith kiu.
Na wen, aci nyane bɛ tiŋ, ke jɔ lɛk kɔc wen kaac etɛɛn, yan, Kene ee raan toŋden.
Ago bɛ jai. Na wen, etethiine, ke kɔc wen kaac etɛɛn ke beki lɛk Petero, yan, Ee yic, yin ee raan toŋden; luɔi ee yin raan e Galili, ku kit thok weke keek aya.
Ago lam rac cak, ku ciɛk lɛt, yan, Yɛn kuc raan luɛlki.

Na wen, etethiine, ke ajith kiu e kiudɛn ee yic rou. Go Petero wel tak wel wen cii Yecu lɛk en, yan, Te ŋoot ajith ke ken kiu raanrou, ke yin bi a jai etaiwei raandiak. Na wen, aci ye thɔɔŋ, ke dhiau.
Na ɣɔnmiak, aru piny, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ke ke cam loŋ ne roordit ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku kɔc nu e loŋic ebɛn, ku jɔki Yecu duut, leerki yinki Pilato.
Go Pilato thieec, yan, Ye malik de Judai? Go bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Ee yɛn.
Go gaany e kajuec e banydit ke ka ke Nhialic.
Go Pilato bɛ thieec, yan, Cin ke bɛɛre? Tiŋ kajuec gɔnye kek yin.
Go Yecu cien ke be bɛɛr: arek abi Pilato gai.
Ku ɣɔn ekool e ahith, Pilato aye raan toŋ ci mac luony keek, raandɛn nu e kepiɔth.
Ku ade raan cɔl Barabath, raan ci rek keke kɔc etok kɔc waan ci tɔŋ cak miric, ku acik kɔc nɔk e buuth ekool e tɔŋ.
Na wen, ke kut e kɔc cot, ku jɔki lɔŋ, an, bi luoi keek cit man ee yen e looi ecaŋɣɔn.
Go Pilato bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Dɛki piɔth luɔi ban week luony Malik de Judai?
Aŋic nɔn ee yen tiɛɛl yen e biiye yen e banydit ke ka ke Nhialic.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic goki kut e kɔc riir niim, yan, aŋuan luɔi bi en Barabath luony keek.
Go Pilato bɛɛr ku be keek thieec, yan, Eeŋo jaki kɔɔr ke ba luoi raan yak tɔ ye Malik de Judai?
Goki bɛ coot, yan, Piaate e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Go Pilato ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo, ee kerɛɛc ŋo ci looi? Goki coot aret, yan, Piaate e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Na wen, akɔɔr Pilato luɔi bi en kut e kɔc tɔ lɔ piɔth yum, ke jɔ Barabath luony keek, ku yin Yecu kɔc, te ci en e kɔn tɔ dui e waat, an, bi lɔ piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Na wen, ke thel alathkeer biic leerki ɣon diit laauwic cɔl Pretoriam; ku jɔki rem alathkeer kut nɔm ebɛn.
Na wen, acik yiek kɔu lupɔ thith amujuŋ, ke ke jɔ gol e kuɔɔth nai, tueelki e yenɔm;
ku jɔki thieec, yan, Thieithieei, Malik de Judai!
Ku yek yup nɔm e wai aruoor, ku ŋuutki guop, ku jɔki kemiɔl tuk, lamki.
Na wen, acik thok e gɛt geet kek en, ke ke luny lupɔ thith amujuŋ bei e yekɔu, ku beki yiek kɔu lupɔɔke. Goki thɛl biic lek piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku ade raan cɔl Thimon raan tek e kueere, ke bɔ rɛɛr, raan e Kurene, ku ye wun Alekandaro ku Rupo: agoki dɔm, ku dhilki tɔ jɔt timdɛn ci riiu nɔm, tim eYecu.
Goki bɛɛi te cɔl Golgotha, te puke yen e thoŋda, acɔl Tede Apet.
Ku miɔcki e mɔn cɔl wany ci liaap keke wɛɛl ŋir cɔl meer: go rɛɛc.
Na wen, ke pieetki e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, ku jɔki lupɔɔke tɛk rot, deenyki gɛk ne keden, nɔn bi ŋɛk ŋo noom.
Ku aci aa thaar kadiak, thaar e pieete ke yen thin.
Ku gɔny wen ci e gaany aci gɔɔr tɛɛuwe e yenɔm nhial, yan, MALIK DE JUDAI.
Ku jɔki kɔc piaat kaarou ne yen etok, kɔc e kaŋ rum, tok e baŋ cuenyde, ku tok e baŋ cam.
Go kecigɔɔr jɔ aa yin, ke ɣɔn ci lueel, yan, Aci mat keke kɔc e loŋ rɛɛc.
Go kɔc wen e teek agoki aa laat, ke ke lek keniim, luelki, yan, Aa! yin ee raan e luaŋdiit e Nhialic dhuoor piny, ku beye yik e nin kadiak.
Kony rot, ku ba piny e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku jɔ geet guop aya ne banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ayek lueel kapac, yan, Aci kɔc kɔk luok; ku acii rot dueer luok.
Ne Kritho, Malik de Yithrael, ne bɔ piny e tim kɔu enɔɔne, tim ci riiu nɔm, buk tiŋ, ku gamku. Go lat e kɔc wen ci piaat ne yen etok.
Na wen, aci thaar aa dhetem, ke jɔ piny guɔ cuɔl ecut e piny nɔm ebɛn aɣet thaar kadheŋuan.
Na wen, e thaar kadheŋuan, ke Yecu cot e rol dit, yan, Eloi, Eloi, lama thabakthani? te puke yen e thoŋda, yen aye, Nhialicdi, Nhialicdi, eeŋo e yin a nyaaŋ piny?
Go kɔc kɔk e kɔc yiic kɔc wen kaac etɛɛn, te ci kek e piŋ, goki lueel, yan, Tieŋki, acɔl Elija.
Go raan tok kat, le ku thieeŋ ke wen e piu jooc ne mɔn ci wac, ku tɛɛu e wai aruoor nɔm, gɛm en le dek, ku lueel, yan, Jaki pɔl; tiŋku nɔn bi Elija bɛn bi bɛn bɛɛi piny.
Na wen, aci Yecu coot e rol dit, ke jɔ thook.
Ku lupɔ diit nu e luaŋdiit e Nhialicyic aci yic rɛɛt erou gɔl nhial ɣeet piny.
Na wen, ke bɛny de rem e alathkeer, bɛny wen kaac e yenɔm tueŋ, te ci en e tiŋ ke cot aya, ago thook, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Ee yic, raane aci aa Wen e Nhialic.
Ku ade diaar etɛɛn aya dieer kaac temec ke ke daai: adeki yiic yi Mari Magdalene ku Mari man Jakop thii ku Jothe, ku Thalome;
aake ye kuany cok waan nu yen e Galili, ku yek luooi; ku nu dieer juec kɔk dieer waan ci bɛn Jeruthalem ne yen etok.
Na wen, aci akɔl thei, luɔi ee yen akool e Gniɛɛk, yen aye kool e kɔn bɛn e kool e thabath,
ke Jothep raan e Arimathaya bɔ, raan nu e loŋic, ku ye raan piɛth, raan e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ŋɔɔth aya; bi ku le te nu Pilato ke ci enyin riil, le guop de Yecu lip.
Go Pilato gai ne ke ci en dap thou: go bɛny de rem e alathkeer cɔɔl, ku lop nɔn ci en thou wen thɛɛr.
Na wen, aci e piŋ tede bɛny de rem e alathkeer, ke jɔ Jothep gam guop.
Go lupɔ linon ɣɔɔc, ku bii piny, ku deer guop e linon, ku jɔ taau e raŋic raŋ ci wec e kuuric; go kuur tok laar e raŋ thok.
Go Mari Magdalene ku Mari man Jothe goki te ci e taau thin tiŋ.
Na ɣɔn, aci thabath guɔ thok, ke Mari Magdalene, ku Mari man Jakop, ku Thalome, ke ke ɣɔc wɛl ci tumetum, bi kek e bɛn tɔc guop.
Ku na ɣɔnamiak a lɔ piny dudur, ekool tueŋ wen ee akool dherou, ke ke bɔ te nu raŋ, ke akɔl bɔ thok.
Ayek rot thieec kapac, yan, Eeŋa bi wo kony bi kuur laar wei e raŋ thok?
Na wen, ajɔtki kenyin, ke ke tiŋ kuur aci guɔ laar wei: ku ye gokdiit e kuur.
Na wen, acik lɔ e raŋic, ke ke jɔ dhuk tiŋ arɛɛr e biak cuec, ke ceŋ lupɔ ɣer; agoki gai aret.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Duoki gai: wek kɔɔr Yecu raan e Nadhareth, raan waan ci piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu: aci rot jɔt: aliu etene; wɔiki te waan tɛɛu kek en.
Jaki jal, lak lɛkki kɔckɛn e piooce ayi Petero, yan, Awat week ke lɔ Galili: abak tiŋ etɛɛn, acit man ci en e kɔn lɛk week.
Na wen, e ke dap lɔ kɔtki e raŋ nɔm: ke ke lɛthe gup ku cik piɔth pau: ku acin raan de ke cik lɛk en; acik riɔɔc.
Na wen, aci Yecu rot jɔt miak etɛɛn ekool tueŋ wen ee akool dherou, ke kɔn tuol tede Mari Magdalene, tiiŋ waan ci en jɔɔk rac kadherou cieec e yeguop.
Go jal, le lɛk kɔc waan cath e yen etok, te waan dhuoor kek e dhieeu.
Ku keek, te ci kek piir piir en piŋ, ku piŋki tiŋ wen ci en e tiŋ, ke jɔki rɛɛc gam.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke nyuth rot kɔc kaarou e keyiic ke ci eguop puk, te waan ciɛth kek, ke ke lɔ rɛɛr.
Goki jal lek lɛk kɔc wen ci doŋ: goki keden rɛɛc gam ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ka nyuth rot kɔc gup kɔc kathieer ku tok, te reer kek ten ee cam, ago keek jɔɔny e rɛɛc reec kek gam ku riɛl ril kek piɔth, luɔi reec kek kede kɔc gam kɔc wen tiŋ en aci rot jɔt.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Laki e piny nɔm ebɛn, bak welpiɛth aa lɔ guieer kɔc ci cak ebɛn.
Raan gam ku baptith abi kony wei; ku raan reec gam abi yiek yeth gaak.
Ku kagookke abik kɔc aa kuany cok kɔc ci gam: yan, Ne rinki abik jɔɔk rac aa cieec; abik aa guɛl e thook mɛɛn thook ci piac yok;
abik karac aa dɔm e kecin, ku na yek ke deyin awuɔɔk dek, ka cii keek bi nɔk; abik kecin aa thany e kɔc tok gup, agoki waar.
Na wen, aci Bɛnydit thok e jam ke keek, ke jɔt leere paannhial, ku jɔ nyuc e baŋ cueny de Nhialic.
Agoki lɔ, lek wel aa guiir e baaiyic ebɛn, ku ye Bɛnydit luui keke keek etok, ago jam tɔ ye yic ne kagook e lɔɔk tic e yecok. Amen.
Kɔc juec acik luɔi dɔm, luɔi de guieer e jam de ka ci gam aret e woyiic,
acit man ci kɔc e lɛk wook, kɔc waan tiŋ keek e kenyin ɣɔn ciɛke ke, ku yek kɔc e ka ke jam e Nhialic looi;
ku yɛn aya, yɛn de piɔu luɔi gaar ɛn yin wel, ne kueny wen e kaŋ kecok kuany, yin Theopilo adhuɛŋ dit, nɔn ŋiɛc ɛn kan egɔk kedhie te ɣɔn ciɛke keek;
aba ke gaar yin, ke ke ba ŋic nɔn ee kek yith kek ka ci yi wɛɛt e ke.
Ɣɔn nu Kerod, malik de Judaya, bɛny de ka ke Nhialic anu, bɛny cɔl Dhakaria, raan e dhien e Abija; tiiŋde ee nyan cɔl Elithabeth, nyan e kuɛɛreden Aaron.
Ku piɛthki piɔth e Nhialic nɔm keek kaarou, ayek looŋ ke Nhialic dot kedhie, ku dotki luɔide ebɛn ke cin gaak bi ke gɔk.
Ku acin ke meth, luɔi ci Elithabeth rol, ku acik dhiɔp kaarou.
Na wen, ke ye luɔide looi e Nhialic nɔm, luɔidɛn e bɛny de ka ke Nhialic ekool e luɔi de dhiende,
ke jɔ lɔ luaŋdiit e Bɛnydit le wɛɛl ci tumetum nyop, cit man e luɔi de bɛny de ka ke Nhialic, luɔi ci gam en ne deeny de gɛk.
Ku nu kut e kɔc biic ebɛn ke ke laŋ e thaar e nyum de wal.
Na wen, ke tunynhial tul tuny e Bɛnydit, ke kaac e biak cueny de yin wen e ye wal nyop.
Na wen, aci Dhakaria ye tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu pau, go riɔɔc dɔm.
Go tunynhial yɔɔk, yan, Du riɔc, Dhakaria, lɔŋdu aci piŋ: ku tiiŋdu Elithabeth abi yi dhieth mɛwa, ku aba cak, yan, Jɔn.
Ku abi yi tɔ mit piɔu aba coŋ; ku kɔc juec abik piɔth miɛt ta dhieethe ye.
Abi dit e Bɛnydit nyin, ku acii bi aa dek e wany ayi mɔu; ku abii Weidit Ɣer nyuooc piɔu ekool dhieetheye.
Ku abi mith juec ke Yithrael wɛl piɔth Bɛnydit Nhialicden.

Ku abi kɔn lɔ e yenɔm tueŋ, ke cath ke wei ke Elija ku riɛlde, le warken e mith wɛl piɔth mithken, ku puk kɔc piɔth kɔc reec gam, bik pɛlenɔm yok pɛlenɔm e kɔc piɛthpiɔth; ago kɔc tɔ guik rot kɔc ci ro coc ne kede Bɛnydit.
Go Dhakaria tunynhial thieec, yan, Ba kene jɔ ŋic adi? kɛn dhiɔp, ku ken tiiŋdi dhiɔp aya?
Go tunynhial bɛɛr, yook, yan, Yɛn Gabriɛl ki, yɛn ee kɔɔc e Nhialic nɔm; ku yɛn ci tooc ba bɛn jam wo yin, ku ba welpiɛthke bɛn lɛk yin.
Tiŋ, yin bi cien thok, yin cii jam bi leu, aɣet kool bi kake lɔɔk tic, luɔi ken yin welki gam, wel bi aa yith ekooldɛn ci lueel.
Ku kɔc atitki Dhakaria, ku gɛiki e luɔi ci en gaau e luaŋditic.
Na wen, aci bɛn biic, ke cii jam be leu ke keek: agoki ŋic nɔn ci en kegok tiŋ e luakic: aye keek nieu tei, ku gɛɛk ke cii jam.
Na wen, aci kool ke luɔide thok, ke jɔ jal le paanden.
Na wen, aci akoolke thok, ke Elithabeth tiiŋde ke liac, ku jɔ lɔ thiaan e pɛi kadhic, ku lueel, yan,
Luɔi de Bɛnydit ki, ke ci looi ekool lieec en ɛn, bi ayardi nyaai e kɔc yiic.
Na ɣɔn aci pɛi aa dhetem, ke tunynhial Gabriɛl ke tooc Nhialic tooc panydiit de Galili cɔl Nadhareth,
aci tuoc dhueny ken kɔn yok ke moc, nyan ci thiaak e mony cɔl Jothep, raan dhien e Dabid; ku rin ke enyane acɔl Mari.
Go tunynhial bɛn ɣot te nu yen, bi ku lueel, yan, Thieithieei, nyan ci athiɛɛi dit yok, Bɛnydit atɔu ke yin! Yin ci thieei e diaar yiic!
Na wen, aci e tiŋ, ke lɔ nɔm cɔt ne welke, ku ciet enɔm e thiec, yan, ee thiec cit ŋo?
Go tunynhial yɔɔk, yan, Du riɔc, Mari: yin e dhueeŋdepiɔu yok tede Nhialic.
Ku tiŋ, yin bi meth yok, ku yin bi mɛwa dhieeth, ku ba cak, an, YECU.
Abi dit aret, ku abi cɔl Wen e Nhialic Awarjaŋ: ku abii Bɛnydit Nhialic yien thoony de kuɛɛredɛn Dabid:
ku abi aa malik ceŋ dhien e Jakop aɣet athɛɛr; ku ciɛɛŋde abi cien thokde.
Go Mari tunynhial thieec, yan, Kene bi tic adi, ku cin mony ŋiɛc?
Go tunynhial bɛɛr, yook, yan, Weidit Ɣer abik yi lɔny, ku riɛl e Nhialic Awarjaŋ abi yi kuom piny: ago keɣeer ba dhieeth ago cɔl Wen e Nhialic.
Ku tiŋ, Elithabeth raandun, yen aci mɛwa yok aya, ke ye dhiɔp: ku pɛike abik aa dhetem e pɛɛiye, tiiŋ waan ee kɔc lueel, yan, ee rol.
Nhialic acin ke bi e dhal.
Go Mari lueel, an, Ya ki yɛn nyanlim e Bɛnydit; ne tiec tede yɛn cit man e welku. Go tunynhial jal e yelɔɔm.
Na wen, ke Mari jɔt rot e akoolke, ku dɛp lɔ paan juec e kuur dit, le panydiit toŋ de Juda;
ku jɔ lɔ ɣon e Dhakaria, le Elithabeth thieec.
Na wen, aci Elithabeth thiec de Mari piŋ, ke meth jɔt rot e yeyac; go Elithabeth thiaŋ ke Weidit Ɣer:
go coot e rol dit, yan, Yin ci thieei e diaar yiic, ku mɛnh nu e yiyace ee ke ci thieei!
Ku ca kene yok tenou, ke bii man Bɛnydiendit tede yɛn?
Ku tiŋ, enɔnthiin e piɛŋ ɛn thiecdu, ke meth jɔt rot e yayac ne piɔnmit.
Ku thieithieei nyan ci wel gam: abik dhil aa yith kek wel ci lɛk en e Bɛnydit.
Go Mari ket, yan, Piɔndi alec Bɛnydit nɔm,
Ku yɛn e piɔu guɔ miɛt woke Nhialic Konydi.
Luɔi ci en nyanlimde woi ne kuany ci en nyin kuany: Tieŋki, gɔl enɔɔne aɣet wadaŋ rem ebɛn abik a tɔ ye nyan ci thieei.
Raan ril e kaŋ leu aci a luoi kadit; Ku rinke ayek rin ɣeric egɔk.
Kok de yenpiɔu ee tɔu keke kɔc rieu en, Reme ku reme aɣet wadaŋ.
Aci keril looi e koŋde; Aci kɔc thiɔi kɔc e ro tɔ dit ne taŋ yek tak e kepiɔth.
Aci banydit cieec e thonykɛn ee kek reer, Ku jɔ kɔc kor jat nhial.
Aci kɔc nɛk cɔk tɔ kueth e kamit; Ku jɔ kɔc cuai tɔ jel ke ke ci nyɔŋ.
Aci Yithrael awunde kony, Ne taŋ ci en kok de yenpiɔu tak;
Acit man e jiɛɛm en keke kuarkuɔ, Yi Abraɣam keke kɔthke aɣet athɛɛr.
Go Mari reer keke yen e pɛi kadiak, ku be enɔm pɔk paanden.
Na wen, ke pɛi ke Elithabeth pɛi liɛɛc en ke ke ke jɔ thok; go mɛwa dhieeth.
Ku piŋ kɔc ke paanden ku kɔcken nɔn ci Nhialic piɔu kok ke yen aret; ku jɔki piɔth miɛt ne yen etok.
Na wen, e nin ee kek bɛt, ke ke jɔ bɛn bik meth bɛn cueel; goki, an, bik cak, an, Dhakaria, ne rin ke wun.
Go man jai, an, Acie yen; abi cɔl Jɔn.
Goki yɔɔk, yan, Acin raan tok dhiendun ci kɔn cak e rinke.
Goki wun nieu, yan, Kɔɔr nɔn bi e cɔl ŋa?
Na wen, ke cɔl pam e gaar ku jɔ gɔɔr, yan, Rinke acɔl Jɔn. Goki gai kedhie.
Go thoŋde ro liep enɔnthiine, ku dak liep rot, go jam, ku leec Nhialic.
Go kɔc rɛɛr ne keek go riɔɔc ke dɔm kedhie: go jam de kake kedhie jɔ thiei e piny de Judaya piny de kuurdit ebɛn.
Na wen, ke kɔc ci ke piŋ, ke ke mukki e kepiɔth, ku luelki, yan, Mɛnhe bi ciet ŋo wadaŋ? Ku jɔ cin e Bɛnydit aa tɔu ke yen.
Go Dhakaria wun go thiaŋ ke Weidit Ɣer, ku jɔ wel guiir, yan,
Thieithieei Bɛnydit, Nhialic de Yithrael; Aci kɔcke neem ku weer keek bei,
Ku aci tuŋ de kunydewei jat nhial ne keda, Tuŋ de dhien e Dabid awunde;
(Acit man ci en e lueel e thok ke nebiikɛn ɣerpiɔth te ɣɔn ciɛke piny),
Bi wo kony ne kɔc de ater ne wook, ku luɛk wo bei e kɔc cin kɔc man wook;
Bi kok ee yen piɔu kok ke kuarkuɔ thol, Ku be yenɔm tak ne loŋ waan ci mac loŋ ɣeric;
Guutguut ci lueel keke kuɛɛredan Abraɣam, yan,
Bi wo luak bei e kɔc cin kɔc de ater ne wook. Agoku ka ke yen aa looi ke cin riɔɔc,
Ke wo tɔu ke wo ɣerpiɔth ku piɛthku piɔth e yenɔm ananda.
Ku yin, wendi, yin bi cɔl nebi de Nhialic Awarjaŋ: Yin bi kɔn lɔ e Bɛnydit nɔm tueŋ, ba kuɛɛrke lɔ looi;
Ba kɔcke tɔ ŋic kunydɛn e wei Ne nyiɛɛi bi karɛcken nyaai,
Ne kok kooke Nhialic piɔu ke wook, Yen a neeme Runepiny wook, Runepiny bɔ nhial,
Bi aa many e kɔc riaau kɔc rɛɛr tecol ku reerki atieptiep e thuɔɔuwic; Ago wocok dak kueer e matic.
Ago meth dit, ku jɔ piɔu riɛl, ku le ceŋ e jɔɔric aɣet kool bi en ro nyuoth Yithrael.
Na ɣɔn e akoolke, ke liem e Kaithar Augoutho lɔ, yan, bi rin ke kɔc gɔɔr kedhie e piny nɔm ebɛn.
Ku gaare ee gaar tueŋ ɣɔn nu Kurenio mudhiir e Thuria.
Go kɔc lɔ gɔɔr kedhie, raan ebɛn, lɔ ŋɛk paanden, ku lɔ ŋɛk paanden.
Ku jel Jothep aya piny de Galili, panydiit cɔl Nadhareth, le Judaya, panydiit e Dabid, cɔl Bethlekem; luɔi ee yen raan dhien e Dabid;
le rinke tɔ gaar keke Mari nyan bi thiaak, ke ci dak.
Na wen, te nu kek etɛɛn, ke pɛi e ke jɔ thok, pɛi bi en e ke dhieth.
Go kaai e wendɛn tueŋ, ku jɔ duut e lupɔ, ku tɛɛc e ken ee mul rem thin; acin te bi kek reer ɣon e kamaan.
Ke ade kɔc e thok tit e paane amɛcki roor, ku titki lunydɛn e thok wakɔu.
Na wen, ke tunynhial de Bɛnydit tul e kelɔm, ku jɔ dhueeŋ de Bɛnydit piny riaau e kekec: agoki riɔɔc aret.
Go tunynhial ke yɔɔk, yan, Duoki riɔc; piɛŋki, wek guieer wel piɛth wel ke piɔnmit, wel bi aa ka ke kɔc kedhie.
Konyduon e wei aci dhieeth ekoole paan e Dabid, yen aye Kritho Bɛnydit.
Ku kene ee ŋiny ba wek e ŋic; We bi mɛnhthiine yok aci deer e lupɔ, ku ci taac e ken ee mul rem thin.
Na wen, ke remdiit e paannhial ke jɔ tuol ethiau ne tunynhial etok, ke ke piɔny Nhialic, ku luelki, yan,
E dhueeŋ tɔu keke Nhialic tenhial ya, Ku tɔu reer piɛth e piny nɔm, Ku miɛtepiɔu e kɔc yiic.
Na wen, aci tuucnhial jal e kelɔm lek paannhial, ke kɔc tit thok ke ke yook rot, yan, Loku Bethlekem enɔɔne, lok ke ci tuole tiŋ, ke ci Bɛnydit nyuoth wook.
Goki dap lɔ, ku yokki Mari ku Jothep, ku mɛnhihiine ke ci taac e ken ee mul rem thin.
Na wen, acik e tiŋ, ke ke jɔ wel guieer kɔc wel ci lɛk keek ne kede mɛnhihiine.
Go kɔc ci kake piŋ gai kedhie ne ka ci kɔc tit thok guieer keek.
Ku jɔ Mari welke dot kedhie, aye ke tak e yepiɔu.
Na wen, ke kɔc tit thok ke ke jɔ keniim dhuny, ku jɔki Nhialic piɔɔny ku lecki, ne ka cik piŋ ku tiŋki ke, acit man waan ci e lɛk keek.
Na wen, aci nin kabɛt thok, ke kool e cuɛl e meth bɔ, ku jɔki cak, yan, YECU, rin cii tunynhial cak waan ŋoot en ke kene man yok.
Na wen, aci nin thok nin bi man ke guop piath, acit man ci loŋ e Mothe e lueel, ke jɔki bɛɛi Jeruthalem, bik bɛn yien Bɛnydit;
(acit man ci e gɔɔr e loŋ e Bɛnyditic, yan, Mɛwa ebɛn, ke ee mɛnh kɛɛi, abi tɔ ye keɣer tede Bɛnydit),
ku bik Nhialic yien ke bi lam ku nak, acit man ci e lueel e loŋ de Bɛnyditic, yan, Guk kaarou, ku nɔn ee kek ajiel ke guk kaarou.
Ku ade raan nu Jeruthalem, cɔl Thimeon; raane apiɛthpiɔu, ee Nhialic rieu, ku ye muŋ bi Yithrael muk piɔu tiit; ku tɔu Weidit Ɣer ne yen.
Aci Weidit Ɣer kɔn lɛk en, yan, Yin cii bi thou, te ŋoot yin ke yi ken Kritho de Bɛnydit kɔn tiŋ.
Go bɛn luaŋditt e Nhialic ne jam de Weidit: na wen, ke mɛnthhiine Yecu ke biiye man ku wun, bik meth bɛn looi ne kede ciɛɛŋ de loŋ;
ku jɔ dɔm e yecin, ku leec Nhialic lueel, yan,
Bɛnydit, tɔ limdu jel ke ci piɔu lɔ piny enɔɔne, Cit man e jamduon waan ci lueel;
Kunyduon e wei aca tiŋ e yanyin,
Kunyduon ci looi e kɔc niim kedhie;
Abi aa many bi Juoor aa nyuooth, Ku bi aa dhueeŋ de jurduon Yithrael.
Go yi Jothep keke man agoki gai ne wel ci lueel ne kede.
Go Thimeon ke thieei, ku jɔ Mari man yɔɔk, yan, Tiŋ, mɛnhe aci bɛɛi bi kɔc juec nu Yithiael tɔ wieek ku be ke tɔ jɔt rot; ku abi aa gok bi koc tiŋ agoki tɔŋ lueel ne yen;
yeka, ayik yin, yin bii abatau guut piɔu; ke ka ye kɔc juec tak e kepiɔth ke ke bi lɔɔk tic.
Ku ade tiiŋ nu cɔl Ana, ku ye nebi, nyan e Panuɛl, raan dhien e Acer: aci dhiɔp aret, aci kɔn reer keke monyde run kadherou te waan ee yen dhuec,
ke aci tɔu ke ye tiiŋ thuoom runke acitki thierbɛt ku ŋuan, ku cii luaŋditt e Nhialic e pɔl, ee ka ke Nhialic looi wɛɛrwakɔu ku akol, ne reec ee yen cam rɛɛc ku ne pal ee yen pal.
Na wen, ke ɣet etɛɛn e thaar mane guop, ke jɔ Nhialic leec, ku jiɛɛm ke kɔc kedhie kɔc ŋath weer bi Jeruthalem wɛɛr bei, jiɛɛm ne kede meth.
Na wen, acik kaŋ thol e luɔi kedhie, ne kede loŋ de Bɛnydit, ke ke jɔ keniim dhuony Galili, lek panydɛnditt cɔl Nadhareth.
Go meth dit, abi piɔu riɛl, go nɔm pɛl aret: ku cath dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu keke yen.
Ku yi wun ku man aake ye lɔ Jeruthalem run ebɛn lek aliith cɔl Winythok looi.
Na wen, aci runke thieer ku rou, ke ke jɔ lɔ Jeruthalem cit man ee kek cool e lɔ tede aliith;
na wen, acik nin ke aliith thol, ke ke jɔ keniim dhuny, ku doŋ Yecu mɛnhden Jeruthalem; ku kuc yi Jothep keke man;
ayek lueel, an, ciɛth ke kɔc kɔk, agoki cath a le akɔl piny, ku jɔki kɔɔr e kɔcken yiic ku mathken yiic;
na wen, acik e yok aliu, ke ke jɔ keniim bɛ dhuony Jeruthalem, lek kɔɔr.
Na wen, aci nin aa diak, ke jɔki yok luaŋdht e Nhialic, ke rɛɛr e kɔc yiic cil kɔc e kɔc wɛɛt, ke piŋ keden, ku thiec keek kaŋ aya;
ago kɔc wen piŋ kede agoki gai kedhie ne ŋiny ŋic en kaŋ ku ne beer ee yen kaŋ bɛɛr.
Na wen, acik e tiŋ, ke ke jɔ gai aret: ku jɔ man yɔɔk, yan, Wendi, eeŋo e luoiye wook wuya? tiŋ, wuur ku yɛn yin cuk kɔɔr ke wo dhiau.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ee kaŋo e kaar wek ɛn? kuocki nɔn ba yɛn dhil tɔu e ka ke Waar yiic?
Goki jam ci lɛk keek cuo yokic.
Ku jɔ lɔ ke keek, bik Nadhareth; go keden aa piŋ; ku dot man welke kedhie e yepiɔu.
Go Yecu dit ku jɔ ro ŋuak e pɛlenɔm, ku ne miɛt ee Nhialic piɔu miɛt ne yen ayi kɔc.

Na ɣɔn, e ruun e ciɛɛŋ de Tiberio Kaithar, ruun ee kek thieer ku dhic, ruun nu Pontio Pilato mudhiir e Judaya, ku ye Kerod teterarki de Galili, ku ye Pilip manhe tererarki de Yituraya, ku piny de Tarakoniti, ku ye Luthanio teterarki de Abilini,
ku ye yi Anath keke Kaiapath banydit tueŋ ke ka ke Nhialic, ke jɔ jam e Nhialic bɛn tede Jɔn wen e Dhakaria e jɔɔric.
Ku jɔ cath e piny nu e Jordan yɔu ebɛn, ee kɔc guieer baptinh e puŋdepiɔu ne nyiɛɛi bi karac nyaai;
acit man ci e gɔɔr e awarekic awarek de wel ke nebi Yithaya, yan, Rol e raan cot e jɔɔric, yan, Luɔiki caar e Bɛnydit, Taki kuɛɛrke lɔ cit.
Tethuth ebɛn abi juok, Ku kuurdit ebɛn ayi kuurthii abike rai piny; Ɣaanŋɔl abike ric, Ku kuɛɛr lɔ ŋɔnyŋɔny abike looi abik lipelip;
Ku jɔ jaŋ ebɛn kuny de Nhialic tiŋ.
Na wen, aci kut dit e kɔc bɛn, bike bɛn baptith ne yen, ke jɔ keek yɔɔk, yan, Wek mith ke karac, eeŋa e yook week, an, bak kat agonh bi bɛn?
Jaki luɔk e luɔi piɛth luɔi bi roŋ ke puŋdepiɔu, ku duoki jam gɔl e wepiɔth, yan, Wo de waarda Abraɣam; wek yɔɔk, an, Nhialic adueer mith ke Abraɣam cak ne kɔike.
Ku enɔɔne, yep e guɔ taau te nu mei ke tiim: tim ebɛn tim reec luɔk e mith piɛth e jɔ yiɛp piny, ku cuɛte mɛɛc.
Go kɔc thieec yan, Eeŋo buk jɔ looi?
Go bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Raan de aluluut kaarou, ke gɛm tok raan cin ahilut; ayi raan de kecam, ke looi aya.
Go kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut bɛn bike bɛn baptith, ku thiecki, yan, Bɛny e weet, eeŋo buk looi?
Go keek yook, yan, Duoki kaŋ e kɔɔr tede kɔc ke war ke ci lɛk week.
Go alathkeer thieec, yan, Na wook, eeŋo buk looi? Go ke yɔɔk, yan, E cin raan ruom wek kede, ku e cin raan cakki thok; ku yak piɔth miɛt ne ariopdun.
Na ɣɔn, ke kɔc kedhie e ke jɔ ŋɔth, ku jɔki kepiɔth cat ne Jɔn, nɔn ee yen Kritho, ku nɔn cii en e yen;
go Jɔn bɛɛr, yook keek kedhie, yan, Ya ki, wek aa baptith e piu; ku ade raan bɔ raan ril e yɛn, raan ca yɛn roŋ ne luɔi ban thion e wɛɛrke dɔk; yen abi week baptith ne Weidit Ɣer ku ne mac.
Amuk ken ee yen rap kɔl e yecin, ku abi yiɛɛude nap abi iipelip, ago rɛɛpke kuot e adhaandeyic; ku nyop ayiɛl e many cie leu ne nak.
Ago kɔc lɛk wel juec kɔk ne guieer ee yen keek guieer.
Na wen, ke Kerod tetararki, te ci e jɔɔny e yen ne kede Kerodiath tiiŋ de Pilip manhe, ku ne karɛc ebɛn ka cii Kerod looi,
ke jɔ kaŋ kedhie ŋuak ne kerɛɛce, many ci en Jɔn mac e aloocic.
Na wen, aci kɔc thok e baptith kedhie, ke Yecu jɔ baptith aya, ku jɔ lɔŋ, go tenhial eyin liep,
go Weidit Ɣer loony e yeguop, cit guop guuk, ku bɔ rol paannhial, rol lueel en, an, Yin ee Wendien nhiaar; yɛn mit piɔu woke yin aret.
Ɣɔn gɔle Yecu weet, ke runke acik ciet nɔn ee thierdiak, ku ye wen e Jothep (cit man ee kɔc e lueel), Jothep de Eli,
Eli de Mathat, Mathat de Lebi, Lebi de Melki, Melki de Janai, Janai ne Jothep,
Jothep de Matathiath, Matathiath de Amoth, Amoth de Nakum, Makum de Ethli, Ethli de Nagai,
Nagai de Maath, Maath de Matathiath, Matathiath de Themein, Themein de Jothek, Jothek de Joda,
Joda de Joanan, Joanan de Retha, Retha de Dherubabel, Dherubabel de Calathiel, Calathiel de Neri,
Neri de Melki, Melki de Adi, Adi de Cotham, Cotham de Elmadam, Elmadam de Er,
Er de Yecu, Yecu de Eliedher, Eliedher de Jorim, Jorim de Mathat, Mathat de Lebi,
Lebi de Thimeon, Thimeon de Judath, Judath de Jothep, Jothep de Jonam, Jonam de Eliakim,
Eliakim de Melca, Melca de Mena, Mena de Matath, Matath de Nathan, Nathan de Dabid,
Dabid de Jethe, Jethe de Obed, Obed de Boadh, Boadh de Thalmon, Thalmon de Nacon,
Nacon de Aniinadap, Aminadap de Aram, Aram de Kedhion, Kedhion de Peredh, Peredh de Juda,
Juda de Jakop, Jakop de Yithak, Yithak de Abraɣam, Abraɣam de Tera, Tera de Nakor,
Nakor de Theruk, Theruk de Reu, Reu de Pelek, Pelek de Eber, Eber de Cela,
Cela de Cainan, Cainan de Arpakad, Arpakad de Cem, Cem de Noa, Noa de Lamek,
Lamek de Mathuthela, Mathuthela de Enok, Enok de Jared, Jared de Makalaleel, Makalaleel de Cainan,
Cainan de Enoth, Enoth de Theth, Theth de Adam, Adam de Nhialic.
Na wen, ke Yecu dɔk enɔm e Jordan, ke ci thiaŋ ke Weidit Ɣer, ku jɔ Weidit thɛl e jɔɔric,
ku jɔ tɔu e nin kathierŋuan, ke ye them e jɔŋdiit rac. Ku acin ke ci cam e akoolke: na wen, aci ninke thok, ke jɔ cɔk nɔk.
Go jɔŋdiit rac yɔɔk, yan, Na ye Wen e Nhialic, yɔɔke kuure abi rot tɔ ye kuin.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Aci gɔɔr, yan, Raan acii bi piir ne kuin etok, ee wel ke Nhialic ebɛn, yen abi en ke piir.
Na wen, ke leere jɔŋdiit rac e kuurdiit baar nɔm, ku jɔ dap nyuoth bɛi ebɛn raantok, bɛi ceŋ bany ke piny nɔm ebɛn.
Go jɔŋdiit rac yɔɔk, yan, Yin ba miɔɔc ne bɛɛny de bɛike kedhie, ayi dhueeŋden: aci guɔ yien ɛn, ku aba gam raan ca tak.
Ku yin, na lam ɛn, kaŋ kedhie abik aa kaku.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Waane e yakɔu cieen, Catan: aci gɔɔr, yan, Yin bi Bɛnydit Nhialicdu aa lam, ku yen etok yen aba ya luooi.
Na wen, ke bii Jeruthalem, ku jɔ taau e luaŋditt e Nhialic nɔm, e kerek nɔm, go yɔɔk, yan, Na ye Wen e Nhialic, cuate ro piny etene:
aci gɔɔr, yan, Abi tuuckɛnnhial yien thok ne kedu, bik yin aa tiit:
ku, yan, Abik yi geeny e kecin, Ke yi cii yicok bi yuop e kuur kɔu.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Aci lueel, yan, Yin cii Bɛnydit Nhialicdu bi them.
Na wen, aci jɔŋdiit rac them thol ebɛn, ke jɔ jal e yelɔɔm, atit akooldɛn bi ro yok.
Go Yecu enɔm dhuony Galili ne riɛl e Weidit: go rinke thiei e pinye nɔm ebɛn.
Go lɔ weet e ɣootkɛn e Nhialic yiic, ke lec e kɔc kedhie.
Ku jɔ bɛn Nadhareth, paan e diit en thin: na wen, ke jɔ lɔ ɣon e Nhialic ekool e thabath, cit man e luɔi ee cool e looi en en, ku jɔ rot jɔt bi awarek bɛn kueenic.
Go yien awarek de nebi Yithaya. Na wen, aci awarek liepic, ke yok te ci gɔɔr, yan,

Weidit ke Bɛnydit acik nyuc e yaguop, En aa tɔc en aguop, ba kɔc kuany nyiin aa guieer welpiɛth. Aci a tooc ba kɔc ci piɔth jiɛth bɛn duut piɔth, Ku ba kɔc ci mac bɛn guieer luny bi ke lony, Ku guieer coor yin bi kek bɛ yin, Ku luɔny kɔc ci miɛn e ciɛɛŋ rac,
Ku guieer kɔc ruun piɛth e Bɛnydit.
Na wen, ke jɔ awarek matic, ku yin raan e kaŋ looi, ku jɔ nyuc; go kɔc e nu ɣon e Nhialic kedhie agoki ye toom guop e kenyin.
Go jam gɔl ke keek, yan, Ekoole kecigɔɔre aci tɔ ye yic e weyith.
Go kɔc piath de yenthok gam kedhie, ku jɔki gai ne wel deyiic dhueeŋ wel e bɔ bei e yethok, goki rot thieec, yan, Cie wen e Jothep ekene?
Go lɛk keek, yan, We bi a dhil lɛk ekaaŋe, yan, Akim, tɔ rot dem: kerieec cuk piŋ, an, cike looi e Kapernaum, jɔ ke looi paandun etene.
Go lueel, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyin, yan, Acin nebi ci gam e paanden guop.
Ku wek lɛk yic, yan, Dieer juec cin niim roor aake nu paan e Yithrael ɣɔn nu Elija, ɣɔn ci tenhial thiook e run kadiak ku pɛi kadhetem, ku nu cɔŋ dit e piny nɔm ebɛn;
ku akene Elija tuoc tiiŋ tok e keyiic, ee Dharepath etok, paan e Thidon, yen aa tuuce yen thin, tuc thŋ cin nɔm moc eteen.
Ku nu kɔc juec de gup wɛth paan e Yithrael ɣɔn nu nebi Elica; ku acin raan tok e keek ci tɔ waar, ee Naaman etok, raan e Thuria.
Na wen, acik kake piŋ, kek kɔc nu ɣon e Nhialic kedhie, ke ke jɔ gɔth aret,
ku jɔki rot jɔt, ku cieecki wei panydit, ku thelki e kuurdit nɔm kuur ci panydɛndit yik e yenɔm, an, bik dɛɛny piny.
Go jɔ teek e keyiic cil, ku jɔ jal.
Go bɛn Kapernaum, panydiit e Galili, ku jɔ keek aa wɛɛt e akool e thabat.
Goki gai ne weetde: nɔn ciɛthe welke ne riɛl.
Ku ade mony nu ɣon e Nhialic, mony cii jɔŋ rac dɔm, go coot e rol dit, yan,
Cai! eeŋoda ne yin, yin Yecu de Nadhareth? E yi bɔ ba wo bɛn nɔk? yin ŋiɛc nɔn ee yin Raan Ɣeer e Nhialic.
Go Yecu jɔɔny, yan, Mim, ku ba bɛi e yeguop. Na wen, ke jɔŋ rac jɔ raan wit e kɔc yiic cii, ku jɔ bɛn bei e yeguop, ku ken yiek tetok.
Goki gai kedhie, ku jɔki jam kapac, yan, Ee wel ŋo ekake? ee jɔɔk rac yɔɔk ne riɛl dit, agoki bɛn bei.
Go rinke tic e baaiyic ebɛn e pinye nɔm.
Na wen, ke jɔt rot, ku jel ɣon e Nhialic, le ɣon e Thimon. Ku dhiɔm e Thimon aa tok aret aye juai dɛɛp guop; ku jɔki Yecu lɔŋ ne kede.
Na wen, ke jɔ kɔɔc e yenɔm, ku jɔ juai jɔɔny; go juai pal piny; go rot jɔt enɔnthiine, ku jɔ ke guiek.
Na wen alɔ akɔl piny, ke kɔc de kɔckɛn tok e juan kithic ke ke jɔki bɛɛi te nu yen; go ecin thany e raan guop ebɛn, ku jɔ ke tɔ dem.
Ku bɔ jɔɔk rac bei e kɔc juec gup, ke ke cot, yan, Yin ee Kritho Wen e Nhialic. Go ke jɔɔny, ku cii ke pɛl jam: ne ŋiny ŋic kek en nɔn ee yen Kritho.
Na wen, aci piny ru, ke jɔ jal, le jɔɔric: go kɔc lɔ kɔɔr, aɣeet kek te nu yen, yan, bik peen, ke cii bi jal e kelɔm.
Go keek yɔɔk, Yɛn bi pɛɛnydit kɔk dhil guieer welpiɛth ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic: en aa tuuce yɛn.
Go wel aa guiir e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic piny de Galili.
Na wen, ke nyiice kut e kɔc wen bɔ bik jam e Nhialic bɛn piŋ, ke kaac e wɛɛr thok wɛɛr cɔl Genedharet;
ku jɔ abeel tiŋ kaarou, akɛɛcki e wɛɛr thok; ku kɔc e dep e rec acik bɛn bei e keyiic, ku wakki bɔɔiken.
Go lɔ e abel tokic, abel e Thimon, ku jɔ lɔŋ, an, bi abel cuɔt e wɛɛric amaath. Ku jɔ nyuc piny, ku weet kut e kɔc ke rɛɛr e abelic.
Na wen, aci jam thok, ke jɔ Thimon yɔɔk, yan, Gɛɛre abel e kolic, ku jaki bɔɔikun luai piny wiir, ba wek rec dɔm.
Go Thimon bɛɛr, yan, Bɛny, wok e ruu ke wo nak rot piny e luɔi wenakɔu, ku acin ke cuk dɔm: apiɛth tei, aba luai piny ne loŋdu.
Na wen, acik kene looi, ke ke jɔ rec juec kɔɔl e bɔiyic arek abi bɔiden tuɛny.
Goki kɔc nu e abel daŋic nieu, kɔc e kaŋ rɔɔm ne keek, an, bik bɛn, bik ke bɛn kony. Goki bɛn, ku jɔki abeel thiɔɔŋ kaarou, arek abik duɛɛr diir.
Na wen, aci Thimon Petero ye tiŋ, ke cuɛt rot piny e Yecu cok, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, jel e yalɔɔm; yɛn ee raan e kerac looi.
Aci piɔu pau ne juec de rec cik dɔm, ayi kɔc cath ne yen kedhie;
ayi Jakop ku Jɔn, wɛɛt ke Dhebedhayo, kɔc room kaŋ ne Thimon, acik piɔth pau aya. Go Yecu Thimon yɔɔk, yan, Du riɔc; yin bi kɔc aa dɔm, gɔl ekoole aɣet rial.
Na wen, acik abeelken thɛl biic, ke ke jɔ kaŋ nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku jɔki kuany cok.
Na ɣɔn, te nu yen panydit tok, di, ke raan cii wɛth dɔm aret bɔ; na wen, aci Yecu tiŋ, ke cuɛt rot piny e yenɔm, ku jɔ lɔŋ, yan, Bɛnydit, te de yin piɔu luɔi bi yin a tɔ waar, yin dueer a tɔ waar.
Go yecin riɛny tueŋ, ku jiɛk, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Anu e yapiɔu: jɔ waar. Na tethiine, ke wɛth dap jal e yeguop.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Mathdien, e cin raan lɛke yen: lɔ tei, nyuothe rot bɛny de ka ke Nhialic, ku yiene kedaŋ ne waar ci yin guop waar, cit man ci Mothe e lueel, abi aa caatɔ e kɔc niim.
Go rinke lɔ ke ke thiei e piny nɔm aret: ku gueer kut dit ke kɔc bik bɛn piŋ, ku bike tɔ dem e ka nu e kegup.
Go ya cool e wony rot le jɔɔric, le lɔŋ.

Na wen, ekool tok e ninke yiic, ke weet kɔc, ku ade Parithai ku bany e kɔc wɛɛt e loŋ areerki etɛɛn, kɔc e bɔ bei e bɛi ke Galili kedhie, ku Judaya,ku Jeruthalem: ku ciɛth riɛl e Bɛnydit keke yen, bi en kɔc tɔ dem.
Na wen, ke kɔc e ke bɔ kɔc ɣɛɛc raan ci duany e laŋarep nɔm: ku jɔki te bi kek e bɛɛi ɣot kɔɔr, bik bɛn taau piny e yenɔm.
Na wen, acin te cik yok, te bi kek e bɛɛi ɣot, ne biak de kut e kɔc, ke ke jɔ lɔ nhial e ɣot nɔm, agoki ɣot ŋaany nɔm e biak, ku jɔki raan luai piny keke laŋarepde e kɔc yiic cil e Yecu nɔm.
Go gamden tiŋ, ku jɔ yɔɔk, yan, Mɛnhe, karɛcku acike pal yin.
Go kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai goki teer gɔl, ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋa eraane raan lat Nhialic? Eeŋa dueer karac pɔl, cie Nhialic etok?
Na wen, aŋic Yecu teer teer kek, ke jɔ bɛɛr, yan, Eeŋo tɛɛrki e wepiɔth?
Ee kenou piɔl e keek, te luɛɛl ɛn en, yan, Karɛcku acike pal yin; ku te luɛɛl ɛn en, yan, Jɔt rot, cathe?
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ba wek e ŋic, nɔn ciɛthe Wen e raan ke riɛl bi en karac pɔl e piny nɔm, (ke jɔ raan ci duany yɔɔk, yan,) yin yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot, jɔt laŋarepdu, ku lɔ paandu.
Go rot jɔt enɔnthiine e keniim, ku jɔt ke wen niin en e yenɔm, ku jɔ lɔ paande, ke lec Nhialic.
Goki gai kedhie, ku jɔki Nhialic leec, ku ci riɔɔc ke dɔm, agoki lueel, yan, Wo ci kagai tiŋ ekoole.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke jɔ lɔ biic, ku tiŋ raan e atholbo tɔ kut, raan cɔl Lebi, ke rɛɛr e maktap de atholbo: go yɔɔk, yan, Kuany acok.
Go kaŋ nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku jɔt rot, kuɛny cok.
Go Lebi luoi kecamdit ɣonde guop: ku ade kut ditt e kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ayi kɔc kɔk kɔc wen rɛɛr ne yen etok.
Na wen, ke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai ke ke jɔ dok e keyac ne kɔckɛn e piooce, ku thiecki, yan, Eeŋo cam wek ku dɛkki weke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut ayi kɔc e kerac looi?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Kɔc piɔl gup aciki akiim e kɔɔr; ee kɔc tok tei.
Yɛn e cii bɔ ba kɔc piɛthpiɔth bɛn cɔɔl, bik kepiɔth puk, ee kɔc e kerac looi kek aa ba bɛn cɔɔl.
Agoki bɛ thieec, yan, Eeŋo ye kɔc e piooce Jɔn cool e reec cam, ku yek cool e pal, ayi kɔc e piooce Parithai aya; ku kɔckuon e piooce ayek cam ku dekki?
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Duɛɛrki mathken e mony thiek tɔ reec cam, te ŋoote mony thiek ke rɛɛr ke keek?
Akool abik bɛn tei, kool bi mony thiek jɔt e keyiic, ku abik cam jɔ rɛɛc e akoolke.

Go ke lɛk kaaŋ aya; yan, Acin raan bi lupɔ ci piac ɣɔɔc kaac e lupɔ thɛɛr kɔu; na loi yen aya, ke ke ci piac ɣɔɔc jɔ lupɔ thɛɛr tɔ rɛɛt, ku lupɔ wen ci bɛɛi bei e lupɔ ci piac ɣɔɔcyic acii ram ke lupɔ thɛɛr aya.
Ku acin raan bi wany ci piac dhiim taau e atheep thɛɛr yiic; na loi en aya, ke wany ci piac dhiim ke jɔ atheep tɔ rɛɛt yiic, ku jɔ lɔ wei, ku jɔ atheep riaak.
Wany ci piac dhiim aye taau e atheep ci piac coŋ yiic; agoki tɔu apiɛth kedhie.
Ku acin raan ci wany ci ceŋ dek bi wany ci piac dhiim dap kɔɔr: abi lueel, yan, Ke ci ceŋ en aŋuan.
Na ɣɔn, ekool toŋ e thabath, ke Yecu tek e dum ke rap yiic; ago kɔckɛn e piooce rap dhoŋ, ku dɔcki ke, ku camki ke.
Go Parithai kɔk ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo luɔɔi wek ke ci pɛn kɔc e luɔi ekool e thabath?
Go Yecu pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Acakaa kene kɛnki kɔn kueen, ke ci Dabid looi, ɣɔn nɛke cɔk en, ayi kɔc cath ne yen;
luɔi ci en lɔ ɣon e Nhialic, ku le kuin ci gam Nhialic noom, ku ciɛm, ku jɔ gam kɔc cath ne yen aya; ku aye kuin cii raan daŋ dueer cam, ee bany ke ka ke Nhialic kapac?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Wen e raan ee Bɛnydiit e thabath aya.
Na ɣɔn, ekool daŋ e thabath, ke jɔ lɔ ɣon e Nhialic le weet; ku nu raan etɛɛn raan ci ciin cuec riɔu.
Go kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai goki woi guop, nɔn bi en raan tɔ dem ekool e thabath; ke ke bi kedaŋ yok ke bi kek e lɔ gaany.
Go ke cik tak e kepiɔth ŋic, ku jɔ raan ci cin riɔu yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot, kaace e ciɛɛlic etɛɛn. Go rot jɔt ku kɛɛc.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk; yan, We ba thiec cook tok; yan, Ci pal kɔc e akool e thabath bik kepiɛth aa looi, ku bik kerac aa looi? bik kɔc aa kony wei, ku bik kɔc aa nɔk?
Na wen, ke ke lieec kedhie, ku jɔ raan yɔɔk, yan, Riny yicin. Go ecin riny: go cin bɛ pial cit man e ciin daŋ.
Agoki niim mum aret, ku jɔki guiir kapac, ne ke bik luoi Yecu.
Na wen, e ninke, ke jɔ jal le e kuurdit nɔm le lɔŋ, ku jɔ ruu e laŋ Nhialic aruwe piny.
Na wen, aci piny jɔ ru, ke jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl; go kɔc kathieer ku rou lɔc e keyiic, ku ciek keek, an, tuuc aya;
yi Thimon, raan ci cak, an, Petero aya, ku Andereya manhe, ku Jakop keke Jɔn, ku Pilip keke Bartholomayo,
ku Mathayo keke Thoma, ku Jakop wen Alapayo, ku Thimon cɔl Dhelote,
ku Judath wen e Jakop, ku Judath Yithkariɔt, raan bi e nyiɛɛn.

Go bɛn piny keke keek etok, bi ku kɛɛc te ci rai keke kut e kɔckɛn e piooce ayi kut dit e kɔc wen bɔ bei e Judayayic ebɛn ku Jeruthalem, ku wɛɛrthok de Turo keke Thidon, kɔc wen ci bɛn bik bɛn piŋ, ku bik bɛn dem ne ka nu e kegup;
ayi kɔc cii jɔɔk rac dɔm; agoki gup waar.
Ku kɔɔr kut e kɔc ebɛn luɔi bi kek e jak; riɛl aci bɛn bei e yeguop, ku tɔ ke dem kedhie.
Na wen, ke jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce lieec, ku lueel, yan, Thieithieei wek kɔc kuany nyiin, ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ee kedun.
Thieithieei wek kɔc nɛk cɔk enɔɔne, we bi tɔ kueth. Thieithieei wek kɔc dhieu enɔɔne, we bi dɔl.
Thieithieei week, te mɛɛne kɔc week, ku te tɔ kek week e kɔc mɛɛn, ku te lɛt kek week, ku te reec kek rinkun tɔki ke nhiany, ne baŋ de Wen e raan.
Jaki piɔth miɛt ekoole abak kɛɛc nhial e piɔnmit: tieŋki, ariopdun adit paannhial; warken aake ye nebii luoi yikya.
Ku amawoou ne week wek kɔc ci bany! adutdun acak guɔ noom.
Amawoou ne week wek kɔc ci kuɛth! we bii cɔk nɔk. Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc dɔl enɔɔne! we bi dhuoor e dhieeu.
Amawoou ne week, te leece week e kɔc kedhie! warken aake ye nebii aluɛth luoi yikya.
Ku wek yɔɔk, wek kɔc piŋ, yan, Nhiaarki kɔc dɛ wek ater, yak kɔc man week luooi apiɛth,
yak kɔc e wek lam kerac thieei, ku yak lɔŋ ne biak de kɔc e week luoi kerac.
Ku raan biak yin gem tok, ke yi wel gem daŋ aya; ku raan rum lupɔduon thiine, ke du pen lupɔduon dit aya.
Miɔc raan ebɛn raan lip yin; ku raan rum weuku, du ke be kɔɔr tede yen.
Ku acit man kaar wek ke bi kɔc aa luoi week, ke ke jaki ya luooi wakya ayadaŋ.
Ku na nhiaarki kɔc nhiaar week, ee lɛc ŋo cath ke week? kɔc e kerac looi ayek kɔc nhiaar keek nhiaar.
Ku na luooiki kɔc apiɛth kɔc luui week apiɛth, ee lɛc ŋo cath ke week? kɔc e kerac looi ayek luui yikya ayadaŋ.
Ku na dhɛnki kɔc kaŋ kɔc ŋathki nɔn ba wek kaŋ bɛ noom tede keek, ee lɛc ŋo cath ke week? kɔc e kerac looi ayek kɔc e kerac looi dhɛn kaŋ, yan, bik kaŋ bɛ aa noom ka cit ka cik aa dhɛɛn.

Ku week, yak kɔc de ater ne week nhiaar, ku yak ke luooi apiɛth, ku dhɛnki ke kaŋ, ke cin ke ŋathki; ke ariopdun abi dit, ku we bi aa mith ke Nhialic Awarjaŋ; ee piɔu adhuɛŋ keke kɔc cin piɔth ayi kɔc racpiɔth.
Yak piɔth kok cit man ee Wuoordun piɔu kok.
Duoki kɔc e jɔɔny, ke we cii bi aa jɔɔny: duoki kɔc e gɔk, ke we cii bi aa gɔk: yak kɔc pal karɛcken, ke we bi aa pal karɛckun;
yak miooc, ke we bi aa miɔɔc; we bii kɔc yiek yoth kaŋ ne ke ci thiaŋ, ku ci cook, ku ci yiek, abi nɔm lɔ wei. Them thɛm wek kɔc kaŋ yen abi kɔc bɛ them week aya.
Go keek lɛk kaaŋ, yan, De cɔɔr dueer cɔɔr daŋ thel? ciki bi loony e pulic kedhie?
Raan ŋoot ke piooce acii raan weet en e woor: ku raan ebɛn raan ci thok e weet abi thoŋ ke raan e weet en.
Ku eeŋo woi yin wɛɛl thiin nu e mɛnhkui nyin, ku cii tim diit nu e yinyin e tiŋ?

Ku duɛɛre mɛnhkui yɔɔk adi, yan, Mɛnhkai, tɔ ya miite wɛlthiin nu e yinyin bei, ku yin guop yin cii timditt nu e yinyine woi? Yin ee raan de yic aguk, kɔne tim diit nu e yinyine bɛɛi bei, na ele, ke yin bi daai egɔk, ke yin dueer wɛɛl thiin nu e mɛnhkui nyin dap bɛɛi bei.
Tim piɛth acie luɔk e mith rac; ayi tim rac, acie luɔk e mith piɛth.
Tim ebɛn aye ŋic ne mɛnhdɛn ee yen luɔk. Kɔc aciki ŋaap e tet e kiir kɔu, ku aciki eenap e tet e peth kɔu.
Raan piɛth ee kepiɛth bɛɛi bei ne piath e yenpiɔu; ku raan rac ee kerac bɛɛi bei ne kerɛɛc nu e yepiɔu: thok ee jam ne ke ci piɔu thiɔɔŋ nɔm.
Ku eeŋo caal wek ɛn, yan, Bɛnydit, Bɛnydit, ku caki ka luɛɛl e looi?
Raan ebɛn raan bɔ tede yɛn, ago welki piŋ, ku jɔ keek aa looi, we ba nyuoth raan kit kek;
acit raan ci ɣot yik, ku jɔ keerkeer wec abi thuth, aci kuur lɔ yok: na wen, ke piny mol aret, go pieeu rot jap e ɣone kɔu, ku cii dueer tɔ lɔ nieŋnieŋ: luɔi ci keerkeerde wec e kuur nɔm.
Ku raan e wel piŋ, ku cii keek e looi, yen acit raan e ɣot yik e tiɔp nɔm ke cin keerkeer ci wec; go pieeu rot jap e ɣone kɔu, ku jɔ dap wiik enɔnthiine; go ɣone riaak e riaak dit.
Na ɣɔn, aci welke thok e luɛl e kɔc yith kedhie, ke jɔ lɔ Kapernaum.
Ku lim toŋ de bɛny de nɔm alathkeer kabɔt ade guop juai, akɔɔr thuɔɔu, ku ye lim nhiɛɛr bɛnyde.
Na wen, aci kede Yecu piŋ, ke toc roordit ke Judai, lek lɔŋ, an, bi bɛn bi limde bɛn tɔ dem.
Goki bɛn te nu Yecu, bik ku laŋki aret, luelki, yan, Raane ee raan piɛth raan duɛɛre kony ne luɔiye:
anhiaar jurda, ku aci wo yiek ɣon e Nhialic yenguop.
Go Yecu lɔ ke keek. Na wen, aci guɔ thiɔk ke ɣot, ke bɛny de nɔm alathkeer kabɔt ke jɔ mathke tuoc en, ku lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, du yiguop dak: yɛn cii piɛth luɔi bi yin lɔ ɣondi:
yen aa kɛn ɛn rot tɔ piɛth aya luɔi ban lɔ tede yin: jɔ jam lueel tei, ke mɛnhdi abi dem.
Ku yɛn aya yɛn ee raan ci taau e bany cok, ku nu alathkeer e yacok; na yɔɔk tok, yan, Lɔ, ka lɔ; ku na yɔɔk daŋ, yan, Ba, ka bɔ; ku na yɔɔk limdi, yan, Loi kene, ka looi.
Na wen, te ci Yecu kake piŋ, ke jɔ gai e yen, go rot puk, ku yook kut e kɔc kuany ecok, yan, Wek yɔɔk, yan, Gam diit cit ekene akɛn kɔn yok, acakaa Yithraelic.
Na wen, te ci kɔc ci tooc keniim dhuony ɣot, ke ke jɔ lim wen tok yok ke ci guop pial.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke jɔ lɔ panydiit cɔl Nain: ku cath kɔc juec ne yen, kɔckɛn e piooce, ku kut diit e kɔc.
Na wen, aci ɣet e kalthok e panydit di, ke jɔ rɔm ke raan ci thou a ket kɔc, leere roor, ku ye mɛnh tok ne man nɔm, ku man acin nɔm moc: ku cath kut e kɔc ke panydit ne yen.
Te ci Bɛnydit e tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu kok ke yen, ku yook, yan, Du dhiau.
Go bɛn ku jiɛk ket: go kɔc ket raan goki kɔɔc. Go lueel, yan, Dhuŋe, yin yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot.
Go raan wen ci thou ago yethar ɣany piny, ku gɔl jam. Go bɛ yinn man.
Go kɔc dɔm e riɔɔc kedhie: ku jɔki Nhialic leec, luelki, yan, Nebi dit aci tuol e woyiic; ku, yan, Nhialic aci kɔcke bɛn neem.
Go jam de luɔi ci looiye go ɣet piny de Judaya ebɛn, ku bɛi nu e yekec.
Go kɔcpiooce Jɔn goki Jɔn lɛk kake kedhie.
Na wen, ke Jɔn jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce cɔɔl kaarou, ku jɔ ke tuoc Yecu, lek thieec, yan, Ye raan wen, an, bi bɛn? ku de raan daŋ buk tiit?
Na wen, aci kɔc ɣet te nu yen, ke jɔki lueel, yan, Wok cii Jɔn Baptith tuoc yin, buk yin bɛn thieec, yan, Ye raan wen, an, bi bɛn? ku de raan daŋ buk tiit?
Ku ekool mane guop ke jɔ kɔc juec tɔ dem ne tɔɔkden ku ne ka ye ke cuil gup ku ne jɔɔk rac ci ke dɔm; ku tɔ coor juec yien.

Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Laki, lɛkki Jɔn ka cak tiŋ ku ka cak piŋ; coor acike tɔ yien, ŋol aciɛthki, kɔc cii wɛth dɔm acike tɔ waar, miŋ apiŋki, kɔc ci thou acike tɔ ɣɔɔr, kɔc kuany nyiin ayeke guieer welpiɛth.
Ku na de raan cii bi tɔ kɔth ne kedi, ka ci thieei.
Na wen, aci kɔc tuuce Jɔn jal, ke gɔl jam keke kut e kɔc ne kede Jɔn, yan, E we lɔ jɔɔric lak ŋo tiŋ? ee aruoor nieŋe yom, yen a lak tiŋ?
Ku e we lɔ biic lak ŋo tiŋ? ee raan ceŋ lupɔ lɔ nip? Tieŋki, kɔc ceŋ lupɔ ci lakelak, ku yek kak e mitemit cam, kek aye tɔu e ɣoot ke mahik yiic.
Ku e we lɔ biic lak ŋo tiŋ? ee nebi? Yeka, wek yɔɔk, yan, ee raan war nebi e kajuec aya.
Yen raan cii jam gɔɔr ne kede ki, yan, Tiŋ, yɛn tooc tunydi e yinɔm tueŋ, Raan bi kueerdu looiyic apiɛth e yinɔm tueŋ.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Ne kɔc yiic kɔc ci dhieeth e diaar, acin nebi nu nebi diit war Jɔn Baptith; ku raan koor cin naamde raan nu e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic yen adit awar en.
Go kɔc ci welke piŋ kedhie, ayi kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut, agoki piath e Nhialic piɔu leec, wen ci ke baptith e baptinh e Jɔn.
Ku Parithai keke bany e kɔc wɛɛt e loŋ, ke ke jɔ jam nu e Nhialic piɔu ne keden rɛɛc, wen keneke baptith e baptinh e Jɔn.
Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Ba rem e ekoole jɔ thɔɔŋ ŋo? ku citki ŋo?
Acitki miththii rɛɛr e thuukic, ke ke ye rot cɔɔl, yan, Wo ci kaaŋ kuoth week, ku wek ken coŋ; wo ci dhuoor e weniim, ku wek ken dhiau.
Jɔn Baptith aci bɛn ke cie cam e kuin ku cie dek e mɔu; aguɔki lueel, yan, Ciɛth ke jɔŋ rac.
Wen e raan aci bɛn ke ye cam ku deh; aguɔki lueel, yan, Tiŋ raane, ee mamith ku ye raan e dek e mɔu aret, ku ye mɛthe e kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut keke kɔc e kerac looi!
Ku pɛlenɔm aye tɔ ye yic ne mithke kedhie.
Na wen, ke cɔɔl raan toŋ de Parithai, yan, bi cam ke ye. Ku jɔ lɔ ɣon e Parithai, le ku nyuuc ten ee kɔc cam.
Ku ade tiiŋ nu panydit, tiiŋ rac; na wen, aci piŋ nɔn reere Yecu ten ee kɔc cam ɣon e Parithai, ke bii gun e alabatha deyic miok ci tumetum,
bi ku kɛɛc e yecok cieen ke dhiau, ku gɔl e wɛk ecok e piu ke nyin, ku jɔ ke weec e nhiim ke yenɔm, ku ciim cok, ku tɔc keek e miok ci tumetum.
Na wen, ke Parithai wen ci Yecu cɔɔl, te ci en e tiŋ, ke jɔ lueel e yepiɔu, yan, Raane, tee ye nebi, adi ci tiiŋe ŋic, tiiŋ e jak en, ku adi ci taude ŋic; ee tiiŋ e kerac looi.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook, yan, Thimon, yɛn de ke lɛk yi. Go lueel, yan, Bɛny e weet, luel kedu.
Go lueel, an, Ade raan nu raan ci kɔc dhɛɛn kaarou: ŋɛk aci dhɛn weu cit jinii kathieer, ku dhɛn ŋɛk ke cit jini tok tei.
Na wen, te cin kek weu bik bɛ cuol en, ke ke jɔ pɔl kaarou ne dhueeŋ. Jɔ lɛk ɛn, yan, Ne keek kaarou, eeŋa bi e nhiaar aret?
Go Thimon bɛɛr, yan, Aya lueel, yan, Raan ci pal kajuec, en abi e nhiaar aret. Go yɔɔk, yan, Yin e loŋ tiiŋ nɔm.
Go yenɔm wɛl tik, ku yook Thimon, yan, Ci tiiŋe tiŋ? Yɛn e bɛn ɣondu, ku yin ken a gam piu waak ɛn ke yacok: ku tiiŋe aci a waak cok e piu ke nyin, ku weec keek e nhiim ke yenɔm.
Yin ken a ciim; ku tiiŋe, gɔl te wen ba yɛn ɣot, aɣet ci enɔɔne aken a pɔl cok e ciem.
Yin ken a tɔc nɔm e miok: ku tiiŋe aci a tɔc cok e miok ci tumetum.
Yen a lɛk ɛn e yin, yan, Karɛcke, ciɛk an, juecki, acike pal en; nɔn ci en a nhiaar aret: ku raan ci pal kethiinakaŋ, nhieerde abi kuur tei.
Ku jɔ tik yɔɔk, yan, Karɛcku acike pɔl.
Go kɔc rɛɛr e yen etok ten ee kɔc cam, agoki jam gɔl e kepiɔth, yan, Eeŋa eraane raan e karac pɔl aya?
Go tik yɔɔk, yan, Gamdu aci yi kony; lɔ tei, acin kerac.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke jɔ piny caath, ee lɔ panydiite ku le panyditte, ku le paane ku le paane, le kɔc aa wɛɛt ku guiir keek welpiɛth ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic: ku cath kɔc kathieer ku rou ne yen,
ayi dieer ci tɔ dem ne jɔɔk rɛc ci ke dɔm ayi juei, yi Mari cɔl Magdalene, tiiŋ cii jɔɔk rac kadherou bɛn bei e yeguop,
ku Joana thŋ de Cudha raan e ka ke dhien e Kerod dot, ku Thuthana, ku dieer juec kɔk, dieer wen e ye kony ne weuken.
Na wen, aci kut ditt e kɔc gueer, ku kɔc kɔk aŋootki ke ke bɔ te nu yen e baaiyic ebɛn, ke jɔ jam ne kaaŋ: yan,
Raan e com e lɔ domic le kɔthke com: na wen, te cum en, ke kɔth kɔk ke ke loony piny e kueer kec; goke dum e kɔc cok, ku cam diɛt nhial keek.
Ku loony kɔk piny de kuur; na wen, acik goŋ, ke ke dap biɔɔr, ne cien tiɔptiɔɔp e piny.
Ku loony kɔk e kuɔɔth yiic; na wen, ke kuɔɔth e ke jɔ cil ne keek etok, goki ke nyiɛɛc.
Ku loony kɔk e tiɔm piɛthic, agoki cil, ku lokki, nyin tok abi bɔt bɛɛi. Te ci en ekake lueel, ke jɔ coot, yan, Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce thieec, yan, Kaaŋe enɔɔne, tharde akou?
Go lueel, yan, Aci gam week ke we bi jam ci thiaan ŋic, jam de ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic: kɔc kɔk ayeke wɛɛt e kɛŋ; luɔi bi kek aa daai, ku ciki e daai apiɛth, ku luoi bi kek aa piŋ, ku ciki kaŋ e yok yiic.
Kaaŋ thar ki: Kɔth kek aye jam e Nhialic.
Ka nu e kueer kec kek aye kɔc e jam piŋ; na ele ke jɔŋditt rac bɔ, bi ku jɔt jam e kepiɔth, ke ke cii bi gam agoke kony wei.
Ku ka nu piny de kuur, ayek kɔc e jam piŋ, ku dɔmki ne piɔnmit: ku acinki mei, agoki gam tethiinakaŋ, ku bik rot dak cieen ekool theme ke.
Ku ka ci loony e kuɔɔth yiic ayek kɔc e jam piŋ, ku jɔki lɔ, agoke nyiɛɛc ne diɛɛr ee kek dieer e kaŋ ku bany ci kek bany ku kamit yek kɔɔr ka ke piire, ku ciki e luɔk apiɛth.
Ku ka nu e tiɔm piɛthic ayek kɔc ci jam piŋ, ku jɔki muk ne piɔn yic ku piɛth, agoki luɔk ne rum ee kek kepiɔth rom.
Acin raan e manyealath kooth, ku jɔ kuom nɔm piny e tony, ku tɛɛu e laŋarep thar aya; aye taau e kedaŋ nɔm, ke kɔc bɔ ɣot ke ke bi mac tiŋ.
Acin ke ci thiaan, ke cii bi tic; ku acin ke ci moony, ke cii bi ŋic, ago tic e kɔc niim.
Yak rot tht ne piŋ aa wek piŋ: raan de nɔm kaŋ, abi bɛ miɔɔc; ku raan cin nɔm kaŋ, acakaa ke ye tɔ ye kede abi noom tede ye.
Na wen, ke man bɔ tede yen keke mithekɔcken, ku cin te bi kek ɣeet te nu yen ne baŋ de kut e kɔc.
Ku aci lɛk en, yan, Moor ka kaac biice keke mithekɔckun, akɔɔrki yin.
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Kɔcke kɔc e jam e Nhialic piŋ, ku loiki, kek aye maar ku yek mithekɔckuɔ.
Na wen, ekool tok e akoolke yiic, ke lɔ e abelic keke kɔckɛn e piooce, ku jɔ keek yɔɔk, yan, Bak teemku lɔɔk. Agoki abel lony.
Na wen, aciɛthki e abelic, ke jɔ nhi: ku jɔ amaŋ rot tuk e baaric,arek abi abel duɛɛr thiaŋ, abik duɛɛr diir.
Ku jɔki bɛn tede yen, bik ku packi, yan, Bɛny, wok thou. Go rot jɔt, ku nen yom ku athiakthiak de piu; agoki kɔɔc, ku lɔ wɛɛr diu.
Go ke thieec, yan, Nu gamdun tenou? Agoki riɔɔc, ku gɛiki, ku jɔki lueel kapac, yan, Ee raan cit ŋo ekene? raan ee yi yom yɔɔk ayi piu, agoki kede piŋ?
Agoki ɣet paan e Gadarai, tuoom nɔm keke Galili.
Na wen, aci bɛn biic e abelic, ke ram ke raan toŋ bɔ bei e panyditic, raan de guop jɔɔk rac ecaŋɣɔn, ku acin lupɔ ee cieŋ, ku cie reer ɣoot, ku ye reer e rɛɛŋ yiic.
Na wen, aci Yecu tiŋ, ke jɔ coot, ku cuɛt rot piny e yenɔm, ku jɔ lueel e rol dit, yan, Eeŋoda ne yin, Yecu, Wen e Nhialic Awarjaŋ? Yin laŋ, du ya leŋ wei.
Aci jɔŋ rac kɔn yɔɔk, an, Ba bei e raan guop. Aa ye cool e dɔm en e: go aa rek e kuɛɛt ku joth, ku jɔ aa tiit; ku jɔ kake ye mac aa dhoŋ, ku ye jɔŋ rac kuaath roor.
Go Yecu thieec, yan, Cɔl yin ŋa? Go lueel, yan, Remdit; luɔi ci jɔɔk juec lɔ e yeguop.
Goki lɔŋ, an, Du wo cieec tethuth aloŋloŋ.
Ku ade lunydiit e kudhuur etɛɛn, ke ke nyuath e kuurdit nɔm: goki lɔŋ, an, bi ke pal lɔ e keyiic. Go ke pɔl.
Go jɔɔk rac bɛn bei e raan guop, bik ku lek e kudhuur gup: go luny ebɛn lɔ piny e ke riŋ aret lek te lɔ luooŋlaŋ e baaric, ku jɔki mou.
Na wen, aci tiit ke ci looi tiŋ, ke ke jɔ kat, lek lɛk kɔc e panyditic ayi rɛɛr.
Go kɔc lɔ biic lek ke ci looi tiŋ; goki bɛn te nu Yecu, ku yokki raan wen ci jɔɔk rac jal e yeguop, arɛɛr e Yecu cok, ke ceŋ lupɔ, aci nɔm piath; agoki riɔɔc.
Go kɔc wen ci e tiŋ, goki keek guieer luɔi ci raan tɔ dem raan wen cii jɔɔk rac dɔm.
Na wen, ke kut e kɔc ebɛn kɔc ke piny e Gadarai, piny thiaak keke tɛɛn, ke jɔki lɔŋ, an, bi jal pinyden; aci riɔɔc dit ke dɔm: go lɔ e abelic, ku jɔ enɔm puk.
Go raan wen ci jɔɔk rac jal e yeguop go lɔŋ, an, bi tɔu ke yen;
go Yecu tɔ jel, yan, Dhuonye yinɔm paandu, ke jɔ kɔc guieer kadit cii Nhialic luoi yin. Go jal, ku jɔ lɔ le guieer kɔc e panyditic ebɛn kadit cii Yecu luoi yen.
Na wen, aci Yecu enɔm dhuny, ke jɔ loor e kɔc; aa tiit kɔc kedhie.
Na wen, ke raan bɔ raan cɔl Jairo, ku ye bɛny e ɣon e Nhialic: ku jɔ rot cuat piny e Yecu cok, ago lɔŋ, an, bi bɛn ɣonde;
ade nɔm nyan tok tei, runke acitki thieer ku rou, ku adhɔt piny ke kɔɔr thuɔɔu. Go lɔ, ku jɔ giŋ e kut e kɔc.
Ku tik anu, tiiŋ e cool e kueer e riɛm e run kathieer ku rou, ku aci weuke thol kedhie riɔp en akiim, ku acin akim toŋ ci e leu,
na wen, ke bɔ e yekɔu cieen, bi ku jiɛk lupɔde thok: go riɛm a ŋeu enɔnthiine.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Eeŋa e jak ɛn? Go kɔc jai kedhie, go Petero ku kɔc cath ne yen lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin giŋ kut e kɔc ku thanyki yin, ku ba jɔ lueel, yan, Eeŋa e jak ɛn?
Go Yecu lueel, an, Ade raan toŋ ci a jak: aŋiɛc nɔn ci riɛl bɛn bei e yaguop.
Na wen, aci tik e tiŋ nɔn cii en dueer mɔɔny, ke jɔ bɛn ke lɛthe, bi ku cuɛt rot piny e yenɔm, go lɛk en e kɔc niim kedhie yen ke jiɛk en en, ku dem ci en dem enɔnthiine.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Nyane, rit rot: gamdu aci yi tɔ dem; lɔ tei, acin kerac.
Te ŋoot en ke jam, ke raan bɔ paan e bɛny e ɣon e Nhialic, bi ku yook, yan, Nyandu e thou; du Bɛny e weet be jut.
Go Yecu piŋ, ku jɔ bɛɛr, yan, Du riɔc: gam tei, abi guop pial.
Na wen, aci bɛn ɣot, ke cin raan pɛl lɔ ɣot, ee Petero, ku Jakop, ku Jɔn, ku wun duet ku man, keek kapac.
Kɔc aake dhiau kedhie, dhieuki meth; ku jɔ lueel, yan, Duoki dhiau; aken thou, anin tei.
Goki dɔl guop, aŋicki nɔn ci en thou.
Go ke ciɛɛc biic kedhie, ku jɔ duet dɔm cin, ku coot, yan, Nyanthiine, jɔ paac.
Go weike keniim bɛ puk, ku jɔ rot jɔt enɔnthiine: go ke yɔɔk, an, bik miɔɔc e kecam.
Go yi wun gai keke man: ku jɔ ke lom thook, ke ke cii ke ci tic bi lɛk raan daŋ.
Go kɔc kathieer ku rou cɔɔl, ku gɛm keek riɛl bi kek jɔɔk rac cieŋ kedhie, ku tɔki juai waar.
Go ke tooc lek kɔc aa guieer ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ku tɔki kɔc tok dem.
Ku yook keek, yan, Duoki ka ke kueeric muk, acin thieec, ayi athep, ayi kuin, ayi weu; ku duoki aluluut leer kaarou.
Ku ɣon ba we lɔ thin, jaki reer thin, ku bak jal etɛɛn.
Ku na de kɔc reec week nyuooc, te jal wek paanden, ke we teŋ abui wei e wecok, abi aa caatɔ bi dɛ ater ke keek.
Goki jal, ku jɔki bɛi caath yiic, ke ke guiir welpiɛth, ku tɔki kɔc dem e baaiyic ebɛn.
Na wen, ke Kerod tetararki ke jɔ ke ci looi piŋ ebɛn; go gai aret, ne ke ci lueel e kɔc kɔk, yan, ci Jɔn rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic;
ku lueel kɔc kɔk, yan, ci Elija tuol; ku ne kɔk, yan, ci raan toŋ de nebii thɛɛr rot bɛ jɔt.
Go Kerod lueel, yan, Jɔn aca kiɛp nɔm wei; ku eeŋa eraane, raan can ka cit ekake piŋ ne kede? Ku ade piɔu luɔi bi en e tiŋ.
Na wen, aci kɔc ci tooc keniim puk, ke jɔki guieer ka cik looi. Go ke lɛɛr, ku jɔ rot wuony te cin kɔc e jɔɔric jɔɔr e panydiit cɔl Bethaida.
Na wen, aci kut e kɔc e ŋic, ke jɔki biɔɔth cok: go keek loor, ku jɔ keek guieer ka ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ku tɔ kɔc dem kɔc de ke nu e kegup.
Go akɔl rot puk; ku jɔ kɔc kathieer ku rou bɛn, bik ku luelki, yan, Tɔ kut e kɔc jel, bik lɔ e wuot yiic ku bɛi yiic tethiɔk, lek te tɔɔc kek kɔɔr, ayi kecam: piny tɔu wok thin ee jɔɔric tei.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Week, miacki keek e kecamki. Goki lueel, yan, Acin ke cath ke wook, ee kuiin ci pam kadhic tei, ku rec kaarou; wu, buk lɔ, buk kecam lɔ ɣɔc kɔcke kedhie?
Aake cit agum kadhiny e roor. Go kɔckɛn e piooce yɔɔk, yan, Taki ke nyuc e bniuuk, bniuŋ tok ee thierdhic, ku buluŋ tok ee thierdhic.
Goki looi aya, tɔki ke nyuc kedhie.
Na wen, ke kuany kuiin ci pam kadhic ku rec kaarou, ku jɔ tenhial iieec, go ke thieei, ku wɛk keyiic, gɛm ke kɔcpiooce, bik ke lɔ taau e kut e kɔc niim.
Goki cam, abik kuɛth kedhie: ku jɔki ka lɔ thueithuei kuany e dioony yiic dioony kathieer ku rou ne ka ci both.
Na wen, ke laŋ etok, ku tɔu kɔckɛn e piooce ne yen: go ke thieec, yan, Ye kɔc ɛn tɔ ye ŋa?
Goki bɛɛr, yan, Jɔn Baptith; ku lueel kɔk, yan, Elija; ku ne kɔk, yan, ee raan toŋ de nebii thɛɛr en ci rot bɛ jɔt.
Go keek thieec, yan, Na week, yak a tɔ ye ŋa? Go Petero bɛɛr, yan, Yin ee Kritho de Nhialic.
Go ke lom thook, ku yook keek aret, yan, E cin raan lɛkki ekene:
ku lueel, yan, Wen e raan abi kajuec dhil guum, ku abii roordit rɛɛc, ku banydit ke ka ke Nhialic, ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ku abi nɔk, ku be rot jɔt ekool ee kek diak.
Go keek yɔɔk kedhie, yan, Na de raan de piɔu luɔi bi en a kuany cok, e ye rot nyɔŋ, ku ye timdɛn ci riiu nɔm jɔt e akooinyiin, ku kuɛny acok.
Raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en weike kony, ka bi ke moor; ku raan mar weike ne biakdi, yen abi weike kony.
Te ciɛme raan piny nɔm ebɛn, ku mɛɛr rot, ku nɔn tɔ yen rot riaak, ee piathou bi yok thin?
Raan ci guop riɔɔc ne biakdi ku ne biak de welki, raane abi Wen e raan guop riɔɔc ne biakde, te bi yen ke dhueeŋ de yenguop, ku dhueeŋ de wun, ku dhueeŋ de tuucnhial ɣerpiɔth.
Ku wek lɛk yic, yan, Ade kɔc kaac etene, kɔc cii thuɔɔu bi thieep, te ŋoot kek ke ke ken ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic kɔn tiŋ.
Na wen, aci welke thok te cit nin kabɛt, ke jɔ Petero noom, ku Jɔn ku Jakop, go lɔ e kuurdit nɔm, le lɔŋ.
Ku te ŋoot en ke laŋ, ke tau de yenyin puk rot, go lupɔde jɔ ɣɛɛr abi lɔ bilbil.
Na wen, ke kɔc kaarou e ke jam ne yen, ke yi Mothe keke Elija:
acik tuol ne dhueeŋ, ke ke jam ne kede jal bi en jal e piny nɔm e Jeruthalem.
Ku Petero keke kɔc cath ne yen aci nhi ke nɔk: na wen, acik guɔ paac, ke ke jɔ dhueeŋde tiŋ, ku tiŋki kɔc kaarou ke ke kaac ne yen.
Na wen, ajel kɔc e yelɔɔm, ke Petero yook Yecu, yan, Bɛny, tau tɔu wok ene en apiɛth: jɔku kɛɛt looi kadiak, ee tok kedu, ku ee tok kede Mothe ku ee tok kede Elija: akuc ke lueel.
Te ŋoot en ke jam, ke luat bɔ, kum ke piny: goki riɔɔc te le kek e luatic.
Ku bɔ rol bei e luatic, yan, Wendien nhiaar ki; yak kake piŋ!
Te ci rol mim, ke ke jɔ Yecu yok etok. Goki lɔ ku mimki, ku cin ke cik lɛk raan daŋ e akoolke ne ka wen cik tiŋ.
Na ɣɔnmiak, acik bɛn piny e kuurdit nɔm, ke jɔ rɔm ke kut diit e kɔc.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ e kut e kɔc yiic cot, yan, Bɛny, yin laŋ, woi wendi: ee mɛnhdien tok:
ku tiŋ, aye jɔk dɔm, go dap rol ethiau; aye tɔ lɔ juɔklaŋ, abi ayok gut e yethok, ku acie dap pɔl, aye kɔn bɔɔt guop.
Aguɔ kɔckuon e piooce lɔŋ, an, bik cieec biic; agoki cuo leu.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Rem reec gam oou, rem e loŋ yalic oou, ba reer e weyiic e run kadi, ku ba kakun guum e run kadi? bɛɛiye wendu etene.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke bɔ, ke wite jɔŋ rac piny, ku tɔ lɔ juɔklaŋ aret. Go Yecu jɔŋ rac jɔɔny, ku tɔ meth waar, ku jɔ bɛ yien wun.
Goki gai aret kedhie ne riɛl diit gok e Nhialic. Na wen, te ŋoot kek ke ke gai kedhie ne kerieec cii Yecu looi, ke jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce yɔɔk, yan,
Taki welke loony e weyith ya: Wen e raan e thiɔk ke luɔi bi e taau e kɔc cin.
Ku akenki jame gith thar, aci mɔny keek, ke ciki bi yokic: ku acik riɔɔc ne lop bi kek e luɔp e jame.
Na wen, ke ater cak rot e keyiic, yan, ee raanou bi lɔ tueŋ e keyiic.
Go Yecu ke cik tak e kapiɔth ŋic, go mɛnhthiinakaŋ noom, ku tɛɛu e yelɔɔm,
go ke yɔɔk, yan, Raan bi mɛnhthiine dɔm ne rinki, ka ye yɛn e dɔm: ku raan bi a dɔm, ka ye Raan e toc ɛn, yen e dɔm; ku raan koor e weyiic wedhie, yen abi dit.
Go Jɔn bɛɛr ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, wo e raan tiŋ ke ciec jɔɔk rac ne rinku; agoku peen, luɔi cii en e cath ke wook.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Du pen: raan cin ater ke wook, yen aye mat ke wook.
Na ɣɔn, aci nin thiɔk nin ke leer bi ye lɛɛr nhial, ke jɔ enɔm wɛl te lɔ Jeruthalem, an, bi dhil lɔ,
ku tooc tuuc bik lɔ e yenɔm tueŋ; goki jal, lek paan toŋ e Thamaria, lek kede guik.
Na wen, ke reecki nyuooc, luɔi de en nyin lɔ Jeruthalem.
Na wen, aci kɔckɛn e piooce yi Jakop ku Jɔn e tiŋ, ke jɔki lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, de yi piɔu luɔi bi wo mac cɔɔl piny tenhial, cit man ci Elija e looi aya?
Go rot puk, jieeny keek, yan, Wek kuc wei cath ke week nɔn ee kek wei cit ŋo.
Wen e raan aa cii bɔ bi kɔc bɛn riɔɔk wei, ee kunydewei en e bi yen. Goki lɔ paan daŋ.
Na wen, aciɛthki kueer, ke lueel raan tok, yan, Bɛnydit, yin ba kuany cok te de en te le yin thin.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Awaan adeki ɣootkɛn ci wec piny, ku diɛt nhial adeki ɣoot, ku Wen e raan acin te kɛn en enɔm.
Go lɛk raan daŋ, yan, Kuany acok. Go lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, pal ɛn e ya kɔn lɔ la waar thiɔk.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Pal kɔc ci thou e ke thiak kɔckɛn ci thou: ku yin lɔ, guieere kɔc ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic.
Ku lueel raan daŋ aya, yan, Bɛnydit, yin ba kuany cok; ku pal ɛn e ya kɔn lɔ la kɔc nu paanda tɔɔŋ.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Raan e puur dɔm e yeciin, ku be cieen lieec, acii roŋ ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke Bɛnydit jɔ kɔc kɔk kathierdherou cɔɔl aya, ku tɔɔc keek rene kapac ku rene kapac, bik lɔ panydit ebɛn ku baai ebɛn, te bi en dap bɛn thin.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Ka ci luɔk ajuecki, ku kɔc e luui aliki. Yen aa wek Bɛnydit e ka ci luɔk lɔŋ, yan, bi kɔc e luui tuɔɔc domdɛn ci luɔk.
Laki tei: tieŋki, wek tuɔɔc cit man ee amithook lɔ e aŋuooth yiic.
Duoki kiith e weu muk, ayi athep, ayi war: ku duoki raan daŋ e thieec kueer.
Ku ɣon ba wek lɔ thin, ke jaki kɔn lueel, yan, E mat tɔu ke ɣone.
Ku na nu raan nhiaar mat thin, ke mandun abi reer ke yen: ku na liu, ka bi rot pɔk week.
Ku jaki cool e ɣone guop, ke we ye cam ku dɛkki ne ka bi yien week: raan e luui ee roŋ ke ariopde. Duoki ɣoot wil.
Ku panyditt la wek thin, ku tɔ kɔc week e kamaan, ke we ye ka ci taau e weniim cam:
ku taki kɔc tok dem kɔc nu thin, ku yɔɔkki keek, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aci ɣeet tethiɔk ke week.
Ku panydiit la wek thin, ku cii kɔc we tɔ ye kamaan, ke we jɔ lɔ biic e ciɛɛr ke paane yiic, ku luɛlki, yan,
Ayi tɔɔr e panyduondit tɔɔr wen ci nuɛt e wogup, yen a weecku wei, jany jieeny wok week ka! Ku jaki kene ŋic, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aci ɣeet tethiɔk ke week.
Ku week yɔɔk, yan, Ketuc bii Thɔdom yok acii bi kit keke ketuc bii panydiite yok ekoole.
Amawoou ne yin, Koradhin! Amawoou ne yin, Bethaida! tee kadit ril ci looi e Turo ku Thidon cit man ci ke looi e weyiic, adi cik kepiɔth puk ɣɔn thɛɛr, ke ke ceŋ cuɛl ku yek reer e aropic.
Ku ketuc bii Turo ku Thidon yok acii bi kit keke ketuc bak yok.
Ku yin Kapernaum, yin ci jat nhial aɣet paannhial, yin bi bɛɛi piny aɣet paan e kɔc ci thou.
Raan piŋ kedun, ke piŋ kedi; ku raan reec week, ke reec ɛn; ku raan reec ɛn, ke reec raan e toc ɛn.
Na wen, ke kɔc kathierdherou ke ke jɔ keniim dhuny, ke ke mit piɔth, ku jɔki lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, aɣɔl jɔɔk rac ayek keda gam ne rinku.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Yɛn e Catan tiŋ ke loony piny paannhial cit man e wiledeŋ.
Tieŋki, wek gam riɛl ba wek karac kac e wecok, ayi mancieei, ku gam week riɛl ba wek riɛl diit e raan de ater tiaam ebɛn: ku acin ke bi week nɔk anandun.
Ku duoki piɔth mit ne ecooke, yan, ee jɔɔk rac kedun gam; aŋuan luɔi ba wek piɔth miɛt ne gaar ci rinkun gɔɔr paannhial.

Ku ne thaar mane guop ke Yecu jɔ piɔu miɛt ne Weidit, ku lueel, yan, Yin lɛɛc, Waar, luɔi ci yin kake mɔny kɔc pel ku kɔc de niim, ku jɔ keek nyuoth mithi. thiiatetet: ee yen, Waar; en aci guɔ miɛt e yiniɔu.
Kaŋ kedhie aci Waar ke yien ɛn: ku acin raan ŋic Wende, nɔn ee yen ŋa, ee Wun etok, ku acin raan ŋic Wun, nɔn ee yen ŋa, ee Wende etok, ku raan nu e Wende piɔu luɔi bi en e nyuoth en.
Go rot pɔk kɔcpiooce, ku yook keek kapac, yan, Thieithieei e nyin tiŋ ka tieŋki:
wek yɔɔk, yan, Nebii juec ayi maliik acik piɔth dɛ luɔi tiŋ kek ka wɔiki, ku akenki ke tiŋ; ku luɔi piŋ kek ka piɛŋki, ku akenki ke piŋ.
Na wen, ke raan tok jɔt rot, ee bɛny de loŋ, ku jɔ them, thieec, yan, Bɛny e weet, eeŋo ba looi ke ban piir athɛɛr lɔɔk lak?
Go lueel, yan, Eeŋo ci gɔɔr e loŋic? Ye kueen adi?
Go bɛɛr, yan, Yin bi Bɛnydit Nhialicdu nhiaar e piɔndu ebɛn, ku weiku ebɛn, ku riɛldu ebɛn, ku nɔmdu ebɛn: ku nhiaar raan rɛɛr ke yin cit man nhiɛɛr yin rot.
Go lueel, yan, Aci tiiŋ nɔm: na loiye wule, ke yin bi piir.
Go kɔɔr luɔi bi en rot kɔl, en eraane, ku jɔ Yecu thieec, yan, Ku raan rɛɛr ke yɛn yen ee ŋa?
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Ade raan e jel Jeruthalem le Jeriko, ku jɔ rɔm ke cuɛɛr; na wen, ke ke door lupɔde bei e yeguop, goki dui, ku jɔki jal, ku nyieeŋki piny ke deyic wei.
Na wen, ke bɛny toŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke biiye piny e kueere, go tiŋ, ku jɔ rot yal e kueer biaktui, ku teek.
Ayi raan e Lebi aya, te ci en ɣeet te nu raan, ke woi, ku jɔ rot yal e kueer biaktni, ku teek.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ e Thamaria keny etɛɛn, ku jɔ bɛn te nu raane: na wen, aci e tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu kok ke yen,
ago lɔ te nu yen, ku jɔ ɣaan tok deer, wen ci en ke tɔc e miok keke wany, ku tɛɛu e mulde kɔu, ku bii ɣon e kamaan, go jɔ muk apiɛth.
Na ɣɔnmiak, te jel en, ke jɔ rial bɛɛi bei, yin raan de ɣot, ku yook, yan, Muk apiɛth; ku na de weu kɔk ci yin ke ye ɣɔɔc, ke yin ba cuoot miak, te can bɛn.
Ne yin, an, Ne keyiic kadiak eeŋa ci rot tɔ ye raan rɛɛr ke raan wen ram ke cuɛɛr e kaŋ rum?
Go lueel, yan, Ee raan wen ci piɔu kok ke yen. Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ, ku ye looi wuya.
Na wen, aciɛɛthki kueer, ke jɔ lɔ paan tok; go nyuooc e tiiŋ toŋ cɔl Martha.
Ku ade nɔm nyankene cɔl Mari, nyan ci nyuc e Yecu cok, ke piŋ welke.
Na wen, ke Martha nuan aret ke luɔi dit, ku jɔ bɛn te nu yen, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, luɔi ci nyankai a pal luɔi yatok, cin kedu thin? Yɔɔke bi a kony.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook, an, Martha, Martha, yin ci piɔu diɛɛr ku ci nuan e kajuec:
ee tok tei en dak: ku Mari aci baŋ piɛth lɔc, baŋ cii bi nyaai tede yen.
Na ɣɔn, a lɛŋ tedaŋ, ku jɔ lɔŋ pɔl, go raan toŋ e kɔcken e piooce lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, wɛɛte wook e lɔŋ, acit man waan weete Jɔn kɔckɛn e piooce aya.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Te ya wek lɔŋ, ke yak lueel, yan, Waada nu paannhial, tɔ rinku rieuwe. Tɔ ciɛɛŋdu bɔ. Ye kede piɔndu tɔ loi e piny nɔm, cit man e ye looi paannhial.
Ye wo miɔɔc e akoolnyiin e ke buk aa cam.
Ku ye wo pal karɛckuɔ; ku wook aya wo ye kɔc pɔl kedhie kɔc cath ne kanykuɔ. Ku du wook e lɛɛr e themic; ye wo luok e kerac.
Go lɛk keek, yan, Eeŋa ne weyiic, raan de mɛthe, ku bi lɔ tede yen e wɛɛric cil, le ku lueel, yan, Math, dhɛne ya kuiin ci pam kadiak;
ade mɛthedien ci bɛn te nuo yɛn, ke keny, ku acin ke gɔɔŋ ɛn en;
go raan nu ɣoot lueel, yan, Du ya jut guop: ɣot aci guɔ gaar, ku mithki acik tɔc e yayɔu; yɛn cii rot dueer jɔt, la yi miɔɔc?
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Ciɛk, an, cii rot bi cak jɔt, miɔɔc, ne baŋ de maath, ka bi rot dhil jɔt ku jɔ miɔɔc ne ka kɔɔr kedhie, ne baŋ wen cool en e lip.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Yak lip, ke we bi aa miɔɔc; yak koor, ku abak aa yok; yak ɣot tɔɔŋ thok, ku abi liep week.
Raan ebɛn raan e lip, aa ye miɔɔc; ku raan e koor ee yok; ku raan e ɣot tɔɔŋ thok aye liep ɣot.
Ku na de raan e weyiic raan de nɔm mith, ku te lip mɛnhde kuin tede yen, bi miɔɔc e kɔɔi? Ku na lip rɛc, bi miɔɔc e kerac, le enyin e rɛcic?
Ku na lip tuɔŋ, bi miɔɔc e mancieei?
