Ku te ŋiɛc wek mithkun miɔɔc ne kapiɛth, wek kɔc rac, na Wuoorduon nu paannhial cii kɔc lip en bi dhil miɔɔc ne Weidit Ɣer?
Na ɣɔn, acieec jɔŋ rac jɔŋ cin thok. Na wen, aci bɛn bei, ke raan wen cin thok, ke jam; go kut e kɔc gai.
Go kɔc kɔk e keek lueel, yan, Ee jɔɔk rac cieec ne Beeldhebub bɛnydiit e jɔɔk rac.
Ku them e kɔc kɔk, ke ke kɔɔr gok tede yen, gok bɔ nhial.
Go ke cik tak e kepiɔth ŋic, ku lueel, yan, Na teer kɔc ke paan tok ke baai aa riaak; ku na teer kɔc ke dhien tok ke dhien aa riaak.
Ku na teer Catan rot, ke ciɛɛŋde bi kɔɔc adi? Ne jamduon luɛlki, yan, aa jɔɔk rac cieec ne Beeldhebub.
Ku na ya jɔɔk rac cieec ne Beeldhebub, ku na mithkun, yek jɔɔk rac cieec ne ŋa? Keek abik aa kɔc e loŋdun jɔɔny.
Ku na ya jɔɔk rac cieec ne ciin e Nhialic, ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ki, ci bɛn tede weeke.
Te muke raan ril ka ke tɔŋ ku tiit paande, ke weuke ayek jɔ tɔu apiɛth;
ku te bi raan ril e yen, ku tiɛɛm en, ke jɔ kakɛn e tɔŋ noom tede yen, kakɛn ee yen ke rot ŋɔɔth, ku jɔ weukɛn ci peec tek.
Raan reec mat keke yɛn ka de ater ke yɛn; ku raan reec gueer e yalɔɔm ke thiei wei.
Te ci jɔŋ rac bɛn bei e raan guop, ke jɔ te cin piu aa caath, ke kɔɔr te bi en lɔŋ thin; na wen, acin te ci yok, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Yɛn bi anɔm dhuony ɣondien waan jal ɛn thin.
Na wen, aci bɛn, ke yok ɣot aci weec aci yic lak.
Go lɔ, ku cɔl jɔɔk rɛc kɔk kadherou jɔɔk war en e rac, goki bɛn, ku lek ɣot, ku jɔki ɣap thin; ago tau de raane taudɛn cieen go rac awar taudɛn thɛɛr.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke luel kake, ke tiiŋ tok e kut e kɔc yiic ke jɔ yerol jɔt, lueel, yan, Thieithieei e yany ci yi dhieeth, ku thin ci thuat!
Go lueel, yan, Aŋuan luɔi bi yin e lueel, yan, Thieithieei e koc e jam e Nhialic piŋ, ku yek dot.
Na wen, aci kut ditt e kɔc gueer, ke gieŋic, ke jɔ jam gɔl, yan, Rem enɔɔne ee rem rac, akɔɔrki gok bik tiŋ; ku acin gok bi yien keek, ee gok de nebi Jona tei.
Acit man ɣɔn ee Jona gok cii kɔc ke Ninebe tiŋ agoki gai, en abi Wen e raan aa gok bii rem enɔɔne tiŋ agoki gai.

Tiiŋ malik de piny cieen abi rot jɔt ekool e guieereloŋ keke rem de enɔɔne etok, ago ke yiek yieth gaak: aci bɛn te le piny thar guut, bi wel ke Tholomon bɛn piŋ wel ke pɛlenɔm; ku raan dit e Tholomon ki ene.
Kɔc ke Ninebe abik rot jɔt ekool e guieereloŋ ne rem de enɔɔne etok, agoki ke yiek yieth gaak: acik kepiɔth puk ne guieer cii Jona ke guieer wel; ku raan dit e Jona ki ene.
Acin raan e manycalath kooth, ku jɔ taau te cii en tiec, ku cii tɛɛu e kedaŋ thar aya, aye taau nhial e kedaŋ nɔm, ke kɔc bɔ ɣot ke ke bi mac tiŋ apiɛth.
Nyin ee many e guop riaau: na piath nyindu, ke yin ɣer guop ebɛn; ku na rac nyindu, ke yin col guop ecut ayik yiyic.
Ye rot tiit ke keɣer nu yiguop ke cii bi aa cuɔl.
Te ci guopdu ɣɛɛr ebɛn, ku cin tethiin col, ka bi jɔ ɣɛɛr ewic ebɛn, cit man ee riau de manyealath yi riaau.
Na wen, te ŋoot en ke jam, ke cɔɔl raan toŋ de Parithai, yan, bi lɔ cam ke yen: go lɔ ɣot, le ku nyuuc ten ee kɔc cam.
Go raan e Parithai tiŋ wen ciem en ke ken kɔn piny, go gai.
Go Bɛnydit yɔɔk, yan, Wek Parithai enɔɔne, wek ee biny coth kɔu abi ɣɛɛr, ku cuɔthki aduɔk kɔu; ku weyiic thin acik thiaŋ e wath ku kerac.
Wek dhan, Acieŋ e cak ke nu biic, ken ke nu thin cak aya?
Aŋuan luɔi ba wek kɔc kuany nyiin miɔɔc ne ka cath ne week; ku tieŋki, kaŋ kedhie ayek ɣɛɛr tede week.

Amawoou ne week, wek Parithai! we ye wal juaar, yi mint, ku rue, ku wal ebɛn, gamki Nhialic toŋ wen thieer kek, ku yak guieereloŋ woocyic keke nhieer e Nhialic: kake adi cak ke dhil aa looi, ku caki kak awen e pɔl ayadaŋ.
Amawoou ne week, wek Parithai! wek nhiaar reer aa wek reer e thony piɛth niim e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic, ku nhiaarki thiec ee kɔc week thieec e thuk yiic.
Amawoou ne week, wek kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai, kɔc de yac aguk! wek cit rɛŋ cii tiec, go kɔc cath e keniim nhial goki kuc.
Go raan tok e bany ke loŋ jɔ bɛɛr, yook, yan, Bɛny e weet, luɛl lueel yin ekake, ke yin e wook lat aya.
Go lueel, yan, Amawoou ne week aya, wek bany ke loŋ! wek ee kɔc yink kɔɔth kathiek e ke doony, ku wegup we cii kathiek e jak e ciin tok.
Amawoou ne week! wek ee rɛŋ ke nebii yik, nebii ɣɔn cii warkun nɔk.
Ee yin, wek ee caatɔɔ enɔɔne e gam ca wek luɔi de warkun gam; ee kek e nak keek, ku wek aye rɛŋken yik.
Yen a lueele Nhialic en ne pɛl e yenɔm, yan, Yɛn bi nebii tuoc keek ayi tuuc, ku abik kɔc kɔk e keek nɔk abik thou, ku yɔŋki kɔk:
ke riɛm de nebii kedhie, riɛm ci leu gɔl te ɣɔn ciɛke piny aɣet ci enɔɔne, ke bi thieec tede rem de enɔɔne;
gɔl e riɛm de Aabel aɣet riɛm de Dhakaria, raan ci nɔk e kaam de yin de lam keke luaŋdiit e Nhialic: wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Abi thieec tede rem de enɔɔne.
Amawoou ne week, wek bany ke loŋ! we ci mukihaar de ŋinydekaŋ jɔt; wegup wek ken lɔ ɣot, ku kɔc wen, an, lek ɣot, acak ke peen.
Na wen, te lueel en kake, ke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku Parithai ke ke gɔl ater ne yen aret, ku themki luɔi bi kek e tɔ jam ne kajuec:
acik buuth, luɔi bi kek e cak thok ne ke lueel, ke bik lɔ gaany.
Ɣɔn aci kuut ke kɔc jɔ gueer, kuut cii raan ke dueer leu e kuɛn, arek abi kɔc kecok aa kac, ke jɔ jam gɔl keke kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Yak rot tht e luɔu de Parithai, yen aye aguk nu e raan yac.
Acin ke ci kum, ke cii bi liep nɔm; ku acin ke ci moony, ke cii bi ŋic.
Yen ka, kerieec cak lueel tecol ebɛn abike piŋ teɣer; ku ke cak tuom e raan yin e ɣoot yiic thin abi guiir e rol dit e ɣoot niim.
Ku wek yɔɔk, wek mathki, yan, Duoki e riɔɔc e kɔc nak kɔc gup abik thou, ku acin daŋ bik bɛ leu.
Ku we ba nyuoth raan ba wek aa riɔɔc e yen: Yak riɔɔc ne raan e kɔc kɔn nɔk abik thou, na ele, ke de riɛl bi en ke cuat e giɛnayin; yeka, wek yɔɔk, yan, Yak riɔɔc ne yen.
Amɔr kadhic cike e ɣaac e miliim kaarou? ku acin tok e keek toŋ ee Nhialic moor nɔm.
Acakaa nhim gup nhim ke weniim acike kueen kedhie. Duoki riɔc: wek war amɔɔr juec ne piath.
Wek yɔɔk aya, yan, Raan ebɛn raan e ya gam e kɔc niim, yen abii Wen e raan gam aya e tuuc ke Nhialic niim:
ku raan e ya jai e kɔc niim, yen aba jai e tuuc ke Nhialic niim.
Ku raan ebɛn raan e Wen e raan lɛk jam rac, ka dueere pal en: ku raan e Weidit Ɣer laat acii dueere pɔl.
Ku te ye kek week bɛɛi e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic ku bany niim bany e loŋ guiir, ku bany e kɔc cieŋ, ke we duoki e diɛɛr ne wel bak bɛɛr, ku ne ke bak lueel:
Weidit Ɣer abik we wɛɛt e thaar mane guop ne ke bak dhil lueel.
Na wen, ke leke raan toŋ de kut e kɔc en, yan, Bɛny, lɛke wanmaath, buk ka cii waada nyaaŋ piny tek.
Go lueel, yan, Ŋadi, eeŋa ci a tɔ ye bɛnyduon e luk ku ye bɛny e week tɛk kaŋ?
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Yak rot tiŋ, ku tiɛtki rot ne kɔɔr e kajuec; juec de ka nu raan cin acii en ke e piir.
Go keek lɛk kaaŋ, yan, Raan ci bany anu raan ci pinyde luɔk aret;
ago cat e yepiɔu, yan, Eeŋo ba looi, nɔn cin en te ban kakien ci luɔk taau, thin?
Go lueel, yan, Aba looi ale: Adhɛɛnki aba ke ŋaany, aguɔ ka war keek yik: ku ja kakien ci luɔk kedhie taau thin ayi weuki.
Ku yɛn bi piɔndi yɔɔk, yan, Piɔndi, kakuon juec acike tɔɔu bik run juec lɛɛr; jɔ lɔŋ tei, ye cam, ku ye dek, aba piɔu aa miɛt.
Na wen, ke yook e Nhialic, yan, Yin dhɔn, elewakɔu weiku abike cɔɔl tede yin: ku kakuon ci guik bi guɔ aa ka ke ŋa?
Raan ee rot kuɛt weu juec, ku cie bany e ka ke Nhialic, yen acit eraane.
Na wen, ke yook kɔckɛn e piooce, yan, Yen a yɔɔk ɛn week, yan, Duoki e diɛɛr e weikun ne ke bak aa cam; ku duoki e diɛɛr e wegup, ne ke bak aa cieŋ.
Wei aditki awarki kecam, ku guop apiɛth awar lupɔ.
Wɔiki gɛk col, aciki e pur, ku aciki e tem; ku acinki ɣondɛn e rap ayi adhaan; ku aye Nhialic ke caam: ŋuan ŋuaan wek e diɛt yindi?
Ku eeŋa ne weyiic raan dueer bɛɛrde ŋuak e kaam tok ne diɛɛr wen ee yen diɛɛr?
Na caki ye bi leu ayi te ciɛk en aa luɔi koor, ke eeŋo ya wek diɛɛr ne luɔi kɔk kedhie?
Wɔiki agurbiok cil ciil kek: acin luɔi yek looi, ku acin alɛɛth yek wii; ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Acakaa Tholomon keke dhueeŋde ebɛn aken rot piɔth cit tok ne kake yiic.
Ku na ye Nhialic wɛl roor piɔth ale, wɛl tɔu roor ekoole, ku na miak ke cuɛte mɛɛc; ke cii we bi piɔth e pioth war piothden aret, wek kɔc dɛk e gam?
Ku duoki ke bak aa cam e kɔɔr, ayi ka bak aa dek, ku duoki e diɛɛr e wepiɔth.
Kake kedhie aye juɔor ke piny nɔm ke kɔɔr: ku aŋic Wuoordun nɔn ba wek dhil dɛ kake.
Yak ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic kɔn kɔɔr, ku kake abike juɛk week kedhie.
Du riɔc, yin luny koor: anu e Wuoordun piɔu luɔi bi en we miɔɔc e ciɛɛŋ.
Ɣaacki ka cath ne week, ku miacki kɔc kuany nyiin; yak rot luɔi kith cii bi dhiap, yak weu kuot paannhial weu cii bi thok, te cin cuɛɛr bi ɣeet tethiɔk, ku te cin kɔm bi ke riɔɔk.
Te nu weukun, yen abi piɔndun nu thin aya.
Yak tɔu ke we duoot yiic, ku dɛp mɛckuon e alath;
ku wegup yak reer cit kɔc tit bɛnyden, dhuny bi en enɔm a dhuny e thieekic; na ele, bi ku tɔɔŋ ɣot thok, ka bik dap liep en enɔnthiine.
Thieithieei liimke, liim bii bɛny yok ke ke tit kaŋ, kool bi en bɛn: wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Abi eyic duut, ku jɔ ke tɔ nyuc ten ee cam, ago bɛn ku yin ke kecam.
Ku na bi te ci piny dit, ku te kiiuwe ajith, ku yok keek aya, thieithieei hiimke.
Ku jaki kene ŋic, yan, Tee bɛny de ɣot ŋic thaar bi cuɛɛr bɛn thin, adi ci yin, ku cii ɣonde pal a thur kɔu.
Ku week, yak rot coc aya; Wen e raan abɔ e thaar kuocki.
Go Petero thieec, yan, Bɛnydit, kaaŋe lɛke wook, ku lɛke kɔc kedhie ayadaŋ?
Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Eeŋa ye raan tit dhien, raan adot ku de nɔm, raan bii bɛnyde taau e dhiende nɔm, bi kɔc aa tɛk kecam ekooldɛn ci lueel?
Thieithieei lime, lim bii bɛnyde yok ekool bii yen, ke looi aya.
Wek lɛk yic, yan, Abi jɔ taau e kake niim kedhie.
Ku na jam lime e yepiɔu, yan, Bɛnydi aci gaau e bɛnde; ago wɛɛt liim gɔl e dui ayi duet liim, ku ye cam ku ye dek ku ye rot tɔ wit mɔu;
ke bɛny de lime abi bɛn ekool kene ye tiit, ku ne thaar kuc, ku jɔ dui aret, ago mat keke kɔc reec gam.
Ku lim waan ŋic kede piɔn e bɛnyde, ku cii rot e coc, ku cii kede piɔn e bɛnyde e looi, yen abi dui e wɛt juec:

ku raan ci kede piɔn e bɛny kuc, ku ci kaŋ looi ka roŋ e luɔi bi ye dui, yen abi dui e wɛt lik. Raan ebɛn raan ci yien kajuec, abi thiec kajuec; ku raan ci kɔc kuɛi kajuec, en abik thiec kajuec awar kɔc kɔk.
Yɛn e bɔ ba mac bɛn cuat e piny nɔm; ku dɛ piɔu ŋo, te ci e guɔ kooth?
Ku yɛn de baptinh bi a dhil baptith e ye; ku yɛn ci rok alal te ŋoot en ke ken kɔn thok!
Luɛlki nɔn ba yɛn ba mat bɛn bɛɛi e piny nɔm? Wek yɔɔk, yan, Acie yen; ater en a bɛɛi:
gɔl enɔɔne, kɔc kadhic abik keyiic tek ɣon tok, diak abik dɛ ater ne rou, ku rou ne diak.
Wun meth abi dɛ ater ke wende, ku bi wende dɛ ater ke wun; ku man duet keke nyande, ku nyande keke man; ayi man mony e duet keke tiiŋ de wende, ku tiiŋ de wende keke man monyde.
Ku yook kɔc aya, yan, Te tieŋ wek luat ke tul ten ee akɔl lɔ piny, ke wek ayak dap lueel, yan, Deŋ abɔ; ago bɛn.
Ku te pute yom ke ye wowic, ke wek ayak lueel, yan, Piny abi tuoc: ago tuoc.
Wek kɔc de yac aguk, wek ee tenhial ŋic ayi piny tau bi ke tɔu; ku eeŋo kuoc wek ekoole tau bi en tɔu?
Ku eeŋo ca wek loŋ e guiir apiɛth wapac ayadaŋ?
Na lɔ we raan de ater ke yin e bɛny nɔm, ke yi them mat weke yen kueer; ke cii yi bi thɛl e bɛny e loŋ guiir nɔm, ago bɛny e loŋ guiir yi yien cawic, ku bi cawic yi cuat e aloocic.
Yin yɔɔk, yan, Yin cii bi bɛn bei, te ŋoot yin ke yi ken kaŋ cool kedhie, ayi niiliim.
Ku ade kɔc e nu etɛɛn ekoole guop kɔc e lek Yecu ne kede kɔc ke Galili, kɔc waan cii Pilato riɛmden liaap keke kakɛn cik lam ku nakki ke.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Wak rac kɔc ke Galilike, warki kɔc ke Galili kedhie, luɔi ci kek ka cit ekake yok?
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Acie yen; ku te kɛn wek wepiɔth puk, ke we bi thou wedhie cit man e kek.
Ayi kɔcke kathieer ku bɛt, kɔc waan ci alooc baar nu Thiloam wiik e keniim, ago ke nɔk, wak rɛcki awarki kɔc rɛɛr e Jeruthalem kedhie?
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Acie yen; ku te kɛn wek wepiɔth puk, ke we bi thou wedhie cit man e kek.
Na wen, ke luel kaaŋe aya; yan, Ŋadi ade ŋaap ci com domde; na wen, ke bɔ bi mithke bɛn kɔɔr, ku acin ke ci yok.
Ku jɔ raan e luui e domic yɔɔk, yan, Tiŋ, run kadiak yɛn ee mith bɛn kɔɔr tede ŋaape, ku acin ke ca yok; yiɛpe wei; eeŋo kum en piny youyou?
Go bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Bɛny, bɛye pɔl a tɔu e run toŋe aya, aba wec thar, aguɔ yiek thar war:
aa le luɔk, ka piɛth: na ken luɔk, ka ba jɔ yiɛp wei.
Ku aa weet kɔc ɣon tok e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic ekool e thabat.
Ku ade tiiŋ nu etɛɛn, di, tiiŋ cath ke jɔŋ e ye tɔ kɔc guop e run kathieer ku bɛt, ku acii jɔk tot kɔu, ku aci ekɔu e leu e jot.
Na wen, aci Yecu ye tiŋ, ke jɔ cɔɔl, yook, yan, Tiiŋe, yin ci lony e jɔŋdu.
Go ecin thany e yeguop: na wen, e tethiine, ke jɔ yekɔu ric, ago Nhialic leec.

Go bɛny de ɣon e Nhialic gɔth, luɔi ci Yecu raan tɔ dem ekool e thabath, ku jɔ bɛɛr, yook kɔc, yan, Akool kadhetem anuki kool dueere kɔc ke luui thin: yak bɛn e akoolke yiic bi we bɛn tɔ dem, ku duoki e bɛn ekool e thabath.
Go Bɛnydit puk nɔm, yook, yan, Yin raan de yac aguk, raan ebɛn e weyiic cii miɔɔrde e lony ayi mulde ten ee yen rem thin ekool e thabath, ku jɔ thɛl wiir le dek?
Ku na tiiŋe, nyan e Abraɣam, nyan cii Catan mac, di, e run kathieer ku bɛt, cii dueere lony e jonh mɛc en ekool e thabath?
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke kɔc de ater ne yen ke ke jɔ yaar: go kɔc piɔth miɛt kedhie ne ka ci looi ka deyiic dhueeŋ kedhie.
Go lueel, yan, Cit ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ŋo? ku ba thɔŋ ŋo?
Acit nyin toŋ de matharda, ci raan noom, ku cuɛt e domdeyic; ago cil, abi aa tim dit; ku jɔ diɛt nhial aa reer e keerke niim.
Go bɛ lueel, yan, Ba ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic thɔŋ ŋo?
Acit luɔu cii tik noom, ku jɔ taau e akop wacic, cit aduuk kadiak, aɣet te bi en tuak ebɛn.
Go pɛɛnydit caath yiic ayi bɛi yiic, ke jɔ cath ke weet kɔc, ke lɔ Jeruthalem.
Go raan tok thieec, yan, Bɛnydit, kɔc bi kony wei, kek iik? Go ke yɔɔk, yan,
Yak cok e thɛm wek en aret luɔi ba wek teek e kalthok thoŋ kooric: wek yɔɔk, yan, kɔc juec abik lɔ thin kɔɔr, ku aciki bi leu.

Rial, te ci bɛny de ɣot rot guɔ jɔt ku jɔ ɣot thiook thok, ku we bi jɔ kɔɔc biic, ku taŋki ɣotthok, ku luɛlki, yan, Bɛnydit, Bɛnydit, liepe wo ɣot; ku abi bɛɛr, yook week, yan, Wek kuoc te ba wek thin;
ku bak jɔ lueel, yan, Wok aa ye cam ku yok dek e yinɔm, ku yin aa ye weet e kuɛɛrkuɔ yiic;
ku abi lueel, yan, Wek yɔɔk, yan, Wek kuoc te ba wek thin; jalki e yalɔɔm, wek kɔc e kerac looi wedhie.
Te ca week Abraɣam tiŋ, ku tieŋki Yithak, ku Jakop, ku nebii kedhie, e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic, ku wegup ku ci we ciɛɛc biic, ke dhieeu abi nu keke ŋeny de lec.
Ku kɔc abik bɛn ten ee akɔl thok bɛn ku biki ten ee akɔl lɔ piny, ku rut, ku wowic, bik ku nyucki e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic.
Ku tieŋki, ade kɔc nu cieen enɔɔne kɔc bi lɔ tueŋ, ku de kɔc nu tueŋ enɔɔne kɔc bi lɔ cieen.
Na ɣɔn, ekool mane guop, ke kɔc kɔk e Parithai ke ke bɔ, bik ku yookki, yan, Nyai, jel etene: Kerod ade piɔu luɔi bi en yi nɔk.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Laki, yɔɔkki awantui, yan, Tiŋ, yɛn ciec jɔɔk rac ku ja kɔc tɔ dem ekoole ku miak, ku na ekool ee kek diak ke yɛn e guɔ thok.
Ku yɛn bi dhil cath ekoole ku miak ku miak ruu: acin nebi dueer thou roor ku cii thou e Jeruthalem.
Jeruthalem oou, Jeruthalem oou, paan e nebi nɔk, ku biook kɔc ne kur kɔc ci tuoc yin; ee nin kadi can piɔu dɛ kum kuom ɛn mithku, cit man ee ajith mithke kum e yewuok, ku acak rɛɛc?
Tieŋki, ɣondun aci nyaaŋ week ke yaar: ku wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, We cii a bi bɛ tiŋ, aɣet kool ba wek e lueel, yan, Thieithieei raan bɔ ne rin ke Bɛnydit.
Na ɣɔn, ke lɔ ɣon e bɛny tok e bany ke Parithai yiic, le cam e kuin ekool e thabath, ku jɔki toom guop.
Ku ade raan tɔu e yenɔm, di, raan ci bɔɔt guop.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, thieec bany ke loŋ ku Parithai, yan, Ci pal kɔc, an, bik kɔc tɔ dem ekool e thabath?
Goki lɔ lik. Na wen, ke noom, tɔ dem, ku tɔ jel.
Ku jɔ pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Eeŋa ne weyiic, raan de muul ayi miɔɔr, na loony yiith, ke cii bi dap mieet bei ekool e thabath?
Agoki welke cuo leu e beer.
Na wen, ke jɔ kɔc wen ci cɔɔl lɛk kaaŋ, wen ci en keek tiŋ, acik tepiɛth ee reer lɔc; yook keek, yan,
Te ci raan yi cɔɔl e thieekic, ke yi du nyuc tepiɛth; na ele, lɔ raan diit e yin cɔɔl,
ku jɔ raan e cɔl week bɛn, bi ku yook yin, yan, Nyai, pate raane; ke yin bi jɔ yaar, ku jɔ lɔ nyuc kec ya.
Ku na cɔl raan yin, ke yi jɔ nyuc kec; na ele, lɔ raan wen e cɔl yin bɛn, ke jɔ yi yɔɔk, yan, Math, ba tepiɛth: ke yin bi lɛc yok e kɔc niim kɔc rɛɛr ne yin etok tede cam.
Raan ebɛn raan e ro tɔ dit abi tɔ koor; ku raan e ro kuɔɔr piny, yen abi tɔ dit.
Go raan wen cɔl en yɔɔk, yan, Te looi yin kecamdit ayi miak ayi theen, ke yi du mathku cɔl, ayikɔc raan wek, ayi kɔc rɛɛr wek etok kɔc ci bany; ke ke cii yi bi bɛ cɔɔl, cuutki yin.
Ku te looi yin kecamdit, ke yi cɔl kɔc kuany nyiin, ku ŋol, ku kɔc e kɔm, ku coor:
ke yin bi jɔ thieei; ne luɔi cin kek ke bi kek yi cuoot: yin bi cuoot tei ekool e jonerot e kɔc piɛthpiɔth.
Na wen, ke raan tok e kɔc wen rɛɛr ne yen etok tede cam, te ci en ekake piŋ, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Thieithieei raan bi kuin cam e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Ŋadi aci kecamdit looi; ku jɔ kɔc juec cɔɔl:
na wen, aci kool e cam guɔ bɛn, ke toc limde le kɔc wen ci cɔɔl lɔ yɔɔk, yan, Baki; kaŋ acik guɔ thok kedhie.
Goki kethook mat ne kɔc bi kek rot kɔc. Aci raan tok lueel, yan, Yɛn e dom piac ɣɔɔc, ka ba dhil lɔ tiŋ. Yin laŋ, an, Pal ɛn.
Ku jɔ raan daŋ lueel, yan, Yɛn e mioor ɣɔɔc kathieer, bik aa luui, rene pei ku rene pei, ku yɛn lɔ la keek them: yin laŋ, an, Pal ɛn.
Ku be daŋ lueel, yan, Yɛn ci tiiŋdi thiaak, en aca yɛn dueer lɔ.

Go lim lɔ bɛn ku jɔ bɛnyde lɛk kake. Go bɛny de ɣot gɔth, ku yook limde, yan, Dap lɔ biic lɔ kuɛɛr ke panydit kuɛɛr dit yiic ku kuɛɛr kor yiic, lɔ bɛɛiye kɔc kuany nyiin etene, ku ŋol, ku kɔc e kɔm, ku coor.
Na wen, ke jɔ lim lueel, yan, Bɛny, welkuon wen aca ke looi, ku ɣot aŋoot ke dakic.
Go bɛny lim yɔɔk, yan, Jel lɔ e ciɛɛr yiic ku kɛl kɔɔth, ku dhil ke thel abik dhil bɛn, ke ɣondi abi thiaŋ.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Acin raan toŋ de kɔc ca kɔn cɔɔl bi kecamdi thieep.
Ku cath kuut dit ke kɔc ne yen: go rot puk, yook keek, yan,
Na bɔ raan tede yɛn, ku cii wun man, ku cii man man, ku mithke, ku mithekɔcken, ku nyiirekɔcken, yeka, acakaa weike guop ayadaŋ, ka cii dueer aa raandien e piooce.
Ku raan cii timdɛn ci riiu nɔm e ɣaac, ku jɔ yɛn aa kuany cok, ka cii dueer aa raandien e piooce.
Eeŋa ne weyiic, raan de piɔu luɔi bi en aloocdit baar yik, ke cii bi kɔn nyuc piny, ke jɔ weu bi kɔɔr kueen, nɔn de weu cath ne yen bi en ke ye thol?
Na ken e looi, ke miak, te cien alooc kiɛɛr piny, ku ken leu ne thol, ka bii kɔc geet, kɔc ci e tiŋ, luelki,
yan, Raane aci aloocditt baar gɔl e yik, ku aken bɛn leu e thol.
Ku ye malikou, te de yen piɔu luɔi bi en tɔŋ yien malik daŋ, ke cii bi kɔn nyuc piny, ago yenɔm cat, nɔn dueer en lɔ keke agum de kɔc kathieer le tɔŋ yien bɛny cath ke agum de kɔc kathierou?
Ku na ci e dhal, te ŋoote bɛny daŋ ke mec, ke jɔ kɔc tɔɔc lek mat thieec tede yen.
Yen acit week aya, raan ebɛn e weyiic raan cii kake pal kedhie, ka cii dueer aa raandien e piooce.
Amilɔ yen apiɛth: ku te ci amilɔ jɔ liɛɛr, ke bi bɛ wac adi?
Acii piɛth ke dɔm, ku cii piɛth e toŋ e dhien; aye kɔc cuat wei tei. Raan de yith ee yen ke piŋ, ke piŋ.
Na ɣɔn, ke kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut keke kɔc e kerac looi ke ke jɔ rot cuot te nu yen bik bɛn piŋ.
Na wen, ke Parithai keke kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ke ke jɔ ŋun e keyac, luelki, yan, Raane ee kɔc e kerac looi dɔm tɔ ke ye kɔcke, ku ye cam ke keek etok.
Go keek lɛk kaaŋe, yan,
Ee raanou e weyiic, raan de thok kabɔt, na mar tok e keyiic, ke cii thierdheŋuan ku dheŋuan bi nyaaŋ roor, ku jɔ ke ci maare lɔ kɔɔr, aɣet te bi en e yok?
Na ele, te ci en e yok, ke jɔ taau e yeyeth, ke ye piɔu miɛt.
Ku na ci ɣet bei, ke jɔ mathke cɔɔl ku kɔc rɛɛr e yen etok, ku lek keek, yan, Jaki piɔth miɛt ne yɛn etok; yɛn e thɔkdien wen ci maar yok.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Miɛtepiɔu abi dit paannhial aya ne biak de raan tok raan e kerac looi, ku be yepiɔu puk, awar miɛt mite kɔc piɔth ne biak de kɔc kathierdheŋuan ku dheŋuan kɔc cin puŋdepiɔu kɔɔrki.
Ku ye tiiŋou, tiiŋ de riet kathieer, ku na mɛɛr rial tok, ke cii manyealath bi kooth, ku jɔ ɣot napic, ago cok e kɔɔr en en aɣet te bi en e yok?
Na ele, te ci en e yok, ke jɔ mathke cɔɔl keke kɔc rɛɛr ne yen etok, ku lueel, yan, Jaki piɔth miɛt ne yɛn etok; yɛn e rial wen ca mɔɔr yok.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Yen abi ciet miɛt ee kɔc piɔth miɛt e tuuc ke Nhialic niim ne biak de raan tok raan e kerac looi, ku be yepiɔu puk.
Go lueel, yan, Ade raan nu raan de wɛɛtke kaarou:
na wen, ke mɛnh koor jɔ wun yɔɔk, yan, Waar, game yɛn biak bi lɔɔk aa biakdi e weuku yiic. Go keek tɛk weuke.
Na leer akool like, ke mɛnh koor jɔ weuke kut kedhie, ku jɔ jal keny paan mec, go weuke lɔ thiai wei etɛɛn ne thueec thueec en e kaŋ.
Na wen, aci weuke thol kedhie, ke cɔŋdit jɔ tuol epinye; go kake jɔ dak.
Go lɔ ku mɛt rot e raan lɔɔm raan toŋ de epinye; go tɔ lɔ e dumke yiic le kudhuur aa tiit.
Ku aa de piɔu aret luɔi bi en eyac aa thiɔɔŋ ne thel ee kudhuur cam: ku acin raan e ye miɔɔc.
Na wen, aci nɔm jɔ bɛn, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Kɔc e luui e weu tede waar yekdi, kɔc e kuɛth e kuin ku yek kɔk both, ku yɛn, yɛn thou wo cɔk!
Yɛn bi rot jɔt, la tede waar, la ku luɛɛl, yan, Waar, yɛn e kerac luoi Nhialic, ku luoi yin kerac aya:
yɛn cii be roŋ ne luɔi bi a cɔl wendu: tɔ ya cit raan toŋ e luui e weu tede yin.
Go rot jɔt, bi tede wun. Na wen, ke tiŋ wun ke ŋoot ke mec, go piɔu kok ke ye, ku jɔ kat, le ku kuɛk yeth, ku ciim.
Go wende lueel yan, Waar, yɛn e kerac luoi Nhialic, ku luoi yin kerac aya, ku yɛn cii be roŋ ne luɔi bi a cɔl wendu.
Go wun liimke yɔɔk, yan, Bɛɛiki lupɔ piɛth alaldiite, ku taauki e yekɔu; ku bɛɛiki guelɔ kede yencin, ku war ka ke yencok:
ku jaki miɔɔr a lɔ jot bɛɛi bei miɔɔr cuai, ku nakki; buk cuet, ku jɔku piɔth miɛt:
wendiene aa ci thou, ku e bɛ piir enɔɔne; aa ci maar, ku aci jɔ yok. Goki piɔth jɔ miɛt.
Ku nu wen tueŋ domic: na wen, aci bɛn, aci thiɔk ke baai, ke piŋ diɛt cɔŋe ke lɔɔr.
Go mɛnh tok cɔɔl e mith e luui yiic, ku jɔ kake luɔp thar, yan, Ee kaŋo?
Go lueel, yan, Wanmuuth aci bɛn; ku wuur e miɔɔr a lɔ jot nɔk miɔɔr cuai, nɔn ci en e bɛ yok ke piɔl guop.
Go gɔth, ku reec lɔ ɣot; go wun bɛn bei, bi ku lɛŋ.
Go bɛɛr, yook wun, yan, Tiŋ, yin ca luooi e run juecke cit man e lim, ku acin keduon ca kɔn wooc anandi, ku acin nyɔŋ thiin ci gam ɛn ecaŋɣɔn, ban piɔu miɛt woke mathki.
Ku enɔn ci wenduone bɛne, wen ci weuku thiai wei keke akɔɔrroor, ke jɔ nak miɔɔr a lɔ jot, miɔɔr cuai.
Go lueel, yan, Wendi, yin rɛɛr we yɛn e akooinyiin, ku kaki kedhie ee kaku.
Ee kepiɛth yen dɔl dɔl wok ku mitku piɔth: wanmuuthe aci thou, ku jɔ bɛ piir, aci maar, ku beye yok.
Go kɔckɛn e piooce bɛ yɔɔk aya, yan, Ade raan nu raan juec e kake, ku aci raan taau e dhiende nɔm; ku raane aci gɔny bɛnyde, yan, ci kake thiai wei.
Go cɔɔl, ku yook, yan, Ee kaŋo ekene ke ca piŋ tede yin? kuɛne ya ka ke luɔiduon e dhien; yin cii bi bɛ aa raan nu e dhiendi nɔm.
Go raan nu e dhien nɔm lueel e yepiɔu, yan, Ba ŋo looi? bɛnydi abii ya bei e dhien nɔm: yɛn cii pɔɔr e leu; ku yɛn dueer yaar e lip.
Yɛn ŋic ke ba looi, ke bi kɔc ɛn aa nyuooc e ɣootken, miak, te ci a cieec e dhien nɔm.
Go kɔc cɔɔl kedhie, kɔc wen cath e ka ke bɛnyde; na wen, ke thiec raan bɔ tueŋ, yan, Cathe we ka ke bɛnydi kadi?
Go lueel, yan, Alogoor ke miok kabɔt. Go yook, yan, Nom awarekdu, ku dap nyuc piny, ku jɔ thierdhic gɔɔr.
Ku jɔ daŋ thieec, yan, Ku yin, cathe we di? Go, yan, Cuɛl ke agamɔ kabɔt. Go yɔɔk, yan, Nom awarekdu, ku jɔ thierbɛt gɔɔr.
Go bɛnyde raan rac nu e dhiende nɔm leec, ne luɔi ci en luui ne pɛl: wɛɛt ke piny de enɔɔne ayek wɛɛt ke ɣɛɛrepiny woor ne pɛl e remdenic.
Ku wek yɔɔk, yan, Yak rot kɔɔr mathkun ne weu rɛc ke piny nɔm; na rial, aci kakun dak, ka bik week nyuooc ɣoot ɣoot bi tɔu athɛɛr.
Raan e kalikkaŋ ŋiec dot, yen aye kajuec ŋiec dot ayadaŋ: ku raan e kalikkaŋ kuoc dot, yen aye kajuec kuoc dot ayadaŋ.
Ku na kɛnki weu ke piny nɔm ŋiec aa dot kek weu rac, ke eeŋa bi we kuɛi weu yith?
Ku na kɛnki kede raan daŋ ŋiec aa dot, ke eeŋa bi we gam kedun guop.
Acin raan dueer bany luooi kaarou: nɔn bi en tok maan, ku nhiɛɛr tok; ku nɔn bi en lɔ kuakkuak keke tok, ku tɔ tok cin naamde. Wek cii Nhialic dueer luooi ku luɔɔiki weu ayadaŋ.
Go Parithai, kɔc nhiaar weu, goki kake piŋ kedhie; ku jɔki geet guop.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, We ye rot tɔ ye kɔc piɛthpiɔth e kɔc niim; ku Nhialic aŋic wepiɔth tei: ke de naamde tede kɔc ee kenhiany tede Nhialic.
Loŋ ku nebii aake nu aɣet ɣɔn bii Jɔn; na wen, aci bɛn, ke jɔ ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic aa guieer kɔc, go raan rot riɛɛny thin ebɛn.
Jel bi tenhial jal ayi piny, en ee kepiɔl, ne luɔi dueere cook thiin toŋ de loŋ maar.
Raan pɔk ke tiiŋde, ku jɔ daŋ thiaak, ka ye lɔ ke tiiŋ lci; ku raan thiak tiiŋ ci pɔk ke monyde, ka ye lɔ ke tiiŋ lei.
Raan anu raan juec e kake, ku ye lupɔ thiith amujuŋ cieŋ, lupɔ piɛth lɔ mot, ku ye cam e kamit ku ye reer ke ye adhuɛŋ e akoolnyiin kedhie.
Ku ade raan kuany nyin cɔl Ladharo, raan e ye taau e kalde thok, ku ye guop thiaŋ ke tetok,
ku ye kɔɔr luɔi bi ye muk ne kak athueithuei wen e loony piny te wen ee raan cuai cam: ku jɔk ayek bɛn aya, bik ku nyanki ɣaantok nu e yeguop.
Na wen, ke raan kuany nyin thou, ku jɔt e tuucnhial leerki e Abraɣam yɔu. Ku jɔ raan cuai thou aya, go thiɔk;
na wen, te reer en paan e kɔc ci thou, ke ye leeŋ wei, ku jɔ enyin jɔt, go Abraɣam tiŋ temec, ku tiŋ Ladharo e yeyɔu.
Go coot, lueel, yan, Waada Abraɣam, kok piɔu we yɛn, ku jɔ Ladharo tooc, bi cin nɔm bɛn juɔɔl e piu yiic, bi liemdi tɔ lir; yɛn e leeŋ wei e manyeyic.
Go Abraɣam lueel, yan, Wendi, cate yinɔm, waan piir yin, yin e kepiɛth yok, ku yok Ladharo karac; ku enɔɔne aci duut piɔu, ku yin dhiau piɔu.
Ku pal cooke, daŋ anu, tethuth diit laauwic aci taau e kaamda ne week; ago kɔc wen, an, bik teek ke ke lɔ tede week, agoki cuo leu; ku cii kɔc e leu aya, kɔc wen, an, bik jal etɛɛn, bik tede wook.
Go bɛ lueel, yan, Yin ja lɔŋ, Waar, yan, ba tuɔɔc dhien e waar;
wɛɛtemathkuɔ anuki kadhic; toc abi aa caatɔ bi ke lɔ cok e yook en ke, ke ke cii bi bɛn etene aya, te ye kɔc leeŋ wei thin.
Go Abraɣam lueel, yan, Adeki Mothe ku nebii; tɔ ke piŋ keden.
Go lueel, yan, Ei, Abraɣam waar: ku na de raan toŋ e kɔc ci thou yiic lɔ tede keek, ka bik kepiɔth puk.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Na reecki kede Mothe piŋ ayi nebii, ka cike bi tɔ gam, acakaa raan tok yen e jɔt rot e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Go kɔcpiooce yɔɔk, yan, Ka ye kɔc tɔ wac kaŋ abik dhil bɛn: ku amawoou ne raan e keek tɔ bɔ!
Adueer ŋuan tede yen, te mɛce yeyeth pii ee guar, ku deenye wiir, ne luɔi bi en toŋ de miththiike tɔ wac kaŋ.
Yak rot tiit: na lui mɛnhkui yin kerac, ke jany; ku te puk en epiɔu, ke pal.
Ku te lni en yin kerac raandherou ekool tok, ku be rot pɔk yin raandherou, yan, Yɛn ci apiɔu puk; ka ba dhil pɔl.
Go tuuc Bɛnydit yɔɔk, yan, Ŋuak gamda nyin.
Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Na thoŋ gamdun keke nyin toŋ de mathada, ke we dueer ŋaape yɔɔk, yan, Tɔ rot wuthe bei weke meeidu, ku tɔ rot pith wiir; ku adueer kedun gam.
Ku eeŋa ne weyiic, raan de lim e pur, ku nɔn ee yen thok tiit, ke bi yɔɔk, te ci en bɛn domic, yan, Dap bɛn, nyuc piny ku came?
Ku cii bi kɔn yɔɔk, yan, Guik ke ba cam, ku jɔ yiyin duut, yinne ya kecam, ba cam ku dɛk: na ele, ke yin bi jɔ cam ku dɛke?
Bi liime yɔɔk, yan, Thieithieei, luɔi ci en ka ci lɛk en looi? Acie yen.
Yen acit week aya, na cak kakun thol kedhie, ka ci lɛk week, ke jaki lueel, yan, Wok ee liim cin naamda tei: kedan, an, buk dhil looi acuk looi tei.
Na wen, ale Jeruthalem, ke jɔ Thamaria reetic ayi Galili.
Ku te ci en ɣet paan tok, ke jɔ rɔm ke roor kathieer, roor de gup wɛth, ke ke kaac temec:
ku cotki e rol dit, yan, Yecu, Bɛnydit, kok piɔu we wook.
Na wen, aci ke tiŋ, ke yook keek, yan, Laki, nyuothki rot bany ke ka ke Nhialic. Na wen, aleki, ke ke jɔ dem kueer.
Go raan tok e keek, te ci en e tiŋ nɔn ci en dem, ke puk enɔm cieen, ke lec Nhialic ne rol dit,
ku jɔ piny ciim e Yecu cok, go lueel, yan, Thieithieei: ku ye raan e Thamaria.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Kek kathieer kenki dem? ku kɔc kadheŋuan akou?
Cin raan ci rot yok, raan bi enɔm puk bi Nhialic bɛn lɛc nɔm, ee raan lɛɛne tei?
Go yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot, lɔ tei: gamdu aci yi tɔ piɔl.
Na wen, aci Parithai en thieec, yan, Bi ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic bɛn nɛn? ke jɔ bɛɛr, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic acii bi bɛn ke kɔc e ke daai e ye.
Ku aciki bi lueel, yan, Yeki ene! ku, yan, Yeka etɛɛn! tieŋki, ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic anu e weyiic.
Go kɔcpiooce yɔɔk, yan, Akool abik bɛn, kool ba wek piɔth dɛ tiŋ tieŋ wek kool toŋ de akool ke Wen e raan yiic, ku acaki bi tiŋ.
Ku we bii kɔc yɔɔk, yan, Yeki ene! ku, yan, Yeka etɛɛn! duoki lɔ e kecok, ku duoki ke kuany cok.
Acit man e wiledeŋ ee wil nhial biak a le gut nhial biak tɛɛn; yen abi aa tau de Wen e raan ne koolde.
Ku abi kajuec dhil kɔn guum, ku abii rem de enɔɔne rɛɛc.
Ku acit man ɣɔn tɔuwe kaŋ e akool ke Noa, yen abi ciet tau bi kaŋ tɔu aya e akool ke Wen e raan.
Aa yek cam, ku yek dek, ku yek thieek, ku yeke thiaak, aɣet kool ɣɔn le Noa e abeiic, ku jɔ amool bɛn, bi ku nɛk keek kedhie.
Ku yen aye tau de kaŋ e akool ke Lot aya; aa yek cam, ku yek dek, ku yek ɣooc, ku yek kaŋ ɣaac, ku yek com, ku yek yik;
ku kool e jele Lot e Thɔdom, kool mane guop, ke mac lony nhial keke thiilpur, bi ku nɛk keek kedhie:
acit tau mane guop en abi kaŋ tɔu ekool bi Wen e raan ro nyuɔɔth.
Ekoole, ke raan nu e ɣot nɔm, ku tɔu weuke ɣoot, e cii bɔ piny, bi ke bɛn jɔt: ayi raan nu domic, e cii enɔm dhuny cieen aya.
Yak weniim tak e tiiŋ de Lot.
Raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en weike kony, ka bi ke mɔɔr; ku raan mar weike, ka bi ke kony.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Wɛɛrwakɔuwe, abi dɛ kɔc kaarou ci tɔc e laŋarep tok nɔm; tok abi jɔt, ku nyieeŋe tok piny.
Abi dɛ diaar kaarou dieer guar etok; tok abi jɔt, ku nyieeŋe tok piny.
Abi dɛ kɔc nu domic kaarou; tok abi jɔt, ku nyieeŋe tok piny.
Goki bɛɛr, thiecki, yan, Ee tenou, Bɛnydit? Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Te nu ke ci thou, yen aye te bi cuɔɔr guɛɛr thin.
Go keek lɛk kaaŋ, ke kɔc e ke bi dhil aa cool e lɔŋ, ku ciki e bap;
lueel, yan, Bɛny e loŋ guiir anu panydiit tok, bɛny cii Nhialic e rieu, ku cii kɔc e theek aya:
ku nu tiiŋ cin nɔm moc e panydiite; na wen, ke bɔ te nu yen, bi ku lueel, yan, Kony ɛn ne raan cam ɛn.
Go kɔn yok ke reec: na ɣɔn, ke jɔ lueel e yepiɔu, yan, Ciɛk, an, ca Nhialic e rieu, ku ca raan e theek aya;
ku ne baŋ de jun wen ee tiiŋe ya jut, ka ba kony tei, ago a cuo be jut ne bɛn wen ee yen cool e bɛn.
Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Piɛŋki ke lueel bɛny rac, bɛny e loŋ guiir.
Ku cii Nhialic kɔckɛn ci lɔc bi kony, kɔcke guop, kek kɔc e cool e cɔl en akool ku wakɔu, acakaa yen e cool e gum kaŋ ne keden?
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Abi ke dap kony. Ku na Wen e raan, te bi en rial, bi gam yok e piny nɔm?
Go kaaŋe bɛ lɛk kɔc kɔk kɔc wen e rot ŋɔɔth, yan, piɛthki piɔth, ku yek kɔc kɔk tɔ ye kɔc rac:
yan, Kɔc kaarou acik lɔ luaŋdiit e Nhialic, lek lɔŋ; tok ee raan e Parithai, ku tok ee raan e atholbo tɔ kut.
Go raan e Parithai kɔɔc nhial ku jɔ lɔŋ ale e yepiɔu, yan, Nhialic, yin lɛc nɔm, nɔn can cit kɔc kɔk, kɔc e kaŋ rum, kɔc e kɔc cam, kɔc e dieer lei kɔɔr, ku ca cit raane aya, raan e atholbo tɔ kute.
Yɛn ee cam rɛɛc e akool kaarou e akool kadherou yiic, ku yin aa miɔɔc ne kaki kedhie ne toŋ wen thieer kek.
Go raan e atholbo tɔ kut kɔɔc temec, ku reec enyin jat nhial, ku jɔ yepiɔu biɔɔk, ku lueel, yan, Nhialic, kok piɔu we yɛn, yɛn ee raan e kerac looi.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Raane aci yenɔm dhuony paande, ke ci tɔ piɛthpiɔu awar raan wen: raan ebɛn raan e rot tɔ dit abi tɔ koor: ku raan e rot kuɔɔr piny abi tɔ dit.
Na wen, ke ke bii miththiiakaŋ tede yen aya, bi ke bɛn jak gup: ku te ci kɔckɛn e piooce e tiŋ, ke ke jɔki jɔɔny.
Go Yecu ke cɔɔl, ku lueel, yan, Palki miththiiakaŋ e ke bɔ te nuo yɛn, ku duoki ke pen: ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ee kede kɔc cit keek.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Raan reec ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic noom cit man e mɛnhthiinakaŋ, ka cii bi lɔ thin etaitai.
Go thieec e bɛny tok, yan, Bɛny piɛth bɛny e weet, eeŋo ba looi ke ban piir athɛɛr lɔɔk lak?
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Eeŋo e yin a tɔ piɛth? acin raan toŋ piɛth nu, ee Nhialic etok.
Yin ŋic cok ke loŋ, yan, Du dieer lei e kɔɔr, du ye nak, du ye kual, du ye ya caatɔ alueeth, ye wuur rieu ayi moor.
Go lueel, yan, Cokke aca ke ya dot kedhie ɣɔn aa yɛn meth aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Na wen, aci Yecu kake piŋ, ke jɔ yɔɔk, yan, Ee tok tei yen ŋoot ke dak yin. Jɔ kaku ɣaac kedhie, ku tɛke ke kɔc kuany nyiin, ke yin bi dɛ weu paannhial: ku jɔ bɛn, kuany acok.
Ku te ci en ekake piŋ, ke dhiau piɔu aret: luɔi juece kake aret.
Na wen, aci Yecu dhien dhiɛɛu en piɔu tiŋ, ke jɔ lueel, yan, Lɔ bi kɔc juec e kaken lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic, ee keril oou!
Teek bi thɔrol teek e hipɔ nyin, yen ee kepiɔl, ne luɔi bi raan juec e kake lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic.
Go kɔc wen cii kake piŋ goki thieec, yan, Ka ye ŋa dueere jɔ kony wei?
Go lueel, yan, Kak e kɔc dhal aye Nhialic ke leu.
Ku jɔ Petero lueel, yan, Tiŋ, wo e kaŋ nyaaŋ piny kedhie, ku kuanyku yicok.
Go lɛk keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan, Acin raan ci ɣot pɔl, ku pɛl wun ku man, ku mithekɔcken, ku tik, ku mith, ne biak de ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic,
ku cii kajuec bi yok e pinye nɔm enɔɔne, awarki kakɛn ci pɔl, ku miak ne piny bi bɛn, ke jɔ piir athɛɛr yok.
Na wen, ke cɔl kɔcke kathieer ku rou, ku yook keek, yan, Tieŋki, wo lɔ Jeruthalem, ku kaŋ kedhie ka ci gɔɔr e nebii ne kede Wen e raan abike thol e luɔi.
Abi yien Juoor, ku abi geet guop, ku lɛɛte, ku ŋuute guop:
ku abik dui, ku jɔki nɔk abi thou: go rot bɛ jɔt ekool ee kek diak.
Ku acin cook toŋ cik yokic ne kake yiic: jame aci mɔny keek, agoki ka ci lueel cuo ŋic.
Na wen, aci thiɔk ke Jeriko, ke yok cɔɔr a rɛɛr e kueer kec ke lip:
ku jɔ kut e kɔc piŋ a tek, go thiec, yan, Ee kaŋo?
Goki yɔɔk, yan, Yecu de Nadhareth yeki teke.
Go coot, yan, Yecu Wen e Dabid, kok piɔu we yɛn.
Go jɔɔny e kɔc wen cath tueŋ, yan, Mim; go ŋuak e cɔt, yan, Wen e Dabid, kok piɔu we yɛn.
Na wen, ke Yecu kaac, ku jɔ kɔc yɔɔk, an, Bɛɛiki: ku te ci en bɛn tethiɔk, ke thieec, yan,
Eeŋo nu e yipiɔu, ke ba luoi yin? Go lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, ee luɔi ban bɛ yin yen akaar.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Yiene: gamdu aci yi kony.
Go dap yin enɔnthime, ku jɔ kuany cok, ke lec Nhialic: go kɔc ebɛn, te ci kek e tiŋ, goki Nhialic leec.
Na wen, ke lɔ ku reet Jerikoyic.
Ku ade raan, di, raan cɔl Dhakayo, ku ye bɛny e kɔc e atholbo tɔ kut, ku ye raan juec e weuke.
Ku akɔɔr e yepiɔu luɔi bi en Yecu tiŋ nɔn ee yen raan yindi; ku acin luɔi dueer en e tiŋ e baŋ de kut e kɔc, ne ciɛk cek en.
Go kat, ke lɔ tueŋ, le ku kɛɛc e ŋaap nɔm, ke bi tiŋ: luɔi kɔɔr en teek etɛɛn.
Na wen, aci Yecu ɣet etɛɛn, ke jɔ nhial iieec, go tiŋ, ku yook, yan, Dhakayo, dap bɛn piny; yɛn bi dhil reer ɣondu ekoole.
Go dap kɛɛc piny, ku jɔ loor ke mit piɔu.
Na wen, acik e tiŋ, ke ke ŋun e keyac kedhie, luelki, yan, Aci rot lɔ tɔ ye kaman e raan e kerac looi.
Go Dhakayo rot jɔt, ku yook Bɛnydit, yan, Tiŋ, Bɛnydit, biak toŋ de kaki aba yɛn ke kɔc kuany nyiin miɔɔc; ku na de kede raan daŋ ca noom ne goony elueth, ka ba bɛ cuoot e ŋuan.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Kunydewei aci bɛn e ɣone ekoole, luɔi ee yen wen e Abraɣam aya.
Wen e raan aa bɔ bi ke ci maar bɛn kɔɔr, ku bi bɛn kony wei.
Na wen, apiŋki welke, ke jɔ jam ŋuak lek keek kaaŋ, luɔi ci en thiɔk ke Jeruthalem, agoki lueel, e kepiɔth, yan, bi ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic dap tuol.
Ago lueel, yan, Ade bɛny ci keny paan mec, le lupɔ noom etɛɛn, bi aa malik cieŋ piny, ku bi yenɔm bɛ lɔ dhuny.
Na wen, ke cɔl liimke kathieer, ku gɛm keek jinii kathieer, go keek yɔɔk, yan, Ɣaacki keek aɣet te ban lɔ bɛn.
Ku amɛɛn kɔc ke paanden, goki kɔc tuɔɔc e yecok, kɔc bi e lɔ lueel, yan, Wo cii raane kɔɔr luɔi bi en wo cieŋ.
Na wen, aci enɔm dhuny, ke ci aa malik cieŋ piny, ku jɔ kɔc yɔɔk, an, bi himke cɔl en, kɔc waan ci yien weu, ke bi ke cik yok e ɣooc ŋic, raan ebɛn.
Go lim tok kɔn bɛn tueŋ, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, jinidu aci jinii bɛɛi kathieer.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Apiɛth, yin ee lim piɛth: nɔn ci yin kethiinakaŋ ŋiec dot, ke yin bi aa bɛny ceŋ pɛɛnydit kathieer.
Na wen, ke iim ee kek rou jɔ bɛn, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, jinidu aci jinii bɛɛi kadhic.
Go mɛnhe yɔɔk aya, yan, Yin aya yin bi aa bɛny ceŋ pɛɛnydit kadhic.
Na wen, ke lim daŋ bɔ, bi ku lueel, yan, Bɛny, tiŋ, jinidu ki, aca duut e lupɔ ku taau;
yɛn e riɔɔc e yin, luɔi ee yin raan rilic, yin ee kaŋ kuany ka kɛne taau piny, ku yin ee kaŋ tem ka kɛne com.
Go yɔɔk, yan, Ne welkuon ci lueel, kek aban ke loŋdu guiir, yin ee lim rac. Yin ci a ŋic nɔn aa yɛn raan rilic, nɔn aa yɛn kaŋ kuany ka kɛn taau piny, ku nɔn aa yɛn kaŋ tem ka kɛn com:
eeŋo ken yin weuki yien kɔc e kaŋ kan, na enɔɔn can bɛne, ka di ca kaki yok acike nyin ŋuak?
Go kɔc kaac etɛɛn yɔɔk, yan, Namki jini tede yen, ku gamki raan wen de jinii kathieer.
Goki lueel, yan, Bɛny, acath ke jinii kathieer.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Raan cath ke kaŋ abi miɔɔc; ku raan cin ke cath ke yen, acakaa ke cath ke yen abi noom tede yen.
Ku jaki kɔcke bɛɛi kɔc de ater ne yɛn, kɔc waan reec ɛn, yan, ca bi aa malik bi keek cieŋ, bɛɛiki ke ku nakki ke e yanɔm.
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke lɔ e keniim tueŋ, kuany kueer lɔ Jeruthalem.
Na wen, aci thiɔk ke Bethpagi keke Bethani, ne kuurdiit cɔl kuur e Olip, ke jɔ kɔckɛn e piooce tooc kaarou,
ku lueel, yan, Laki paan nu e weniim tueŋ; ku te ca we lɔ thin, ke we bi mɛnh e muni yok ke mac, mɛnh cin raan ci kɔn cath e yekɔu: luɔnyki, ku bɛɛiki etene.
Ku na de raan thieec week, yan, Eeŋo luɔnyki yen? ka bak pɔk nɔm en ale, yan, Ee luɔi kɔɔre Bɛnydit en.
Go kɔc wen ci tooc lɔ, lek ku yokki ke cit man wen ci e lueel.
Na wen, an, lonyki ye, ke ke jɔ kɔc de mɛnh e muul thieec, yan, Eeŋo luɔnyki mɛnh e muul?
Goki lueel, yan, Ee Bɛnydit en a kɔɔr en.
Goki bɛɛi tede Yecu: ku jɔki lupɔɔken cuat e mɛnh e muul kɔu, ku tɛɛuki Yecu e yekɔu.
Na wen, te ciɛth en, ke ke jɔ lupɔɔken aa thiɛth piny kueer.
Ku te ci en guɔ thiɔk ke panydit, ku ci ɣet e kuur e Olip thar, ke kut diit e kɔcpiooce ebɛn ke ke jɔ piɔth miɛt ku lecki Nhialic e rol dit ne baŋ de luɔi dit ebɛn luɔi cik tiŋ;
luelki, yan, Thieithieei Malik bɔ ne rin ke Bɛnydit! E mat tɔu paannhial, ku tɔu dhueeŋ tenhial ya!
Go kɔc kɔk ke Parithai nu e kut e kɔc yiic, goki lueel, yan, Bɛny, jany kɔckuon e piooce.
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Wek yɔɔk, yan, Te miime kɔcke, ke kɔi gup adueerki coot enɔnthiine.
Na wen, aci guɔ thiɔk, ke woi panydit, ku jɔ dhiau,
lueel, yan, Tee yi ci ka ke mandu guɔ ŋic oou, yin guop, ekoolduone yoou! ku enɔɔne, acike guɔ thiaan e yinyin.
Akool abik bɛn tede yin, akool bi kɔc dɛ wek ater yi geeu ne rek, agoki yi tuɔɔk, ku jɔki yi pɛn lɔ biic e wut kec ebɛn,
ku abik yi rai piny aba nɔm kit we piny, yin weke niithkuon nu e yiyic; ku acin kuur toŋ bik nyaaŋ piny e kuur daŋ nɔm e yiyic; luɔi kuc yin kool e nɛmduon ci yi neem.
Go lɔ e luaŋdiit e Nhialicyic, le ku cieec kɔc wen e kaŋ ɣaac thin, ayi kɔc wen e kaŋ ɣɔɔc;
ku yook keek, yan, E gɔɔr, yan, Luaŋdi ee luaŋ e lɔŋ: ku week, acak tɔ ye ɣon e cuɛɛr.
Go kɔc aa wɛɛt e luaŋditic e akool nyiin. Ku banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr ku kɔc dit e kɔc yiic akɔɔrki naŋ bi kek e nɔk.
Ku acin ke cik yok ke bik looi: kɔc ebɛn ayek gɛɛk e yelɔɔm, ke ke piŋ welke.
Na ɣɔn, ekool tok e ninke yiic, te weet en kɔc luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ku guiir welpiɛth, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ke ke jɔ bɛn ne roordit etok,
bik ku luelki, yan, Lɛke wook, ee riɛlou ee yin ekake looi? ku eeŋa eraan e gɛm yin eriɛle?
Go pɔk nɔm keek, yan, Ku yɛn aya, we ba thiec cook tok; ku abak bɛɛr:
yan, Baptinh e Jɔn, e bɔ nhial, ku e bɔ tede kɔc?
Goki keniim cat kapac, yan, Te lueel wok en, yan, Aa bɔ nhial; ka bi lueel, yan, Eeŋodaŋ kɛn wek e gam?
Ku na luelku yen, an, Aa bɔ tede kɔc; wo bii kɔc biɔɔk e kɔi kedhie: luɔi ci kek Jɔn gam egɔk, yan, ee nebi.
Goki bɛɛr, yan, Akucku te e bi en thin.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Ayi yɛn aya, we ca lek riɛl luɔɔi ɛn ekake.
Na wen, ke jɔ kɔc lɛk kaaŋe: yan, Raan anu raan ci dom com, dom de tim mit cɔl enap, ago kuɛi kɔc bi en aa tiit, ku jɔ keny paan mec e pɛi juec.
Na wen, aci pɛɛi e luɔk e tiim bɛn, ke jɔ lim tok tuoc kɔc e dom tiit, yan, bik miɔɔc ne ka ci luɔk e dom e tiimic: go kɔc e dom tiit goki dui, ku jɔki cieec, ke cin ke muk.
Go lim daŋ bɛ tooc: agoki dui aya, ku lɛɛtki aret, ku jɔki cieec, ke cin ke muk.
Go daŋ bɛ tooc, goki dui abik yiek tetok, ku jɔki cuat e dom kec.
Na wen, ke jɔ bɛny de dom lueel, yan, Eeŋo ba looi? wendien nhiaar aba tooc: abi dɛ te bi kek e rieu te tiŋ kek en.
Ku te ci kɔc e dom tiit e tiŋ, ke ke jɔ kethook mat, yan, Wen bi kaŋ lɔɔk lak ki: bak nakku, ke ke bi lɔɔk lak bi aa keda.
Goki cuat biic e dom kec, ku jɔki nɔk. Bi bɛny de dom ke jɔ luoi ŋo?
Abi bɛn hi kɔc e dom tiite bɛn nɔk, ku jɔ dom yien kɔc kɔk. Na wen, acik e piŋ, ke jɔki lueel, yan, Tɔ peen Nhialic en ekene.
Go keek woi, ku lueel, yan, Kene ee kaŋo ke ci gɔɔre, yan, Kuur cii yiik rɛɛc, Yen mane guop aci tɔ ye kuur e aguk nɔm?
Raan ebɛn raan bi lony e kuure nɔm abi dhuɔŋ; ku raan bi kuure loony e yenɔm, ka bi mot abi ciet abuui!
Ku banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr akɔɔrki luɔi bi kek e dɔm e thaar mane guop; ee riɔɔc riɔɔc kek e kɔc tei: aŋicki nɔn e lueel en kaaŋe ne keden.
Goki tht, ku jɔki neem tooc, kɔc bi rot kɔc tɔki rot e kɔc piɛth, bik jamdɛn bi wooc bɛn jɔt, agoki yien mudhiir, le loŋde guiir.
Goki thieec, yan, Bɛny e weet, yin ŋicku nɔn e yin kaŋ lueel apiɛth ku wɛɛte kɔc apiɛth, ku cii kɔc e kuany yiic, ku ye kɔc wɛɛt e kueer e Nhialic ne yin.
Ci pal wook, an, buk Kaithar kuot atholbo, ku cie ye?
Go rueenyden ŋic, ku yook keek, yan, Eeŋo thɛm wek ɛn?
Nyuothki yɛn rial tok. Ee raanou ci gɔɔr e yekɔu, ayi rinke? Goki bɛɛr, yan, Ee Kaithar.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Yak Kaithar yinn ka ke Kaithar, ku yak Nhialic yien ka ke Nhialic.
Ku akenki leu ne jon bi kek jame jɔt e kɔc niim: acik gai ne beer ci en e bɛɛr, ku jɔki mim.
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk ke Thadokai ke ke jɔ bɛn tede yen, kek kɔc wen e jai, yan, acin jon bi kɔc rot jɔt nu; bik ku thiecki,
yan, Bɛny e weet, aci Mothe gaar wook, yan, Te ci manhe e raan thou, ku de nɔm tik, ku thou ke cin meth, ke manhe abi reer keke thŋde, dhieeth manhe nɔm.
Kɔc anuki kadherou wɛɛt ke raan tok: ku jɔ wendit tik thiaak, ago thou ke cin meth.
Na wen, ke wen lɔ e yecok jɔ reer keke tiiŋde, ku jɔ thou ke cin meth.
Go wen ee kek diak jɔ reer keke yen; ayi wɛɛt cieen kedhie ayadaŋ: ku acin mith cik nyaaŋ piny, ku jɔki thou.
Na wen, ke tik look thou e kecok cieen aya.
Na enɔɔne, ekool e jonerot e kɔc, ke tiiŋe bi aa tiiŋ e ŋa e keyiic? aci reer ke keek kadherou.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yook keek, yan, Mith ke pinye nɔm ayek thieek, ku yeke thiaak:
ku kɔc bi tɔ ye kɔc roŋ ne ɣet bi kek ɣet pinytui, ku yokki jonerɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, aciki bi aa thieek, ku cike bi aa thiaak:
ku ciki dueer bɛ thou aya: acik thoŋ e tuucnhial; ku ayek wɛɛt ke Nhialic, wɛɛt ke jonerot.
Ku jon ee kɔc ci thou jɔt, en aci Mothe nyuoth week ne gaardɛn ɣɔn gɛɛr ne kede tim cek, ɣɔn ci en Bɛnydit tɔ ye Nhialic de Abraɣam, ku Nhialic de Yithak, ku Nhialic de Jakop.
Acie Nhialic de kɔc ci thou, ee Nhialic de kɔc piir: kɔc kedhie apiirki ne yen.
Go kɔc kɔk e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr goki bɛɛr, yan, Bɛny e weet, yin e loŋ tiiŋ nɔm.
Na wen, ke ke jɔ riɔɔc ne thiec bi kek e bɛ thiec kaŋ.
Go ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo lueele kɔc en, yan, Kritho ee wen e Dabid?
Ku aci Dabid guop lueel ne awarek de Thaamic, yan, Bɛnydit aci Bɛnydiendit yɔɔk, yan, Nyuc e ciin cuenydi,
Aɣet te ban kɔc de ater ne yin tɔ ye ken ee yin yicok dhɔɔr.
Aye Dabid tɔ ye Bɛnydit, ku jɔ aa wende adi?
Na wen, ke yook kɔckɛn e piooce abi kɔc piŋ kedhie, yan,
Yak rot tiit e kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, kɔc kɔɔr cath ke ke ceŋ lupɔɔ bar, ku nhiaarki thiec ee koc rot thiec e thuk yiic, ku nhiaarki ɣaan piɛth e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic ayi ɣoot ke kecam yiic;
ku yek ɣoot ke dieer cin niim roor cam yiic, ku yek lɔŋ e lɔŋ baar thiɛɛn kek kerɛɛcden: kedɛn tuc bik yok kek ekɔcke abi dit.
Na wen, ke liec nhial, ku jɔ kɔc juec e weuken tiŋ ke ke cuɛt kaken te wen ee ye Nhialic miɔɔc.
Ago tiiŋ tok tiŋ aya tiiŋ kuany nyin cin nɔm moc, ke cuɛt weu thiiakaŋ kaarou thin, ka cit niiliim.
Go lueel, yan, Wek lɛk eyic, yan, Tiiŋ kuany nyine tiiŋ cin nɔm moc aci kaŋ cuat thin awar kɔc kedhie:
kɔcke kedhie acik kaŋ cuat ten ee Nhialic miɔɔc ne juec e weuken: ku thŋe ne kuany wen kuɛɛny en nyin aci kedɛn bi en piir cuat thin ebɛn.
Na wen, a jam kɔc kɔk e kede luaŋdiit e Nhialic, kieer ci e kur e kur ci lak ku ka ci kɔc gam Nhialic, ke jɔ lueel, yan,
Na kake ka wɔiki, akool abik bɛn, kool bi ke dhuoor piny, ka cin kuur toŋ bi bɛ tɔu e kuur daŋ nɔm.
Goki thieec, yan, Bɛny e weet, bi kake jɔ tic nɛn? Ku bi kɔc akool ŋic ne ŋo kool kɔɔr ekake tuol?
Go lueel, yan, Yak rot tiit, ke we cii bi math: kɔc juec abik bɛn ne rinki, bik ku luelki, yan, Ya ki! ku, yan, Piny e guɔ thiɔk! Duoki ke kuany cok.
Ku te ya wek tɔɔŋ piŋ ayi awenwen e kɔc, duoki piɔth e pau: kake abik dhil kɔn tic; ku thok bi kaŋ thok aŋoot.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Jure abi tɔŋ yien jure, ku yin paane tɔŋ paane:
ku piny abi rot niɛŋ tɛɛn ku tɛɛn, ku bɔ cɔŋdit ku jɔɔk e kɔc thol; ku ka ye kɔc tiŋ agoki riɔɔc abik nu ayi kagook bɔ nhial.
Ku te ŋoote kake wei, ke we bii kɔc dɔm, ku yɔŋki week, ku leerki week e ɣoot ke Nhialic yiic, ku tɛɛuki week e aloc yiic, ku we bi aa bɛɛi e mahik niim ku bany niim ne biak de rinki.
Ku abi rot pɔk week ago aa caatɔdun.
Yen aa wek loŋ dhek e wepiɔth, ke we cii bi diɛɛr e wepiɔth ne beer ba wek aa beer:
we ba gam thook pɛlenɔm, ke koc de ater ne week ke ke cii beer beer kek kedun bi leu, ayi teer teer kek ne week aya.
Ku we bi kɔc e dhieth week nyiɛɛn, ku nyiin mithekɔckun week, ayi kɔc raan e week, ayi mathkun; ku kɔk ne weyiic abike tɔ nak abik thou.
Ku we bii kɔc maan kedhie ne biak de rinki.
Ku acin nhiem toŋ de wekniim bi maar.
We bi weikun yok ne guom aa wek kaŋ ŋiec guum.
Ku na tieŋki Jeruthalem aci tuɔɔk e rɛm ke tɔŋ, ke jaki ŋic nɔn ci riaakde thiɔk.
Ekoole, e kɔc nu Judaya e ke kɔt leki e kurdit niim, ku kɔc nu baai e ke jel lek biic; ku kɔc nu rɛɛr ya e ke cii be lɔ thin.
Akoolke ee akool ke guur, kool bi kacigɔɔr thol e luɔi kedhie.
Ku amawoou ne dieer liac ku dieer thuat e akoolke! jiɛthepiɔu abi dit e piny nɔm, ku tɔu agonhdit e kɔcke yieth.
Ku abike nɔk e abatau, ku pecke leereke e Juoor yiic ebɛn: ku Jeruthalem abi kacic e Juoor, a thooke run ke Juoor.
Ku kagook abik tic e akɔl nyin, ku pɛɛi nyin, ku kuɛl nyiin; ku ne piny nɔm jiɛthepiɔu abi nu e juoor yiic, ku mumenɔm, abapdit abi awuoou de apiɔɔk a maŋ thin;
kɔc abik wei miɛt ne riɔɔc, ku diɛɛr ee kek diɛɛr ne ke bɔ e piny nɔm; karil nu tenhial abike niɛŋ.
Na ele, ke kɔc abik Wen e raan tiŋ a bɔ e luatic ke cath ke riɛldit ku dhueeŋ dit.
Ku te ci kake rot gɔl e bɛn, jaki nhial lieec, ku jatki weniim; wɛɛrduon bi we wɛɛr bei ee guɔ thiɔk.
Go keek lɛk kaaŋ: yan, Wɔiki ŋaap, ayi tiim kedhie:
te ci kek guɔ nyok, ke jaki tiŋ aguɔki ŋic gup nɔn ci ruel thiɔk.
Yen a ba wek thiɔk ci ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic thiɔk ŋic aya, te tieŋ wek kake abɔ.
Wek yɔɔk eyic, yan Rem de enɔɔne acii bi thok, te ŋoote kake ke ke ken thok e bɛn kedhie.
Tenhial ku piny abik liu, ku welki aciki bi liu ananden.
Yak rot tiit, ke we cii piɔth bi aa thiaŋ ne kajuec yak cam, ku win ee mɔu we wit, ku diɛɛr ne ka ke piir enɔɔne, ke we cii ekoole bi mook ethiau:
ku acit man dhie dɔme lɛi e wien yen abi ekoole kɔc mook kedhie ethiau kɔc rɛɛr e tiɔp nɔm ebɛn.
Yen aa wek rot tiit, ku yak cool e lɔŋ e akooinyiin kedhie, ke bi we tɔ ye kɔc e roŋ ne luɔi ba wek poth e ka bi bɛne kedhie, aguɔki kɔɔc e Wen e raan nɔm.
Ku ye kɔc wɛɛt luaŋdiit e Nhialic akol; na theen, ke ye lɔ biic le nhi e kuur e Olip.
Go kɔc aa rieel miak etɛɛn kedhie bik tede yen luaŋdiit e Nhialic, bik kede bɛn piŋ.
Ku aliith e knin cinic luɔu aci thiɔk, ahith cɔl Winythok.
Go banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr goki ke bi kek e nɔk kɔɔr; acik riɔɔc e kɔc.
Na wen, ke Catan lɔ e Judath piɔu, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Yithkariɔt, ku ye raan toŋ e kɔc kathieer ku rou yiic.
Go lɔ le jam guiir keke bany ke ka ke Nhialic ku bany ke alathkeer, ne nyiin bi en e nyien keek.
Goki piɔth miɛt, ku matki kethook, an, bik gam weu.
Go keden gam, ku jɔ kool piɛth kɔɔr kool dueer en e nyien keek te hiuwe kut e kɔc.
Na wen, ke akool e kuin cinic luɔu bɔ, kool bi nyɔŋ de Winythok dhil nɔk.
Go Yecu Petero tooc keke Jɔn, yan, Lak guiekki wook ka ke Winythok, buk lɔ cuet.
Goki thieec, yan, Ee tenou kɔɔr e yipiɔu te bi wok guik thin?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Tieŋki, te ca wek lɔ panydit, ke we bi rɔm ne mony ɣɛɛc tony e piu; jaki kuany cok ɣon bi en lɔ thin.
Ku we bi raan de ɣot yɔɔk, yan, Yin thieec Bɛny e weet, yan, Nu ɣon e kamaan tenou, ɣon bi wo Winythok lɔ cuet thin woke kɔckien e piooce?
Ku abi we nyuoth ɣondiit nu nhial ɣon deyic kaŋ: jaki guik thin.
Goki lɔ, ku yokki ke cit man wen ci en e lɛk keek; goki ka ke Winythok guik.
Na wen, aci thaar ee cam bɛn, ke jɔ nyuc, ku nyuc tuuc kathieer ku rou ne yen etok.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Aa ya cok e kaar ɛn en e yapiɔu ne luɔi bi wok Winythok cuet woke week etok, te ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya ken kaŋ guɔ guum:
wek yɔɔk, yan, Yɛn cii bi bɛ cuet e ye eliŋliŋ, te ŋoot en ke ken guɔ thok e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicyic.
Na wen, ke nom biny, ku leec Nhialic, ku lueel, yan, Namki kene, bak tɛk rot.
Wek yɔɔk, yan, Yɛn cii bi bɛ dek ne mith ke enap, te ŋoote ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ke ken bɛn.
Na wen, ke nom knin ci pam, ku leec Nhialic, ku wɛɛkic, ku yin keek, lueel, yan, Guopdi ki, guopdien ci gam ne baŋdun week; yak kene looi ne taŋ ba wek weniim aa tak ne yɛn.
Ku te ci kecam thok, ke jɔ looi aya ne biny, ku lueel, yan, Binye ee loŋ ci piac mac ne riɛmdi, riɛm bi kueer ne baŋdun week.
Ku tieŋki, ciin e raan nyiin ɛn anu e pam e cam nɔm keke ciindi etok.
Wen e raan alɔ eyic, cit man ci e kɔn lueel, an, bi dhil lɔ: ku amawoou ne eraane raan bi e nyiɛɛn!
Ku jɔki rot luɔp, yan, Eeŋa ne woyiic raan bi kene looi?
Go ater rot cak e keyiic, yan, Ee raanou bi tɔ dit e woyiic.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Mahik ke Juoor ayek kɔc cieŋ, ku bany e kɔc cieŋ ayeke tɔ ye adhueŋ.
Ku week, we cii bi ciet keek; ku raan e dit e weyiic ne ye ciet mɛnh koor: ku raan e ya bɛny, ka bi ya ciet raan e kɔc luooi.
Ku eeŋa dit, raan e reer ten ee cam, ku ye raan e kɔc luooi? cie raan e reer ten ee cam? ku yɛn ee tɔu e weyiic cil cit raan e kɔc luooi.
Ku week, di, wek ee kɔc ee cool e tɔu ne yɛn etok e themdien ci a themic;
ku wek yien ciɛɛŋ, cit man e ci e yien ɛn e Waar,
bak aa cam ku dɛkki e pamdi nɔm e ciɛɛŋdiyic; ku we bi aa reer e thony niim ku guiɛɛrki loŋ de dhien ke Yithrael kathieer ku rou.
Na wen, ke lueel Bɛnydit, yan, Thimon, Thimon, tiŋ, Catan aci we kɔɔr aret luɔi bi en we noom, bi we kiic cit man e agamɔ:
ku yɛn ci lɔŋ ne biakdu, ke gamdu cii bi dak: ku yin, te ci yin yipiɔu guɔ puk, ke yi rit mithekɔckun piɔth.
Go lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, te mɛce wo wo yin etok e aloocyic, arek te ciɛk wok thou etok, ke yɛn dueer gam.
Go lueel, yan, Yin yɔɔk, Petero, yan, Ajith acii bi kɔn kiu ekoole, te ŋoot yin ke yi ken a jai raandiak, yan, Akuoc.
Na wen, ke ke thieec, yan, Waan tuɔɔc ɛn week ke cin kuth e weu, ku cin athep e kecam, ku cin war, de ke ci we bɛn dak? Goki, yan, Acinkedaŋ.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ku enɔɔne, raan de kuth e weu, ke noom, ku nom athep e kecam aya: ku raan cin nɔm abatau, ke ɣɔɔc lupɔde, ɣoc en rot abatau;
wek yɔɔk, yan, Cooke, cook ci gɔɔr ne kedi, aŋoot ke bi dhil thok e yaguop, cook ci lueel, yan, Aci mat keke kɔc e loŋ dhɔŋic etok: ka ke yɛn adeki thokden aya, thok bi kek thok.
Goki lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, tiŋ, abatɛɛu ki, kaarou. Go lueel, yan, E loi.
Na wen, ke lɔ biic, le kuur e Olip, cit man ee yen cool e lɔ; ku kuɛny kɔckɛn e piooce cok aya.
Ku te ci en ɣet etɛɛn, ke ke jɔ yɔɔk, yan, Laŋki, ke we cii bi lɔ e themic.
Ago rot mɛɛc ke keek te dueer raan cuoop te dɛɛny en kɔɔi; go emiɔl tuk, ku lɛŋ,
yan, Waar, na nu e yipiɔu, ke yi nom binye tede yɛn; ku acie kede piɔndi tei, tɔ loi e kede piɔndu.
Go tunynhial tuol tede yen, ke bɔ nhial, bi ye bɛn riit piɔu.
Na wen, aci piɔu jiɛth aret, ke jɔ lɔŋ aret awar man awen: arek abi tucde aa thuat cit man e rim dit kɔɔth ke ke loony piny.
Na wen, aci rot jɔt tedɛn e lɛŋ en, ke jɔ bɛn tede kɔcpiooce, ku yok keek anin ne jiɛth wen ci kek piɔth jiɛth;
go ke yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo nienki? jatki rot, laŋki, ke we cii bi them.
Ku te ŋoot en ke jam, di, ke kut e kɔc e ke bɔ, awɛt raan cɔl Judath keek, ee raan toŋ de kɔc kathieer ku rou; ku jɔ ɣet te nu Yecu le ciim.
Go Yecu thieec, yan, Judath, nyiɛɛne Wen e raan ne ciem?
Na wen, aci kɔc nu e yelɔɔm ke bi lɔɔk tic tiŋ, ke jɔki thieec, yan, Bɛnydit, buk kip e abatau?
Go raan tok e keek go lim de bɛnyditt tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic kiɛp yic wei, yiny cuec.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Jaki pɔl e pek aya. Na wen, ke jiɛk yin, tɔ dem.
Go Yecu banydit ke ka ke Nhialic thieec ku thieec bany ke luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ku roordit, kɔc wen bii tɔŋ tede yen, yan, Cak bɛn biic cit man e ka yin tɔŋ cuɛɛr, ke we muk tɔɔŋ ku thieec?
Waan aa yɛn cool e reer woke week luaŋdiit e Nhialic, wek e ken a dɔm: apiɛth, thaardun ki ekene, ku ye riɛl e cuɔlepiny.
Na wen, ke dɔmki, ku thelki, leerki ɣon e bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic. Go Petero lɔɔk kuany cok ke mec.
Na wen, ke kɔc e ke koth mac e gɔɔlic cil, ku jɔki nyuc etok, go Petero lɔ nyuc e keyiic.
Na wen, ke tiŋ nyan tok e mac nɔm ku jɔ toom guop aret, go lueel, yan, Raane aa cath ke yen aya.
Go jai, yan, Tik, ee raan kuoc.
Na wen, etethiine, ke tiŋ raan daŋ, go lueel, yan, Yin ee raan toŋden aya. Go Petero jai, yan, Mɔny, yɛn cie raanden.
Na wen, te cit thaar tok, ke ŋɛk e raan daŋ, yan, Ee yic, raane aa ye cath ke yen; e luɔi ee yen raan e Galili.
Go Petero lueel, yan, Mɔny, yɛn kuc ke luel. Na wen, aŋoot ke jam, ke ajith jɔ guɔ kiu enɔnthiine.
Go Bɛnydit rot puk, woi Petero. Go Petero yenɔm tak e wel ke Bɛnydit, ne lek ci en e lɛk en, yan, Te ŋoote ajith ke ken kiu ekoole, ke yin bi a jai raandiak.
Go lɔ biic, le dhiau e dhien kec.
Na wen, ke kɔc muk Yecu ke getki guop, ku duiki.
Agoki kum nyin, ku jɔki yup nyin, ku thiecki, yan, Luel: eeŋa raan e yup yin?
Ku lɛɛtki arac ne wel juec kɔk wel rac.
Na wen, aci piny guɔ ru, ke yan e roordit jɔ gueer, keke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ayi kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, goki thel leerki e loŋdenic, ku luelki, yan,
Ten ee yin Kritho, ke lɛke wook. Go lueel, yan, Ciɛk, an, lɛke week, ka caki bi gam;
ku te thiɛɛc ɛn week, ka caki bi bɛɛr, ku caki ya pal.
Gɔl enɔɔne, ke Wen e raan abi reer e biak cueny de riɛldiit e Nhialic.
Goki thieec kedhie, yan, Ka yin jɔ ya Wen e Nhialic? Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Ye ka, ke cak lueele.
Goki lueel, yan, Eeŋodaŋ kɔɔr wok caatɔ daŋ? wokgup acuk piŋ e yethok.
Na wen, ke kɔc wen ci gueer e ke jɔt rot, ku biiki e Pilato nɔm.
Ku jɔki gaany, yan, Wo e raane yok, ee jurda thoi nɔm, ee kɔc pɛn luɔi yin kek Kaidhar atholbo, ku ye lueel nɔn ee yen Kritho malik.
Go Pilato thieec, yan, Ye malik de Judai? Go bɛɛr, yan, Yeka, ke ci lueele.
Go Pilato lɛk banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kuut ke kɔc, yan, Acin kerɛɛc ca yok tede eraane.
Goki ŋak nɔm awar man awen, luelki, yan, Ee kɔc riir niim, e weet ee yen kɔc wɛɛt e paan e Judai ebɛn, gɔl e Gahli, aɣet ci ene.
Na wen, aci Pilato ye piŋ, ke jɔ luɔp nɔn ee yen raan e Galili.
Ku te ci en e ŋic nɔn nu yen e ciɛɛŋ de Kerodic, ke jɔ tuoc Kerod, luɔi tɔu en e Jeruthalem e akoolke yen Kerod.
Na wen, aci Kerod Yecu tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu miɛt alal; aa ye kɔɔr e yepiɔu ecaŋɣɔn luɔi bi en e tiŋ, luɔi ci en kajuec piŋ ne kede; ku aŋath luɔi bi en kegok bi looi tiŋ.
Go thieec e wel juec; go cien ke ci bɛɛr.
Ku kaac banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, ke gɔɔnyki aret.
Na wen, ke dhalki guop, yen Kerod keke remdɛn e tɔŋ, ku jɔki geet guop, agoki yiek kɔu lupɔ ci lɔ riauriau, ku jɔki bɛ pɔk nɔm Pilato.
Go Kerod keke Pilato goki jɔ mat kapac ekool mane guop: waan aake de ater ne rot.
Na wen, ke Pilato cɔl banydit ke ka ke Nhialic, ku cɔɔl bany ceŋ piny ayi kɔc kedhie, yan, bik gueer,
ku lek keek, yan, Raane acak bɛɛi tede yɛn, yan, ee raan e kɔc thoi niim: ku tieŋki, aca luɔp e weniim, ku acin kerɛɛc ca yok tede raane ne ka gaany wek en:
acakaa Kerod aya, acin ke ci yok; aci bɛ pɔk nɔm wook; ku tieŋki, acin ke ci looi ke dueer en roŋ ke thuɔɔu.
Aba jɔ dui tei, ku ja pɔl.
(Abi raan tok dhil luony keek ekool e aliithe.)
Goki coot e rol tok, yan, Nyaaiye raane, ku luonye wook Barabath.
Barabath ee raan ci taau e aloocyic ne baŋ de tɔŋ ci yien miric e panyditic, ku ne baŋ de naŋ de raan.
Go Pilato bɛ jam ke keek, akɔɔr luɔi bi en Yecu lony;
goki coot, luelki, yan, Piaate, piaate.
Go keek bɛ yɔɔk raandiak, yan, Ee kaŋo, ee kerɛɛc ŋo ci raane looi? Acin ke ca yok tede yen ke dueere ye nɔk: yen a ban e dui, ku ja lony.
Goki ŋak nɔm e rol dit, ke laŋki, an, bi piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu. Go Pilato tiaam e rolden.
Go loŋ teem, an, bi looi acit man e kedɛn kɔɔrki.
Go raan luony keek, raan waan ci taau e aloocyic ne baŋ de tɔŋ ci yien miric ku naŋ de raan, raan wen kɔɔrki; ku jɔ Yecu yien keek, bik luoi kede piɔnden.
Na wen, athelki ye wei, ke ke dɔm raan cɔl Thimon raan e Kurene, ke bɔ rɛɛr, goki tim ci riiu nɔm taau e yeket, bi ɣaac e Yecu cok.
Ku kuany cok e kut diit e kɔc, ku diaar, dieer biek kepiɔth ku dhieuki.
Go Yecu yenɔm wɛl keek, ku lueel, yan, Wek nyiir ke Jeruthalem, duoki ya dhieu, dhieuki rot, ku mithkun.
Tieŋki, akool abik bɛn, akool bi kɔc yen aa lueel, yan, Thieithieei e dieer ci rol, ku madhieth ken guɔ dhieth, ku thin kene kɔn thuat.
E akoolke abi kɔc kurdit yɔɔk, yan, Wieekki e woniim; ku yookki kur kor, yan, Kuomki wo piny.
Ku na loiki kake e tim tiɔpic, eeŋo bik looi ne tim ci riɛlic?
Ku ade kɔc kɔk kaarou, kɔc ci kerac looi, ke ke thel ne yen etok lɔ ke nɔk.
Na wen, acik ɣet te cɔl Apet, ke jɔki piaat etɛɛn e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, ku pieetki kɔc ci kerac looi, tok e baŋ cuenyde, ku tok e baŋ cam.
Na wen, ke lueel Yecu, yan, Waar, pal keek; ne kuny kuc kek ke loiki. Goki lupɔɔke tɛk rot ne deeny deeny kek gɛk.
Ku kaac kɔc juec e ke daai. Go bany ceŋ piny goki geet guop aya, luelki, yan, Aci kɔc kɔk kony; tɔ kony rot, ten ee yen Kritho de Nhialic, raandɛn ci lɔc.
Ku get guop alathkeer ayadaŋ, acik bɛn tede yen, gɛmki mɔn ci wac,
ku luelki, yan, Ten ee yin Malik de Judai, ke yi kony rot.
Ku ade jam ci gɔɔr e yenɔm nhial, ne gaar de Giriki ku Roma ku Eberu, yan, KENE EE MALIK DE JUDAI.
Na wen, ke raan toŋ de kɔc ci piaat ne yen etok, kɔc ci kerac looi, ke jɔ lat e lɛt rac, ku lueel, yan, Na ye Kritho, ke yi kony rot ku kony wook aya.
Go raan daŋ ci piaat keke yen bɛɛr, jieeny, yan, Kɛne cak riɔɔc e Nhialic, nɔn jiɛɛm yin wuya, ke yin ci ketuc mane yok aya?
Ku ketuc cuk yok wook aci tiiŋ nɔm egɔk; wo ci ke roŋ ke luɔida jɔ yok: ku raane acin kerɛɛc ci looi.
Ku lek Yecu, yan, Bɛnydit, tak yinɔm e yɛn, te ci yin lɔ e ciɛɛŋduyic.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Ekoole ke yin bi nu weke yɛn e Paradeitho.
Na wen, te cit thaar kadhetem, ke mɔɔth bɔ e piny nɔm ebɛn aɣet thaar dheŋuan,
akɔl e maar: ku jɔ lupɔ diit de luaŋdiit e Nhialic yic rɛɛt e ciɛɛlic.
Na wen, ke Yecu cot e rol diit, lueel, yan, Waar, weiki a taau keek e yicin: ku te ci en welke lueel, ke jɔ thook.
Na wen, ke bɛny de nɔm alathkeer kabɔt, te ci en ke ci tic tiŋ, ke lec Nhialic, lueel, yan, Raane ee raan piɛthpiɔu eyic.
Ku kuut ke kɔc kedhie, kɔc wen ci gueer bik bɛn daai e kene, te ci kek ke ci looi tiŋ, ke ke dhuny keniim, ku biakki kepiɔth.
Go kɔc ŋic en kedhie ku dieer waan e ye kuany cok ne Galili, goki kɔɔc temec, ku dɛɛiki ne kake.
Na wen, di, ke raan cɔl Jothep, raan nu e loŋ de kɔc ditic, ku ye raan piɛth ku piɛth e loŋ,
(raan ken loŋden gam ayi luɔidɛn cik looi), ee raan e Arimathayo, panydiit toŋ de Judai, ku yenguop aŋath ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic:
e lɔ tede Pilato en eraane, le ku lip guop de Yecu.
Go bɛɛi piny, ku deer e lupɔ linon, ku jɔ taau e raŋic, raŋ ci wec e kuuric, raŋ cin raan ci kɔn tɔɔu thin.
Ku aa ye kool e guiɛɛk, ku ci kool e thabath thiɔk.
Na wen, ke dieer waan ci bɛn bei e Galili ne yen etok, ke kuanyki cok, ke ke jɔ raŋ tiŋ, ku tiŋki tau ci guopde tɔɔu.
Goki keniim dhuny, lek wɛl ci ŋireŋir guik ku miok. Goki lɔŋ ekool e thabath cit man ci e lueel e loŋic.
Na wen, ekool tueŋ wen e akool dherou, te ci piny ru, ke ke bɔ te nu raŋ, abiiki wɛl wen cik guik wɛl ci ŋireŋir, ku cath kɔc kɔk ne keek.
Goki kuur yok aci laar wei e raŋ thok.
Na wen, acik lɔ thin, goki guop de Bɛnydit Yecu kɛn yok.
Na wen, aŋootki ke ke gai ne kene, di, ke ke tiŋ kɔc kaarou ke ke kaac e kelɔm, aceŋki lupɔɔ lɔ bilbil:
na wen, ke ke pau piɔth, abik kenyin guoot piny, agoki ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo kaar wek raan piir tede kɔc ci thou?
Aliu etene, e rot jɔt: takki weniim ne wel waan ci lɛk week, ɣɔn ŋoot en Galili,
yan, Wen e raan abi dhil yien kɔc rac, ku bi piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, ku bi rot bɛ jɔt ekool ee kek diak.
Goki keniim tak e welke,
ku dhunyki keniim e raŋ nɔm, lek kake kedhie lɛk kɔc kathieer ku tok, ayi kɔc kɔk.
Ee yi Mari Magdalene, keke Joana, ku Mari man Jakop, ku dieer kɔk cath ne keek, kek aa lek tuuc ekake.
Go welken ciet ɣaar yiic tede keek, agoki ke cuo gam.
Na wen, ke Petero jɔt rot, kɔt ke lɔ e raŋ nɔm: le ku guŋ luiit raŋic, go lupɔɔ linon tiŋ ke ke tɔu kapac; go jal le paanden ke gai ne ke ci tic.
Na wen, di, ke kɔc kaarou e keyiic aake cath ekool mane guop ke ke lɔ paan cɔl Emauth, kaam de paane ke Jeruthalem acit mail kadherou.
Ku jɔki guiir kapac ne ke ci tice kedhie.
Na wen, aguiirki kapac, ku yek rot luɔp, ke Yecu guop cut rot tethiɔk, ku le cath ke keek etok.
Ku acike kum nyiin, agoki cuo ŋic.
Go ke thieec, yan, Ee jam ŋo guieerki wapac, ke we cath? Goki gak ke ke kaac, ke ke gut kenyin piny.
Go raan tok e keek, cɔl Kleopath, go bɛɛr, yan, Yin, ye kaman rɛɛr yitok e Jeruthalem, ku kuc ke ci tic etɛɛn e akoolke?
Go ke thieec, yan, Ee kaŋo? Goki lueel, yan, Ka ke Yecu de Nadhareth, ee nebi ril e luɔide ku welke e Nhialic nɔm ku kɔc niim kedhie:
ku luɔi ci banydit ke ka ke Nhialic e yien miric, ayi banykuɔn e wo cieŋ, bi loŋde teem, an, nak, goki piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku wook, aa yok ŋɔɔth, nɔn ee yen raan bi Yithiael wɛɛr bei. Ku mate cooke e cokke yiic ayadaŋ, yan, Nin acik aa diak ekoole te waan tice kake.
Ku dieer kɔk ne dieer ke remda acik wo tɔ gai ayadaŋ, dieer ci dap rieel e raŋ nɔm wenamiak;
na wen, akenki guopde yok, ke ke jɔ bɛn, bik ku luelki, yan, cik tuucnhial tiŋ, tuuc wen lueel en, yan, a piir.
Go kɔc kɔk ne kɔc rɛɛr ne wook goki lɔ e raŋ nɔm, lek ku yokki ke cit man wen ci diaar e lueel: ku yenguop akenki tiŋ.
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Agai kɔc dhan oou, kɔc e kaŋ rɛɛc dap gam ka ci nebii lueel kedhie!
Ken Kritho kake dhil guum, ku jɔ lɔ tedɛn e dhueeŋ?
Na wen, ke ke weer jam nu e kacigɔɔr yiic kedhie, jam de kede yenguop, gɔl e Mothe aɣɔl nebii kedhie.
Na wen, acik thiɔk e paan le kek thin, go, an, le tueŋ.
Goki peen, yan, Rɛɛre we wook, piny aci aa theen; akɔl e thiɔk ke lɔ piny. Go lɔ ɣot le reer ke keek.
Na wen, aci nyuc ke keek ten ee cam, ke nom kuin ci pam, leec Nhialic, ku wɛɛkic, ku gɛm keek.
Goke liep nyin, ku jɔki ŋic; go lɔ riar piny e kenyin.
Goki rot thieec kapac, yan, Kenku piɔth dep e woyiic thin, wen jiɛɛm en ke wook kueer, ke weer wo kacigɔɔr?
Goki rot jɔt e thaar mane guop, ku beki keniim dhuony Jeruthalem, agoki kɔc kathieer ku tok yok acik gueer, keke kɔc e reer ne keek,
ku luelki, yan, Bɛny dit aci rot jɔt eyic, ku aci tuol tede Thimon.
Go kɔc wen kaarou goki ka ci tic kueer guiir, ku ŋiny ci kek e jɔ ŋic e wɛɛk ci en kuin ci pam waakic.
Na wen, aŋootki ke ke luel kake, ke Yecu guop ke jɔ tuol e keyiic cil, yook keek, yan, E mat tɔu e weyiic.
Goki piɔth pau ku riɔcki aret, luelki, an, ee jɔk en e tiŋki.
Go ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo pau wek piɔth? ku eeŋo luɛɛl wek kajuec e wepiɔth?
Wɔiki yacin ku yacok, nɔn ee yen yɛnguop? tiɛcki yɛn, ku tieŋki; jɔk acin riŋ ku yom, cit man ca wek e tiŋ nɔn ciɛth kek e yɛn.
Ku te ci en kene lueel, ke jɔ ecin nyuoth keek ayi yecok.
Na wen, aŋoothki ke ke ken guɔ gam ne miɛt mit kek piɔth, ke ke gai, ke ke jɔ thieec, yan, Dɛki kecam etene?
Goki miɔɔc ne baŋ toŋ de rɛc ci geet, ku athin e kiec.
Go noom, ku jɔ cam e keniim.
Go keek yɔɔk, yan, Welki ki, wel waan ca lɛk week, waan ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya tɔu wo week, yan, Kaŋ kedhie abik dhil aa yith, ka ci gɔɔr ne kedi e loŋ de Motheyin, ku nebii yiic, ku thaam yiic.
Go kaŋ wɛɛr keek apiɛth, ke ke bi kacigɔɔr aa yok yiic,
ku yook keek, yan, Aci gɔɔr ale, yan, Kritho abi kaŋ dhil guum, ku be rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic ekool ee kek diak;
ku, yan, Puŋdepiɔu ku pal e karac abike ya guieer juoor ebɛn ne rinke, gɔl e Jeruthalem.
Ku wek ee caatɔɔ de kake.
Ku tieŋki, wek tuoc ke cii Waar lueel, an, bi gam: ku week, jaki reer e panydit Jeruthalem, aɣet te bi we piɔth ne riɛldiit bɔ nhial.
Na wen, ke ke leer biic ɣeet keek Bethani: ku jɔ ecin jat nhial, thieei keek.
Na wen, aŋoot ke ke thieei, ke jel e keyiic, ku jɔ jɔt leere paannhial.
Goki lam, ku beki keniim dhuony Jeruthalem ke ke ci piɔth miɛt aret:
ku yek cool e tɔu luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ke ke ye Nhialic leec. Amen.
Tᴇ ɣɔn thɛɛr gɔle kaŋ Jam aa nu, ku nu Jam keke Nhialic, ku Jam yen aye Nhialic.
Yenguop aa nu keke Nhialic te ɣɔn gɔle kaŋ.
Kaŋ kedhie yen aa cak keek; ku acin ke ci cak ke liiu yen thin.
Yen aa deyic piir; ku piire aa ye ɣɛɛrepiny e kɔc.
Ku ɣɛɛrepiny aa ye riau tecol, ku aacii cuɔlepiny e tiŋ.
Ade raan e tooc Nhialic, raan cɔl Jɔn.
Aa bɔ ke ye caatɔ, bi kɔc bɛn lɛk ɣɛɛrepiny, bi kɔc kedhie ya gam ne liemde.
Acie yen ee ɣɛɛrepinye, aa bɔ bi kɔc bɛn lɛk ɣɛɛrepiny.
Ɣɛɛrepiny yic ka, ɣɛɛrepiny e raan riaau ebɛn, raan e bɛn e piny nɔm.
Aa nu e piny nɔm, ku yen aa cak piny, ku aa kuc piny.
Aa bɔ tede kɔcke, ago kɔcke cuo ye gam.
Ku kɔc ci gam, kek aa miɔɔc e riɛl bik aa mith ke Nhialic, kek kɔc gam rinke:
kɔc kene dhieeth e riɛm, ku keneke dhieeth e kede guop, ku keneke dhieeth e kede piɔn e moc, aake dhieeth Nhialic.
Ago Jam aa guop, ku tɔu e woyiic (agoku dhueeŋde tiŋ dhueeŋ cit dhueeŋ e Wen toŋ cii Wun dhieeth etok), aci piɔu thiaŋ ke dhueeŋ ku yic.
Jɔn aa ye caatɔ de yen, ago coot, an, Raan waan aa yɛn kede lueel ki, yan, Raan bi bɛn e yacok, yen anu e yanɔm tueŋ: e luɔi ee yen e kɔn nu ne yɛn.
Ku ne kuɛth ci en kuɛth yen aci wok kaŋ yok wodhie, ayi dhueeŋdepiɔu dhueeŋ ci ro ŋuak.
Loŋ aa gɛme Mothe, ku dhueeŋdepiɔu ku yic aake bɔ ne Yecu Kritho.
Acin raan ci Nhialic kɔn tiŋ ekool tok; ee Wen toŋdɛn ci dhieeth etok, Wen nu e Wun yɔu, yen aa nyuuth en.
Jam e lueel Jɔn ki, ɣɔn tooce Judai bany ke ka ke Nhialic ku Lebii, toocki keek e Jeruthalem lek thieec, yan, Ee yin ŋa?
Ago lɔ gam, ku cii jai; gɛm, an, Yɛn cie Kritho.
Agoki thieec, yan, Ka yee ŋa? Ye Eiija? Go, yan, Ei, yɛn cie Elija. Goki, yan, Ka ye nebi waane? Go bɛɛr, jiɛi, yan, Ɣei.
Agoki be thieec, yan, Ku ee yin ŋa? luɔi bi wok e lɔ lɛk kɔc e toc wook. Ka yin, jɔ aa ŋa?
Go lueel, yan, Yɛn ee rol e raan cot e jɔɔric, yan, Riecki kueer e Bɛnydit, acit man ci nebi Yithaya ye lueel.
Ku kɔc waan ci tooc aake ye kɔc ke Parithai.
Agoki thieec, yan, Eeŋo ee yin kɔc baptith, te cii yin e Kritho, ku cie Elija, ku cie nebi waane?
Go Jɔn puk nɔm, yan, Yɛn ee kɔc baptith ne piu: ku ade raan kaac e weyiic cil, raan kuocki,
yen ee raan bɔ e yacok, raan nu e yanɔm tueŋ, raan can roŋ woke luɔi duɛɛr ɛn thion e warde dɔk.
Kake aake loi e Bethabara e Jordan nɔm lɔŋtni, te waan e Jɔn kɔn baptith thin.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke Jɔn tiŋ Yecu ke bɔ tede yen, go lueel, yan, Wɔiki, Amɛthok de Nhialic ki, anyiɛɛi kerɛɛc de piny nɔm!
Ye ki, yen raan waan aa yɛn kede lueel, yan, Ade raan bɔ e yacok, raan nu e yanɔm tueŋ, e luɔi ee yen e kɔn nu e yɛn.
Ku aa kuoc guop; ku luɔi bi e ŋic e Yithrael, yen aa ba yɛn, ba kɔc bɛn baptith ne piu.
Go Jɔn kede lueel, yan, Yɛn aa tiŋ Weidit ke ke bɔ nhial ke cit guop guuk, bi ku reer e yenɔm.
Ku aa kuoc guop: ku raan e toc ɛn ba kɔc bɛn baptith ne piu, yen aa leke yɛn, yan, Raan ba tiŋ a bi Weidit piny bik ku reerki e yenɔm, yen aye raan bi kɔc aa baptith e Weidit Ɣer.
Aguɔ tiŋ, ku ja lɛk kɔc, yan, Kene ee Wen e Nhialic.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke Jɔn be kɔɔc keke kɔckɛn e piooce kaarou;
go Yecu woi guop te ciɛth en, go lueel, yan, Wɔiki, Amɛthok de Nhialic ki!
Go kɔcpiooceke kaarou goki piŋ, te jiɛɛm en, agoki Yecu kuany cok.
Go Yecu liec, ago ke tiŋ akuanyki ecok, ku jɔ ke thieec, yan, Eeŋo kaarki? Goki lueel, yan, Rabi (yen aye Bɛny e weet, ne thoŋda), yan, Rɛɛre tenou?
Go ke yɔɔk, yan, Bak tieŋki. Goki bɛn ku tiŋki te reer en thin, ku jɔki cool e yen ekoole: te waan le kek aa cit thaar kathieer.
Raan tok e keek kaarou, kɔc wen piŋ jam de Jɔn ku kuanyki Yecu cok, acɔl Andereyo, manhe e Thimon Petero.
Go Thimon manhe guop kɔn yok, ku lek en, yan, Wok e Mathia yok (yen aye Kritho, ne thoŋda).
Go bɛɛi tede Yecu. Go Yecu woi guop, ku lueel, yan, Yin Thimon, wen e Jona: yin bi cɔɔl Kepath (yen aye Petero, ku ye Kuur, ne thoŋda).
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke Yecu de piɔu jal le Galili, ago Pilip yok: ku jɔ lɛk en, yan, Kuany acok.
Ku Pilip ee raan e Bethaida, ee panydit, paan e yi Andereya keke Petero.
Go Pilip Nathanyel yok, ku jɔ lɛk en, yan, Wok e raan yok, raan ci Mothe kede gɔɔr e loŋic, ayi nebii, Yecu de Nadhareth, wen e Jothep.
Go Nathanyel thieec, yan, Dueer kepiɛth bɛn bei e Nadhareth? Go Pilip lueel, yan, Ba tiŋ.
Na wen, ke Yecu tiŋ Nathanyel ke bɔ tede yen, go lueel, yan, Wɔiki, raan e Yithrael egɔk ka, raan cin yac rueeny!
Go Nathanyel thieec, yan, E yi ŋic ɛn tenou? Go Yecu bɛɛr, yan, Waaŋ ŋoot Pilip ke ken yin cɔɔl, waan reer yin e ŋaap thar, yin eca tiŋ.
Go Nathanyel bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Rabi, yin ee Wen e Nhialic! ku yin ee Malik de Yithrael!
Go Yecu bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Nɔn can e lɛk yin, yan, Yin e tieŋ e ŋaap thaar, yen a gɛm yin? Yin bi kadit tiŋ kawar kake.
Ago lɛk en, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Wadaŋ, we bi paannhial tiŋ aɣɔɔr, ku tieŋki tuucnhial ke Nhialic ke ke lɔ nhial ku biki piny ne Wen e raan nɔm.
Na wen, ekool ee kek diak, ade thieŋ ci lueel e Kana de Galili; ku nu man Yecu etɛɛn:
ayi Yecu ayi kɔckɛn e piooce acike cɔɔl e thieekic ayadaŋ.
Na wen, aci mɔu dak, mɔndɛn cɔl wany, ke Yecu yook e man, yan, Acin keniim wany.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Tiiŋe, eeŋoda ne yin? Thaardi aŋoot ke ken bɛn.
Go man kɔc yin kɔc miith yɔɔk, yan, Te de yen ke lek week, ke luɔiki.
Ade tony dit ci cap etɛɛn kadhetem, tony ke piu, tony e cuec e kuur, kak ee kɔc ke piny, cit man e ciɛɛŋ de Judai, tony tok adueer roŋ keke thapiɔɔ kaŋuan ayi dhetem.
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Thiaŋki tony e piu. Goki ke thiɔɔŋ acin kethook te dak.
Ago lɛk keek, yan, Gɛmki ke bei enɔɔne, lɛɛrki ke tede raan nu e thieek nɔm. Goki ke lɛɛr.
Na wen, aci raan nu e thieek nɔm piu thieep, piu wen ci rot tɔ ye wany, ku kuc te bi en thin (ku ŋic kɔc yin kɔc miith kɔc wen gem piu), ke raan nu e thieek nɔm jɔ mony de thieek cɔɔl,
ku lek en, yan, Raan ebɛn ee wany piɛth kɔn taau; na ele, te ci kɔc yiic a niak, ke jɔ wany piɛth emaath bɛɛi: ku yin e wany piɛth peen aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Gol e gɔle gook bi kɔc ke gai, ki, ke cii Yecu looi e Kana de Galili, abi dhueeŋde nyuɔɔth; go kɔckɛn e piooce goki kede gam.
Na wen, aci kene wan, ke jel le Kapernaum, yen ku man, ku mithekɔcken, ku kɔckɛn e piooce: agoki ceŋ etɛɛn akool cii juec.
Ahith e Judai e guɔ thiɔk, aliith cɔl Winythok, go Yecu lɔ Jeruthalem.
Ago kɔc yok luaŋditt e Nhialic, kɔc e mioor ɣaac ayi thok ayi guk, ku yok kɔc e weu waar yiic ke ke rɛɛr.
Go tiaar yieer e keet, ku cieec ke biic kedhie ne luaŋdiit e Nhialicic, ayi thok, ayi mioor; ku luuŋ weu piny weu ke kɔc e weu waar yiic, ago pɛɛmken pɔk yiic piny;
ku lek kɔc e guk ɣaac, yan, Nyaaiki kake etene; duoki ɣon e Waar e tɔ ye ɣon e ɣooc.
Ago kɔckɛn e piooce agoki keniim cat nɔn ci e gɔɔr, yan, Dit aa yɛn piɔu dit e kede ɣondu e ya cuet piɔu.
Go Judai bɛɛr, thiecki, yan, Ee gok ŋo nyuothe wook, ke loi yin ekake?
Go Yecu bɛɛr, lek keek, yan, Riakki luaŋ e Nhialice, ku aba bɛ tɔ kaac e nin kadiak.
Go Judai lueel, yan, Luaŋe aa leer run kathierŋuan ku dhetem ke yik, ku ba bɛ tɔ kaac e nin kadiak?
Ku aa jam ne kede guopde, aci tɔ ye luaŋ de Nhialic.
Na ɣɔn aci ro guɔ jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, go kɔckɛn e piooce agoki tak nɔn ci en kene lɛk keek; goki kecigɔɔr gam, ayi jam waan cii Yecu lueel.
Ɣɔn nu yen e Jeruthalem e akool ke Winythok, go kɔc juec rinke gam, te ci kek gook tiŋ gook wen ci looi.
Ku Yecu aken ro pal keek, luɔi ŋic en kɔc kedhie,
ku acin caatɔ dueer dhil kɔɔr caatɔ bi kede raan lueel; yen guop ee ke nu e raan piɔu ŋic.
Raan aa nu raan e Parithai, cɔl Nikodemo, ee bɛny e Judai.
E bɛn tede Yecu wakɔu, bi ku lueel, yan, Rabi, yin ŋicku nɔn ee yin raan e weet raan e bɔ tede Nhialic: acin raan dueer gook loiye looi, te cii Nhialic cath ke yen.
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te kene raan bɛ dhieeth, ka cii ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic dueer tiŋ.
Go Nikodemo thieec, yan, Dueere raan bɛ dhieeth adi, te ci en dit? dueer bɛ lɔ e man yac, ku beye dhieeth?
Go Yecu puk nɔm, yan, Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Te kene raan dhieeth ne piu keke Wei, ka cii dueer lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic.
Ke ci dhieeth ne guop ee guop; ku ke ci dhieeth e Wei ee wei.
Du gai nɔn can e lɛk yin, an, We bi dhil bɛ dhieeth.
Yom ee pot tede piɔnde, ku yin ee awooude piŋ, ku kuc te bi yen thin, ayi te le yen thin: raan ebɛn raan ci dhieeth e Wei yen acit en.
Go Nikodemo bɛɛr, thieec, yan, Dueer kake tic adi?
Go Yecu puk nɔm, lueel, yan, Yee raan e Yithrael wɛɛt, ku kuc kake?
Yin yɔɔk eyic, yan, Wok ee ke ŋicku lueel, ku yok caatɔɔ ne ka cuk tiŋ; ku wek cii keda e gam.
Te can week lɛk ka ke piny nɔm, ku caki gam, ku na lɛk week ka ke paannhial, bak gam wakdi?
Acin raan ci lɔ paannhial, ee raan ci bɛn piny paannhial etok, yen aye Wen e raan Wen nu paannhial.
Acit man ci Mothe kerac jat nhial e jɔɔric, yen acit jon bi Wen e raan dhil jat nhial aya:
ke raan gam en cii bi maar, ku bi dɛ piir athɛɛr, raan ebɛn.
Nhialic e piny nɔm nhiaar alal, arek abi miɔɔc e Wendɛn ci dhieeth etok, ke raan gam en cii bi maar, raan ebɛn, ku bi dɛ piir athɛɛr.
Nhialic aacii Wende tuuc e piny nɔm, bi kɔc ke piny nɔm yiek yieth gaak, ee luɔi bi kɔc kony wei kɔc ke piny nɔm, en e tuuc en en.
Raan gam en acin gaak nu e yeyeth: ku raan reec gam, e guɔ yiek yeth gaak enɔɔne, luɔi reec en gam ne rin ke Wen e Nhialic, Wen ci dhieeth etok.
Gaak ci taau e kɔc yicth ki, yan, Ɣɛɛrepiny e bɛn e piny nɔm, go kɔc cuɔlepiny nhiaar awar ɣɛɛrepiny; e luɔi rɛɛce luɔiden.
Raan ebɛn raan e kerac looi, ee ɣɛɛrepiny maan, ku ye rɛɛc bɛn teɣer, ke luɔide cii bi aa jɔɔny.
Ku raan e yic looi ee bɛn teɣer, ke luɔide bi aa tic, nɔn ci e looi ne Nhialic.
Na wen, aci kake wan, ke Yecu bɔ piny de Judaya keke kɔckɛn e piooce; go reer ke keek etɛɛn, ku ye kɔc baptith.
Ku Jɔn ayadaŋ aa ye kɔc baptith Ainon thiaak ke Thalim, luɔi nu piu juec etɛɛn: ago kɔc bɛn, bike bɛn baptith.
Jɔn aŋoot ke kene guɔ cuat e aloocic.
Na wen, ke kɔcpiooce Jɔn ke ke teer ne Judai ne kede waak.
Agoki bɛn tede Jɔn, bik ku luelki, yan, Rabi, raan e rɛɛr wek etok e Jordan nɔm lɔŋtui, raan ci yin kede lueel, tiŋ, ee kɔc baptith, go kɔc aa lɔ tede yen kedhie.
Go Jɔn bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Acin ke dueere raan yok, te kene ye gam en nhial.
Week gup wek ee caatɔɔ ne ke can lueel, yan, Yɛn cie Kritho, ku yɛn aa kɔne tuooc e yenɔm tueŋ.
Raan thiak nyan lueele thieeke, yen aye mony de thieek: ku mɛthe mony de thieek, raan kaac etɛɛn ku piŋ jamde, ee piɔu miɛt alal e rol e mony de thieek: miɛt miɛt ɛn piɔu ki, aci guɔ aa yic.
Yen abi ro dhil aa ŋuak, ku yɛn bi dhil aa lɔ cieen.
Raan bɔ nhial yen anu e kɔc niim kedhie. Raan bɔ e piny nɔm, yen aye kede piny, ku ye ka ke piny lueel: raan bɔ paannhial anu e kɔc niim kedhie.
Go ya caatɔ ne ka ci tiŋ ku ne ka ci piŋ, go kede aa lueel; ku acin raan e kede gam.
Raan e kede gam, aci gɔɔr e katimde, yan, Nhialic yen aye yic.
Raan e tuuc e Nhialic ee wel ke Nhialic lueel: ku Nhialic acii e miɔɔc e Wei ne them them en keek.
Waada anhiaar Wende, ago kaŋ taau e yecin kedhie.
Raan gam Wende ee cath ke piir athɛɛr; ku raan reec Wende gam, acii piir bi tiŋ, agonh e Nhialic ee reer e yeyeth.
Na wen, aci Bɛnydit e ŋic nɔn ci Parithai e piŋ nɔn e Yecu kɔc juec tɔ ye kɔcpiooce ku ye keek baptith awar Jɔn,
(ku Yecu guop aacii kɔc e baptith, ee kɔckɛn e piooce kek aye kɔc baptith),
ke jel e Judaya, be lɔ Galili,
dhil Thamaria reetic.
Ago bɛn te nu paan toŋ de Thamaria, ee panyditt cɔl Thukara, athiaak keke piny cii Jakop gam wendɛn Jothep.
Ku yinh e Jakop aa nu etɛɛn. Go Yecu nyuc e yich nɔm aya, ke ye dakke cath. Ee te cit nɔn e thaar kadhetem.
Na wen, ke tiiŋ e Thamaria bɔ, bi bɛn gem e piu: go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Miɔc ɛn e ka dɛk.
Kɔckɛn e piooce acik guɔ jal lek panydit lek ɣooc e kecam.
Go tiiŋ e Thamaria puk nɔm, yan, Ee kaŋo ke lip yin ɛn e piu, ku ye Judai, ku ya tiiŋ e Thamaria? Judai keke kɔc ke Thamaria aciki raan.
Go Yecu bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Tee yi ŋic miɔc de Nhialic, ku ŋic raan wen thɛɛr yook yin, yan, Miɔc ɛn e ka dɛk; adi ci lip tede yen, ku adi ci yi gam piu piir.
Go tik lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin cin ken ee yin gem, ku yith amec thar; ba piu piire yok tenou?
Dit awar kuɛɛredan Jakop, raan e gɛm wook yith, ku ye dek e ye, yen, ku mithke, ku ɣɔkke?
Go Yecu bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Raan ebɛn raan e dek e piuke abi bɛ aa yal:
ku raan ebɛn raan e dek e piu ba gam en acii bi bɛ aa yal anande; piu ba gam en abik aa awaŋ e yith e yeyac, awaŋ bi aa cool e tul aɣet piir athɛɛr.
Go tik lueel, yan, Bɛny, miɔc ɛn e piuke, ke ya cii bi bɛ aa yal, ku ca bi bɛ aa bɛn etene ba bɛn gem.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Lɔ, cɔl monydu, ku baki ene.
Go tik bɛɛr, lueel, yan, Yɛn cin nɔm moc. Go Yecu lueel, yan, Yin e yic lueel, yan, Yɛn cin nɔm moc:
roorku acik aa dhiec; ku mony rɛɛr wek etok enɔɔne acie monydu: keduon ci lueele ee yic.
Go tik lueel, yan, Bɛny, yin ŋiɛc aye nebi.
Kuarkuɔ aake ye lam e kuure nɔm, ku yak lueel, yan, ee Jeruthalem en ee te bi kɔc dhil aa lam thin.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Tiiŋe, gam kedi, yan, Thaar abi bɛn thaar ba wek Waada lam thin, ku aci e kuure nɔm, ku aci e Jeruthalem aya.
Wek ee ke kuocki lam: ee ke ŋicku yen ayok lam: kunydewei abɔ tede Judai.
Ku ade thaar bɔ, ku anu enɔɔne, thaar bii kɔc Waada lam thin ne wei ku ne yic, kek kɔc e lam yic kɔɔr: ku Waada ee kɔc cit kek kɔɔr bik aa kɔc e ye lam.
Nhialic ee Wei, ku kɔc lam en abik e dhil aa lam ne wei ku ne yic.
Go tik lueel, yan, Aŋiɛc nɔn bi Mathia bɛn (yen acɔl Kritho): ku te ci en bɛn, ka bi wo guieer kaŋ kedhie.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Yɛn aye yen, yɛn eraan jam wo yine.
Na wen, ke kɔckɛn e piooce e ke bɔ; goki gai e ke jiɛɛm en keke tik; ku acin raan ci e thieec, yan, Eeŋo kɔɔr? ku, yan, Eeŋo jiɛɛm yin weke yen?
Go tik tonydɛn e piu nyaaŋ piny, ku jel le panydit, le lɛk kɔc, yan,
Baki, tieŋki raan ci a lɛk kaŋ kedhie ka ca looi ecaŋɣɔn: cii dhil aa Kritho ekene?
Goki lɔ biic panydit, bik tede yen.
Na wen, aŋootki wei, ke lɛŋ kɔcpiooce, yan, Bɛny, came.
Go lueel, yan, Yɛn de miith cam nhith kuocki.
Go kɔcpiooce rot thieec kapac, yan, De kecam ci yicn en?
Go Yecu ke yɔɔk, yan, Luɔi luɔi ɛn kede piɔn e raan e toc ɛn, ayi thol ban luɔide thol, yen aye kecamdi.
Caki e lueel, yan, Ŋoot pɛi wei kaŋuan, pɛi ke tem e rap? Wɔiki, wek yɔɔk, yan, Jatki wenyin nhial, ku wɔiki dum, acik guɔ ɣɛɛr, aci aa te temeke.
Ku raan e tem ee ariop yok, ku ye rap kut niim e kede piir athɛɛr; ago raan e com ayi raan e tem agoki piɔth miɛt etok.
Ago jam waane go aa yic, yan, Ŋɛk ee com, ku tem ŋɛk.
Wek e tuɔɔc bak dom lɔ tem dom kɛn wek kɔn luui thin: kɔc kɔk acik luui, ku wek e lɔɔk look e luɔidenic.
Go kɔc juec kɔc ke Thamarai kɔc ke panydiite agoki kede gam ne baŋ de jam de tik, wen ci en e lueel, yan, Aci a lɛk kaŋ kedhie ka ca looi ecaŋɣɔn.
Na wen, aci kɔc ke Thamaria bɛn tede yen, ke jɔki lɔŋ, an, bi reer ke keek: go reer etɛɛn e akool kaarou.
Go kɔc juec gam awarki kɔc waan alal, ne biak de jamde guop;
agoki lɛk tik, yan, Wok e gam enɔɔne, ku acie biak de jamdu: acuk piŋ e wokgup, agoku ŋic nɔn ee yen Kritho ne yic, konydewei ke jaŋ ebɛn.
Na wen, e nin kaarou, ke jɔ jal etɛɛn le Galili.
Yecu guop ee jame gam, yan, ee yic, yan, Nebi acin rieu ee yok paanden guop.
Na wen, aci guɔ bɛn Galili, ke loor kɔc ke Galili, luɔi ci kek kaŋ tiŋ kedhie ka ci looi e Jeruthalem e akool ke ahith: aake ci lɔ tede aliith ayadaŋ.
Na wen, ke be bɛn Kana de Galili, te waan puk en piu aye wany. Ku ade bɛny etɛɛn, bɛny tooke wende e Kapernaum.
Te ci en e piŋ nɔn ci Yecu bɛn bei e Judaya bi Galili, ke jɔ lɔ tede yen, go lɔŋ, an, bi lɔ, le wende tɔ dem; meth akɔɔr thuɔɔu.
Go Yecu lueel, yan, Te kɛn wek gook tiŋ ayi kagɛi, ka caki bi gam anandun.
Go bɛny lueel, yan, Bɛny, loku tei te ŋoote mɛnhdien thiine ke ken thou.
Go Yecu yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ, wendu apiir. Go raan jam gam, jam ci Yecu lɛk en, ku jɔ jal.
Ku te ŋoot en kueer, ke ram ke liimkɛn leke yen, yan, Mɛnhdu apiir.
Go ke luɔp, yan, E pɛle juai piny e thaar kadi? Goki lueel, yan, Waanakol, e thaar kadherou, yen aa pɛle juai en.
Go wun meth ŋic nɔn ee yen thaar man waan leke Yecu e yen, yan, Wendu apiir: go gam, yen keke dhiende ebɛn.
Gok ee kek rou ki, gok cii Yecu looi, te ci en bɛn bei e Judaya bi Galili.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke Judai e ke jɔ ahith looi, ago Yecu jal le Jeruthalem.
Ku ade awol nu Jeruthalem awol thiaak ke kal thok kal e amɛl, awol de gol kadhic, ku acɔl Bethetheda ne thoŋ de Eberu.
Ku ade kut ditt e kɔc e tɔc e golke yiic, kɔc tok, ayi coor, ayi ŋol ayi aduɛɛny; ke ke ye kool bi piu weer tiit.
Ade tunynhial e bɛn piny le e awolic ekool mɛɛn, bi piu bɛn weer: ku raan e kɔn lɔ e piu yiic, te ci ke. weer, ka bi waar e juandɛn nu e yeguop.
Ku ade raan etɛɛn, raan e took e run kathierdiak ku bɛt.
