Go keek woi, ke ŋɔth, an, de ke bi yien yok tede keek.
Go Petero lueel, yan, Yɛn cin nɔm rial ku cien nɔm jini; yin miaac tei ne ke cath ke yɛn. Ne rin ke Yecu Kritho de Nadhareth, jɔt rot cathe.
Go ciin cuec dɔm, jɔt nhial: na wen, enɔntlnin mane ke cokke ku yom ke awodhooruyin ke ke yok riɛl.
Na wen, ke gɔp rot nhial, ku kɛɛc, ku ciɛth, go lɔ luaŋdiit e Nhialic ke keek etok, ke cath ku ye kɛɛc nhial, leec Nhialic.
Ago kɔc tiŋ kedhie ke cath ke lec Nhialic:
ku aŋicki nɔn ee yen raan waan e reer ke lip e kal e luaŋdiit e Nhialic thok, kal thoŋ cɔl Lakelak: agoki gai aret abik niim mum ne ke ci tic tede ye.
Ago raan wen ci dem go Petero dɔm keke Jɔn, ago kɔc kedhie kat etok lek e gɔɔlic te nu kek, gol cɔl Gol e Tholomon, ke ke gai aret.

Na wen, aci Petero ke tiŋ, ke yook kɔc, yan, Week, wek roor ke Yithrael, eeŋo gai wek e kene? Ku eeŋo tuɔɔm wek wogup wakya, aci ciet wok e tɔ raane cath ne riɛlda wogup, ku ne rieeu ee wok Nhialic rieu? Acie yen.
Nhialic de Abraɣam ku Yithak ku Jakop, Nhialic de kuarkuɔ, yen aci Wendɛn Yecu gam dhueeŋ; raan waan cak yien miric, ku cak rɛɛc e Pilato nɔm, waan ci en loŋde teem, an, pɛl.
Ee Raan Ɣerpiɔu en acak rɛɛc, Raan Piɛthpiɔu, ku raan ci raan daŋ luc yen acak lɔŋ, an, bi yien week.
Bɛnydiit e Wei acak nɔk, raan cii Nhialic jɔt bei e kɔc ci thou yiic, ku wok ee caatɔɔ ne cooke.
Ku rin ke yen, ne gam ci wo rinke gam, yen aa tɔ raane ril, raan wɔiki ku ŋiɛcki: yeka, gam bɔ tede yen aci raane gam pialeguop e wenyin wedhie.
Ku enɔɔne, mithekɔckuɔ, aŋiɛc nɔn ca wek kene looi ne kuny kuoc wek en, ayi banykun aya.
Ku kake, ka cii Nhialic tɔ luel tueŋ ne thok ke nebiike kedhie, yan, bi Kritho kaŋ dhil guum, kek acike tɔ ye yith.
Yen ja wek wepiɔth puk, ku bɛki wepiɔth wɛl Nhialic, ke bi karɛckun cuoth bei, ago akool bɛn e Nhialic nyin akool ke dom e wei ke kɔc;
ago Kritho tooc, raan waan ci kɔn guieer week, yen Yecu:
raan bi dhil ceŋ paannhial aɣɔl kool e puŋ bi kaŋ puk niim kedhie, kool cii Nhialic tɔ luel ne thook ke nebiikɛn ɣerpiɔth kedhie, gɔl ɣɔn thɛɛr ciɛke piny.
Mothe e kuarkuɔ yɔɔk eyic, yan, Nebi tok abii Bɛnyduondit Nhialic jat nhial e mithekɔckun yiic, acit man e yɛn; jamde abak piŋ, jam bi lɛk week ebɛn.
Ku eyic, raan ebɛn raan bi kede nebiye rɛɛc piŋ, ka bi maar etaiwei e kɔc yiic.
Yeka, ku nebii kedhie aya, gɔl e Thamuel keke nebii biɔthe, nebii ɣɔn e wel lueel, acik kɔn lueel e kede akoolke, kek kedhie.
Wek ee mith ke nebii, ku yak mith ke loŋ, loŋ cii Nhialic mac keke kuarkuɔ, waan yook en Abraɣam, yan, Ku ne kau de yinguop abi dhien ke piny nɔm aa thieei kedhie.
Ku Nhialic, luɔi ci en Wendɛn Yecu jat nhial, aci kɔn tuoc week, bi week bɛn thieei, ne doŋ bi en we dak wei e luɔiduon racic, week wedhie.
Na wen, aŋootki ke ke jam ne kɔc, ke bany ke ka ke Nhialic e ke bɔ ne bɛny de luaŋdiit e Nhialic ku Thadokai, ke ke bɔ e keyiic,
ke ke ci piɔth diu luɔi weet kek kɔc, ku luɔi guiir kek ne Yecu ne jon bi kɔc rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Goki keek dɔm, ku tɛɛuki keek e aloocic aru piny: akɔl e guɔ thei.
Ku ade kɔc juec ci gam kɔc wen ci jam piŋ; go kuen e roor ci gam go ciet agum kadhic.
Na wen, aru piny, ke banyken ku roordit ku kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr e ke gueer Jeruthalem;
ku nu Anath thin, yen aye bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, ku Kayapath, ku Jɔn, ku Alekandaro, ku kɔckɛn e bɛnydiit tueŋ kedhie.
Na wen, acik ke taau e keyiic cil, ke ke thiecki, yan, Ee riɛlou, ku ye rinkou e luɔɔi wek ekene?
Go Petero thiaŋ ne Weidit Ɣer, ku yook keek, yan, Week, we bany ke kɔc, ku wek roordit ke Yithrael,
te thieec wek wook ekoole ne luɔi piɛth cuk looi e raane guop raan ci duanye, yan, ci tɔ piɔl guop adi;

jaki kene ŋic wedhie, ayi kɔc ke Yithrael, taki ke ŋic kedhie, yan, Ne rin ke Yecu de Nadhareth, raan cak piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, raan cii Nhialic jɔt bei e kɔc ci thou yiic, ne rin ke yenguop, yen a kɛɛce raane etene e weniim, ke ye guɔp pial.
Kene ee kuur waan cak rɛɛc, wek kɔc yik alooc, ku aye tɔ ye kuur e agukic kuur de naamde.
Ku kunydewei aliu ne raan daŋ: ku acin rin kɔk e piny nɔm, rin ci gam kɔc, rin bi wo dhil kony wei ne keek.
Na wen, acik ŋeeny de Petero tiŋ keke Jɔn, ku ŋicki keek nɔn ee kek roor kene wɛɛt, acin kajuec ŋicki, agoki gai; ku jɔki keniim tak ne cath e ye kek cath ne Yecu waan.
Ku te woi kek raan wen ci dem akaac ke keek etok, ka cin ke cik yok ke bik jɔɔny.
Na wen, acik ke yɔɔk, yan, bik lɔ biic e loŋic, ke jɔki guiir kapac,
ku luelki, yan, Buk ŋo looi ne kɔcke? Aci kɔc rɛɛr e Jeruthalem ebɛn ŋic egɔk nɔn ci gok dit looi ne keek; ku acuku ke dueer jɔɔny.
Ku enɔɔne, jɔku ke waai e wɛi gok, luelku, yan, Duoki raan daŋ be guieer e rinke; ke jam cii bi thiei e kɔc yiic.
Goki ke cɔɔl, ku yookki keek, yan, Duoki jam be ya guiir ku duoki kɔc be ya wɛɛt eliŋliŋ ne rin ke Yecu.
Na wen, ke Petero keke Jɔn e ke beer, yookki keek, yan, Luɛlki week, nɔn piɛth en tede Nhialic te piŋ wok kedun awar piŋ piŋ wok kede Nhialic:
ku wo cii aguiɛɛr dueer pɔl ne ka cuk tiŋ ku piŋkuke.
Na wen, acik ke bɛ waai, ke ke palki, acin ke cik yok ke bi kek ke mac, ne baŋ de kɔc; kɔc ebɛn aake ye Nhialic leec ne ke ci looi.
Run ke monye awarki thierŋuan, mony wen ci goke looi e yeguop, gok ci e tɔ piɔl guop.
Na wen, acike pɔl, ke ke lɔ tede remden, lek ku guiirki keek jam ebɛn jam cii banydiit ke ka ke Nhialic lɛk keek ayi roordit.
Na wen, acik jam piŋ, ke ke jɔt kerot lamki Nhialic ne piɔn tok, luelki, yan, Bɛnydit, Yin Nhialic, Yin Acieŋ e cak paannhial ku piny ku abapdit, ku ka nu e keyiic kedhie:
Yin ci lueel ɣɔn ne thoŋ de Dabid awunde, yan, Eeŋo e gothe Juoor, Ku eeŋo e tɛke kɔc ɣɔric e kepiɔth?
Mahik ke piny acik rot jɔt, Ku gueer bany ceŋ kɔc, Bik tɔŋ yien Bɛnydit keke Krithode:
kɔc acik gueer ne yic, kɔc de ater ne Yecu Wenduon ɣerpiɔu, Wenduon ci tɔc, yi Kerod ayi Pontio Pilato, keke Juoor ku kɔc ke Yithrael, aake gueer tetoŋe,
bik kaŋ bɛn looi ebɛn, ka cii riɛldu ku loŋdu kɔn guiir ɣɔn thɛɛr, an, bi ke dhil looi.
Ku enɔɔne, Bɛnydit, piŋ wɛi ee kek wo waai, ku game liimku riɛl, bik jamdu aa guiir ke ke ye ŋeeny,
ku riny yicin ke kɔc e ke bi dem; ku tɔ gook looi ku ka ye kɔc ke gai ne rin ke Yecu Wenduon ɣerpiɔu.
Na wen, acik lam, ke piny nieŋ rot te wen ci kek gueer thin; agoki thiaŋ ne Weidit Ɣer kedhie, ku jɔki jam e Nhialic guiir ne ŋeeny.
Ku tɔu kut e kɔc ci gam ne piɔn tok ku ne jam tok: ku acin raan e ye lueel ne ka cath e yen, an, ee kake yenguop; ayek rɔm etok ne kaŋ kedhie.
Ku tuuc ayek jamden lueel ne riɛldit, jam ee kek caatɔɔ ke jon ci Bɛnydit Yecu ro jɔt: ku tɔu dhueeŋ dit tede keek kedhie.
Ku acin raan ne keyiic raan dɛk e kaŋ; kɔc ebɛn kɔc de niim dum ayi ɣoot ke ke ɣɔɔcki, ku jɔki weu ke ka ci ɣaac bɛɛi,
goki ke taau piny e tuuc niim: na wen, ke weu e ke teke kɔc, miɔc raan ebɛn ne kede dak dɛke kake.
Ku ade mony cɔl Jothep, mony ci tuuc cak rinke, yan, Baranaba (yen aye Wen e Muŋdepiɔu, te puke yen e thoŋda), ku ye raan e Lebi, paanden ee Kupurio;
monye ade nɔm dom, go ɣaac, ku bii weu, tɛɛu keek e tuuc cok.
Ku ade raan cɔl Anania, keke Thapeire tiiŋde, raan ci ka cath ne yen ɣaac;
na wen, ke both biak tok ne weu, ku ŋic thŋde aya, go biak tok bɛɛi, ku tɛɛu piny e tuuc cok.
Go Petero lueel, yan, Anania, eeŋo ci Catan yi thiɔɔŋ piɔu aya, ba Weidit Ɣer bɛn tɔɔr lueth, ku ci biak tok both ne weu ke dom?
Waan ŋoot en ke kene ɣaac, e cie kedu? ayi waan ci e ɣaac aya, e cii tɔu e yicin yitok? Eeŋo take kene e yiniɔu? acie kɔc kek e tɔɔre lueth, ee Nhialic.
Na wen, aci Anania welke piŋ, ke wieek, jɔ guɔ thook: ago riɔɔc dit kɔc dɔm kedhie kɔc piŋ kake.
Go dhuok rot jɔt, ku dutki e lupo, goki lɛɛr biic lek thiɔk.
Na wen, te cit thaar kadiak, ke tiiŋde bɔ ɣot, ke kuc ke ci looi.
Go Petero yɔɔk, yan, Lɛke yɛn, cak dom ɣaac e weu kaale? Go lueel, yan, Ɣɛɛ, weu ayekie.
Go Petero yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo aa wek wethook mat, bak Wei ke Bɛnydit bɛn them? Tiŋ, cok ke kɔc wen ci monydu lɔ thiɔk, kek ka ɣot thok, ku abik yi lɛɛr biic aya.
Na wen, ke wieek e yecok enɔnthiine, jɔ guɔ thook: go dhuok bɛn ɣot, ku yokki aci thou, goki jɔt, lek thiɔk e monyde lɔɔm.
Go riɔɔc dit kanithɔ dɔm ebɛn, ku dɔm kɔc kedhie kɔc piŋ kake.
Ku gook juec ku ka ye kɔc ke gai acike looi e tuuc cin e kɔc yiic: go kɔc aa gueer e piɔn tok e gol e Tholomonic.
Ku ne kɔc kɔk yiic acin raan ci ŋeeny bi mat keke keek: ayeke leec e kɔc lei;
ku kɔc gam Bɛnydit acik rot ŋuak e kut diit e kɔc, roor ayi diaar;
acakaa kɔc tok acike bɛɛi bei, leereke e kuɛɛr yiic, ku tɛɛuwekeek e laŋareep niim ku kurthii niim, yan, bi yien dɛ te le atieptiep de Petero e kɔc gup kɔc kɔk e keyiic, te teek en.
Ku kut diit e kɔc acik bɛn bei e pɛɛnydit nu e Jeruthalem kec aya, ke ke bii kɔc tok ku kɔc cii jɔɔk rac dɔm: agoki dem kedhie.
Na wen, ke bɛnydit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke jɔt rot, keke kɔc e tɔu ne yen kedhie (kek aye rem e Thadokai), agoki piɔth thiaŋ e agɔth,
agoki tuuc dɔm, ku tɛɛuki keek ɣon ee kɔc mac.
Na wen, ke tuny nhial e Bɛnydit ke liep alooc thok wakɔu, ku bii keek biic, yook keek, yan,
Laki, kaacki nhial luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ku guieerki kɔc ne wel ke piire kedhie.

Na wen, acik e piŋ, ke ke lɔ luaŋdiit e Nhialic ɣɔnmiak te ci piny ru, lek kɔc wɛɛt. Go Bɛnydiit tueŋ e kake Nhialic bɛn keke kɔc e tɔu ne yen, goki kɔc ke loŋ caal tetok, keke kɔc dit ke kɔc ke Yithrael kedhie, ku toocki kɔc alooc bik tuuc lɔ bɛɛi.
Na wen, ke cawiic e ke bɔ, ku yokki keek aliu e aloocic, goki keniim dhuny, ku luelki,
yan, Alooc acuk yok aci guur e lɔ dekdek, ku yokku kɔc tit alooc ke ke kaac biic ɣot thok: na wen, acuk e tueer, ke cin raan yokku thin.
Na wen, ke bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, keke bɛny e luaŋdit e Nhialic, ku banydit kɔk e ka ke Nhialic, te ci kek kake piŋ, ke ke jɔ niim a cɔɔtcɔɔt ne keden, ne te bi jame nɔm pek thin.
Na wen, ke raan bɔ, bi ku lueel, yan, Tieŋki, kɔc waan cak taau e aloocic akɛɛcki luaŋditt e Nhialic, ke ke weet kɔc.
Go bɛny e luaŋdiit e Nhialic lɔ keke cawiic, lek ku biiki ke bei, ku ciki ke dɔm aril, acik riɔɔc e kɔc, ke ke cii bi biɔɔk e kɔi.
Na wen, acik ke bɛɛi, ke ke tɛɛuki e kɔc niim kɔc ke loŋ; go bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke thieec,
yan, Kenku week yɔɔk aret, yan, Duoki kɔc e bɛ wɛɛt e rinke? ku tieŋki, we ci Jeruthalem thiɔɔŋ ne weetdun, ku we de piɔth luɔi ba wek riɛm e raane dɛɛr e woyieth.
Go Petero keke tuuc kɔk agoki bɛɛr, yan, Wo bi jam e Nhialic dhil piŋ awar ke lueel kɔc.
Nhialic de kuarkuɔ aci Yecu jat nhial, raan cak nɔk, waan nɔɔk wek en e tim nɔm.
Yen acii Nhialic jat nhial ne ciin cuenyde, abi aa Bɛnydit ku ye Konydewei, bi Yithiael tɔ puk epiɔu, ku tɔ karɛcken pal.
ku wok ee caatɔɔ ne kake; ayi Weidit Ɣer aya, Wei ci Nhialic gam kɔc e kake piŋ.
Na wen, acik kene piŋ, ke ke guute piɔth, goki loŋ cam, an, bik ke nɔk.
Na wen, ke raan tok jɔt rot e loŋic, ee raan e Parithai, cɔl Gamaliɛl, raan e kɔc wɛɛt e loŋ, ariewe kɔc kedhie, raane aci ro jɔt, ku yook keek, yan, bi tuuc tɔ lɔ biic tethiinakaŋ.
Go kɔc yɔɔk, yan, Week, wek roor ke Yithiael, tieŋki rot e hiɔi, an, bak hioi kɔcke.
Raan cɔl Theuda e rot jɔt waan, ago rot tɔ ye raan de naamde; ago kɔc mat e yen, acit bot kaŋuan: ku aci nɔk; ago rem piŋ kede agoki thiai kedhie, abik riaar.
Na wen, e raane cok, ke Judath raan e Galili ke jɔt rot, e akool waan e ke kɔc gɔɔr rin, ku thel kɔc juec e yecok: ku jɔ thou aya; go kɔc piŋ kede agoki thiei roor kedhie.
Ku enɔɔne, wek yɔɔk, yan, Mɛɛcki rot ne kɔcke, palki keek: na loŋe ku luɔiye, te ee yen kede kɔc tei, ka bi riaar:
ku na ye kede Nhialic, acaki bi leu ne tiem; ke we cii bi yok aye kɔc piɔt e Nhialic.
Goki loŋde gam: na wen, acik tuuc cɔɔl, ke ke duiki, ku thɔnki keek alal, yan, Duoki jam be ya guiir ne rin ke Yecu: ku jɔki ke pɔl.
Goki jal e loŋ nɔm, ke ke mit piɔth nɔn cike tɔ ye kɔc e roŋ ne guom de ayaar ne baŋ de Rinke.
Ku akool nyiin kedhie, e luaŋdit e Nhialicic ayi ɣoot yiic ebɛn, akenki weet aa pɔl, ayi guieer e welpiɛth aya, yan, Yecu yen aye Kritho, akenki pɔl.
Na ɣɔn e akoolke, te ci kuen e kɔcpiooce ŋuak, ke Judai e bɔ paan e Giriki ke ke cak dhieeu ne kɔc ke Eberu, yan, ci dieerken ke nyɔŋ dieer cin niim roor, te teke weu e akoolnyiin kedhie.
Na wen, ke kɔc kathieer ku rou ke ke cɔl kut e kɔc ci gam, ku luelki, yan, Acii piɛth e luɔi bi wo jam e Nhialic pɔl, ku yok kecam tɛk kɔc.
Na enɔɔne, week mithekɔckuɔ, jaki roor kadherou kɔɔr e weyiic, roor cath e rin piɛth e kɔc yiic, ku cik thiaŋ e Weidit Ɣer ku pɛlenɔm, kɔc buk taau e luɔiye nɔm.
Ku wook, wo bi ya ceŋ e wo laŋ, ku guiirku jam.

Ku loŋe aci kut e kɔc tɔ mit piɔth kedhie, agoki Thepano lɔc, raan e gam aret, ku ci thiaŋ e Weidit Ɣer, ku Pilip, ku Porokoro, ku Nikanor, ku Thimon, ku Parmena, ku Nikolao raan e bɔ Antiokia ku ci rot tɔ ye Judai.
Goki ke taau e tuuc niim: na wen, acik lɔŋ, ke ke thɛny kecin e kegup.
Go jam e Nhialic piny kiet nɔm: go kuen e kɔcpiooce go enyin ŋuak alal e Jeruthalem; ayi rem diit e bany ke ka ke Nhialic acik gam dot.
Ku Thepano ee raan e piɔu adhuɛŋ aret, ku ciɛth ke riɛl dit, ku aci gook looi e kɔc yiic ayi ka ye kɔc ke gai.

Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk e ke jɔt rot, ke kɔc ke luaŋ ee kɔc gueer thin luaŋ e kɔc cɔl Libertinoi, ayi kɔc ke Kurenai, ku kɔc ke Alekandarei, keke kɔc ke Kilikia, ku Athia, ke ke jɔt rot, akɔɔrki teer ne Thepano.
Ku aci teer ke dhal, ne pɛl pel en nɔm, ku ne Wei cath ne yen, te jiɛɛm en.
Agoki roor kɔk riɔp, kɔc bi e lueel, yan, Raane acuk piŋ ke lat Mothe, ayi Nhialic.
Agoki kɔc riir ale, ayi roordit, ayi kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr, agoki bak, dɔmki, ku thelki leerki e loŋ nɔm.
Agoki caatɔɔ aluɛth tɔ kaac nhial, kɔc bi e lueel, yan, Raane acii jam e pɔl jam de lɛɛt ee yen wune laat wun ɣeric, ayi loŋ:
acuk piŋ ke lueel, yan, Yecu de Nadhareth, yen abi wune riɔɔk, ago ciɛɛŋ puk, ciɛɛŋ cii Mothe yien wook.
Na wen, ke kɔc kedhie kɔc rɛɛr e loŋic, ke ke tom Thepano guop, goki tiŋ nyin, acit nyin tunynhial.
Go bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic thieec, yan, Yek yith kek ekake?
Go lueel, yan, We wɛɛtkewaar ku warkuɔ, piɛŋki. Nhialic cath ke dhueeŋ, yen aci tuol tede waardan Abraɣam te ɣɔn nu yen Methopotamia, aŋoot ke ken guɔ ceŋ e Karan;
go yɔɔk, yan, Jel paandun ku pal mithekɔckun, ku ba paan ba nyuoth yin.
Ago jal paan e Kaldayo, bi ku nyuuc e Karan: na wen, aci wun guɔ thou, ke tɔ Nhialic jel, bi paane paan rɛɛr wek thin enɔɔne.

Ku acin piny ci gam en etene, piny bi nyaŋ mithke, acakaa biak thiin dueere raan liir nɔm acinkedaŋ: aa jɔ lueel tei, an, bi gam en bi aa kede, ku kede mithkɛn bi lɔɔk bɛn e yecok, ku aŋoot ke cin nɔm meth.
Aci Nhialic lueel ale, yan, bi mithke dhil keny paan lei, paan bi keek tɔ ye him thin, ku yeke yɔŋ, bot kaŋuan e run.
Ku lueel Nhialic aya, yan, Jur e tɔ keek e him, aba tɔ yok kedɛn tuc: na miak, ka bik bɛn bei, bik a bɛn lam etene.
Goki loŋ mac, yan, bi kɔc cueel: go Abrabam Yithak dhieeth, ku jɔ cueel ekool ee kek bɛt; ku dhieth Yithak Jakop, ku dhieth Jakop kuarkuɔn thɛɛr kathieer ku rou.
Na wen, ke kuarkuɔn thɛɛr ke ke dɔm tiɛɛl ne Jothep, agoki ɣaac tɔki leere Rip: ku tɔu Nhialic keke yen tei,
ago luok ne ka ci e miɛn ebɛn, ku gɛm dhueeŋ ku pɛlenɔm e Paro nɔm, yen aaye malik de Rip; ago dɔm abi aa bɛnydiit nu e Rip nɔm ku dhiende nɔm ebɛn.
Na wen, ke cɔk bɔ paan e Rip ebɛn ayi paan e Kanaan, ku bɔ rɛɛc e kɔc cuil gup: go kuarkuɔ cien ke piir kek cik yok.
Na wen, aci Jakop e piŋ nɔn nu rap paan e Rip, ke kɔn kuarkuɔ tuɔɔc etɛɛn raan tok.
Na wen, aci cok aa rou, ke Jothep tɔ rot ŋic mithakecken; go dhien e Jothep nyuoth Paro.
Na wen, ke Jothep toc kɔc lek Jakop wun cɔɔl, keke kɔcken kedhie, kɔc kathierdherou ku dhic.
Go Jakop lɔ Rip, ku thou, yen keke kuarkuɔ;
goki lɛɛr Cekem, lek taau e raŋic, raŋ ɣɔn cii Abraɣam ɣɔɔc e weu tede wɛɛt ke Emor raan e Cekem.
Na wen, aci kool cii Nhialic mac keke Abraɣam guɔ thiɔk, ke kɔc e ke jɔ ro ŋuak abik juec aret paan e Rip,
aɣet te ci malik daŋ ro jɔt, malik kuc Jothep.
Go jurda luoi rueeny, yen emalike, ku jɔ kuarkuɔ cieŋ e ciɛɛŋ rac, an, bi miththiiken cuat wiir, ke ke bi thou.
Ɣɔn nu malike, yen aa dhieethe Mothe, ke ye mɛnh ci lakelak, go muk e pɛi kadiak paan e wun:
na wen, aci taau biic, ke jɔt nyan e Paro, ago muk tɔ ye wende.
Go Mothe weet ne pɛl e kɔc ke Rip ebɛn, aci aa raan ril e wel ku luɔi.
Te ci en run thol kathierŋuan, ke jɔ piɔu dɛ luɔi bi en kɔcken neem, kek kɔc ke Yithrael.
Na wen, ke tiŋ raan tok e keek aci dui e ɣɔric, ku jɔ luok, go kede raan ci kuoc cieŋ guoor, yup mɛnh e Rip:
aa ye lueel e yepiɔu nɔn bi kɔcken e ŋic, luɔi bi Nhialic keek kony e yecin; ku akenki ŋic.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke yok kɔc kaarou ne kɔcken yiic ke ke piɔt kapac, ku jɔ kɔɔr luɔi bi en keek mɔɔk, yan, Wathii, wek ee kɔc ke raan tok, eeŋo cam wek rot?
Na wen, ke raan wen ci mɛnhkene cam, ke jiep Mothe wei, yan, Nyai! eeŋa ci yi tɔ ye bɛnyda, bɛny bi loŋda ya guiir?
Ba a nɔk e naŋ e mony e Rip waanakol?
Go Mothe jɔ kat ne ejame, le ku reer paan e Midian, ago mithwat dhieeth kaarou etɛɛn.
Na wen, aci run kathierŋuan thok, ke tunynhial tuny e Bɛnydit tul tede yen e jɔɔric jɔɔr e kuurdit cɔl Thinai, tul mɛɛc many dɛp e tim cekic.
Na wen, aci Mothe ye tiŋ, ke gai ne ke ci tiŋ: go lɔ tethiɔk le gɔɔk apiɛth, go rol e Bɛnydit tuol, ku yook, yan,
Yɛn Nhialic de kuarkun, Nhialic de Abraɣam, ku Yithak, ku Jakop. Go Mothe lath guop, ku jɔ riɔɔc e daai bi en bɛ daai.
Go Bɛnydit yɔɔk, yan, Bɛɛiye war bei e yicok: te kɛɛc yin thin ee piny ɣeric egɔk.
Ciɛɛŋ ci kɔcki kuoc cieŋ paan e Rip aca tiŋ egɔk, ku dhien ee kek dhiau aca piŋ, ku ja guɔ bɛn piny ba ke bɛn luok. Enɔɔne ba, yin ba tuɔɔc Rip.

Yen Mothe guop raan waan cik rɛɛc, yan, Eeŋa e tɔ yin e bɛny e woniim, bɛny bi loŋda ya guiir? yenguop acii Nhialic tooc, bi aa bɛny bi keek cieŋ, ku kony ke, ne tunynhial tuny e tul tede yen e tim cekic.
Yen eraane yen aa bii ke bei, wen ci en gook looi gook bi kɔc ke gai paan e Rip, ku Abapdit Thith, ku jɔɔric e tun kathierŋuan.
Yen Motheye ki, raan waan yook kɔc ke Yithrael, yan, Nebi tok abii Bɛnyduondit Nhialic jat nhial ne kedun e kɔckun yiic, raan cit ɛn; jamde abak piŋ.
Kene ee raan waan e nu e kɔc yiic kɔc ci gueer e jɔɔric, keke tunynhial etok, tuny waan jam ke yen e kuurdit Thinai nɔm, ku aa nu keke kuarkuɔ ayadaŋ: ee raan waan ci wel piir noom, bi ke yien wook:
raan waan ci kuarkuɔ kede rɛɛc piŋ, acik jap wei, agoki kepiɔth bɛ pɔk Rip,
agoki Aaron yɔɔk, yan, Cuɛce wo yieth bik wo wɛt kueer: na raan cɔl Motheye, mɛnh waan bii wook bei e Rip, ke ci tic tede yen akucku.
Goki dau cueec e akoolke, tɔki ye yanhden, ku thɛtki, ku mitki piɔth ne ke cik cueec e kecin.

Na wen, ke Nhialic yɛl rot wei, ku pɛl keek bik rem de kuɛl nhial aa lam; acit man ci e gɔɔr e awarek de nebiiyic, yan, Week, e we ye ya that ne ka yak nɔk ku tɛmki kerot E jɔɔric e run kathierŋuan, we dhien e Yithrael?
Keemɔ de Molok acak dɔm, Ku damki kuel e yanhduon Repan, Ka cak cueec abak keek aa lam: Ku enɔɔne, we ba lɛɛr e Babulon baŋ tui.
Kuarkuɔ aake ye cath ne keemɔ de caatɔ e jɔɔric, acit man ci Nhialic e lueel, waan yook en Mothe, an, bi ye looi ne kede cuɛc ci tiŋ.
Na wen, ke kuarkuɔn e bɔ e kecok ke ke look keemɔ bɛɛi Jocua ɣɔn peec kek piny de juur cii Nhialic ciɛɛc wei e kuarkuɔ niim, ago tɔu aɣet akool ke Dabid;
raan nu e Nhialic piɔu, ku aa de piɔu luɔi bi en luak yik luaŋ bi Nhialic de Jakop reer thin.
Ku Tholomon yen aa yik en luak.
Ku Awarjaŋ acie reer e luek yiic tei, luek ci yik e kɔc cin; acit nɔn lueele nebi yen, yan,
Paannhial yen aye thoonydien dit, Ku piny yen aye ken aa yɛn acok dhɔɔr: Ee ɣonou bak yiek ɛn? ke lueel Bɛnydit ki: Ku te duɛɛr ɛn lɔŋ thin akou?
Cie ciindi yen e cuec ekake kedhie?
Week kɔc ril niim, kɔc kene cueel piɔth, ku keneke cueel yith, wek ee cool e luel ater ne Weidit Ɣer ecaŋɣɔn: cit man e kuarkun, ayi week aya.
Eeŋa e nebii yiic raan kene kuarkun yɔŋ guop? ku acik kɔc nɔk kɔc waan nyuoth keek tueŋ ne bɛn e Raan Piɛthpiɔu; raan cak guɔ nyiɛɛn enɔɔne ku kuorki abi thou:
wek kɔc ci yien loŋ ne guiɛɛk ci tuucnhial e guik, ku rɛɛcki dot e muk.
Na wen, acik kake piŋ, ke ke guute piɔth, agoki kelec reem e yenɔm.
Go Thepano, wen ci en thiaŋ ke Weidit Ɣer, go tenhial toomic e daai, ku tiŋ dhueeŋ de Nhialic, ku tiŋ Yecu ke kaac e baŋ cueny de Nhialic.
Go lueel, an, Tieŋki, paanhial a wɔi aci yeyic liep; ku wɔi Wen e raan ke kaac e baŋ cueny de Nhialic.
Goki coot e rol dit, ku kumki keyith, goki Thepano bak raantok;
ku cuɛtki biic e panydit kec, ku biookki e kur; ku tɛɛu caatɔɔ lupɔɔken piny e dhuŋ cɔl Thaulo cok,
Goki Thepano biɔɔk e kur, ke cot, lueel, yan, Bɛnydit Yecu, loor weiki.
Go emiɔl tuk, ku coot e rol dit, yan, Bɛnydit, du kerɛɛce deer e keyieth. Na wen, aci kene lueel, ke nin.
Ku gam Thaulo thonde. Na wen, e akoolke, ke yoŋ dit cak rot tede kanithɔ nu Jeruthalem; goki thiei roor piny e Judaya ebɛn keke Thamaria, keek kedhie, ee tuuc kapac ke ke dɔŋ.
Go kɔc rieu Nhialic goki Thepano jɔt lek thiɔk, ku dhieuki e dhien dit.
Ku Thaulo yen aa ye kanithɔ riɔɔk, ee lɔ e ɣoot yiic kedhie, le ku dɔm roor ku diaar, mɛc keek e aloocic.
Na wen, ke kɔc ci thiei roor ke ke lɔ baaiyic ebɛn, lek kɔc guieer jam.
Ku lɔ Pilip panydiit cɔl Thamaria, le kɔc guieer Kritho.
Na wen, ke kɔc e ke gam ka lueel Pilip ne piɔn tok, waan piŋ kek gook ci looi ku tiŋki keek.
Jɔɔk rac acik bɛn bei e kɔc juec gup, kɔc cik dɔm, ke ke cot e rol dit, ku dem kɔc juec ci duany, ayi ŋol.
Go miɛtepiɔu dit e panydiite.
Ku ade raan cɔl Thimon, raan waan e kɔc thueeth e panydiite guop, ee kɔc ke Thamaria tɔ gai aret, ku ye rot tɔ ye gok diit e raan;
aake ye jamde piŋ kedhie, kɔc kor aɣɔl kɔc dit, aa yek lueel, an, Raane acath ke riɛl diit e Nhialic.
Aake ye kede piŋ, luɔi ci en keek tɔ gai ne thuɛth ee yen thueth ecaŋɣɔn.
Na wen, acik jam de Pilip gam, waan guiir en ka ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic ku rin ke Yecu Kritho, ke ke baptith, roor ayi diaar.
Go Thimon guop gam ayadaŋ: na wen, aci baptith, ke ye cool e rɛɛr keke Pilip, ku gɛi, wen ci en gook ci looi tiŋ ayi kagai.
Na wen, aci tuuc nu Jeruthalem e piŋ nɔn ci Thamaria jam e Nhialic gam, goki Petero tuoc keek keke Jɔn:
te ci kek bɛn, ke ke laŋ Nhialic ne biakden, yan, bik Weidit Ɣer noom:
aŋootki ke ke ken loony e raan tok guop e keyiic: acike baptith tei ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu.
Ku jɔki kecin thany e kegup, agoki Weidit Ɣer noom.
Na wen, aci Thimon e tiŋ nɔn ci kɔc miɔɔc ne Weidit Ɣer ne thany ci tuuc kecin thany e kegup, ke jɔ, yan, gɛm keek weu,
yan, Gamki yɛn e riɛle aya, ke raan ban acin thany e yeguop ke bi Weidit Ɣer noom.
Go Petero yɔɔk, yan, E weuku e ke mar e yin etok, luɔi ci yin e lueel e yipiɔu nɔn dueere miɔc e Nhialic ɣɔɔc e weu.
Jame yin liu thin eliŋliŋ: piɔndu acii piɛth e Nhialic nyin.
Yen puk yin yipiɔu ne kerɛɛcduon ci wooce, ku jɔ Nhialic lɔŋ, ke ke ci tak e yiniɔu ke bi dɛ te bi e yien pal yin.
Yin wɔi enɔɔne, yin tɔu ke yi kec piɔu cit man e keth, ku cii kerac duut aril.
Go Thimon bɛɛr, yan, Laŋki Nhialic ne kedi, ke bi cien ke bi bɛn e yaguop ne ka wen cak lueel.
Na wen, acik guieer guiir kek kɔc jam e Nhialic thol, ke ke jɔ keniim dhuony Jeruthalem, ku guiirki welpieth bɛi ke Thamaria bɛi juec.
Na wen, ke tunynhial tuny e Bɛnydit jɔ Pilip yɔɔk, yan, Jɔt rot, lɔ te lɔ wowic, te nu kueer jel e Jeruthalem le Gadha, kueer tek e jɔɔric.

Go ro jɔt ku jel: ku ade mony e Aithiopia, mony ci roc, ku ye bɛnydiit de naamdɛn dit e Kandake cok, tiiŋ malik de Aithiopia, ku nu monye e weu niim kedhie, weu ke tiiŋ malik, ku aaci bɛn Jeruthalem bi bɛn lam;
ku dhuny enɔm ke rɛɛr e abeldeyic abel biic, ke kuen gaar e nebi Yithayayic.
Na wen, ke jɔ Weidit Pilip yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ tethiɔk, mate rot e kɔc ke abele yiic.
Go Pilip kat le te nu yen, go piŋ ke kuen gaar e nebi Yithayayic, ku thieec, yan, Ŋic thar e ke kuen?
Go lueel, an, Duɛɛr ŋic adi, te cin en raan bi a bɛn nyuooth? Go Pilip lɔŋ, an, Ba nhial, nyuc e yalɔɔm.
Ku te wen kueen en kecigɔɔric aci gɔɔr ale, yan, Aci thel cit man e amal lɔ teem rol; Ku cit man ee nyɔŋ amaal lɔ lik e raan nɔm raan tem nhimke, Yen a miim en aya:
Ne kuur ci e tɔ koor en aci loŋde kuoc guiir: Ku remde eeŋa bi ye lueel? Luɔi ci weike nyaai e piny nɔm.
Go mony ci roc Pilip yɔɔk, yan, Yin thieec, yan, E nebi luel jame e kede ŋa? ee kede yenguop, ku ye kede raan daŋ?
Na wen, ke Pilip jɔ yethok tueer, ku gɔl jam e cook awen, ago guieer ka ke Yecu.
Na wen, te ciɛth kek kueer, ke ke jɔ ɣet te nu piu: go mony ci roc lueel, yan, Tiŋ, piu ki; eeŋo pen a baptith?
Go Pilip lueel, yan, Te gam yin e yipiɔu ebɛn, ke yin dueere baptith. Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn gam Yecu Kritho nɔn ee yen Wen e Nhialic.
Go abel biic tɔ kaac: goki lɔ piny kaarou leki e piu yiic, yen Pilip keke mony ci roc; go baptith.
Na wen, acik bɛn bei e piu yiic, ke Wei ke Bɛnydit ke ke gɔp Pilip wei; ku akene mony ci roc bɛ tiŋ, go kueerde dɔmic ke mit piɔu.
Go Pilip rot a yok Adhoto: go teek e pɛɛnydit yiic kedhie, ke guiir welpiɛth, aɣet te ci en bɛn Kaithareia.
Ku Thaulo, aŋoot ke bii wɛi bei e yethok wɛi wɛɛi yen kɔcpiooce Bɛnydit, yan, bi ke kuur e nak, go lɔ te nu bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic,
le ku kɔɔr awareek tede yen awareek bi gaar kɔc ke luek ke Nhialic Damathko, yan, te de yen kɔc ci yok kɔc cath e Kueere, nɔn ee kek roor, ku nɔn ee kek diaar, yan, bi ke bɛɛi Jeruthalem ke ke mac.
Na wen, ke jɔ keny, ku ɣet tethiɔk ke Damathko: na wen, ke keɣer dap tuol ethiau, ke bɔ nhial, go piny riaau e yelɔɔm;
go wiik, ku piŋ rol yook en, an, Thaulo, Thaulo, eeŋo yɔŋ yin ɛn?
Go thieec, yan, Ee yin ŋa, Bɛnydit? Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Yɛn Yecu raan yɔŋe: atok te wec yin wiɛth thook.
Go lath guop ku pɛu piɔu, go thieec, yan, Bɛnydit, eeŋo kɔɔr ke ba looi? Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Jɔt rot, lɔ panydit, yin bi lɛk ke ba dhil looi.
Go kɔc cath ne yen goki kɔɔc, acik lɔ lik, ke ke piŋ rol, ku acin raan cik tiŋ.
Na wen, ke Thaulo jɔt rot piny; ku liep enyin, ku cii piny woi; agoki dɔm cin, ku thelki, leerki Damathko.
Ku jɔ tɔu e nin kadiak ke cii piny e tiŋ, ku cii cam ku cii dek.
Ku ade raanpiooce Damathko, cɔl Anania; na wen, aci Bɛnydit yɔɔk, ke e nyuoth, yan, Anania. Go gam, an, Ya ki, Bɛnydit.
Go Bɛnydit lueel, an, Jɔt rot, lɔ kueer cɔl Lɔcit, lɔ ɣon e Judath lɔ luɔp e raan cɔl Thaulo, raan e Tartho; tiŋ, alaŋ;
ku aci raan tiŋ ke e nyuoth, raan cɔl Anania a bɔ ɣot, bi ku thɛny ecin e yenɔm, ke bi bɛ yin.
Go Anania bɛɛr, an, Bɛnydit, kede raane aca piŋ tede kɔc juec, ne karɛc juec ci luoi kɔckuon ɣerpiɔth e Jeruthalem:
ku acath ke riɛl etene tede banydit ke ka Nhialic, bi kɔc bɛn mac kedhie kɔc e rinku cɔɔl.
Go Bɛnydit yɔɔk, yan, Lɔ: raane ee raandien ca lɔc, bi rinki lɛɛr e Juoor niim, ku maliik niim, ku kɔc ke Yithiael niim:
aba nyuoth kajuec bi dhil guum ne baŋ de rinki.

Go Anania jal, le ɣot; na wen, ke thɛny ecin e yenɔm, ku lueel, yan, Thaulo mɛnhkai, yɛn aa tooc Bɛnydit Yecu, raan e tiec tede yin kueer waan bi yin ene, yen aa toc ɛn, ke yi bi piny bɛ tiŋ, ku ba thiaŋ ne Weidit Ɣer.
Na wen, etethiine, ke kaŋ e ke jɔ loony piny e yenyin kacit kuɛc, ago bɛ yin; ago ro jɔt, ku baptith;
na wen, aci kecam thieep, ke jɔ riɛl. Go reer Damathko akoolke keke kocpiooce.
Go jam dap gɔl e luek ke Nhialic yiic, aguiir Yecu, an, ee Wen e Nhialic.
Go kɔc piŋ jamde agoki gai kedhie, ku thiecki rot, yan, Kene cie yen e raan waan e kɔc yɔŋ kɔc e rinke cɔɔl e Jeruthalem, ku bi etene, luɔi bi en keek lɛɛr e banydit ke ka ke Nhialic niim ke ke mac?
Ku jɔ Thaulo rot ŋuak e riɛl, ku ye Judai rɛɛr e Damathko guut e loŋ, ke nyuuth keek egɔk, nɔn ee Yecu yen ee Kritho guop.
Na wen, aci nin juec lɛɛr, ke cieme Judai yai, an, bik nɔk:
ku yandɛn cik cam acii Thaulo ŋic. Goki kɛl aa tiit thook akol ku wɛɛrwakɔu, luɔi bi kek e nɔk:
na wen, ke noom kɔcpiooce wakɔu, ku luɛiki piny e pany kɔu e dionyic.
Na wen, aci Thaulo bɛn Jeruthalem, ke them luɔi bi en mat keke kɔcpiooce; agoki riɔɔc e yen kedhie, akeniti gam nɔn ee yen raanpiooce eyic.
Go Baranaba Thaulo noom, leer tede tuuc, ku jɔ keek guieer ne tiŋ ci en Bɛnydit tiŋ kueer, ago jam ne yen, ku luɔi ci en kɔc guieer e Damathko ne rin ke Yecu ke ye ŋeeny.
Go tɔu keke keek e Jeruthalem, ke ye lɔ biic ku bi,
ku ye kɔc guieer ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu ke ye ŋeeny; go wel aa tɛɛr keke Judai e bɔ paan e Giriki; ku adeki piɔth luɔi nɛk kek en.
Na wen, aci wathii e piŋ, ke jɔtki leerki Kaithareia, goki tɔ lɔ Tartho.
Go kanithɔɔ jɔ reer ke ke lɔ diu e Judaya ebɛn ku Galili ku Thamaria, goki jɔ riɛl e gam; ku yek cath e rieu de Bɛnydit, ku ne muŋdepiɔu de Weidit Ɣer, agoki kenyin ŋuak.
Na wen, ke Petero ciɛɛth baayic ebɛn, ku jɔ ɣet tenu kɔc ɣerpiɔth ceŋ Luda aya.
Ku yok mony tok etɛɛn, cɔl Ainea, mony e dhɔt piny e laŋarep nɔm e run kabɛt, ke ye duany.
Go Petero yɔɔk, yan, Ainea, Yecu Kritho atɔ yin dem: jɔt rot, loi laŋarepdu. Go rot jɔt enɔnthiine.
Na wen, ke tiŋ kɔc ceŋ Luda ebɛn ayi kɔc ceŋ Tharon, ku jɔki kepiɔth wɛl Bɛnydit.
Ku ade raanpiooce e Jopa, tiiŋ cɔl Tabitha, yen aye Doruka e thoŋ e Giriki (ku cɔl Ŋɛɛr ne thoŋda): tiiŋe ee tiiŋ piɛth cin, ee cool e loi luɔi piɛth, ku ye kɔc kuany nyiin miɔɔc.
Na wen, e akoolke, ke jɔ took, en etiiŋe, ku thou; goki waak guop, ku tɛɛuki ɣon nu nhial.
Te ci kɔcpiooce e piŋ nɔn nu Petero e Luda, (Jopa ee paan thiaak ke Luda), ke ke jɔ kɔc tooc kaarou, lek lɔŋ, yan, Dap bɛn tede wook, cak, an, de ke gau yin, ke nyaaŋe piny.

Go Petero ro jɔt ku le ke keek. Na wen, aci bɛn, ke jɔki lɛɛr ɣot ɣon nu nhial: ku kaac diaar ebɛn e yelɔɔm dieer cin niim roor, ke ke dhiau, anyuthki yen aluluut ku lupɔɔ kɔk kak e kɔɔc Doruka, waan reer en ke keek.
Go Petero ke tɔ lɔ biic kedhie, go emiɔl tuk ku lɛŋ; na wen, ke wel enɔm raan ci thou, ku yook, yan, Tabitha, jɔt rot. Go enyin liep: na wen, aci Petero tiŋ, ke jɔt rot reer.
Go dɔm cin, ku jɔt nhial; go kɔc ɣerpiɔth cɔɔl keke dieer cin niim roor, ku jɔ ke yien raan ke piir.
Go jɔ ŋic e Jopa ebɛn, go kɔc juec agoki Bɛnydit gam.
Na wen, ke rɛɛr e Jopa e nhi juec ɣon e Thimon, aten e biok coŋ.
Ku ade raan nu Kaithareia, cɔl Korunelio, ee bɛny de rem alathker, rem cɔl Thiyan,
ee raan rieu Nhialic, ku ye ka ke Nhialic kɔɔr, yen keke dhiende ebɛn, ku ye adhuɛŋ e kɔc miɔɔc aya, ku ye cool e laŋ Nhialic e akoolnyiin kedhie.
Na wen, te cit thaar kadheŋuan akol, ke tiŋ tuny e Nhialic ke tiec egɔk, ke bɔ tede yen, bi ku yook, yan, Korunelio.
Na wen, aci woi guop, ke pau piɔu, ku lueel, yan, Ee kaŋo, Bɛnydit? Go yɔɔk, yan, Lɔŋdu ku miɔcduon e kɔc kuany nyiin acik ɣet nhial e Nhialic nɔm, an, bik aa ka bi Nhialic aa tak.
Ku enɔɔne, tuoce kɔc Jopa, lek raan cɔl Thimon lɔ diec, rin kɔk acɔlke Petero:
arɛɛr keke raan cɔl Thimon aten e biok coŋ, ɣonde anu e abapdit yɔu; yen abi yi lɛk ke ba dhil looi.
Na wen, aci tuny nhial wen jam ke yen jal, ke cɔl kɔc lni ɣonde kaarou, keke alathker tok e kɔc yiic kɔc e cool e loi kede, ku ye raan rieu Nhialic;
ago ke guieer kaŋ kedhie, ku jɔ ke tuɔɔc Jopa.
Na ɣɔnmiak, te ŋoot kek kueer, ku cik thiaak e panydit, te ci akɔl kɔɔc cil, go Petero lɔ nhial e ɣot nɔm le lɔŋ:
na wen, ke jɔ cɔk nɔk aret, ago cam kɔɔr; ku te ŋoot kek e ke guik kecam, ke jɔ nyuoth;
ku jɔ nhial tiŋ a ɣɔɔr, go kedaŋ loony piny e yelɔɔm, acit gok diit e lupɔ, ci mac e cin kaŋuan, ke luɛiye piny;
ku ade yic lai de cok kaŋuan ebɛn ku lai roor ku kamol piny ku diɛt nhial.
Go rol tuol, an, Jɔt rot, Petero, nak, ku cuet.
Go Petero jai, an, Ei, Bɛnydit; kerac ayi kenhiany akɛn ke kɔn cam anandi.
Go rol bɛ nyɔk raanrou, ku yook, yan, Ke cii Nhialic tɔ piɛth, du tɔ rac, yin.
Kene aci looi raandiak: ku jɔ kedaŋ bɛ jat nhial.
Na wen, aŋoot Petero ke dhɛl ke wen ci tiŋ ke e nyuoth, aken yokic, ke kɔc ci tooc e Korunelio ke ke dap bɛn, acik ɣon e Thimon luɔp, ku kɛɛcki e kal thok,
goki coot, thiecki nɔn de raan etɛɛn, raan cɔl Thimon, ku cɔl Petero aya.
Ku te ŋoot Petero ke ciet ke ci tiŋ e yepiɔu, ke yook e Weidit Ɣer, an, Tiŋ, ade kɔc kɔɔr yin kadiak.
Jɔt rot, lɔ piny, ku lɔ we keek, du piɔu be cɔm; ee yɛn e toc keek.
Go Petero lɔ piny te nu kɔc e tuce yen e Korunelio, le ku lueel, yan, Ya ki, yɛn ee raan wen kaarki: ee kaŋo ke ba wek?

Goki lueel, yan, Korunelio, bɛny e rem e alathker, raan piɛthpiɔu, ku ye Nhialic rieu, ku ye raan piɛth rin e jur e Judaiyic ebɛn, en aa yooke Nhialic ne tunynhial tuny ɣeric, yan, bi yi tuoc kɔc, an, ba lɔ ɣonde, ke bi wel piŋ tede yin.
Go ke caal ɣot, tɔ keek e kamaan. Na ɣɔnmiak, ke jel ke keek, ku cath wathii kɔk ne yen, kɔc ke Jopa.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke ke ɣet Kaithareia. Ku tit Korunelio keek, aci kɔcken cɔɔl ku mathkɛn nhiɛɛr, bik bɛn gueer.
Na wen, abɔ Petero ɣot, ke loor Korunelio, le ku cuɛt rot piny e yecok, ku lɛm.
Go Petero jat nhial, ku lueel, yan, Jɔt rot; yɛn guop aya yɛn ee raan tei.
Na wen, aŋoot ke jam ke yen, ke jɔ lɔ ɣot, ku yok kɔc juec ci gueer:
go keek yɔɔk, yan, Aŋiɛcki nɔn rɛɛc en, te mɛte raan e Judai keke raan e jur daŋ, ayi te neem en en; ku yɛn cii Nhialic nyuooth, yan, ca raan daŋ bi tɔ rac ku ta col:
yen a ba yɛn, ke ya ken gook, te waan cɔɔle ya. Wek luɔp enɔɔne, e ke e tuoc wek ɛn.
Go Korunelio lueel, yan, Nin waan e kaŋuan, yɛn e kecam theek aɣet te cit ethaare; ku thaar kadheŋuan yɛn aa laŋ Nhialic ɣondi; na wen, ke raan kaac e yanɔm ke ceŋ lupɔ lɔ riauriau,
ku lueel, an, Korunelio, lɔŋdu aci piŋ, ku miɔcduon e kɔc kuany nyiin aa muk Nhialic e yepiɔu.
Yen tooc yin kɔc Jopa, lek Thimon cɔɔl etene, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Petero; arɛɛr ɣon e Thimon aten e biok coŋ e abapdit yɔu: te ci en bɛn, ka bi jam ke yin.
Yen aa dap ɛn kɔc tuoc yin enɔnthiine; ku yin e kepiɛth looi nɔn ci yin bɛn. Na enɔɔne, wok ki etene e Nhialic nɔm wodhie, buk kaŋ bɛn piŋ kedhie, ka cii Nhialic thɔn yin.
Na wen, ke Petero tuer ethok, ku lueel, yan, Yɛn e Nhialic tiŋ eyic, nɔn cii en e raan e kɔc kuany yiic:
ku ne juooric ebɛn, raan rieu en ku ye kepiɛth looi, yen anu e Nhialic piɔu.
Jam cii Nhialic tuoc kɔc ke Yithrael, ke guiir mat ne Yecu Kritho (yen aye Bɛnydiit nu e kɔc niim kedhie)
jame aŋiɛcki, jam ci tai piny e Judaya ebɛn, le gɔl Galili, e baptith cok baptinh cii Jɔn guiir;
jam ne kede Yecu de Nadhareth, luɔi ci Nhialic e tɔc ne Weidit Ɣer, ku gɛm riɛl: ago piny aa caath ke ye kepiɛth looi, ku tɔ kɔc dem kɔc cii jɔŋdiit rac cieŋ e ciɛɛŋ rac; luɔi ciɛthe Nhialic ke yen.
Ku wook, wok ee caatɔɔ ne ka ci looi ebɛn paan e Judai, ayi Jeruthalem; ku acik nɔk abi thou, ne nok ci kek e nook e tim nɔm.
Yen acii Nhialic jat nhial ekool ee kek diak, ku tɔ tiec egɔk;
ku acie tede kɔc kedhie, yen e tic en, ee tede caatɔɔ cii Nhialic kɔn lɔc, ke wook, kɔc wen e cam ne yen ku dekki, te ci en rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Ku aci wo yɔɔk, yan, buk kɔc aa guieer ku yok caatɔɔke, yan, ee yen ee raan cii Nhialic dɔm aye Bɛny e loŋ guiir loŋ de kɔc piir ayi kɔc ci thou.
Ku nebii ebɛn acik aa caatɔɔ ne kede, an, ne rin ke yen raan ebɛn raan gam en abi miɔɔc ne nyiɛɛi bi karɛcke nyaai.
Na wen, te ŋoote Petero ke luel welke, ke Weidit Ɣer loony e kɔc gup kedhie kɔc piŋ jam.
Go kɔc ci gam kɔc ci cueel, ke kɔc wen bɔ ne Petero etok, agoki gai kedhie, luɔi ci Juoor miɔɔc ne Weidit Ɣer ayadaŋ, luuŋeke e kegup.
Acik ke piŋ ke ke jam e thook lei, ke ke lec Nhialic. Go Petero bɛɛr, yan,
De raan dueer piu peen, an, cii kɔcke baptith, kɔc wen ci Weidit Ɣer yok cit man e woke?
Go ke yɔɔk, an, bike baptith ne rin ke Bɛnydit. Na wen, ke laŋki, an, bi reer ke keek e akool like.
Na wen, ke tuuc ku kɔc ci mat e gam kɔc e tɔu e Judaya ke ke piŋ nɔn ci Juoor jam e Nhialic gam ayadaŋ.
Na wen, aci Petero bɛn Jeruthalem, ke kɔc ke cuɛl ke ke gɔl teer e yen,
luelki, yan, Yin e lɔ ɣot weke kɔc kene cueel, ku came we keek.
Go Petero jam gɔl, ku guiir keek ne kueny e kaŋ kecok kuany, yan,
Yɛn aa nu panydiit cɔl Jopa ke ya laŋ: guɔ nyuoth e kaŋ ke ya yien, kedaŋ aa bɔ piny acit gok diit e lupɔ, aci luai piny nhial e cin kaŋuan; go ɣeet te nuo yɛn;
na wen, aca woiyic, ke ya ciet apiɔu, guɔ lai ke piny tiŋ, lai de cok kaŋuan, ku lai rac, ku kak e mol piny, ayi diɛt nhial.
Ku piɛŋ rol aya, rol yook ɛn, yan, Jɔt rot, Petero; nak ku cuet.
Guɔ jai, ya, Ei, Bɛnydit, acin kerac ayi kenhiany ci kɔn lɔ e yathok anandi.
Go rol bɛ bɛn nhial, yan, Ke cii Nhialic tɔ piɛth, du tɔ rac, yin.
Kene aci looi raandiak: go kaŋ bɛ jat nhial kedhie.
Na wen, etethiine, ke kɔc kadiak e ke kaac ɣot thok ɣon nu wok thin, kɔc ci tuoc ɛn ne Kaithareia.
Go Weidit a yɔɔk, yan, Du piɔu cɔm, lɔ we keek. Ku cath wɛɛtke kadhetem ne yɛn, agoku lɔ ɣon e raane:
go wook lɛk tiŋ ci en tunynhial tiŋ ɣonde ke kaac, ku yook, yan, Tuoce kɔc Jopa lek Thimon cɔɔl, yen aye Petero aya;
yen abi week lɛk wel, wel bi yi kony wei weke dhiendu ebɛn.
Na wen, agal jam, ke Weidit Ɣer ke ke loony e kegup, acit man ci kek kɔn loony e wogup waan.
Guɔ anɔm tak e wel ke Bɛnydit, wel waan ci lueel, yan, Jɔn ee kɔc baptith ne piu; ku week, we bi baptith ne Weidit Ɣer.
Ku enɔɔne, te ci Nhialic keek miɔɔc ne miɔc cit miɔc ci en wo miɔɔc, waan ci wo Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho gam, ku yɛn, ya ŋa, duɛɛr Nhialic pɛn luɔide?
Na wen, acik kake piŋ, ke ke jɔ lɔ lik, ku lecki Nhialic, yan, Ee yic, Nhialic aci Juoor dhil gam puŋdepiɔu aya ke ke bi piir.
Na wen, ke kɔc waan ci thiei roor ne yoŋ ci ro cak ne kede Thepano, ke ke tek ɣetki Poiniki, ku Kupurio, ku Antiokia, ku acin kɔc kɔk cik guieer jam, ee Judai kapac.
Ku kɔc kɔk e keek ayek kɔc ke Kupurio ku Kurene; na wen, acik bɛn Antiokia, ke ke jam ne Girikii, guiirki ke welpiɛth wel ke Bɛnydit Yecu.
Ku cath riɛl e Bɛnydit ke keek: go kɔc juec gam, ku welki kepiɔth Bɛnydit.
Na wen, ke jam de kene ke piŋ kanithɔ nu e Jeruthalem: goki Baranaba tooc bi ɣet Antiokia:
na wen, aci bɛn, ago dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu tiŋ, ke jɔ piɔu miɛt; ku yook keek kedhie, an, bik cok e tɔu kek ne Bɛnydit ne piɔn ril:
ee raan piɛth, raan ci piɔu thiaŋ e Weidit Ɣer ku gam: go kɔc gam Bɛnydit agoke ŋuak nyiin alal.
Na wen, ke Baranaba jel le Tartho, le Thaulo kɔɔr:
go yok, ku bii Antiokia. Goki gueer e kanithɔ etok ku tholki run tok etɛɛn, ke ke ye kut dit e kɔc wɛɛt. Ku kɔcpiooce ayeke kɔn tɔ ye Krithiaan e Antiokia.
Na wen, e akoolke, ke nebii ke ke bɔ e Jeruthalem bik Antiokia.
Go raan tok e keek ro jɔt, raan cɔl Agabo, go kɔc yɔɔk ne Weidit, an, de cɔŋ diit bi dap bɛn e piny nɔm ebɛn: na wen, ke cɔŋe tul waan nu Kulaudio Kaithar.
Go kɔcpiooce goki loŋ lueel e kepiɔth, yan, bik kaŋ tɔ yine mithekɔckɛn rɛɛr e Judaya, lek keek kony, raan ebɛn abi miooc ne kedɛn ci yok:
agoki looi aya, ku tɔki kaŋ luethe roordit ne Baranaba ku Thaulo.
Na wen, e akoolke, ke malik Kerod dɔm kɔc kɔk ke kanithɔ bi ke bɛn kuur.
Go Jakop manhe e Jɔn tɔ nak e abatau.
Na wen, aci luɔiye tiŋ nɔn mit en e Judai piɔth, ke look Petero dɔm aya. Akoolke aa yek akool ke kuin kene tup.
Na wen, aci Petero dɔm, ke tɛɛu aloocic, yin alathkeer kathieer ku dhetem bik e wɛɛr e tiet, ŋuɛɛne pei ku ŋuɛɛne pei; ke lueel e yepiɔu, an, bi bɛɛi bei yin kɔc, te ci Winythok thok.
Ku yok Petero a tit aloocic: ku kanithɔ ee cool e laŋ Nhialic ne biakde.
Na wen, ewɛɛrwakɔuwe guop, ke Kerod, an, bi bɛɛi bei miak, ku nin Petero e kaam de alathkeer kaarou, ke mac e joth kaarou: ku nu kɔc tit aloc thok biic ke ke yien.
Na wen, ke tunynhial e Bɛnydit ke go tuol e yelɔɔm, ku jɔ ɣɛɛr alooc riaauwic: go Petero biɔɔk lɔɔm, ku jɔ pɔɔc, yan, Dap ro jɔt. Go joth loony piny e yecin.
Go tuny nhial yɔɔk, yan, Dut yiyic, ku taauwe war e yicok. Go looi. Go lueel, yan, Cuate lupɔdu e yikɔu, ku kuany acok.
Go lɔ biic ke kuɛny cok; ku kuc ke looi e tunynhial nɔn ee yen yic, e ye tɔ ye nyuoth.

Na wen, acik kɔc tit nu tueŋ kɔn waan, ku wanki kɔc tit nu cieen aya, ke ke ɣet athin e weeth, athin nu te lɔ kueer lɔ panydit; go athin ro tueer yetok: goki lɔ biic, ku tekki e caar tok; go tunynhial dap jal e yelɔɔm.
Na wen, aci nɔm jɔ bɛn, ke jɔ Petero lueel, yan, Aca jɔ ŋic egɔk enɔɔne, nɔn ci Bɛnydit tunyde tooc, ago a luok e Kerod cin, ku aŋɔth ŋathe kɔc ke Judai ebɛn.
Go enɔm cat, ku bi ɣon e Mari man Jɔn, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Mak; ɣon ci kɔc juec gueer thin bik bɛn lɔŋ.
Na wen, aci Petero kal tɔɔŋ thok, ke nyan cɔl Roda bɔ bi bɛn piŋ.
Na wen, aci Petero ŋic rol, ke cii kal tuer thok ne mietepiɔu, aci bɛ kat ke lɔ ɣot, le kɔc yɔɔk, yan, Petero ki, kaace e kal thok.
Goki jɔɔny, yan, Yin mum nɔm. Go ŋak, an, Ee yen eyic. Ku jɔki lueel, yan, Ee tunydɛn bɔ nhial.
Ku ŋoot Petero ke tɔŋ kal thok: na wen, ke ke tuer kal thok, ku jɔki tiŋ, goki gai alal.
Go ke nieu e yecin, yan, Miɛmki. Go ke guieer ne bii ci Bɛnydit e bɛɛi bei e aloocic. Go, an, Lakki guieerki Jakop kake ayi wɛɛt kɔk. Na wen, ke jɔ jal, le tedaŋ.
Na wen, aci piny ru, go anuɔɔn dit cak e alathkeer yiic, yan, ci Petero yedi?
Go kɔɔr e Kerod, ku cii yok, go kɔc tit thieec alal, ku jɔ lueel, yan, bike nɔk. Na wen, ke jel e Judaya le Kaithareia, ku jɔ lɔ reer etɛɛn.

Ku Kerod aci piɔu gɔɔi keke kɔc ke Turo keke Thidon: goki bɛn e piɔn tok te nu yen, lek mat lueel, acik Bulathetho tɔ ye mɛtheden, yen aye bɛnydiit e ɣon ee malik nin thin; pinyden aa muk piny e malik ne kecam.
Na wen, ekool ci kɔn lueel, ke Kerod alulut e malik taau e yekɔu, ku nyuc e thoonydɛn e bɛɛny nɔm, jieem keek.
Go kɔc coot, yan, Ee rol e Nhialic, acie rol e raan.
Na wen etethiine, ke yup tunynhial tuny e Bɛnydit, luɔi ken en Nhialic leec: go kam cam, go thou.
Go jam e Nhialic piny kiet nɔm ku ŋuɛk enyin alal.
Na wen, ke Baranaba keke Thaulo ke ke dhuny keniim e Jeruthalem, te ci kek luɔiden thol, ku cath Jɔn keke keek, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Mak.
Ku kanithɔ nu Antiokia anu nebii thin, ayi kɔc e weet, yi Baranaba, keke Thimeon rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Niger, ku Lukio e bɔ Kurene, ku Manaen, raan waan ci muk keke Kerod etok Kerod tetararke, ku Thaulo.
Na wen, te looi kek ka ke Bɛnydit, ku reecki cam, ke ke yook e Weidit Ɣer, yan, Pɔcki yɛn Baranaba keke Thaulo ne kede luɔi can ke caal thin.
Na wen, acik cam bɛ rɛɛc, ku lɛŋki, goki kecin thany e keniim, ku tɔki ke jel.
Ku keek, te ci keek tooc e Weidit Ɣer, ke ke jel lek Theleukia; ku jelki etɛɛn, ke ke cath ne abel lek Kupurio.
Na wen, acik ɣet Thalami, ke ke jɔ jam e Nhialic guiir e luek ee Judai ke lɔŋ thin: ku cath Jɔn ke keek, ee raan bi keden aa looi.
Goki tuur caathic ebɛn aɣeet kek Papo, ku yokki bɛny e kɔc thueeth etɛɛn, ee raan e Judai, ku ye nebi alueeth, rinke acɔl BarYecu;
ku ye tɔu keke mudhiir cɔl Thergio Paulo, ee raan ŋic kaŋ. Na wen, ke cɔl Baranaba ku Thaulo, yen mudhiir, akɔɔr luɔi bi en jam e Nhialic piŋ.
Na wen, ke Eluma bɛny e kɔc thueeth (yen aye rinke ne thoŋ e Giriki), ke cak ater ke keek, akɔɔr luɔi bi en mudhiir wɛl piɔu wei ke ci bi gam.
Go Thaulo, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Paulo aya, wen ci en thiaŋ ke Weidit Ɣer, go toom guop,
ku yook, yan, Yin, raan ci yic thiaŋ ke rueeny ku de guop aciɛɛn, yin wen e jɔŋdiit rac, raan man piathepiɔu ebɛn, cii bi pɔl anandu ne yal ee yin kuɛɛr ke Bɛnydit tɔ yal rot, kuɛɛr lɔ cit?
Ku enɔɔne, tiŋ, ciin e Bɛnydit atɔu e yiguop, ku yin bi cɔɔr, ku cii akɔl bi tiŋ akoolke. Na wen, etethiine, ke ke cit ruu ku cuɔlepiny ke ke loony e yeguop; go yieem, akɔɔr raan bi e dɔm cin thel.
Na wen, aci mudhiir ke ci looi tiŋ, ke gam, aci gai ne weet e Bɛnydit.
Na wen, acik jal e Papo ne abel, ke yi Paulo ku kɔc cath e ke, goki ɣet Perga nu Pampulia: ku pal Jɔn keek etɛɛn, le yenɔm dɔk Jeruthalem.
Na wen, acik jal e Perga, ke ke bɔ Antiokia nu Pithidia; goki lɔ luaŋ e Nhialic ekool e thabath, lek ku nyucki.
Na wen, te ci loŋ guɔ thok e kuɛn keke nebii, ke bɛny e luaŋ e Nhialic ke tuc raan keek, yan, We wathii, na de jam bak guieer kɔc, luɛlki kedun.
Go Paulo ro jɔt, go nieu e yecin, ku lueel, yan, Week roor ke Yithrael, ku week kɔc rieu Nhialic, jaki piŋ.
Nhialic de kɔc ke Yithiaele aci warkuɔ lɔc, ku jɔt kɔc nhial, te ɣɔn reer kek cit man e kamaan paan e Rip, go keek bɛɛi bei etɛɛn ne koŋ ril.
Go epiɔu tɔ lir ne ciɛɛŋdɛn rac acit run kathierŋuan e jɔɔric.
Na wen, aci juur riɔɔk kadherou paan e Kanaan, ke ke tek pinyden ne deeny ci kek gɛk dɛɛny.
Na wen, e kake cok, ke jɔ keek gam bany e loŋ guiir acit bot kaŋuan ku thierdhieny de run, aɣet akool ke nebi Thamuel.
Na wen, ke ke kɔɔr malik: go Nhialic ke gam Thaulo wen e Kic, raan e dhien e Benjamin, e run kathierŋuan.
Ku te ci en e nyaai, ke jɔt Dabid nhial abi aa malikden; go luɛɛl ne kede, yan, Yɛn e Dabid wen e Jethe yok, raan nu e yapiɔu, raan bi kede yɛnpiɔu looi ebɛn.
Ne kau de raane, yen aa jɔte Nhialic Konydewei, yen Yecu, ku gɛm Yithrael, acit man ci en e kɔn lueel;
te ci Jɔn baptinh e puŋdepiɔu kɔn guieer kɔc ke Yithrael kedhie, waan ŋoot Yecu ke ken bɛn.
Na wen, aci akoolke duɛɛr thol, ke Jɔn thiec kɔc, yan, Yak lueel, an, aa ŋa? yɛn cie yen. Ku tieŋki, ade raan bɔ e yacok, ku yɛn ci roŋ wo luɔi ban wɛɛrke dɔk e yecok.
Week wathii, mith ke kuɛɛredan Abraɣam, ku kɔc nu e weyiic ebɛn kɔc rieu Nhialic, jame aci tuoc week, jam de kunydeweiye.
Ku kɔc rɛɛr e Jeruthalem keke bany ceŋ keek, ne kuny kuc kek en, ku kucki jam e nebii, jam e cool e kueneyeyic e akool ke thabath kedhie, acik jamden tɔ ye yic, ne many ci kek e mac yeth kerac.
Ku na ciɛk cien cook cik yok cook dueereye nɔk, ke ke laŋ Pilato tei, yan, bi nɔk.
Na wen, acik kaŋ thol kedhie ka ci gɔɔr ne kede, ke jɔki bɛɛi bei e tim kɔu, tɛɛuki e raŋic.
Ku jote Nhialic bei e kɔc ci thou yiic:
ago tiŋ e kɔc e akool juec kɔc waan bɔ e Galili ne yen etok lek Jeruthalem, ku kek aye caatɔɔ lek kɔc ne kede.
Ku wek guiirku wel piɛth, yan, Loŋ cii Nhialic mac ke kuarkuɔ,
yen acii Nhialic tɔ ye yic tede wook wok mithken, ne jon ci en Yecu be jat nhial; acit man ci e gɔɔr e thaam ee kek rou, an, Yin ee Wendi, ekoole yin ca dhieeth.
Ku ne kede jon ci en e jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic, ku cii enɔm bi bɛ dhuony e dhiapic, ke lueel ale, yan, Yin ba miɔɔc e athiɛɛi de Dabid athiɛɛi yic agɔk.
Ago lueel aya ne thaam daŋ, yan, Yin cii Raanduon Ɣerpiɔu bi pɔl abi dhiap tiŋ.
Ku Dabid, te ci en remden kony ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, ke jɔ thou, go jɔ tɔɔu keke kuarken etok, go dhiap:
ku raan cii Nhialic bɛ jat nhial acin dhiap ci tiŋ.
Yen ŋiɛc wek en, wek wathii, yan, Pal e karac aguiire week ne eraane:
ku ne yen, kɔc gam en kedhie ayeke tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne kerieec ebɛn, ku we ci dueere tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne keyiic ne loŋ de Mothe.
Jaki rot tiŋ, ke kene cii bi bɛn tede week, ke ci lueel e nebii yiic, yan;
Tieŋki, wek kɔc e kaŋ caany e ɣɔric, abak gai, ku thuɔuki; Yɛn bi luɔi looi e akoolkun, Luɔi caki bi gam anandun, te ciɛke raan e guieer week.
Na wen, aci Judai jal luaŋ e Nhialic, ke Juoor e ke laŋ, an, bi jam e Nhialic guieer keek ekool e thabath bi bɛn.

Na wen, aci kɔc pɔk kɔc wen ci gueer, ke Judai juec keke Juoor ci rot tɔ ye Judai, kɔc rieu Nhialic, ke ke kuany Paulo cok keke Baranaba: goki jam ne keek, yookki keek alal, yan, bik aa cool e tɔu ne dhueeŋ de Nhialicic.
Na wen, ekool e thabath lɔ ekoole cok, ke panydit gueer ebɛn bi jam e Nhialic bɛn piŋ, adoŋ kɔc toktook tei.
Ku te ci Judai kut e kɔc tiŋ, ke ke dɔm tiɛɛl, ku janyki ka lueel Paulo, ku latki.

Go Paulo keke Baranaba agoki nyin riɛl, ku jɔki lueel, yan, Jam e Nhialic aci dhil kɔn guieer week. Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ca wek e nyaai, ku cak rot tɔ ye kɔc cii roŋ ne piir athɛɛr, tieŋki, wo e ro yal te nu Juoor.
Yen aye ke ci Bɛnydit thɔn wo, yan, Yin ca taau ba ya keɣeer bi Juoor aa riaau, Ku ba ya kede kunydewei aɣet te le piny thar guut.
Te ci Juoor kene piŋ, agoki piɔth miɛt, ku lecki jam e Nhialic: ago kɔc ebɛn kɔc ci kɔn lɔc, an, bik dɛ piir athɛɛr, agoki gam.
Go jam e Bɛnydit go piny kiet nɔm pinye ebɛn.
Na wen, ke Judai ke ke keek dieer dit dieer rieu Nhialic, ku roor dit ke panydit, ku riirki keniim bik Paulo yɔŋ keke Baranaba, goki ke cieec pinyden.
Ku keek, te ci kek abuni tɛŋ wei e kecok ne jany bi kek ke jɔɔny, ke ke bɔ Yikonion.
Go kɔcpiooce piɔth miɛt alal, ku thieŋki ne Weidit Ɣer.
Na wen, te nu kek Yikonion, ke ke lɔ luaŋ ee Judai lɔŋ thin, keek kaarou etok, ku jɔki kɔc guieer, ago kut diit e kɔc gam, Judai ayi Giriku aya.
Go Judai reec gam goki Juoor kɛɛk, ku tɔki ke nhiany piɔth ne wathii.
Agoki ceŋ etɛɛn e akool juec ku yek wel guiir ke ke ye nyin riɛl e Bɛnyditic, ago Benydit aa caatɔ de jam de dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu, go gook tɔ loi e kecin, ku ka gɛiye kɔc.
Ku kut e kɔc nu panydit acik rot tek; kɔc kɔk acik mat e Judai, ku mat kɔc kɔk e tuuc.
Na wen, ke Juoor keke Judai ku bany ceŋ keek, te ci kek tɔŋ lɛɛr e ke riŋ, lek ke kuur, ku biookki keek e kur,
agoki ŋic kek tuuc, ku kɔtki, lek e pɛɛnydit kɔk, yi Luthura ku Derbe, kek pɛɛnydit ke Lukaonia, ku leki e bɛi nu e kekec aya:
agoki welpiɛth guiir etɛɛn.
Ku ade mony nu Luthura, mony cin riɛl e yecok, ku ye cool e rɛɛr, ke ye aduany ken kɔn cath anande ecaŋɣɔn dhieethe ye.
Monye aci Paulo pıŋ te guiir en wel: na wen, ke toom Paulo guop alal, ku tiŋ nɔn ciɛth en ke gam bi e tɔ dem,
go yɔɔk e rol dit, yan, Kaace ke yi kim ro piny. Go kɛɛc nhial ku ciɛth.
Na wen, aci kut e kɔc luɔi e looi Paulo tiŋ, ke ke jɔt kerot, jamki ne thoŋdɛn e Lukaonia, luelki, yan, Yieth acik loony piny tede wook ke ke cit gup kɔc.
Goki Baranaba tɔ ye Dhio; ku tɔki Paulo Kereme, luɔi ee yen raan e wel dap guiir.
Na wen, ke guny de Dhio, yanh nu luaŋde e kal thok kal e panydit, ke bii mioor e kɛl thook, ku bii gool, an, bi lam keke kut e kɔc, ku nak.
Na wen, aci tuuc e piŋ, ke yi Paulo keke Baranaba, ke ke ret lupɔɔken yiic, ku kɔtki lek e kɔc yiic cil, ke ke cot,

yan, Wek roor, eeŋo luɔɔi wek kake? Wok ee kɔc tei, wok kit piɔth e week, ku wek guiirku wel piɛth, ke we bi rot yal wei e kaɣaar yiic cit ekake, ku jaki wepiɔth wɛl Nhialic piir, Raan e cak nhial ku piny ku abapdit, ku ka nu e keyiic kedhie:
ku aci juoor kedhie pal cath e kuɛɛrken ɣɔn nu rɛm thɛɛr.
Ku aken ro pɔl te cin caatɔde tei, aa ye cool e loi luɔi piɛth, ee wo miɔɔc ne deŋ bɔ nhial ayi pɛi ee kaŋ ke luɔk, go wo tɔ kueth e kecam abuk piɔth miɛt.
Ku ciɛk an, cik kake lueel, ke pɛn pen kek kɔc luɔi lam kek keek, aci duɛɛr dhal.
Na wen, ke Judai bɔ e Antiokia keke Yikonion ke ke ɣet etɛɛn: agoki kut e kɔc weŋ, ku biookki Paulo ne kur, ku thelki biic e panydit kec, aluelki, an, ci yien thou.
Ku te ci kɔcpiooce ye geeu, ke jɔt rot le panydit: na ɣɔnmiak, ke jel keke Baranaba lek Derbe.
Na wen, acik welpiɛth guieer panydiite, ku weetki kɔc juec abik aa kɔcpiooce, ke ke dhuny keniim Luthura, ku Yikonion, ku Antiokia,
ku ritki kɔcpiooce piɔth, yookki keek, yan, bik aa tɔu e gamic apiɛth, ku yan, ne guom ee wok katuc juec guum en abi wo dhil lɔ e ciɛɛŋ de Nhialicic.
Agoki roordit lɔc e kanithɔɔ yiic ebɛn, ku te ci kek lɔŋ ne rɛɛc reec kek cam, ke ke pɛlki e Bɛnydit cin, Bɛnydit cik gam.
Ku te ci kek Pithidia teekic, ke ke bɔ Pampulia.
Na wen, acik wel guiir e Perga, ke ke lɔ Atalia;
ku jelki etɛɛn ne abel lek Antiokia, paan ci wathii ke kɔn tɔɔŋ thin waan, an, bik cath ne dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu ne kede luɔiden, luɔi cik guɔ thol enɔɔne.
Na wen, acik bɛn, ke ke tɔ kanithɔ gueer, ku guiirki keek kerieec cii Nhialic looi keke keek, ku luɔi ci en ɣon e gam liep Juoor.
Ku jɔki reer etɛɛn e akool juec ne kɔcpiooce.
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk e ke bɔ e Judaya, bik ku weetki wathii, yan, Te kene we cueel cit man e tau de ciɛɛŋ de Mothe, ke we cii dueere kony wei.
Goki teer cak ne Paulo ku Baranaba, teer dit e wel juec bɛɛi: na wen, ke lueel kɔc, yan, bi Paulo lɔ Jeruthalem keke Baranaba, ku kɔc kɔk e keyiic, lek te nu tuuc ku roordit, lek jame guiir.
Go kanithɔ ke ruac kueer, ku jɔki Poiniki teekic keke Thamaria, ke ke lek kɔc puŋ ci Juoor kepiɔth pɔk Nhialic: goki wathii tɔ mit piɔth alal.
Na wen, acik ɣet Jeruthalem, ke ke loor kanithɔ ayi tuuc ku roordit, ku jɔki ke guieer kerieec ebɛn ka cii Nhialic looi keke keek.
Ku jɔt kɔc kɔk rot, kɔc ke rem e Parithai kɔc ci gam, ku jɔki lueel, yan, Juoor abike dhil cueel, ku abuk keek dhil yɔɔk, yan, bik loŋ de Mothe dhil aa muk ebɛn.
Go tuuc ku roordit goki gueer bik jame bɛn woiyic.
Na wen, aci kɔc teer e teer dit, ke Petero jɔt rot, ku lueel, yan, Wathii, aŋiɛcki lony ci Nhialic a lɔc waan e weyiic, yan, bi Juoor welpiɛth piŋ e yathok, ku gamki.
Ku Nhialic, Raan ŋic kɔc piɔth, aci aa caatɔden, ne miɔc ci en keek miɔɔc ne Weidit Ɣer, acit man ci en wo miɔɔc;
ku acin puny ci en wo pɔɔc yiic, wook ne keek, waan ci en keek waak piɔth ne gam.
Na enɔɔne, eeŋo thɛmki Nhialic, bak kethiek taau e kɔcpiooce yieth, kethiek ci warkuɔ dhal e jot ayi wook?
Wok gam tei nɔn bi wo kony wei ne dhueeŋ e Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho piɔu, acit man e kek aya.
Na wen, ke kut e kɔc ebɛn ke ke jɔ mim, ku piŋki kede Baranaba ku Paulo, ke ke guiir gook ku ka ye kɔc ke gai, ka cii Nhialic looi e Juoor yiic ne kecin.
Na wen, acik jamden thol, ke Jakop beer, lueel, yan, Wathii, piɛŋki kedi:
Thimeon aci week guieer ne nɛm tueŋ ci Nhialic Juoor kɔn neem, bi kɔc bɛn bɛɛi bei e keyiic, ne baŋ de rinke.
Ku wel ke nebi arɛmki ne kene; acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan,
Na ele e kake cok, ke yɛn bi anɔm dhuny, Guɔ keemɔ de Dabid wen ci wiik aguɔ bɛ yik; Ku pɛɛny ci riaak aba ke bɛ yik, Ku ta ke kaac:
Luɔi bi kɔc Nhialic kɔɔr, kɔc ci doŋ, Ayi Juoor kedhie Juoor ci cɔɔl ne rinki; Jam de Bɛnydit ki, Bɛnydit loi kake kedhie.
Luɔi looi ebɛn aŋic Nhialic te ɣɔn gɔle kaŋ.
Enɔɔne di, loŋdi ki, yan, Duku kɔc e jut kɔc ci Kepiɔth wɛl Nhialic ne Juoor yiic;
ku abuk keek gaar tei, yan, bik luɔi de yieth pɔl luɔi nhiany, ku palki dhoom, ku cam de lai ci dec, ku riɛm.
Mothe ade kɔc e loŋde guiir ecaŋɣɔn wut ebɛn, jamde aye kueenic e luek ke Nhialic yiic e akool ke thabath kedhie.
Go tuuc ku roordit ku kanithɔ ebɛn agoki loŋ mat e kepiɔth, yan, bik kɔc ci lɔc ne remdenic tuɔɔc Antiokia, bik cath e Paulo keke Baranaba; ke yi Judath cɔl Barthaba, ku Thila, kɔc dit e kɔc yiic:
goki awarek gɔɔr tɔki luɛthki, awarek lueel en, yan, Wek thieec tuuc ku roordit ku wathii, wek mithekɔckuɔn nu e Juoor yiic, kɔc tɔu ne Antiokia, ku Thuria, ku Kilikia:
Acuk piŋ nɔn de kɔc kɔk ci jal e woyiic, kɔc ci week jut ne wel weete ke, ku lieepki weniim, luelki, yan, bi we dhil cueel, ku bak loŋ aa dot; ku acin ke cuk thɔn keek;
agoku loŋ mat e wopiɔth ne gueer ci wo gueer ne piɔn tok, an, buk kɔc cuk lɔc tuoc week bik cath e Baranaba ku Paulo, kɔc nhiaarku,
kɔc ci weiken kuɔɔn ne baŋ de rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Yen a toc wok Judath ku Thila, kɔc bi we lɛk wel manke ne kethook.
Apiɛth tede Weidit Ɣer ayi wook, yan, Acin daŋ buk taau e weyieth, ee kake tei ka bak dhil looi;
yan, bak cam e riŋ ci gam yieth pɔl, ku riɛm, ku ka ci dec, ku dhoom, te ca wek kake pɔl, ka we ye kepiɛth looi. Niɛnki apiɛth.
Na wen, acike tɔ jel, ke ke bɔ Antiokia; ku te ci kek kut e kɔc tɔ gueer, ke ke jɔki gam awarek.
Agoki kueen, ku jɔki piɔth miɛt ne muŋ ci ke muk piɔth.
Go Judath ku Thila, luɔi ee kek nebii aya, agoki wathii guieer wel juec, ku ritki kepiɔth.
Na wen, acik nin lɛɛr etɛɛn, ke ke tɔ jel apiɛth ne wathii bik lɔ te nu tuuc.
Ku Thila amit piɔu ne reer reer en etɛɛn.
Ku dɔŋ Paulo ku Baranaba Antiokia, ke ke ye kɔc wɛɛt guiirki keek jam e Bɛnydit, ne kɔc juec kɔk aya.
Na wen, acik nhi lɛɛr, ke Paulo yook Baranaba, yan, Jɔku woniim bɛ dhuny lok mithekɔckuɔ bɛ neem e panyditic ebɛn te waan ee wok jam ee Bɛnydit guiir thin, ke wo bi tau tɔu kek tiŋ.
Ago Baranaba piɔu dɛ luɔi bi kek Jɔn lɛɛr bi lɔ cath ke keek, rinkɛn kɔk acɔlke Mak.
Ku lueel Paulo, yan, cii piɛth luɔi bi kek raan lɛɛr raan waan e jel e kelɔm e Pampulia, ku reec cath ke keek e luɔiyic.
Agoki teer alal apɔk kek, ku jɔ Baranaba Mak lɛɛr, jel abelic le Kupurio;
ku lɔc Paulo Thila, ku jel, aci wathii ke kɔn tɔɔŋ, yan, bi dhueeŋ e Nhialic piɔu cath ke keek.
Go Thuria ku Kilikia teek yiic, ke tɔ kanithɔɔ kaac arik
Go ɣet Derbe ku Luthura aya: ku ade raanpiooce etɛɛn, cɔl Timotheo, wen e tiiŋ ci gam, ku ye nyan e Judai; ku wun ee Giriki.
Ku mɛnhe ee mɛnh ci leec e wathii wɛɛt nu Luthura ku Yikonion.
Ku Paulo ade piɔu luɔi bi mɛnhe cath keke yen: go noom ku cueel, ne biak de Judai rɛɛr etɛɛn: wun aŋic kɔc kedhie nɔn ee yen Giriki.
Na wen, te ciɛth kek e pɛɛnydit yiic, ke ke yin kɔc looŋ bik muk, looŋ cii tuuc lueel ku roordit nu Jeruthalem.
Ago kanithɔɔ tɔ ril ne gam kedhie, ku ŋuek kuenden enyin e akoolnyiin kedhie.
Go Paulo ku kɔc cath e yen goki lɔ teek Purugia ku piny e Galatia, ku pen Weidit Ɣer keek ne guieer bi kek jam guiir ne Athia;
na wen, acik ɣet Muthia, ke ke them luɔi bi kek lɔ Bithunia, go Weidit ke Yecu ke peen;
goki teek e Muthia, ku jɔki bɛn Toroa.
Ku tul raan tede Paulo wakɔu ke e nyuoth; ee raan e Makedonia akaac ke laŋ, yan, Ba lɔŋda paan e Makedonia, ba wo bɛn kony.
Na wen, aci raane tiŋ, goku te bi wo lɔ Makedonia dap kɔɔr, ayok lueel e wopiɔth, an, ci Bɛnydit wo dhil cɔɔl, buk welpiɛth lɔ guieer keek.
Goku jal e Toroa e abel, ku ciɛthku kueer lɔ cit aɣet Thamotharake, na ɣɔnmiak ke wo jɔ ɣet Neapoli;
ku jelku etɛɛn lok Pilipoi, yen aye panydit de naamden dit e Makedonia biake, ku ye piny ci Romai ɣap thin aya: agoku reer e panydiite e akoolke.
Na wen, ekool e thabath, ke wo lɔ panydit kec e wɛɛryɔu te ye kɔc lɔŋ thin; loku ku nyucku piny, jamku ne dieer ci gueer etɛɛn.
Ku ade tiiŋ ci jamda piŋ, cɔl Ludia, tiiŋ e lupɔ thith amujuŋ ɣaac, abɔ panydit cɔl Thuatira, ku ye tiiŋ rieu Nhialic: piɔnde acii Bɛnydit liep, bi ka lueel Paulo cok e piŋ en ke.
Na wen, aci baptith, keke dhiende ebɛn, ke laŋ wook, yan, Te ca wek a tɔ ye raan e ka ke Bɛnydit dot, baki ɣondi, bak bɛn reer tliin. Go wo dhil tɔ ye kamaanke.
Na wen, ekool tok, te le wok te ye kɔc lɔŋ, ke wo jɔ rɔm ne nyan lim, nyan de guop yanh cɔl nyieel, ku ye banyke tɔ yok weu juec ne caar ee yen cɔɔr.
Go wo kuany cok woke Paulo, en enyane, ke ye coot, yan, Roorke ayek him ke Nhialic Awarjaŋ, kɔc guiir wook ne kueer e kunydewei.
Go kene looi e akool juec. Na wen, ke Paulo diu piɔu, ku puk rot, yook jɔŋe, yan, Ne rin ke Yecu Kritho yin yɔɔk, yan, Ba bei e yeguop. Go bɛn bei e thaar mane guop.
Na wen, aci banyke e tiŋ nɔn ci aŋɔthdɛn e weu jal, ke ke dɔm Paulo ku Thila, ku thelki keek e thuukic e bany niim bany e loŋ guiir;
na wen, ke ke leerki e bany ke tɔŋ niim, ku luelki, yan, Kɔcke, Judaike, ayek panydandit jut alal ne jamden,
ku yek kɔc wɛɛt e ciɛɛŋ cii piɛth e luɔi dɔm wok en, ku loiku, wok Romai.
Na wen, ke kut e kɔc e ke jɔt rot kedhie luelki ater ne keek: go bany ke tɔŋ agoki lupɔɔken tɔ reete bei e kegup, ku luelki, an, bike dui e wɛt.
Agoki ke dui e wɛt juec, ku tɛɛuki keek e aloocic, ku yookki raan tit alooc, yan, bi ke cok e tit en keek:
ku yen, te ci e lɛk loŋ cit ekene, ke ke jɔ taau e aloocic cil, ku mɛc kecok e tiim kɔɔth.
Na wen, e wɛɛric cil, ke Paulo ku Thila ke ke laŋ ku kitki diɛt leec kek ke Nhialic, ku piŋ kɔc kɔk ci mac e keek etok.
Na wen, ke piny jɔ ro guɔ niɛŋ aret ethiau, abi alooc niɛŋ aɣet ethar: go thok ke alooc rot liep kedhie enɔnthiine; ku ruet joth rot kedhie joth mace kɔc cok.
Na wen, ke raan e alooc tiit paac, ku tiŋ thok ke alooc aɣɔɔrki, go abataude miet bei, an, nɛk rot, alueel, an, ci kɔc ci mac kat.
Go Paulo coot e rol dit, an, Du ro nak; wok ki ene, wodhie.
Na wen, ke cool mac, ku kɛɛc ɣot, bi ke lɛthe, ku jɔ wiik e Paulo nɔm keke Thila,
ago ke bɛɛi bei, ku thieec keek, yan, Wek bany, eeŋo ba looi, ke bi a kony wei?
Goki lueel, yan, Gam Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho, ke yi bi kony wei, weke dhiendu.
Goki guieer jam e Bɛnydit, yen keke dhiende ebɛn.
Na wen, ke ke leer e thaar mane guop, ku piny e wakɔu, le ku wɛɛk tetokken; go baptith enɔnthiine, yen keke dhiende ebɛn.
Na wen, ke ke bii ɣonde, ku tɛɛu kecam e keniim, ke mit piɔu alal, keke dhiende ebɛn, ne gam wen ci kek Nhialic gam.
Na wen, aci piny ru, ke bany ke tɔŋ ke ke toc cawiic, yan, Taki kɔcke lony.
Go raan e alooc tiit go welke lɛk Paulo, yan, Bany ke tɔŋ acik thɔn, yan, lony week: jaki jal enɔɔne, we bi cath apiɛth.

Go Paulo lueel, yan, Acik wo dui e kɔc niim, ke wo kene yiek niim gaak, ku yok Romai, ku acik wo cuat e aloocic; ku dueerki wook jap biic ecueer enɔɔne? Acie yen; ne ke bɔ kekgup, bik wo bɛn bɛɛi bei.
Na wen, ke cawiic e ke lɔ lek bany ke tɔŋ lɛk welke; goki riɔɔc, te ci kek e piŋ nɔn ee kek Romai;
agoki bɛn, bik ku laŋki keek; ku biiki ke bei e aloocic, laŋki keek, yan, bik jal panydit.
Goki jal e aloocic, lek ɣon e Ludia: na wen, acik wathii tiŋ, ke ke ritki piɔth, ku jɔki jal.
Na wen, acik teek Ampipoli, ku Apolonia, ke ke jɔ bɛn Thethalonike, paan de yic luaŋ ee Judai lɔŋ thin:
go Paulo lɔ luɛɛk tenu keek, acit man ee yen cool e loi en en, ku jɔ wel guiir keke keek e akool ke thabath kadiak ne kacigɔɔr yiic,
ee kaŋ weer thaar, ku nyuth keek apiɛth, yan, Kritho aci kaŋ dhil guum, ku be ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic; ku ye lueel aya, yan, Yecuye, raan guieer ɛn week kede, yen aye Kritho.
Go kɔc kɔk gam, ku matki e yi Paulo keke Thila; ayi rem diit e Giriku rieu Nhialic, keke dieer dit dieer juec emaath.

Na wen, ke Judai reec gam, ke ke dɔm tiɛɛl, ku cɔlki roor rac ne kɔc ke thuukic, bik ke bɛn kony, goki rem kut, abik panydit tɔ pal awuɔɔu ebɛn, goki tɔŋ lɛɛr ɣon e Jathon, akɔɔrki Paulo keke Thila luɔi bi kek ke bɛɛi bei yinki ke kɔc.
Na wen, acik ke yok aliu, ke ke thel Jathon keke wɛɛt kɔk leerki keek e bany niim, bany ceŋ panydit, ke ke cot, yan, Kɔcke kɔc ci piny yiek anuɔɔn e piny nɔm ebɛn acik bɛn ene aya;
ku aci Jathon ke gam ɣot: ku kɔcke kedhie ayek looŋ ke Kaithar rɛɛc gam; ayek lueel, yan, de malik daŋ, cɔl Yecu.
Goki kɔc tɔ diɛɛr ayi bany ceŋ panydit aya, te ci kek kake piŋ.
Na wen, ke ke nom weu juec tede Jathon ayi wɛɛt kɔk, ku jɔki ke pɔl.
Go wathii Paulo dap tɔ jel wakɔu keke Thila, lek Beroya: na wen, acik ɣeet, ke ke lɔ luaŋ ee Judai lɔŋ thin.
Ku kɔcke ee kɔc ci ŋiec dhieeth awarki Judai nu Thethalonike, agoki jam dap piŋ ne piɔnmit, ku jɔki kacigɔɔr aa woi yiic e akoolnyiin kedhie, ke bik ŋic nɔn tɔuwe kaŋ aya.
Yen aa gɛme kɔc juec e keyiic; ayi Giriki juec emaath, dieer dit ku roor.
Na wen, aci Judai nu Thethalonike e piŋ nɔn ci jam e Nhialic guiir ne Paulo e Beroya, ke ke lɔ etɛɛn aya, lek kɔc noon.
Go wathii Paulo tɔ jel enɔnthiine cit ke lɔ e abapdit nɔm: ku dɔŋ Thila etɛɛn keke Timotheo.
Go kɔc wen ruɛc Paulo agoki lɛɛr ɣeetki Athenai: na wen, aci Paulo ke thɔn, an, bik Thila ku Timotheo yɔɔk, yan, Banki wecok, ke we bɔ te nuo yɛn, ke ke jɔ jal.
Ku te waan tiite Paulo keek e Athenai, ke jɔ piɔu diu nɔn ci en panydit tiŋ aci ro gam lam de yieth eliŋliŋ.
Go lɔ luaŋ ee Judai lɔŋ thin, le wel guiir keke Judai, ku kɔc kɔk rieu Nhialic, ku ye lɔ e thuukic e akoolnyiin kedhie le wel guiir keke kɔc ci yok etɛɛn.

Ku ade kɔc pel niim, ke yi Epikureoi ku Thotoikoi, kɔc ci e gek. Go kɔc kɔk lueel, yan, Raan wooŋe bi ŋo lueel? Ku lueel kɔk, yan, Acit ke guiir jam de yieth mɛɛn kucku: ne guiir ci Paulo keek guieer jam de Yecu, ku jon bi kɔc ro jɔt.
Goki dɔm, ku leerki Areopagi, ku thiecki, yan, Duɛɛre wo tɔ ŋic weetduon guiir, weet ci piac bɛɛi, nɔn ee yen ŋo?
Yin e wo tɔ piŋ jam mɛɛn pei: wo de piɔth nɔn bi yin wo lɛk welke thaar.
(Kɔc ke Athenai kedhie ku kamaan e tɔu etɛɛn acin luɔi daŋ yek looi, ee luɛl bi kek ka ci piac bɛɛi ya lueel tei, ku piŋ bi kek keek aa piŋ).
Go Paulo kɔɔc e Areopagoyic cil, ku lueel, yan, Wek roor ke Athenai, wek ca tiŋ nɔn aa wek kɔc rieu yieth alal ne kerieec ebɛn.
Waan tɛɛk ɛn kueer, yɛn e kaŋ tiŋ ka lamki, aguɔ yiŋ tok yok aya, yiŋ de lam, aci gaar kɔu wel, yan, KEDE NHIALIC KUCKU. Yen, Raan yak lam ke kuocki, yen a guieer week enɔɔne.
Nhialic, Raan e cak piny ku ka nu e yenɔm kedhie, luɔi ee yen Bɛnydiit e paannhial ku piny, acie reer e luek yiic, luek ci yik e kɔc cin,
ku acie kony e kɔc cin, cit nɔn dɛk en e kaŋ, ee yen e kɔc miɔɔc kedhie ne piir, ku wei, ku kaŋ kedhie;
ku yen e juoor tɔ dhieth ebɛn ne riɛm tok, abik piny ɣap nɔm ebɛn, ku ye keek gam runkɛn ci kɔn lueel ɣɔn thɛɛr, ku gɛm keek akɛɛth ke pinydɛn bi kek ɣap thin;
luɔi bi kek Bɛnydit aa kɔɔr, agoki piny ruany, nɔn de te bi kek e yok, ciɛk, an, cii mec tede wook wodhie:
yen a piir wok, ku yok cath, ku yok nu ne yen; acit man e ke cii cieekkuon kɔk lueel, yan, Wok ee mithkɛn ci dhieeth ayadaŋ.
Ku luɔi ee wok mith ke Nhialic, ka cii piɛth luɔi dueer wok e lueel, yan, Nhialic acit man e adhaap, ku ateek, ku kuur, ke ye kɔc cueec eteet ku ne cap ee raan cak.
Run ɣɔn kek aye run ke kuny kuce kɔc kaŋ, ago Nhialic lɔ lik tei; ku enɔɔne e thɔn, an, bi kɔc kepiɔth puk kedhie e piny nɔm ebɛn:
luɔi ci en kool tok lueel, kool bi en loŋ de piny guiir e guieer piɛth ne raan ci tɔ ye bɛny e loŋ guiir; ku aci kene tɔ ŋic kɔc kedhie, an, ee jam yic, ne jon ci en e jɔt bei e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Na wen, acik jame piŋ, jam de jonerot e kɔc ci thou, ke jɔ kɔc kɔk geet; ku lueel kɔk, yan, Kedu abuk bɛ piŋ ne kede ecooke.
Yen aye jal e jele Paulo e keyiic.
Ku ade kɔc toktook ci mat e yen, ku gamki: raan tok e keek acɔl Dionuthio, raan de Areopago, ku tiiŋ cɔl Damari, ku nu kɔc kɔk ayadaŋ.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke jel e Athenai, bi Korintho.
Ku yok Judai tok etɛɛn cɔl Akula, raan ci dhieeth e Ponto, ku aa piɛc bɛn e Yitalia, keke Pirithikila tiiŋde, ne biak de loŋ cii Kulaudio lueel, yan, bi Judai jal e Roma kedhie: go bɛn tede keek;
ago reer ke keek, luɔi ee kek ateet kit, agoki ya luui etok; ayek ateet e keemɔɔ cueec.
Go wel aa guiir luaŋ e Nhialic e akool ke thabath kedhie, ke bi Judai tɔ gam welke, ayi Girikii.
Na wen, aci Thila bɛn Makedonia keke Timotheo, ke Paulo jieth piɔu, go cok e guiir en Judai, yan, Yecu yen aye Kritho.
Ku te ci kek ater cak ku lɛtki, ke Paulo teŋ lupɔde, ku jɔ keek yɔɔk, yan, E riɛmdun tɔu e weyieth; yɛn iiu thin: ele enɔɔne, yɛn bi lɔ tede Juoor.
Go jal etɛɛn, le ɣon e raan cɔl Juthuto, raan rieu Nhialic, thieeke ɣonde keke luaŋ e Nhialic.
Ku Kirithipo, bɛny e luaŋ e Nhialic, aci Bɛnydit gam keke dhiende ebɛn; ku gam Korinthoi juec ayadaŋ, te ci kek jam piŋ, agoke baptith.
Ku yook Bɛnydit Paulo wakɔu ke e nyuoth, yan, Du riɔc, ye wel guiir, du mim:
yɛn cath wo yin, ku acin raan bi ro yiek ater ke yin, bi yi nɔk: yɛn de kɔc juec e panydiiteyic.
Go reer etɛɛn e ruun tok ku pɛi kadhetem, ke ye jam e Nhialic guiir e keyiic.
Na ɣɔn, nu Galio mudhiir e Akaya, ke Judai ke ke jɔt rot e piɔn tok lek tɔŋ yien Paulo, ku biiki te ye bany loŋ guiir thin,
ku luelki, yan, Raane ee kɔc weŋ, an, bik Nhialic aa lam ne lam de ater keke loŋda.
Na wen, ke Paulo, yan, tueer ethok, ke Galio yook Judai, yan, Tee yen jam de luɔi rac ayi kerɛɛc cii raan looi ecueer, wek Judai, adi piɛth luɔi ban kedun piŋ:
ku na enɔɔne, tee yen teer e wel tei, ku rin, ku loŋdun week, jaki woiyic week wapac; yɛn cin piɔu luɔi ban ke cit ekene guiir.
Go ke cieec ɣon ee loŋ guiir thin.
Go Girikii kedhie goki Thothene dɔm, yen aye bɛnydiit e luaŋ e Nhialic, ku duiki e ɣot thok ɣon ee loŋ guiir thin. Ku Galio aken yecin tuɛɛl thin, aa rɛɛr.
Na wen, ke Paulo ŋoot ke rɛɛr etɛɛn e nin juec, na ɣɔn, ke tɔŋ wathii, ku jel le Thuria ne abel, ku cath Pirithikila ku Akula ne yen; aci enom muut e Kenkurea: ne kede jam waan ci lɛk Nhialic.
Go bɛn Epetho, ku nyieeŋ keek piny etɛɛn: na wen, ke yenguop ke lɔ luaŋ e Nhialic, le wel guiir keke Judai.
Goki lɔŋ, an, Yok e yi rɛɛr weke wook, go jai;
go keek tɔɔŋ, ku lueel, yan, Ahith bɔ enɔɔne aba dhil lɔ looi Jeruthalem; ku yɛn bi anɔm dɔk week tei, te ci Nhialic e lueel. Go jal e Epetho ke cath e abel.
Na wen, aci bɛn bei e abelic e Kaithareia, ke jɔ kanithɔ lɔ thieec, ku jɔ lɔ Antiokia.
Na wen, aci reer etɛɛn e akoolke, ke jɔ jal, le paan e Galatia kuanyic, ayi paan e Purugia, ke tɔ kɔcpiooce ril e gam kedhie.
Na wen, ke Judai tok bɔ Epetho, cɔl Apolo, ee raan ci dhieeth e Alekandaria, raan ŋic wel guiir, ku ŋic kacigɔɔr alal.
Monye aci weet ne kueer e Bɛnydit; ku ye raan lethic, go kɔc guieer ku weet keek ne ka ke Bɛnydit ke cin cook wɛɛc, ku ŋoot ke ŋic baptinh e Jɔn tei.
Go jam gɔl luaŋ e Nhialic ke ye nyin riɛl: na wen, aci Akula keke Pirithikila e piŋ, ke leerki ɣonden, ku weetki apiɛth ne kueer e Nhialic.
Na wen, aci piɔu dɛ luɔi bi en teek le Akaya, ke wathii ke ke jɔ awarek gaar kɔcpiooce etɛɛn, laŋki keek, yan, bik loor: ku te ci en bɛn etɛɛn, ke jɔ kɔc ci gam ne dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu kony alal:
aa ye Judai tiaam e wel aret e kɔc niim, ne nyuuth ee yen keek nyuooth egɔk ne kacigɔɔr, yan, Yecu yen aye Kritho.
Na wen, te ŋoot Apolo ke tɔu e Korintho, ke Paulo bɔ Epetho, te ci en bɛi rɛɛr caath yiic, ku yok kɔc tokiook etɛɛn kɔcpiooce:
go ke thieec, yan, Cak Weidit Ɣer noom waan gam wek? Goki yɔɔk, yan, Ei; ciɛk, an, de Weidit Ɣer nu akenku piŋ ayadaŋ.
Go ke thieec, yan, Ku ye baptinh ŋo ci we baptith? Goki lueel, yan, Ee baptinh e Jɔn.
Go Paulo lueel, yan, Jɔn aa ye kɔc baptith eyic ne baptinh de puŋdepiɔu, ku ye kɔc yɔɔk, yan, bik raan gam raan bɔ e yecok, yen aye Kritho Yecu.
Na wen, acik kene piŋ, ke ke baptith ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu.
Ku te ci Paulo yecin thany e kegup, ke Weidit Ɣer ke ke bɔ e kegup; agoki jam gɔl ne thook lei, ku guiirki wel ke Nhialic.
Kuen e kɔcke acit thieer ku rou kedhie.
Go Paulo lɔ luaŋ e Nhialic, ku ye wel guiir ke ye nyin riɛl e pɛi kadiak, aa ye kaŋ wɛɛr kɔc, ku weet keek apiɛth ne kede ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic.

Na wen, aci kɔc kɔk niim riɛl, ke ke reec gam, ku luelki kerac ne Kueere e kut e kɔc niim, go Paulo jal e keyiic, ku tɛɛu kɔcpiooce pei, go jam wɛɛr kɔc e akooinyiin kedhie luaŋ de guieer e wel, luaŋ de raan cɔl Turano.
Ee kene looi e run kaarou; ago kɔc rɛɛr e Athia ebɛn goki jam e Bɛnydit piŋ, Judai ayi Giriku.
Go Nhialic gook tɔ loi ne cin e Paulo, gook bi kɔc ke gai:
aɣɔl lupɔɔ ke abiɔɔr ayi lupɔɔ ee cieŋ, acike bɛɛi bei e yeguop, leereke tede kɔc tok gup, go juai jal e kegup, ku bɔ jɔɔk rac bei e kegup ayadaŋ.
Ku ade kɔc arieeu, kɔc ke Judai, kɔc e jɔɔk rac cieec. Na wen, ke kɔcke ke ke ye rin ke Yecu cɔɔl e kɔc niim kɔc de gup jɔɔk rac, ayek lueel, yan, Wek yookku ne Yecu, raan guiire Paulo rinke.
Ade kɔc kadherou kɔc e kene looi, kek aye wɛɛt ke raan tok cɔl Thekewa, ee Judai, ku ye bɛnydiit e ka ke Nhialic.
Go jɔŋ rac bɛɛr, yan, Yecu aŋiɛc, ku ŋiɛc Paulo, ku week, yak yiŋa?
Na wen, ke raan de guop jɔŋ rac kɛɛc e keyiic, wit keek, ago ke tiaam, adhil kek kat e ɣone ke ke cin kɔɔth lupɔɔ, ku cike dui alal.
Go kɔc tɔu e Epetho kedhie, Judai ayi Girikii, agoki kake piŋ; goki piɔth pau kedhie, go rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu aa leec.
Na wen, ke kɔc ci gam ke ke bɔ, ku gamki ca wooc, luelki karɛc cik looi.
Go kɔc juec kɔc e thueth goki awareekken bɛɛi tetok, ku jɔki ke nyop e kɔc niim kedhie: goki ɣooc de awareek kueen, ku yokki agum kadhieny de jinii.
Go jam de Benydit lɔ ke ŋuak rot aya, ku tiem aret.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke lueel Paulo e yepiɔu, an, bi lɔ Jeruthalem, te ci en teek Makedonia ku Akaya, alueel, yan, Na elemiak, te can lɔ tɛɛn, ke yɛn bi Roma dhil tiŋ aya.
Go kɔc kaarou tuɔɔc Makedonia e kɔc yiic kɔc e yen kony, Timotheo keke Erathato; ku dɔŋ guop Athia e akoolke.
Ku e akoolke gup, anuɔɔn dit aci rot cak ne kede Kueere.
Ade raan cɔl Demeturio, aten e ateek thɔɔth, raan e kathii yeke Diana lam cueec e ateek, ku ye ateet kɔk tɔ yok weu juec;
na wen, ke cɔl ateet kedhie, keke ateet ke luɔi cit ekene, ku yook keek, yan, Week wathii, thathe aŋiɛcki nɔn ee yen e weukuɔ bɛɛi, weu bi wok ke piir.
Ku tieŋki aya ku piɛŋki, nɔn ci Paulo kɔc juec weŋ ku yɛl keek wei, acie Epetho etok, ee piny de Athia nɔm ebɛn, aye keek yɔɔk, yan, Ka ye cueec e kɔc cin, aciki e Nhialic.

Ku enɔɔne riɔɔc anu, nɔn bi atenda tɔ cin naamde; ku acie en etok, riɔɔc anu aya, luɔi bi luaŋdit e Diana biɔɔn, tɔ cin naamde, yen gok diit e yanh e tik, ago dhueeŋdɛn dit riɔɔk ebɛn, ku yen aye lam ne piny de Athia ebɛn, aɣet piny nɔm ebɛn.
Na wen, acik jame piŋ, ke ke goth alal, ku jɔki coot, yan, Diana de Epetho yen adit.
Go panydit a wenwen ebɛn: goki Gayo dɔm keke Aritharko, kɔc ke Makedonia, kɔc e cath e Paulo, ku lek e riaaŋditic ke ke riŋ e piɔn tok, riaaŋ wen ee kɔc gueer thin.
Na wen, ke Paulo de piɔu luɔi bi en lɔ thin te nu kɔc, ku jɔ peen e kɔcpiooce.
Go kɔc kɔk ne kɔc dit ke Athia, kɔc maath e Paulo, goki thɔn ku laŋki, yan, Du ro lɔ kuɔɔn e riaaŋditic.
Ku kɔc aake ye coot, kɔk ayek kene lueel, ku luel kɔk kene: kɔc ci gueer acike liaap niim kedhie, tedit e kɔc akucki ke e gueer kek.
Goki Alekandaro tuɛɛl e kut e kɔc niim, ee Judai kek aa tɛɛu en tueŋ. Go Alekandaro kɔc nieu e yecin, akɔɔr luɔi bi en kede lueel e kut e kɔc niim.
Na wen, acik e ŋic nɔn ee yen Judai, ke ke cot alal ne rol tok, ku coolki e cɔt e thaar kaarou, luelki, yan, Diana de Epetho yen adit.

Na wen, ke katip de panydit ke jɔ kut e kɔc tɔ lɔ diu, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Week, kɔc ke Epetho, de raan kuc panydit Epetho, nɔn ee yen tin e luaŋ de Diana, gok de yanh e tik, ku nɔn ee yen tin e ke ci loony piny ne Dhio?
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi cin en raan dueer kake jɔɔny, aŋuan te pal wek wepiɔth piny, ku duoki kaŋ e looi eruprup.
Kɔcke acak keek bɛɛi etene, kɔc ken ka nu e luek yiic kual luek ke lam, ku kenki yanhduon e tik lat aya.
Ku enɔɔne, te de Demeturio ke bi en goony keke raan, ayi ateet cath ne yen, te de kek ke bi kek goony, makamɔɔ ayeke taau piny, ku nu bany ke luk: tɔki keek gɔɔny rot.
Ku na thieec wek ne kɔk, abi dhil lueel e makamɔyic ekooldɛn e ye taau piny.
Wok riɔc enɔɔne, e cɔt bi wo cɔɔl ne kede anuɔɔn de akoole, acin ke e gueer e kɔc: ku acin ke dueerku lueel, yan, Ke e gueer wok, ki.
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke tɔ kɔc ci gueer jel.
Na wen, aci anuɔɔn jɔ thok, ke Paulo cɔl kɔcpiooce, ku jɔ ke riit piɔth; na wen, ke ke tɛɛŋ, ku jel le Makedonia.
Ku te ci en pinye caathic, go kɔcpiooce riit piɔth ne wel juec, ke jɔ bɛn paan e Giriki.
Ku jɔ reer etɛɛn e pɛi kadiak; na wen, ke Judai e ke mat kethook, an, bik nɔk, waan, an, le Thuria ne abel, go Paulo nyueth guop, ago piɔu dɛ luɔi bi en enɔm pɔk cieen e kueer tek Makedonia.

Go ruac e raan e Beroya cɔl Thopataro, wen e Puro, aɣeet kek Athia; ayi Aritharko ku Thekando, kɔc ke Thethalonike, ayi Gayo de Derbe, ku Timotheo; ku Tukiko keke Toropimo, kɔc ke Athia; kɔc e ruɛc en, ka.
Kɔcke acik lɔ tueŋ lek wo tiit Toroa.
Ku wook, wo e jel Pilipoi e abel, te ci akool ke kuin kene tup thok, goku bɛn te nu kek e Torao e nin kadhic, ku rɛɛrku etɛɛn e nin kadherou.
Na wen, ekool toŋ wen ee akool dherou, te ci kɔcpiooce gueer bik kuin bɛn wokic, ke ke jɔ Paulo guieer wel, akɔɔr jal bi en jal miak; go cool e jam adiite piny.
Ku ade mɛc juec mɛc ke alath, ɣon ci kek gueer thin, ee ɣon nu nhial.
Ku rɛɛr dhuŋ toŋ cɔl Yutuko aweeruyin, ke ye thiai ke nin: na wen, aci Paulo tedit guiir, ke jɔ thiai ke nhi, go loony piny ɣon nhial wen ee ɣoot diak, go jɔt ke ye thou.
Na wen, ke Paulo lɔ piny, ku cuɛt rot e yekɔu, go kuak e yecin, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Duoki diɛɛr; weike anuki e yeguop.
Go bɛ lɔ nhial, le kuin wokic, ku ciɛm; ku te ci kek abarɔ bɛ mat aru piny, ke jɔ jal.
Goki dhuŋ wen bɛɛi ke piir, ku jɔke muk piɔth aret.
Ku wook, wok aa kɔn lɔ tueŋ te nu abel, ku jɔku jal e abel lok Atho, wo de piɔth luɔi bi wo Paulo taau e abelic etɛɛn; cit man ci yen e kɔn lueel, akɔɔr luɔi bi en teek biic yetok.
Na wen, acuk jɔ rɔm e Atho, agoku noom, tɛɛuku e abeiic, ku jɔku bɛn Mitulene.
Na wen, ke wok jel etɛɛn e abel, na ɣɔnmiak, ke wo jɔ ɣet e Kio nɔm; na ɣɔnmiak, ke wo jɔ ɣet Thamo, agoku cool Terogilium; na ɣɔnmiak, ke wo jɔ ɣet Mileto.
Paulo aa de piɔu luɔi bi en Epetho winy thok e abel, acin piɔu luɔi bi en ceŋ Athia; aa cath alal, nɔn de te bi en nu Jeruthalem ekool e Thierdhic.
Go kɔc tooc e Mileto lek Epetho, lek roordit ke kanithɔ cɔɔl.
Na wen, acik bɛn te nu yen, ke ke yook, yan, Week, wek ŋic reer aa yɛn reer e weyiic ecaŋɣɔn gɔl ekool tueŋ e kan ɛn bɛn Athia aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Yɛn ee ka ke Bɛnydit looi ne kuur aa yɛn rot kuɔɔr piny, ku ne dhien dit aa yɛn dhiau, ku ne them dit ee ya them ne baŋ de man cii Judai kethook mat, an, bik a nɔk:
ku ŋiɛcki aya nɔn cin en jam ca pɛn week, jam dueer we muk; yɛn aa ye week guieer wel ku wɛɛt week e kɔc niim ayi ɣoot yiic,
yɛn aa ye ya caatɔ lɛk Judai ayi Girikii aya puŋ bi kek kepiɔth pɔk Nhialic, ku gam bi kek Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho gam.
Ku enɔɔne, yɛn lɔ Jeruthalem, ke yɛn ci mac ne weiki, ka ba yok etɛɛn akuoc ke:
Weidit Ɣer tei ayek aa caatɔ, lek ɛn e pɛɛnydit yiic ebɛn, yan, Joth ku ketuc ba guum atitki yɛn etɛɛn.

Ku acin ke e ya tɔ dit e kake yiic, acakaa piirdi aca dueer theek, luɔi ban luɔidi thol e miɛtepiɔu, ku thɔl luɔi cii Bɛnydit Yecu taau e yacin, yan, ban aa caatɔ, ba welpiɛth aa guiir, welpiɛth ke dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu.
Ku tieŋki, enɔɔne, wek kɔc aa yɛn ke cath e weyiic, ke ya guiir ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, aŋiɛc nɔn ca wek a bi bɛ tiŋ nyin anandun wedhie.
Yɛn ee guɔ aa caatɔ e weniim ekoole, yan, Riɛm e raan ebɛn aliu e yayeth.
Luɔi can week lɛk loŋ de Nhialic ebɛn, acin ke ca mɔny week.
Yen tieŋ wek rot, ku tiɛetki luny de thok ebɛn, luny cii Weidit Ɣer taau e wecin abak tht, bak kanithɔ de Nhialic aa caam, kanithɔ ci ɣɔɔc e riɛmde guop.
Aŋiɛc nɔn bi aŋuooth rac lɔɔk bɛn e weyiic, te can jal, aŋuooth cii luny bi pɔl; ku kɔc kɔk abik rot jɔt e weyiic gup aya, kɔc bi jam rac lueel, lek kɔcpiooce thɛl e kecok.
Yen tiɛɛt wek rot, ku takki weniim nɔn kɛn ɛn weet pɔl weet aa yɛn week wɛɛt wedhie e run kadiak, wɛɛrwakɔu ku akol, ke ya ye dhiau e piu ke yɛnnyin.
Ku enɔɔne, wathii, wek taau e Nhialic cin, ayi jam de dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu, jam dueer week kueet, agoki week gam biakduon bak lɔɔk lak e kɔc ɣerpiɔth yiic kedhie.
Acin ateek ke raan daŋ ca woi e yapiɔu, ayi adhaap ayi lupɔde aya.
Week wegup aŋiɛcki, nɔn ee cinkienke kek aa muk ɛn, ayi kɔc waan cath ne yɛn aya.

We ca nyuoth kerieec ebɛn, luɔi ba wek aa luui aya, aguɔki kɔc kuany nyiin dhil aa muk, ku yak weniim tak ne wel ke Bɛnydit Yecu, waan lueel en en, yan, Raan yin raan daŋ kaŋ, yen aye thieei awar raan e yine kaŋ.
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke jɔ emiɔl tuk, ku jɔ lɔŋ ke keek etok kedhie.
Goki dhiau aret kedhie, ku kuakki Paulo yeth, ku cimki,
ke ke dhiau e dhien dit alal, ne jam wen ci lueel, yan, ciki bi bɛ tiŋ nyin ananden. Goki ruac e abel nɔm.
Na wen, acuk pɔk wo keek, ke abel jɔ yup, ku jɔku jal, lok kueer lɔ citic ɣetku Koth, na ɣɔnmiak ke wo jɔ bɛn Roda, ku jelku etɛɛn lok Patara.
Agoku abel lɔ Poiniki yok, ku jɔku lɔ thin, jelku.
Na wen, acuk Kupurio tiŋ nɔm, goku nyaaŋ piny e baŋ cam, ku jɔku lɔ Thuria, goku bɛn bei e Turo, ka ɣɛɛc abel ayeke bɛɛi bei etɛɛn.
Na wen, acuk kɔcpiooce yok etɛɛn, ke wo jɔ reer etɛɛn e nin kadherou: go kɔcke Paulo yɔɔk ne Weidit Ɣer, an, cii Jeruthalem bi kacic.
Na wen, acuk akoolke lɛɛr, ke wo jɔ jal lok e kueerda; goki wo ruac kedhie, keke dieerken ku mithken, abuk ɣet e panydit kec: goku womiɔl tuk e abapdit yɔu, ku lɛŋku;
na wen, acuk rot tɔɔŋ, ke wo jɔ lɔ e abelic, ku dhunyki keniim bei.
Ku wook, te ci wok jal e Turo, ɣetku Potolemai, ke cathdan e abeiic e jɔ thok; goku wathii thieec etɛɛn, ku jɔku reer e keek ekool tok.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke wo jɔ jal wo kɔc wen cath e Paulo, joku bɛn Kaidhareia; goku lɔ ɣon e Pilip, raan ŋic welpiɛth guiir, ku ye raan toŋ e kɔc kadherou yiic, goku reer e yen.
Raane ade nyiirke kaŋuan, dhueec kene thiaak, dhueec e wel guiir.
Na wen, atɔuku etɛɛn e akool juec, ke raan bɔ piny Judaya, ke ye nebi, rinke acɔlke Agabo.

Na wen, ke bɔ te nu wok, bi ku noom diion wen ee Paulo eyic duut, ku duut rot, cin ku cok, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Ne Weidit Ɣer aleyɔɔ, yan, Raan de yethione abii Judai nu Jeruthalem duut aya, ku jɔki yien Juoor.
Na wen, acuk kake piŋ, ke wook ayi wathii nu etɛɛn ke jɔku lɔŋ, an, Du lɔ Jeruthalem.
Go Paulo bɛɛr, an, Eeŋo luɔɔiki wakya, abak a tɔ cuan piɔu ne dhiendun? Acie many mɛce ya e Jeruthalem en gam etok, ayi thuɔɔu aca gam aya, ne baŋ de rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu.
Na wen, areec keda gam, ke wo jɔ jam pɔl, ku luelku, yan, Abi looi tei ne kede piɔn e Bɛnydit.
Na wen, aci akoolke wan, ke wo dut weukuɔ, ku jɔku lɔ Jeruthalem.
Ku wo ruɛce e kɔc kɔk e kɔcpiooce nu Kaidhareia, ku aciɛthki ne raan cɔl Manathon, mony e bɔ Kupurio, ee raan e kɔn e piɔɔc thɛɛr, ku ye raan bi wok reer ɣonde.
Na wen, acuk ɣet Jeruthalem, ke wo loor wathii ne piɔnmit.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke Paulo lɔ ke wook etok tede Jakop; ku nu roordit kedhie ne yen etok.
Na wen, aci ke thieec, ke ke guiir kaŋ cooke ku cooke, ka cii Nhialic looi e Juoor yiic ne luɔide.
Na wen, acik e piŋ, ke ke jɔ Nhialic lɛc nɔm, ku yookki, yan, Kɛne tiŋ enɔɔne, mɛnhwaada, kut diit e Judai ci gam, nɔn juec kek alal; ku nɔn leth kek yiic e baŋ de loŋ kedhie:
ku acik kedu piŋ nɔn weet yin Judai nu e Juoor yiic ebɛn, yan, bik Mothe pɔl, ku nɔn lek yin keek, yan, ciki mithken bi dhil aa cueel, ku ciki ciɛɛŋ thɛɛr e kuanyic.
Eeŋo buk jɔ looi? kut e kɔc abik dhil gueer; abik dhil piŋ nɔn ci yin bɛn.
Yen looi yin ke lekku yin: Wo de roor kaŋuan etene, roor de jam cik lɛk Nhialic aŋoot e keyieth;

mate ro keek, wak yiguop aba guop piath we keek, ku game keek weu bi kek keniim muut: yen abi kɔc e ŋic kedhie nɔn ee yen lueth yen jam cik piŋ ne kedu; ku bik ŋic nɔn reer yin e reer piɛth, ku nɔn dot yin loŋ e muk.
Ku na Juoor ci gam, acuk ke gaar loŋ cuk thol e guieer, yan, acin ke bik aa looi ke cit ekene, ee cokke kapac, yan, bik rot aa tiit ne ka ci kɔn yien yieth, ku riɛm, ku ka ci dec, ku dhoom.

Go Paulo ro mat e roorke; na ɣɔnmiak, aci yeguop waak abi guop a wic ke keek etok, ke jɔ lɔ luaŋdiit e Nhialic le lɛk kɔc thok ci akool e wɛk e gup thok, ku tɔu etɛɛn, aɣet te bi kedaŋ gam Nhialic ne biakden kedhie.
Na wen, aci akool kadherou thiɔk e thok, ke Judai e bɔ piny de Athia, te ci kek Paulo tiŋ e luaŋditic, ke ke guet kut e kɔc niim kedhie ku jɔki dɔm,

ku cotki, yan, Week, roor ke Yithiael, kuɔnyki wook, kene ee raan e kɔc wɛɛt e jam de ater ke jurda, ku loŋ, ku luaŋe, e piny nɔm ebɛn: ku daŋ aya, aci Girikii bɛɛi e luaŋdit e Nhialicic, go teɣeere tɔ nhiany.
