Aake ci Toropimo kɔn tiŋ waan keke Paulo e panyditic, yen aye raan e Epetho, goki lueel, an, ci Paulo yien bɛɛi e luaŋditic.
Go panydit nuɔɔn ebɛn ku jɔ kɔc bɛn e ke riŋ etok: goki Paulo dɔm, ku thelki biic luaŋdit e Nhialic: ku dap thok ke luaŋdit guur.
Na wen, akɔɔrki nɔn bi kek Paulo nɔk, ke jam bɔ tede bɛnydit e rem de alathkeer, yan, ci Jeruthalem nuɔɔn ebɛn.
Go alathkeer dap cɔɔl enɔnthiine, keke banyken, ku dap kat ke lɔ te nu kek: na wen, acik bɛnydit tiŋ keke alathkeer, ke ke jɔ Paulo pɔl e dui.
Go bɛnydit alathker lɔ te nu yen, le ku dɔm, ku tɔ rek e joth kaarou; go thieec, an, Ee yin ŋa? eeŋo ci looi?
Go kɔk coot luelki cooke, ku cot kɔk luelki cooke, ne kut e kɔc yiic: na wen, te cin en te dueer en kedaŋ ŋic egɔk, ne biak de anuɔɔn, ke yook, an, bi lɛɛr e aloocic.
Na wen, aci ɣet te ye kɔc lɔ nhial, ke dhile ɣaac alathkeer ne jieep jieepe yen e kɔc;
acii kut e kɔc biɔɔth cok, ke ke cot, yan, Eeŋo ca wek eraane nyiɛɛi?
Na wen, an, leere yen e aloocditic, ke Paulo thiec bɛnydit alathker, an, Dueerku kaŋ lueel woke yin? Go, an, Ŋic thoŋ e Giriki?
Ci ye mony e Ripe, raan akɔlɔn cak anuɔɔn, raan waan leer agum kaŋuan e kɔc e jɔɔric, kek aye luuc e kɔc nɔk, ci ye yen?
Go Paulo bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn ee Judai nɔm, raan e bɔ Tartho de Kilikia, panydit ba yɛn thin acie pany youyou: ku yin laŋ, yan, Pal ɛn ajam wo kɔc.
Go gam, go Paulo kɔɔc te ye kɔc lɔ nhial, ku nieu kɔc e yecin. Na wen, aci kɔc lɔ diu alal, ke jɔ jam ke keek ne thoŋ de Eberuu, lueel, yan,
Week, wɛɛtkewaar ku warkuɔ, piɛŋki kedien luɛɛl e weniim enɔɔne.
Na wen, acik e piŋ nɔn jiɛɛm en ke keek ne thoŋ de Eberuu, ke ke lɔ lik alaldiite: go lueel, yan,

Yɛn e Judai nɔm egɔk, ku yɛn aa dhieeth e Tartho e Kilikia, ku yɛn aa muk e panydiiteyic, ke ya ye piɔɔc e Gamaliɛl, ku ye ya wɛɛt e tau de loŋ de kuarkuɔ, tau agɔk, aguɔ yic lɛth ne kede Nhialic, acit man e wek wedhie ekoole.
Yɛn aa ye kɔc cath e Kueere yɔŋ athou kek, ku aake ya duut, ku mac keek e aloc yiic, roor ayi diaar.

Bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ee caatɔdi ne ecooke aya, ayi roordit ebɛn: awareek aca ke noom tede keek aya, awareek ba yien wathii, guɔ lɔ Damathko, la kɔc e tɔu etɛɛn lɔ bɛɛi Jeruthalem, ke ke rɛk, abik kedɛn tuc bɛn yok.
Na wen, acath kueer, ku ca ɣeet tethiɔk keke Damathko, te kɛɛc akɔl cil, ke keditt ɣeer e piny riaau go tuol e yalɔɔm ethiau, keɣeer bɔ nhial.
Guɔ wiik, ku piɛŋ rol leke yɛn, an, Thaulo, Thaulo, eeŋo yɔŋe yɛn?
Guɔ thieec, yan, Ee yin ŋa, Bɛnydit? Go, an, Yɛn Yecu de Nadhareth, raan yɔŋe.
Go kɔc cath e yɛn goki keɣer tiŋ, agoki riɔɔc: ku kenki rol e raan jam ke yɛn piŋ.
Guɔ thieec, yan, Eeŋo ba looi, Bɛnydit? Go Bɛnydit lueel, yan, Jɔt rot, lɔ Damathko; ka ba dhil looi abike lɛk yin etɛɛn, kaŋ kedhie.
Na wen, aca cien te daai ne riaau ci keɣeere a riaau nyin, ke ya dɔm cin e kɔc wen cath e yɛn, thelki ya, guɔ jɔ bɛn Damathko.
Ku ade raan cɔl Anania, raan rieu Nhialic ku dot loŋ, ku ye raan piɛth rin tede Judai waan rɛɛr etɛɛn kedhie,
raane e jɔ bɛn tede yɛn, bi ku kɛɛc e yalɔɔm, go a yɔɔk, yan, Thaulo, mɛnhkai, bɛye yin. Guɔ yin enɔnthiine, ku wɔi guop.
Go lueel, yan, Nhialic de warkuɔ aci yi lɔc, ba kede piɔnde bɛn ŋic, ago Raan Piɛthpiɔuwe tiŋ, ku jɔ jam e yenthok piŋ.
Yin bi aa caatɔde e kɔc yiic kedhie, ne ka ci tiŋ ku piŋ ke.
Ku enɔɔne, eeŋo gau yi? Jɔt rot, ke yi baptith, aba karɛcku waak wei, ku jɔ rin ke Bɛnydit cɔɔl.

Na wen, te can anɔm bɛ dhuony Jeruthalem, ke ya laŋ e luaŋdiit e Nhialicic, ku ja kaŋ tiŋ ke ya nyuoth, guɔ Yecu tiŋ ke yook ɛn, an, Dap jal e Jeruthalem enɔnthiine: jamduon ee lueel e kedi aciki bi gam.
Guɔ lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, aŋicki nɔn can kɔc gam yin tɔ mac, ku ya ke dui e luek ke Nhialic yiic kedhie:
ku waan leuwe riɛm e Thepano caatɔduon waan ci nɔk, ke yɛn aa kaac etɛɛn aya, ku gam thonde, guɔ lupɔɔ ke kɔc nak en tiit.
Go ya yɔɔk, yan, Jel tei: yin ba tuɔɔc temec ya te nu Juoor.
Goki ka lueel Paulo piŋ aɣet jame: na wen, ke ke jɔt kerot, aluelki, yan, Nyaaiye raan cit ekene e piny nɔm: acii piɛth luɔi bi en piir.
Na wen, ke ke cot arek abik lupɔɔken cuat piny, ku deenyki abuni nhial aya,
ke jɔ bɛnydit alathker lueel, yan, bi Paulo lɛɛr e aloocic, ku lueel, yan, bi luɔp ne dui bi e dui e waat, ke bi thar e ke ye kɔc coot aya ŋic.
Na wen, adutki yen e wiin, ke Paulo thiec bɛny de rem, bɛny kaac e yelɔɔm, yan, Ci pal week nɔn ba wek raan dui e waat ku ye Romai, te ŋoot en ke kene yiek yeth gaak?
Te ci en ekene piŋ, ke bɛny de rem jɔ lɔ lɛk bɛnydit alathker, yan, Tiŋ rot e ke loi; raane ee Romai.
Go bɛnydit alathker bɛn, ku jɔ thieec, yan, Lɛke yɛn, ye Romai? Go, yan, Ɣɛɛ.
Go bɛnydit alathker bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn e weu juec taau piny ne biak ban aa dil. Go Paulo lueel, yan, Ku yɛn e dhieth ke ya ye dii.
Go kɔc jal e yelɔɔm enɔnthiine, kɔc wen, an, bik e luɔp ne dui: bɛnydit alathker e riɔɔc aya, te ci en e ŋic nɔn ee yen Romai, wen ci en e tɔ dut.

Na ɣɔnmiak, nɔn de yen piɔu luɔi bi en thar e kedaŋ ŋic egɔk, ke gɔɔnye Judai ye, ke jɔ Paulo lony e joth yiic, ku cɔɔl banydit ke ka ke Nhialic keke kɔc ke loŋ kedhie, an, bik bɛn. Go Paulo bɛɛi, ku tɛɛuwe e keniim.
Na wen, ke Paulo jɔ kɔc nu e loŋic toom gup, ku lueel, yan, Week, wɛɛtkewaar, yɛn ee reer e reerdi ne piɔn agɔk e Nhialic nɔm aɣet ci ekoole.
Go Anania, bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic, go kɔc kaac e yelɔɔm yɔɔk, yan, Biakki thok.
Go Paulo yɔɔk, yan, Yin bii Nhialic biɔɔk, yin ee pany ci rɔɔth kɔu e keɣer: rɛɛre etɛɛn, ba kedi bɛn guiir ne kede loŋ, ku ba kɔc yɔɔk, yan, bik a biɔɔk, ago loŋ jɔ wooc aya?
Go kɔc kaac etɛɛn goki thieec, yan, Lat bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic?
Go Paulo lueel, yan, Wathii, aa kuoc nɔn ee yen bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic: aci gɔɔr, yan, Du bɛny ceŋ kɔckun e lat.

Na wen, aci Paulo kɔc nu e loŋic tiŋ, yan, biak tok ee Thadokai, ku biak tok ee Parithai, ke jɔ coot e loŋic, yan, Wɛɛtkewaar, yɛn ee Parithai, wen e Parithai: ne aŋɔth aa yɛn ŋɔth ku ne jon bi kɔc ci thou rot jɔt, en a guiire kedi.
Ku te ci en ekene lueel, ke teer cak rot e yi Parithai keke Thadokai, go kɔc nu e loŋ nɔm goki keyiic tek.
Aye Thadokai lueel, yan, Jon bi kɔc rot jɔt aliu, ayi tunynhial, ayi jɔk aliuki: ku ye Parithai ke gam kedhie.
Go awuɔɔu dit rot cak: kɔc e loŋ gɔɔr kɔc e mat e Parithai acik rot jɔt, teerki, aluelki, yan, Acin kerɛɛc cuk yok tede raane: ku na de jɔŋ ci jam keke yen, ayi tuny nhial, duku biɔk e Nhialic.
Na wen, aci teer dit ro cak, ke bɛnydit alathker riɔc luɔi bi Paulo cuaan e kɔc cin, go alathkeer yɔɔk, an, bik lɔ piny, lek thɛl bei e kɔc yiic, ku biiki e aloocic.
Na ɣɔnakɔu, ke Bɛnydit jɔ kɔɔc e Paulo lɔɔm, ku lueel, yan, Rit yiniɔu, Paulo: acit man ci yin aa caatɔ ne kedi e Jeruthalem, ke yin bi dhil aa caatɔ e Roma aya.
Na wen, aci piny ru, ke Judai kɔk e ke jɔ kethook mat, goki mel cam alal, yan, ciki dek ku ciki cam, te ŋoot kek ke ke ken Paulo nɔk.
Kɔc ci kethook mat aya awarki thierŋuan.
Goki lɔ tede banydit ke ka ke Nhialic ku roordit, ku luelki, yan, Wok e mel cam alal, yan, acin ke buk thieep te ŋoot wok ke wo ken Paulo nɔk.

Ku week enɔɔne, weke kɔc nu e loŋ nɔm, we bi bɛnydit alathker yɔɔk, an, bi Paulo bɛɛi piny yine week, an, kaarki luɔi ba wek kaŋ luɔp ne kede, ka bak ŋic egɔk: ku wook, te ŋoot en ke ken ɣet tethiɔk, ke wo ye thiɔk e naŋ nɛk wok en.
Na wen, aci wen e nyankene Paulo both buuthe ke piŋ, ke jɔ lɔ, ku le e aloocditic le lɛk Paulo.
Go Paulo bɛny tok cɔɔl, bɛny de rem, ku lueel, yan, Lɛɛre dhuŋe tede bɛnydit alathker: ade ke bi lɔ lɛk en.
Go noom, bii e bɛnydit alathker nɔm, ku lueel, yan, Paulo, raan ci mac, aci a cɔɔl, ku lɛŋ ɛn, yan, ba dhuŋe bɛɛi tede yin, ade ke bi lek yin.
Go bɛnydit alathker dɔm cin, ku jɔki rot miɛɛt kec, te cin kɔc, go thieec, yan, Ee kaŋo ke cath ke yin ke ba lɛk ɛn?
Go lueel, yan, Judai acik kethook mat, luɔi bi kek yi lɔŋ, an, ba Paulo bɛɛi e loŋ nɔm miak, an, kɔɔrki luɔi bi kek kaŋ luɔp ne kede, ka bik ŋic egɔk.
Yen du yin keden gam: ade kɔc buth en kueer, awarki thierŋuan, kɔc ci mel cam, an, ciki cam ku ciki dek te ŋoot kek ke kenki nɔk: ku acik thok enɔɔne, atitki jam bi bɛn tede yin.
Go bɛnydit alathker dhuŋe tɔ jel, ku yook, yan, Du lek raan daŋ nɔn ci yin a nyuoth kake.

Go bany ke rem cɔɔl kaarou, ku jɔ ke yɔɔk, yan, Taki bot ke alathkeer kaarou guik bik lɔ Kaithareia, ayi alathkeer cath e joŋgoor kɔɔth kathierdherou, ku alathkeer muk tɔɔŋ bot kaarou, abik jal e thaar kadiak elewakɔu:
ku we bi joŋgoor yok ayadaŋ, bi kek Paulo taau e kekɔɔth, bik lɔ lɛɛr yinki mudhiir Pelik apiɛth.
Go awarek gɔɔr ale:
yan, Mudhiir Pelik adhuɛŋ piɛth arac, yin thieec, yɛn Kulaudio Luthia.
Raane acii Judai dɔm, ku acik duɛɛr nɔk, guɔ bɛn wo tɔŋ, ku kuɔny: aca piŋ nɔn ee yen dil e Romai.
Na wen, aa dɛ piɔu luɔi ban goony gɔɔny kek en ŋic, ke ja bɛɛi e loŋden nɔm:
aguɔ piŋ nɔn ci e gaany ne kede loŋden tei, ku kene gaany ne ke dueere ye tɔ nak, ku ne ke dueere ye tɔ mac aya.
Ku aci lɛk ɛn nɔn buuthe Judai yen, aguɔ dap tɔ yine yin, ku ca kɔc gɔɔny en yɔɔk aya, yan, bik kedɛn e gɔɔny kek en lueel e yinɔm. Yin bi nin apiɛth.
Go alathkeer Paulo noom, acit man ci e lɛk keek, ku biiki Antipatiri wakɔu.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke alathkeer cath piny ke ke dhuny keniim aloocdit: ku nyieeŋki alathkeer cath e joŋgoor kɔɔth piny, bik lɔɔk cath e Paulo.
Na wen, acik bɛn Kaithareia, ke ke jɔ awarek yien mudhiir, ku tɛɛuki Paulo e yenɔm aya.
Te ci mudhiir awarek kueenic, ke jɔ thieec, yan, Yee raan e pinyou? Te ci en e piŋ nɔn ee yen raan e Kilikia,
ke jɔ lueel, yan, Kedu aba piŋ, te ci kɔc gɔɔny yin bɛn aya. Go kɔc yɔɔk, an, bik mac aloocdiit e Kerod, alooc e guieer e loŋ.
Na wen, aci akool kadhic thok, ke Anania bɛny diit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ke jɔ bɛn keke roordit, ke ke cath ne raan ŋic jam guiir raan cɔl Tertulo; ku jɔki mudhiir nyuoth jamden ne Paulo.
Na wen, aci cɔɔl, ke Tertulo gɔl gɔny gɔɔny en Paulo, yan, Nɔn reer wok ke piny lɔ diu aret, e ke bɔ e ciindu, ku nɔn ci luɔi piɛth aret luoi jurda ne piath e yinɔm,
yen aye wok kaŋ noom ke wo lec yinɔm ne piɔnmit, e akoolnyiin kedhie ku piny ebɛn, ku jɔku aa lueel, an, Thieithieei, yin Pelik adhuɛŋ piɛth alal.
Na enɔɔne, ke can yi tɔ bap, yin laŋ, an, Piŋ welkuɔn lik ke yi hir yipiɔu.
Wok e raane yok aye raan rac etaiwei, ku ye raan e Judai kɛɛk kedhie e piny nɔm ebɛn, ee raan ditt e rem de Nadharani:
aci them aya luɔi bi en luaŋdiit e Nhialic tɔ riaak: agoku dɔm, ku deku piɔth luɔi bi wok kede guiir e kede loŋda.
Go Luthia bɛnydiit alathker guɔ bɛn, ku jɔ dɔm bei e wocin e riɛl dit,
ku yook kɔc gɔɔny en, an, bik bɛn tede yin: na enɔɔne, te ci yin e thieec yinguop, ke yin dueer kake ŋic egɔk, ka gɔɔny wok ke yen, kaŋ ebɛn.
Go Judai gam aya, luelki, an, kake ayinki ya.
Na wen, aci mudhiir e nieu, ke Paulo beer, yan, Bɛnydit, aŋiɛc nɔn ee yin jure cieŋ e run juec, en a luɛɛl ɛn kedi e piɔnmit:
aduɛɛre ŋic enɔɔne, yan, nin acik thieer ku rou tei, te waan la yɛn Jeruthalem la lam:
ku yɛn kene kɔc yok ke ya cak teer wo kɔc e luaŋdit e Nhialicic, ku kene ya yok aya ke ya tɔ kɔc wou e luek ke Nhialic yiic, ayi panyditic.
Ku ka gɔɔny kek ɛn enɔɔne, aciki ke dueer tɔ ye yith.
Ku cooke aca gam e yinɔm tei, yan, Lam luelki, yan, ee lam mɛɛn, yen aya yɛn Nhialic de kuarkuɔ lam, ku yɛn gam ka ci gɔɔr e loŋ de Motheyic ku nebi yiic, kaŋ kedhie:
ku yɛn ŋath Nhialic, ayi keek aya, ee Nhialic en ŋathki, nɔn bi jonerot e kɔc ci thou nu, kɔc piɛthpiɔth ayi kɔc rac piɔth.
Ku yɛn ee ro them e cooke, yan, ba ya cath ne piɔn agɔk anandi, ku cin ke ya wooc e Nhialic nɔm ku kɔc niim ayadaŋ.
Ku enɔɔne, te can run juec lɛɛr, ke yɛn e jɔ bɛn ba ka ci gam ne dhueeŋ bɛn yien jurda, ayi ka ci yien Nhialic:
ago Judai kɔk bɔ Athia agoki bɛn, ku yokki yɛn luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ke ya piɛth guop, ku cin kut e kɔc cath e yɛn, ku cin awuɔɔu nu:
kɔcke adi cik bɛn e yinɔm, bik a bɛn gaany, te de yen ke bi kek a gaany.
Ayi kɔcke etene, tɔ luelki keek gup, nɔn de kerɛɛcdien cik yok te waan kaac ɛn e loŋ nɔm,
ee jam toŋe tei, jam waan cɔɔt ɛn, waan kaac ɛn e keyiic, yan, Ne kede jonerot e kɔc ci thou, yen a guiire loŋdi e weniim ekoole.
Na wen, aci Pelik kake piŋ, luɔi ŋic en jam de Kueer aret, ke ke jɔ rieec, go lueel, yan, Miak te ci Ludiia bɛnydit alathker bɛn, ke yɛn bi jamdun jɔ woiyic apiɛth.
Go bɛny de rem yɔɔk, an, bi Paulo aa tht, ku tɔ rɛɛr apiɛth; ku cii kɔcken bi pɛn bɛn e yelɔɔm, bik kede bɛn looi.
Na wen, aci nhi lik thok, ke Pelik jɔ bɛn keke Duruthila tiiŋde, ee nyan e Judai, go Paulo tɔ cɔl, ku jɔ piŋ waan guiir en kede gam de Kritho.

Na wen, aguiir Paulo kede piathepiɔu, ku ne dom ee raan rot dɔm, ku ne guieer bi loŋ de kɔc guiir rial, ke Pelik jɔ riɔɔc aret, go bɛɛr, yan, Jɔ jal enɔɔne: na miak, te can akool piɛth yok, ke yin ba cɔɔl.
Ku aŋath Paulo aya, nɔn bi en e waac e weu, ke bi lony: yen aa ye yen cool e cɔɔl en en, bi jam ke yen.
Na wen, aci run kaarou thok, ke Porukio Pethetɔ loony e nyin e Pelikic; go Pelik piɔu dɛ luɔi bi en Judai tɔ mit piɔu, go Paulo nyaaŋ piny amac.
Na wen, aci Petheto bɛn piny, ke jɔ nin lɛɛr kadiak, ku jɔ jal Kaithareia le Jeruthalem.
Go bɛnydiit tueŋ e ka ke Nhialic ku roordit ke Judai goki Paulo gaany e yenɔm, ku jɔki lɔŋ,
lipki, ke bi Paulo tɔ biiye Jeruthalem; akɔɔrki nɔn bi kek e buuth e kueer kec, bik nɔk.
Go Petheto bɛɛr, yan, e Paulo yok ke mac e Kaithareia, ku lueel e yenguop, an, bi dap jal, ke lɔ tɛɛn.
Go, an, Na de kɔc nu e weyiic, kɔc dueer lɔ, e ke lɔ ne yɛn etok, bik raane lɔ gaany, nɔn de yen ke ci wooc.
Go reer e keyiic te cit nin kabɛt ku nɔn thieer kek, ke jɔ lɔ Kaithareia; na ɣɔnmiak, ke nyuc e thoony e guieereloŋ, go lueel, yan, e Paulo biiye.
Na wen, aci bɛn, ke Judai e bɔ e Jeruthalem, ke ke jɔ kɔɔc e yelɔɔm, goki Paulo gaany e kajuec kathiek, ku acin te bi kek ke tɔ ye yith.
Go Paulo bɛɛr ne kede guop, yan, Acin kerɛɛc ca wooc ne loŋ de Judai, ayi luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ayi Kaithar, acin cook tok.
Na wen, ke Petheto, ke kɔɔr luɔi bi en Judai tɔ mit piɔth, go Paulo thieec, yan, Duɛɛre lɔ Jeruthalem, bi jamdu lɔ guiir e yanɔm etɛɛn, ne ka ci yi gaanye?
Go Paulo lueel, yan, Yɛn kaac e thoony de Kaithar nɔm, thoony e guieereloŋ, yen aye te bi kedi dhil guiir thin: acin ke ca wac Judai, kene aŋic egɔk aya.

Ku na de ke ca wooc, ku na de kerɛɛc ca looi kerɛɛc roŋ ke luɔi bi a nɔk, ke yɛn cii dueer jai e thuɔɔu: ku te cii kek e yith, kek kak e gɔɔny kek ɛne, ke luɔi dueer raan a tɔ yine keek aliu. Yɛn bi kedi lɛɛr e Kaithar nɔm.
Go Petheto jam guiir keke kɔc nu e loŋic, ku jɔ bɛɛr, yan, Ci guɔ lueel, an, ba kedu lɛɛr e Kaithar nɔm? Apiɛth, yin bi jɔ lɔ e Kaithar nɔm.
Na wen, aci nhi kɔk thok, ke malik Agiripa jɔ bɛn keke Berenike, ke ke bɔ Kaithareia, bik Petheto bɛn thieec.
Ku te ci kek guɔ reer etɛɛn e nhi juec, ke Petheto jɔ malik guieer jam de Paulo, yan, Ade raan cii Pelik nyaaŋ piny ke mac:
na wen, te nuɔ yɛn Jeruthalem, ke banydit ke ka ke Nhialic keke roordit ke Judai ke ke jɔ ya guieer kede, akɔɔrki luɔi ban loŋde teem, an, e nak.
Aguɔ keden bɛɛr, yan, Acie ciɛɛŋ de Romai, an, bik raan yien kɔc, lɔ nɔk, te ŋoote raan ci gaany ke ken ethok kɔn tuoom keke kɔc gɔɔny en, ago pal luɛl lueel en kede ne ke e gɔɔnye ye.
Na wen, acik bɛn ene, ke ya ken gaau, ɣɔnmiak guop yɛn e nyuc e thoony e guieereloŋ, ku yɔɔk kɔc, yan, bik raan bɛɛi.
Na wen, aci kɔc gɔɔny en rot jɔt, akenki gaany ne kak e ya lueel e yapiɔu, yan, bi kek e gaany:
aterden ne yen ee jam de lam ee kek yiethken lam kapac, ku ye jam de raan cɔl Yecu, raan ci thou, ku ye Paulo ŋak, an, piir enɔɔne.
Na wen, aci a dhal luɔi ban kede guiir, guɔ Paulo thieec, yan, Duɛɛre lɔ Jeruthalem, ke kedu bi lɔ guiir etɛɛn ne kake.
Go Paulo lɔŋ, an, bi yok ke tɔu, bi kede lɔ piŋ e Augoutho nɔm, aguɔ lueel, an, bi yok ke mac aɣet kool ban e tɔ yine Kaithar.
Go Agiripa Petheto yɔɔk, yan, Ayik ɛn aya, yɛn de piɔu luɔi ban kede raane piŋ. Go, an, Aba piŋ miak.
Na ɣɔnmiak, aci Agiripa bɛn keke Berenike, ke ke bɔ ne dhueeŋ dit, ku jɔki lɔ aloocdit alooc de guieereloŋ, keke banydit alathker ku roordit ke panydit, go Petheto Paulo tɔ cɔl, go bɛɛi e keniim.

Go Petheto lueel, yan, Yin malik Agiripa, weke kɔc nu etene wedhie, raane a wɔiki, raan cii kɔc ke Judai kedhie a loŋ ne kede, ayi Jeruthalem ayi etene, ku cotki, yan, Raane acii piɛth ke luɔi bi en bɛ piir.
Ku luɔi cin en ke ca yok, ke bi e nɔk, ku luɔi ci en a lɔŋ, yenguop, yan, bi kede lɛɛr e Augoutho nɔm, ke guɔ lueel, yan, ba tɔ leere.
Ku acin jam yic cath ke yɛn, jam ba gaar bɛnydan dit ne kede. Yen a bɛɛi ɛn en e weniim, ayik yinɔm, yin malik Agiripa; na ele, te ca wek e thieec apiɛth, ke yɛn bi dɛ kedien ba gɔɔr.
Aca lueel, yan, Ee keɣɔric, te ta yɛn raan ci mac leere tedaŋ, ke ya ken raan yine ye nyuoth thar e ke e gɔɔnye yen.
Go Agiripa Paulo yɔɔk, yan, Yin dueer jam e rot yitok. Go Paulo yecin rieny tueŋ, ku jɔ kede lueel jɛi en rot:
Yan, Aya lueel, yan, ca guop miɛt ekoole, yin malik Agiripa, luɔi ban kedi lueel e yinɔm, ne ka ci Judai a gaany kedhie:
ku luɔi ŋic yin ciɛɛŋ de Judai ku wel luelki kedhie, yen a miɛt ɛn guop aret, aguɔ yi lɔŋ, yan, Piŋ kedi ke yi liir yiniɔu.
Tau e tau ɛn waan aa yɛn meth, waan rɛɛr ɛn woke jurdi e Jeruthalem, aŋic Judai ebɛn;
aake ŋic ɛn waan thɛɛr, te de kek piɔth luɔi bi kek e lueel, aŋicki taudi nɔn e tau ɛn ke ya ye Parithai, yen aye rem ril etor ne lamda.
Ku yɛn kaac enɔɔne, ku aguiir loŋdi ne baŋ de aŋɔth ŋath ɛn jam cii Nhialic kɔn lɛk warkuɔ;
ku dhienkuɔ kathieer ku rou kek aye jame ŋɔɔth, luɔi bi en aa yic, ku yek Nhialic lam aret akol ku wakɔu. Ne baŋ de aŋɔthe, yin malik Agiripa, yen a gɔɔnye Judai yɛn ekoole.
Eeŋo luɛɛl wek en, an, ee ke cii kɔc dueer gam, yen jon bi Nhialic kɔc ci thou jat nhial?
Yɛnguop aa ya lueel waan, an, ba kajuec dhil looi ater ne rin ke Yecu de Nadhareth.
Aguɔ looi aya e Jeruthalem: yɛn e riɛl noom tede banydit ke ka ke Nhialic, ku ja kɔc juec mac e aloc yiic, kɔc ɣerpiɔth; ku ekool cike nɔk, yɛn e thonden gam.
Aake ya cool e duoi ɛn ke e luek ke Nhialic yiic kedhie, ku ja ke dhil aa tɔ lat Nhialic; aguɔ ke yɔŋ ɣɛɛt ɛn pɛɛnydit lei ne agonhdiit aa yɛn gɔth wo keek.
Waan luɔɔi ɛn ekake, ke ya keny Damathko, ku cath wo riɛl ku bɛɛny cii banydit ke ka ke Nhialic yien ɛn:
na wen, akaac akɔl cil, yin malik, ke ya tiŋ keɣer kueer, keɣeer bɔ nhial, ke war akɔl e riau, ku jɔ piny riaau e yalɔɔm, ayi kɔc lɔm kɔc ciɛth wok.
Na wen, acuk wiik wodhie, ke ya piŋ rol jam ke yɛn ne thoŋ e Eberu, yan, Thaulo, Thaulo, eeŋo yɔŋ yin ɛn? Atok te wec yin wiɛth thook.
Guɔ thieec, yan, Ee yin ŋa, Bɛnydit? Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn Yecu, raan yɔŋe.
Jɔt rot tei, kaace e yicok: yɛn e jɔ tuol tede yin, luɔi ban yi tɔ ye raan e kaki looi ku ye caatɔdi ne ka ci guɔ tiŋ, ayi ka ba yɛn ke bɛ tuol e keyiic tede yin;
yin ba luok e kɔc cin, ayi Juoor cin, Juoor tuɔɔc ɛn yin tede keek enɔɔne,

lɔ keek liep nyiin, ke ke bi ro yal bei e cuɔlepinyic lek teɣer, ku yɛlki rot bei e riɛl e Catanic, lek te nu Nhialic, agoki nyiɛɛi de karac yok, ku yokki ke bik lɔɔk lak ne kɔc etok kɔc ci tɔ ɣerpiɔth ne gam ci kek a gam.
Yen akɛn ɛn ke ci nyuoth ɛn rɛɛc, ke bɔ nhial, yin malik Agiripa;

yɛn e kɔc nu Damathko kɔn guieer, na wen, ke ya guiir kɔc nu Jeruthalem, ku piny e Judaya ebɛn, ku guieer Juoor aya, yɔɔk keek, yan, bik kepiɔth puk ku welki kepiɔth Nhialic, agoki kaŋ aa looi ka roŋ ne puŋdepiɔu.
Guiir guieer ɛn kɔc kake, yen aa dɔme Judai yɛn e luaŋditt e Nhialicic, ku kɔɔrki luɔi bi kek a nɔk.
Nhialic yen aa kony a tei, aguɔ tɔu aɣet ci ekoole, ke ya ye cool e guiir kɔc, kɔc kor ayi kɔc dit, ku acin kɔk aa lɛk keek, ee kak e lueel nebii tei, ayi Mothe, yan, bik tic:
yan, bi Kritho ketuc dhil guum, ku bi aa raan bi rot kɔn jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, ago kɔc guieer jam de ɣɛɛrepiny, ayi Judai ayi Juoor.
Na wen, te ŋoote Paulo ke luel kede, ke jɔ Petheto lueel e rol dit, yan, Paulo, yin e miɔl; ŋiny ŋic yin kaŋ aret aci yi tɔ miɔl.
Go bɛɛr, yan, Yɛn ken miɔl, yin adhuɛŋ dit Petheto; yɛn luel wel yith wel ke piathenɔm.
Kake aŋic malik keek, yɛn e kaŋ lueel e yenɔm ke ya ril nyin: aŋiɛc egɔk, yan, acin tok e kake yiic ke ci thien en; kene akene looi athian.
Yin, malik Agiripa, gam nebii? Aŋiɛc nɔn gɛm yin keek.
Go Agiripa Paulo yɔɔk, yan, Yin de piɔu luɔi bi yin a weŋ ne jam thiinakaŋ, ago ya tɔ ye Krithian.
Go Paulo bɛɛr, yan, Nɔn ee yen jam thiinakaŋ ku nɔn ee yen jam dit, yɛn laŋ Nhialic, acie kedu yin yitok, ee kede kɔc kedhie aya, kɔc piŋ kedi ekoole, ke we bi ciet ɛn, ejothke tei, e ke bi liu.
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke malik jɔt rot keke mudhiir, ku Berenike, ayi kɔc rɛɛr ne keek:
goki nyai e yelɔɔm, ku guiirki kapac, luelki, yan, Raane acin ke ci looi ke roŋ ke luɔi dueere ye nɔk, ayi many mɛce yen aya.
Go Agiripa Petheto yɔɔk, yan, Raane adi ci lony, tee ken kede lɛɛr e Kaithar nɔm.
Na wen, aci lueel, yan, buk cath ne abel lok Yitalia, ke ke jɔ Paulo keke kɔc kɔk ci mac yien raan cɔl Julio, ee bɛny de rem cɔl rem de Augoutho.
Goku lɔ e abelic, abel e Adramution, ku jɔku yup, ayok lueel, yan, buk cath ke wo kuany wɛɛr nɔm piny de Athia; ku ciɛthku ne Aritharko, raan e Makedonia bɔ Thethalonike.
Na ɣɔnmiak, ke wo jɔ kɔɔc e Thidon: ku Julio aci Paulo luoi apiɛth etɛɛn, go pɔl a lɔ tede mathke, bik en lɔ kony.
Na wen, acuk lony etɛɛn, ke wo jɔ cath e Kupurio yɔu, ne luɔi ci yom abel peen cath aret.
Na wen, acuk teek e wɛɛr e Kilikia keke Pampulia, ke wo jɔ ɣet Mura, ee paan toŋ nu Lukia.
Go bɛny de rem abel yok etɛɛn, abel e Alekandaria lɔ Yitalia, ku jɔ wo taau thin.
Na wen, ke wo ye cath ediirdiir e nhi juec, aci wo duɛɛr dhal e yiit bi wo yin piny ne Kinido, ne pɛn ci yom wo peen, goku teek e Kerete yɔu, ku jɔku yiit piny e Thalmone:
ku te ŋoot wok ke wo ken tuure winy thok, ke wo jɔ ɣet te cɔl Wanh Lɔdip, athiɔk keke panydit cɔl Lathaia.
Na wen, acuk nin juec lɛɛr, abi riɔɔc guɔ nu enɔɔne ne cath e abel, ahith ee cam rɛɛc e guɔ thok aya, ke Paulo jɔ kɔc yɔɔk ale,
yan, Bany, yɛn e cathe tiŋ, cath ciɛth wok, nɔn bi wo dak aret, ku riaak abi nu, acie riaak de weu tei ayi abel, ee weikuɔ ayadaŋ.
Go bɛny de rem ago jam de raan kuath abel gam ayi jam de wun abel, ku reec ka lueel Paulo.

Ku luɔi rɛɛce wanhe ne mai bi abel mai thin, ke jɔ tedit e kɔc guɔ lueel, an, buk yup ku themku nɔn dueer wo ɣet Poiniki, buk lɔ mai etɛɛn; Poiniki ee wanh e Kerete, wanh ee abeel mac thin, ku ci eyic wɛl wowic ku ten ee akɔl lɔ piny, ayi rut ku ten ee akɔl lɔ piny.
Na wen, aci wowic pot emaath, ke jɔki lueel, yan, Ke nu e wopiɔth ka, acuk yok, goki abel yup, ku jɔki teek e Kerete yɔu, ke ke kuany wɛɛr yɔu.
Na wen, acin tediit cik lɛɛr, ke amaŋdit bɔ ne keniim tueŋ, amaŋ cɔl Eurakulo:
go abel dɔm e yom, aci enɔm duɛɛr cɔk e yomic, goku pɔl, a kuɛɛth yom.
Goku riŋ e tuur yɔu, tuur thiin cɔl Kauda, ku aci wo duɛɛr dhal ne thel bi wok abelthiine thɛl thin:
na wen, acik abel thiine jat nhial, ke ke jɔ wiin a tɛɛk abel thar, duut kek en, ke bi riɛl; ku luɔi riɔɔc kek e cot bi abel cot e liɛɛt kɔcic, ke ke jɔ lupɔ de abel dak bei, bi yom ke kuaath tei.
Ku na ɣɔnmiak, luɔi ci amaŋ abel tɔ lɔ jaŋjaŋ alal, ke ke jɔ weu kɔk dhil dɛɛny wei e abelic;
ku ekool ee kek diak wok e ka ke abel cuat wei e wocin.
Ku jɔku nin juec lɛɛr ke akɔl ayi kuɛl ke ke cii tiec kedhie, ku ŋoot amaŋ ke put alal, ago aŋɔth e ŋathku, yan, bi wo kony, go jal e wopiɔth.

Na wen, aci kɔc cam rɛɛc e nhi juec, ke Paulo jɔt rot e kɔc yiic cil, ku jɔ lueel, yan, Week bany, tee we e jamdi piŋ waan, ku tee wo ken lony Kerete, adi ci ŋuan, ku kerɛɛce adi ken nu enɔɔne ayi eriaake.
Ku wek yɔɔk enɔɔne, yan, Ruɔmki wepiɔth tei: acin maar bi kɔc maar e weyiic, ee abel tei en abi maar.
Tunynhial aa kaac e yalɔɔm wenakɔu, tuny de Nhialic, Nhialic aa yɛn limde ku ya kake looi,
ku jɔ lueel, yan, Du riɔc, Paulo; yin bi dhil lɛɛr e Kaithar nɔm: ku tiŋ, Nhialic aci yi gam piir piire kɔc cath wek kedhie ayadaŋ.
Yen ruɔm wek wepiɔth, bany: yɛn gam Nhialic, nɔn bi en aa yic aya, cit man ci en e lɛk ɛn.
Wo bi dhil cuat e tuur tok nɔm tei.
Na wen, aci nin guɔ thieer ku ŋuan, ke wo ye biak tɛɛn ku biɛke wo tɛɛn abapdiit de Adria, te ci piny dit, ke jɔ kɔc lni abelic lueel, yan, de piny ci guɔ thiɔk;
agoki them e wien, ku yokki acit bɛɛr e kɔc kathierou: na wen, acik lɔ tueŋ emaath, ke jɔki bɛ them, ku yokki acit bɛɛr e kɔc kathieer ku dhic.
Na wen, ke ke riɔc nɔn bi wo ɣaal e kur yiic, agoki weu ke abel kaŋuan cuat piny e abapditic abel thar cieen, weu e abel mɔk piny, ku jɔki runepiny tht alal.
Na wen, ke kɔc lui abelic, an, kɔtki abelic, goki abel thiine luai piny wiir, ke loiki ecueer, an, cuɛtki weu e abel mɔk piny wiir, e abel nɔm tueŋ,
go Paulo bɛny de rem yɔɔk, ku yook alathkeer kɔk, yan, Te kene kɔcke reer e abelic, ke we cii dueere kony.
Go alathkeer wiin ke abel thiine ŋnith kɔɔth, ku palki a loony wiir.
Na wen, akɔɔr piny ru, ke Paulo jɔ kɔc lɔŋ kedhie, yan, bik kecam thieep, yan, Nin kathieer ku ŋuan ke we rɛɛr ecaŋwaan, ke we cii cam.
Jaki cam, wek laŋ: yen aba wek piir: acin nhiem toŋ e raan tok bi maar e weyiic.
Na wen, aci kene lueel, ke jɔ kuin ci pam noom, ku jɔ Nhialic yɔɔk, an, Thieithieei, e keniim kedhie: na wen, ke wɛkic, ciɛm.
Goki kepiɔth rom, ku nomki kecam ayadaŋ, ciɛmki.
Wok kɔc e nu abelic wodhie, wok ee bot kaarou ku thierdherou ku dhetem.
Na wen, acik cam acik kuɛth, ke ke jɔ agamɔ cuat wiir, ke abel bi pial.
Te ci piny guɔ ru, agoki piny kuc, nɔn ee yen pinyou: acik nyin thiine yok, nyin de yɔu liɛɛt, goki lueel, an, bik them nɔn dueer kek abel yien yal thin.
Na wen, acik weu wen e abel mɔk piny ŋuiɛth wei, pɛlike wiir, ku dakki wiin wen ee abel puk, ku jɔtki lupɔ nhial lupɔ nu e abel nɔm tueŋ, bi yom kuaath, goki cath lek te nu piny de liɛɛt.
Na wen, acik leu te nu kiɛɛr kaarou, ke ke jɔ abel tɔ lɔ biic; go abel nɔm nuɛt piny ku jɔ kɔɔc aril, ku dhoŋ abel thar ne riɛl e apiɔɔk.
Go alathkeer loŋden lueel, yan, bi kɔc ci mac nɔk, ke bi cien raan bi kuaŋ ke lɔ biic, go ban.
Go bɛny de rem ke peen, akɔɔr luɔi bi en Paulo kony, go lueel, yan, bi kɔc ŋic kuaŋ ro kɔn cuat wiir, lek biic:
ku bi kɔc ci doŋ lɔ biic, kɔk e pɛɛm niim, ku kɔk e ka ke abel niim. Goki lɔ biic aya, acik jɔ poth kedhie.
Na wen, acuk guɔ poth, ke wo jɔ tuur ŋic nɔn cɔle yen Melita.
Go kɔc de pinye agoki wo muk apiɛth: acik mac kooth, ku tɔki wook e kamaan wodhie, luɔi ci deŋ tuɛny, ku de piny wiir.
Go Paulo dut toŋ e tiim kuany; na wen, aci ke taau mɛɛc, ke deŋakook jɔ bɛn bei ne tuoc de mac, go ro dɛɛr e yecin.
Na wen, aci kɔc ke pinye kerac tiŋ, ke lɔ nornor e Paulo cin, ke ke jɔ rot yɔɔk kapac, yan, Raane e raan daŋ dhil nɔk; ku ciɛk, an, ci ban abapditic, ka ŋoot ke bi aciɛɛnde nɔk.
Na wen, ke jɔ kerac tɛŋ mɛɛc tei, ku cin kerɛɛc ci yok.
Goki tiit, yan, bi lɔɔk but, ku nɔn bi en wiik, ku jɔ thou enɔnthiine: na wen, acik tiit ecaŋawen, ku acin kerɛɛc ci yok cik tiŋ, ke ke jɔ keniim bɛ cat, ku luelkti, yan, ee yath.
Ku ade dum ke raandit de tuur raan cɔl Publio, thiaak etɛɛn; raane aci wo nyuooc apiɛth, tɔ wook e kamaanke e nin kadiak.
Ku dhɔt wun Publio piny ke juai, ku cii thien e yac dɔm aya: ago Paulo lɔ neem, le ɣon nu yen thin, le ku lɛŋ, ku jɔ ecin thany e yeguop, go tɔ waar.
Na wen, ke kɔc kɔk de gup juai e tuuric ke ke jɔ bɛn, agoki dem:
agoki wo miɔɔc apiɛth ne kajuec; na wen, ekool e jel wok, ke ke jɔ wo gam ka kɔɔrku kedhie.
Na wen, acuk pɛi lɛɛr kadiak, ke wo jɔ jal e Alekandaria, abel waan mai tuur, abel de Wɛɛt Acuek ci guaŋ e yenɔm tueŋ.
Agoku lɔ piny e Thurakoutha, ku jɔku reer etɛɛn e akool kadiak.
Na wen, acuk jal etɛɛn, ke wo jɔ ro yal, ɣetku Regio: na ɣɔnmiak, ke wowic leu, agoku bɛn Puteoli ekool tok:
ade wɛɛtamathkuɔn cuk yok etɛɛn, acik wo cɔɔl, yan, buk reer e keek e akool kadherou: ku jɔku ɣet Roma aya.
Na wen, ke wɛɛtamathkuɔn nu Roma, te ci kek keda piŋ, ke ke jɔ bɛn bei bik wo bɛn loor aɣet Thuuk de Apio, ku Luek Kadiak: na wen, aci Paulo ke tiŋ, ke jɔ Nhialic leec, go yepiɔu rom.
Na wen, acuk ɣet Roma, ke bɛny de rem jɔ kɔc ci mac yien bɛny de kalakon: go Paulo pɔl a rɛɛr etok, ke tht alathker tok tei.

Na wen, aci nin kadiak wan, ke Paulo cɔl kɔcdit ke Judai abik bɛn gueer te nu yen: te ci kek gueer, ke jɔ ke yɔɔk, yan, Wathii, ciɛk an, cin ater ca cak woke kɔc, ayi ciɛɛŋ de warkuɔ, ke yɛn ci yien Romai e Jeruthalem ke ya mac:
na wen, acik a thieec, ke ke kɔɔr luɔi bi kek a pɔl, luɔi cin en kerɛɛc ca looi, ke bi ya nɔk.
Na wen, aci Judai ye ŋak ater, ke ya jɔ dhil lɔŋ, an, ba kedi lɛɛr e Kaithar nɔm; ku acin ke ban kɔcki lɔ gaany tei.
Ke e caal ɛn week ka, ee tiŋ ban week tiŋ, aguɔ jam wo week: ne baŋ de aŋɔth de Yithrael, yen a mɛce yɛn e jothe.
Goki yɔɔk, yan, Acin awareek cuk yok ne kedu awareek bɔ Judaya, ku acin raan tok e wɛɛtakeckuɔ ci bɛn ene, raan cath ke jam rac ne kedu.
Wo de piɔth tei, luɔi bi wok ke ba lueel piŋ: ku na ereme, aŋicku nɔn lueele kɔc ater e yen e baai nɔm ebɛn.

Goki akol lueel, akool bi kek bɛn: na wen, ke kɔc juec e ke bɔ ɣon reer en thin, ago keek guieer wel, ku lek keek ka ke ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ciɛk ɣɔnmiak aɣet theen, anyuth keek ka ke Yecu, e loŋ de Motheyic ayi nebii yiic aya.
Go kɔc kɔk ka lueel gam, ku reec kɔk.
Na wen, aken jamden rɔm, ke ke jɔ jal, te ci Paulo jam tok lueel, yan, Ee yic yen ke cii Weidit Ɣer lɛk warkuɔ ne nebi Yithaya,
yan, Lɔ tede kɔcke, lɔ ku luel, yan, Ciɛk an, piɛŋki, ka bak piŋ, ku acaki bi yokic: Ku ciɛk an, tieŋki, ka bak tiŋ, ku acaki bi gɔɔk:
Piɔn e kɔcke aci guɔ cuai, Ku aciki e piŋ apiɛth e keyith, Ku acik kenyin hiɛɛn; Ke ke cii bi daai e kenyin, Ku piŋki e keyith, Ku yokki jam e kepiɔth, Ku jɔki kepiɔth puk, Aguɔ keek tɔ dem.
Yen ŋiɛc wek cooke, yan, Kuny e Nhialic aci tɔ yine Juoor, ku abik dhil piŋ.
Na wen, aci kake lueel, ke Judai e ke jel, ke ke teer aret kapac.
Ago Paulo reer ɣonde guop ɣon ci kiir e weu, ku jɔ run thol kaarou, ke ye kɔc nyuooc kedhie kɔc e bɛn tede yen,
aa ye keek guieer ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ku ye ke wɛɛt ne ka ke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho ke ye nyin riɛl, ku acin raan e ye pɛn guieer.
Yɛn Paulo, lim de Yecu Kritho, raan ci cɔɔl, an, bi aa tuc, raan ci tɔɔu pei ne kede welpiɛth ke Nhialic,
welpiɛth ci kɔn tɔ lueel nebiike ne kacigɔɔr yiic kaɣer yiic.
Welpiɛthke ee ka ke Wende, raan ci dhieeth e dhien e Dabid kuɛɛre ne kede guop,
ku ci tic ne riɛl dit nɔn ee yen Wen e Nhialic, ne kede Wei ke ɣɛɛrepiɔu, ne jon ci en rot jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic; yen Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda,
raan ci wo tɔ yok dhueeŋdepiɔu, ku yokku tuoc ci wo tooc, ne luɔi bi kɔc wel aa piŋ ku gamki keek e juoor yiic kedhie, ne baŋ de rinke.
Ku week aya, wek nu e keyiic, wek kɔc ci cɔɔl, bak aa kɔc ke Yecu Kritho;
wek kɔc nu Roma wedhie, kɔc nhiɛɛr Nhialic, ku ci we cɔɔl, bak aa kɔc ɣerpiɔth. E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu e weyiic keke mat, e ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Cook tueŋ ka, yɛn lec Nhialicdi ne Yecu Kritho e biakdun week wedhie, luɔi ci gamdun lueel e piny nɔm ebɛn.
Nhialic, Raan aa luooi ne weiki ne welpiɛth ke Wende, yen aye caatɔdi, ne luɛl aa yɛn cool e luel kedun acin pek e lɔŋdiyic,
yɛn ee cool e lɔŋ, nɔn bi en dɛ te ban week kɛny e keny piɛth ekool bi ro yok ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, aguɔ bɛn tede week.
We ca tak adi tieŋ week, aguɔ we miɔɔc e ke de wei, ke bi we tɔ kaac aril;
yen aye ke bi wo muk piɔth woke week etok, ne gam ci wo gam wodhie, gamdun week ayi gamdi.

Ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi ŋiɛc wek en, wek mithekɔckuɔ, nɔn can e lueel e yapiɔu raanjuec ne bɛn ban bɛn tede week, ku yɛn ci peen aɣet ci enɔɔne; yɛn kɔɔr ke bi luɔk e weyiic ayadaŋ, acit man can e yok e juoor kɔk yiic.
Ayi Giriki ayi juur ceŋ e ciɛɛŋden, ayi kɔc pelniim, ayi kɔc kuc wel, keden anu e yayeth.
Yen tede ka, yɛn cii dueer jai, yɛn dueer welpiɛth guieer week aya, wek kɔc nu Roma.
Yɛn cie yaar ne baŋ de welpiɛth ke Kritho; kek aye riɛldiit e Nhialic riɛl e raan kony wei ebɛn raan ci gam, gɔl e Judai, mɛt Giriki thin aya.
Piathepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic aci nyuɔɔth e welke yiic ne gam bi kɔc gam; acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan piɛthpiɔu abi aa piir ne gam.
Ku agonhdiit e Nhialic agonh bɔ nhial aci nyuɔɔth e baŋ de rɛɛc reece kɔc Nhialic gam ku baŋ de luɔi rɛɛc ee kɔc looi, kɔc e yic waan cieen ne rac de kepiɔth.
Ke dueere kɔc ŋic ne kede Nhialic aci jɔ lɔ gɔk tede keek; acii Nhialic nyuoth keek.
Ka ke Nhialic ɣɔn ciɛke piny, ka cii dueere tiŋ, ka cit riɛldɛn thɛɛr, ku luɔi ee yen Nhialic, kake ayeke ŋic egɔk, ayeke ŋic ne ka ci cueec. Ku acin ke bi kek rot kɔc;
ku te ciɛk kek Nhialic ŋic, ka ciki e rieu e rieeu ee Nhialic rieu, ku ciki e leec; acik aa kɔc e ɣɔric tak e kepiɔth, ago piɔndɛn piɔl ago cuɔl ecut.
Aake ye rot tɔ ye kɔc pelniim, ku acik aa kɔc piɔlpiɔth,
ku aake ye dhueeŋ de Nhialic cii dueer dhiap puk tɔki cit ke ci cueec cit guop raan bi dhiap, ayi diɛt, ayi lɛn de cok kaŋuan, ayi ka mol piny.
Yen aa kune Nhialic keek luɔi col ne dom ci ŋɔɔŋ de kerac ke dɔm, abik dhueeŋ de kegup riɔɔk e rot kapac;
kɔc ci yic de Nhialic puk tɔki ye lueth, ku yek ke ci cueec rieu ku yek luooi, awar Acieŋ e cak kaŋ, Raan cath ke athiɛɛi aɣet athɛɛr. Amen.
Yen aa koone Nhialic keek abik kacol ecut aa kɔɔr e kepiɔth; acakaa dieerken gup ayek ciɛɛŋ de tik puk, ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke piny, ku jɔki ciɛɛŋ e cii piny cak kɔɔr
Ku roor ayadaŋ, ayek luɔi de tik pɔl, luɔi de ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke piny, ago ŋɔɔŋ de roor ke dɔm aret, ago roor ke cii piɛth aa luoi roor, agoki kaŋ aa yok e kegup ka bi roŋ ne kerɛɛc cik wooc.
Rɛɛc ci kek ŋiny de Nhialic rɛɛc muk e kepiɔth, yen aa koone Nhialic keek, abik niim rac etaiwei, bik kaŋ aa looi ka cii roŋ e luɔi dueer raan ke looi.
Ayek piɔth thiaŋ ne racdepiɔu, dhoom, kɔɔr e kerac, wni de kalei, luɔi anyaak; ayek thiaŋ ne tiɛɛl, nak, ater, rueeny, cuɔlepiɔu; ayek mantuum,
ayek kɔc e kɔc cak thook, kɔc man Nhialic, kɔc tat gup, kɔc dit piɔth, kɔc e rot leec, kɔc e cap rac cak, kɔc e ka ke kɔc e dhieth keek rɛɛc piŋ,
kɔc cin niim, kɔc cin piɔth, kɔc e kaŋ riic, kɔc cin kokepiɔu.
Kɔcke, te ciɛk kek loŋ e lueel Nhialic ŋic, an, kɔc e ka cit ekake looi aroŋki e thuɔɔu, ke ke ŋoot e ke ye kake looi, ku yek piɔth rɔm ayadaŋ ne kɔc e ke looi.
Yen enɔɔne, yin ŋadi, yin raan jany raan daŋ, yin cin te bi yin rot kɔc; jany jieeny yin raan daŋ, yen a jieeny yin rot; yin raan jany raan daŋ, yin ee kaŋ looi kamanke gup.
Ku aŋicku jany ee Nhialic kɔc jɔɔny, kɔc e ka cit ekake looi, nɔn ee yen jany yic.
Ku yin ŋadi, yin raan e kɔc jɔɔny, kɔc e ka cit ekake looi, ku ye kamanke looi gup, ye lueel e yipiɔu, an, ba poth e jany bi Nhialic yi jɔɔny?
Ku ci dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu guɔ biɔɔn dhueeŋ gok, ayi dit e liɛɛr e yenpiɔu, ku guom guum en kajuec, ku kuc dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu nɔn thel en yin tede puŋ bi yin yiniɔu puk?
Ku yin, ne riɛl ril yin piɔu, ku ne rɛɛc reec yin puŋ de yinpiɔu, yin e rot kuɛt agonhdit aɣet akool e agɔth, akool e nyuoth bi loŋ piɛth ci Nhialic guiir rot nyuɔɔth.
Ago raan ebɛn gam kede, ke bi roŋ ke luɔidɛn ci looi.
Kɔc kɔɔr dhueeŋ ku rieeu ku luɔi cii kek bi dhiap, kɔc e kepiɛth looi ne iiɛɛr e kepiɔth, kek abi gam piir athɛɛr;
ku kɔc e wel tɛɛr, kɔc reec yic gam, ku gamki kerac, kek abi diu de Nhialic piɔu yok keke agɔth,
ku yokki ketuc bi keek dhal ku acɔt bi kek niim acɔt, raan ebɛn raan e kerac looi, gɔl e Judai, mɛt Giriki thin aya;
ku dhueeŋ ku rieeu ku mat, kek abi tɔu ne raan e kepiɛth looi, gɔl e Judai, mɛt Giriki thin aya.
Kueny ee kɔc kuany yiic aliu tede Nhialic.
Kɔc kedhie kɔc e kerac looi ku liu loŋ tede keek, kek abi maar ke cin loŋ; ku kɔc kedhie kɔc e kerac looi, ku nu loŋ tede keek, kek abi jɔɔny ne loŋ.
Ku acie kɔc piŋ loŋ tei, kek ee kɔc piɛthpiɔth tede Nhialic, ee kɔc e loŋ looi, kek abi tɔ ye kɔc piɛthpiɔth.
Ku Juoor, kɔc cin loŋ cath ke keek, te ci ke ka nu e loŋic looi, ne ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke keek, kek gup, ciɛk, an, cin loŋ ŋicki, ke loŋ anu e kepiɔth.
Anyoothki luɔi de loŋ nɔn ci e gɔɔr e kepiɔth, ku ŋiny de kepiɔth ee rɔm keke loŋ aya, agoki loŋ guiir e kepiɔth kapac, go raan rot gaany, ku nɔn de en te bi en ro kony, go ro kony,
kool bi Nhialic ka cii kɔc moony jɔɔny ne Yecu Kritho, ne kede welkienpiɛth.
Tiŋ, yin cɔl Judai, ku rɛɛre e loŋic, ku lec rot ne Nhialic,
ku yin ŋic ke nu e yepiɔu, ku mite piɔu weke kapiɛth alaldhte, ku ci weet ne kede loŋ,
ku yin e ro ŋɔɔth nɔn ee yin raan e cɔɔr thel, ku ye many e kɔc nu tecol riaau,
ku nɔn ee yin raan e kɔc piɔlpiɔth wɛɛt, raan e miththiiakaŋ wɛɛt, luɔi muk yin tau de ŋinydekaŋ keke yic e loŋic;
na yin enɔɔne, yin raan e raan daŋ wɛɛt, cii rot e wɛɛt ayadaŋ? Yin ee kɔc yɔɔk, an, Duoki e kual, ku yin guop, ye kual?
yin raan e kɔc yɔɔk, an, Duoki e lɔ ne dieer lei, ye lɔ we dieer lei yin? Yin raan e yieth maan, ye luek ke Nhialic tɔ nhiany, yin?
Yin raan e ro leec ne loŋ, ye Nhialic tɔ bni, yin, ne wac ee yin loŋ woocic?
Rin ke Nhialic ayeke laat e Juooric ne baŋdun, acit man ci e gɔɔr.
Cuɛl ee kepiɛth eyic, te dot yin loŋ apiɛth; ku te ee yin raan e loŋ woocic, ke cuɛldu aci tɔ ye cien cuɛl.
Ku raan kene cueel, te ci en loŋ tiiŋic, ke cien cuɛlde cii bi tɔ ye cuɛl?
Ku raan kene cueel, ne caŋ e dhiethe ye, te ci en loŋ aa tiiŋic, cii yi bi jɔɔny, yin raan e loŋ woocic, acakaa yin eye raan cath we jam ci gɔɔr ayi cuɛl?
Raan acie Judai nɔm, ten ee yen Judai e biak biic tei; ayi cuɛl, acie ke ye tic e biak biic e raan guop tei.
Raan ee ya Judai nɔm, ten ee yen Judai e yeyac thin; ku cuɛl ee kede raan piɔu, ee kede wei, acie kede jam tei. Lɛcde acii bɔ tede kɔc, abɔ tede Nhialic.
Ku na Judai enɔɔne, war wɛɛr en kɔc akou? Ku cuɛl, piathdɛn bi bɛɛi akou?
Piathden adit ne cok ebɛn. Ku cook dit, ki, tɛɛu ci wel ke Nhialic taau e kecin.
Ku na ciɛk dɛ kɔc kɔk kuc kaŋ dot, eeŋodaŋ? Kuny kuc kek kaŋ dot, bi ŋiny ŋice Nhialic kaŋ dot tɔ cin naamde?
Aci bi aa yen! yeka, tɔ Nhialic e yic, ciɛk, an, ye raan ebɛn alueeth, acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Luɔi bi yi tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne wel lueel, Ku luɔi bi yin kɔc tiaam te guiire loŋdu.
Ku na rac de wopiɔth, te ci en piath e Nhialic piɔu nyuɔɔth, buk ŋo lueel? Rac Nhialic, te ci en kɔc luoi ketuc e agɔth? (yɛn jam cit man e raan tei.)
Aci bi aa yen! Te nu yen, ke Nhialic dueer loŋ de piny nɔm guiir adi?
Te ci yic de Nhialic ro ŋuak ne luenhdi, ago aa kede dhueeŋde, eeŋo ŋoote loŋdi ke guiir, aca ciet raan e kerac looi?
Ku eeŋo cii wok kerac e looi, ke kepiɛth bi bɛn?cit man ci wo cak thook, an, yok lueel, ku ye kɔc kɔk ŋak, yan, yok lueel. Kɔc luel en aroŋki ne gaak bi ke gɔk.
Jɔ aa ŋo? warku keek e piath? Ei, acie yen! wok e kɔc kɔn nyuooth, Judai ayi Giriki, nɔn reer kek e keracic kedhie;
acit man ci e goor, yan, Acin raan piɛthpiɔu nu, acin raan tok;
Acin raan ŋic kaŋ, acin raan e Nhialic kɔɔr;
Acik ro yal wei kueer kedhie, acik aa kɔc baaŋ kedhie; Acin raan e kepiɛth looi, acakaa raan tok aliu.
Rolden ee raŋ ɣɔɔr nɔm; Ayek jam erueeny e keliep; Wirii de karac anu e kethook thin;
Acik thook thiaŋ e lam rac ku kɛcdepiɔu; Aŋicki kat aret ne leu bi kek riɛm leu;
Riaak keke mumdenɔm anuki e kuɛɛrken yiic;
Kueer e mat acik guɔ kuc;
Ayek nyin cien rieeu de Nhialic.
Na enɔɔne, aŋicku, yan, ke lueel loŋ, aye lɛk kɔc rɛɛr e loŋic, ke kɔc e ke bi kethook ruɔɔt kedhie, ago piny nɔm ebɛn yiek yeth gaak e Nhialic nɔm.
Acin raan toŋ bi tɔ piɛthpiɔu e yenɔm ne luɔi de loŋ; ee loŋ yen e bii ŋiny de kerac.
Ku enɔɔne piathepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic aci tic, ku liu loŋ thin, ku loŋ keke nebii ayek caatɔɔ ne yen;
yen aye piathepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic ne gam de Yecu Kritho, bi tede kɔc kedhie, ku bi e kɔc gup kedhie, kɔc gam; ku acin puny ee kɔc pɔɔc yiic;
kɔc acik kerac wooc kedhie, ku dɛkki ne dhuɛɛŋ de Nhialic;
ku ayeke tɔ piɛthpiɔth youyou ne dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu ne weer ci ke wɛɛr bei e Kritho Yecuyic,
raan cii Nhialic taau e kɔc niim, an, bi aa ke bi Nhialic luk, ne gam bi kɔc riɛmde gam. Kene ee nyuoth nyooth en piath e yenpiɔu, ɣɔn pɛl en karɛc ci looi thɛɛr, ne liɛɛr e yenpiɔu;
ku ye nyuoth nyooth en piath e yenpiɔu enɔɔne, nɔn ee yen bɛny e loŋ tiiŋic, ku ye bɛny e raan gam Yecu tɔ piɛthpiɔu ayadaŋ.
Lɛc dueer raan ro leec akou enɔɔne? Aliu, aye nyaai. Ne loŋou? Ne loŋ de luɔi? Acie yen; ne loŋ de gam, yen a nyiɛɛiye ye.
Agoku jɔ lueel, yan, Raan aye tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne gam, te hiuwe luɔi de loŋ thin.
Ku ye Nhialic de Judai kapac? Cie Nhialic de Juoor ayadaŋ? Ɣɛɛ, ee kede Juoor ayadaŋ;
luɔi ee yen Nhialic toŋe, Raan bi kɔc ci cueel tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne gam, ku tɔ kɔc kene cueel piɛthpiɔth ne gam ayadaŋ.
Enɔɔne, yok loŋ tɔ cin naamde ne gam? Ei! acie yen, wok tɔ loŋ kaac apiɛth.
Eeŋo buk jɔ lueel ne kede Abraɣam waada ne dhieth, ke ci yok?
Ku te ci Abraɣam tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne luɔidɛn ci looi, ka cath keke ke dueer en ro leec; ku acii rot dueer leec e Nhialic nɔm.
Kecigɔɔr e lueel adi? Yan, Abraɣam e Nhialic gam, ago tɔ ye piathepiɔu tede yen.
Ku enɔɔne, raan e kaŋ looi, ke bi yok thin, acie tɔ ye kede dhueeŋ, aye tɔ ye ariop.
Ku raan cie luui, ku aye Raan gam, Raan e kɔc racpiɔth tɔ piɛthpiɔth, gam gɛm en aci tɔ ye piathepiɔu.
Acit man lueele Dabid athiɛɛi de raan cii Nhialic tɔ piɛthpiɔu, ke hiuwe luɔi thin; yan,
Thieithieei ne kɔc ci pal karɛcken, Kɔc cii kakɛn cik wooc kum.
Thieithieei ne raan cii Bɛnydit bi yiek yeth kerac.
Bɔ athiɛɛiye enɔɔne e kɔc ci cueel gup kapac, ku bɔ e kɔc kene cueel gup aya? Luɔi ci wok e lueel, an, Gam aye tɔ ye piathepiɔu tede Abraɣam.
E tɔ ye piathepiɔu adi? ɣɔn ci e cueel, ku ye ɣɔn kene ye cueel? Acie ɣɔn ci e cueel, ee ɣɔn kene ye cueel.

Ago cuɛl noom, bi aa ŋiny bi ye ŋic, ku bi aa bɔt de piathepiɔu ci yok ne gam, piathepiɔu ɣɔn cath keke yen ɣɔn ŋoot en ke kene cueel. Ago aa wun kɔc gam kedhie, acakaa te keneke cueel, ke piathepiɔu bi tɔ ye keden ayadaŋ;
ku ci aa wun cuɛl tede kɔc, acie kɔc ci cueel kapac, ee kɔc e waardan Abraɣam kuany cok e gam aya, gam waan cath keke yen te ŋoot en ke kene cueel.
Luɛl ci ye kɔn lueel, an, bi aa raan bi piny lɔɔk lak, aaci bɔ tede Abraɣam ayi kaude ne loŋ, aa bɔ ne piathepiɔu ci yok ne gam.
Ku tee ye kɔc ke loŋ kek bi piny lɔɔk lak, ke gam adi bi aa ɣɔric, ku ke ci kɔn lueel adi bi aa ke cin namde.
Ee loŋ yen e agɔth bɛɛi; ku te cin loŋ, ke wac ee kɔc wooc aliu.
Yen abi yen ne gam, ke bi aa kede dhueeŋ; ago ke ci kɔn lueel, ago dhil aa kede kaude ebɛn; acie kede kɔc nu e loŋic kapac, ee kede kɔc nu e gamic aya, gam de Abraɣam, yen aye waarda wook wodhie;
acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Yin ca tɔ ye wun juur juec; aye waada e Nhialic nom, Raan ci gam, Raan e kɔc ci thou tɔ piir, ku ye Raan e kaliu tɔ cit ka nu.
Yen Abraɣam, raan waan ci gam ne aŋɔth ŋɛɛth, ku ke e ŋɛɛth aliu, luɔi bi en aa wun juur juec, acit man e ke ci lueel, yan, Tau de kaudu, ki.
Ku luɔi cii en e raan koor e gam, yen aken en e lueel ne kede yenguop, yan, e thɔl thou enɔɔne, te ci runke ciet nɔn e bɔt, ayi tɛɛm ci Thara tɛɛm, aken tak aya.
Ku ke ci Nhialic kɔn lueel aken piɔu ŋit e ye ne dak de gam, aci gam e gam ril, go Nhialic lɛc nɔm,
aci gam edhoc, an, ke ci kɔn lueel, en Nhialic, abi leu ne luɔi.
Yen aa tɔ ye piathepiɔu tede yen aya.
Ku akene gɔɔr ne biak de yen etok, nɔn ci e tɔ ye kede;
ee biak de wook aya, ku abi tɔ ye piathepiɔu tede wook aya, te gɛm wok Raan ci Yecu Bɛnydiitda jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic;
yen Yecu, raan ci ro gam thuɔɔu ne kede wac cuk wooc, ku beye jat nhial ke bi wo tɔ piɛthpiɔth.
Ku enɔɔne, nɔn ci wo tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne gam, wok ci mat e Nhialic ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho;
raan ci wo liep kueer le wok e dhueeŋic dhueeŋ tɔu wok thin enɔɔne, ne gam ci wok gam, agoku piɔth miɛt ne ŋath ŋɛɛth wok dhueeŋ de Nhialic.
Ku acie yen etok, wok lec rot ne karil dhal wook ayadaŋ; ne ŋiny ŋic wok en, an, Karil dhal wook, yen aye guomdekaŋ bɛɛi;
ku guomdekaŋ ee raan tɔ giu; ku giu ci raan giu yen aye aŋɔth bɛɛi;
ku aŋɔth acii raan e tɔ yaar, luɔi ci nhieer e Nhialic luooŋ e wopiɔth ne Weidit Ɣer Wei ci gam wook.
Ku te waan ŋoot wok ke wok cin riɛl, ke jɔ Kritho thou ekooldɛn piɛth ne biak de kɔc kuc Nhialic rieu.
Ku raan acii thuɔɔu dueer dap gam, ciɛk, an, e baŋ de raan piɛthpiɔu; ku abi yien dɛ kɔc toktook kɔc dueer rot kuɔn thuɔɔu ne biak de raan piɛthpiɔu.
Ku Nhialic e nhieerde nyuɔɔth, nhieer nhiɛɛr en wook, ne thon ci Yecu Kritho thou ne biakda, ku ŋootku e wo ye kɔc e kerac looi.
Ku enɔɔne, nɔn ci wo guɔ tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne riɛmde, ke kuny bi en wo kony ne agɔth yen apiɔl awar ekene aret.
Te ci wo maat ne Nhialic ne thon ci Wende thou, ke wo ŋoot e wo ye kɔc de ater, na enɔɔne, nɔn ci wo guɔ maat, ke kuny bi wo kony ne piir piir en, yen apiɔl awar ekene aret.
Ku acie yen etok, wok mit piɔth ayadaŋ e Nhialicic ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, raan e yok wok mat ne yen.
Yen tede ka, kerac aa bɔ e piny nɔm ne raan tok, ku bɔ thuɔɔu e kerac cok, go thuɔɔu jɔ loony e kɔc gup kedhie, luɔi ci kɔc kaŋ wooc kedhie:—
ku te ɣon ŋoote loŋ ke liu, kerac aa nu e piny nɔm; ku kerac acie taau e kɔc yieth te cin en loŋ.
Ku thuɔɔu yen aa ceŋ piny tei, gɔl te ɣɔn nu Adam ɣeet e Mothe, aa ceŋ kɔc acakaa kɔc ken kerac wooc cit man e kerɛɛc e looi Adam, yen acit raan ci lueel, an, bi bɛn.

Ku miɔc youyou acii cit wac ci raan wooc. Ku na ci kɔc juec thou ne wac cii raan tok wooc, ke dhueeŋ de Nhialic ku miɔc bɔ ne dhueeŋ, dhueeŋ biiye raan tok, Yecu Kritho, ka cik ro ŋuak aret tede kɔc juec.
Ku miɔc aya, acii cit luɔi de raan toŋ ci kaŋ wooc. Loŋ ci guiir e kɔc yiek yieth gaak ne baŋ de raan tok, ku miɔc youyou ee kɔc tɔ piɛth piɔth ne kajuec cik wooc.

Ku na ci thuɔɔu piny cieŋ ne baŋ de raan tok, ne wac ci raan tok kedaŋ wooc, awar kene aret, kɔc yok dit de dhueeŋdepiɔu ku yeke miɔɔc ne piathepiɔu, kek abi piny cieŋ ne piir ne baŋ de raan tok, Yecu Kritho.
Yen tede ka, acit man ci loŋ de kɔc guiir kedhie, ne baŋ de goc de raan tok, ago kɔc yiek yieth gaak kedhie, yen acit yoŋ ci kɔc piathepiɔu yok kedhie ne baŋ de luɔi piɛth de raan tok, ke ke bi piir.
Acit man ci kɔc juec tɔ ye kɔc e kaŋ wooc ne dhaŋ ci raan tok loŋ dhɔŋic, yen acit luɔi bi kɔc juec tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne piŋ ci raan tok kaŋ piŋ.
Ku loŋ aa bɔ thm, e luɔi bi wac ro ŋuak wac wɛɛce kɔc kaŋ; ku te ci kerac ro ŋuak, ke dhueeŋdepiɔu ŋuak rot aret awar kerac,
luɔi bi dhueeŋdepiɔu piny cieŋ ayadaŋ ne piathepiɔu aɣet piir athɛɛr ne Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda, cit man e ciɛɛŋ cieŋe kerac piny aɣet thuɔɔu.
Eeŋo daŋ buk lueel? Buk aa cool e git kerac e luɔi, ke dhueeŋdepiɔu bi ro ŋuak?
Acie yen! Wok kɔc ci thou tede kerac, buk ŋoot e wo piir thin adi?
Kuocki ekene, yan, Wok wodhie, wok kɔc ci baptith ne kede Kritho Yecu, ke wok ci baptith ne kede thon ci en thou.
Yen ka, wok ci tɔɔu ne yen etok e thuɔɔuwic ne baptinh ci wo baptith, luɔi bi wok tɔu e piir e piɛcku yokic aya, cit man e jon ci Kritho jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic ne dhueeŋ de Wun.
Ku te ci wo mat ne yen etok ne tau de thonde, ke wo bi mat ne yen etok ne tau de jon ci en ro jɔt aya.
Aŋicku nɔn ci raandan thɛɛr piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu keke yen etok, ke guop de kerac bi riaak, agoku cuo be aa him ke kerac.
Raan ci thou aci wɛɛn bei e keracic.
Ku enɔɔne, te ci wok thou ne Kritho etok, ke wok gam nɔn bi wok piir ne yen etok.
Aŋicku nɔn cii Kritho bi bɛ thou, luɔi ci e guɔ jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic; thuɔɔu acii ye be aa cieŋ.
Ku thon ci en thou, ee tede kerac en e thou en raantok; ku piir piir en, ee tede Nhialic en a piir en.
Ayi week ayadaŋ, yak rot tɔ ye kɔc ci thou edhoc tede kerac, ku taki rot e kɔc piir tede Nhialic ne Kritho Yecu Bɛnydiitda.
Yen duo wek kerac tɔ ceŋ piny e wegup, gup de yiic thuɔɔu, abak ŋɔɔŋ ee kɔɔr aa gam.
Ayi ka ke wegup duoki ke gam kerac, abik aa ka ke racdepiɔu bi kerac aa looi; yak rot gam Nhialic cit man e kɔc ci bɛ piir e kɔc ci thou yiic, ku yak Nhialic gam ka ke wegup abik aa ka ke piathepiɔu.
Kerac acii we bi aa cieŋ, luɔi ca wek e tɔu e loŋic, wek e tɔu e dhueeŋdepiɔuwic.
Eeŋo daŋ? Buk kerac aa looi nɔn liiu wok e loŋic, ku nɔn tɔu wok e dhueeŋdepiɔuwic? Acie yen!

Kuocki week, an, Raan ca wek rot tɔ ye liimke, abak ka ke yen aa looi, yen aya wek liimke, yen raan aa wek ka ke looi, nɔn ee yen kerɛɛc e thuɔɔu bɛɛi, ku nɔn ee yen piŋ aa wek ka ke Nhialic piŋ, yen aye piathepiɔu bɛɛi?
Ku thieithieei Nhialic, waan thɛɛr wek aa ye him ke kerac, ku we ci tau de weet ci yien week aa gam e wepiɔth enɔɔne.
Ku enɔn ci we luony bei e kerac cin, ke wek ci jɔ aa him ke piathepiɔu.

Yɛn jam cit man e raan tei, ne baŋ de kɔc de guopdun. Acit man ca wek ka ke wegup gam cuɔlepiɔu abik aa liimke, ku acak ke gam rɛɛceloŋ bik loŋ aa rɛɛc, yen abi ciet gam duɛɛr wek ka ke wegup gam piathepiɔu enɔɔne, abik aa liimke, ke bi ɣɛɛrepiɔu bɛɛi.
Waan aa wek liim ke kerac, ke we ye luony bei e piathepiɔu cin.
Ee luɔk cit ŋo cak guɔ yok waan e kake yiic, ka ya wek gup yaar e keek enɔɔne? Ee thuɔɔu yen e thok bi kake thok.
Ku enɔɔne, nɔn ci we luony bei e kerac cin, aguɔki aa him ke Nhialic, ke we de kakuon ci luɔk enɔɔne ka ke ɣɛɛrepiɔu, ku thok bi en thok ee piir athɛɛr.
Ariop de kerac yen aye thuɔɔu; ku miɔc de Nhialic yen aye piir athɛɛr ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Kuocki week enɔɔne, wek mithekɔckuɔ, (yɛn jam woke kɔc ŋic loŋ), kuocki nɔn cieŋe loŋ raan anande te piir en?
Tiiŋ de nɔm monyde acii loŋ mac e monyde lɔɔm anande te piir en; ku na thou monyde, ka ye luony bei ne loŋ de monyde.

Ku enɔɔne, te ŋoote monyde ke piir, ku beye thiaak e mony daŋ, ka bi tɔ ye tiiŋ ci lɔ keke mony lei; ku na thou monyde, ka ci dɔk yeth e loŋeyin, ago cuo be ye tɔ ye tiiŋ ci lɔ keke mony lei, acakaa yen e beye thiaak e mony daŋ.
Ku week aya, wek mithekɔckuɔ, we ci tɔ thou tede loŋ, ne guop de Kritho; luɔi bi raan daŋ we thiaak, yen e raan waan ci jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, luɔi bi wok luɔk ne kede Nhialic.
Ku te waan reer wok e ka ke guopic, ke ŋɔɔŋ ee wok ŋɔŋ e kerac, ke e bɔ ne loŋ, aa ye luɔide looi e ka ke wogup, bik luɔk ne kede thuɔɔu.
Ku enɔɔne, wo ci luony bei e loŋ cin, ke waan ci wo mac thin e guɔ thou; luɔi bi wok kaŋ aa looi ne wei cuk piac yok, ku cuku kaŋ e looi ne kathɛɛr ci gɔɔr e loŋic.
Eeŋo buk jɔ lueel? Ee kerac en loŋ? Ei! Acie yen. Ku adi ca kerac jɔ kuc, tee loŋ liu; ku adi ca ŋɔɔŋ de kerac kuc, tee kene loŋ lueel, yan, Du kalei e woi e yiniɔu.
Kerac, te ci en kooldɛn piɛth jɔ yok, ne cook de loŋ ci yinn wook, ke jɔ wni de kalei ebɛn tɔ lɔ e yapiɔu; ku te liiuwe loŋ, kerac ee thou.
Ku yɛn, yɛn ee piir waan hiuwe loŋ; ku te ci cook de loŋ bɛn, ke kerac e bɛ piir, aguɔ thou yɛn;
guɔ cook de loŋ ci yien kɔc ne kede piir, guɔ yok aye kede thuɔɔu;
kerac aci akoldɛn piɛth jɔ yok ne cook de loŋ, go ya math, ago ya nɔk e yen.
Yen tede ka, loŋ aɣeric eyic, ku cook de loŋ aɣeric, ku diik, ku piɛth.
Ku enɔɔne, ci kepiɛth ro guɔ puk aye thuɔɔu tede yɛn? Ei! Acie yen. Ee kerac, luɔi bi en guɔ tic nɔn ee yen kerac guop, yen aa luui ɛn thuɔɔu ne kepiɛth; ke kerac bi jɔ rac etaiwei ne loŋ.
Loŋ aŋicku nɔn ee yen kede wei; ku yɛn ee raan e piny tei, yɛn ci ɣaac ke yɛn ci aa lim de kerac.
Ku ke ya looi enɔɔne, aca gam nɔn ee yen luɔidi; ku ke nu e yapiɔu, an, ba ya looi, aca ye looi; ee ke maan, yen aya looi.
Ku enɔɔne, te luɔɔi ɛn ke liu e yapiɔu, yɛn gam loŋ nɔn ee yen piɛth.
Yen acii be aa yɛn e ye looi, ee kerɛɛc rɛɛr e yayic, aye ye looi.
Ku aŋiɛc nɔn cin en kepiɛth toŋ rɛɛr e yayic; (ee guopdiyic en luɛɛl;) ku piɔn duɛɛr ɛn kaŋ looi acath ke yɛn, ku ke ban kepiɛth looi, aba thol, akɛn guɔ yok.
Ku kepiɛth nu e yapiɔu, an, ba ya looi, aca ye looi; ku kerɛɛc liu e yapiɔu, yen aya looi.
Ku na ya ke liu e yapiɔu looi, ka cii be aa yɛn e ye looi, ee kerɛɛc rɛɛr e yayic, yen aye ye looi.
Yɛn e loŋ daŋ yok enɔɔne, an, Kool dɛ yɛn piɔu luɔi luɔɔi ɛn kepiɛth, ke kerac tɔu keke yɛn.
Yɛn mit piɔu woke loŋ de Nhialic e yayin thin;
ku yɛn e loŋ daŋ yok e ka ke yɛnguop yiic, loŋ de ater keke loŋ de yanɔm, loŋ e yɛn thel cit man e raan ci peec abi ya tɔ ye lim de loŋ de kerac, loŋ nu e ka ke yɛnguop yiic.
Amawoou yɛn kuany nyin oou! Eeŋa bi a luak bei ne guop cath ke thuɔɔuweyic?
Yɛn lec Nhialic ne Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda. Yen ka, yɛn guop, yɛn woke nɔmdi, yɛn ee ka ke loŋ de Nhialic looi; ku woke guopdi, yɛn ee ka ke loŋ de kerac looi.
Yen ka, acin gaak be nu e kɔc yieth kɔc nu e Kritho Yecuyic, kek kɔc cie tɔu e tau de guop, ayek tɔu e tau de wei.
Ku loŋ de Wei ke piir, loŋ nu e Kritho Yecuyic, aci a luony bei ne loŋ de kerac keke thuɔɔu.
Ke ci loŋ dhal e luɔi, ne kɔc kɔɔc en ne baŋ de guop, acii Nhialic ŋiec looi, waan tooc en Wende guop, ke cath ke guop cit guop deyic kerac, ku aa tuuc ne baŋ de kerac, ago kerɛɛc nu e guopic gɔk,
luɔi bi ke lueel loŋ aa tiiŋic e woyiic, wok kɔc cie tɔu e tau de guop, wok ee tɔu e tau de Wei.
Kɔc e tɔu e tau de guop ayek ka ke guop tak; ku kɔc e tɔu e tau de Wei ayek ka ke Wei tak.
Taŋ ee raan ka ke guop tak yen aye thuɔɔu; ku taŋ ee raan ka ke Wei tak yen aye piir ku ye mat.
E luɔi de yen ater keke Nhialic, yen taŋ ee raan ka ke guop tak; ku acii kede loŋ de Nhialic e piŋ, ku acie leu e piŋ ayadaŋ;
yen ka, kɔc e tɔu e tau de guop aciki Nhialic dueer tɔ mit piɔu.
Ku week, wek cie tɔu e tau de guop, ee tau de Wei yen tau wek, te reere Wei ke Nhialic e weyiic eyic. Ku na de raan nu raan cii cath ke Wei ke Kritho, ka cie kede.
Ku te nu Kritho e weyiic, ke guop e thou ne baŋ de kerac, ku piir Wei ne baŋ de piathepiɔu.

Ku te reere Wei e weyiic, ke Wei ke Raan waan ci Yecu jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic, te reer kek e weyiic, ke Raan ci Kritho jat nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic, yen abi week tɔ piir gup gup de yiic thuɔɔu, ne riel e Weikɛn e reer e weyiic.
Yen ka, wek mithekɔckuɔ, luɔi bi wok ka ke guop aa looi, acii nu e woyieth;
ku te ya wek ka ke guop looi, ke we bi thou; ku te ya wek luɔi de guop yiekic thuɔɔu ne riɛl e Wei, ke we bi piir.
Kɔc ebɛn kɔc ee thel e Wei ke Nhialic, kek aye mith ke Nhialic.
Wek kene bɛ gam piɔn e him, piɔn riɔc, wek ci gam piɔn e mith ci muk, piɔn e wo tɔ cot, an, Abba, Waada.
Weidit gup kek aye jam mat ne piɔthkuɔ etok, alekki wook nɔn ee wok mith ke Nhialic;
ku ten ee wok mith, ke wo bi kaŋ lɔɔk lak; wok ee mith bi ka ke Nhialic lɔɔk lak, ku lookku kaŋ rɔm ne Kritho etok; na yok kaŋ guum ne yen etok, ke wo bi gam dhueeŋ etok.
Cook ca kueen e yapiɔu ka, an, Karɛc yok guum enɔɔne, acinki naamden, aciki dueere kieet e dhueeŋ bi dap nyuoth wook.
Ka ci cak ebɛn ayek kaŋ ŋɔɔth aret, atitki kool e tic bi wɛɛt ke Nhialic tic.
Ku ka ci cak ebɛn acike taau e ɣɔric cok, acie kede piɔnden etok, ku e kede piɔn e Raan ɣon tɛɛu keek e kaŋ cok, ne ŋath bi kek e ŋɔɔth,
an, bi ka ci cak luony bei e himic, liim e dhiap de kaŋ, agoki aa cath e kede yenhden ne cath ee mith ke Nhialic cath e dhueeŋ.
Ku ka ci cak ebɛn aŋicku nɔn keŋ kek etok ku reme kegup acit man e tiiŋ kɔɔr dhieth aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Ku acie keek kapac, ee wok aya, wok kɔc cath ne Wei, biak ci kɔn gam wook, wok gup, wok keŋ e woyiic, wok ee muŋ bi wo muk tiit, yen aye wɛɛr bi wo wɛɛr gup bci.
Wo ci kony wci ne aŋɔth ŋathku. Ku ke ci raan tiŋ acie tɔ ye aŋɔth. Ke ci raan tiŋ eeŋo dueere ye bɛ ŋɔɔth?
Ku na ŋathku ka kenku tiŋ, yen abuk aa tiit ne piɔn lir.
Ku Weidit ee wo kony aya ne kɔc kɔɔc wok; lɔŋ bi wok lɔŋ apiɛth akucku, ku Weidit guop yen aye lɔŋ ne biakda ne keŋ cii dueere lueel.
Ku Raan e kɔc woi piɔth thin ee piɔn e Weidit ŋic, tau tɔu en, luɔi ee yen lɔŋ ne biak de kɔc ɣerpiɔth ne kede piɔn e Nhialic.
Cook ŋicku ki, an, Kerieec ebɛn ee mat etok, bi kɔc nhiaar Nhialic bɛn luoi kepiɛth, kɔc ci cɔɔl e kede piɔnde.
Ku kɔc waan ci kɔn ŋic tueŋ, kek aa kɔn lɔc e yen, bike tɔ kit gup ne Wende, luɔi bi en aa kɛɛi e mith juec yiic mith ke Wun.
Ku kɔc ɣɔn ci kɔn lɔc, kek ayeke cɔɔl e yen, ku kɔc ci cɔɔl e ye, kek ayeke tɔ piɛthpiɔth e yen, ku kɔc ci tɔ piɛthpiɔth, kek ayeke gam dhueeŋ e yen.
Buk ŋo jɔ lueel ne kede kake? Te mɛte Nhialic ke wook, ke eeŋa bi dɛ ater ke wook?
Yen Nhialic, Raan waan ken Wende peen, Wende guop, ku aci e yien Raan thuɔɔu e biakda wook wodhie, eekaŋo cii en wo bi miɔɔc e kaŋ kedhie aya ne yen etok e dhueeŋ?
Eeŋa bi kɔc cii Nhialic lɔc lɔ gaany? Ee Nhialic yen aye Raan e keek tɔ cin yieth gaak;
Eeŋa bi wo yiek yieth gaak? Kritho raan waan ci thou, yeka, aŋuan bi wok e lueel, an, raan ci bɛ jat nhial, raan nu e baŋ cueny de Nhialic, yen aye raan e lɔŋ ne biakda aya.
Eeŋa bi wo paak ne nhieer e Kritho? Keril gumku bi leu, ayi kerɛɛc dhal wook, ayi yoŋ, ayi cɔk, ayi cien cin wokɔɔth lupɔɔ, ayi riɔɔc, ayi tɔŋ, de toŋ bi leu e keyiic?
Acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Ne biakdu wok e nɔk ekool ebɛn; Wo ci tɔ ye thok bi tem rot.
Acie yen, ku ne kake yiic kedhie wok ee joot e tɔŋ tiaam aret ne riɛl e raan ci wo nhiaar.
Cook ŋiɛc e yapiɔu aret ki, an, Thuɔɔu, ayi piir, ayi tuuc bɔ nhial, ayi bany, ayi riɛl, ayi ka ke enɔɔne, ayi ka bi nu wadaŋ,
ayi bɛɛr bɛɛre kaŋ, ayi tethuth, ayi te de yen daŋ ci cak, acin tok e kake yiic toŋ bi pɛɛk leu, pɛɛk bi en wo paak ne nhieer e Nhialic, nhieer nu e Kritho Yecu Bɛnydiitdayin.
Ee yin en luɛɛl e Krithoyic, yɛn cii lueth tor, ku jam ca yok e yapiɔu ee caatɔ keke yɛn etok e Weidit Ɣer yiic,
yan, Yɛn e piɔu jiɛth aret ku ya coole dhiau piɔu acin pek.
Ku aduɛɛr lueel e yapiɔu, an, adi miɛt piɔu tee ya ye guop dɛ aciɛɛn bi ya cieec e Kritho nɔm ne baŋ de mithekɔckuɔ, kɔc rɛɛn wok ne dhienh e dhieethe wook.
Ayek kɔc ke Yithrael, ku muŋ ci Nhialic ke muk e dhueeŋ ee keden, ayi looŋ ci mac, ayi tɛɛu ci loŋ tau piny, ku luɔi de ka ke Nhialic, ku ka ci kɔn lueel, an, bike gam keek, ayek kaken;
kuarkuɔ ayek kaken, ayi Kritho aya abɔ ne keek ne dhienh e dhieethe ye, raan nu e kaŋ niim kedhie, ku ye Nhialic de guop athiɛɛi athɛɛr. Amen.
Ku akɛn lueel, nɔn cin en ke ci wel ke Nhialic leu, acie yen. Ku aciki e Yithiael niim kedhie, kek kɔc ke Yithrael,
ku aciki e mith ke Abraɣam kedhie, e luɔi ee Abraɣam kuɛɛreden; ku aye lueel, yan, Kaudu abi kuɛɛn e Yithakic.
Tharde ki, yan, Mith ke guop acie keek ee mith ke Nhialic, ee mith ke ka ci kɔn lueel, keek ayeke tɔ ye kau.
Jam ci kɔn lueel ki, yan, Eleruoon, acit piny ekene, ke yɛn bi bɛn, ku Thara abi nɔm dɛ wende.
Ku acie kene etok; Rebeka aya, te ci en acuek yok ne mony tok, yen aye Yithaak waada,

ku te ŋoote mithke ke ke kene guɔ dhieeth, ku acin ke cik looi ayi kepiɛth ayi kerac, luɔi bi loŋ cii Nhialic lueel e yepiɔu ne kede lɔny lɔc en kɔc, luɔi bi en tɔu tede, ku acie ne kede ke cii raan looi, ee jam e Raan e kɔc cɔɔl;
ke jɔ lɛk en, an, Mɛnh dit abi aa lim de mɛnh koor.
Acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Jakop aca nhiaar guop, ku maan Ethau.
Eeŋo buk jɔ lueel? De jam rɛɛc cath ke Nhialic? Ei, acie yen!
Ku aci lɛk Mothe, yan, Yɛn bi piɔu kok woke raan ca tak, an, ba piɔu kok wo yen, ku ba apiɔu wɛl raan ca tak, an, ba apiɔu wɛl en.
Yen ka, acie jam de raan kɔɔr kedaŋ aret, ku acie jam de raan lui aret, ee jam de Nhialic, Raan cath keke kokepiɔu.
Ku kecigɔɔr aci lɛk Paro, yan, Yen kede ekene yen aa jat ɛn yin nhial, ke ya bi riɛldi nyuɔɔth e yiyic, ke bi rinki aa lueel e piny nɔm ebɛn.
Yen tede ka, ee piɔu kok keke raan nu e yepiɔu, ku raan ci tak, an, bi tɔ ril nɔm, ke tɔ ril nɔm.
Yin bi a jɔ thieec, yan, Eeŋo daŋ ŋoot en ke ye kɔc gɔk? Eeŋa dueer en pɛn kede piɔnde?
Ku yin ŋadi, yee ŋa, raan beer Nhialic thok? Ke ci cueec bi raan e cuec en yɔɔk, yan, Eeŋo e yin a looi aya?
Ku cueny e tony, cii cath ke riɛl bi en tony cueec kaarou ne tiɔm toŋe, ee toony tok kede dhueeŋ, ku cii toony tok e kede dhueeŋ?
Ku na Nhialic, te de yen piɔu luɔi bi en agɔnhde nyuɔɔth, ku tɔ riɛlde ŋic, eeŋodaŋ, acakaa yen eci tony ke agɔth guum ne liɛɛr diit e yenpiɔu, kek tony ci roŋ ne riaak bi ke riɔɔk;
ku bi dit e dhueeŋde nyuɔɔth ne tony ke kokdepiɔu, tony ci kɔn looi, bik aa ka ke dhueeŋ,
ee wook gup, wok kɔc ci cɔɔl, aci e Judaiyic etok, e Juooric aya?
Acit man ci e lueel ne Kothea, yan, Yɛn bi kɔc tɔ ye kɔcki, kɔc e cie kɔcki waan; Ku ta raan e raan nhiaar, raan e cie nhiaar waan.
Ku teman waan ci ke yɔɔk tliin, yan, We cie kɔcki, Yen etemane guop yen abike cɔɔl thin, yan, Wek ee wɛɛt ke Nhialic piir.
Ku Yithaya ee coot ne kede Yithrael, yan, Na cak mith ke Yithrael juec acitki nɔn e liɛɛt nu abapdit, ee biak ci doŋ tei, yen abi kony wei;
abi luɔi thol, teem acek ne piathepiɔu; Bɛnydit abi luɔi ci teem acek looi e piny nɔm.
Ku acit man ci Yithaya ye kɔn lueel, yan, Tee kene Bɛnydiit de Rɛmdit wo nyaŋ kau, Adi cuk ciet Thɔdɔm, ku adi ci wo tɔ cit Gɔmɔra.
Eeŋo buk jɔ lueel? Yan, Juoor, kɔc e cii piathepiɔu e cop, acik piathepiɔu yok, yen aye piathepiɔu bɔ ne gam;
ku Yithrael, kɔc e ye loŋ de piathepiɔu cop, akenki loŋ de piathepiɔu gith.
Ee kaŋo? Ee luɔi e cii kek en e kɔɔr ne gam, aa yek kɔɔr ne luɔi de loŋ. Aake kɔth e kuur e kɔth,
acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Tieŋki, yɛn e kuur e kɔth tuɛɛl e Dhiɔnic, ku ye kuur diit ee kɔc tɔ kɔth aret; Ku raan ebɛn raan gam en, acii bi yaar.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, ke kaar e yapiɔu ki, yɛn guop, ku laŋ laŋ ɛn Nhialic ne biak de Yithiael ki, ee kuny bi ke kony wei.
Ku yɛn ee caatɔden e dit diit kek piɔth e kede Nhialic, ku aciki kaŋ ŋic apiɛth.
Ku keek, ne kuny kuc kek piathepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic, ku ŋath ŋɛɛth kek piathdɛn e piɔu etok, aake ye piathepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic rɛɛc gam.
Ku Kritho yen aye thok de loŋ ne kede piathepiɔu tede raan ebɛn raan gam.
Ku Mothe e kaŋ gɔɔr ale, ne kede piathepiɔu wen bɔ ne loŋ, yan, Raan e kake looi abi piir e keek.
Ku piathepiɔu wen bɔ ne gam aye lueel ale, yan, Du luel e yipiɔu, yan, Eeŋa bi lɔ paannhial? (luɛɛlde ki, ee bii le en Kritho bɛɛi piny.)
Ku du luel aya, yan, Eeŋa bi lɔ piny tethuth? (luɛɛlde ki, ee bii le yen Kritho bɛɛi nhial e kɔc ci thou yiic.)
Ku ye ŋo lueel? Yan, Jam athiaak ke yin, anu e yithok, ku nu e yipiɔu aya; yen aye jam de gam, jam guiirku;
yan, Te gɛm yin Bɛnydit Yecu e yithok, ku gam e yipiɔu, nɔn ci Nhialic e jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, ke yin bi kony wei.
Gam ee raan gam e yepiɔu yen aye yen piathepiɔu yok; ku luɛɛl ee raan gamde lueel e yethok yen aye yen kunydewei yok.
Ku kecigɔɔr aye lueel, yan, Raan ebɛn raan gam en acii bi yaar.
Acin te ci kɔc keyiic tek, Judai ayi Girikii; ee Bɛnydiit toŋe Bɛny nu e kɔc niim kedhie, yen ee piɔu adhuɛŋ ke kɔc cɔl en kedhie.
Raan ebɛn raan e Bɛnydit cɔɔl rin ka bi kony wei.
Ku enɔɔne, bik raan aa cɔɔl rin adiaa raan kenki gam? Ku bik raan gam adi, raan ken kek kede piŋ? Ku bik piŋ adi, te hiuwe raan e keek guiir?
Ku bik aa guiir adi, te keneke tooc? Acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Eeŋo ci kɔc cok dikedik ale, kɔc e welpiɛth guiir, wel ke mat, kɔc e welpiɛth guiir, wel ke kepiɛth?
Ku akenki welpiɛth gam kedhie, cit man ci Yithaya ye lueel, yan, Bɛnydit, eeŋa ci guieerda gam?
Yen ka, Gam abɔ ne piŋ de wel, ku bɔ piŋ de wel ne jam de Nhialic.
Ku wek thieec, yan, Kɛnki piŋ? Go, an, Ɣɛɛ, ee yic, Rolden aci thiei e piny nɔm ebɛn, Ku lɔ welken guut e piny thar.
Aguɔ bɛ thieec, yan, Ken ŋic en Yithrael? Go, an, Aci Mothe kɔn lueel, yan, We ba tɔ dɔm tiɛɛl ne jur cie tɔ ye jur, Ku ta week goth alal ne jur kuc wel.
Ku Yithaya e ŋeeny aret, lueel, yan, Yɛn cii kɔc yok, kɔc e ken a kɔɔr; Yɛn ci nyuoth kɔc, kɔc e ken a luɔp.
Ku yook Yithrael, yan, Yɛn e cool e rieny ɛn acin ecaŋawen e kɔc reec gam, kɔc nhiaar jany.
Guɔ jɔ thieec, an, Ci Nhialic kɔcke cuat wei? Ei! Acie yen! Yɛn aya, yɛn ee raan e Yithrael, ne kau de Abraɣam, ne dhien e Benjamin.
Nhialic aken kɔcke cuat wei, kɔckɛn ci kɔn lɔc. Kuocki ke lueel kecigɔɔr ne kede Elija? Laŋ ci en Nhialic lɔŋ ne kede Yithrael, yan,
Bɛnydit, acik nebiiku nɔk, ku acik yikkuon ke lam thuoor piny; adɔɔŋ ɛn atok, ku akɔɔrki naŋ nɛk kek ɛn.
Ku beer beere Nhialic en e luel ŋo? Yan, Yɛn e ro bɔth agum kadherou de roor kɔc ken kemiɔl tuk e Baal nɔm.
Ku yen enɔɔne aya, biak ci doŋ anu ne ke ci lɔc ne dhueeŋdepiɔu.

Ku te ee yen kede dhueeŋdepiɔu, ka cii be ya kede luɔi; ten ee yen en, ke dhueeŋdepiɔu acii be ya dhueeŋdepiɔu; ku te ee yen kede luɔi, ka cii be ya kede dhueeŋdepiɔu; ten ee yen en, ke luɔi acii be ya luɔi.
Jɔ aa ŋo? Yithrael aken ke kɔɔr yok; ku biak ci lɔc, yen aci e yok, ku kɔc kɔk acike tɔ ril niim,
acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Nhialic aci ke gam piɔn e nin, ku gɛm keek nyin cii daai, ku yith cii kaŋ e piŋ, aɣet ci ekoole.
Go Dabid lueel, yan, Tɔ pamdɛn e cam e acerek, ku ke bi keek aa dɔm, Ayi ke bi keek tɔ kɔth, ayi kedɛn tuc bik yok;
Tɔ ke lɔ nyiin dudur, ke ke cii bi daai, Ku tɔ ke tot kekɔɔth ananden.
Aguɔ jɔ thieec, yan, E ke kɔth abik wiik? Acie yen. Ku kɔth ci kek kɔth, yen a yoke Juoor kunydewei, ke Yithrael bi tiɛɛl dɔm.
Ku enɔɔne, kɔth kɔth kek, te ci en aa kuɛth ci piny tɔ kueth nɔm, ku kuur koor kek, te ci en aa kuɛth ci Juoor tɔ kueth, na piathden, bi kene woor e war ŋo?
Yɛn jam wo week, wek Juoor, ku luɔi aa yɛn tuny e Juoor, yen a lɛɛc ɛn luɔidi;
nɔn de te ban kɔcki tɔ dɔm tiɛɛl, aguɔ kɔk kony wei e keyiic.
Ku na cuɛt cuɛteke wei, te ee yen mɛɛt bi piny nɔm maat, ku dom bi ke bɛ dɔm, bi ciet ŋo, cii bi aa piir e kɔc ci thou yiic?
Ku na ɣer awany tueŋic, ka yen ɣɛɛr e awacic ebɛn ka; ku tim, te ɣeere meideyic, ka yen ɣɛɛr e keerke yiic ka.
Ku na ci keer kɔk cak dhuoŋ bei, ku yin, yin ee keer e olip e cil roor, na ci yi cak tuɛɛl e keyiic, aba cil we keek etok, ago rɔm we keek etok ne cuai de tim de olip, ke bɔ ne meiyic;
ke yi du rot e leec e ker niim. Ku te leec yin rot, tak yinɔm nɔn cie yin e muk meei, ee meei yen amuk yin.
Ku ba jɔ lueel, yan, Keerke acike dhuoŋ bei, luɔi bi a tuɛɛl thin, aba cil.
Ee yindu; ne baŋ de rɛɛc de gam yen a dhuŋeke bei, ku yin, yin kaac ne gam. Du yinɔm muk nhial, ye riɔɔc tei.
Ku te kene Nhialic keer thɛɛr ke tim pɔl, ke ye rot tiit, ke yi cii bi pɔl ayadan.
Wɔiki enɔɔne, piath e Nhialic piɔu ayi riɛl e yenpiɔu: tede kɔc waan ci wiik, ee riɛlepiɔu; ku tede yin, ee piathepiɔu, te ee yin cool e reer e piath de yenpiɔuyic; na reec, ke yin bi tɛɛm bei aya.
Ku keek ayadaŋ, te cii kek e cool e reec gam, ka bike tuɛɛl thin abik cil; Nhialic acath ke riɛl bi en ke bɛ tuɛɛl thin abik cil.

Ku te ci yi ŋuoot bei e tim de olip waan, tim e cil roor tei, ago tuɛɛl e tim de olip piɛthic, ku tueel tueele yi thin acii cit ciɛɛŋduon e ciɛke yi; na kake kek keer thɛɛr ke tim, tueel bike bɛ tuɛɛl e timdenic guop tim de olip, cii bi pial awar tueel e tueele yin aret?

Ku yɛn cin piɔu, wek mithekɔckuɔ, luɔi kuoc wek ecooke, cook ci thiaan, ke we cii rot bi leec, yan, pɛlki niim. Cook ci thiaan, ki, yan, Biak toŋ de Yithrael aci tɔ ril nɔm, aɣet kool bi kuɛth de juoor bɛn thin;
ago Yithrael kony wei ebɛn aya, acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan e kɔc luok abi bɛn bei e Dhiɔnic, Go rɛɛc reec kek Nhialic dak wei e Jakopic;
Ku yen aye loŋ buk mac wo keek atok, Kool ban karɛcken nyaai.
Ne kede welpiɛth, ayek kɔc de ater ne Nhialic ne baŋdun; ku ne kede lony lɔce keek, ayek kɔc nhiaar ne baŋ de warkuɔ.
Miɔc de Nhialic ku cɔt cɔɔl en kɔc, Nhialic acii keek e bɛ riic.
Ku acit man waan ca wek Nhialic e gam, ku we ci kokdepiɔu yok enɔɔne ne rɛɛc reec kek gam,
yen aacii kek e gam aya, ke ke bi kokdepiɔu yok ne kokdepiɔu cak yok week.
Kɔc aci Nhialic ke mac etok kedhie ne rɛɛc reec kek gam, ke bi piɔu kok keke keek kedhie.
Eeŋo diite pɛl e Nhialic nɔm aya, ayi ŋiny ŋic en kaŋ! Looŋkɛn ci guiir bi raan ke gii thaar nɛn, ku kuɛɛrke bi raan ke yok adi?
Eeŋa e ŋic piɔn e Bɛnydit? Ku eeŋa e tɔ rot e raan e yen lɛk loŋ?
Ku eeŋa ci e kɔn miɔɔc e kaŋ, ka bi bɛ cuol en?
Kerieec ɛbɛn ee kake, ku bɔ ne yen, ku le tede yen. E dhueeŋ tɔu keke yen aɣet athɛɛr. Amen.
Yen a laŋ ɛn week, mithekɔckuɔ, ne kok e Nhialic piɔu, an, Gamki gupkun abik aa ke ci lam ke piir, ke ɣeric, ke mit e Nhialic piɔu, lamduon piɛth ki.
Ku duoki tau de pinye nɔm enɔɔne e dɔmic, jaki rot puk ne luɔi e piɛce we looi niim, ke we bi kede piɔn e Nhialic aa them nɔn yin en di, piɔn piɛthe, ku mit, ku ci dikedik.
Ku enɔɔne, ne dhueeŋdepiɔu ci gam ɛn, yen a lɛk raan ebɛn ne weyiic, yan, E cin raan e ro tɔ dit e dit cii roŋ ke ye; yak rot tɔ nu e kaamic, acit man ci Nhialic kɔc tɛk gam raan ebɛn.
Ku acit man de raan kajuec e yeguop, ku ye guop toŋe, ku luɔi de ka ke guop ebɛn aciki e kit;
ayi wook ayadaŋ, wok juec, ku yok guop tok e Krithoyic, ku wook wodhie wok raan e rot wapac.
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ciɛth wok ne ka ci gam wook ka kith yiic bik roŋ ne luɔi de dhueeŋ ci gam wook, nɔn ee yen caar ee wok cɔɔr, yok cɔɔr e caar e roŋ ke gamda;
ku nɔn ee yen luɔi ee wok kɔc luooi, yok keda looi apiɛth; ku raan e weet, e ye weet apiɛth;
ku raan e kɔc guieer wel, e ye kɔc guieer apiɛth; raan e miooc, e ye miooc e piɔn tok; raan nu e kɔc niim, e ye kede looi ke leth guop; raan e piɔu kok, e ye luui e piɔn mit.
Taki nhieer nu, nhieer cinic rueeny. Yak kerac maan etaiwei, ku yak kepiɛth dɔm e dom ril.
Yak rot nhiaar ne nhieer e mith ke raan tok; e ŋɛk e ŋɛk rieu awar rieeu rieu en rot.
E cin raan e rot dak e luɔide; yak yiic leth ne Weidit, yak ka ke Bɛnydit looi.
Yak piɔth miɛt e aŋɔth ŋathki; yak keril dhal week guum; yak lɔŋ cok e giet wek en.
Yak kakun tek ne kɔc ɣerpiɔth, te de yen ke dak kek; yak kamaan ŋic aret.
Yak kɔc yɔŋ week thieei; yak ke thieei, duoki ke lam aciɛɛn.
Yak piɔth miɛt etok ne kɔc mit piɔth; yak dhiau etok ne kɔc dhiau.
Taki piɔndun e tok. Duoki wepiɔth e tuɔm ka ke bany, yak reer apiɛth ne kɔc cin naamden. Duoki rot e leec, yan, Pɛlki niim.
Duoki kerɛɛc e raan luoi week e cool e kerac anandun. Thɛmki nɔn ba wek kapiɛth aa looi e kɔc niim kedhie.
Te lɛu wek reer emaath ne kɔc kedhie, ke we them reer ba wek reer.
Duoki rot e guoor, wek kɔc nhiaar, yak agɔth pat kueer; luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Guur ee kedi; aba cool yɛn, jam de Bɛnydit ka.
Yen tede ka, na nak cɔk raan man yin, ke tɔ cam; na nak reu en, ke tɔ dek; luɔi loi wuya, yen abi yin en tɔ gɔk rot etok.
Duoki rot e tɔ tiɛɛm kerac, yak kerac tiaam ne piath.
E raan ebɛn e ye bany piŋ thook, bany ci taau e kɔc niim. Acin bɛny daŋ nu, ee bany e bɔ tede Nhialic kapac; ku bany nu enɔɔne, ee Nhialic yen e dɔm keek.
Ku raan e bɛny ŋeny, ka ci loŋ cii Nhialic lueel ŋeny; ku kɔc e ŋeeny aya, abik ketuc yok e jamdenic.
Ku bany aciki kɔc e kepiɛth looi e tɔ riɔc, ee kɔc e kerac looi kek ayek tɔ riɔc. De yipiɔu luɔi cii yin bi riɔɔc e bany? Ye kepiɛth looi, ke bi yin leec yen bɛny;
ee raan e ka ke Nhialic looi ne kede piathdu. Ku na ye kerac looi, ke yi jɔ riɔɔc; abatau acie mɔk ɣɔric; ee raan e ka ke Nhialic looi, raan e raan e kerac looi guoor e agɔth.
Yen a ba wek jamde dhil aa piŋ, acie baŋ de agɔth etok, ee baŋ de loŋ ee raan yok e yepiɔu aya.
Ku yen a ya wek atholbo kut aya; ayek kɔc e ka ke Nhialic looi, kɔc e cool e tit luɔi mane guop.
Yen a wek kɔc kedhie gam kaken; an, ee atholbo, ke we gɛm atholbo; an, ee guaaric, ke we gɛm guaaric; an, ee rieeu, ke rieuki; an, ee thɛk e guop, ke thɛkki guop.
Duoki e cath ne kany de raan daŋ, ee nhieer tei, nhieer ba wek rot aa nhiaar; raan e raan daŋ nhiaar aci loŋ tiiŋic.

Yan, Du lɔ weke tiiŋ de raan daŋ, Du raan nak abi thou, Du kuel, Du raan ciek thok, Du kalei woi e yipiɔu, ku na de cook daŋ nu, cook de loŋ, ayeke mat niim kedhie ne loŋ toŋe, yan, Yin bi raan rɛɛr keke yin nhiaar cit man nhiɛɛr yin rot.
Nhieer acin kerɛɛc e luoi raan rɛɛr ke raan; yen aye nhieer loŋ tiiŋic.
Ku cooke aya, yan, Yak piny ŋic, nɔn ee yen akool bi wok dhil paac e ninic; kuny bi wo kony wei e guɔ thiɔk enɔɔne awar waan kɔn wo gam.
Piny e dit, ku a kɔɔr ru; jɔku luɔi de cuɔlepiny cuat wei, ku jɔku ka ke ɣɛɛrepiny dɔm, ka ke tɔŋ.
Yok ŋiec reer apiɛth, luɔi ee yen akol; yok thueec pɔl, ku win ee mɔu wo wit, ayi ŋɔɔŋ de tik ayi luɔi rac, ayi ater ayi tiɛɛl.
Jaki Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho cieŋ cit lupɔ, ku duoki e diɛɛr ne karɛc kɔɔr guop.
Raan dɛk e gam, ke damki, ku duoki wel e tɛɛr ne yen.
Ŋɛk aye gam luɔi dueer en cam e kerieec ebɛn, ku cam ŋɛk e wal tei, ne kɔc kɔɔc en.
Raan e cam, e cii raan cie cam e biɔɔn guop; ku raan cie cam, e cii raan e cam e gɔk; acii Nhialic dɔm.
Ee yin ŋa, yin raan e lim de raan daŋ gɔk? Kɔɔc kɛɛc en, ku wiik wiik en, ee kede bɛnyde guop etok. Yeka, ku abi mɔk nhial; Nhialic ade riɛl bi en e tɔ kaac.
Raan tok aye kool tok rieu awar kool daŋ; ku lueel raan daŋ, yan, Akool akitki. E raan ebɛn e ye kedaŋ ŋic egɔk e yepiɔu.

Raan rieu akol, ee kede Bɛnydit en a rieu en en; ku raan cii akol e rieu, ee kede Bɛnydit en acii en en e rieu. Ku raan e cam, ee cam ne kede Bɛnydit, ago lueel, an, Thieithieei Nhialic; ku raan cie cam, ee kede Bɛnydit en acii en e cam, ku lueel, an, Thieithieei Nhialic.
Ku acin raan tok ne wook, raan piir e kede etok, ku acin raan thou e kede etok.
Piir piir wok, ee kede Bɛnydit en piir wok; ku thon thou wok, ee kede Bɛnydit en thou wok; ayi te piir wok ayi te thou wok, wok ee kɔc ke Bɛnydit.
Ku yen aa thouwe Kritho, ku jɔt rot be piir, luɔi bi en aa Bɛnydiit e kɔc ci thou ayi kɔc piir.
Ku yin, eeŋo gɛk yin mɛnhkui? Ku eeŋo biɔɔn yin mɛnhkui guop aya? Wok wodhie, wo bi kɔɔc e thoony e Kritho nɔm, thoony ee loŋ guiir.
Cit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Alueel Bɛnydit, yan, Ten aa yɛn Nhialic piir, ke miɔl kedhie abike tuk e yanɔm, Ku liep kedhie abik aca wooc gam e Nhialic nɔm.
Yen ka, wok wodhie, ŋɛk abi kede yenguop lɛk Nhialic.
Yen du wo rot e bɛ gɔk; aŋuan luɔi bi wok loŋe lueel e wopiɔth, yan, E cin raan e kedaŋ taau kueer, ke bi mɛnhkene tɔ kɔth, ayi te bi e tɔ wieek.
Cook ŋiɛc ka, aca cok e ŋiɛc ɛn en egɔk e Bɛnydit Yecuyic, yan, Acin ken ee rac etok; ku raan e tɔ kedaŋ rac, ke jɔ rac tede yen.
Te ci mɛnhkni piɔu diu ne baŋ de riiŋduon e cuet, ke yin cii be reer e reer e nhieer. Du raan riak ne riiŋduon e cuet, raan waan thouwe Kritho ne biakde.
Duoki piathdun e tɔ leke kerac.
Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic acie cam ku acie dek, ee piathepiɔu, ku mat, ku piɔnmit e Weidit Ɣer yiic.
Ku raan e Kritho luooi apiɛth e kake yiic, ka piɛth e Nhialic piɔu, ku aye kɔc tɔ ye raan piɛth ayadaŋ.
Yen ee wok ka ke mat cop ayi ka ke kuɛt bi wok kueet.
Du luɔi de Nhialic riak ne baŋ de riŋ. Kerieec ebɛn aɣeric tei; ku ee kerac tede raan e kedaŋ cam, ago kaŋ wooc thin.
Apiɛth luɔi cii yin riŋ bi aa cuet, ku luɔi cii yin mɔu bi aa dek, ku luɔi cii yin kaŋ bi aa looi ebɛn, ka bi mɛnhkui tɔ wac kaŋ, ku ka bi e tɔ wieek, ku ka bi e tɔ kɔc.
De gam cath ke yin? E cath ke yin yitok e Nhialic nyin. Thieithieei e raan ken ro gɔk ne ke ci en ro pal luɔi.
Ku raan e piɔu wil e kaamic, te ciɛm en, aye jɔɔny, luɔi liiuwe gam thin; ku kerieec ebɛn ke liiuwe gam thin, yen aye kerac.
Wok kɔc ril, wo bi kɔc dhil aa muk ne kɔc kɔɔc kek, ku cuku e luui ne kede piɔnda.
Wook wodhie e ŋɛk e ye raan reer kek kony abi piɔu miɛt, e kede piathde, ku kede kuɛt bi ye kueet.
Acakaa Kritho guop, aacii kede yenpiɔu e looi; ku, acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Gaŋ gɛke kɔc yin aci loony e yayeth.
Ku ka ci gɔɔr ɣɔn thɛɛr kedhie aake gaar ne weet bi wo weet, ke wo bi dɛ aŋɔth ŋathku ne guomdekaŋ ayi muŋdepiɔu kak e biiye kacigɔɔr.
Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic de guomdekaŋ keke muŋdepiɔu, e week tɔ luel jam tok wapac jam roŋ ke Kritho Yecu;
ke we bi Nhialic aa leec nɔm ne piɔn tok ku ne thoŋ tok, yen aye Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Yen aa wek rot dɔm wapac, acit nɔn ci Kritho wook dɔm ayadaŋ, ke Nhialic bi leec.
Aluɛɛl ale, yan, Yecu Kritho aci aa raan e aŋueel luooi ne baŋ de yin de Nhialic, ke bi ka ci kɔn lɛk kuarkuɔ tɔ ye yith,
ku luɔi bi Juoor Nhialic aa lɛc nɔm ayadaŋ ne baŋ de kok ci en piɔu kok ke keek; acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Yen aba yɛn kedu gam e Juoor yiic, Ku piaany rinku.
Ku be lueel, yan, Yak piɔth miɛt, wek Juoor, ne kɔcke etok.
Ku be lueel, yan, Yak Bɛnydit piɔɔny, wek Juoor wedhie; Ku yak leec nɔm, wek kɔc wedhie.
Ku be Yithaya lueel, yan, Abi dɛ meei de Jethe, Ku bi dɛ raan bi ro jɔt le Juoor cieŋ; Yen abi Juoor aa ŋɔɔth.
Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic de aŋɔth e week thiɔɔŋ piɔth ne miɛtepiɔu ebɛn keke mat ne gam gam wek, ke aŋɔth ŋath wek abi lɔ ke dit, ne riɛl e Weidit Ɣer.
Ku yɛn guop yɛn e kedun guɔ ŋic e yapiɔu aya, wek mithekɔckuɔ, dit diite piathdun, ku dit e ŋiny ŋiɛc wek kaŋ, ku leu aa wek rot leu e weet.
Ku we ca gaar cok kɔk ke ya ril nyin aret, e taŋ tak ɛn weniim ne ke cak kɔn ŋic, ne baŋ de dhueeŋ ci Nhialic gam ɛn,
ke yɛn bi aa raan e Yecu Kritho luooi e Juoor yiic, raan e welpiɛth ke Nhialic luoi keek, ke gɛm ci Juoor gam Nhialic ke bi aa lam mit e Nhialic piɔu, lam ci tɔ ɣeric ne Weidit Ɣer.
Yen a cath ɛn woke ke duɛɛr ɛn ro leec e Kritho Yecuyic ne ka ke luɔi de Nhialic.
Yɛn cii jam daŋ duɛɛr lueel, ee jam de ke ci Kritho looi ne yɛn etok, ne jam ayi luɔi, bi en Juoor tɔ piŋ wel,
ku ne gook ril ayi kagai ci looi, ne riɛl e Weidit ke Nhialic; ku yɛn atok, agal e Jeruthalem ku bɛi nu e yekec, a le guoot piny de Yilurikon, yɛn e welpiɛth ke Kritho thol e guieer;
yeka, aa nu e yapiɔu luɔi ban welpiɛth aa guiir, te kene rin ke Kritho kɔn lueel, ku yɛn aa cin piɔu luɔi ban yik e keerkeer e raan daŋ nɔm;
ku acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Kɔc kene lɛk e kede, kek abi tiŋ, Ku kɔc ken kɔn piŋ, kek abi jam yokic.
Yen aye cool e peene ya bɛn ba yɛn bɛn tede week.
Ku enɔɔne luɔi cin en tedien be nu e bɛike yiic, ku luɔi aa yɛn piɔu dɛ lɔ la yɛn tede week e run juecke,
ke yɛn bi jɔ lɔ tede week, miak te keny ɛn Thepaniya; (yɛn de piɔu luɔi ban we tiŋ miak te tɛɛk ɛn, aguɔki ya ruac kueer lɔ tɛɛn, te can piɔu kɔn a yum emaath e abarɔdun)
ku yɛn lɔ Jeruthalem enɔɔne, la kɔc ɣerpiɔth a luooi.
Kɔc ke Makedonia keke Akaya acik kaŋ juɛɛr kɔc ne miɛt e kekpiɔth kɔc ɣerpiɔth kuany nyiin nu Jeruthalem.
Acik ke juaar ne miɛt e kekpiɔth; ku anu e keyieth luɔi bi kek ke miɔɔc. Ku Juoor, te ci kek aa kɔc rom ne keek etok ne kakɛn e Wei, aye guɔ nu e keyieth ayadaŋ luɔi bi kek ke kony ne ka ke piny.
Na miak, aca luɔiye thol, ku ca ka ci luɔke dhiel keek, ke we ba baar te la yɛn Thepaniya.
Ku aŋiɛc bɛn ban bɛn tede week, nɔn ban bɛn ne dit de athiɛɛi de welpiɛth ke Kritho.
Ku enɔɔne, wek laŋ, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne biak de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, ku nhieer e Weidit Ɣer, an, bak a kony ne lɔŋ aa wek Nhialic lɔŋ aret ne biakdi, cit man e kɔc wiet;
ke ya bi luok e kɔc reec gam cin, kɔc nu Judaya, ku laŋki aya, ne kede luɔi ba looi e Jeruthalem, nɔn bi en miɛt e kɔc ɣerpiɔth piɔth;
ku nɔn ban bɛn tede week ne piɔnmit, te ci Nhialic e lueel, agoku aa lɔŋ etok woke week.
Nhialic de mat, e tɔu ke week wedhie. Amen.
Wek lɛk Pibi nyankeneda, raan e kanithɔ luooi kanithɔ nu Kenkurea;
an, bak nyuooc e baŋ de Bɛnydit, e nyuuc roŋ ke kɔc ɣerpiɔth, ku bak kony te de yen ke bi kɔɔr tede week; ee raan ci kɔc juec kony, ayik ɛn ayadaŋ.
Thiecki Pirithila keke Akula kɔc luui wok etok e Kritho Yecuyic,
kɔc ci weiken kuɔɔn ne baŋ de weiki; ee kɔc aa yɔɔk, an, Thieithieei, ku acie yɛn atok, ee kanithɔɔ ke Juoor kedhie ayadaŋ;
ku thiecki kanithɔ nu ɣonden ayadaŋ. Thiecki Epaineto raan nhiaar, raan ci Kritho kɔn gam e Akaya.
Thiecki Mari, raan ci kajuec looi ne baŋda.
Thiecki Andoroniko ku Junia, kɔckuɔ, ku ye kɔc waan mɛc wok etok, kek kɔc de naamden e tuuc yiic, kɔc ci Kritho kɔn gam ke ya ŋoot.
Thiecki Ampiliato raan nhiaar e Bɛnyditic.
Thiecki Urbano raan e luui wok etok e Krithoyic, keke Thataku raan nhiaar.
Thiecki Apele raan ci leec e Krithoyic. Thiecki kɔc ke dhien e Arithobolo.
Thiecki Kerodion raanda. Thiecki kɔc ke dhien e Narkitho kɔc nu e Bɛnyditic.
Thiecki Turupaina keke Turupotha, kɔc e luui e Bɛnyditic. Thiecki Perthith, raan nhiaar, raan e luui aret e Bɛnyditic.
Thiecki Rupo raan ci lɔc e Bɛnyditic, keke man ku ye maar ayadaŋ.
Thiecki Athunkiritho ku Pelogon, ku Kerme, ku Pataroba, ku Kerma, keke mithekɔckuɔn rɛɛr ne keek.
Thiecki Pilolago ku Julia, ku Nereu keke nyankene, ku Olumpa, ku kɔc ɣerpiɔth rɛɛr ne keek kedhie.
Thiecki rot wapac ne ciem ɣeric. Wek thieec kanithɔɔ ke Kritho kedhie.
Ku wek yɔɔk, wek mithekɔckuɔ, wɔiki kɔc e kɔc paak ku kɔc e kak e kɔc tɔ wac kaŋ cak, kɔc e weet e weete week riɔɔk; pakki ne keek.
Kɔc cit keek aciki Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho e luooi, e keyiic kek luuiki; ku ayek kɔc cin piɔth kerac math piɔth ne wel mit luelki, ayi weŋ ee kek kɔc weŋ.
Ku piŋ piɛŋ wek loŋ aci ɣet tede kɔc kedhie. Aguɔ piɔu miɛt ne baŋdun; ku enɔɔne yɛn kɔɔr luɔi ba wek aa kɔc pelniim te lɔ kepiɛth, ku yak kɔc kuc kaŋ te lɔ kerac.
Ku Nhialic de mat abi Catan dap tɔ dum e wecok piny. E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke week. Amen.
Wek thieec Timotheo raan luui wok etok; ayi Lukio ku Jathon ku Thothipataro, kɔckuɔ.
Yɛn Tertio, raan e gaar awareke, wek thieec e Bɛnyditic.
Wek thieec Gayo raan ci a tɔ ye kaman, ku ye raan e kanithɔ tɔ ye kaman ebɛn. Wek thieec Erathato raan e ka ke panydit dot, keke Kuarto mɛnhkeneda.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke week wedhie. Amen.
Ku enɔɔne, thieithieei e Raan cath ke riɛl bi en we tɔ kaac aril ne kede welkien piɛth, ku guieer ci Yecu Kritho guieer kɔc, ku nyuoth ci ke waan ci moony te ɣɔn ciɛke piny nyuɔɔth,
ku aci tɔ tiec enɔɔne, ku tɔ ŋic juoor ebɛn ne kacigɔɔr e nebii, acit loŋ cii Nhialic de piir athɛɛr lueel, bi kek wel aa piŋ ku gamki ke;
e Nhialic de nɔm pɛl, yen etok, e ye tɔu ke dhueeŋ aɣet athɛɛr. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, raan ci cɔɔl bi aa tuny e Yecu Kritho ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, woke Thothene mɛnhkeneda,

awarek en gɛɛrku kanithɔ de Nhialic nu Korintho, kɔc wen ci tɔ ɣerpiɔth e Yecu Krithoyic, kɔc wen ci cɔɔl bik aa kɔc ɣerpiɔth, keke kɔc kedhie kɔc nu e wuot yiic ebɛn, kɔc e rin ke Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda cɔɔl, ee Bɛnyden keek ku ye Bɛnyda wook.
E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu e weyiic, ayi mat, e ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Yɛn ee cool e lec Nhialicdi ne baŋdun, ne kede dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu dhueeŋ ci gam week e Kritho Yecuyic;
luɔi ci en week tɔ kueth e kerieec ebɛn, ne ŋiec jam ebɛn ku ne ŋiny de kaŋ ebɛn;
acit man ci jam tɔ ye yin e weyiic jam ci lueel e kede Kritho.
ago cien miɔc toŋ dak week, te tiɛɛt wek nyuoth bi Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ro nyuɔɔth;
raan bi week muk abak riɛl a thooke piny, ke bi cien ke bi we gɔk ekool e Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Nhialic ee Raan adot, Raan ci we cɔɔl ne kede maath de Wenden Yecu Kritho Bɛnydittda.
