Ku enɔɔne, wek laŋ, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, an, Yak jam tok lueel wedhie, ku e cin teŋ tɛk wek weyiic; ku we bi weyiic mat etok e piɔn tok ku ne loŋ tok, loŋ luɛlki.
Ku ade jam ci lɛk ɛn e dhien e Kuloe e kedun, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, nu ateer e weyiic.

Ku enɔɔne, we lɛk kene, yan, Raan ebɛn ne weyiic, aye ŋɛk lueel, yan, Yɛn ee raan e Paulo, ku lueel ŋɛk, yan, Yɛn ee raan e Apolo, ku lueel ŋɛk, yan, Yen ee raan e Kepath, ku e ŋɛk, yan, Yɛn ee raan e Kritho.
Ci Kritho eyic tek? Ci Paulo piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu ne baŋdun? ku week, ci we baptith ne rin ke Paulo?
Yɛn lec Nhialic luɔi cin en raan ca baptith e weyiic, ee Kirithipo ku Gayo kapac;
ke cin raan bi e lueel, yan, ca kɔc baptith ne rinki.
Ayi dhien e Thepana aya aca ke baptith: ku akuoc nɔn de raan daŋ ca baptith.
Kritho aken a tooc, ba kɔc bɛn baptith, ee guieer ban welpiɛth aa guiir, en aa tooc en ɛn: ku acie pɛl pɛl ɛn nɔm en duɛɛr ɛn welpiɛth aa guiir, ke tim ci riiu nɔm cii bi aa ɣɔric tim de Kritho.
Ku guieer e wel ke tim ci riiu nɔm ee keɣɔric tede kɔc bi maar; ku ye riɛldht e Nhialic tede wook wok kɔc kony wei.
Ne gaar cie gɔɔr, yan, Yɛn bi pɛlenɔm e kɔc pelniim riɔɔk, Ku ŋinydekaŋ de kɔc ŋic kaŋ aba nyaai.
Raan pelnɔm akou? raan e loŋ gɔɔr akou? raan ŋic wel teet nu nou, raan e pinye nɔm? pɛlenɔm e kɔc ke pinye nɔm kene Nhialic tɔ ye keɣɔric?
Ku te ci kɔc ke piny nɔm Nhialic guɔ kuc ne pɛl e keniim, cit man ci Nhialic e lueel ne pɛl e yenɔm, ke Nhialic jɔ piɔu miɛt luɔi bi en kɔc gam kony wei ne keɣɔric cɔl guieer e welpiɛth.
Judai akɔɔrki gok bi nyuoth keek, ku kɔɔr Giriki pɛlenɔm:
ku wook, wok guiir Kritho, raan ci piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu, tede Judai, ee ke ye kɔc tɔ kɔth, ku tede Giriku ee keɣɔric;
ku tede kɔc ci cɔɔl, Judai ayi Girikii, yen aye Kritho, riɛldiit e Nhialic, ku ye pɛlenɔm e Nhialic.
Acakaa pial e Nhialic piɔu awar kɔc ne pɛlenɔm; ku kɔc kɔɔce Nhialic awar kɔc ne riɛl.
Ku we ye cɔt cɔɔle we tiŋ, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Acin kɔc juec ci cɔɔl, kɔc ci kɔc ke piny nɔm tɔ ye kɔc pel niim ayi kɔc ril, ayi kɔc ci dhieeth e dhien e bɛny:
ee dhan ke piny nɔm kek e lɔc Nhialic, bi kɔc pelniim tɔ yaar: ku lɔc Nhialic kɔc kɔc, bi kɔc ril tɔ yaar;
ayi ka youyou ka ke piny nɔm, ayi ka ci biɔɔn, aci Nhialic ke lɔc, acakaa ka liu aya, bi en ka nu tɔ cin naamden;
ke bi cien raan toŋ bi ro leec e yenɔm.
Ku yen aye week tɔ tɔu e Kritho Yecuyic, raan cii Nhialic tɔ ye pɛlenɔm ne baŋda, ku piathepiɔu, ku ɣɛɛrepiɔu, ku weer weere wo bei;
abi ciet man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan e ro leec, ke lec rot e Bɛnyditic.
Ku yɛn, mithekɔckuɔ, waan ba yɛn tede week, yɛn aa cii bɔ wo ŋiec jam ayi pɛlenɔm, waan guieer ɛn week jam ne kede Nhialic.
Yɛn ci loŋ teem e yapiɔu, yan, Acin ke ba ŋic e weyiic, ee Yecu Kritho etok, ku pieet e pieete yen e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku yɛn aa ye reer e weyiic ke ya kɔc, ku riaac, ku lɛthe yɛn aret.
Ku jamdi ayi guieer e ya yɛn guiir aake cin yiic wel e kɔc weŋ, wel ke pɛl e raan nɔm, aake ye cath ne nyuuth ee Weidit ke nyuɔɔth ayi riɛldɛndit;
ke gamdun cii ro bi ŋɔɔth ne pɛl e raan nɔm, abi ro ŋɔɔth ne riɛlditt e Nhialic.
Ku wok ee jam de pɛlenɔm lueel woke kɔc ci ŋuɛn; ku acie pɛlenɔm e pinye enɔɔne, ku acie pɛlenɔm e banydit ke pinye nɔm, bany bi cien naamden rial.
Wok ee pɛl e Nhialic nɔm lueel, pɛl ci yal kɔu bei, ee jam ci thiaan, jam cii Nhialic kɔn lueel e yepiɔu te ŋoote piny ke liu, an, bi aa kede dhueeŋde.
Yen aye pɛlenɔm cin raan toŋ de bany ke pinye nɔm e ci e ŋic; tee cik ŋic, adi kenki Bɛnydiit e dhueeŋ piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu.
Ku acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Akeneke tiŋ e raan nyin, ku akeneke piŋ e raan yic, Ku akenki lɔ e raan piɔu, Ke ka cii Nhialic guik ne kede kɔc nhiaar en.
Ku wo cii Nhialic nyuoth keek ne Weikɛndit: Weidit ee kaŋ kɔɔr yiic kedhie, yeka, ayi kathuth ke Nhialic.
Ku ee raanou ŋic ka ke raan, ee piɔn e raan etok, piɔn cath ke ye? Yen acit en nɔn cin en raan ŋic ka ke Nhialic aya, ee Wei ke Nhialic kapac, kek aŋic keek.
Ku wok aa cii gɛme wei ke piny nɔm, ee wei e bɔ tede Nhialic kek aa gɛme wook, luɔi bi wo kaŋ ŋic ka cii Nhialic gam wook edhueeŋ.
Kek ayok ke guiir ne wel ci Weidit Ɣer wo wɛɛt, ku cuku keek e guiir ne wel ci wo wɛɛt e pɛl e raan nɔm; ka ke Wei ayok ke guiir ne wel ke Wei.
Ku raan e yepiɔu tuom ka ke piny acii ka ke Wei ke Nhialic e dɔm, aye keek tɔ ye kaɣar yiic; ku acii keek dueer ŋic, luɔi ye ke yok yiic ne Wei.
Ku raan e yepiɔu tuom ka ke Wei, yen aye kaŋ yok yiic kedhie, ku yenguop acin raan bi ye yokic.
Ku eeŋa e ŋic piɔn e Bɛnydit, bi en e wɛɛt? Ku wook, wok cath ne piɔn e Bɛnydit.
Ku yɛn, mithekɔckuɔ, yɛn aa cii dueer jam woke week waan, cit kɔc ci kepiɔth tuom ka ke Wei, yɛn aa ye jam wo week cit kɔc ci kepiɔth tuom ka ke guop tei, cit mith thiiatetet e Krithoyic.
We ca tɔ rueth e ca, ku acin riiŋ ca gam week; wek aa ken riŋ guɔ leu e cuet: ku acakaa enɔɔne, acaki e leu;
we ŋoot e we tum wepiɔth ka ke piny. Ku nɔn tɔuwe tiɛɛl e weyiic ayi ateer ayi teŋ aa wek weyiic tek, caki wepiɔth e tuom ka ke piny, ku caki e reer e reer e kɔc tei?
Ku ten e ŋɛk e lueel, yan, Yɛn ee kede Paulo, ku lueel ŋɛk, yan, Yɛn ee kede Apolo; caki e kɔc e kepiɔth tuom ka ke piny?
Paulo ee ŋa? ku Apolo ee ŋa? Ciki e kɔc e luui tei, kɔc ci we tɔ gam, cit man ci Bɛnydit e gam ŋɛk ku gɛm ŋɛk?
Yɛn e com, Apolo en aaye piook, ku ee Nhialic en aaye kaŋ tɔ cil.
Yen acin raan e com naamde, ku cin raan e piook naamde, ee Nhialic raan e kaŋ tɔ cil, yen ade nɔm.
Ku raan e com keke raan e piook ayek tok, ku raan ebɛn abi ariopde yok, ariop bi roŋ ke luɔide yenguop.
Wok ee kɔc e luui ne Nhialic etok: wek ee dom e Nhialic, ku yak alooc de Nhialic.
Luɔi luɔɔi ɛn ke ci taau e yacin ne dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu, yen aa kɛɛr ɛn keerkeer, cit man aten pelnɔm nu e ateet niim, ku ee raan daŋ yen a yik thin. Ku tɔ raan ebɛn cok e woi en yin yik en thin.
Ku keerkeer daŋ acin raan dueer e leu e kɛɛr, ee ke ye thok e kɛɛr etok, yen aye Yecu Kritho.
Ku na yik raan e keerkeere nɔm, ku yiŋ yik en e yenɔm, nɔn ee yen adhaap, ku nɔn ee yen ateek, nɔn ee yen kuur lak, nɔn ee yen tim, nɔn ee yen wal, nɔn ee yen anin;
ke luɔi de raan ebɛn abi tic wadaŋ: ekoole yen abi e nyuɔɔth, ee mac en abi e nyuɔɔth; ku luɔi de raan ebɛn abii mac them, nɔn ee yen luɔi cit ŋo.
Na dɔŋ ke e ŋɛk looi, ke ci yik e keerkeeric, ka bi ariopde yok.
Ku te ci ke ci ŋɛk looi nyop abi lɔ kuith piny, ka bi dak e kaŋ, ku yenguop abi kony wei; ku abi poth e poth e raan e kony e macic.
Kuocki wegup, nɔn aa wek luaŋdiit de Nhialic, ku nɔn reere Weidit ke Nhialic e weyiic?
Raan e luaŋditt e Nhialic tɔ nhiany, en abii Nhialic tɔ nhiany: luaŋdiit e Nhialic ee keɣeric, ku yen aye week.
Ne cin raan e ro math. Na de raan e weyiic raan e ro tɔ ye raan peinɔm e pinye nɔm, e ro tɔ ye dhɔn, luɔi bi en aa raan pelnɔm.
Pɛl e pinye nɔm ee dhɔɔn tede Nhialic, luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Aye kɔc pelniim dɔm ne rueenydenic:
ku aye bɛ gɔɔr, yan, Bɛnydit aŋic ka ye kɔc pelniim tak e kepiɔth, nɔn ee kek kaɣaar yiic.
Yen cin en raan e rot leec e kɔc. Kaŋ kedhie ayek kakun;
Paulo, ayi Apolo, ayi Kepath, ayi piny nɔm, ayi piir, ayi thuɔɔu, ayi ka nu enɔɔne, ayi ka bi bɛn; ayek kakun kedhie;
ku wek ee ka ke Kritho; ku Kritho ee kede Nhialic.
Tɔ lueel raan ne kede wook nɔn ee wok kɔc e ka ke Kritho looi, kɔc cii ka ke Nhialic taau e kecin, ka ci thiaan ɣɔn.
Ku enɔɔne, raan cii kaŋ taau e yecin, abi dhil aa raan adot.
Ku ne yɛn, ee kecin naamde nɔn ba wek a thieec ne ka ca looi, ku nɔn bi kɔc a thieec aya: yeka, ayik ɛn guop, yɛn cii rot e thieec.
Acin ke ŋiɛc rot; ku acie kene yen a tɔ yɛn e raan piɛthpiɔu: Raan e ya thieec, en aye Bɛnydit.

Yen cin en ke yak jɔɔny te ŋoot akooldit wei, te ŋoote Bɛnydit ke ken bɛn, raan bi ka ci thiaan tecol bɛɛi teɣer, ku bi looŋ ee lueel e kɔc piɔth tɔ tiec; ekoole yen abii raan ebɛn lɛc yok tede Nhialic.
Ku kake, wek mithekɔckuɔ, aca ke lueel ne kedi woke Apolo ne baŋdun week, luɔi ban week wɛɛt, an, Duoki kɔc e rieu awar ke ci gɔɔr, ku e cin raan e dit e ŋɛk tɛɛr, an, diit awar ŋɛk.
Eeŋa e yi tɔ tɔu pei? ku eeŋo cath ke yin ke kene gam yi? Ku na ci gam yin, ka eeŋo e yin ro leec, acit man e ke kene gam yin?
We e guɔ kuɛth etaiwei, wek juec e kakun enɔɔne, wek e piny cieŋ cit man e bany, ke wok liu thin: ku adi ya piɔu miɛt, tee we ceŋ piny eyin, ke wo dueer piny cieŋ ne week etok.
Ku ne yapiɔu, wo cii Nhialic taau cieen wok tuuc, cit man e kɔc ci gam thuɔɔu: wo ci tɔ ye ke bi aa woi e piny nɔm, bi tuucnhial aa woi, ayi kɔc.
Wok ee dhan ne baŋ de Kritho, ku wek ee kɔc pelniim e Krithoyic; wok kɔc gup, ku wek ril; wek de niim dhueeŋ, wok cin naamda.
Aɣet ci enɔɔne, wok ee cɔk nɔk ayi reu, ku cinku kɔɔth lupɔɔ, ku bieke wook e kɔc cin, wok e taai, wo cin niim wut;
wok ee cool e loi luɔi e wocin: lat wo, ke luelku, yan, Thieithieei; yɔŋ wo, ke gumku;
leke wo kerac, ke wo laŋ kɔc: wo ci tɔ ye nuoon e piny nɔm, ku tɔ wook e ayil e kaŋ kedhie aɣet ci ekoole.
Yɛn cii kake gaar luɔi ban we tɔ yaar, ku wek a nen cit man e mithkien nhiaar gup.
Ku na cak dɛ agum de kɔc kathieer nu, kɔc e week wɛɛt e ka ke Kritho, ku acin warkun juec nu: we ca dhieeth e Krithoyic ne guieer e welpiɛth.
Yen a yɔɔk ɛn week, yan, Yak taudi dɔmic.
Yen aa tuoc ɛn Timotheo week, ee wendien nhiaar ku ee raan adot e ka ke Bɛnydit, en abi week tɔ tak weniim ne tau aa yen tɔu e Krithoyic, acit man wɛɛt ɛn baai ebɛn e kanithɔyin ebɛn.
Ku kɔc kɔk e weyiic acik niim dham, ayek lueel, yan, ca bi bɛn tede week.
Ku yɛn bi dap bɛn tede week, te nu en e Bɛnydit piɔu, aguɔ riɛl e kɔcke ŋic, kɔc wen ci niim dham, acie jamden tei.
Ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic acie jam tei, ee riɛldit.
E wepiɔth wakdi? Ba bɛn tede week ke ya muk thieny duoi ɛn week, ku ba bɛn woke nhieer ku piɔn lir?
Aye lueel e raan ebɛn, an, nu dhoom e weyiic, ku dhoom yinya aliu acakaa Juoor yiic aliu, yan, bi raan tiiŋ de wun noom.
Ku we e niim dham, ku kɛnki dhiau, ke raan ci ekene looi bi jɔt e weyiic.
Ku yɛn, raan liu guop e weyiic, ku nu ne weike, yɛn ci loŋ de raan ci kene looi guɔ teem, cit man e kee nu,
yan, Ne rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, te ca wek gueer etok, week ne weiki, ku ne riɛldiit e Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho,
ke we bi eraane yien Catan le riɔɔk guop, ke bi kony wei ekool e Bɛnydit Yecu.
Lɛc aa wek rot leec acii piɛth. Kuocki luɔu thiinakaŋ nɔn ee yen awany dit tɔ piɔɔr ebɛn?
Yen waak wek luɔu thɛɛr wei, ke we bi aa awany e piɛc nuaai, cit man waan cien wek yiic luɔu. Nyɔŋdan amaal de Winythok ee guɔ nɔk ne baŋda, yen Kritho.
Yen ciɛm wok kuin e aliith, kuin cinic luɔu thɛɛr, ku cinic luɔu de anyaak, ku rɛɛcdepiɔu, yok cam e knin cinic luɔu knin e piɔn yic agɔk.
Aca gaar week waan e awarekic, yan, Duoki e mat ne dhoom etok;
ku akɛn lueel, yan, bak pɔk etaiwei weke dhoom ke pinye nɔm, ayi kɔc dit piɔth, ayi cuɛɛr, ayi kɔc e yieth lam; yen aduɛɛr wek dhil jal e piny nɔm.

Ku enɔɔne, aca gaar week, yan, Duoki e mat etok ne raan ci tɔ ye mɛnhkeneda, te ee yen dhom, ku nɔn ee yen raan dit piɔu, ku nɔn ee yen raan e yieth lam, ayi raan e kɔc laat, ayi raan e ro tɔ wit e mɔu, ayi cuɛɛr; raan cit ekene, acakaa kecam, ke we duoki rom ne yen.
Guieer e loŋ e kɔc tɔu biic eeŋodi thin? Cie kedun, an, bak loŋ de kɔc nu e kanithɔyic aa guiir?
Ku kɔc e tɔu biic loŋden abii Nhialic guiir. Jaki raan rɛɛce bɛɛi bei e weyiic.
Te de yen raan nu e weyiic raan de nɔm gɔny keke raan daŋ, dueer dhil lɔ gɔɔny e kɔc rac niim, ku cii lɔ gɔɔny e kɔc ɣerpiɔth niim?
Kuocki kɔc ɣerpiɔth nɔn bi kek loŋ de kɔc ke piny nɔm aa gulir? Ku te bi loŋ de kɔc ke piny nɔm aa guiir e week, caki dueer roŋ ne guieer ba wek looŋ thiiakaŋ aa guiir?
Kuocki nɔn hi wo loŋ de tuucnhial aa guiir? Ku na guieer e ka ke pinye nɔm enɔɔne, cii piɔl e kene aret?
Ku enɔɔne, te dɛ wek niim gɔɔny ne ka ke pinye enɔɔne, jaki kɔc taau e gɔɔny niim kɔc cin naamden e kanithɔyic.
Ee yaar ba wek yaar, en a luɛɛl ɛn ekene. Ye guop ka, cin raan toŋ pelnɔm e weyiic, raan dueer loŋ de raan keke mɛnhkene ŋiec guiir?
Ku enɔɔne, raan ee lɔ gɔɔny ke mɛnhkene, acakaa e kɔc reec gam niim.
Yen aya wek kedaŋ jɔ wooc alaldiite, ne goony aa wek rot gaany wapac. Eeŋo ca wek kerac e guum tei? Eeŋo ca wek rot e tɔ cam tei?
Ku we ye kɔc luoi kerac, ku yak kɔc cam, ayi kɔckun aya.

Kuocki kɔc racpiɔth nɔn cii kek ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic bi lɔɔk lak? Duoki rot e tɔ mɛthe: dhoom, ayi kɔc e yieth lam, ayi kɔc e dieer lei kɔɔr, ayi dieer e roor kɔɔr, ayi roor e rot tɔ ye diaar, ayi roor e nhi e roor,
ayi cuɛɛr, ayi kɔc e weu nhiaar, ayi kɔc e rot tɔ wit e mɔu, ayi kɔc e kɔc laat, ayi kɔc e kɔc rum, keek kedhie, aciki ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic bi lɔɔk lak.
Ku kɔc kɔk e weyiic aake ye kɔc cit keek: ku enɔɔne we ci waak, we ci tɔ ɣerpiɔth, we ci tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu, ku ne Weidit ke Nhialicda.
Kaŋ kedhie acike pal ɛn; ku kaŋ aciki e dɛ piathden kedhie; kaŋ kedhie acike pal ɛn, ku yɛn ci bi tuɛɛl e kedaŋ cok bi a cieŋ.
Kecam ee kede yac, ku yac ee kede kecam; ku Nhialic abi keek riɔɔk kedhie. Ku guop de raan acie kede dhoom, ee kede Bɛnydit, ku Bɛnydit ee kede raan guop.
Ku Nhialic e Bɛnydit jat nhial, ku abi wo jat nhial aya ne riɛldiit e yencin.
Kuocki wegup, nɔn ee kek ka ke Kritho? Ku ba ka ke Kritho noom, ta keek e ka ke akɔɔrroor? Ei! Acii bi aa yen!
Kuocki ecooke, yan, Raan e mat keke akɔɔrroor, ke ye guop tok keke ycn etok? Aa lueel, yan, Keek kaarou abik aa guop tok.
Ku raan ci mat keke Bɛnydit kek aye wei tok.
Yak kat ne dhoom. Kerɛɛc ebɛn ken ee raan looi anu e raan guop biic; ku raan dhom ee guopde luoi kerac.
Ku kuocki guopdun nɔn ee yen luaŋditt e Weidit Ɣer nu e weyiic, Wei cak yok tede Nhialic, ku wek cie cath e naamdun?
We ci ɣɔɔc e ɣooc tuc: yen aa wek Nhialic tɔ yok dhueeŋ ne guopdunic ayi weikun yiic, kek ka ke Nhialic ka.
Ku ne kede ka cak gaar ɛn; yan, Apiɛth tede moc te cii en tik jak.
Ku ne biak de bal, e moc ebɛn e ye dɛ tiiŋ de yenguop, ku e tik ebɛn e ye dɛ mony de yenguop.
Ku moc e ye tiiŋde luooi apiɛth; ku ye tik monyde luooi apiɛth aya.
Tik acin nɔm riɛl e yeguop, ee moc en a de nɔm riɛl: ayi moc aya, acin nɔm riɛl e yeguop, ee tik en a de nɔm riɛl.
E ŋɛk cii rot e pɛn ŋɛk, e rom ba wek thook rɔm tei bak rot pɔl e akoolke, ke we bi cok e laŋ laŋ wek Nhialic, ku jaki rot bɛ mat etok, ke we cii Catan bi them, ne kuny kuoc wek rot muk.
Ku kene a luɛɛl ne pal e pɛle yɛn luɛɛl, acin iiem ci yien ɛn. E yapiɔu tei adi tɔu kɔc kedhie cit man e yɛn.
Ku raan ebɛn acath ke ke ci Nhialic gam en, ŋɛk ke kede, ku ŋɛk ke kede.
Ku yɛn yook kɔc ken thieek, ayi dieer cin niim roor, yan, Apiɛth tede keek te reer kek cit man e yɛn.
Ku na dhɛl keek ne muŋ bi ke rot muk, e ke thiek: thieek aŋuan ne luɔi bi ŋɔɔŋ ke nɔk.
Ku kɔc ci thieek kek a yɔɔk, ku acie yɛn, ee Bɛnydit en a yook keek, yan, E tik cii pɔk keke monyde,
(ku te pɔk kek, tɔ rɛɛr ke cin nɔm moc, ku na cin piɔu ekene, ke tɔ mat keke monyde); ku moc, e cii tiiŋde ciec.
Ku kɔc kɔk kek a yɔɔk, acie Bɛnydit, ee yɛn e yook keek: yan, Na de mɛnkheneda, raan de nɔm tiiŋ ken gam, ku tik agam reer keke yen, ke du tɔ cieec.
Ayi tiiŋ de monydɛn ken gam, ku gɛm reer keke yen, ke du tɔ jel e yelɔɔm.
Mony ken gam aye tɔ ɣeric ne tik, ku tiiŋ ken gam aye tɔ ɣeric ne moc: tee cie yen, ke niithkun adi kenki yiic ɣɛɛr; ku acik yiic ɣɛɛr enɔɔne.
Ku raan ken gam, te jel en, ke lɔ: na loi yen aya, ke raan ci gam, nɔn ee yen moc ku nɔn ee yen tik, acin ke ci e mac, cit man e lim: ku Nhialic aci wo cɔɔl ne kede mat.
Ku ŋic wudi, yin tik, nɔn bi yin monydu kony? ayi yin, yin moc, ŋic wudi nɔn bi yin tiiŋdu kony?
E ŋek e reer tei, cit man ci Nhialic kaŋ tɛk raan ebɛn, ku cit cɔt ci Bɛnydit raan cɔɔl ebɛn. Ku yen a yɔɔk ɛn kɔc e kanithɔɔ yiic ebɛn.
De raan ci cɔɔl ke ye aŋuɛl? E cii ro tɔ ye raan cie aŋuɛl. Ee raan ci cɔɔl ke cie aŋuɛl? E cii ro tɔ ye aŋuɛl.
Cuɛl acin naamde, ku luɔi kene raan cueel acin nɔm; ee muŋ e raan looŋ ke Nhialic muk, en ade naamde.
E raan ebɛn e tɔu e taudɛn e tɔu en te waan cɔɔle ye.
E yi cɔl, ke yi e lim? du diɛɛr e yipiɔu: ku na de ten, an, lony yi, ke yi tɔ ro lony tei.
Ku raan ci cɔɔl e Bɛnyditic, ke ye lim, yen aye raanden e Bɛnydit raan e cath e kede yenhde: ayi raan ci cɔɔl ke ye raan e cath e kede yenhde, yen aye lim de Kritho.
We ci ɣɔɔc e ɣooc tuc; duoki rot bi tɔ ye liim ke kɔc.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, e ŋek e tɔu keke Nhialic e taudɛn e yen tɔu te waan cɔɔle ye.
Ku na kede dhueec, acin liem cii Bɛnydit yien ɛn: ku loŋdi yen a luɛɛl tei, ke ya ye raan ci kokepiɔu yok tede Bɛnydit, ban aa raan adot.
Aluɛɛl e yapiɔu, ne baŋ de riaak de piny enɔɔne, yan, Apiɛth tede raan te tɔu en aya.
Ci yi duoot e tik kɔu? Du luny e kɔɔr. Ci yi lony e tik kɔu? Du tik e kɔɔr.
Ku te thieek yin, acin ke ci wooc; ayi dhuec, te thiɛɛke ye, acin ke ci wooc. Ku kɔcke abik ke dhal keek yok e kegup: ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi pal ɛn week.
Ku aluɛɛl aleyɔɔ, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Piny athiɔk, ku e akool ci doŋ, ke kɔc de dieerken e ke tɔu cit man e ka cin niim diaar;
ayi kɔc e dhiau, e ke tɔu cit man e ka cii dhiau; ayi kɔc e piɔth miɛt, ne ke tɔu cit man e ka cii piɔth mit; ayi kɔc e ɣooc, cit man e ka cin niim kaŋ;
ayi kɔc e ka ke pinye nɔm looi, e ke ye kaŋ looi ku ciki kepiɔth tum keek: tau de piny nɔm enɔɔne akɔɔr luɔi bi en jal.
Ku yɛn de piɔu nɔn ba we tɔu ke we cie diɛɛr. Raan ken thieek ee diɛɛr e ka ke Bɛnydit, luɔi bi en Bɛnydit tɔ mit piɔu:
ku raan ci thieek ee diɛɛr e ka ke piny nɔm, luɔi bi en tiiŋde tɔ mit piɔu.
Ayi tik ku dhuec acik keyiic tek. Nyan kene thiaak ee diɛɛr e ka ke Bɛnydit, luɔi bi en yic ɣɛɛr ayi yepiɔu ayi weike: ku nyan ci thiaak ee diɛɛr e ka ke piny nɔm, luɔi bi en monyde tɔ mit piɔu.
Ku kene aluɛɛl ne kede piathdun; acie pɛn pɛn ɛn week kaŋ, ee kepiɛth en kaar, ke we bi Bɛnydit aa luooi apiɛth, ke cin ke bi week gɔɔu.
Ku na de raan luel en, yan, ci nyan bi thiaak wac kedaŋ, ne nyɔk ci en nyɔk, ku na ŋuan thieek, ke tɔ loi ke nu e yepiɔu; acin ke ci wooc; tɔ ke thiak rot.
Ku raan e piɔnde kɔɔc aril, acin ke dhal en, ku ee raan e ro ŋiec muk, ku ci loŋ teem e yepiɔu, yan, bi nyan bi thiaak tɔu aya, yen aye kepiɛth looi.
Yen aye tede, raan e tiiŋde thiaak aci kepiɛth looi; ku raan cii thiek, ka ci kepiɛth looi aret.
Tik aye mac e loŋ anande te piire monyde; ku te thouwe monyde, ka ci lony, adueere raan thiaak raan nu e yepiɔu, te ee yen raan ci Bɛnydit gam tei.
Ku ne loŋdi, te tɔu en aya, yen adueer en athiɛɛi dit yok: ku aluɛɛl, yan, cuk piɔth rɔm woke Wei ke Nhialic aya.
Ku ne kede ka ci lam yieth; Aŋicku wook wodhie nɔn de wo ŋinydekaŋ. Ku ŋinydekaŋ ee raan ro tɔ dit youyou, ku nhieer en aye raan kueet.
Ku te lueele raan en, yan, ŋic kaŋ, ke ŋoot ke kuc kaŋ ke cit ke bi dhil ŋic.
Ku te nhiɛɛre raan Nhialic, yen aye ŋic e yen.
Ku ne kede cam de ka ci lam yieth, yath aŋicku nɔn cin en naamde e piny nɔm, ku aŋicku nɔn cin en Nhialic daŋ ee tok tei.
Ku na ciɛk dɛ ka ci tɔ ye Nhialic, nɔn ee yen tenhial ku nɔn ee yen e piny nɔm; cit man nu yieth juec, ku nu bany juec;
ku tede wook ade Nhialic tok tei, yen Waada, Raan e bi kaŋ kedhie e ye, ku tɔuku ne yen; ku Bɛnydit tok, yen Yecu Kritho, raan tɔuwe kaŋ kedhie e ye, ku tɔuku ne yen.
Ku ŋiny de ekene acii nu tede kɔc kedhie: kɔc kɔk arieuki yieth e kepiɔth, goki kedaŋ aa cam aɣet ci enɔɔne, ku tɔki e ke ci nak yath, ago piɔnden rac ne kɔc kɔɔc en.
Ku kecam acii wo dueer tɔ piɛth e Nhialic nɔm: acakaa te ye wok cam, acin kepiɛth yok yok, ku acakaa te cii wok e cam, acin ke dak e wook.
Yak rot tiit, duoki riɛlduone tɔ ye ke bi kɔc kɔc tɔ wac kaŋ.
Ku te tiŋe raan yin, yin raan de ŋinydekaŋ, ke yi nyuc e kecam nɔm luaŋ de yath, cii piɔn e raan kɔc bi ŋeeny ago ka ci nak yieth aa cam?
Ku ne ŋinyduon e kaŋ, bi mɛnhkui kɔc maar, mɛnh ci Kritho thou ne baŋde?
Ku te luoi wek mithekɔckuɔ kerac aya, ku jɔki piɔndɛn kɔc yinkic kerac, ke Kritho en a luoiki kerac ayadaŋ.
Yen na ye riŋ mɛnhkai tɔ wac kaŋ, ka cin riiŋ ba ya cam anandi, ke ya cii mɛnhkai bi aa tɔ wac kaŋ.
Ca ye tuc? Ca ye cath e kede yenhdi? Kɛn Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda tiŋ? Week, caki e luɔidi e Bɛnyditic?
Acakaa yɛn e cie tuc tede kɔc kɔk, ku tede week yɛn dhil aa tuc: ke e ŋice yen nɔn aa yɛn tuc ee tau tau wek e Bɛnyditic.
Beer ban e pɔk nɔm kɔc thiec ɛn, ki,
yan, Cuku niim de riɛl bi wok cam ku dek wok?
Cuku niim de riɛl bi wok cath ne tik, nyankeneda, acit man e tuuc kɔk aya, ayi wɛɛtamathken e Bɛnydit, ayi Kepath?
Ku wo wapac, wook woke Baranaba, cuku niim de riɛl bi wo luɔi pɔl?
Alathkerou e lɔ tɔŋ, ku jɔ aa cam e weu ke yenguop? Eeŋa e dom com e tiim, ku cie e cam e ka ci luɔk? ku eeŋa ye thok tiit, ku cie cam e cɛk ke thok?
Luɛɛl kake cit man e raan tei? ku cii loŋ kake lueel ayadaŋ?
Aci gɔɔr e loŋ de Mothe, yan, Du miɔɔr e kum thok, te ciɛth en e rap yiic ke ke kɔɔm. Ee mioor kek ee Nhialic diɛɛr?
Ku cie baŋda wook en e lueel en en? Yeka, ee baŋda wook en aa gɛɛre ye: ke raan pur ke bi pur e aŋɔth ŋɛɛth en kaŋ, ayi raan kɔm, ke ŋath kaŋ, ka bi kedɛn e ŋɛɛth yok.
Te ci wok ka ke wei cuom week, duɛɛrki tɔ ye kedit, te tem wok kakuon e piny nɔm?
Na cath kɔc kɔk ne riel bik we cieŋ aya, ke wook, cuku ke war? Ku riɛle aacuke ye kɔɔr; wok ee kerieec guum, ke wo cii welpiɛth ke Kritho bi aa pɛn cathden.
Kuocki kɔc e ka ke luaŋdiit e looi, nɔn ciem kek e ka ke luaŋdiit? Ayi kɔc e kede yiŋ ee lam looi, kuocki nɔn ee kek ka ke yin ee lam rɔm?
Yen acit luɛl ci Bɛnydit e lueel, yan, bi kɔc e welpiɛth guiir aa piir e welpiɛth.
Ku yɛn, yɛn ken kake kɔɔr anandi: ku yɛn ken kake gɔɔr e luɔi bi e luoi yɛn aya: luɔi ban thou en aŋuan ne luɔi bi raan lɛc lɛc ɛn rot tɔ ye ɣɔric.
Na ya cak welpiɛth aa guiir, ke yɛn cin nɔm ke ban ro leec; yɛn ci mac thok, an, ba welpiɛth dhil aa guiir; yeka, amawoou ne yɛn, te can welpiɛth e guiir.
Ku te luɔɔi ɛn ekene ne piɔn mit, ke yɛn cath wo ariopdi: ku na luɔɔi ɛn en ke ya diu piɔu, ke yɛn ci gam thon ba dot thon e welpiɛth.
Ariopdi jɔ aa ŋo? Ariopdi ki, yan, Ten aa yɛn welpiɛth guiir, ke yɛn bi welpiɛth ke Kritho aa guiir youyou tei, ke yɛn cii bɛɛnydi bi kuoc muk, bɛɛny ci gam ɛn e welpiɛth yiic.
Acakaa yɛn e cath e kede yenhdi e kɔc yiic kedhie, ke yɛn ci ro tɔ ye lim de kɔc kedhie, luɔi ban kɔc juec dɔm.
Tede Judai yɛn ci ro tɔ ye Judai, luɔi ban Judai dɔm: ku tede kɔc rɛɛr e loŋic, aguɔ ro tɔ ye raan rɛɛr e loŋic, luɔi ban kɔc rɛɛr e loŋic dɔm;
tede kɔc cin loŋ, yɛn ci ro tɔ ye raan cit ke cin loŋ, luɔi ban kɔc cin loŋ dɔm, ku yɛn cii tɔu ke ya cin loŋ tede Nhialic, yɛn nu e loŋic tede Kritho.
Tede kɔc kɔc, yɛn e ci ciet raan kɔc, luɔi ban kɔc kɔc dɔm: yɛn ci ro tɔ ye kaŋ kedhie tede kɔc kedhie, luɔi ban kɔc kɔk kony ne kerieec ca looi.
Ku yɛn ee kene looi ne baŋ de welpiɛth, ke yɛn bi dɛ kedi thin.
Ku na kɔc e woor, kuocki keek nɔn wɛɛr kek kedhie, ku raan tok tei en aye miɔɔc e kedaŋ? Yen aa wek woor wakya, ke we bi miɔɔc.
Ku raan ebɛn raan e ro riit e luɔi bi en kɔc woor ee ro ŋiec muk e kerieec ebɛn. Ku kek aye luui aya ke ke bi gol bi riaak yok; ku wo bi gol cii bi riaak yok.
Yen aya yɛn riŋ aya, ku acii cit ke cin naamde; ku yɛn ee biok aya, ku aci cit nɔn aa yɛn peeric biɔɔk tei:
ku yɛn ee yaguop dui, ku ta ye limdi, ke ya cii bi cuat wei, ya ka ye raan e ci wel kɔn guieer kɔc kɔke.
Ku enɔɔne, mithekɔckuɔ, yɛn kɔɔr luɔi ba wek cooke ŋic, yan, Kuarkuɔ aake nu e luat thar kedhie, ku acik abapdit teem kedhie;
ku acike baptith kedhie ne kede Mothe e luatic ku abapditic;
Ku aake ye cam e kecam toŋe kecam de wei;
ku aake ye dek e piu toŋe piu ke wei: kuur e weiye kuur e ke kuany cok yen aa ye kek dek e ye: ku kuure yen aye Kritho.
Ku tedit e keek Nhialic aa cii piɔu mii ke keek: ku acik bɛn riaar e jɔɔric.
Ku kake acike tɔ ye ka bi wo wɛɛt, ke wo cii bi aa kɔc ci ŋɔɔŋ de karac dɔm, cit man ɣɔn dɔme ŋɔɔŋ keek.
Ku duoki rot tɔ ye kɔc e yinth lam aya, cit man e kɔc kɔk e keek; acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Kɔc ayek nyuc ciemki ku dekki, na ele, ke ke jɔt rot, lek thueec.
Ku duku diaar e kɔɔr, cit man ee kɔc kɔk e keyiic diaar kɔɔr, ago agum de kɔc kathierou ku diak wiik ekool tok.
Ku duku Kritho them aya, cit man ci kɔc kɔk e keyiic e them, ago karac ke nɔk.
Ku duoki e dok e weyac aya, acit man ci kɔc kɔk e keyiic dok, agoke nɔk e ke ye kɔc nɔk.
Ku enɔɔne, kake kedhie aake yok keek, abik aa ka bi wo wɛɛt, ku cike gɔɔr ne nen bi wo nen, wok kɔc ci thok de piny guɔ ɣeet tede wook.
Yen na de raan ŋic rot nɔn kɛɛc en apiɛth, ke ye rot tiit ke cii bi wiik.

Acin them ci we them pei, ee yen e them toŋ e jaŋ ebɛn. Ku Nhialic ee piɔu adot, acii we bi pɔl a them e them caki dueer leu e guom, ku abi kueer looi keke them etok, kueer duɛɛr wek ban thin, luɔi ba wek e leu ne guom.
Yen aa wek kat e lam de yieth, wek kɔckien nhiaar.
Yɛn jam cit man e ke jam woke kɔc pelniim; yak thɔɔŋ e wepiɔth en ke luɛɛl.
Biny de athiɛɛi, biny yok thieei, cie man mɛt wok ne riɛm de Kritho? Knin ci pam kuin yok waakic, ci en e man mɛt wok ne guop de Kritho?
Ku wook, acakaa wok e juec, wok ee kuin tok, ku yok guop tok: ne rom e wok knin toŋe rɔm wodhie.
Wɔiki ciɛɛŋ de Yithrael, ciɛɛŋdɛn e lam: kɔc e cam ne ka ci lam Nhialic ciki e kɔc rɔm yiŋ de lam etok?
Eeŋo daŋ ba lueel? Yath de naamde? Ayi ke ci gam yath, lam, de naamde ayadaŋ?
Ku ya lueel, yan, Ka ye Juoor that, ee jɔɔk rac ke yek that, ku acie Nhialic yen yek that: ku yɛn cin piɔu luɔi ba wek aa kɔc mat ne jɔɔk rac etok.
We cii dek bi leu ne biny de Bɛnydit keke biny de jɔɔk rac etok: we cii dueer rɔm etok e pam ee kɔc cam, pam e Nhialic keke pam e jɔɔk rac.
Yok Bɛnydit tɔ dɔm tiɛɛl enɔɔne? Rilku awarku yen?
Kaŋ kedhie acike pal ɛn; ku kaŋ aciki de piathden kedhie; kaŋ acike pal ɛn kedhie, ku kaŋ aciki kɔc e kueet kedhie.
E cin raan e piathde kɔɔr etok, e ŋɛk e piath de ŋɛk kɔɔr.
Ka ci ɣaac e thuukic kedhie abak ke cam, acin ke bak luɔp ne biak de ke ci raan yok e yepiɔu;
ne ke ye piny kede Bɛnydit, ayi ka ye piny thiɔɔŋ, ee kake ayadaŋ.
Ku na de raan cɔl week e kede cam, ku ye raan toŋ de kɔc ken gam, ku dɛki piɔth lɔ, ka ci taau e weniim jaki ke cam kedhie, ku duoki kaŋ e luɔp ne biak de jam bi raan yok e yepiɔu.

Ku na de raan leke week, yan, Kene aa nɛke yath, ke we duoki cam e ye, ne biak de raan e nyuth e week, ku ne biak de jam bii raan yok e yepiɔu: ne ke ye piny kede Benydit, ayi ka ye piny thiɔɔŋ, ee kake ayadaŋ:
ku aci e biak de jam ba yok e yipiɔu yen luɛɛl, ee biak de jam bi raan daŋ yok e yepiɔu. Ku eeŋo dueere ya thieec ne ke luɔɔi ne yenhdi ne jam ci raan daŋ yok e yepiɔu?
Te can thieithieei lueel te cam an, eeŋo leke ya kerac, ne ke can thieithieei lueel ne ye?
Yen na yak cam, ku yak dek, ayi te de yen ke bak aa looi, yak kaŋ looi kedhie ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok.
Yak tɔu ke we cii kɔc e tɔ wac kaŋ, ayi Judai, ayi Giriki, ayi kanithɔ de Nhialic:
acit man e yɛn, yɛn ee kɔc tɔ mit piɔth ne kerieec ebɛn, yɛn cii piathdi e kɔɔr, ee piath de kɔc juec en aa ya kɔɔr, luɔi bi ke kony wei.
Yak taudi dɔmic, cit man aa yɛn taau de Kritho dɔmic aya.
Enɔɔne, wek mithekɔckuɔ, wek lɛɛc nɔn aa wek a tak e kerieec ebɛn, ku nɔn aa wek jam ci yinn week dot, acit man can e gam week.
Ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi ba wek e ŋic, nɔn ee yen Kritho yen ee nɔm de moc ebɛn; ku nɔm de tik yen aye moc; ku nɔm de Kritho yen aye Nhialic.
Moc ebɛn, te lɛŋ en ayi te guiir en wel, ke kuom nɔm, ka ye yenɔm tɔ yaar.
Ku tik ebɛn, te lɛŋ en ayi te guiir en wel, ke cii nɔm kuom, ka ye yenɔm tɔ yaar: yen akit keke ke ci muut nɔm.
Ku tik, te cii en nɔm kuom, tɔ tem nɔm aya: ku te ee yen ayaar tede tik te teme yenɔm ayi te muute yenɔm, ke tɔ kuom nɔm.
Acii piɛth eyic tede moc te kum en enɔm, luɔi cit en Nhialic ne taude ku ye dhueeŋde: ku tik yen aye dhueeŋ de moc.
Moc aa cii bɔ ne tik: tik en aa bɔ ne moc.
Ku moc ayadaŋ aa cii cak ne biak de tik, tik en aa cak ne biak de moc.
Yen a dueere tik dhil dɛ kedaŋ e yenɔm, ke bi riɛl cath ke monyde nyuɔɔth, ne biak de tuucnhial.
Ku moc acie reer te cin tik, ayi tik acie reer te cin moc, e Benyditic.
Ku acit man e bi tik ne moc, ayi moc aya abɔ ne tik, ku bɔ kaŋ kedhie tede Nhialic.
Thɔɔŋki wapac: piɛth tede tik te lɛŋ en Nhialic ke cii nɔm kuom?
Acakaa piny guop ken week wɛɛt, nɔn ee yen ayaar tede moc, te ciɛth en ke nhim bar?
Ku tik te ciɛth en ke nhim bar, ka ye dhueeŋ tede yen: nhim bar acike gam en ne kum bi en ro kum.
Ku na de raan kɔɔr teer, ke wo cin ciɛɛŋ cit ekene, acakaa kanithɔɔ ke Nhialic ayadaŋ, aliu tede keek.
Ku ne cooke cook ba lɛk week enɔɔne, we ca lec; Enɔn e ya wek gueer, acie piathdun, ee rac en aya wek gueer.
Cook tueŋ, Enɔn e ya wek gueer e kanithɔyic, aca piŋ nɔn aa wek weyiic tek; ku aca gam e biak tok.
Teŋ ee kɔc keyiic tek abi dhil nu e weyiic, ke kɔc ci tɔ ye kɔc piɛth ke ke bi tic egɔk e weyiic.
Enɔn e ya wek gueer tetoŋe, acie cam ba wek kecam theen e Bɛnydit aa cam en aya wek gueer:
raan ebɛn ee kecam de yenguop noom ku ciɛm; ku ŋɛk aci cɔk nɔk, ku wit ŋɛk e mɔu.
Ee kaŋo? Cin ɣootkuon nu, ɣoot ba wek aa cam thin, ku dɛkki? ku yak kanithɔ de Nhialic biɔɔn, ku yak kɔc cin kaken yɔɔr? Ba week lɛk ŋo? ba week lɛc niim ne baŋ de kene? we ca lec niim.
Ku yɛn e loŋ yok tede Bɛnydit, loŋ ca gam week aya, yan, Bɛnydit Yecu, wɛɛrwakɔu bi e nyiɛɛn thine, ke nom kuin ci pam;
ku te ci en thieithieei lueel, ke wɛkic, lueel, yan, Ŋaki, camki; kene ee guopdien ci dhuooŋ ne baŋdun: yak kene looi ne taŋ ba wek ɛn aa tak.
Ku yen e nɔm noom en biny aya, te ci kɔc thok e cam, ku lueel, yan, Binye ee loŋ ci piac mac e riɛmdiyic: yak kene looi, te de yen te dɛk wek e ye, ne taŋ ba wek ɛn aa tak.
Ku te de yen te cam wek e kuine ku dɛkki e binye, ke thon e Bɛnydit en nyuɔɔthki aɣet te bi en bɛn.
Yen raan ebɛn raan e kuine kuoc cam, ku kuc dek e biny e Bɛnydiite, ka ye yeyeth dɛɛr guop de Bɛnydit ayi riɛmde.
E raan kɔn rot thieec, ku bi jɔ cam e kuine, ku dek e binye.
Ku raan e kuoc cam ku kuc dek, ka ye ro cam jany bi e jɔɔny ku dek rot jany, ne kuny kuc en guop de Bɛnydit nɔn nu yen thin.
Yen aye kɔc juec e weyiic gup kɔc, ku cin ke riɛl, ku ci kɔc juec thou.
Ku tee wo ye rot ŋiec jɔɔny, adi cii wo ye jɔɔny.
Ku te jeenye wo, ke wok ee Nhialic wɛɛt cit man e mithke, ke wo cii bi yiek yieth gaak ne kɔc ke piny nɔm etok.
Yen aye tede, wek mithekɔckuɔ, te ya wek gueer bak bɛn cam, ke we e rot tiit.
Ku na de raan ci cɔk nɔk, ke cam paanden, ke we cii bi jɔɔny e gueerduon e ya wek gueer. Ku cok kɔk aba ke bɛn guiir apiɛth miak can bɛn.
Jam de ka ke Wei, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yɛn cin piɔu luɔi ba wek e kuc.
Aŋiɛcki nɔn ee ya wek Juoor ɣɔn, kɔc e ci thɛl roor e yieth cok, yieth cin kethook te ye jam, acit man ee we cool e thele we.
En a ta yɛn we ŋic ecooke, yen, Acin raan jam ke cath ke Weidit ke Nhialic raan bi e lueel, yan, Yecu ade guop aciɛɛn; ku acin raan dueer e lueel, yan, Yecu ee Bɛnydit, te cii en cath ke Weidit Ɣer.
Ku miɔc akithic, ku Weidit ee tok.
Ku luɔi ee kɔc kɔc kony akithic, ku Bɛnydit ee tok.
Ku luɔi ee kɔc looi akithic, ku yen Nhialic toŋ mane yen e kerieec looi ebɛn e kɔc yiic kedhie.
Ku tic ee Weidit tic aye gam raan ebɛn, luɔi bi kek kepiɛth aa yok thin.
Ŋɛk aye Weidit miɔɔc ne jam e pɛlenɔm; ku miɔc ŋɛk ne jam de ŋinydekaŋ, ne Wei mane gup.
Ku miɔc ŋɛk ne gam, ne Wei mane gup; ŋɛk aye miɔɔc e riɛl bi en kɔc tok tɔ dem, ne Wei mane gup;
ŋɛk aye miɔɔc e ke bi en luɔi ril aa looi; ku miɔc ŋɛk e guieer bi en wel ŋiec aa guiir; ku ŋɛk ne pɛɛk dueer en wei paak; ku ŋek ne jam e thoŋ kithic; ku ŋɛk ne ŋiny bi en thok aa puk yiic:
ku kake kedhie aye Weidit toŋ mane ke looi, ago raan ebɛn tɛk kaŋ, ŋɛk ke kede pei, ku ŋɛk ke kede pei, acit man nu en e yepiɔu.
Acit man ee guop de raan tok, ku ka nu thin ajuecki, ku ka nu e guop toŋeyic, na cakaa ke ke juec, kek aye guop tok tei; yen acit Kritho aya.
Wook wodhie, wo ci baptith e guop tokic ne Weidit toŋe, nɔn ee wok Judai, ku nɔn ee wok Girikii, nɔn ee wok liim, ku nɔn ee wok kɔc e cath e kede yenhden; ku wo ci tɔ dek ne Weidit toŋe wodhie.
Ku raan guop acii yic de tok, adeyic ka juec.
Te lueele cook de raan en, yan, Luɔi can e cin, ke yɛn cie ke de guop: yen cie ke de guop?
Ku yic, te lueel en en, yan, Luɔi can e nyin, ke yɛn cie ke de guop; yen cii en e ke de guop?
Raan guop ebɛn, te ee yen nyin etok, ke piŋ bi raan kaŋ aa piŋ adi nu nou? Ku raan guop ebɛn, te ee yen piŋ tei, ke ke bi raan aa ŋor adi nu nou?
Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic aci kaŋ taau e raan guop kedhie, acit nɔn nu yen e yepiɔu.
Ku te ee yen ke toŋe tei, ke raan guop adi nu nou?
Ku enɔɔne, ka nu e guopic acik juec, ku guop ee tok tei.
Ku nyin acii cin dueer yɔɔk, yan, Yin ca kɔɔr: ayi nɔm, acii cok dueer yɔɔk, yan, We ca kɔɔr.
Acie yen, ku ka nu e raan guop ka yok tɔ ye ka kɔc, keek adhilki nu alaldit:
ku ka yok tɔ ye ka cin dhueeŋ, kek ka nu e wogup, kake ayok ke gam dhueeŋ awarki kɔk; ago ka nu e wogup, ka cin lakden, agoki dɛ piathden abik kɔk woor.
Ku ka ke wogup ka ci lakelak acin te dak e ke: ku Nhialic aci guop matic ebɛn, ago baŋ dɛk e kaŋ go jɔ ŋuak e dhueeŋ;
ke ater cii bi nu e guopic, ku bi ka nu e guopic rot tak akit kapac.
Ku te tooke ke toŋ e raan guop, ke ka ke guop kedhie ke ke jɔ took ne yen etok; ku te bi ke tok e raan guop gam dhueeŋ, ke ka ke guop kedhie ke ke jɔ piɔth miɛt ne yen etok.
Ku wek ee guop de Kritho; ku yak ka nu e guopdeyic, ŋɛk ee ke toŋe ku ŋɛk ee ke toŋe.

Ku Nhialic aye kɔc kɔk taau e kanithɔyic, kɔc tueŋ kek aye tuuc, kɔc lɔ e kecok, kek aye kɔc e wel guiir, ku lɔ kɔc e weet, ku lɔ luɔi ril, ku riɛl bi kɔc aa tɔ dem, ku kuny konye kɔc rot, ku ciɛɛŋ, ku thook mɛɛn pei.
Yek tuuc kedhie? yek kɔc e wel guiir kedhie? yek kɔc e weet kedhie? cath kɔc ne luɔi ril kedhie?
Ŋicki kɔc tok tɔ waar kedhie? yek jam e thook mɛɛn kedhie? ŋicki thok puk kedhie?
Jaki ka dit e piathden aa kɔɔr, ka bi gam week. Ku wek a nyuoth kueer enɔɔne kueer piɛth alal awar kerieec.
Na ya cak jam woke liep ke kɔc ayi tuucnhial, ku cien nhieer, ke yɛn ci ciet malaŋ kok, ku ciet alogor ci tɔɔŋ.
Ku na ya cak wel ŋiec guiir, ku ŋiɛc ka ci thiaan kedhie, ku dɛ ŋiny de kaŋ kedhie; ku na ya cak dɛ gam ebɛn, gam duɛɛr ɛn kurdit tɔ nyai teden, ku cien nhieer, ke yɛn cin nɔm kedaŋ.
Ku na ya cak kɔc miɔc e kaki kedhie, bi kek kecam yok, ku na ya cak guopdi gaam, an, bi nyop e mac, ku cien nhieer, acin piath ba yok tede ye.
Nhieer ee kaŋ guum anande, ku apiɛth piɔu; nhieer acinic tiɛɛl; nhieer acii rot e leec, acii rot e tɔ dit,
acii ke cii piɛth e looi, acii ka ke yenguop e kɔɔr, acie dap gɔth, acin kerɛɛc ee tak;
acie piɔu miɛt keke luɔi de kerac, ee piɔu miɛt keke yin;
Ee kerieec guum, ee kerieec gam, ee kerieec ŋɔɔth, ee yepiɔu ruut e kerieec.
Nhieer acie dak anande: ku na de guieer e wel nu, ka bi aa cien naamde; ku na de liep nu, ka bik jɔ kɔɔc; ku na de ŋinydekaŋ nu, ka bi aa cien naamde.
Enɔɔne wo ŋic kaŋ e biak tei, ku yok wel guiir e biak tei:
ku te ci ke lɔ wop bɛn, ke ke nu e biak tei abi tɔ cin naamde.
Ɣɔn aa yɛn meth, yɛn ee jam cit man e meth, ku yɛn ee kaŋ piŋ cit man e meth, ku yɛn ee kaŋ tak cit man e meth: ku enɔn can aa raan dit, ke ka ke mɛɛth aca ke pɔl.
Ku enɔɔne, wok ee daai emormor, cit man e raan e daai acidhathic; ku rial, wo bi aa daai wo tuum wonyiin: enɔɔne yɛn ŋic kaŋ e biak tci; ku rial yɛn bi kaŋ ŋic cit man ci a ŋic.
Ku enɔɔne adɔŋ gam, ku aŋɔth, ku nhieer, kake kadiak; ku ke diit e kake yiic ee nhieer.
Cuɔpki nhieer cok, ku kaarki ka ke Wei aret, ku ke ŋuan e keek ee guieer ba wek wel ŋiec guiir.
Raan e jam e thoŋ mɛɛn acie jam ke kɔc, ee jam ke Nhialic; acin raan e kede piŋ; ku ee jam ne ka ci thiaan e weike yiic.
Ku raan e wel guiir ee guiir ke kɔc e ke bi kueet, ku bi ke riit piɔth, ku luk ke piɔth.
Raan e jam e thoŋ mɛɛn ee ro kueet etok; ku raan e wel guiir ee kanithɔ kueet.

Ku yɛn dueer piɔu miɛt te ya wek jam e thok mɛɛn wedhie, ku luɔi ba wek wel aa guiir yen anu e yapiɔu aret: ku raan e wel guiir yen adit awar raan e jam e thok mɛɛn, te ken en jam puk, ke kanithɔ abi kueet.

Ku enɔɔne, wek mithekɔckuɔ, te ba yɛn tede week, ke ya jam e thok mɛɛn, ee kepiɛthou ba yien week, te kɛn ɛn jam wo week ne ke ci nyuoth ɛn, ayi ne ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn kaŋ, ayi ne guieer guieer ɛn wel, ayi ne weet wɛɛt ɛn week?
Acakaa ka cin piir, ka ye dhiau, nɔn ee yen kaaŋ de aruoor, ku nɔn ee yen thom, te cin en luɔi bi dhiende ro pɔɔc, ke ci kooth bi kɔc jɔ ŋic adi, ayi ke ci gut, bi kɔc ŋic adi?
Ayi kaaŋ, te ci en erol guɛl, rol dhal kɔc, eeŋa bi ro guik e tɔŋ?
Yen acit week ayadaŋ, te luɛɛl wek jam dhal kɔc ne thoŋ mɛɛn, bi ŋic adi yen ke ci lueel? We bi kaŋ aa lueel e peeric.
Abi de te nu thok kith yiic e piny nɔm, ku acin thok e keyiic thoŋ cin jamden ci lueel.
Ku te kuoc ɛn thoŋ jiɛɛme raane, ke yɛn bi aa raan e guɛl tede raan jam, ku raan wen jam abi aa raan e guɛl tede yɛn.
Ayi week ayadaŋ, na kaarki ka ke Wei alaldiite, jaki kɔɔr luɔi ba wek woor ne kuɛt ba wek kanithɔ kueet.
Yen raan e jam e thoŋ mɛɛn e laŋ ke bi jam ŋiec puk.
Ku te laŋ ɛn ne thoŋ mɛɛn, weiki kek alaŋ, ku ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn kaŋ acin ke ci yok thin.
Jɔ aa ŋo? Yɛn bi lɔŋ woke weiki, ku ba lɔŋ woke ŋinydekaŋ aya: yɛn bi ket woke weiki, ku ba ket woke ŋinydekaŋ aya.
Be, yan, cie looi wuya, ku jɔ Nhialic thieei weke weiku kapac, ke raan rɛɛr etɛɛn ke ye raan kene wɛɛt, bi Amen lueel adi, nɔn ken en ke luel piŋ?
Yin e Nhialic ŋiec leec nɔm ne yic, ku raane akene kueet.
Thieithieei Nhialicdi, yɛn e jam ne thok mɛɛn, ka week waar wedhie:
ku ne yɛn, an, aŋuan luɔi ban wel kadhic lueel e kanithɔyin woke ŋinydekaŋ, luɔi ban kɔc kɔk wɛɛt aya, awar agum de wel kathieer ne thoŋ mɛɛn, wel dhal kɔc.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, duoki bi aa miththiike ne ŋinydekaŋ: yak aa miththiiatetet ne racdepiɔu tci, ku ne ŋinydekaŋ yak aa kɔc dit.
Aye gɔɔr e loŋic, yan, Woke thok mɛɛn pei ku liep mɛɛn pei, kek a ban ke jam woke jure, ku acakaa yɛn e jam ne keek ale, ka ciki kedi bi piŋ, ke lueel Bɛnydit ki.
Yen ka, thok mɛɛn ee gok nyuuth kɔc, ku acie kede kɔc ci gam, ee kede kɔc ken gam: ku guieerewel acie kede kɔc ken gam, ee kede kɔc ci gam.
Yen na ci kanithɔ gueer ebɛn tetok, ku jamki e thok mɛɛn kedhie, ku bɔ kɔc kɔk ɣot kɔc kene wɛɛt, ayi kɔc wen ken gam, ke ciki bi lueel, yan, cak miɔl?
Ku na guiir kɔc wel kedhie, ku jɔ raan ken gam bɛn ɣot, ayi raan kene wɛɛt, ka bi kaŋ yok e yepiɔu kedhie, ka ci piŋ, ku abi luɔp piɔu ne kaŋ nyiin kedhie;
ago ka ci thiaan e yepiɔu jɔ tic, ago ro cuat piny e yenɔm, ku lɛm Nhialic, ku jɔ lueel, an, Nhialic anu e weyiic edhoc.

Jɔ aa ŋo, wek mithekɔckuɔ? Te guɛɛr wek tetok, week wedhie, ŋɛk ade din e Dabid, ku de ŋɛk weet, ku de ŋɛk thoŋ mɛɛn, ku de ŋɛk ke ci nyuoth en, ku de ŋɛk puŋ puk en jam. Yak kaŋ tɔ loi kedhie ne kede kuɛt bi kɔc kueet.
Ku na de kɔc jam e thoŋ mɛɛn, abik aa rou tei, ku te juec kek, abik aa diak, ku abik jam, ŋɛk e kede taau, ku tɛɛu ŋɛk kede; ku raan tok puk jam:
ku te cin en raan e jam puk, ke raan lɔ lik e kanithɔyic; ku jɔ jam yenguop keke Nhialic.
Ayi kɔc guiir wel e ke guiir kaarou ayi diak, ku kɔc kɔk e ke them jam.
Ku na de ke ci nyuoth raan daŋ raan rɛɛr etɛɛn, ke raan tueŋ lɔ lik.
We dueer wel guiir wedhie, ye ŋɛk kede taau, ku tɛɛu ŋɛk kede, ke we bi piooc wedhie, ku muk we piɔth wedhie;
ku wei ke kɔc guiir wel aceŋ kek e kɔc guiir wel.
Nhialic acie Nhialic de lieepekaŋ, ee Nhialic de mat; acit man tɔu en e kanithɔɔ yiic kedhie kanithɔɔ ɣerpiɔth.
E dieerkun e ke ye lɔ lik e kanithɔɔ yiic: akene pal keek nɔn bi kek jam thiin; ne ke ye tɔu ke ke ye wel piŋ, acit man lueele loŋ en ayadaŋ.
Ku na de ke kɔɔrki luɔi bi ke piooc e ye, e ke thiec roorken gup paanden: ee ayaar te jiɛme tik e kanithɔyic.
Eeŋo? ee week e bii jam e Nhialic? e cii yine week tei?
Ku na de raan ci ro tɔ ye raan ŋic wel guiir, ayi raan ŋic ka ke Wei, ke gam ka gaar week, nɔn ee kek ka cii Nhialic thɔn kɔc.
Ku na de raan kuc jam, ke kuc tei.
Yen ka, wek mithekɔckuɔ, kaarki guieerewel aret, ku duoki jam e thoŋ mɛɛn e peen.
E kaŋ e ke ye looi apiɛth kedhie, ku yek kecok kuany apiɛth.
Ku week, mithekɔckuɔ, wek a tɔ ŋic welpiɛth ca kɔn guieer week, wel waan cak dɔm ayadaŋ, ku yek we tɔ kaac aya,
ku yek wel ci we kony wei e keek, te ya wek jam ca guieer week cok e mɔk wek e, te kɛn wek peer gamic tei.
Yɛn e jam kɔn yien week ɣɔn, jam ca noom ayadaŋ, jam e thon ci Kritho thou ne biak de karɛckuɔ acit man ci kacigɔɔr e lueel;
ku luɔi ci e tɔɔu, ku luɔi ci en ro bɛ jot ekool ee kekdiak acit man ci kacigɔɔr e lueel;
ku luɔi ci en tic tede Kepath, na wen, ke tiec tede tuuc kathieer ku rou:
Na wen, ke jɔ tiŋ e mithekɔckuɔ, kɔc war bot kadhic e raantok, ku te dit e keek anu aɣet ci enɔɔne, kɔc kɔk e keek acik lɔ tɔc tei.
Na wen, ke tiec tede Jakop; ku jɔ tic tede tuuc kedhie.
Na wen, e kɔc cok kedhie, ke jɔ tic tede yɛn ayadaŋ, acit man e ke e dhieth ke ye athɔɔrbei.
Luɔi ee yɛn koor ee tuuc kedhie, ku yɛn cii roŋ ne luɔi bi a tɔ ye tuc, luɔi aa yɛn kanithɔ de Nhialic yɔŋ.

Ku ee dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu, en a tau ɛn e taudi: ku dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu dhueeŋ ci yien ɛn, acie keɣɔric; yɛn ee luui aret, ka waar keek kedhie: ku acie yɛn e luui, ee dhueeŋ e Nhialic piɔu, en aye luui, dhueeŋ e tɔu ke yɛn.
Ku enɔɔne, nɔn ee yen ɛn, ku nɔn ee ke keek, wok ee wel guiir ale, ku we ci gam ale.
Ku te ci e guieer kɔc e kede Kritho nɔn ci en ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, ku na kɔc kɔk e weyiic, yek lueel adi, yan, cin jot nu jon bi kɔc ci thou ro jɔt?
Ku te cin en jon bi kɔc ci thou ro jɔt nu, ke Kritho ayadaŋ, ka ken ro jɔt:
ku te kene Kritho ro jɔt, ke guieer guiir wok wel ee keɣɔric, ayi gam gam wek ee keɣɔric ayadaŋ.
Yeka, ku wo ci yok aye caatɔɔ ke Nhialic caatɔɔ aluɛth; ne luɛl ci wok e lueel e kede Nhialic, an, ci Kritho jat nhial: ku tee kɔc ci thou e ke cii ro bi jɔt, ka ken jat nhial.
Ku te cii kɔc ci thou rot e jɔt, ke Kritho ayadaŋ ka ken ro jɔt:
ku te kene Kritho ro jɔt, ke gamdun ee keɣɔric; wek ŋoot e wek tɔu e karɛckun yiic.
Ku jɔ kɔc ci nin e Krithoyic maar aya.
Te de wok aŋɔth ŋɛɛth wok Kritho ne piir enɔɔne tei, ke wok ee kɔc kuany nyiin e kɔc kedhie.
Ku enɔɔne Kritho aci ro jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, ago aa ke ci kɔn luɔk e k::c ci nin yiic.
Ku luɔi ee yen raan yen e bii thuɔɔu, ka ye raan aya yen e bii jonerot e koc ci thou.
Acit man e thouwe kɔc kedhie ne Adam, yen acit piir bi kɔc tɔ piir kedhie ne Kritho.
Ku raan ebɛn ŋɛk ke kooldɛn roŋ ke ye: Kritho ee ke ci kɔn luɔk; miak, ke kɔc ke Kritho abik rot lɔɔk jɔt ekool bi en bɛn.
Ku jɔ thok e kaŋ bɛn, te ci en ciɛɛŋ de piny taau e Nhialic Wun cin; kool ci en ciɛɛŋ tɔ cin naamde ebɛn, ayi bɛɛny ebɛn, ayi riɛl ebɛn.
Ku yen abi piny dhil cieŋ, aɣet te ci en kɔc de ater e yen tuɛl e yecok yiic piny.
Raan de ater raan bi tɔ cin naamde e kaŋ cok cieen, yen aye thuɔɔu.
E kerieec taau e yecok yiic piny. Ku te lueel en en, yan, ci kerieec taau e yecok yiic piny, ku cooke e dhil ŋic, yan, Raan e tɛɛu kaŋ e yecok yiic piny akene mat thin.
Ku te ci kerieec ebɛn guɔ taau e yecok, ke Wende guop aya abi jɔ taau e Raanditt cok Raan e tɛɛu kerieec ebɛn e yecok, ago Nhialic aa kaŋ kedhie ku nu e kaŋ yiic kedhie.
Ku te cii kɔc ci thou rot jɔt, ke kɔc ci baptith ne kede kɔc ci thou bik looi adi? ku jɔ aa ŋo ke baptith keek ne kede kɔc ci thou?
Ku wook, eeŋo ye wo cath ke wo ye kɔc ci thou ecaŋɣɔn?
Yeka, ne lɛc aa yɛn ro leec e kedun e Kritho Yecu Bɛnydittdayic, ee yic en luɛɛl, yan, Yɛn ee cath ke ya ci thou e akooinyiin kedhie.
Te can piɔt woke lai roor Epetho cit man e kɔc, eeŋo ba yok thin te cii kɔc ci thou rot jɔt? Aŋuan luɔi dueer wo cam, ku dekku, ne luɔi bi wo thou miak.
Duoki rot tɔ mɛthe: man mɛte raan ke kɔc rac, yen aye ciɛɛŋ piɛth riɔɔk.
Jaki paac ne piɔnpiɛth, ku duoki kerac ee looi; kɔc kɔk acin ŋiny de Nhialic cath ke keek: yɛn luel cooke, ke we bi yaar.
Ku abi dɛ raan toŋ thiec, yan, Kɔc ci thou yek rot jɔt adi? ku bik bɛn e guopou?
Yin piɔl piɔu, na ke ci com, yin, acie piir, te ŋoot en ke ken kɔn thou:
ku ke com, acie guop bi nu en com, ee nyin tei, nyin cin kɔu kaŋ, nɔn ee yen agamɔ, nɔn ee kek rɛp kɔk tei;
ku Nhialic yen aye ye gam guop cit man nu yen e yepiɔu, ku gɛm kau ebɛn guop de yenguop.
Riŋ ebɛn acii kit: riiŋ de raan pei, ku riiŋ de lai pei, ku riiŋ de rec pei, ku riiŋ de diɛt pei.
Ku ade gup ke ka ke paannhial, ku gup ke ka ke piny nɔm: ku dhueeŋ de ka ke paannhial anu pei, ku nu dhueeŋ de ka ke piny nɔm pei.
Dhueeŋ de akɔl pei, ku dhueeŋ de pɛɛi pei, ku dhueeŋ de kuɛl pei; ayi kuele ku kuele, ŋɛk acath ke dhueeŋde pei.
Yen acit jonerot e kɔc ci thou aya. Aye com e ke bi dhiap; aye ro jɔt e ke cii bi dhiap:
aye com e ke ci biɔɔn, ku jɔt rot ke cath ke dhueeŋ: aye com ne kɔcde; ku jɔt rot ne riɛl:
aye com e guop de piny nɔm, ku jɔt rot e guop de wei. Guop de piny nɔm anu, ku guop de wei anu.
Yen aa gɛɛre yen aya, yan, Adam raan tueŋ aci aa piɔn piir. Ku Adam raan cieen aci aa wei, wei e kɔc tɔ piir.
Ku kede wei acii nu tueŋ, ee ke de piny nɔm en anu tueŋ; na miak ke jɔ kede wei lɔ.
Raan tueŋ aa bɔ piny, ee kede piny: raan lɔ e yecok, ee Bɛnydit bɔ paannhial.
Ku cit man tɔuwe ke de piny, yen aye tau tɔuwe kɔc ke piny ayadaŋ: ku cit man tɔuwe raan e paannhial, yen aye tau tɔuwe kɔc ke paannhial.
Ku cit man e ye wo cath ne cuɛc de raan e piny, yen abi wo cath ayadaŋ ne cuɛc de raan e paannhial.
Ku kene en aluɛɛl, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Riŋ keke riɛm aciki ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic dueer lɔɔk lak; ayi ke bi dhiap, acii ke cii bi dhiap dueer lɔɔk lak.
Wɔiki, wek nyuoth kecithiaan, yan, Wo cii bi nin wodhie, wo bi rot puk wodhie,
ethiau, cit man anieu de nyin, te koothe kaaŋ cieen: kaaŋ abi kooth, go kɔc ci thou rot jɔt ke ke cii bi dhiap, ka wo bi ro puk.
Ku dhiape abi ke cii bi dhiap dhil cieŋ cit man e lupɔ, ku bi kede thuɔɔuwe ke cii bi thou dhil cieŋ.
Na miak, aci dhiape ke cii bi dhiap guɔ cieŋ, ku ci kede thuɔɔuwe ke cii bi thou guɔ cieŋ, yen abi jam aa yic jam ci gɔɔr, yan, Thuɔɔu aye guɔ liek ne tiem ci e tiaam.
Yin thuɔɔu, winhduon ee yin kɔc moc akou? Ayik yin, yin paan e thuɔɔu, tiem tiɛɛm yin kɔc akou?
Winh e thuɔɔu en aye kerac; ku riɛl e kerac yen aye loŋ:
ku enɔɔne, Thieithieei ne Nhialic, Raan e wo tɔ tiam kaŋ ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.

Yen ka, wek mithekɔckuɔn nhiaar, yak kɔɔc tedun aril, duoki rot e tɔ jap tedun, yak wenyiin ŋuak ne luɔi de Bɛnydit e akoolnyiin kedhie, ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek luɔiduon ril nɔn cii en e keɣɔric e Bɛnyditic.
Ku ne kede juɛɛr aa wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth juɛɛr kaŋ, yak looi cit man can e lɛk kanithɔɔ ke Galatia.
Ekool tueŋ ee kekdherou ebɛn, week wedhie, e ŋɛk e ye kaŋ tɔɔu abi ke kueet, acit man ci Nhialic e tɔ yok kaŋ, ku miak te can bɛn, ka cin juɛɛrekaŋ bi nu.
Ku miak, te can bɛn, ke yɛn bi kɔc tooc, kɔc cak tɔ ye kɔc piɛth ne awareekkun yiic, bik ka cak gam e dhueeŋdun lɛɛr Jeruthalem:
ku te ci jam roŋ, ke yɛn bi lɔ aya, aguɔ cath wo keek etok.
Ku yɛn bi lɔ tede week, te can Makedonia kɔn caathic; yɛn bi Makedonia dhil caathic;
Ku abi dɛ te ban reer wo week, nɔn de yen te ban mai wo week, aguɔki ya ruac kueer, te de en te la yɛn thin.
Yɛn cin piɔu luɔi ban week tiŋ ku baaric; ee luɔi ban yok ke ya rɛɛr wo week yen a kaar, te ci Bɛnydit a pɔl.
Ku yɛn bi reer Epetho aɣet kool e Thierdhic;
gokdiit e bap aye liep ɛn, bap duɛɛr ɛn kaŋ leu e ye, ku kɔc de ater ajuecki.
Te ci Timotheo bɛn, ke taki rɛɛr keke week ke cin riɔɔc; ee luɔi de Bɛnydit looi acit man e yɛn aya:
e cin raan biɔn en. Ku abak ruac kueer apiɛth ke cin kerac, ke bi bɛn tede yɛn: en a tiɛɛt keke mithekɔckuɔ etok.
Ku ne kede Apolo mɛnhkeneda, aca yɔɔk alal nɔn bi en lɔ tede week keke mithekɔckuɔ etok: ku luɔi bi en lɔ enɔɔne aa liu e yepiɔu; ku abi lɔ ekool ci ro yok.
Yak rot tiit, kaacki apiɛth e gam, yak luui e luɔi e roor, yak riɛl.
Yak kakun tɔ loi kedhie e nhieer nhiaar wek rot.
Wek laŋ, wek mithekɔckuɔ (wek ŋic dhien e Thepana, nɔn ee kek kɔc ci kɔn gam e Akaya, ku acik rot gam luɔi de kuny de kɔc ɣerpiɔth),
wek laŋ, yak rot taau e kɔc cok kɔc cit keek, ayi kɔc lni e luɔi ril ne wook etok kedhie.
Ku yɛn mit piɔu ne bɛn de Thepana ku Portunato ku Akayiko: ayek keduon ci dak thiɔɔŋ thok.
Acik piɔndi tɔ yop ayi piɔthkun: yen ŋiɛc wek kɔc cit keek abak ke rieu.
Wek thieec kanithɔɔ ke Athia. Wek thieec alal e Bɛnyditic Akula keke Pirithila, ku kanithɔ nu ɣonden.
Wek thieec mithekɔckuɔ kedhie. Thiecki rot wapac ne ciem ɣeric.
Thiecdi ki, ke ca gɔɔr e yacin yɛn Paulo.
Na de raan cii Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho nhiaar, ka bi guop dɛ aciɛɛn. Bɛnydiitda ka bɔye.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e tɔu ke week.
E nhieerdi e tɔu ke week wedhie, nhieer nu e Kritho Yecuyic. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, tuny e Yecu Kritho ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, woke Timotheo mɛnhkeneda, awarek en gɛɛrku kanithɔ de Nhialic nu Korinth, keke kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie kɔc nu Akaya ebɛn:
E dhueeŋdepiɔu keke mat ne ke tɔu e weyiic, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Thicithieei Nhialic yen Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, Wun kokdepiɔu ku ye Nhialic de muŋdepiɔu ebɛn;
Raan e wo muk piɔth ne ka dhal wook ebɛn, luɔi bi wo kɔc ŋiec muk piɔth kɔc cii kedaŋ dhal, ne muŋ ci wo muk piɔth e Nhialic wogup.
Ku acit man juece katuc gumku ne biak de Kritho, en a diite muŋ ee wo muk piɔth aya ne Kritho.

Ku na dhal kaŋ wook, ee kede muŋ bi we muk piɔth ayi kuny bi we kony wei; ku ayeke luoi week ne ruot aa wek wepiɔth ruut ne kaguomki, ka kit e ka gumku ayadaŋ: ku te ci wo muk piɔth, ee kede muŋ bi we muk piɔth aya ku kuny bi we kony wei.
Ku aŋɔth ŋathku e biakdun ee yin egɔk, luɔi ŋic wok ekene, yan, acit man aa wek kɔc e rɔm etok ne guomdekaŋ, ke we bi aa kɔc e rɔm etok ne muŋdepiɔu aya.
Ku wo cin piɔth luɔi ba wek ka ci wo dhal kuc, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ka cuk yok e Athia, yik ci wo yink piɔth kethiek edot, ke cuku dueer leu e guom, arek acuk rot kuoc piir:
ee yic, wok aa rɛɛr e wo ye kɔc e rot ŋiec thuɔɔu, luɔi cii wo rot e ŋɔɔth, ee Nhialic en abuk dhil aa ŋɔɔth, Raan e kɔc ci thou jat nhial;
Raan e wo luok ne thon diit yinya, ku ŋoot ke ye wo luok: ku yen a ŋathku luɔi bi en ŋoot ke luak wook aya;
ku week ayadaŋ we bi wo kony etok ne laŋ aa wek lɔŋ ne biakda; na miak, te ci wo kaŋ yok ne lɔŋ cii kɔc juec lɔŋ, ka bi kɔc juec lueel, an, Thieithieei, ne biakda.

Miɛt e wo piɔth miɛt ki, yan, jam e yok yok e wopiɔth aye lueel, yan, yok cath e piɔn cinic rueeny ku ciɛthku ne yic de Nhialic, wok aacii rɛɛr ne pɛlenɔm de kɔc, ee dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu, en aa reer wok e piny nɔm, ku en aa reer wok e weyiic awarki kɔc kɔk
Acin wel kɔk gɛɛrku week, ee wel kuɛnki enɔɔne kapac, ku yek wel cak gam aya, ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi ba wek ke gam athooke kaŋ:
acit man ca wek wo kɔn gam e biak, yan, yok lɛcduon aa wek ro leec, cit man aa wek lɛcda ayadaŋ ekool e Bɛnydan Yecu.
Ku gam can ekene gam yen aa luɛɛl ɛn en e yapiɔu waan, nɔn ban bɛn tede week, luɔi ba wek kepiɛth bɛ yok raanrou;
ku nɔn ban teek e welɔm ke ya lɔ Makedonia, aguɔ anɔm pɔk Makedonia ba tede week, ke we bi a ruac kueer lɔ Judaya.
Loŋ ca lueel e yapiɔu aya, ca lueel e ya wiel piɔu? ayi loŋ e ya lueel, ee kede guop en luɛɛl ɛn en, cit man jam ɛn e looŋ kaarou, yan, Ɣɛɛ, ɣɛɛ, ku, yan, Ei, ei?
Ku ne don ee Nhialic adot, jamda woke week acie Ɣɛɛ ku be aa Ei.
Wen e Nhialic, Yecu Kritho, raan e wok rinke guiir e weyiic, wo woke Thiluano ku Timotheo, yen aacii ye Ɣɛɛ ku be aa Ei, kaŋ ayek Ɣɛɛ tede yen.
Ku te de en ka ci Nhialic lueel, an, bi ke gam kɔc, Ɣɛɛ yen aye kede, ku ye Amen kede, ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok ne wook.
Ku Raan e wo tɔ kaac aril e Krithoyic woke week etok, ku ci wo tɔc gup, yen aye Nhialic;
Raan ci wo gaar piɔth rinke aya, ago wo gam Weidit e wopiɔth, ke ye biak de ke buk yok rial.
Ku yɛn cɔl Nhialic bi aa caatɔdi ne kede yɛnpiɔu, yan, Pal pal ɛn week en a ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya ken bɛn Korintho.
Ku acie luɔi ee wok week cieŋ, wok ee kɔc e week kony ne miɛt ba we piɔth miɛt: ee gamdun en a kaac wek.
Ku yɛn e loŋ lueel e yapiɔu yatok, nɔn can bi bɛ bɛn tede week ke ya dhiau piɔu.
Te can week tɔ dhiau piɔth, ke eeŋa bi a tɔ mit piɔu, cie yen raan ca tɔ dhiau piɔu?
Ku yɛn e kemane gaar week, na miak, te can bɛn, ke yɛn cii dhienepiɔu dueer yok tede kɔc bi a dhil tɔ mit piɔu; ku we ca gam wedhie, nɔn ci miɛt de yɛnpiɔu aa miɛt de wepiɔth wedhie.
Aca gaar week waan woke piu juec e yanyin ne kediit dhal ɛn, ku jiɛthepiɔu; acie luɔi ba wek piɔth dhiau, e luɔi ba wek nhieerdi ŋic nhieer nhiaar ɛn week awar kerieec.
Ku na de raan ci kɔc tɔ dhiau piɔth, acie yɛn e tɔ dhiau piɔu yɛn atok, ee week wedhie we ci tɔ dhiau piɔth e biak (ke we ca bi gɔk e gaak dit).
Gaŋ ci raane gɔk e loi enɔɔne, gaŋ ci kɔc juec e gɔk.
Ku enɔɔne aŋuan nɔn ba wek e pɔl, ku jaki muk piɔu, ke raane cii tieel bi dɔm ne dit de jiɛth e yenpiɔu.
Yen a laŋ ɛn week, yan, bak bɛ tɔ ŋic nhieerduon nhiaar wek en.
En aa gaar ɛn week waan aya, luɔi ban week them aguɔ piɔndun ŋic, nɔn aa wek kerieecdi piŋ ebɛn.
Ku raan bak pal kedaŋ, ka ca pɔl aya; ku te can kedaŋ pal raan, ka ye biakdun week, en aa pal ɛn en e Kritho nɔm;
ke Catan cii bi dɛ te bi en wo woor: rueenyde acuku kuc, aŋicku.
Cook daŋ, waan can bɛn Toroa ba welpiɛth ke Kritho bɛn guiir, ago kal thok liep ɛn e Bɛnydit,
acin lɔŋ ca yok e yapiɔu, luɔi kɛn ɛn Tito mɛnhkai yok: aguɔ kɔcke tɔɔŋ, guɔ jal etɛɛn la Makedonia.
Ku thieithieei Nhialic, Raan e cool e tɔ wo tiam kaŋ e Krithoyic, ago atuomde tɔ tiec ne wook e baai nɔm ebɛn, atuom de ŋiny bi kɔc e ŋic.
Wok ee atuom de Kritho ne kede Nhialic e kɔc yiic, ayi kɔc kony wei ayi kɔc mar;
tede kɔcke wok ee atuom e thuɔɔu a luel thuɔɔu, ku tede kɔcke wok ee atuom e piir a lueel piir. Ku eeŋa dueer kacit e kake leu?
Ku wook, wo cii cit tediit e kɔc, kɔc e jam e Nhialic riɔɔk ne biak de weu: jam yok lueel ee piɔn yic yen aye wok e lueel, ku cit liem de Nhialic, e Nhialic nɔm, yen aye wo jam e Krithoyic.
Cuk bɛ gɔl e lɛc leec wok rot? Ku kɔɔrku awareek bi wo leec, cit man e kɔc kɔk, awareek ci gaar week, ayi ka bak gɔɔr ku yine ke wook?
Wek aye awarekda awarek ci gɔɔr e wopiɔth, ku ci ŋic e raan ebɛn ku yek kueen;
we ye tic nɔn aa wek awarek de Kritho, awarek ci looi ne wook, ku kene gɔɔr e miok e gaar, ee Wei ke Nhialic piir kek e gɛɛre ye; ku acie pɛɛm e kur kek e gaar kɔɔth, ee pɛɛm cɔl piɔth ke kɔc.
Ku aŋɔth yinya en aŋɛɛth wok Nhialic ne Kritho:
ku wo wapac acin ke dueerku lueel e ye, yan, e bɔ ne wook; leu ee wok kaŋ leu abɔ tede Nhialic;
Raan ci wo tɔ leu kaŋ, buk aa kɔc ee ka ke loŋ ci piac mac ŋiec guiir; ku guieerda acie kede wel ci gɔɔr tei, ee kede wei: wel ci gɔɔr tei ayek kɔc nɔk, ku wei kek aye kɔc tɔ piir.
Ku na guieer e loŋ de thuɔɔu, en aye loŋ ɣɔn ci gaar e kur kɔɔth, te ci e yekic dhueeŋ, ago mith ke Yithrael dhal e wni woi kek Mothe nyin, ne baŋ de dhueeŋ e yennyin; ku dhueeŋe ee ke kɔɔr liu:
na guieer e wei eeŋo cii en guieere bi woor e dhueeŋ?
Ku na guieer e jany bi kɔc jɔɔny ten ee yen dhueeŋ, ke guieer e piathepiɔu ee guieere woor e dhueeŋ alaldiite.
Ke ci gam dhueeŋ ɣɔn acin dhueeŋ be cath keke yen enɔɔne, ne biak de cooke, yan, a wɛɛr dhueeŋ war kerieec.
Ku na ke bi nyaai, te ciɛth en keke dhueeŋ, ke ke bi doŋ anande acath keke dhueeŋ war dhueeŋe alaldiite.
Yen ka, nɔn ciɛth wok e aŋɔth yinya, wok ee jam ke wo ril nyiin alal,
ku wo cii cit Mothe, ɣɔn e yen enyin kum e lupɔ, ke mith ke Yithrael ke ke cii thok e dhueeŋe dueer woi, dhueeŋ kɔɔr luɔi bi en jal:
acik niim riɛl: ku aɣet ci ekoole lupɔ mane guop e doŋ akene nyaai, te ye awarek kueenic awarek de loŋ ci mac thɛɛr; ku lupɔye aye nyaai ne Krithoyic.
Ku aɣet ci ekoole, te ye loŋ de Mothe kueenic, ke lupɔ ke ŋoot ke rɛɛr e kepiɔth.
Ku kool bi kek kepiɔth wɛl Bɛnydit tei, ka bi nyaai.
Ku Bɛnydit en aye Weidit: ku te nu Weidiit ke Bɛnydit, en ee te nu luny bi kɔc lony.

Ku wok wodhie, wok ee dhueeŋ de Bɛnydit woi cit man e wo kaŋ woi e mɛndheric, ke cin lupɔ kum wonyiin, agoku rot aa puk buk aa ciet taudɛn mane guop, ku yok dhueeŋ yok dhueeŋ e cool e ŋuak rot, ku ye Bɛnydit en a bii en, yen aye Weidit.
Yen ka, enɔn de wo niim luɔiye, acit man ci wo kokdepiɔu yok, ke wo cie bap;
ku ka ke ayaar ka ci moony acuk ke jai, ku wo cie reer e wo e ruɛny, ku cuku jam e Nhialic e cakic; ee yic en a yok tɔ tiec, ago wo ŋic e kɔc piɔth kedhie nɔn piɛth wok e Nhialic nɔm.
Ku te ci welkuɔn piɛth kum, ayeke kum tede kɔc mɛɛr wei:
kek kɔc cii jɔŋ rɛɛc ceŋ pinye nɔm enɔɔne tɔ cɔɔr piɔth, kek kɔc reec gam, ke riau de welpiɛth ke cii keek bi riaau, welpiɛth ke dhueeŋ de Kritho, raan e tɔu e tau de Nhialic guop.
Ku wo cie guiir e keda, ee kede Kritho Yecu Bɛnydit en e yok guiir, ku wook, wok ee himkun ne biak de Yecu.
Luɔi ee yen Nhialic, Raan ɣɔn yook ɣɛɛrepiny, an, Ba bei tecol, ye piny riaau, yen aa riau wopiɔth, agoku riau de ŋiny de dhueeŋ de Nhialic yok, riau nu e Yecu Kritho nyin.
Ku wo ee kepiɛthe muk e ka ci cueec e tiɔp yiic, ke diit e riɛl war kerieec ke bi aa kede Nhialic, ku cii bɔ tede wook.
Wo cii katuc tuɔɔk, ku te lniny wok acie liu; wo e niim mum, ku wo cii niim e mum etaiwei;
wok e yɔŋ, ku wo kene pal wei; wo ye dɛɛny piny, ku cii wo nak eliŋliŋ;
thon e Bɛnydit Yecu en ayok cool e ɣɛɛc wok en e wogup, ke piir e Yecu bi tic e wogup ayadaŋ.
Ku wo kɔc piir, wo ye cool e yine wo thuɔɔu ne baŋ de Yecu, luɔi bi piir e Yecu tic e guopdayic guop deyic thuɔɔu.
Yen tede ka, thuɔɔu ee luui e woyiic, ku lui piir e weyiic.
Ku wo cath wo wei toŋe wei ke gam, acit man e ke ci gɔɔr, yan, Aca gam, en aa jam ɛn; ayi wook ayadaŋ, wok gam, ku yen a jiɛɛm wok,
ne ŋiny ŋic wok cooke, yan, Raan waan jɔt Bɛnydit Yecu nhial, en abi wo jat nhial aya ne Yecu, ago wo taau e yenɔm woke week etok.
Ku kaŋ kedhie atɔuki ne biakdun, ke dhueeŋdepiɔu bi ro ŋuak ne kɔc juec ne luɛl ci kɔc juec thieithieei lueel, ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok.
Yen acii wok e bap; ku na cak jɔ a tiaam en e raandan nu biic, ke raandan nu thin aye bɛ cool e cuɛɛceye e akoolnyiin kedhie.
Kepiɔɔldan dhal wook, ke bi dap lɔ with wei, aye wo luoi dhueeŋ thiek dhueeŋ war ke dhal wook alalditte, ku ye tɔu athɛɛr;
e luɔi cii wok ka ci tiŋ e tak, ee ka kene tiŋ kek a yok tak: ka ci tiŋ ayek ka ke akoolke tei; ku ka kene tiŋ ayek tɔu athɛɛr.
Ku kene aŋicku, yan, ɣondan e piny nɔm, yen keemɔ ee wok reer thin, te ci en riaak, ke wo de ɣon bɔ tede Nhialic, ɣon e cii yik e raan cin, ee ɣon bi tɔu athɛɛr paannhial.
Ku wo ye kim e ɣon nu wo thineyic, ku yok kɔɔr alal luɔi bi wo ɣonda cieŋ cit man e lupɔ, ɣondan bɔ tenhial:
ku te ye wok lupɔ cieŋ ne yic, ke wo cii bi yok e wo cin kɔɔth lupɔɔ.
Ku wok kɔc e tɔu e keemɔyic enɔɔne, wo ye kim eyic, ku yok duɔɔny; ku acie reer bi wo reer ke wo cin kɔɔth lupɔɔ en kɔɔrku, wo kɔɔr luɔi bi wo kɔɔth dɛ lupɔɔ, ago kedan kɔɔr thuɔɔu, ago liek e piir.
Ku Raan e cuec wo ne kemane guop en aye Nhialic, Raan ci wo gam Weikɛn Dit, ee biak de ke buk yok rial.
Agoku cool e rit wo wopiɔth, ne ŋiny ŋic wok ecooke, yan, te nu wok baai e guopdayic, ke wok tɔu roor te liiuwe Bɛnydit:
(ee gam en aye wo reer, acie daai);
wo ee wopiɔth riit, di, ku yok lueel, yan, adueer ŋuan tede wook te tɔu wok roor te liiuwe guopda, ku tɔuku baai ne Bɛnydit etok.
Ku kene en ayok cool e kɔɔr wok en aret, yan, Te nu wo baai ayi te nu wo roor, ke wo bi miɛt e Bɛnydit piɔu.
Ku wo bi dhil tic e thoony de Kritho nɔm wodhie, thoony de guieereloŋ; ago raan ebɛn kaŋ yok ka bi roŋ ne ke ci looi e guopdeyic, nɔn ee yen kepiɛth, ku nɔn ee yen kerac.
Yen ka, luɔi ŋic wok riɔɔc bi kɔc dhil riɔɔc e Bɛnydit, ke wo ye kɔc guet niim, ku Nhialic aŋic wopiɔth; ku yɛn dueer piɔu miɛt te ca wek wook ŋic piɔth ayadaŋ ne jam e yak yok e wepiɔth.
Ku wo cii rot e bɛ lɛc week, wek ayok tɔ yok ke duɛɛr wek rot leec ne biakda, ke we bi dɛ ke ba wek kede kɔc bɛɛr, kɔc e rot leec ne ke ci tic tei, ku ciki rot e leec ne ke nu e raan piɔu.
Ku na ye te jiɛɛm wok wei, ee kede Nhialic; ku na yok niim piath, ee kedun week.
Nhieer e Kritho ee wo cieŋ; ayok lueel ale, yan, Thon e thouwe raan tok ne biak de raan ebɛn, ka yen thon ci raan thou ebɛn ka;
ku thon thou en ne biak de raan ebɛn, ee ke cii kɔc piir bi bɛ piir e kede yenhden, ka bik piir e kede raan ci thou ne biakden ku be ro jɔt.
Yen acin en raan beku ŋic e baŋ de guop: acakaa Kritho guop, te ciɛk wok e kɔn ŋic ne baŋ de guop, ka cuku be ŋic aya.
Yen tede ka, te de yen raan nu e Krithoyic, ka ye ke ci piac cak: kathɛɛr acik lɔ ya; wɔiki, kaŋ acike piac cak kedhie.
Ku kaŋ aake bɔ tede Nhialic kedhie, Raan e wo tɔ mat ne yen ne Yecu Kritho, ago luɔi de mat yien wook;
luɔi e nu Nhialic e Krithoyic, ee piny nɔm tɔ mat ne yen, ku luɔi cii en ka cii kɔc wooc e mac e keyieth, ago jam de mat taau e wocin.
Ku enɔɔne wok ee tuuc ke Kritho, acit man lɛŋe Nhialic kɔc ne wothook: we laŋku ne biak de Kritho, yan, Bɛki mat ne Nhialic.
Yen raan kuc kerac aci tɔ ye kerac guop ne biakda; luɔi bi wo tɔ ye piathepiɔn e Nhialic ne yen.
Ku nɔn ee wok luui ne yen etok, en a lɛŋ wo week, ke we cii dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu nom e ɣɔric.
Nɔn ci en e lueel, yan, Yɛn e kedu piŋ ekool piɛth, Ku yin ca luok ekool e kunydewei. Ekoole ki, yen aye kool piɛth; tieŋki, ekoole ki, yen aye kool e kunydewei.
Acin ke loiku ke bi raan diiu piɔu, ke luɔi e wo kaŋ looi ke ci bi gɔk;
wo ye rot tɔ ye kɔc piɛth ne kerieec ebɛn, acit man e kɔc e ka ke Nhialic looi, ne liɛɛr diit e wopiɔth, ne katuc dhal wook, ne ka dak wook, ne ka giŋ wook,
ne dui duiye wook, ne many mɛce wook, ne awuoou dit, ne luɔi ril, ne yin ee wo yin, ne mɔl ee wo mɔl e cam;
ne ɣɛɛrepiɔu, ne ŋinydekaŋ, ne guomdekaŋ, ne piathepiɔu, ne Weidit Ɣer, ne nhieer cinic rueeny,
ne jam de yic, ne riel diit e Nhialic, ne weu ke tɔŋ weu ke piathepiɔu e ciin cuec ku ciin cam,
ne lɛc, ku ne cien lɛc, ne rin piɛth ku ne rin rac; acit kɔc e kɔc math, ku wok ee kɔc yith;
acit kɔc kuc, ku wo ŋic apiɛth; acit kɔc, an, thouki, ku tieŋki, wok piir; acit kɔc ci dui, ku wo kene nɔk;
acit kɔc e dhiau, ku wo ye piɔth miɛt ananda; acit kɔc kuany nyiin, ku wo ye kɔc juec tɔ kueth; acit kɔc cin niim kaken, ku wo de niim kaŋ kedhie.
Wo ci wothook liep week, wek Korinthoi, wo ci piɔth laau e kedun.
Acie wook e giŋ week, ee weyac, kek e giŋ week.
Ku enɔɔne, ne cuot ba wek kaŋ cool aya (yɛn cit ke jam woke mithki), taki weyac laau.
Duoki rot e tɔ mac etok ne kɔc reec gam, ke we ci kit: piathepiɔu eeŋode thin keke dhaŋ de loŋic? ayi ɣɛɛrepiny bi mat adi keke cuɔlepiny?
Ku bi Kritho ethok mat adi keke Belial? ayi raan gam bi kaŋ rɔm adi keke raan reec gam?

Ayi luaŋ e Nhialic bi jam mat keke yinth adi? ku week, wek aye luaŋ e Nhialic piir; acit man ci Nhialic e lueel, yan, Yɛn bi reer e keyiic, ku cath e keyiic; ku yɛn bi aa Nhialicden, ku kek abik aa kɔcki.
Yen Ba wek bei ne keyiic, abak rot tɔ ye kɔc mɛɛn pei, ke lueel Bɛnydit ki, Ku duoki kecol e jak; Ku we ba dɔm,
Ku yɛn bi aa Wuoordun, Ku we bi aa wɛɛtki ku nyurki, Ke lueel Bɛnydiit Leu Kerieec ka.
Yen ka, enɔn ciɛth wok woke ka ci lueel, an, bike gam wooke, wek kɔc nhiaar, yok rot waak ne acuɔl ebɛn acol e guop ku acol e wei, ku yok wopiɔth tɔ ɣer abik dikedik ne rieu de Nhialic.
Liɛpki wepiɔth wook: acin raan cuk luoi kerac, acin raan cuk riɔɔk piɔu, acin raan cuk cam.
Acie jany jaany ɛn week, yen e luɛɛl ekene. aca kɔn lueel, nɔn tau wek e wopiɔth, ku abuk thou etok, ku abuk piir etok.
Yɛn ci anyin riil alal, te jaam ɛn wo week, ku lɛɛc rot alal ne biakdun: yɛn ci riit piɔu alal ka cin daŋ kaar, yɛn mit piɔu aret awar kerieec ne ketuc dhal wook ebɛn.
Waan, te ci wok bɛn Makedonia, wo cin lɔŋ ci wogup lɔŋ, wo cii ketuc dhal wook tuɔɔk e biake ku biake; e wogup biic, tɔɔŋ aake nu, ku e wopiɔth thin, riɔɔc aa nu.
Acakaa kake kek e nu, Nhialic, Raan e kɔc riit piɔth kɔc e piɔth dhiau, aci wo riit piɔth ne bɛn de Tito;

ku acie ne bɛnde etok, ku ne riet ci e riit piɔu yenguop ne kedun ayadaŋ, waan lek en wook taŋ aa wek ɛn tak alal, ayi dhien aa wek dhiau, ayi lɛthduon aa wek yiic lɛth ne biakdi; aguɔ piɔu jɔ miɛt aret awar miɛtepiɔu awaan.
Ku acakaa yɛn e ci week tɔ dhiau piɔth ne awarek, ke yɛn cii rot gak enɔɔne, acakaa yɛn e ci ro kɔn gɔk waan; aca tiŋ nɔn ci awareke we tɔ dhiau piɔth, ku we ci piɔth guɔ lɔ yaŋ.
Ku enɔɔne, acie luɔi ci we tɔ dhiau piɔth, en e miɛt ɛn piɔu, e luɔi ca wek piɔth dhiau aɣet puŋ ba wek wepiɔth puk: ee kede Nhialic en aci we tɔ dhiau piɔth, ke cin kerɛɛc bak yok e kedayic.
Ku dhienepiɔu bɔ tede Nhialic ee puŋdepiɔu bɛɛi, ke bi raan kony wei, ku acin raan bi ro gɔk e ye: ku dhienepiɔu bɔ ne piny nɔm ee thuɔɔu bɛɛi.

Thɔɔŋki kemane guop, dhien ci we tɔ dhiau piɔth ne kede Nhialic, thɔɔŋki lɛth ci we tɔ leth yiic dit diit en, yeka, ku dit e luɛl ca wek kedun lueel, yeka, ku diu ca wek piɔth diu, yeka, ayi taŋ ca wek kaŋ tak aret, yeka, ayi tuoc ca we piɔth tuoc, yeka, ayi guur ca wek kaŋ guoor! ne kerieec ebɛn we ci ro nyuɔɔth nɔn ca wek gup a gɔk e liu liɛɛu wek e jameyic.

Yen na ca we cak gaar waan, acie biak de raan ci kedaŋ wooc, en e gaar ɛn en, ku cie biak de raan ci wac kedaŋ aya, ee luɔi bi diɛɛrduon dit tɔ tiec tede week e Nhialic nɔm, diɛɛr aa wek diɛɛr e wook.
Yen aci wo muk piɔth: ku enɔn ci wo muk piɔth, yen aci wo piɔth miɛt aretditte ne miɛt e Tito piɔu, luɔi ci piɔnde tɔ lɔ guik piny e week wedhie.
Ku na de ke ca lɛk en e lɛc lɛɛc ɛn rot e week, ke yɛn ken yaar; ku acit man ci wo week lɛk kaŋ kedhie ne yic, ayi lɛcdan e wo rot lɛc week e Tito nɔm, aci aa yic aya.
Ku taŋ tɛk en week aci yenyin ŋuak, te tɛk en enɔm ne piŋ ca wek kaŋ piŋ wedhie, ku nyuuc ca wek e nyuooc ne riɔɔc keke lɛtheguop.
Yɛn e piɔu miɛt nɔn duɛɛr ɛn guop a laŋ ne kedun ne kerieec ebɛn.
Ku daŋ ki, wek tɔku ŋic dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu, wek mithekɔckuɔ, dhueeŋ ci yien kanithɔɔ ke Makedonia,
acakaa kek e ye them ne ketuc diit dhal keek, ke miɛt mit kek piɔth alal ku kuany de kekuyiin acik piɔndɛn adhuɛŋ tɔ ŋuak rot abi dit alal.
Ku yɛn ee caatɔ de miɔc ci kek miooc e kaken, ke roŋ ke weu cath ke keek, arek acik ŋuak nyin ayadaŋ, ku acik tak e kede nɔmden kapac,
agoki wo lɔŋ e laŋ dit, an, buk ke cik gam edhueeŋ noom, ku jɔku mat e luɔiyin ne keek etok, luɔi de kuny de kɔc ɣerpiɔth:
ku acii cit ke e ŋathku tei, acik rot kɔn gam Bɛnydit, ku gɛmki rot wook ne kede piɔn e Nhialic.
Agoku Tito yɔɔk, yan, cit man ci en e kɔn gɔl, ka bi dhueeŋe thol e weyiic aya.
Ku acit man ca wek kuɛth ne kerieec ebɛn, ne gam, ku ne jam, ku ne ŋinydekaŋ, ku ne lɛth lɛth wek yiic, ku ne nhieer nhiaar wek wook, en ja wek aa kuɛth ne dhueeŋe ayadaŋ.
Acie luɔi dhiɛl wek e looi en luɛɛl, ee biak de lɛth e kɔc kɔk yiic en a luɛɛl ɛn en, ku e them thɛm ɛn nhieerdun ayadaŋ nɔn ee yen yic.
Wek ŋic dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu, acakaa yen e juec e kake, ke ye ro tɔ ye raan kuany nyin ne biakdun, luɔi ba wek aa kɔc juec e kakun ne kuany kuɛɛny en nyin.
Ku yɛn e loŋdi taau ne kede jame: kene adueer piath tede week, wek kɔc ci kaŋ kɔn gɔl run waan, acie ne luɔi tei, ee gam ca wek piɔth dɛ gam ayadaŋ.
Ku enɔɔne, jaki luɔi de kaŋ thol ayadaŋ; ago cit man nu gam de piɔu, ke tholekaŋ abi nu aya ne ka nu e wecin.
Ku na nu gam e raan piɔu, ka bi tɔ ye piathde, ne kede ke nu e yecin, ku acie ne kede ke liu e yecin.
Ku yɛn cin piɔu luɔi bi kɔc kɔk dɛ lɔŋ, ku duɔɔnyki:
ee kit ba we kit en a kaar, yan, enɔɔne kuɛthdun abi keek kony ne ke dak keek, na ekool daŋ, ke kuɛthden abi we kony ne ke dak week; aguɔki kit wedhie:
acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan ci kajuec kuany, acin ke ci doŋ keke yen; ku raan ci kalik kuany, ka cin ke dak en.
Ku thieithieei Nhialic, Raan e tɛɛu lɛtheyic mane guop e Tito piɔu ne biakdun.
Ee yic, aci loŋda gam; ku nɔn leth en yic alal, ke jɔ lɔ tede week ne kede piɔnde etok.
Agoku mɛnhkeneda tooc keke yen etok, raan ci leec e kanithɔɔ yiic kedhie ne baŋ de welpiɛth;
ku acie kene etok, ee raan cii kanithɔɔ lɔc, yan, buk cath etok e yen, lok ke ci gam edhueeŋe looi, ke Bɛnydit bi dhueeŋ yok, ku luɔi kɔɔr wok nɔn bi wo kɔc kony.
Ku wo cin piɔth luɔi bi en dɛ raan bi wo gɔk ne juec de kaŋ ka looi wok kake:
agoku kaŋ aa dot apiɛth, aci e Benydit nɔm tei, e kɔc niim ayadaŋ.
Ku wo ci mɛnhkenedan daŋ tooc keke keek etok, raan cuk kɔn them ecaŋɣɔn ku cuk yok alethic ne kajuec, ku enɔɔne alethic awar man waan ne biak de aŋɔth ŋɛɛth en week aret.
Ku na de raan lop e kede Tito, ee raan rom wok etok ku lniku etok ne kedun; ku na lop raan e kede mithekɔckuɔ, ayek tuuc ke kanithɔɔ, ku yek dhueeŋ de Kritho.
Yen nyuoth wek keek yic ee nhieerdun yic e kanithɔɔ niim, ayi yic ee lɛcda yic lɛc ee wo rot leec e kedun.
Ku ne kede kuny de kɔc ɣerpiɔth, acin ke duɛɛr ɛn e dhil gaar week:
yɛn ŋic thok ca wek thok e guiɛɛk, en a lɛɛc ɛn rot ne kedun e kɔc ke Makedonia niim, yan, ci Akaya guɔ thok e guiɛɛk run waan; ku lɛth e wekyiic aci kɔc juec alal tɔ leth yiic ayadaŋ.
Ku yɛn ci mithekɔckuɔ tooc tei ke lɛc leec wok rot e kedun ke cii bi aa ɣɔric ne kede cooke; luɔi ba wek thok e guiɛɛk, cit man can e lueel.
Ku na de te bi kɔc kɔk ke Makedonia ne yɛn etok, ku yokki week aken thok e guiɛɛk, ke wook (aca bi lueel, yan, ee week), wo dueer yaar e aŋɔth ci wo week ŋɔɔth, ku lɛc ci wo rot leec e kedun.

Aguɔ lueel e yapiɔu, yan, ba mithekɔckuɔ dhil yɔɔk, yan, bik kɔn lɔ tede week, lek ke cak gam edhueeŋ kɔn guik abi thok, ke can kede kɔn lɛk week, luɔi bi en aa kede dhueeŋ, acie kede ciɛɛŋ ci we dhil cieŋ.
Ku cooke en a luɛɛl, yan, Raan cum e kalik, ka bi kalik tem ayadaŋ; ku raan cum edhueeŋ, ka bi tem ne dhueeŋ aya.
Raan ebɛn e ye miooc e miɔcdɛn cit man e yenpiɔu; e cie ne dhien dhiɛɛu en, ku cie ciɛɛŋ ci e cieŋ: raan e miooc ne piɔnmit en a nhiɛɛr Nhialic.
Ku Nhialic adueer dhueeŋdepiɔu ebɛn tɔ dit tede week; ke we bi kuɛth alal anandun ne kerieec ebɛn, aguɔki kuɛth e leu ba wek luɔi piɛth aa leu ebɛn:
acit man ci e gɔɔr, yan, Aci kake thiai wei, gɛm keek kɔc kuany nyiin; Ku piath e yenpiɔu a tɔu athɛɛr.
Ku enɔɔne, Raan e raan cum yien kɔth, ku ye raan cam yien kuin, abi we yien kɔthkuon lak com, ku ŋuɛk ke, ago piath e wepiɔth ŋuak e luɔk:
ke we bi tɔ kueth e kerieec abak piɔth adhuɛŋ alal, en aye Nhialic tɔ yok lɛc ne wook.
Luɔi e kuny e kɔc ro konye ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth tɔ kueth alal ne ke dak keek, ku acie yen etok, piath de luɔiye e ro ŋuak aya, ne luɛl ee kɔc e lueel, an, Thieithieei Nhialic, ecaŋɣɔn;

ŋiny ci kek we ŋic piɔth ne luɔiduone, yen aye kek Nhialic leec nɔm, ne biak de reer rɛɛr wek e gamic gam de welpiɛth ke Kritho, ku ne biak de piɔnduon adhuɛŋ aa wek keek miɔɔc e kakun ayi kɔc kedhie;
ku kegup ayadaŋ, te ye kek lɔŋ e biakdun, ke ke ye week tak alal, ne biak de dhueeŋ diit e Nhialic nu e wepiɔth dhueeŋ dit alal.
Thieithieei Nhialic e biak de miɔcdɛn e ye miooc edhueeŋ, niiɔc iiu ene.
Ku yɛn Paulo guop, wek yɔɔk ne kuur ci Kritho ro tɔ koor ku ne liɛɛr e yenpiɔu, yɛn raan cin naamdi e weyiic te wɔi wek ɛn, ku nɔn liɛɛu ɛn, yɛn ci nyin riɛl tede week:
ku wek a laŋ, duoki ya tɔ ŋeeny te nuo yɛn, ne ŋeeny ca lueel, an, ba kɔc kɔk dhil ŋɛny kɔc e jam e wook, yan, yok reer e reer e guop tei.
Ku na cakku reer e guopic, ke wo ci tɔŋ e biok e biok de guop
(weukuɔn ke tɔŋ aciki e ka ke guop, ayek riɛl etor e Nhialic nɔm, bik alocdit ril aa dhuoor piny);
ayok looŋ rac dhuoor piny, ayi kerieec nu nɔm nhial ebɛn, kak e ro jɔt ku cakki ater ne ŋiny de Nhialic, ku jɔku ke yok tak e wopiɔth ebɛn tɔ ye lim bi kede Kritho aa piŋ;
ku buk rot dap guoor e rɛɛc reece kɔc piŋ ebɛn, te ca wek guɔ thok e piŋ piɛŋ wek kaŋ.
Yak kaŋ woi ne kede tic ee kek tic biic? Na de raan ŋic rot nɔn ee yen kede Kritho, e be cooke thɔɔŋ e yepiɔu aya, yan, Acit man ee yen kede Kritho, yen aye wok ka ke Kritho ayadaŋ.
Ku na ya cak ro leec alal ne riɛlda (riɛl e gɛme Bɛnydit wook ne kede kuɛt bi wo week kueet, ku acie kede dhuur bi wo we dhuoor piny), ke yɛn cii dueer yaar:
ku yɛn cin piɔu luɔi ban we tɔ riɔc ne awareek.
Ade kɔc e ye lueel, yan, Awareekke aciɛthki ne loŋ thiek, ku arilki; ku tau de yenguop akɔc, ayi jamde acin nɔm.
Raan luel en aya, tɔ ciet enɔm e kene, yan, Tau tɔu wok e jamic e awareek yiic te liiu wok, yen aye tau bi wo tɔu e luɔiyin aya te nu wok.
Ku wo cii woyiic dueer mat ne kɔc kɔk kɔc e rot leec kapac, ku cuku ro dueer thɔɔŋ e keek aya: ku keek, them ee kek ro them kapac, ku thooŋ ee kek ro thɔɔŋ kapac, acin kek niim.
Ku wook, wo cii ro bi leec abuk akeu lii nɔm, wo bi pek e akeu nɔm aken e them ci Nhialic yien wook, aken ci ɣet tede week aya.
Wo ken akenda lii nɔm, cit man ken wo ɣet tede week: wok e ɣet tede week aya ne guieer ee wok welpiɛth ke Kritho guiir:
wo cii rot dueer leec e ka nu e akenda baŋtni, kek aye luɔi e looi kɔc kɔk; ku kene aŋathku, yan, te ci gamdun ro guɔ ŋuak, ke riɛlda bi dit e weyiic, ku ŋootku ke wo pek akenda, agoku lɔ tueŋ,
ku jɔku welpiɛth guiir ayi bɛi nu e weniim tueŋ, ku cuku rot e leec ne luɔi ci raan daŋ kɔn looi, luɔi cuk yok e thok.
Ku raan e ro leec, e ye ro leec e Bɛnyditic.
Acie raan lec rot etok yen piɛth egɔk, ee raan leec Nhialic yen apiɛth.
Adi miɛt piɔu te guom wek kedi tethiinakaŋ e piɔl piaal ɛn piɔu: yeka, guomki tei.
Yɛn de yic tiɛɛl e biakdun, tiɛɛl e Nhialic: luɔi can week tɔ thiak e mony tok, luɔi ban week gam Kritho cit man e dhueny ɣerewic.
Ku yɛn riɔc, luɔi bi en dɛ te ba wek piɔth riaak, cit man ci kerac Kawa math ne rueenyde, aguɔki piɔth cuo bɛ aa tok, ku caki yiic be ɣɛɛr ne Kritho.
Ku na raan bɔ enɔɔne, ten ee yen kede Kritho daŋ guiir, Kritho ken wo kede guiir, ku te yok wek wei mɛɛn wei kɛnki yok waan, ayi welpiɛth mɛɛn wel kɛnki gam waan, aduɛɛrki yien guum apiɛth.
Ku e yapiɔu, yɛn kit woke tuuc ebɛn, acakaa tuuc dit nu tueŋ alal, acin kethiin tau ɛn cieen.
Ku na cakaa yɛn e dɛk e jam, ka cin ke dak ɛn ne ŋinydekaŋ; ee yic, kene acuk cok e nyuth wok e week ne kerieecic ebɛn.
Ca kerac looi, e kuur can ro kuɔɔr piny, luɔi bi we jat nhial, nɔn can welpiɛth ke Nhialic guieer week youyou?
Yɛn e weu ke kanithɔɔ kɔk rum, waan nɔɔm ɛn ariop tede keek, luɔi ban kedun aa looi;

ku te waan rɛɛr ɛn wo week, ekool e de en ke dak ɛn, acin raan ca miɛn; ken ee ya dak, aye mithekɔckuɔ yinn ɛn aba kuɛth, mithekɔckuɔn e bɔ Makedonia; ku yɛn aa ye ro muk ne kerieec ebɛn aguɔ we cuo min, ku yɛn bi ro muk e muŋdi.
Yic de Kritho acath ke yɛn, acin raan bi a pɛn lɛc lɛɛc ɛn rot ne cooke, piny de Akaya nɔm ebɛn.
Ee kaŋo? ee luɔi can we nhiaar? Nhialic en aŋic en.
Ku ke luɔɔi enɔɔne, yen aba ya looi, luɔi ban ke bi kek ro leec tɛɛm wei tede kɔc kɔɔr en; ago, an, lecki rot, ka bik ro yok akit e wook.
Kɔc cit e kake kek aye tuuc aluɛth, kɔc e luui ecueer, agoki rot aa puk tɔki rot e tuuc ke Kritho.
Ku acie kegai en ekene; Catan guop ee ro puk tɔ rot e tuny e ɣɛɛrepiny tunynhial.
Ku acie kedit, te ye kɔc e kede looi ro puk tɔki rot e kɔc e ka ke piathepiɔu looi; ku kedɛn bik yok rial abi roŋ ke luɔiden.
A bɛ lueel, yan, E cin raan e ya tɔ ye raan mum nɔm; ku na yak a tɔ ye raan mum nɔm, ke we dɔm ɛn tei, cit man e raan mum nɔm, ke ya bi ro leec tethiinakaŋ.
Ke luɛɛl enɔɔne, acie kede Bɛnydit en a luɛɛl ɛn en, ku ja ro leec aya, ke yan ci nyin riɛl.
Enɔn juece kɔc e rot leec ne kede guop, ke yɛn aya yɛn bi ro leec.
We ŋic kede kɔc mum niim guum, luɔi aa wek kɔc pel niim.
Te tɔ raan week e him, ayak guum, ayi te ciɛme raan week, ayi te rume raan week, ayi te bieeke raan wenyin.
Yɛn jam e jam e raan cin naamde, acit man kɔc wok. Ku na de ke bi raan enyin riil, (yɛn jam e jam e mumnɔm), ke yɛn ci anyin riil aya.
Kɔcke yek Eberuu? ayi yɛn aya. Yek kɔc ke Yithrael; ayi yɛn aya. Yek kɔth ke Abraɣam? ayi yɛn aya.

Yek kɔc e ka ke Kritho looi? (Yɛn jam cit raan jiɛɛm wei) a waar ke; e luɔi tuc, en a waar ɛn keek, ku waar keek e dui cii dueere kueen, ku many e ya cool e mɛce yɛn e aloc yiic, ku ŋiny aa yɛn cool e ŋic rot thuɔɔu.
Tede Judai yɛn aa dui raandhic e wɛt kathierŋuan a lɔ tok liu.
Yɛn aa dui e thieec raandiak, ku biooke yɛn e kur raantok, yɛn aa tuke wei abelic raandiak, wɛɛr tok ku cool tok ke ya tɔu abapditic;

awaar ke ne keny aa yɛn cool e keny, ku riɔɔc wiir, ku riɔɔc de kɔc e kɔc luc, riɔɔc e jurda, riɔɔc e juoor, riɔɔc nu e panyditic, riɔɔc nu e jɔɔric, riɔɔc nu e abapditic, riɔɔc nu e mithekɔckuɔn cuɛɛr yiic.
ne luɔi tuc e kɔc doony, ku luɔi e kɔc nɔk, ne ruu aa yɛn ruu yin ecaŋɣɔn, ku ne cɔŋ e ya nɔk ayi reu, ku ne nyaŋ aa yɛn cool e nyaŋ rot e kecam, ku ne wiir e ya nɔk, ku cin aa yɛn kɔu cien lupɔ.
Jaki kake pɔl, ee ka nu biic tei, lɔ ken e ya miɛn piɔu e akooinyiin kedhie, yen aye diɛɛr aa yɛn piɔu diɛɛr e kanithɔɔ kedhie.
Eeŋa kɔc, ku ca kɔc ayadaŋ? de raan ci tɔ wac kaŋ, ku ca piɔu bi tuoc?
Na de ke ban ro dhil leec, ke yɛn bi ro leec ne kak aa yɛn ke kɔc e ke.
Nhialic Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, yen aŋic en nɔn can lueth tor, yen acath ke athiɛɛi aɣet athɛɛr.
ku yɛn aa luɛiye piny e dionyic e aweernyin, awer nu e panydit kɔu, aguɔ ban e yecin.
Yɛn bi ro dhil leec, acakaa yen e cii piɛth; ku yɛn bi bɛ bɛn te nu jam de tiŋ can Bɛnydit tiŋ ku nyuth ci en ro nyuoth ɛn.

Yɛn ŋic raan nu e Krithoyin, ku run acik teek kathieer ku ŋuan (nɔn e ciɛth en keke guopde, ku nɔn e cii en cath ke yen, a ja kuc; aŋic Nhialic), raane, yen raan wen luɛɛl aci gap nhial ɣeet paan e Nhialic ya.
Yɛn ŋic raan cit ekene (nɔn e ciɛth en keke guopde, ku nɔn e cii en cath ke yen, a ja kuc; aŋic Nhialic),
raane aci gap nhial ɣeet Paradeitho, ago wel piŋ wel e raan pɛn luɛl lueel en ke.
Ne kede raan cit ekene, en a ban ro leec: ku ne kedi guop yɛn cii ro bi leec, ee kɔc kaac ɛn tei, en a ban ro leec.
Ku na cak piɔu dɛ luɔi ban ro leec, ke yɛn cii dueer aa raan mum nɔm; luɔi ee yen yic en ba lueel; ku enɔɔne aca pɔl, ke cin raan bi a tɔ ye raan dit awar tiŋ tiŋ en ɛn, ku wɛɛr ke ci piŋ ne kedi.

Ku luɔi can ro tɔ dit e dit cii piɛth, ne biak de ka juec gook ci nyuoth ɛn, yen aa yike ya guop kou kon nu e riŋic, ee tuny e tuuce Catan bi yɛn aa biɔɔk guop, ke ya cii ro bi tɔ dit e dit cii piɛth.
Guɔ Bɛnydit lɔŋ ne biak de kene raandiak, ke bi jal e yaguop.

Go lɛk ɛn, yan, Dhueeŋ de yɛnpiɔu ee yi kiet: riɛldien dit aye tɔ ye dikedik ne kɔc kɔɔce raan. Yen a ban rot aa leec ke ya mit piɔu alal ne kɔc aa yɛn guop kɔc, ke riɛldiit e Kritho bi reer e yaguop.
Yen a ya yɛn piɔu miɛt e kɔc kaac ɛn, ku ne lɛɛt ee ya laat, ku ne dak aa yɛn dak e kaŋ, ku ne yoŋ ee ya yɔŋ, ku ne dhal ee kaŋ a dhal, ne biak de Kritho: kool kaac ɛn, en aye kool riɛl ɛn.
Yɛn ci aa raan mum nɔm e lɛc lɛɛc ɛn rot; we ci a dhil tɔ lec rot; adi cak a leec week: acin ke ye tuuc a woor acakaa tuuc ditt nu tueŋ alal, acakaa yɛn e cinkedaŋ.
Ŋiny dueere ye ŋic egɔk nɔn aa yɛn tuc e guɔ looi e weyiic ne yic ne guom de kerieec ebɛn, ku ne gook ku ka gɛiye kɔc, ku luɔi ril ebɛn.
Ee kaŋo ke ci we tɔ kor e kanithɔɔ kɔk, ee luɔi e can kakun e cam lɛɛny etok, yɛnguop; palki yɛn e ke ca wooce.

Tieŋki, yɛn e cok aa rou tede week, ku dieŋden ki, yɛn jɔ bɛn; ku kakun aca ke bi aa cam lɛɛny: acie kakun ke kaar, ee wegup wek kaar; acii piɛth luɔi bi mith kɔc e dhieth ke kuɛt kaŋ, ee kɔc e dhieth mith kek aye kaŋ kuɛt mithken.
Ku yɛn bi kaki aa riaar piny ke ya mit piɔu, ku ja ro riaar piny aya ne biak de weikun; ciɛk an, dit nhieer nhiaar ɛn week ke yen aye nhieerduon nhiaar wek ɛn tɔ koor.
Ne tɔu aya tei, wek kɛn miɛn; ee rueeny en e dam ɛn week, en luɛlki?
De raan toŋ ca tɔ cam week, e kɔc ca tuoc week yiic?
Yɛn e Tito lɔŋ, an, bi lɔ tede week, ku ja mɛnhkenedan daŋ tooc keke yen etok. De ke ci Tito we cam? e wo cii cath e piɔn toŋe? E wo cii cath e kueer toŋr?
Cook daŋ, yan, yak lueel, yan, konyku rot e weniim ecaŋawen? Wok jam e Nhialic nɔm e Krithoyic. Ku ka luelku kedhie, wek kɔc nhiaar, ee ka ke kuɛt bi we kueet.

Yɛn e riɔɔc, miak, te can bɛn, ke we cit ka ca bi yok aye kɔc kaar e yapiɔu, ku yɛnguop yɛn cit ke caki bi yok aye raan kaarki e wepiɔth; yɛn e riɔɔc e ciet ke bi dɛ ateer nu, ku tiɛɛl, ku agooth, ku tɔɔŋ, ku ciek de thok, ku atuum, ku lɛc leece kɔc rot, ku awuoou;

ku yɛn e riɔɔc, miak, te la yɛn bɛ bɛn, ke Nhialicdi acit ke bi a tɔ yaar e weyiic, ku yɛn cit ke bi kɔc juec dhieu kɔc ci kerac kɔn looi, ku kenki kepiɔth puk ne luɔidɛn col ku kɔɔr ee kek diaar kɔɔr ku dhoomden, luɔidɛn rɛɛc e cik aa looi.
Yɛn e cok aa rou, ku dieŋden ki, ban jɔ bɛn tede week. Ne thok ke caatɔɔ kaarou ayi diak abi jam lɔ kimpiny ebɛn.

Aca lɛk week waan, ku kan lɛk week tueŋ enɔɔne raanrou, cit nɔn nuo yɛn woke week; ku iiu liɛɛu ɛn enɔɔne, en a gaar ɛn kɔc ci kerac looi ɣɔn, ku gaar kɔc kedhie, yan, Te la yɛn bɛ bɛn, ke we ca bi pɔl;
luɔi kaar wek ŋiny ba wek e ŋic egɔk nɔn jiɛɛme Kritho e yathok; ku yen acii kɔc tede week, aril alal e weyiic:
acakaa yen e ci piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu ke kɔc guop, ka piir enɔɔne ne riɛl diit e Nhialic. Ayi wook aya, wok kɔc ne yeyic, ku wo bi piir ne yen etok ne riɛl diit e Nhialic, riɛl nu tede week.
Thɛmki rot nɔn rɛɛr wek e gamic egɔk; caathki rot. Kuocki wegup nɔn nu Yecu Kritho e weyiic, te ca wek e kɔc ci rɛɛc tei?
Ku ya ŋath ba wek wo ŋic nɔn cii wok e kɔc ci rɛɛc.
Ku enɔɔne yɛn laŋ Nhialic e biakdun, ke cin kerɛɛc bak aa looi; acie luɔi bi wo tɔ ye kɔc piɛth, ee luɔi ba wek kepiɛth aa looi, na cakaa wok e ye tɔ cit kɔc ci rɛɛc.
Wok cin ater dueerku lueel e yic, ee man mɛt wok e yic, en anu.
Wok e piɔth miɛt, te ee wok kɔc, ku riɛlki: ku cook ee wok lɔŋ aya, ee luɔi ba wek piɔth dikedik.
Yen a gaar ɛn kake ke ya liu e weyiic, ke we ca bi dhil nen e nen rac miak te can bɛn, ago riɛl cii Bɛnydit gam ɛn, ago aa kede yin de kaŋ, ku acie kede dhuur e kaŋ piny.
Cook cieen, mithekɔckuɔ, yak piɔth miɛt. Yak piɔth dikedik; yak wepiɔth riit; yak tɔu ne piɔn tok; yak reer ediu: ku Nhialic de nhieer ku mat abi reer ke week.
Thiecki rot wapac ne ciem ɣeric.
Wek thieec kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie.
Dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu, ku nhieer e Nhialic, ku maath de Weidit Ɣer, e ye tɔu keke week wedhie. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, tuc, (ku ca ye tuny e kɔc, ku acie raan en ee toc ɛn, ee Yecu Kritho, keke Nhialic Waada, Raan e jɔt en e kɔc ci thou yiic),
