yɛn woke mithekɔckuɔn tɔu ne yɛn etok, awarek en gɛɛrku kanithɔɔ ke Galatai.
E dhueeŋdepiɔu keke mat e ke tɔu ne week, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada, ku Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho,
raan ci ro gaam ne biak de karɛc cuk looi, luɔi bi en wo luok ne pinye nɔm enɔɔne, piny rɛɛce, ne kede piɔn e Nhialic Waada:
e dhueeŋ e ye tɔu keke yen aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.
Yɛn gai e ke ca wek ro dap guɔ rat wei wakya e Raan lɔɔm Raan ci we caal e dhueeŋic dhueeŋ de Kritho piɔu, lak welpiɛth kɔk gam:
ku acin welpiɛth kɔk nu, wel yith; ku ade kɔc e week tɔ diɛɛr e wel, akɔɔrki luɔi bi kek welpiɛth ke Kritho puk kɔɔth.
Ku na cakaa wook, ku na cakaa tuny bɔ nhial, te de en raan guiir week welpiɛth mɛɛn pei, wel cii thoŋ ke wel waan guiirku week, ne bi guop dɛ aciɛɛn.
Acit man e ke cuk kɔn lueel waan, aba bɛ nyɔkic, aleyɔɔ, Te de en raan guiir week welpiɛth mɛɛn pei wel cii thoŋ ke wel waan cak noom, ne bi guop dɛ aciɛɛn.
Kaar luɔi bi kɔc piɔth miɛt ne yɛn enɔɔne, ku ye Nhialic? kaar luɔi ban kɔc kɔc nyiin? Tee ya ŋoot ke ya ye kɔc kɔc nyiin, adi ca ye lim de Kritho.
Ku enɔɔne, we ta ŋic ekene, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Welpiɛth ca guiir waan, aciki e ka ke raan.
Ku aake ca yok tede raan, ku kene ya wɛɛt aya, ee nyuuth ci Yecu Kritho a nyuooth tei.
Wek e taudi piŋ taudien aa yɛn tɔu ɣɔn e lam e Judaiyic, lam ee kek Nhialic lam, luɔi aa yɛn kanithɔ de Nhialic yɔŋ e yoŋ rac etaiwei, ku riaar:
ku yɛn e kɔc juec riic wok woor ne lam de Judai, luɔi aa yɛn yic lɛth alal ka waar keek ne kede ciɛɛŋ thɛɛr e kuarkuɔ.
Ku Nhialic, Raan ci a tɔɔu pei ne maar yac, go ya cɔɔl ne dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu, te ci en piɔu miɛt,
luɔi bi en a nyuoth Wende e yapiɔu, ke yɛn bi welkɛn piɛth aa guiir e Juoor yiic; ku enɔnthiine yɛn ken loŋ guiir woke kɔckuɔ:
ku kɛn lɔ Jeruthalem te nu kɔc e ye tuuc ɣɔn ŋuɔɔt ɛn; ku yɛn e jal ke ya lɔ Arabia; na wen, ke ya be yanɔm pɔk Damathko.
Na wen, aca run lɛɛr kadiak, ke ya lɔ Jeruthalem kɛny Petero, aguɔ reer wo yen e akool kathieer ku dhic.
Ku acin tuny daŋ ca tiŋ, ee Jakop etok, manhe e Bɛnydit.
Ku ka gaar week enɔɔne, di, yɛn cii lueth tor, aŋic Nhialic.
Na wen, ke ya lɔ piny de Thuria ku Kilikia.
Ku yɛn ŋoot ke ya kuc guop e kanithɔɔ ke Judaya, kanithɔɔ nu e Krithoyic:
acik kedi piŋ tei, yan, Raan waan e wo yɔŋ, yen aye kɔc guieer gam enɔɔne, gam waan ee riɔɔk;
agoki Nhialic leec ne kedi.
Na wen, aci run wan kathieer ku ŋuan, ke ya be lɔ Jeruthalem woke Baranaba etok, ku wo cath woke Tito ayadaŋ.

Ku yan e lɔ ne kede nyuuth ci a nyuooth; aguɔ welpiɛth lueel e keniim welpiɛth aa cool e guiɛɛr ɛn keek e Juoor yiic; aa ke luɛɛl e kɔc de naamden niim kapac te cin kɔc, nɔn bi en yien aa ɣɔric, yen ke luɔɔi, ayi ka ca looi ɣɔn nɔn ee kek ɣaar yiic ayadaŋ.
Ku acakaa Tito akene dhil tɔ cuel ayadaŋ, ku ye Giriki:
ee jam de mithekɔckuɔn kɔk aluɛth, kɔc ci bɛn thin ecueer, en aa jɛi wok e cuɛlde, ayek cathda bɛn neem, cath ciɛth wok e kede yenhda e Kritho Yecuyin, luɔi bi kek wo tɔ ye liim.
Ku akenku ke tɔ tiam wook, buk aa reer e loŋdenic, acin thaar tok; luɔi bi yic de welpiɛth aa tɔu ke week.
Ku kɔcke kɔc ci tɔ ye kɔc de naamden, (acakaa kek e ye ŋo, acakaa kek e dit ku acakaa kek e kor, akitki tede yɛn: Nhialic acin raan e rieu guop) kɔcke kɔc ci tɔ ye kɔc dit acin loŋ daŋ cik lɛk ɛn:
acie yen, ku te ci kek e tiŋ, nɔn ci guieer taau e yacin guieer ban welpiɛth guieer kɔc kene cueel, acit man ci guieer bi en aŋueel guieer taau e Petero cin,
(ku Raan waan e luui keke Petero ne kede tuoc ci e tuoc aŋueel, yen aaye luui keke yɛn ayadaŋ ne kede Juoor);

na wen, te ci kek dhueeŋ ŋic dhueeŋ ci gam ɛn, ke yi Jakop, ku Kepath, ku Jɔn, kɔc ci tɔ ye meen ke kanithɔ, ke ke gɛm wook cin cueec ke maath, wo woke Baranaba, yan, buk lɔ tede Juoor wook, ku leki tede aŋueel;
ee cooke etok tei, yan, taŋ bi wok kɔc kuany nyiin aa tak; ku yen ecook mane guop aa ya yɛn cool e lethic e ye.
Na wen, aci Petero bɛn Antiokia, ke ja jɔɔny e yenɔm, luɔi de yen yeth gaak.
Ɣɔn ŋoote kɔc kɔk e ke ken bɛn tede Jakop, aa ye cam keke Juoor etok: na wen, aci kɔcke bɛn, ke jɔ enɔm dak cieen, go ro tɔɔu pei, ne riɔɔc ee yen riɔɔc e aŋueel.
Ago Judai kɔk ayadaŋ luui erueeny ne yen etok; arek abi Baranaba thɛl wei ne rueenyden aya.

Na wen, aca reerden tiŋ, nɔn cii en e reer piɛth reer roŋ ke yic de welpiɛth, ke ya ja Petero yɔɔk e kɔc niim kedhie, yan, Yin, yin ee Judai nɔm, te reer yin e reer e Juoor ku cii cit reer e reere Judai, eeŋo e yin Juoor dhil tɔ rɛɛr e reer e Judai?
Wok kɔc ci dhieeth ke wo ye Judai, ku wo cie Juoor e karac looi,

aŋicku nɔn kene raan tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne luɔi de loŋ, ee gam de Yecu Kritho etok, en ee raan tɔ piɛthpiɔu, ayi wok ayadaŋ, wo e Yecu Kritho gam, luɔi bi wo tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne gam ci wo Kritho gam, ku acie ne luɔi de loŋ: ne cin cin en raan toŋ bi tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne luɔi de loŋ.
Ku enɔɔne, te kɔɔr wok luɔi bi wo tɔ piɛthpiɔu e Krithoyic, ku wo wogup, wo ci yok a ye kɔc e kerac looi ayadaŋ, ke Kritho ee raan e kede kerac looi? Acie yen!
Ku te can kake bɛ yik, ka waan ca ŋaany, ke yɛn e ro tɔ ye raan e kaŋ wooc.
Ku ne loŋ yɛn ci guɔ thou ne kede loŋ, luɔi ban piir ne kede Nhialic.

Yɛn ci piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu woke Kritho etok; ku yɛn ŋoot ke ya piir; ku acii be aa yɛn, ee Kritho en piir e yaguop: ku piir pieer ɛn e guopic enɔɔne, ee gam en a pieer ɛn, gam aa yɛn Wen e Nhialic gam, raan e nhiaar ɛn, ago ro gaam ne biakdi.
Yɛn cii dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu e tɔ cin naamde: ku te bi piathepiɔu tede loŋ, ke thon e thouwe Kritho ee ɣɔric.
Wek Galatai mum niim oou, eeŋa ci we thueeth, ba we yin cuo piŋ, wek kɔc cii Yecu Kritho taau e weniim edei, ke ye piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu?
Ee cooke yetok en a kaar luɔi ban e piŋ tede week, Cak Weidit yok ne luɔi de loŋ, ku cak ke yok ne piŋ ca wek e piŋ, aguɔki gam?
Mum mɔɔm weniim ka? nɔn ca wek gamdun gɔl e Wei yiic, bak thol e guopic enɔɔne?
Ee ɣɔric en e guoom wek kajueec cit ekake? ku cie ɣɔric en e guom wek?
Raan e week yien Weidit enɔɔne, ku ye luɔi ril looi e weyiic, ee luɔi de loŋ en e ye yen e looi, ku ye looi ne gam de ke ci piŋ?
Acit man ci Abraɣam Nhialic gam, ago tɔ ye piathepiɔu tede yen.
Yen ŋiɛc wek cooke, yan, Kɔc ke gam kek aye mith ke Abraɣam.
Ku kecigɔɔr, te ci en e kɔn tiŋ nɔn bi Nhialic Juoor tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne gam, ke jɔ welpiɛth kɔn guieer Abraɣam, yan, Juoor ebɛn abi thieei ne yin.
Ago kɔc ke gam agoke guɔ thieei ne Abraɣam etok, raan ŋic gam.
Ku kɔc ke luɔi de loŋ kek atɔuki e aciɛɛnic kedhie: luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan ebɛn raan cie cool e dot ka ci gɔɔr e awarek de loŋic kedhie, bi keek aa looi, ka ci cieen.
Ku cin cin en raan ci tɔ piɛthpiɔu ne loŋ e Nhialic nɔm, yen aye tic egɔk: luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan piɛthpiɔu abi piir e gam;
ku loŋ acie kede gam: ku aye gɔɔr, yan, Raan e keek looi, yen abi piir e keyiic.
Kritho aci wo wɛɛr bei e aciɛɛn e loŋic, luɔi ci e tɔ ye aciɛɛn ne biakda: luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Raan ebɛn raan nɔɔk e tim nɔm, ka ci cieen:
e luɔi bi athiɛɛi de Abraɣam bɛn e Juoor gup ne Yecu Kritho; ku luɔi bi wo kaŋ yok ka ci kɔn lueel, yan, bi ke gam wook, kek aye Weidit, ne gam gɛm wok.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, yɛn jam e jam e kɔc tei: Loŋ ci mac, acakaa yen e ye loŋ e raan tei, te ci e mac egɔk, ka cin raan bi e tɔ cin naamde, ku acin raan bi wel kɔk taau thin.
Ku ka ci kɔn lueel, an, bi ke gam en, ayeke lɛk Abraɣam keke kaude. Aken lueel, yan, Aba ke gam kɔth, cit nɔn juec kek; ee tok en e lueel, yan, Aba ke gam kaudu, yen aye Kritho.

Tharde ki yen a luɛɛl, yan, Loŋ ci mac ɣɔn, loŋ ŋoote Nhialic ke kaac thin egɔk, yan, ee kede Kritho, acii dueere tɔ cin naamde ne loŋ de Mothe, loŋ ci yien kɔc e loŋe cok, wen ci en run lɛɛr bot kaŋuan ku thierdiak, ku ke ci kɔn lueel, an, bi gam en, acii loŋ de Mothe dueer tɔ cin naamde.
Ku ke bi lɔɔk lak e kɔc, te bi en ne loŋ, ka cii be aa ke ci kɔn lueel, yan, bi gam: ku aci Nhialic gam Abraɣam ne luɛl ci en e kɔn lueel, yan, bi gam en.
Ku loŋ, eeŋodɛn bi looi? Aci taau thin ne biak de wac ci kɔc kaŋ wooc, aɣet te bi kau bɛn, kau ci kɔn lueel, yan, bi gam en; ku aci ŋiec guik apiɛth e tuucuhial, ku jɔ taau e raan e kɔc luk cin.
Ku raan e kɔc luk, acie raan tok en ee luook; ku Nhialic en aye tok.
Ku loŋ enɔɔne, deki ater ne ka ci Nhialic kɔn lueel, an, bi ke gam kɔc? Acie yen! ku te e de loŋ ci yien kɔc nu, loŋ dueer kɔc tɔ piir, eyic, piathepiɔu adi ci bɛn tede loŋ.
Ku kecigɔɔr aci jaŋ ebɛn mac e keracic, luɔi bi ke ci kɔn lueel, an, bi yien kɔc, ne gam ci kek Yecu Kritho gam, luɔi bi e yien kɔc ci gam.
Ku te ŋoote gam ke ken bɛn, wok ci mac, ku tit wo e loŋic, wo ci yok e wo mac aɣet kool bi gam bɛn, gam bi nyuoth kɔc elemiak.
Yen tede ka, loŋ en aye raan e wo wɛɛt cit mith, leer wook te nu Kritho, luɔi bi wo tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne gam.
Ku enɔn ci gam guɔ bɛn, ke wo cii be aa mith nu e raan e wo wɛɛt cok.
Wek ee wɛɛt ke Nhialic wedhie ne gam ca wek Kritho Yecu gam.
We wedhie, we kɔc ci baptith e Krithoyic, we ci Kritho taau e wekɔɔth.
Judai ayi Giriki aliu etene, ayi lim ayi raan e cath e kede yenhde aliuki ayi moc ayi tik aliuki aya: wek wedhie wek ee tok ne Kritho Yecuyic.
Ku te ya wek kɔc ke Kritho, ke wek ee kau de Abraɣam, ku yak kɔc bi kaŋ lɔɔk lak, acit man e ke ci kɔn lueel.
Ku aluɛɛl enɔɔne, yan, Raan bi ka ke wun lɔɔk lak, te ŋoot en ke ye meth, ka cin pɛɛk bi ye paak keke lim, acakaa yen e ye bɛny nu e kaŋ niim kedhie;
ku ye reer e kɔc cok kɔc e ye muk ku kɔc ci taau e dhien nɔm, aɣet kool bii wun lueel.
Yen acit wook aya, ɣɔn ee wok mith, wo ci tɔ ye liim buk aa tɔu e ka ke piny nɔm cok:
na wen, aci run thok, ke Nhialic toc Wende, bi dhieeth e tik, ku dhieth e loŋic,
luɔi bi en kɔc nu e loŋic wɛɛr bei, ago wo tɔ muk abuk aa wɛɛtke.
Ku luɔi aa wek wɛɛtke, ke Nhialic jɔ Wei ke Wende tuɔɔc e wepiɔth, ke ke cot, yan, Abba, Waar.
Yen ka, yin cii be ŋoot ke yi ye lim, yin ee wende; ku ten ee yin wende, ke yin ee wen bi ka ke Nhialic lɔɔk lak ne Kritho.
Ku waan kuoc wek Nhialic, wek aa ye him ke yiethkun yieth cie Nhialic ne ciɛɛŋdɛn e ciɛke keek:

ku enɔɔne, nɔn ca wek Nhialic ŋic, ku aŋuan luɔi lueel wok en, an, we cii Nhialic ŋic, eeŋo bɛ wek rot pɔk ka cin naamden, ka cin riɛl ku kuanyki nyiin, ku dɛki piɔth luɔi ba wek rot bɛ tɔ ye liimken raanrou?
Wek ee akool theek, ayi pɛi, ayi te cit nɔn e rut ku ruel, ayi run, ayak ke theek.
Yɛn e riɔɔc e kedun, akuoc nɔn ee yen ɣɔric yen naŋ can ro nak piny e luɔi ne biakdun.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, wek laŋ, yan, Yak tɔu cit man e yɛn, ku yɛn aya, yɛn e tɔu cit man e wek. Acin ke cak wac a;
ku aŋiɛcki nɔn can welpiɛth kɔn guieer week ne kɔc kaac ɛn guop;
ku them ci a them e guopdiyic akɛnki biɔɔn, ku we ken a koon; we ci a rieu cit tuny de Nhialic ku cit Kritho Yecu guop.
Athiɛɛiduon waan ci guɔ lɔ nou? Yɛn ee caatɔdun e cooke, yan, Tee cak leu e luɔi, adi cak wenyiin tuok bei, yienki keek yɛn.
Ca ro tɔ ye raan de ater ke week, nɔn can week lɛk yic?
Kɔɔr ee kek cok e kɔɔr kek week acii piɛth; ee luɔi bi ke we guoor biic, en anu e kepiɔth, ke ke bak cok e kaar wek keek.
Ku apiɛth nɔn ba wek aa cok e kaar wek kepiɛth e akoolnyiin kedhie, ku acie te nuo yɛn e weyiic tei.
Wek mithkienthiike, yɛn e bɛ rɔɔp e dhienhdun, aɣet te bi Kritho cueec e weyiic.
Yeka, yɛn dueer piɔu miɛt te nuo yɛn wo week enɔɔne, aguɔ arol puk; luɔi cɔm ɛn piɔu e kedun.
Lɛkki yɛn, wek kɔc kɔɔr reer e loŋic, cakki kede loŋ e piŋ?
Luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Abraɣam aa de wɛɛtke kaarou, tok e dhieeth e nyan lim, ku dhieth tok e nyan e cath e kede yenhde.
Ku wen e nyan lim e dhieeth e kede guop tei; ku wen e nyan e cath e kede yenhde e dhieeth e ke ci kɔn lueel.
Kake ayek kaaŋ: dieerke ayek looŋ kaarou looŋ ci mac; tok a bɔ e kuurdit Thinai, ku ye mith dhieeth ke ke ye liim, en aye Agar.
Ku Agare en aye kuurdit Thinai paan e Alarap, ku athoŋ ke Jeruthalem nu enɔɔne: ka ye tɔu ke ye lim keke mithke.
Ku Jeruthalem nu nhial ee cath e kede yenhde, yen aye maada wodhie.
Luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan, Mit piɔu, yin tiiŋ rol, tiiŋ cie dhieth; Ɣɔɔre yirol piny, cot aret, yin e tiiŋ cie rɔɔp: Mith ke tiiŋ thuoom awarki mith ke tiiŋ de monyde aretdiite.
Ku wook, mithekɔckuɔ, wok cit Yithak, wok ee mith ke ke ci kɔn lueel.
Ku acit man ɣɔn e mɛnh ci dhieeth e kede guop ee yen mɛnh ci dhieeth e kede Wei yɔŋ, yen anu yen enɔɔne aya.
Ku kecigɔɔr ee lueel adi? yan, Ciec nyan lim keke wende: wen e nyan lim acii ka ke wun bi lɔɔk lak keke wen e nyan e cath e kede yenhde.
Yen tede ka, wo cie mith ke nyan lim, wok ee mith ke nyan e cath e kede yenhde.
Cath bi wok aa cath e kede yenhda, en aa lony Kritho wook; yen kaac wek thin aril, ku duoki weyieth be tɔ rek, abak aa liim.
Wɔiki da, wek lɛk, yɛn Paulo, yan, Te bi we cueel, ke Kritho acin piathdɛn bi nu tede week.
Yeka, yɛn ee caatɔ lek raan e ro tɔ cuel ebɛn, yan, luɔi bi en loŋ aa looi ebɛn anu e yeyeth.
Kritho aci tɔ cin naamde tede week, wek kɔc kɔɔr luɔi bi we tɔ piɛthpiɔth ne loŋ, week wedhie; wek ci loony wei e dhueeŋdepiɔu yic.
Ku wook, aŋɔth e piathepiɔu wen bɔ ne gam en a yok tiit ne Weidit.
Ku ne Kritho Yecuyic cuɛl acin naamde ayi luɔi kene raan cueel; ee gam lui ne nhieer en ade nɔm.
Wek aake ye riŋ apiɛth; eeŋa e we pɛn piŋ piɛŋ wek yic?
Weŋ ci we weŋe acii bɔ tede raan e cɔl week.
Luɔu thiinakaŋ ee amiɛɛn dit tɔ piɔɔr ebɛn.
Yɛn ŋath Bɛnydit ne kedun ke cin loŋ daŋ bak dɔm: ku raan e we tɔ diɛɛr e wel abi kede yok e yenhde, acakaa yen e ye raan yindi.
Ku yɛn, mithekɔckuɔ, te ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya guiir jam de cuɛl, ke yeŋo ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya yɔŋ kɔc? yen adi ci nyaai, yen kɔth ee kɔc kɔth e tim ci riiu nɔm.
Yɛn dueer piɔu miɛt te ci kɔc e we tɔ diɛɛr e wel rot tɛɛm wei.

Ee cath ba wek aa cath e kede yenhdun en aa cɔɔle week, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ku cath aa wek cath e kede yenhdun duoki ye kuoc dɔm, taki ye ke de luɔi de guop, ku yak rot luooi cit man e him, ne nhieer aa wek rot nhiaar.
Loŋ ebɛn aye tiiŋic e jam tok, jam e lueel aleyɔɔ, yan, Yin bi raan rɛɛr ke yin aa nhiaar cit man nhiɛɛr yin rot.
Ku te ya wek rot kaac, ku yak rot cam, tiɛɛtki rot ke we cii ro bi thol wapac.
Ku aluɛɛl aleyɔɔ, yan, Cathki ne Wcidit yiic, ke we cii ka kɔɔr guop bi aa looi.
Guop ee tɔŋ cam keke Wei, ku ye Wei tɔŋ cam ne guop; ku kake ayek gɔm kapac; ku wek cii ka kaarki e wepiɔth dueer aa looi.
Ku te ye we thel e Wei, ke we cie tɔu e loŋic.
Ku luɔi de guop aye tic egɔk, kek ki; kɔɔr e diaar, luɔi col, dhoom,
lam de yieth, athuɛɛth, man mɛɛne kɔc rot, ateer, tiɛɛl, agooth, ateer ke dit, teŋ ee kɔc keyiic tek, dom de weet rac,

wui de kalei, naŋ de kɔc, win ee kɔc wit e mɔu, thueec deyin kerac, ku ka kɔk cit e kake; ka ke guop ka: ku akan lɛk week enɔɔne ne kede kake, acit man can e kɔn lɛk week ɣɔn ne keden, yan, Kɔc e ka cit e kake looi, aciki ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic bi lɔɔk lak.
Ku ka ci luɔk e Weidit, kek aye nhieer, miɛtepiɔu, mat, guom de kajuec, ŋiec reer emaath, dhueeŋ, don e kaŋ,
kuur e raan ro tɔ koor, dom de rot: acin loŋ de ater ne ka cit e kake.
Ku kɔc wen e ya kɔc ke Kritho acik guop piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu keke kak ee guop kɔɔr etok, ayi ŋɔɔŋ e ye dɔm.
Te piir wok e Wei yiic, ke wo ye cath e Wei yiic ayadaŋ.
Duku lɛc ɣɔric e kɔɔr, duku rot e jut, duku yiic e dɛ tiɛɛl e rot.
Wek mithekɔckuɔ, na de raan ci cak dɔm ne kerɛɛc ci looi, ke wek kɔc ke Wei, jaki raan cit ekene dak kueer, ne kuur aa wek rot kuɔɔr piny; ye yipiɔu woi, ke yi cii bi them aya.
E ŋɛk e ŋɛk kony ne ke nuan en, yen aba wek loŋ de Kritho aa tiiŋic.
Ku te de en raan e ro tɔ ye raan de naamde, ku acin naamde, ka mɛth rot tei.
Raan ebɛn e ŋɛk e ye luɔide yenguop thɔɔŋ e yepiɔu, yen abi en dɛ te bi en ro leec ne kede yen etok, ku acie ne kede raan daŋ.
Raan ebɛn ŋɛk abi thieec e kede luɔide.
Ku raan e weete ne wel e ye kake rɔɔm keke raan weet en etok, kakɛn piɛth ebɛn.
Duoki rot tɔ mɛthe; Nhialic acie dɔl guop: te de yen ke com raan, ke yen abi tem aya.
Raan e com ne kede guopde, ka bi kede guop tem, en aye dhiap de kaŋ; ku raan e com ne kede Wei, abi kede Wei tem, yen aye piir athɛɛr.
Ku duku wopiɔth tɔ bap ne luɔi de kepiɛth: wo bi tem ekool piɛth e tem, te ken wok bap.
Yen ee wo kɔc jɔ luooi apiɛth kedhie, e akool bi ro yok, ku kɔckuɔn ci wok gam etok abuk ke ya luooi apiɛth aretditte.
Wɔiki gaar gaar ɛn week e yacin, dit diit en nyin.
Kɔc ebɛn kɔc kɔɔr luɔi bi ke ŋic e ye kɔc piɛth e guopic, kek a dhil week tɔ cuel; ee luɔi cii ke bi yɔŋ tei ne biak de tim ci riiu nɔm tim de Kritho.
Acakaa kegup kek kɔc ci cueel, aciki loŋ e dot apiɛth ayadaŋ; akɔɔrki luɔi bi we cueel, ke ke bi rot aa leec e guopdunic.
Ku yɛn, lɛc ban ro leec aliu etaiwei, ee kede tim ci riiu nɔm etok, tim de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, raan ci ka ke piny nɔm tɔ pieete e tim kɔu tede yɛn, ku pieete ya e tim kɔu tede ka ke piny nɔm.
Ku cuɛl ayi luɔi kene raan cueel, acinki naamden e Yecu Krithoyic; ee raan ci piac cak, yetok.
Ku kɔc kedhie, kɔc e mat e cooke, e mat e ye tɔu ke keek ayi kokdepiɔu, ku e ke tɔu ne Yithiael de Nhialic.
Gɔl ekoole, ne cin raan e ya jut: yɛn cath wo pieer ke Bɛnydit Yecu ci gɔɔr e yaguop.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke weikun, wek mithekɔckuɔ. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, tuny e Yecu Kritho ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, awarek en gaar kɔc ɣerpiɔth nu Epetho, keke kɔc adoot kɔc nu e Kritho Yecuyic;
E dhueeŋdepiɔu e tɔu ke week, ku mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Thieithieei e Nhialic, Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, Raan ci wo thieei e athiɛɛi de wei ebɛn, athiɛɛi de ka ke paanhial, ne Krithoyic;
acit man ci en wo lɔc ne Krithoyic ɣɔn thɛɛr aŋoot piny ke kene cak, ne nhieer nhiɛɛr en wook, luɔi bi wok piɔth ɣɛɛr ku cin ke bi wo gɔk e yenɔm.
Aci wo kɔn meek e yepiɔu nɔn bi en wo muk tɔ wook e wɛɛt ke yenguop ne Yecu Kruho, acit man e miɛt mit en piɔu,
ne lɛc bi dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu aa leec dhueeŋ ci lakelak, dhueeŋ ci gam wook edhueeŋ ne biak de Raan Nhiɛɛr,
Raan ci wo wɛɛr bei ne riɛmde, ago wo tɔ pɛle karɛckuɔ, ne dit de dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu,
dhueeŋ ci ŋuak nyin tede wook ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn ku piathenɔm ebɛn.
Aci wo to ŋic ke nu e yepiɔu ke ɣɔn ci thiaan, ne miɛt e yenpiɔu. Yen aye loŋ ci lueel e yepiɔu,
ne kede ciɛɛŋ bi en kaŋ cieŋ kedhie, te ci piny guɔ thok, an, abi kaŋ tɔ kut niim ebɛn, tɛɛu keek e Kritho cin, ayi ka nu paannhial, ayi ka nu e piny nɔm.
Abi ke taau e Kritho cin, raan ci wo tɔ yok ka buk lɔɔk lak, ne mɛk ci wo kɔn meek cit man ci Nhialic e lueel e yepiɔu, Raan e kerieec looi ebɛn, cit loŋ ci tak e yepiɔu;
luɔi bi wok aa kɔc e dhueeŋde tɔ lec, wok kɔc ci Kritho kɔn ŋɔɔth.
Ku ye raan cak gam ayadaŋ week, te ca wek jam de yic piŋ, yen jam piɛth de kuny ci we kony wei: ku week, te ca wek guɔ gam, ke we ci gaar piɔth Weidit Ɣer, Wei ci kɔn lueel, an, bi gam wook,
yen aye biak ci kɔn gam wook tueŋ, biak de ke buk lɔɔk lak, aɣet weer bi ke ci ɣɔɔc wɛɛr bei etaitai, ke dhueeŋde bi leec.
Ku yɛn aya, te can gamduon ca wek Bɛnydit Yecu gam piŋ, ku piɛŋ nhieer nhiaar wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie,
ke yɛn cii luɛl aa yɛn thieithieei lueel ne biakdun pal, wek aa lueel rin e lɔŋdiyic;
ke Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, yen aye Wun de nɔm lɛc, ke bi we miɔɔc ne wei ke pɛlenɔm ku nyuth bi we nyuoth kaŋ, luɔi ba wek e ŋic apiɛth;
ke we bi tɔ daai apiɛth ne nyiin ke wepiɔth; bak aŋɔth ŋic aŋɔth de cɔtdɛn ci en we cɔɔl, ku ŋiɛcki dhueeŋ bii Nhialic lɔɔk lak e kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth yiic, dit diit en,
ku bak riɛldɛn dit ŋic, dit diit en alal awar kerieec, riɛldɛn diit ci nyuoth wook wok kɔc ci gam, acit man e luɔi de riɛldɛn diit agok,
riɛldɛn ɣɔn ci looi e Krithoyic, te ci en e jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, go taau e ciin cuenyde paannhial,
tenhial ya, aci miric kɔk woor kedhie alaldit, ayi ciɛɛŋ, ayi riɛl, ayi bɛɛny, ayi rin ci cak kedhie, acii e piny enɔɔne tei, ee piny bi bɛn aya, aci ke woor kedhie:
go kerieec taau e yecok ebɛn cieŋ ke, ku tɛɛu e kaŋ niim kedhie, ne kede kanithɔ,
yen aye guopde, ku ye kuɛthde, kuɛth de raan e kaŋ tɔ kueth kedhie, ka nu e kerieecic ebɛn.
Ku we cii Nhialic tɔ ɣɔɔr, wek kɔc ɣɔn ci thou ne kakuon ee yak wooc, ku ne karɛckuon ee yak looi;
karɛc yak cool e luɔɔi wek ke, ɣɔn rɛɛr wek e reer e kɔc ke pinye nɔm enɔɔne, reer e bɛnydiit cath ke rial e yomic, yen aye jɔŋ rɛɛc e luui e kɔc reec gam yiic enɔɔne.

Ku wook ayadaŋ wodhie, wok aa ye mat ne keek ɣɔn, ne ŋɔɔŋ de ka ke guop, ku wok aa ye kak e yok kɔɔr e yac looi, ayi kak e yok tak e wopiɔth; agoku aa mith ke agɔth ne ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke wo, cit man e kɔc kɔk.
Ku Nhialic Raan kok piɔu alal, ne dit e nhieer e nhiɛɛr en wook,
acakaa wok e ci thou e kakuɔn ee yok wooc yiic, ka ci wo tɔ ɣɔɔr ne Kritho etok, (ee dhueeŋdepiɔu en aci we kony wei),
ku aci wo jat nhial etok, ago wo tɔ rɛɛr etok paannhial ne Kritho Yecuyic:
luɔi bi en dit e dhueeŋ de yepiɔu nyuɔɔth wadaŋ thɛɛr ne piny bi bɛn, dhueeŋ diit war kerieec, ne miɛt mit en piɔu ke wook e Kritho Yecuyic:
ee dhueeŋdepiɔu en aci week kony wei, ne gam; ku acii bɔ tede week: ee miɔc de Nhialic:
aci bɔ ne luɔi ee raan looi, ka cin raan dueer rot leec.
Wok ee cuɛcde, ne caŋ ci wo cak e Kritho Yecuyic ne kede luɔi piɛth cii Nhialic kɔn lueel, an, buk aa cool e looi wok keek.
Yen tak we weniim ecooke, yan, Ɣɔn wek e ye Juoor ne dhien e dhiethe week, we ci tɔ ye Jur kene cueel ne jur ci tɔ ye Aŋuɛl, e guopic, ee ke ci looi e kɔc cin;

wek e cii thiaak e Kritho ɣɔn, wek e nu pei, ku caki e diil ke Yithrael, ku wek e ye kɔc lei, aa cin kedun thin e loŋ ci macic, loŋ de ke ci kɔn lueel, an, bi gam kɔc, wek aa cin ke ŋathki, ku iiu Nhialic tede week e piny nɔm.
Ku enɔɔne ne Kritho Yecuyic, wek kɔc waan nu temec, we ci bɛɛi tethiɔk ne riɛm de Kritho.
Yen aye man mɛte wook, raan e wo mat yiic waarou, tɔ wook e tok, ago pany nu kaamda dhuoor piny,
ne nyiɛɛi ci en ater nyaai ne riŋ de yenguop, ater e loŋ de yic cok bi kɔc aa piŋ, ku ka bi kɔc aa looi; bi raan toŋ ci piac looi cak ne guopdeyic, cak ne keek kaarou, ago ke maat aya:
bi en keek maat e Nhialic kek kaarou, ne guop tok ne tim ci riiu nɔm, ne nyiɛɛi ci en ater nyaai aya.
Na wen, ke bɔ, bi jam de mat bɛn guieer week, wek kɔc e nu temec, ku guiir kɔc e nu tethiɔk aya:
ku ne yen, wok waarou wo dueer ro cuot Waada ne Wei tok.
Yen enɔɔne, we cii be aa kɔc lei ku caki e buny lei, wek ee kɔc ke wun tok weke kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku yak kɔc ke dhien e Nhialic,
we ci yik e kerkeeric keerkeer e tuuc ku nebii, ku Yecu Kritho guop yen aye kuur nu e agukic kuur de naamde;
alooc ebɛn aci kieet nɔm e yen, abi dikedik, go ŋuak abi aa luaŋ diit ɣeric e Benyditic:
ku week aya, we ci yiek thin etok bak aa ɣon bi Nhialic cieŋ ne Weidit.
Yen aye yɛn raan e Yecu Kritho raan ci mac ne biakdun week wek Juoor,
te ca wek kede luɔi e dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔuwe piŋ, luɔi ci gam ɛn e kedun:
luɔi ci en a tɔ ŋic jamcimoony, ne nyuoth ci en a nyuoth kaŋ; acit man can e gɔɔr waan ne wel liaakaŋ.
Ku te kuɛn wek welki yiic, ke we dueer ŋinydi yokic, ŋiny ŋiec ɛn jam de Kritho jamcimoony;
jam kene nyuoth kɔc e rem kɔk yiic, cit man cie nyuoth tuuckɛn ɣerpiɔth enɔɔne ku nebii ne Wei dit;
jam de rom bi Juoor ke bi kɔc lɔɔk lak rɔm etok, ku luɔi bi kek aa guop tok, ku bik ke ci kɔn lueel rɔm etok e Krithoyic ne welpiɛth.
Ku yɛn ci tɔ ye raan e welpiɛthke looi, acit man ci a miɔɔc ne dhueeŋ e Nhialic piɔu ne luɔi de riɛlde luɔi e kaŋ tiiŋ yiic.
Yɛn guop, acakaa yɛn ee koor e kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie, yɛn e miɔɔc ne dhueeŋe, luɔi ban Juoor guieer ka ke Kritho, kek aye weu cii dueere gith niim;
ku luɔi ban kɔc tɔ daai apiɛth kɔc kedhie, abik thar e jamcimoony ŋic, jam ɣɔn ci moony e Nhialicic te ɣɔn ciɛke piny, Nhialic Raan e cak kerieec ebɛn ne kede Kritho;
ke pɛl e Nhialic nɔm, pɛl kithic alal, ke bi ŋic e ciɛɛŋ ku riɛl nu paannhial ne kanithɔ enɔɔne.
Yen loŋ ci lueel e yenpiɔu ɣɔn thɛɛr ne kede Kritho Yecu Bɛnydandit,
raan ee wo tɔ ril nyiin, bi wo ro cuot tethiɔk ke wo cii nyiin riɔc ne gam ci wok e gam.
Yen a laŋ ɛn week, ke we cii piɔth bi bap ne katuc e ya dhal ne biakdun, yen aye dhueeŋdun.
Yen a tuok ɛn amiɔl e Waada nɔm Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho,
Raan e ciek dhien rin kedhie, dhien nu paannhial ku dhien nu e piny nɔm,
aguɔ lɔŋ, ke bi we gam riɛl ne dit e dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu, abak riɛl e riɛldit ne Weike e wepiɔth thin;
ke Kritho bi reer e wepiɔth ne gam gam wek; ago meikun ku keerkeerdun ɣet piny e nhieeric,
ke we bi nhieer e Kritho leu ne yoŋ ba we yokic, week weke kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie, dit diit en kɔu, ku bɛɛr bɛɛr en kɔu, ku thuthde, ku bɛɛrde,
aguɔki nhieerde ŋic, nhieer war ŋinydekaŋ, ke we bi kuɛth ne kuɛth e Nhialic ɛbɛn.
Ku enɔɔne, Raan leu kaŋ e luɔi alaldit awar ka yok lip ayi ka yok tak ebɛn, ne riɛldit ee luui e woyiic,
e lɛc tɔu ke yen e kanithɔyic ne Kritho Yecu rem ebɛn aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr. Amen.
Ya ki, yɛn ee raan ci mac ne kede Bɛnydit, wek laŋ nɔn ba wek reer e reer piɛth reer roŋ ke cɔt e cɔɔle week,
ne kuur aa wek rot kuɔɔr piny, ku ne reer aa wek reer emaath, ku ne liɛɛr e wepiɔth, bak aa reer apiɛth etok ne nhieer;
yak cok e thɛm wek apiɛth ke we bi piɔn toŋ de Weidit aa muk ne duot ci we duut e matic.
Ee guop tok yen nu, ku Weidit tok, acit man ci we cɔɔl ne aŋɔth tok, aŋɔth e cɔt e cɔɔle week;
Bɛnydiit tok, gam tok, baptinh tok,
Nhialic tok, Wun kɔc kedhie, nu e kɔc niim kedhie, ku ye luui e kɔc yiic kedhie, ku nu e weyiic wedhie.
Ku wo ci yien dhueeŋdepiɔu wo wodhie, acit man e them ci miɔc de Kritho thɛm wook.
Yen a lueel en en, yan, Ɣɔn le yen nhial, ke thel ke ye kɔc mac ke mac, Ku jɔ kɔc miɔɔc ne kaŋ.
(Ku lɔ e le yen nhial, ee kaŋo? Cie ɣet ci en kɔn ɣet piny tethuth ya ayadaŋ?
Raan ci ɣet piny yenguop yen aye raan ci lɔ nhial ya aya, aci tenhial woor ebɛn aret, luɔi bi en kerieec thiɔɔŋ ebɛn.)
Go kɔk gaam aye tuuc; ku gɛɛm kɔk aye nebii, ku bi kɔk aa kɔc e welpiɛth guiir, ku bi kɔk aa kɔc e kɔc tiit ku kɔc e weet;
ne luɔi bi kɔc ɣerpiɔth a dikedik, ku ne luɔi de kuny e kɔc rot kony, ku ne kuɛt bi guop de Kritho kueet,
aɣet te bi wok ɣet wodhie ne gam toŋ ci wok gam etok, ku ne ŋiny ŋic wok Wen e Nhialic, agoku aa kɔc dit, ku buk ɣet e pek e dit de kuɛth cii Yecu kuɛth;
ke wo cii bi bɛ aa mith thiaakaŋ, mith ee yom miaŋ ebɛn, leer ke tɛɛn ku leer ke tɛɛn, yom de weet e kɔc, ne math mɛthe kɔc kɔc erueeny, ku cap kithic ee kek kɔc math.
Wok bi yic dhil aa muk ne nhieer, ku yok dit e kerieecic ebɛn te nu yen, yen aye naamda, yen Kritho guop;

ago guop dit ebɛn ne yen ne duot ci e duut apiɛth abi lɔ kuendek, ne yomnyiin ebɛn yomnyiin cath ne yen, acit luɔi ee ka ke raan guop looi ebɛn, kene ke luɔide ku kene ke luɔide, ago guop dit abi ro yik e nhieeric.
Yen a luɛɛl ɛn cooke, ke ya ye caatɔ e Bɛnyditic, an, Duoki e bɛ reer e reer e Juoor, kɔc e reer ke ke ye ɣɔric tak e keniim,
kɔc col piɔth ku liuki e piir e Nhialicic ne biak de kuny kuc kek kaŋ, ku ne riɛl ril kek niim;
kɔc cin piɔth, agoki rot gam luɔi de dhoom, bik luɔi col kithic aa looi ne ŋɔɔŋ e ke dɔm.
Ku week, we kene wɛɛt e Kritho wakya,
te ca wek jamde piŋ, ku te ci we wɛɛt ne yen, ne weet yic nu e Yecuyin:
yan, bak raan thɛɛr pɔl, ne reerduon ee ya wek reer waan, raan ci dhiap ne biak de ŋɔɔŋ de lueth ŋɔɔŋ e ye dɔm;
ku bɛki rot tɔ cak ne wei nu e wepiɔth,
ku jaki raan ci piac cak dɔm, raan cii Nhialic caal piɔu, ne caŋ e ciɛkeye ne piathepiɔu ku ɣɛɛrepiɔu, ne yic.
Yen pal wek lueth, ku yak yin lueel, ŋɛk ke raan rɛɛr ke yen, luɔi raan wok.
Gɔthki, ku duoki kerac looi: duoki akɔl tɔ lɔ piny ke we ŋoot e wek goth:
Duoki jɔŋdiit rac pɛl te bi en reer e wepiɔth.
Raan e ye kual, ne cie bɛ kual: aŋuan luɔi bi en aa luui e luɔi piɛth ne cinke, ke bi dɛ ke bi en raan miɔɔc, raan dɛk e kaŋ.
E cin jam nhiɛɛny e bɛn bei e wethook, e ye jam piɛth etok, jam dueer kɔc kueet e ke dak keek, ke kɔc piŋ en ke ke bi dhueeŋdepiɔu yok.
Duoki Weidit Ɣer e Nhialic tɔ dhiau piɔth, Wei ci we gɔɔr piɔth e keek aɣet kool e wɛɛr weere kɔc bei eliŋliŋ.
Wel tuc ebɛn, ayi ditepiɔu, ayi agɔth, ayi jam arolrol, ayi jam rac ebɛn, e ke nyiɛɛiye e weyiic, keke luɔi anyaak ebɛn:
ku yak rot theek wapac, yak piɔth kok e rot, abak rot aa pɔl, e nɛk e ŋɛk pal ke ci wooc, cit man ci Nhialic we pɔl ne biak de Kritho.
Yen dam wek tau de Nhialicic, cit mithkɛn nhiɛɛr;
ku rɛɛrki ne nhieeric, acit man ci Kritho wook nhiaar, ago ro gaam ne biakda, tɔ rot e ke ci gam Nhialic, ku nak, ago awau ci tumetum bɛɛi.
Ku bal, ayi luɔi col ebɛn, ayi wui de kalei, duoki ke tɔ luel rin e weyiic, aci piɛth tede kɔc ɣerpiɔth;
ayi jam e rɔɔth, ayi jam ɣɔric, ayi alɛɛŋ rac, aciki piɛth kedhie: aŋuɛɛne lɛc de Nhialic.

Kene aŋiɛcki egɔk, yan, Acin raan e diaar kɔɔr, ku cin tiiŋ e roor kɔɔr, ku cin raan e luɔi col looi, ku cin raan e kalei woi, yen aye raan e yath lam, acin raan e keyiic, raan bi dɛ ke bi lɔɔk lak e ciɛɛŋ de Krithoyic keke Nhialic.
E cin raan e we math e wel ɣaar yiic: agonh e Nhialic abɔ e kɔc reec gam niim ne biak de ka cit ekake.
Yen duo wek e rɔm etok ne keek;
wek aa ye cuɔlepiny ɣɔn, ku enɔɔne, wek ee ɣɛɛrepiny e Bɛnyditic: rɛɛrki e reer e mith ke ɣɛɛrepiny.
Kak e ɣɛɛrepiny ke luɔk ayek luɔi de kepiɛth ebɛn ku piathepiɔu ku yin.
Yak ka mit e Nhialic piɔu thɔɔŋ e wepiɔth;
ku duoki rot e mat ne luɔi de cuɔlepiny, luɔi cinic ke ye yok thin, aŋuɛɛn e luɔi ba wek kɔc loi en aa jɔɔny.
Ka yek looi ecueer ee ayaar te ciɛk, an, lueel ke.
Ku kaŋ kedhie, te ci ke jɔɔny, ayeke tɔ tiec ne ɣɛɛrepiny: ku te de en ke ye kaŋ tɔ tiec yen aye ɣɛɛrepiny.
Yen a lueel en en, yan, Jɔ paac, yin e raan nine, jɔt rot e kɔc ci thou yiic, ke yi bii Kritho riaau.
Yen tiɛɛt wek rot, ku yak cath aŋiɛcki, cit kɔc pelniim, duoki e cath e cath e dhan;
yak ka ke enɔɔne wɛɛr bei e keracic, ne rac rɛɛc akool.
Yen duo wek rot tɔ ye kɔc mum niim, yak rot tɔ ye kɔc ŋic kede piɔn e Bɛnydit.
Ku duoki rot e tɔ wit mɔu, ee mumenɔm bɛɛi; yak rot tɔ thiaŋ e Weidit;
yak jam wapac ne thaam ku diɛt kɔk ke Nhialic ku diɛt ke ka ke Wei, yak ket ku yak Nhialic piɔɔny e wepiɔth;
yak cool e luɛɛl wek en, yan, Thieithieei Nhialic Waada, ne baŋ de kerieec ebɛn, ne rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho;
e ŋɛk e tɔu e ŋɛk cok ne rieeu rieu wek Kritho.
Wek diaar, yak tɔu e roorkun cok, roorkun gup, acit man tau wek e Bɛnydit cok.
Luɔi ee yen moc yen aye nɔm de tik, cit man ee Kritho nɔm de kanithɔ aya, ku yen aye kony de guop.
Ku acit man tɔu kanithɔ e Kritho cok, yen acit tau dueere diaar tɔu e roorken cok roorken gup ne kerieec ebɛn.
Ku wek roor, nhiaarki dieerkun acit man ci Kritho kanithɔ nhiaar aya, ago ro gaam ne biakde;
luɔi bi en e tɔ ɣeric ewic, te ci en e tɔ piɛth, ne wɛk ci e waak e piu ne jam,
luɔi bi en e taau e yenɔm, abi aa kanithɔ deyin dhueeŋ, ke cinic kethiin rac, ayi anyinn, ayi daŋ cit e kene aliu; ku abi yic ɣɛɛr ewic ku cinic ke bi e gɔk.
Yen acit nhieer dueere roor dieerken nhiaar aya, cit man nhiɛɛr kek kegup. Raan nhiaar tiiŋde ke nhiaar rot:
acin raan ee riiŋ de yenguop maan anande; aye muk apiɛth ku ye tiit apiɛth, cit man ee Benydit kanithɔ muk ku ye tiit apiɛth;
e luɔi ee wok ka ke yenguop, ka ke riiŋde, ku ka ke yomke.
Yen abi moc wun pɔl ku pɛl man, ago ro mat ke tiiŋde, agoki aa riiŋ tok keek kaarou.
Kene ee kecimoony e kɔc dhal aret: ku yɛn jam ne kede Kritho keke kanithɔ.
Ku week, raan ebɛn e ye tiiŋ de yenguop nhiaar cit man nhiɛɛr en rot; ku tik e ye monyde rieu.
Wek mith, yak ka ke kɔc e dhieth week piŋ e Bɛnyditic: kene di, yen apiɛth.
Ye wuur rieu keke moor (kene ee cook tueŋ e loŋic cook deyic jam de ke bi gam raan),
ke yi bi tɔu apiɛth, ku yin bi piir e run juec e piny nɔm.
Ku week, wek warken e mith, duoki mithkun e cool e juot wek kegup, abik gɔth; ku yak ke muk e muŋ de Bɛnydit ayi weetde.
Wek liim, yak ka ke banykuon e week cieŋ gup piŋ, ne rieeu ku lɛthe guop, ne piɔn cinic anainai, cit man ee yen Kritho en luooiki;
duoki e luui e ke woi kɔc, cit man e kɔc e kɔc math nyiin; yak luui cit man e him ke Kritho, abak kede piɔn e Nhialic aa looi e wepiɔth thin;
yak kaŋ looi ne piɔnmit, acit man e kede Bɛnydit, acie kede kɔc:
ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek cooke, yan, Te de en kepiɛth ee raan looi, ke yen abi yok tede Bɛnydit, nɔn ee yen lim, ku nɔn ee yen raan e cath e kede yenhde.
Ku wek bany de niim him, yak luui wakie ayadaŋ tede liimkun, yak wɛi pɔl wɛi aa wek ke waai: ne ŋiny ŋiec wek cooke, yan, Bɛnydun week ayadaŋ anu paannhial, ku acin kueny ee yen kɔc kuany yiic.
Cook cieen, mithekɔckuɔ, yak riɛl e Bɛnyditic, ne riɛl diit ril en.
Yak weu ke tɔŋ taau e wegup kedhie, weu ke Nhialic, luɔi ba wek kɔɔc leu apiɛth ne ŋeeny aa wek cap de jɔŋdiit rac ŋɛny.
Wo cie wit ne riŋ ku riɛm, wok ee wit ne ciɛɛŋ, ayi riɛl, ayi banydit ke cuɔlepinye enɔɔne, ayi rɛm ke jɔɔk rac, rɛm nu tenhial, kek a wit wok e ke.
Yen naam wek weu ke tɔŋ ebɛn weu ke Nhialic, luɔi ba wek biok aa leu apiɛth ekool rac, ku te ca wek kaŋ thol kedhie, ke we bi tɔu e we kaac.
Yen aa wek kɔɔc, ke we ci weyiic duut ne thion cɔl yic, ku taauki ke ba wek weyoth kum, yen aye piathepiɔu;
ku cɛŋki war e wecok, wɛɛr ke guiɛɛk de welpiɛth ke mat;
ku awar kaŋ niim kedhie, namki kon e gam, kon ba wek tɔɔŋ aciɛɛr ke raan rac aa nɔk kedhie, tɔɔŋ de thook mac.
Ku namki akup de kunydewei aya, keke abatau de Weidit, yen aye jam de Nhialic:
ku yak cool e lɔŋ e akoolnyiin kedhie ne lɔŋ ebɛn ku pal e Wei yiic, ku yak cok e tiɛɛt wek rot e keyiic, ne ŋaŋ aa wek weniim ŋak aret ku pal aa wek pal ne biak de kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie;
ku ne biakdi aya, luɔi bi a miɔɔc e jam ban athok liep ke ya cii riɔc, aguɔ jamcimoony ɣɔn tɔ ŋic, kek aye welpiɛth,
ku luɔi aa yɛn tuny guiir keek, en a mac ɛn e joth: yak jɔ lɔŋ, ke ya bi jam e jam ban dhil jam, ke ya cii riɔc.
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi ba wek kaki ŋic, ku ŋiɛcki tau tau ɛn, we bi Tukiko tɔ ŋic kaŋ kedhie, yen aye mɛnhkenedan nhiaar, ku ye raan e kaŋ ŋiec dot ne luɔi de Bɛnydit:
ee ŋiny ba wek kakuɔ ŋic, ku muŋ bi en week muk piɔth, yen ke tuoc ɛn en week ka.
E mat tɔu ke mithekɔckuɔ, ayi nhieer keke gam, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke kɔc kedhie kɔc nhiaar Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ne piɔn agɔk. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo woke Timotheo, liim ke Yecu Kritho, awarek en gɛɛrku kɔc ɣerpiɔth e Kritho Yecuyin kedhie kɔc nu Pilipoi, keke kɔc e kɔc tht ayi kɔc e kake kanithɔ looi:
E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke week ayi mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Yɛn e Nhialicdi leec ne taŋ aa yɛn cool e tak ɛn anɔm e week,
ku lɔŋ aa yɛn cool e lɔŋ ne biakdun wedhie, ee miɛt e yɛnpiɔu yen aa yɛn lɔŋ,
ne man ca wek rot mat e welpiɛth yiic, ɣɔn kan wek gam aɣɔl ci enɔɔne. Ku cooke aŋiɛc egɔk, yan, Raan e cak luɔi piɛth e weyiic abi thol abi piath ekool e Yecu Kritho.

Ku apiɛth aya nɔn ban kene thɔɔŋ e yapiɔu ne kedun week wedhie, luɔi aa yɛn we tak e yapiɔu, ne rom aa wek dhueeŋ rɔm ne yɛn etok wedhie, ne many mɛce yɛn ayi kuny aa yɛn welpiɛth kony ke ke bi kɔɔc aril.
Nhialic ee caatɔdi, ee taŋ aa yɛn we tak aret wedhie ne nhieer e Yecu Kritho.
Ku cooke yen a laŋ, ke nhieerdun bi lɔ ke lɔ abi dit aret ne ŋinydekaŋ ku puny aa wek kaŋ ŋiec pɔɔc yiic ebɛn,
abak kapiɛth cok e ŋiɛc wek keek, ke we bi yiic awai ku cienki piɔth kerac aɣet kool e Kritho;
ke we bi thiɔɔŋ piɔth e kak ee piathepiɔu ke luɔk, kak e bɔ tede Yecu Kritho, ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok ayi lɛc.
Ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi ba wek e ŋic, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Ka ca yok acik bɛn piath agoki welpiɛth tɔ lɔ tueŋ;
ago many mɛce yɛn e biak de Kritho ago ŋic e kaldiit e bɛnydit ebɛn, ku ŋic e kɔc kɔk niim kedhie;
ku tedit e mithekɔckuɔn nu e Bɛnyditic acik piɔth riɛl ne biak de many mɛce yɛn, agoki nyiin riɛl aret ne luɛl ee kek welpiɛth lueel ke ke cii riɔc.
Kɔk ayek ka ke Kritho guiir ne tiɛɛl tei, keke ater; ku guiir kɔk ne piɔn piɛth aya.
Kɔcke ayek Kritho guiir ne teer e wel, aciki ke guiir ne piɔn agɔk, ayek lueel, yan, bik tuoc de many mɛce ya ŋuak;
ku guiir kɔcke ne nhieer, aŋicki nɔn ci a dɔm ne kuny ban welpiɛth aa kony.
Jɔ aa ŋo? Apiɛth tei, ee guieer ebɛn, nɔn ee yen rueeny, ku nɔn ee yen yin, ka ke Kritho ayeke guiir tei; ku yen a miɛt ɛn piɔu, yeka, ku yɛn bi tɔu ke ya mit piɔu.
Ne ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn en nɔn bi kene piath ne kedi, ago ya kony ne lɔŋduon aa wek lɔŋ, ku ne miɔc ci wo miɔɔc ne Wei ke Yecu Kritho,
acit man kaar ɛn en aret ku ŋaath, yan, bi cien ke ban yaar, ku yɛn bi nyin riɛl aret, ago Kritho lɛc yok e kedi enɔɔne, acit man ee yen en yok ecaŋɣɔn, ayi te pieer ɛn, ayi te thuɔɔu ɛn.
Ku tede yɛn, piir pieer ɛn ee Kritho, ku thon thuɔu ɛn ee kemit ba yok.
Ku te pieer ɛn e piny nɔm, ke yɛn bi kak e luɔidi ke luɔk yok; ku ke ba lɔc e keyiic yen a ja kuc.
Yɛn e miɛn e kaamden kaarou, yɛn cii ŋɔɔŋ de jal dɔm, jal jal ɛn aguɔ tɔu woke Kritho etok, yen aŋuan aretdit.
Ku reer ban reer e piny nɔm aŋuan tede week.
Ku ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn ekake egɔk, yen a ŋiɛc ɛn en nɔn ban tɔu, ku rɛɛr woke week wedhie, ke we bi lɔ tueŋ ku miɛtki piɔth e gam,
ago lɛc lɛɛc wek rot ne kedi, ago aa dit e Kritho Yecuyic, ne tau ban bɛ tɔu woke week.

Yak tɔu apiɛth tei, ke taudun bi aa roŋ keke welpiɛth ke Kritho; ku na miak, aca bɛn ba week bɛn tiŋ, ku na kɛn bɛn aya, ke yɛn dueer kedun piŋ, nɔn kaac wek aril ne piɔn tok, ku nɔn luɔɔi wek aret ne piɔn tok ne kede gam de welpiɛth.
Ku duoki wepiɔth e tɔ pau e kedaŋ ne kɔc dɛ wek ater. Aterdɛn ne week, yen aye ŋiny aa wek riaakden ŋic, ku ye ŋiny ba wek kunyduonewei ŋic, kuny e bɔ tede Nhialic.
Aci aa kedun ne biak aa wek Krithiyaan, acie luɔi ba wek kede Kritho gam tei, ee luɔi ba wek kerac aa guum aya ne biakde;
wit aa wek wit enɔɔne ee wit cit ke cak tiŋ e yaguop, ku acit ke piɛŋki enɔɔne nɔn wiet ɛn.
Ku na de muŋdepiɔu nu e Krithoyic, ku na de luŋdepiɔu nu, luŋ bɔ e nhieeric, ku na de maath e Weidit nu, ku na de kokdepiou nu,
ke we bi miɛt de yɛnpiɔu tɔ ye yic, ne luɛl aa wek jam tok lueel, ku dɛki nhieer toŋe, ku yak loŋ tok mat, ku cathki ne piɔn tok.
Duoki kaŋ e looi ne ater ayi lɛcderot, yak rot kuɔɔr piny, e ŋɛk e ye ŋɛk rieu awar rieeu rieu en rot.
E ŋɛk cii ka ke yenguop e ŋic kapac, e ye ka ke kɔc kɔk ŋic ayadaŋ.
Yak cath ne piɔn kit keke piɔn waan cath ke Kritho Yecu ayadaŋ;
acakaa yen e cit guop Nhialic, ke kit kit en keke Nhialic aken tɔ ye ke bi dhil muk aril, ku cii pal,
ku aci dhueeŋde pɔl, ku tɔ rot cit lim, ago dhieeth ke cit guop raan;
na wen, aci ciet guɔp raan, ke jɔ ro kuɔɔr piny, go ya raan e jam piŋ, athou en e thon rac, thon e tim ci riiu nɔm.
Yen aa jɔte Nhialic en nhial aret, ago miɔɔc e rin nu e rin niim kedhie;
bi miɔl tuk kedhie ne rin ke Yecu, miɔl ke ka nu paannhial, ku ka nu e piny nɔm, ku ka nu e piny thar,
go liep ebɛn Yecu Kritho gam, yan, ee Bɛnydit, ke Nhialic Waada bi dhueeŋ yok.

Yen ka, wek kɔckien nhiaar, acit man aa wek jam piŋ ecaŋɣɔn, ku acie te nuo yɛn etok, yak kunyduon e wei looi, kunydun guop, luɔiki abak thol ne riɔɔc ku lɛtheguop, ku bak cok e luɔɔi wek en aret enɔɔne te liɛɛu ɛn;
ee Nhialic yen ee Raan e luui e weyiic bak kaŋ aa kɔɔr ku yak ke looi ayadaŋ, ka cit ka nu e yepiɔu.
Yak kerieec looi ebɛn ke we cii piɔth e dok ku caki e teer;
ke we bi cien gaak ku cienki gup akɔɔk, mith ke Nhialic mith cii dueere gɔk e remic cii rem e cath edɔkdɔk ku ci ro yal e keracic, rem aa wek tic e keyiic cit man e mɛɛc e piny riaau,
ku yak jam e piir mɔk nhial cit man e kuthyuni, yen aban dɛ ke ban rot leec ekool e Kritho, yan, acie ɣɔric en e riɛŋ ɛn, ku yen luɔɔi yɛn.
Yeka, ku na cak weiki luooŋ e yik nɔm, ku luuŋe ke e luɔi nɔm aya, luɔiduon e gam ca wek gam, ka mit e yapiɔu, ku yɛn mit piɔu woke week wedhie.
Ku yen acit miɛt duɛɛr wek piɔth miɛt ayadaŋ, abak piɔth ayum ne yɛn etok.
Ku yɛn ŋath Bɛnydit Yecu nɔn ban Timotheo dap tuoc week, ke yɛn bi yapiɔu riit aya, te can taudun ŋic.
Luɔi cien en raan cath ke yɛn raan cit piɔu en, raan bi aa diɛɛr e kakun ne yic.
Kɔc kedhie ayek kaken gup kɔɔr kapac, ku ciki ka ke Yecu Kritho e kɔɔr.
Ku we ye piathde yok, aŋiɛcki luɔi ee yen luui keke yɛn etok ne luɔi de welpiɛth, cit man ee meth wun luooi.
Yen aŋiɛc nɔn ban e dap tooc miak, te can jamdi tiŋ, tau bi en tɔu;
ku yɛn ŋath Bɛnydit nɔn ban dap lɔ tede week yɛn guop aya.
Aca lueel tei, yan, ba Epaprodito dhil tuoc week, ee mɛnhkai, raan luui wok etok, ku yok biok etok, ku ye tunydun, raan ci a kony ne ka ci a dak;
aca tooc, luɔi ci en we tak wedhie, ku aci wei miɛt, luɔi ca wek e piŋ nɔn e de en guop juai.
Ee yic, aa de guop juai waan, arek abi duɛɛr thou; ku Nhialic aci piɔu kok ke yen, ku acie yen etok, e piɔu kok ke yɛn ayadaŋ, ke ya cii dhienepiɔu bi gieek.
Yen a kaar ɛn en aret nɔn tuoc ɛn en week, ke we bi piɔth miɛt, te ca wek e bɛ tiŋ, go dhien de yɛnpiɔu kuur.
Yen dam wek en e Bɛnyditic, ke we mit piɔth aret, ku yak kɔc cit en rieu gup;
ee biak de luɔi de Kritho, yen aa dueer en thou, aci weike kuɔɔn, ke bi ke ci nɔm dak ne kuny ca wek a kony thiɔɔŋ nɔm.
Cook cieen, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Yak piɔth miɛt e Bɛnyditic. Gaar gaar ɛn week e kamanke gup, acii yɛn e tɔ bap, ku ee kepiɛth tede week.
Yak rot tht e jɔk, yak rot tiit e kɔc e kerac looi, yak rot tiit e kɔc e rot tɔ ye aŋueel;
ku wook, wok aye aŋueel yith, wok kɔc e lam e Weidit ke Nhialic, ku yok rot leec ne Kritho Yecu, ku cuku rot e ŋɔɔth e guop.
Ku yɛn aya, yɛn de ke duɛɛr ɛn ro ŋɔɔth e guop; na de raan daŋ e ye lueel nɔn de en te dueer en ro ŋɔɔth e guop, ka waar;
yɛn ci cueel ekool ee kekbɛt, yɛn ee jur cɔl Yithrael, raan e dhien e Benjamin, yɛn ee Eberu ci dhieeth e Eberuu; ne kede loŋ, yɛn ee Parithai;
ne kede lɛth lɛth ɛn yic, yɛn e kanithɔ yɔŋ; ne kede piathepiɔu nu e loŋic, yɛn cin ke bi a gɔk.
Ku ka de naamdɛn dit tede yɛn waan, kek aca ke tɔ ye riaak tei ne biak de Kritho.

Yeka, ee yin, yɛn e kaŋ tɔ ye riaak tei kedhie, ne biak de piath war kerieec, piath de ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn Kritho Yecu Bɛnydiitdi, raan ci riaak de kaki kedhie a tiiŋ nɔm ne biakde, ku aca ke tɔ ye wɛr tei, luɔi ban Kritho yok,
ku luɔi bi a yok ke ya nu e yeyin, ke ya cath woke piathepiɔu, ku acie kedi, ke bɔ ne loŋ, ee ke bɔ ne gam, gam can Kritho gam, yen aye piathepiɔu e bɔ tede Nhialic, ne gam;
ku luɔi ban e ŋic, ku ŋiɛc riɛl diit e jondɛn ci en ro jɔt, ku ŋiɛc rom ban ka ci guum rɔm woke yen etok, aguɔ guop kit woke yen ne thon ci en thou;
nɔn bi dɛ te ba yɛn ɣet te nu jon bi kɔc jɔt bei e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Ku acie yoŋ can e guɔ yok en luɛɛl, ayi dik can guɔ dikedik: ku yɛn ŋoot e ya cop kedaŋ, nɔn de en te ban e dɔm, yen aye ke e dɔme yɛn e Kritho Ɣecu aya.
Mithekɔckuɔ, aca luel ne kede nɔn can e dɔm: ee cook tok en luɛɛl tci, yan, Ka nu cieen acan nɔm maar e ke, ku ja ro riɛɛny tueŋ te nu ka nu tueŋe,
guɔ riŋ e ya lɔ tueŋ te nu ke ci keer, ke ya bi ariop lɔ yok, ariop de cɔt cii Nhialic kɔc cɔɔl e Kritho Yecuyic, cɔt de naamde.
Yen lueel wok en wukie, wok kɔc ci dikedik wodhie; ku na de ke luɛlki pei, ke Nhialic abi we nyuoth ekene aya:
ku enɔɔne, te ci wo guɔ ɣet thin, jɔku cath e kueer toŋe, ku luelku jam toŋe.
Yak taudi dɔmic, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ku thɛkki kɔc e reer cit man e wok, wok kɔc ba wek tauden dɔmic.
Ku kɔc juec akucki reer enɔɔne, ku yɛn e keden cool e lɛk ɛn e week ecaŋɣon, ku lɛk week enɔɔne ke ya dhiau, yan, ayek kɔc de ater ne tim de Kritho tim ci riiu nɔm:
kedɛn bik yok rial ee riaak eliŋliŋ, yac en aye nhialicden, ku dhueeŋden ee yaar ee kek yaar, ayek kepiɔth tuom ka ke piny nɔm.
Ku wook, paanda ee paan nu nhial; paan ee wok Konydewei tiit thin, yen aye Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho:
raan bi wo puk gup, gup cin naamden, luɔi bi en ke cueec abik kit e guopdɛn e dhueeŋ, ne luɔi de riɛldɛndit riɛl ee yen kaŋ ŋiec taau e yecok kedhie.
Yen ka, wek mithekɔckuɔn nhiaar, ku ca we tak, wek ee miɛt de yɛnpiɔu, ku yak gol e yɛnɔm, yak kɔɔc aril wakie e Bɛnyditic, wek kɔc nhiaar.
Yɛn lek Ewodia, ku lɛk Thuntuke, yan, Yak jam toŋe lueel e Bɛnyditic.

Ku yin, yin raan luui wok etok, raan yic, yin laŋ aya, an, bak dieerke kony, aake ye luui ne yɛn etok ne welpiɛth yiic, keke Keleme aya, ku kɔc kɔk e ye wok ke luui etok, kɔc cii rinken gɔɔr e awarek de piiric.
Yak piɔth miɛt e Bɛnyditic e akoolnyiin kedhie: abɛ nyɔkic, yan, Yak piɔth miɛt.
Liɛɛr aa wek piɔth liɛɛr taki ŋic kɔc kedhie. Bɛnydit athiɔk.
E cin ke ba wek piɔth diɛɛr; ku ne kerieecic ebɛn yak ke kaarki tɔ ŋic Nhialic ne lɔŋ ku pal ku luɛl aa wek thieithieei lueel.
Ku man e Nhialic, man e kɔc dhal e ŋic kedhie, abi week gel piɔth ku gel ka yak tak e Kritho Yecuyic.

Cook cieen, mithekɔckuɔ, yan, Te de yen kak e yith, te de yen ka ye rieu, te de yen ka ye tiiŋ yiic, te de yen kaɣer yiic, te de yen ka ci lakelak, te de yen ka piɛth rin; na de piath nu, ku na de lɛc nu, takki weniim e kake.
Ka cak ŋic ku ka cak yok ku ka cak piŋ ku ka cak tiŋ tede yɛn, kek luɔiki: ku Nhialic de mat abi tɔɔu ke week.
Ku yɛn e piɔu miɛt alal e Bɛnyditic, ne taŋ aa wek ɛn tak, nɔn ci en ro bɛ piac gɔl e kecieene, we ci a tak tei ecaŋaɣɔn, ku acin kool piɛth cak yok.
Ku acie dak dak ɛn e kaŋ en luɛɛl ɛn en: yɛn e weet, ka yɛn dueer piɔu aa lɔ yum, te de en ke ya yok.
Yɛn ŋic kuur dueere ya tɔ koor, ku ŋiɛc bany ba yɛn bany: ne kerieec ebɛn ku ne kaŋ yiic kedhie yɛn ci weet egɔk, kuɛth ban kuɛth, ku guom ban cɔk guum, ayi bany ban bany ayi dak ban dak e kaŋ.
Yɛn ee kerieec leu e luɔi ebɛn ne yen, yen raan e ya gam riɛl.
Ku we ye kepiɛth looi tei, ne man ca wek mat ne yɛn etok ne ketuc dhal ɛn.
Ku cooke aŋiɛcki aya, wek Pilipoi, ɣɔn ciɛke welpiɛth, ɣɔn jal ɛn e Makedonia, acin kanithɔ daŋ ci mat keke yɛn ne kede miɔc ku ne kede nɔm, ee week wapac;
acakaa ɣɔn nuo yɛn e Thethalonika, we e kaŋ tɔ yine yɛn raanrou, ɣɔn ci kaki dak.
Acie miɔc en kaar; ee ka ye luɔk ka bi aa kakun kek a kaar, juec bi kek juec.
Ku yɛn cath wo kerieec ebɛn, ku yɛn ci bany: yɛn e kuɛth, yɛn e kaŋ yok tede Epaprodito, kak e bɔ tede week, ee awau ci tumetum, ee lam piɛth, lam e Nhialic tɔ mit piɔu.
Ku Nhialicdi abi we tɔ kueth ne kadak week ebɛn ne juec e kakɛn nu paandɛn e dhueeŋ e Kritho Yecuyic.
Ku enɔɔne, e lɛc tɔu keke Nhialic yen aye Waada, aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.
Thiecki kɔc ɣerpiɔth nu e Kritho Yecuyic kedhie. Wek thieec mithekɔckuɔn rɛɛr ne yɛn etok.
Wek thieec kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie, ku kɔc nu dhien e Kaithar acik we thieec alaldit.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke week wedhie. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, tuny de Yecu Kritho ne kede piɔn e Nhialic, woke Timotheo mɛnhkeneda,
awarek en gɛɛrku kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku mithekɔckuɔn adoot e Krithoyin kɔc nu Kolothai: E dhueeŋdepiɔu e tɔu ke week ayi mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada keke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Ayok cool e lueel, an, Thieithieei Nhialic Wun Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, ten ee wok lɔŋ ne biakdun,
luɔi ci wok gamduon ca wek Kritho Yecu gam piŋ, ku piŋku nhieerduon aa wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth nhiaar kedhie,
ne biak de aŋɔth ci kuɛt week paannhial. Ku aŋɔthe acak kede kɔn piŋ ɣɔn piɛŋ wek wel ke yin,
welpiɛth ci ɣeet tede week; acit man ci kek thiei e piny nɔm ebɛn aya, ku lokki abik juec. Ku acik luɔk e weyiic ayadaŋ, gɔl ekool ɣɔn piɛŋ wek dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu ku jaki yokic egɔk.
Acit man ca wek e piŋ tede Epapara raan e wok luui etok raan nhiaar. Ee raan adot raan e ka ke Kritho looi e biakdun;
ku yen aa lek wook nhieerduon nu e Weiditic.
Yen aye wok cool e laŋ Nhialic ne biakdun acin pek, gɔl ekool ɣɔn kɔn wok e piŋ, ke we bi kuɛth e ŋiny ŋiɛc wek kede piɔnde ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn ku ne yoŋ aa wek ka ke wei yok yiic,
ke reerdun bi roŋ keke reer e kɔc ke Bɛnydit, ke Bɛnydit bi piɔu miɛt aret. Yak luɔk ne luɔi piɛth ebɛn, ku ŋuakki wenyiin e ŋiny ŋiɛc wek Nhialic.
Yak riɛl e riɛl ebɛn, ne riɛldiit e dhueeŋde, bak kaŋ ŋiec guum ebɛn, ne liɛɛr e wepiɔth ku ne miɛtepiɔu,
abak aa lueel, yan, Thiethieei Waada, Raan ci wo tɔ roŋ ne luɔi dueer wok dɛ keda ne ke bi kɔc ɣerpiɔth lɔɔk lak, kɔc nu teɣer.
Aci wo luak bei ne riɛl e cuɔlepinyin, ku tɛɛu wook e ciɛɛŋ de Wendɛn nhiɛɛric;
Wendɛn ci wo wɛɛr bei ne riɛmde, ago wo tɔ pɛle karɛckuɔ.
Yen acit guop Nhialic Raan cii dueere tiŋ, ku ye kɛɛi e ka ci cak ebɛn;

kaŋ acike cak e yeyic kedhie, ka nu paannhial ayi ka nu e piny nɔm, ka dueere tiŋ ku ka cii dueere tiŋ, nɔn ee kek thony ke maliik, ku nɔn ee kek bany ceŋ piny, ku nɔn ee kek ciɛɛŋ, ku nɔn ee kek riɛl; kaŋ aake cak ne yen kedhie, ku aake cak ne kede.
Ku yen anu e kaŋ niim tueŋ kedhie, ku tɔu kan kedhie ne yen.
Ku yen aye nɔm de guop, guop cɔl kanithɔ; yen aye gɔle kaŋ, ee kɛɛi e kɔc ci thou yiic; luɔi bi en nu tueŋ e kerieec ebɛn.
Aci miɛt e Wun piɔu luɔi bi en tɔu ke kuɛth aret;
ago kaŋ tɔ luuke kedhie ne yen, ne luɛl ci en mat lueel ne riɛm de timdɛn ci riiu nɔm; nɔn ee kek ka nu e piny nɔm, ku nɔn ee kek ka nu paannhial, ee Wende yen aa luuk ke.
Ku week, wek kɔc ɣɔn ci tɔ ye kɔc lei ku yak kɔc de piɔth ater ne yen ne luɔiduon rac, we ci luook ne yen enɔɔne,
ne guopdɛn e riŋ, ne thon ci en thou, luɔi bi en we taau e yenɔm, ke we ɣerpiɔth ku cin gaak bi we gɔk, ku cin jany bi we jɔɔny;

te ya wek cool e reer e gamdunic, abak kɔɔc aril ku caki e dap wiiki ku te kɛn wek rot rat wei e aŋɔthic aŋɔth e welpiɛth cak piŋ, wel ci guieer kɔc ci cak kedhie e piny nɔm ebɛn; ke welpiɛth e ya yɛn kake looi yɛn Paulo.
Ku yɛn mit piɔu enɔɔne ne ka guoom ne biakdun, ku ka ci niim dak ne katuc ci Kritho guum, aya ke ke thiɔɔŋ niim e guopdiyin, ne biak de guopde, yen aye kanithɔ.
Ku yɛn ci tɔ ye raan e ka ke kanithɔ looi, ne tɛɛu cii Nhialic luɔi taau e yacin ne kedun, ba jam e Nhialic thol e guieer,
yen jamcimoony ɣɔn thɛɛr e run ebɛn ku rɛm ebɛn, ku aci nyuoth kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth enɔɔne.
Aci miɛt e Nhialic piɔu luɔi bi en keek tɔ ŋic dit de dhueeŋ de jamcimoonye e Juooric, yen aye tau tɔuwe Kritho e weyiic, ku ye aŋɔth de dhueeŋ.
Yen aye raan ee wok kede guiir, ke yok raan nen ebɛn ku yok raan wɛɛt ebɛn ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn, luɔi bi wok raan ebɛn taau e yenɔm ke ye piɔu dikedik e Kritho Yecuyic.
Ku yen aya yɛn rot nak piny e luɔi, cit man e raan wiet, ne riɛldɛn e luui e yaguop e luɔi ril aret.
Ku yɛn kɔɔr luɔi ba wek e ŋic biok diit aa yɛn biok ne biakdun, ku ne biak de kɔc nu Laodikia, ku ne biak de kɔc kɔk kedhie kɔc ken a tiŋ nyin e guopic,
ke ke bi muk piɔth, ku matki etok ne nhieer, ku ne kuɛth bi kek kuɛth ne ŋiny ŋic kek kaŋ egɔk agoki jamcimoony de Nhialic ŋic, yen aye Kritho,
raan ci ka piɛth ci kueet thiaan e yeyic ebɛn, ka ke pɛlenɔm ku ŋinydekaŋ.
Cooke en a luɛɛl, ke cin raan bi we math ne weŋ ee yen kɔc weŋ e yeiiep.
Ku yɛn, acakaa yɛn e liu guop, ke yɛn nu woke week e wei yiic, ke ya mit piɔu ne wui wɔi ɛn kut aa wek jamdun kiɛɛt ku kɔɔc kaac wek tedun aril ne gamduon nu e Krithoyic.
Yen ka, acit man ca wek Kritho Yecu Bɛnydit noom, yen rɛɛr wek e yeyin aya,
ku taki meeidun ɣet e yeyic, ku we bi yik e yeyic, ku yak kɔɔc aril ne gamic, cit man ci we wɛɛt, ku yak kuɛth e gam abak thieithieei dap aa lueel.
Yak ro tht, ke cin raan bi we puk piɔth ne nhieer e pɛl ku ne rueeny ɣɔric, ne jam thɛɛr e kɔc, ku ne jam de jɔɔk ke piny nɔm, jam cie kede Kritho.
Yen aye raan reere kuɛth e Nhialic ebɛn e yeguop,
ku we ci kuɛth e yen, raan nu e bany niim kedhie ku nu e riɛl nɔm ebɛn:
ku we ci cueel e yen ne cuɛl kene looi e raan cin, ee luny ca wek guop de riŋ luony bei, ne cuɛl cii Kritho we tɔ cuel;
we ci tɔɔu ne yen etok ne baptith, ku we ci be jɔt thin aya, ne gam ca wek luɔi de Nhialic gam, Raan e jɔt en e kɔc ci thou yiic.
Ku week, wek kɔc ɣɔn ci thou ne karɛckun, ku ne luɔi kene riiŋdun cueel, we ci bɛ tɔ piir ne yen etok, te ci en karɛckuɔ pal wook kedhie;
ku ci jam ci gɔɔr e looŋ yiic cuoth bei, ke de ater ke wook: ago nyaai e woyiic, ne pieet ci en e piaat e tim ci riiu nɔm kɔu,
ɣɔn ci en bany yak ayi riɛl, tɔ ke e ka bi kɔc woi, ago keek thel ne tiɛm ci en ke tiaam e yen.
Yen duo wek rot e tɔ jieeny raan ne kede kecam ku ne kede ka dek ayi kool e ahith, ayi pɛɛi ci wil, ayi kool e thabath:
kake ayek atiep de ka bi bɛn; ku guop ee kede Kritho.
Duoki rot tɔ pene raan ariopduon bak yok, ne kuur ee yen ro kuɔɔr piny ku lam ee yen tuucnhial lam, raan e pek e ke ci yok e nyuothic, ee rot tɔ dit e ɣɔric, ne piɔndɛn ci tuom ka ke piny,
ku cii Nɔm e muk aril, Nɔm ee guop ebɛn tɔ dit e dit e Nhialic, ne muŋ ci e muk ku man ci en ro mat ne yomnyiin ku ral.
Ku te ca wek thou ne Kritho etok, te lɔ ka ke piny nɔm, eeŋo ya wek ka lueel kɔc piŋ, cit man pieer wek e piny nɔm,
ke cit, Du ye jak; du ye thieep; du ye dɔm
(kake kedhie ee ka bi dhiap ne luɔi looiye raan keek), ayek looŋ ke kɔc tei, ku weet e kɔc?
Kake ayek rot tɔ ye ka cit ka cath e pɛlenɔm, ne lam ee raan lam e kede yenpiɔu, ku ne kuur ee raan ro kuoor piny, ku rɛɛc ee raan eguop rɛɛc muk; ku acinki naamden, ee kak e piɔu tɔ mit tei.
Ku enɔɔne, te ci we jat nhial ne Kritho etok, yak ka nu tenhial kɔɔr, te reere Kritho thin, ke rɛɛr e ciin cueny de Nhialic.
Yak wepiɔth tuom ka ke tenhial, duoki wepiɔth e tuom ka nu e piny nɔm.
Wek ci thou, di, ku piirdun aci thiaan keke Kritho e Nhialicic.
Miak, te tice Kritho piirda, ke we bi tic aya ne yen etok e dhueeŋic.
Yak ka ke wegup tɔ thou, ka nu e piny nɔm; kɔɔrediaar, luɔi col, tum ee raan epiɔu tuom ka ke piny, ŋɔɔŋ de kerac, ku wui de kalei, yen aye lam de yieth.
Ee biak de kake yen a bi agonh e Nhialic e kɔc reec gam niim.
Ku wek aya we ye reer e kɔcke yiic, ɣɔn aa wek cool e luɔɔi wek kake.
Ku enɔɔne, palki kake kedhie ayadaŋ: agɔth, ditepiɔu, racdepiɔu, lɛɛt, jam e rɔɔth e bɛn bei e wethook.
E ŋɛk cii ŋɛk e tɔɔr lueth, ne pal ca wek raan thɛɛr pɔl keke luɔide,
ku cak raan e piac cak taau abak cieŋ, raan ee bɛ cak ke bi kaŋ ŋic egɔk, ku bi ciet tau de raan e cak en.

Ku tɛɛn acin Giriki nu ku cin Judai, ku cin aŋuɛl nu ku cin raan cie aŋuɛl, ayi Jur rɛɛc e ciɛɛŋde, ayi Thekuka, ayi lim, ayi raan e cath e kede yenhde, abi cien kedaŋ, ku Kritho yen aye kerieec ebɛn, ku nu e kaŋ yiic kedhie.
Yen dam wek piɔn e dap kok, cit kɔc cii Nhialic lɔc, kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku nhiaar ke, ku damki dhueeŋ, ku piɔn koor, ku kuur ee raan ro kuɔɔr piny, ku reer emaath, ku guom de kajuec;
yak reer apiɛth etok, yak rot pɔl wapac, te de en raan de nɔm goony keke raan daŋ; acit man ci Kritho we pɔl, ke we ye rot pɔl aya.
Ku ne kake yiic kedhie yak nhieer dɔm, yen aye ken ee kaŋ mat yiic abik a dikedik.
Yak man e Kritho tɔ rɛɛr e loŋ nɔm e wepiɔth, yen ee cɔt e cɔɔle week ne guop tokic; ku yak dap lueel, an, Thieithieei.
Yak jam de Kritho tɔ rɛɛr e weyiic ne pɛlenɔm ebɛn, abak kuɛth e ye; yak rot wɛɛt wapac ku yak weniim tak ne thaam ku diɛt ke Nhialic ku diɛt ke Weidit, ku yak Bɛnydit kɛt ne miɛt e wepiɔth.
Ku na de ke luɔɔiki, nɔn ee yen jam ku nɔn ee yen luɔi, yak ke looi ebɛn ne rin ke Bɛnydit Yecu, ke we ye Nhialic Waada yɔɔk, yan, Thieithieei, ne kede.
Wek diaar, yak tɔu e roorkun cok, cit man roŋ en e Bɛnyditic.
Wek roor, nhiaarki dieerkun, ku duoki piɔth e rac e keek.
Wek mith, yak ka ke kɔc e dhieth week piŋ e kerieecic ebɛn, kene amit e Nhialic piɔu.
Wek warken e mith, duoki mithkun e jut e jam, ke ke cii piɔth bi bap.
Wek liim, yak ka ke banykun piŋ, bany ceŋ wegup; duoki e luui e ke woi kɔc, cit man e kɔc e kɔc math nyiin, yak luui ne piɔn cinic anainai, ne rieeu rieu wek Nhialic.
Na de ke luɔɔiki, ke luɔɔiki e wepiɔth thin; cit man aa wek Bɛnydit luooi, ku cakki kɔc e luooi tei;
ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek cooke, yan, Ee tede Bɛnydit, yen ba wek kaŋ lɔɔk lak ka bi aa ariopdun; ee Bɛnydit Kritho yen luɔɔiki.
Ku raan e kerac looi abi kede yok ne kerɛɛc ci looi; ku kueny bi kɔc aa kuany yiic aliu.
Wek bany de him, yak himkun gam ka roŋ e luɔiden, yak ke miɔɔc e ke kieetki; aŋiɛcki nɔn dɛ wek Bɛnydun aya paannhial.
Yak cok e cuɔɔl wek e lɔŋ, ku yak ro tiit thin ne luɛl aa wek e dap lueel, yan, Thieithieei;
ku yak lɔŋ ne biakdi ayadaŋ, ke Nhialic bi wo liep ɣot thok, ɣon e guieer e wel, buk jam de Kritho aa guiir, jamcimoony, jam ci a mac ne biakde aya;
yak lɔŋ, ke ya bi jam tɔ tiec egɔk, cit man aa yɛn en dhil lueel.
Rɛɛrki ne kɔc nu biic e reer e kɔc pelniim, ku yak ka ke enɔɔne wɛɛr bei e keracic.
Yak jamdun tɔ cath ke dhueeŋdepiɔu anandun, cit man e knin ci wac e amiiɔ, ke we bi kede raan ebɛn ŋiɛc bɛɛr apiɛth.
Taudi ebɛn abi Tukiko lɛk week, ee mɛnhkenedan nhiaar, ku ye raan e kaŋ dot e luɔi, raan ee wok him etok e Bɛnyditic.
Yen aa tuoc ɛn en week, ke we bi tauda ŋic, ku bi we muk piɔth;
yen keke Onethimo, mɛnhkenedan adot ku nhiaar, ku ye raandun. Kek abi we tɔ ŋic ka ci looi ene kedhie.
Wek thieec Aritharko raan mɛc wok etok, ku wek thieec Mak aya, wen e nyankene Baranaba (we ci yien thok ne kede; te ci en bɛn tede week, ke damki),
ku Yecu, raan cɔl Juthutho aya, keke kɔc nu e aŋueel yiic; kɔcke kapac ayek kɔc luui wok etok ne kede ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, kɔc ci a muk piɔu.
Wek thieec Epapara, raandun, ku ye raan e Yecu Kritho luooi, ee cool e nɛk rot piny e lɔŋdeyic ne biakdun, ke we bi aa kɔɔc aril, ke we bi piɔth a dikedik ku kuɛthki ne kede piɔn e Nhialic ebɛn.
Yɛn ee caatɔ de lɛth ee yen yic lɛth e luɔi aret ne biakdun, ku ne biak de kɔc nu Laodikia, ayi kɔc nu Kierapoli.
Wek thieec Luk, akim nhiaar, ku Demath.
Thiecki mithekɔckuɔn nu Laodikia, ku Numpa, ku kanithɔ nu ɣonde.
Ku te ci awareke kueenic e weyiic, taki kuen e kanithɔ de kɔc ke Laodikiayic aya; ayi week, we bi kede Laodikia kueenic aya.
Ku yɔɔkki Arkipo, yan, Ye luɔi tiit apiɛth luɔi ci yok tede Bɛnydit, aba thol apiɛth.
Thiecdien e yɛncin ki, yɛn Paulo. Takki weniim e joth mac ɛn ke. E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke week. Amen.

Yɛn Paulo, woke Thiluano, ku Timotheo, awarek en gɛɛrku kanithɔ de Thethanlonikei nu e Nhialic Waadayic, ku Bɛnydit Yecu Krithoyic: E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu ke week, ayi mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada, ku Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho.
Wok ee cool e lec Nhialic nɔm e akooinyiin kedhie ne biakduon week wedhie, ku wok ee kedun lueel e lɔŋdayic;
luɔiduon e gam ayok tak acin pek, ku takku luɔiduon e nhieer, ku aŋɔth aa wek Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ŋɔɔth ne liɛɛr e wekpiɔth e Nhialic Waada nɔm;
lonyduon ci Nhialic we lɔc aŋicku, wek mithekɔckuɔn nhiaar,
welkuɔn piɛth aake cii bɔ e weyiic ne jam tei, aake bɔ ne riɛl ayadaŋ, ku ne Weidit Ɣer, ku ne ŋiny aa wek ke ŋic egɔk; we ŋic taudan e ye wo tɔu e weyiic ne biakdun week.
Ku we ci aa kɔc ci tauda dɔmic, ayi tau de Bɛnydit, ne gam ca wek jam gam ne ketuc dhal week aret, ku ne miɛtepiɔu e Weidit Ɣer;
aguɔki aa kɔc bi kɔc taudun aa dɔmic, kɔc nu Makedonia ku Akaya ebɛn.
Luɔi ca wek jam de Bɛnydit tɔ kok abi kɔc piŋ, acie Makedonia keke Akaya kapac, gamduon ca wek Nhialic gam aci thiei e thai nɔm ebɛn; ku acin ke buk dhil lueel.
Kek gup ayek wo nyuoth lɔ ci wo lɔ e weyiic, ku wel ca wek rot wɛl Nhialic ne yiethkun yiic, bak ka ke Nhialic yic piir aa looi,
ku bak Wende aa tiɛɛt paannhial, Wendɛn ci jɔt e kɔc ci thou yiic, yen Yecu, raan ci wo luok e agonh bi bɛn.
Ku wegup, wek mithekɔckuɔ, we ŋic bɛndan ci wo bɛn e weyiic, nɔn cii en e ɣɔric:
ku acakaa wok e ci kerac kɔn guum, ku wo ye luoi kerac alal e Pilipoi, acit man ŋiɛc wek en, ke wo ŋoot ke wo ye week guieer welpiɛth ke Nhialic ne ater dit, ke wo ril piɔth e riɛl e Nhialicda.
Ku guieer ee wo wel guiir aa cinic mɛth e kɔc math, ayi jam col aa liu thin, ayi rueeny:
ku acit man ci Nhialic wo tɔ piɛth, an, bi welpiɛth taau e wocin, yen aye wok jam; acie kɔc ke yok tɔ mit piɔth, ee Nhialic Raan e wo them piɔth.
Ku acin kool toŋ ci wo wel e mɛthenyin lueel, acit man ŋiɛc wek en, ku acin wui de kalei cuk moony; Nhialic ee caatɔda:
ku acin lɛc cuk kɔɔr tede kɔc, ayi tede week, ayi tede kɔc kɔk, acakaa wek e cuk duɛɛr miɛn, luɔi ee wok tuuc ke Kritho.
Ku wo aaye ŋiec reer emaath e weyiic, cit man ee tik mithke ŋiec muk apiɛth:
ku ne taŋ ee wok week tak aret, en aa ye wok piɔth miɛt, luɔi yin wo week welpiɛth ke Kritho, ku acie keek kapac, ee weikuɔ ayadaŋ, ne nhieer ci wo week nhiaar alal.
Wek ee weniim tak, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne luɔi diit thieek yok looi: wo ye luui akol ku wakɔu, wok e cin piɔth luɔi bi wo raan tok miɛn e weyiic, agoku welpiɛth ke Nhialic guieer week aya.
Wek aye caatɔɔ, ayi Nhialic aya, ne tau ee wok tɔu e weyiic wek kɔc ci gam, taudan ɣeric ku piɛthic ku cinic gaak dueere wo gɔk:
acit man ŋiɛc wek en, guieer ee wok week guieer ku muŋ ee wo week muk piɔth, ku lek ee wok week lɛk wedhie, cit man ee wun mith jam keke mithke,
an, bak ŋiec reer e reer e roŋ ke Nhialic, Raan e cɔl week e ciɛɛŋde ku dhueeŋde.

Yen a ye wok cool e lec Nhialic acin pek, luɔi kɛn wek jam gam cit nɔn ee yen jam de kɔc tei, waan gam wek jam cak piŋ tede wook, ku acak tɔ ye jam e Nhialic, ku ye jam e Nhialic egɔk, jam e cool e lni e weyiic ayadaŋ wek kɔc gam.

Ku week, mithekɔckuɔ, we ci aa kɔc e tau de kanithɔɔ ke Nhialic dɔmic kanithɔɔ nu e Yecu Krithoyic e Judaya: ne guom ca wek karɛc mane guum ayadaŋ tede kɔc ke paandun, ka kit e ka cik guum tede Judai;
kek kɔc ci Bɛnydit Yecu nɔk ayi nebii ayadaŋ, ku acik wo yɔŋ, ku ciki Nhialic e tɔ mit piɔu, ku yek ater lueel e kɔc kedhie;
ayek wook pɛn guieer guiir wo Juoor jam e kuny bike kony wei; yen aye kek karɛcken kut niim ecaŋɣɔn: ku agɔth aci bɛn tede keek ka cin ke ye doŋ.
Ku wook, mithekɔckuɔ, nɔn ci wo jɔt e welɔm buk ceŋ roor e akool liaakaŋ, ku ye wokgup kek e jɔt acie wopiɔth, yen aa ŋɛk wok en alal e tiŋ bi wo we tiŋ nyin, we cuk tak alal:
yen aa ya yɛn bɛn tede week kɔɔr, yɛn Paulo guop, nɔn ban bɛn raantok, ku nɔn ee yen raanrou; go Catan wo peen.
Aŋɔth ŋathku ee kaŋo, ayi miɛt e wopiɔth, ayi goldan e dhueeŋ, yek kaŋo? Ciki e week, e Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho nɔm ne bɛn bi en bɛn?
Wek aye dhueeŋda ku yak miɛt e wopiɔth.
Na wen, aci cien luɔi bi wok e bɛ guum, ke luelku e wopiɔth, an, apiɛth te bi wo nyaaŋ Athenai wapac;
agoku Timotheo tooc, mɛnhkeneda, ku ye raan e ka ke Nhialic looi, raan e wok luui etok ne welpiɛth ke Kritho, acuk tooc luɔi bi en week tɔ kaac apiɛth, ku riit wepiɔth e gamduon ca wek gam;
ke cin raan bi ro yal ne biak de katuc dhal wooke: luɔi ŋiɛc wek en wegup, nɔn ee yen biak de kake yen e dɔme wo.
Ayi ɣɔn tɔu wok e weyiic ayadaŋ, acuk kɔn lɛk week nɔn bi wo kerɛɛc dhal wook guum; acit man ci en guɔ aa yic enɔɔne, aŋiɛcki week.
Yen aa tuɔɔc ɛn raan, waan ci en cien luɔi ban e bɛ guum, ke ya bi gamdun ŋic, nɔn de ke ci jɔŋ e kɔc them we yien them, ago luɔida aa ɣɔric.

Ku enɔɔne, te ci Timotheo lɔ bɛn e welɔm bi tede wook, ke bii jam piɛth jam de gamdun ku nhieerdun, ayi taŋ aa wek cool e tak wook apiɛth ecaŋɣɔn, ku nɔn kaar wek tiŋ ba wek wo tiŋ alal, acit man kɔɔr wok tiŋ bi wo we tiŋ ayadaŋ;
yen aa jɔ wok muk piɔth ne biakdun, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne ketuc dhal wook ebɛn ku ne dak e wo dak e kaŋ, ee gamdun yen aa muk wopiɔth:
wok piir enɔɔne, te kaac wek aril e Bɛnyditic.
Ee lɛc ŋo dueer wok Nhialic bɛ lɛc nɔm ne biakdun, ne miɛtepiɔu ebɛn miɛt ee wo piɔth miɛt ne biakdun e Nhialicda nɔm?
Wok e cool e lɔŋ alal wɛɛrwakɔu ku akol, ke we buk tiŋ nyin, agoku ka dak week e gamdun looi abik dikedik.
Enɔɔne, e Nhialic guop, yen aye Waada, keke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, e ke wo nyuoth kueerdan lɔ tede week:
e Bɛnydit e we tɔ ŋuak wenyiin abak kuɛth ne nhieer nhiaar wek rot, ku ne nhieer nhiaar wek kɔc kedhie, acit man nhiɛɛr wok week ayadaŋ;
luɔi bi en we tɔ kaac piɔth aril, ke cin gaak dueere we gɔk, ne ɣɛɛrepiɔu e Nhialic nɔm, Yen aye Waada, ekool e bɛn bi Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho bɛn keke kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth kedhie.

Cook cieen, wek mithekɔckuɔ, wek laŋku, ku lekku week ne Bɛnydit Yecu, yan, acit man ca wek jam yok tede wook, jam de reer ba wek dhil reer, ke we bi Nhialic tɔ mit piɔu, wek laŋku, ke reerduon piɛth bi aa cool e ŋuak enyin.
We ŋic jam cuk yien week ne Bɛnydit Yecu.
Kede piɔn e Nhialic ki, yan, ɣɛɛr ba wek piɔth ɣɛɛr, ku pal ba wek kɔɔrediaar pɔl;
we wedhie, e ŋɛk e ye guopde ŋiec dɔm ne ɣɛɛrepiɔu ku rieeu,
ku cii epiɔu tum kerac ne ŋɔɔŋ e ye dɔm, cit man e Juoor kuc Nhialic;
e cin raan bi akeu waan, ciɛm mɛnhkene e kedaŋ: luɔi ee yen Bɛnydit yen ee Raan bi ka cit ekake guoor kedhie, acit man ci wok e kɔn lɛk week ayadaŋ, ku acuk rot tɔ ye caatɔɔ.
Acie kede luɔi col en e cɔɔle Nhialic wook, ee kede ɣɛɛrepiɔu.
Yen ka, raan reec piŋ, acie raan e reec en kede piŋ, ee Nhialic, Raan ci we miɔɔc ne Weikɛn Ɣer.
Ku ne kede nhieer ba wek mithekɔckun nhiaar acin ke duɛɛr gaar week, wegup, we cii Nhialic wɛɛt, an, bak rot nhiaar wapac;
ku kene ayak looi ayadaŋ tede niithekɔckun kedhie nu Makedonia ebɛn. Ku wek laŋku, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ke nhieerdun bi lɔ ke ŋuak enyin aret;
ke we bi reer ba wek reer emaath aa cool e thɛm wek e, ku bak kakun gup aa looi, ku yak luui e wecin, acit man ci wok e lɛk week;
luɔi ba wek reer ke we lɔ piɔth gɔk ne kɔc nu biic, ku cin ke bi we dak.
Ku wok cin piɔth luɔi ba wek e kuc, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne kede kɔc ci nin; ke we cii piɔth bi jiɛth alal, cit man e kɔc kɔk, kɔc cin ke ŋathki.
Ku te gɛm wok en nɔn ci Yecu thou, ku be ro bɛ jɔt, yen acit bii bi Nhialic kɔc ci lɔ nin e Yecuyic bɛɛi ne yen etok.
Ku kene a lekku week ne jam e Bɛnydit, yan, Wok kɔc piir, kɔc bi doŋ aɣet bɛn bi Bɛnydit bɛn, wo cii kɔc ci nin bi waan.
Bɛnydit guop abi bɛn piny paannhial ne kiɛɛu, ku ne rol e bɛny nu e tuucnhial niim, ku kaaŋ de Nhialic; go kɔc ci thou ne Krithoyic agoki rot kɔn jɔt:
na ele, ke wok kɔc piir, kɔc ci doŋ, wo bi gap nhial ne keek etok e luaat yiic, buk lɔ rɔm ne Bɛnydit e yomic: ku jɔku tɔu ne Bɛnydit etok aɣet athɛɛr.
Yen ya wek wepiɔth muk wapac ne welke.
Ku ne kede run ku akool, wek mithekɔckuɔ, acin ke duɛɛr gaar week.
Wegup aŋiɛcki egɔk nɔn bi akol e Bɛnydit bɛn cit man ee cuɛɛr bɛn wakɔu.
Ku te lueel kek en, an, Piny arɛɛr ediu, ku acin riɔɔc nu; en a bi riaak e kegup ethiau, cit man e kɛc ci tik kac; ku acin ke dueer kek poth.
Ku week, mithekɔckuɔ, wek cii nu e cuɔlic, bi ekoole we math cit man e cuɛɛr:
luɔi aa wek wɛɛt ke ɣɛɛrepiny wedhie, ku yak wɛɛt ke akol: wo cie kɔc ke wɛɛrwakɔu, ayi cuɔlepiny.
Yen du wok e nin cit man e kɔc kɔk; yok yin ku piɛthku niim.
Kɔc e nin ee wɛɛrwakɔu en aye kek nin; ayi kɔc e ro tɔ wit mɔu, ee wɛɛrwakɔu en aye mɔu ke wit.
Ku wook, wok kɔc ke akol, yok niim piath, abuk weu pat yiic e yɔu gel aa cieŋ, weu ke gam ku nhieer; ku ceŋku aŋɔth de kunydewei a ye akup e wokuiim.
Nhialic aken wo dɔm ne kede agɔth, ee luɔi bi wo kunydewei yok, en aa dɔm en wook ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho,
raan ci thou ne biakda, luɔi bi wok piir ne yen etok, ayi te yin wok ayi te niin wok.
Yen aa wek wepiɔth muk wapac, ku yak rot kueet wapac, acit man aa wek e looi ayadaŋ.
Ku wek laŋku, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ke we bi kɔc e luui e weyiic aa ŋic, kɔc nu e weniim e Bɛnyditic, kɔc e we tak wel;
aguɔki ke aa rieu alaldiite ku nhiaarki keek ne biak de luɔiden. Ku yak ŋiec reer e rot apiɛth.
Wek lekku, wek mithekɔckuɔ, an, Yak kɔc e loŋ yalic nen, yak kɔc e piɔth riɔɔc muk piɔth, yak kɔc kɔc kony, yak piɔth liɛɛr ne kɔc kedhie.
Mathdhien, e cin raan e raan luoi kerac raan ci e kɔn luoi kerac; yak kepiɛth kuany cok anandun, e ŋɛk e ŋɛk luoi kepiɛth, ayi raan ebɛn.
Yak piɔth miɛt anandun;
yak cool e lɔŋ acin pek;
Yak thieithieei lueel ne kerieec ebɛn: kene e kede piɔn e Nhialic ne kedun e Kritho Yecuyic.
Duoki Weidit Ɣer e piɔɔk abik liu;
wel ci guiir duoki keek e biɔɔn;
yak kaŋ them kedhie: yak kepiɛth muk aril;
yak tɛɛm e luɔi de kerac ebɛn.
Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic de mat, Yen guop, e we tɔ ɣerpiɔth eliŋliŋ; ku weikun ebɛn ku piɔndun ku guopdun e ye ke muk acin keliu, ku bi cien ke dueere ke gɔk aɣet bɛn bi Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho bɛn.
Raan cɔl week ee Raan Adot, Raan bi luɔi dhil thol ayadaŋ.
Mithekɔckuɔ, yak lɔŋ ne biakda.
Thiecki mithekɔckuɔ kedhie ne ciem ɣeric.
Wek yɔɔk ne Bɛnydit, an, Taki awareke kueen mithekɔckuɔn ɣerpiɔth kedhie.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke week. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, woke Thiluano, ku Timotheo, awarek en gɛɛrku kanithɔ de Thethalonikei nu e Nhialic Waadayic ku Bɛnydan Yecu Krithoyic;
E dhueeŋdepiɔu tɔu keke week ayi mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada ku Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Wo bi dhil aa cool e lec Nhialic nɔm ne biakdun, wek mithekɔckuɔ, cit man piɛth en, e luɔi ee gamduon ro ŋuak alalditte, ku luɔi ditte nhieer nhiaar wek rot wedhie alal.
Yen a leec wok rot ne week e kanithɔɔ ke Nhialic yiic ne biak de liɛɛr e wepiɔth ku gam ca wek gam e yoŋic ebɛn yoŋ ee we yɔŋ, ku ne katuc dhal week kedhie katuc yak guum.
Ku kene ee ŋiny ba wek guieer ee Nhialic loŋ guiir ŋic egɔk, nɔn ee yen guieer yic; ee ke bi we tɔ ye kɔc roŋ ne ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ciɛɛŋ aa wek kake guum ne biakde aya:
ten ee yen kepiɛth tede Nhialic luɔi bi en ketuc cool nɔm tede kɔc e ye week luoi ketuc,
ku luɔi bi en week cuoot ne lɔŋ ba wek lɔŋ ne wook etok, wek kɔc ee luoi ketuc, kool bi Bɛnydit Yecu ro nyuɔɔth, te bi en paannhial keke tuuckɛn ril bɔ nhial,
ke cath ke many e dep alal, ago rot guoor e kɔc kuc Nhialic, ayi kɔc reec welpiɛth gam, wel ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Kɔcke abik kedɛn tuc yok, yen aye riaak bi ceŋ athɛɛr, riaak bɔ e Bɛnydit nyin ku bi ne dhueeŋ de riɛlde,
te ci en guɔ bɛn bi dhueeŋ bɛn yok e kɔckɛn ɣerpiɔth yiic, ku bii kɔc ditr ekoole, kɔc gam kedhie (luɔi ci jam cuk lɛk week gam).
Yen a ye wok cool e lɔŋ ne biakdun e akoolnyiin kedhie aya, ke Nhialicda bi week tɔ roŋ ne cɔt ci we cɔɔl, ago ke ye kɔɔr ne piath e yenpiɔu thol ebɛn, ku thol luɔi de gam ne riɛldit;
ke rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho ke ke bi dhueeŋ yok e weyiic, ku bak dhueeŋ yok ne yen, ne dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu keke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Ku enɔɔne, wek laŋku, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne kede bɛn bi Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho bɛn, ku gueer bi wo gueer e yelɔɔm;
yan, Duoki weniim e dap tɔ lieepe, ku duoki e diɛɛr ne wei, ayi jam, ayi awarek ci gɔɔr, awarek cit ke e bɔ tede wook, luel en, an, Kool e Bɛnydit aci guɔ ɣeet.
E cin raan e we math, acakaa yen e mɛth week e ŋo: ekoole acii bi kɔn bɛn, te ŋoot e dɔk ke ken bɛn, dɔŋ ee kɔc rot dak cieen, ku te kene raan rac e taiwei ro guɔ nyooth, yen aye wen e riaak eliŋliŋ;
raan e ro yiek ater ne ka ci tɔ ye Nhialic ebɛn, ayi ka rieuwe, ku tɔ ro dit e keek; ago reer e luaŋdiit e Nhialic ke ye ro tɔ ye Nhialic guop.
Kɛnki weniim tak, nɔn can kake lɛk week waan ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya nu e weyiic?
Ku enɔɔne we ŋic ke pen en, luɔi bi en ro nyooth ne koolde guop.
Luɔi de rɛɛc de loŋ luɔi ci thiaan ee luui enɔɔne: ku raan pen en luɔi alal anu enɔɔne aɣet te bi e nyaai e ciɛɛlic.
Ku yen abi raane jɔ tic, raan reec loŋ eliŋliŋ, raan bii Bɛnydit Yecu nɔk ne wei bɔ bei e yethok, ku tɔ mar ne riau de bɛnde:
bɛnde yen eraane ee kede luɔi de Catan ne riɛl ebɛn ku gook ku luɔi bi kɔc ke gai, luɔi lueth,
ku ne mɛth bi en kɔc mar math ne kerac, luɔi ci kek nhieer e yic rɛɛc dɔm, ke ke bi kony wei.
Yen abi Nhialic ken ee kɔc math tuoc keek, ke ke bi lueth gam:
luɔi bi loŋden guiir atuc, kek kɔc reec yic gam kedhie, kɔc mit piɔth ne luɔi de kerac.
Ku wo bi dhil cool e lec Nhialic ne biakdun, wek mithekɔckuɔn nhiɛɛr Bɛnydit, ne lony ci Nhialic we lɔc te ɣɔn ciɛke kaŋ, ke bi we kony wei ne ɣɛɛr ba wek piɔth ɣɛɛr, ku ne gam ba wek yic gam.
Yen aa cɔɔl en week ne welkuɔn piɛth, ke we bi dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho yok.
Yen ka, wek mithekɔckuɔ, yak jɔ kɔɔc aril, ku yak wel ci yien kɔc dot wel ci we wɛɛt e keek, nɔn ee yen jam de raan thok, ku nɔn ee yen awarek cuk gɔɔr.
Ku enɔɔne, Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho guop, ku Nhialic Waada, Raan ci wo nhiaar, Raan ci wo gam muŋdepiɔu bi ɣet athɛɛr, ku gɛm aŋɔth piɛth ne dhueeŋ de yenpiɔu,
e ye week muk piɔth, ku tɔ ke ril ne jam piɛth ebɛn ku luɔi piɛth ebɛn.
Cook cieen, wek mithekɔckuɔ, Yak lɔŋ ne biakda ke jam de Bɛnydit ke bi cath e kueerde, ku lec, acit man leeceye e weyiic aya;
ku laŋki ke wo bi luok e kɔc cin kɔc cin niim, ayi kɔc racpiɔth: acie kɔc kedhie ke cath e gam.
Ku Bɛnydit en aye piɔu adot, raan bi we tɔ kaac aril, ku gel week e kerac.
Ku wo ye Bɛnydit gam ne kedun, nɔn luɔɔi wek ka cuk thɔn week enɔɔne, ku nɔn ba wek aa cool e luɔɔi wek keek.
E Bɛnydit e ye we dak piɔth e nhieer e Nhialicic, ku dɔk wepiɔth e liɛɛric liɛɛr e Kritho piɔu.
Ku enɔɔne, we yookku, wek mithekɔckuɔ, ne rin ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, an, Ratki rot wei e mɛnhkenedan lɔɔm ebɛn mɛnh kuc reer, ku reec jam aa piŋ jam cak yok tede wook.
Ku wegup aŋiɛcki nɔn ba wek tauda dhil aa dɔmic: luɔi ken wok kuoc reer e weyiic;
ku acin kuin de raan toŋ cuk cam youyou, wok ee luui, wok e rot nak piny e luɔi aret, wok ee luui akol ku wakɔu, ke wo cii raan toŋ e wekyiic dueer miɛn:
ku acie cin cin wok riɛl, ee luɔi bi wo rot tɔ ye kɔc bak aa woi aguɔki tauda dɔmic.
Ku acakaa waan tɔu wok e weyiic, kene acuk lɛk week, yan, Na de raan e luɔi rɛɛc, ke duoki e tɔ cam ayadaŋ.
Luɔi ci wok e piŋ nɔn de kɔc kɔk e weyiic kɔc kuc reer, ku ciki e luui ananden, ku yek rot gap e luɔi de kɔc kɔk yiic.
Ku wo yook kɔc cit keek enɔɔne ku guiirku keek ne Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho, yan, bik aa luui elik, ku yek kuinden cam guop.
Ku week, wek mithekɔckuɔ, duoki e bap ne luɔi de kepiɛth.
Ku na de raan reec jamda piŋ jam nu e awarekeyic, yak raane gɔɔk guop, ku duoki e mat e yen, ke bi yaar.
Ku duoki e tɔ ye raan dɛ wek ater, yak nen tei cit man e mɛnhkenedun.
Ku enɔɔne, Bɛnyditt de mat, yenguop, e ye week gam mat anandun ne kaŋ yiic kedhie. E Bɛnydit e ye tɔu ke week wedhie.
Thiecdi ki, yɛn Paulo, thiec ca gɔɔr e yacin, ku yen ee ŋiny ba wek e ŋic e awareek yiic kedhie: gaar aa yɛn gar ki.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e tɔu ke week wedhie. Amen.
Yɛn Paulo, tuny e Yecu Kritho ne loŋ de Nhialic Konyda, ku aŋɔthdan Kritho Yecu;
ee Timotheo en gaar, ee mɛnhdien yic ne gam. E dhueeŋdepiɔu e ye tɔu ke yin, ku kokepiɔu, ku mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada ku Kritho Yecu Bɛnydandit.
Acit man waan yɔɔk ɛn yin, yan, ba doŋ Epetho, waan la yɛn Makedonia, luɔi bi yin kɔc kɔk yɔɔk, yan, Duoki e weet e weet mɛɛn,
ku duoki paarekɔɔr e piŋ, ayi jam de rɛm thɛɛr, jam cin pekde, ee kak e teer bɛɛi tei, ku aciki kɔc e tɔ kuet ne ka ke Nhialic ku ne gam: jɔ keek aa yɔɔk wuya, mɛnhdi.
Thar e jam ci guiir en aye nhieer ee kɔc rot nhiaar ne piɔn agɔk ku ne ŋiny ee raan epiɔu ŋic nɔn piɛth en egɔk, ku ne gam cinic mɛthenyin;
kake aci kɔc kɔk ke rot yal, ku jɔki kepiɔth wɛl jam ɣɔric;
adeki piɔth luɔi bi kek aa kɔc e weet e loŋ, ku kucki ke luelki, ayi thar e jam ŋɛkki akucki ayadaŋ.
Ku loŋ aŋicku nɔn piɛth en, te tiiŋe raan eyic e luɔi,

luɔi ŋic wok kene, yan, Loŋ akene taau ne kede raan piɛthpiɔu, ee kede kɔc reec loŋ gam kɔc e loŋ yalic, yen aa tɛɛuwe ye, ayi kede kɔc reec Nhialic gam ku kɔc e kerac looi, kede kɔc cin piɔth rieeu ku cinki gup athɛɛk, kede kɔc e warken dui ku duiki marken, kede kɔc e kɔc nɔk,
kede kɔc e diaar kɔɔr, ku roor e roor kɔɔr, ku kɔc e kɔc peec, ku kɔc e lueth toor, ku kɔc e guutguut lueel e lueth, ku na de daŋ ke de ater ke wcet piɛth,
ke cii ram keke welpiɛth ke dhueeŋ de Nhialic de athiɛɛi, welpiɛth ci taau e yacin ba ke dot.
Ku aluɛɛl, an, Thieithieei raan ci a gam riɛl, yen Kritho Yecu Bɛnydandit, luɔi ci en a tɔ ye raan adot, ago ya dɔm ba luɔide looi;
acakaa yɛn e ye raan ee Nhialic laat ɣɔn, raan e kɔc yɔŋ, ku ye ke kuur: ku yɛn e kokdepiɔu yok, luɔi can e looi ke kuoc ne cien gam;
ku dhueeŋ de Bɛnydittda piɔu aci ro ŋuak abi dit alal keke gam ku nhieer nu e Kritho Yecuyic.
Ee jam yic ekene, jam e roŋ ne luɔi bi kɔc gam kedhie, yan, Kritho Yecu aa bɔ e piny nɔm bi kɔc e kerac looi bɛn kony wei. Ku yɛn ee raan nu e kɔc niim tueŋ ne rac:
ku yen aa yɔk ɛn kokdepiɔu, e luɔi bi Yecu Kritho guomdepiɔu ebɛn tɔ tiec e yaguop, yɛn eraan nu tueŋe, ku luɔi ba yɛn aa raan bi kɔc woi ku dɔmki taudiyic kek kɔc bi kede gam agoki piir athɛɛr yok.
Ku enɔɔne, Malik tɔu aɣet athɛɛr ya, ke ci dhiap, ku cii dueere tiŋ, yen Nhialic de nɔm pɛl etok, e rieeu ku dhueeŋ e ke ye tɔu ne Yen aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr. Amen.
Thone yen a taau e yicin, yin Timotheo mɛnhdi, ne baŋ de wel ci kɔn guiir tueŋ ne kedu, ke bi yin ke tɔŋ piɛth aa biɔk:
ku ba gam aa muk, ku muk ŋiny ee yin yipiɔu ŋic nɔn le en gɔk; ŋinye acii kɔc kɔk cuat wei, agoki gamden tɔ riaak, acit man e abel ci pol e piu yiic:
kɔc deyiic yi Kumenayo keke Alekandaro; kɔc ca yien Catan, luɔi bi ke wɛɛt, ke ke cii Nhialic bi aa laat.
Yen a kan ɛn yi yɔɔk e kaŋ kedhie, yan, Pal, ku lɔŋ, ku kɔɔr e kedaŋ, ku thieithieei, abike ya lueel ne baŋ de raan ebɛn;
ne baŋ de mahik, ku kɔc nu e kɔc niim kedhie; luɔi bi wo tɔu ke wo reer ke cin riɔɔc, ku reerku ediu, ne rieeu diit ee wok Nhialic rieu ku thɛk ee wo kɔc theek.
Kene ee kepiɛth tede Nhialic Konydanewei, ku piɛth e yepiɔu,
Raan de piɔu luɔi bi kɔc kony wei kedhie, ku yokki ŋiny de yic.
Nhialic tok tei en anu ku ade raan toŋ e luk lueel raan nu kaam de Nhialic keke kɔc, yen aye raan cɔl Kritho Yecu,
raan ci ro gaam bi aa ke ye kɔc wɛɛr bei kedhie, raan cii kede lueel ne caatɔɔ ekooldɛn piɛth;
ku yɛn ci dɔm aye raan bi kede guiir, ku ya tuc (yic en aa luɛɛl e Krithoyin, yɛn cii lueth tor), ku ya raan e Juoor wɛɛt ne gam ku ne yic.
Yen a dɛ yɛn piɔu luɔi bi roor aa lɔŋ e baai nɔm ebɛn, ke ke ye kecin jat nhial cin ɣer yiic, ke cin agɔth ku cin teer e wel.
Ku diaar ayadaŋ, e ke ye rot kur e lupɔ roŋ e kegup, ne riɔɔcdenyin ku piathenɔm; ku ke cii keniim e nai, ku ciki adhaap e cieŋ ayi guen tuc e ɣoocde ayi lupɔ tuc e ɣoocde;
aŋuan luɔi ee kek ro kiir e luɔi piɛth (ke roŋ ke diaar ka, dieer, an, yek Nhialic rieu).
E tik weete ke lɔ lik, ke ye ro taau e kɔc weet en cok.
Yɛn cii tik e pal weet weet en kɔc, ku ca pɛl ciɛɛŋ ceŋ en moc, e ye tɔu elik.
Adam en aa kɔne cak, ku jɔ Kawa cak cieen;
ku Adam akene math, ee tik en e mɛthe, a le en e keracic:
ku tik abi kony te dhieeth en meth, te tɔu kek ne gamic ku nhieer ku ɣɛɛrepiɔu ku piathenɔm.
Ee jam yic ekene, yan, Te kɔɔre raan luɔi de raan e kɔc gam tiit, ka ye luɔi piɛth en kɔɔr.
Raan e kɔc gam tiit abi dhil aa raan cii dueere gɔk, abi aa mony de tiiŋ tok, raan ŋic ro muk, raan piɛth nɔm, raan ŋic reer, ku ŋic kaman, raan ŋic kɔc wɛɛt;
raan cii mɔu e nhiaar, ku cii kɔc e dui, ku cii e wath e weu ke ayaar; raan lir piɔu, ku cin piɔu ater, ku acii weu e nhiaar.
Abi aa raan e dhiende ŋiec cieŋ apiɛth, ee mithke tɔ piŋ jam apiɛth, ne rieeu ee kek kɔc rieu;
ku raan kuc dhiende cieŋ apiɛth, bi kanithɔ de Nhialic ŋiec tiit adi?
Acii bi aa raan e piac gam, ke cii ro bi tɔ dit, ago wiik ne keracic kerɛɛc ee jɔŋditt rac wiik tliin.
Ku abi dhil aa raan piɛth rin tede kɔc nu biic aya; ke cii kedaŋ bi wooc ke bi e gɔk, ago loony e win e jɔŋditt racic win ee dep.
Ku yen acit tau de kɔc e ka ke kanithɔ looi aya, abik dhil aa kɔc piɛth niim, ku ciki e kɔc e liep rou, ku ciki e kɔc e mau juec kɔɔr, ku ciki e wath e weu ke ayaar;
abik aa kɔc e jam de gam dot e piɔn agɔk, jam ɣɔn ci moony.
Ku kɔcke e ke kɔne them; na miak, ke jɔ ke tɔ loi ka ke kanithɔ, te cin en ke dueere ke gɔk.
Ku dieerken aya abik aa dieer piɛth niim, ku ciki e mantuum, abik aa dieer ŋic ro muk, dieer e kaŋ dot apiɛth kedhie.
Kɔc e ka ke kanithɔ looi e ke ee ya roor de niim dieer tokiook, kɔc e mithken ŋiec cieŋ apiɛth ku ŋicki dhienken cieŋ aya.
Kɔc ci ka ke kanithɔ aa looi apiɛth ayek ciɛɛŋ piɛth yok, ku jɔki piɔth riɛl aret e gam nu e Kritho Yecuyin.
Kake aa gaar ke yin, ke ya ŋath bɛn ban dap bɛn tede yin;
ku na ca gaau, ke yin bi tau bi raan dhil aa tɔu ɣon e Nhialic ŋic, yen aye kanithɔ de Nhialic piir, ku ye men e yin ku ye yic thar.

Cook yic ka, cook cii dueere jɔɔny, yan, Luɔidan ee wok Nhialic luooi ee kecimoony, ku cie dap yokic: Aci tic e guopic, Ku ci tɔ piɛtpiɔu e Wei yiic, Ku ci tiŋ e tuucnhial, Ku ci kede guieer Juoor, Ku ci gam e piny nɔm, Ku ci lɛɛr nhial e dhueeŋic.
Aci Weidit lueel ne thoŋ bi kɔc piŋ, yan, Ekool wadaŋ kɔc kɔk abik loony wei e gamic, ku jɔki ka ke jɔɔk e kɔc math piŋ, ku piŋki weet e jɔɔk rac,
ne rueeny de kɔc e lueth toor, kɔc ci jam cik yok e kepiɔth tɔ gɛɛre bei cit man e ke e gaar e wenh tuc;
abik kɔc aa pɛn thieek, ku yookki keek, an, bik riŋ pɔl e cam, ee ke ciɛk Nhialic bi kɔc ci gam aa dɔm kɔc ŋic yic, dɔmki ku luelki, yan, Thieithieei.
Ke cii Nhialic cak ee kepiɛth ebɛn, ku acin toŋ bi rɛɛc e kɔc, te ci e dɔm ku lueel raan, an, Thieithieei:
aye tɔ ɣeric ne jam e Nhialic ku lɔŋ.
Te ee yin mithekɔckuɔ tak niim e kake, ke yin bi aa raan e ka ke Yecu Kritho looi apiɛth, raan ci ŋiec muk ne wel ke gam ku weet piɛth weet ci kuany cok egɔk.
Ye kɔɔr rɛɛc ka ye kɔc paar ne ka ke piny, ayi ka ye dɔɔc paar. Ye rot them ne rieeu ee yin Nhialic rieu:
yir ee raan eguop yiir ade naamdɛn thiinakaŋ: ku rieeu e raan Nhialic rieu ade naamdɛn dit e kerieec ebɛn, ee raan tɔ ŋɔth ne kede piir enɔɔne, ayi kede piir bi bɛn.
Ee jam yic ekene, ku ye jam roŋ ne luɔi bi raan gam ebɛn.
Yen a ye wok luui alal, ku koon wook, luɔi ee wok Nhialic piir ŋɔɔth, yen aye Konydewei de raan ebɛn, ku ye Kony diit e wei tede kɔc ci gam.
Ye kake guieer kɔc weet yin ke.
E cin raan e yi biɔɔn ne biak de kuur koor yin; tɔ rot e raan piɛth dueere kɔc ci gam taudu aa dɔmic, ne jam, ku ne reer reer yin, ku nhieer, ku wei, ku gam, ku ɣɛɛrepiɔu.
Aɣɔl te ban bɛn, ye cok e kuen yin, ku guiir wel, ku wɛɛte kɔc.
Du yinɔm tɛɛk piny ne miɔc cath ke yin, miɔc waan ci gam yin ne guieerewel ku thany ci roordit yi thany e kecin.
Ye kake thɔɔŋ e yipiɔu; ye tɔu e keyiic; ke lɔ le yin ke yi lɔ tueŋ ke bi ŋic e kɔc kedhie.
Ye rot tiit apiɛth, ku ye weet tiit aya. Ye cok e tɔu yin e kake yiic: ten e yin e looi wuya, ke yin bi ro kony ku kony kɔc e kaku piŋ ayadaŋ.
Raandiit nu e kɔc niim du ye nen alal, ye lɔŋ tei cit man e wuur; ye dhuok tɔ cit mithekɔckun;
ye dieer dit tɔ cit markun; ku tɔ dieer kor cit nyiirekɔckun ne ɣɛɛr ee yin piɔu ɣɛɛr ewic.
Ye diaar rieu dieer cin niim roorken ne yic.
Ku na de tiiŋ cin nɔm monyde ku de nɔm mithke ayi mith ke mithke, tɔ ke weete abik kɔc ke dhienden kɔn rieu, ago kɔc e dhieth keek cuoot: kene ee kepiɛth, ee ken ee Nhialic tɔ mit piɔu.
Ku tiiŋ cin nɔm monyde, ku ye thuoom egɔk, aŋɔthde ee cath ke Nhialic, ago cool e pal Nhialic ku lɛŋ wɛɛrwakɔu ku akol.
Ku tiiŋ e kuɛth e yanyde kɔɔr tei, na ciɛk piir ka ci thou.
Jɔ kɔc aa lɛk ekake, agoki aa tɔu ke cin gaak gɛkeke.
