Cook cieen, yak tɔu ne piɔn tok wedhie, yak piɔth dap dhiau e rot wapac, yak rot nhiaar cit mith ke raan tok, yak piɔth dap kok, yak rot tɔ kor.

Duoki kerac e puk nɔm e kerac, ku lɛt duoki e puk nɔm e lɛt; acie yen, athiɛɛi yen aba wek e puk nɔm; luɔi ŋiɛc wek en, yan, e luɔi ba wek athiɛɛi lɔɔk lak, yen ke e coole week ka. Luɔi ci e gɔɔr, yan,
Raan de piɔu luɔi nhiɛɛr en piir, Ku jɔ kool piɛth tiŋ, Ke ye yeliep pɛn jam rac, Ku ye yethok pɛn jam erueeny:
E ye ro yal e luɔi de kerac, ku ye kepiɛth jɔ looi; E ye mat kɔɔr, ku jɔ aa cop.
Nyin ke Bɛnydit ayek kɔc piɛthpiɔth woi, Ku yithke ayek palden dap piŋ: Ku Bɛnydit ee yenyin jɔt e kɔc e kerac looi.
Ku eeŋa bi we luoi kerac, te ya wek kɔc e kepiɛth kuanyic?
Ku na cakaa wek e gum kerac ne biak de piathepiɔu, ke we ci thieei: ku duoki e riɔɔc e riɔcden, ku duoki wepiɔth e tɔ jeth:
ku yak Kritho theek e wepiɔth taki e Bɛnydit. Yak cool e cɔc wek rot, ke we bi loŋ de raan ebɛn ŋiec aa bɛɛr, raan e we thieec ne kede aŋɔth ŋathki, abak aa bɛɛr ne piɔnlir ku rieeu;
yak cath e piɔn agɔk; ku na cakaa kek e ye we tum gup, yan, yak kɔc e kerac looi, ka bik yaar kek kɔc e reerduon piɛth e Krithoyin lat.
Te nu yen e Nhialic piɔu nɔn ba wek kaŋ guum ne biak de luɔi piɛth yak looi, yen aŋuan ne luɔi guoom wek kaŋ ne biak de luɔi de kerac.

Luɔi ci Kritho kaŋ guum aya raantok ne kede kerac, raan piɛthpiɔu en aa gum kaŋ ne biak de kɔc racpiɔth, luɔi bi en wo lɛɛr te nu Nhialic; e tɔ thou e guopic, ku tɔ piir e wei yiic; ago lɔ aya ne wei yiic le wei ci mac guieer wel,
wei ke kɔc e loŋ rɛɛc piŋ ɣɔn thɛɛr, ɣɔn tiite liɛɛr e Nhialic piɔu kɔc ɣɔn nu Noa, te ɣɔn looiye abeldit, abel ɣɔn ci kɔc liaakaŋ kony wei thin, kɔc kabɛt, ne piu.
Ku yen acit kuny ee baptith wo kony wei enɔɔne aya, acie bii bi acuɔl e raan guop bɛɛi bei, ee kɔɔr ee raan kɔɔr luɔi ŋic en epiɔu nɔn le en gɔk e Nhialic nɔm, ne jon ci Yecu Kritho ro jɔt;
raan ci lɔ paannhial, ku ye tɔu e ciin cueny de Nhialic; ku tuucnhial ku bany ku riɛl acike tɔ piŋ kede.
Ku enɔn ci Kritho kaŋ guum e biakda e yeguop, ke week aya, yak wepiɔth tɔ thoŋ e piɔnde; raan ci kaŋ guum e yeguop aci guɔ pɔk ke kerac;
ago tau tau wek e guopic e akoolkuon e piir ci doŋ tede week, ago cie kede ŋɔɔŋ e kɔc dɔm, abi aa kede piɔn e Nhialic.

Akool waan ci wan acik dhil loi, kool waan ee wok kamit e Juoor piɔth looi, kool e ye wok cool e loi luɔi de dhoom, ku ŋɔɔŋ de kerac, ku deŋ de mɔu, ku thueec rac, ku win ee kɔc wit e mɔu, ku lam de yieth col ecut.
Ku kɔcke ayek gai ne luɔi rɛɛc wek ro cuat e kerɛɛc gokdiiteyin cit man e kek, agoki week aa lat e lan rac:
kɔc bi keden lueel e bɛny nɔm bɛny ci ro coc bi loŋ dap guiir loŋ de kɔc piir ayi kɔc ci thou.
Yen aa guiire welpiɛth kɔc aɣɔl kɔc ci thou, ke loŋden bi guiir e guieer e kɔc rɛɛr e guopic, ku bik piir e wei yiic ne kede Nhialic piɔu.
Ku thok bi kaŋ thok kedhie aci guɔ thiɔk: yen piath wek niim, ku yak ro tiit aguɔki Nhialic ŋiec aa lɔŋ:
ku cook nu e cok niim, ee nhieer ba wek rot nhiaar alal; nhieer ee kutdiit e karac kum:
yak rot nyuooc, e ŋɛk e ŋɛk nyuooc, ke cin dok aa wek dok e weyac:
week wedhie, te ci raan kedaŋ yok ke ci gam en, ke teke kemane kɔc, en a ba wek ciet kɔc piɛth ci taau e dhien nɔm, kɔc ŋic dhueeŋ e Nhialic dot dhueeŋ kithic:

raan guir wel, ke ke guiir cit man ee kek wel ke Nhialic; raan loi ka ke kɔc e ke looi ne riɛl cii Nhialic yien en: ke Nhialic bi dhueeŋ yok ne Yecu Kritho e kerieecic ebɛn, Raan de nɔm dhueeŋ ku ciɛɛŋ aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.
Wek kɔc nhiaar, duoki gai e them tuc cit mac nu e weyiic, them ee we them enɔɔne, duoki e lueel, an, ee kegai mɛɛn pei ke ci tuol tede week:
ku yak piɔth miɛt, ne rom ram wek ka ci Kritho guum ne yen etok; na miak, te ci dhueeŋde ro nyuɔɔth aya, ke we bi piɔth miɛt abak piɔth a yum.
Ten ee we cak thook ne biak de rin ke Kritho, ka ye thieithieei week; Wei ke dhueeŋ ku Wei ke Nhialic e ke rɛɛr e wegup: ee ke bi aa laat tede keek, ku ye dhueeŋ tede week.
Ku e cin raan e weyiic raan bi kede yok e naŋ ci en raan nɔk, ku luɔi ee yen cuɛɛr, ku luɔi ci en kerac looi, ku ne cook e ye jamde cuɔɔk e jam de kɔc kɔk yiic:
ku na guum raan kerac ne baŋ ee yen Krithiaan, ke cii yaar; e lec Nhialic ne rinke.
Kool bi loŋ gɔl e guieer ɣon e Nhialic ki, ci bɛne: ku te ci e kɔn gɔl e wook, ke ke bi kɔc yok rial bi ciet ŋo kek kɔc e welpiɛth ke Nhialic rɛɛc piŋ?
Ku te ye raan piɛthpiɔu kony wei e kadhal, ke raan reec Nhialic ku raan e kerac looi bik tic tenou?
Yen ka, e kɔc e kerac guum ne kede piɔn e Nhialic e ke ye weiken kuɛi Nhialic ne luɔiden piɛth yek looi, luɔi ee yen Aceŋdiit e kaŋ ŋiec dot.
Roordit nu e weyiic kek yɔɔk, ku yɛn ee monydit aya, ku ya caatɔ de ka cii Kritho guum, ku ya raan bi dɛ kedi aya ne dhueeŋic dhueeŋ bi ro nyuɔɔth rial:
yan, Yak luny e Nhialic tiit luny nu e weyiic, abak keek aa tiit, ke cin raan e we cieŋ, ee kede piɔndun tei; ku acie biak de weu ke ayaar, ee miɛtepiɔu yen a ba wek keek aa tht;
ku duoki e ya bany e kɔc cieŋ, kɔc ci we taau e keniim, taki rot e kɔc bi lunydun taudun aa dɔmic.
Na elemiak te ci Tindiit e Thok tuol, Tin nu e tiit niim, ke we bi gol e dhueeŋ yok gol cii bi biɔɔr anande.

Ku week aya, wek kɔc kor, yak ka ke kɔc dit piŋ. Yeka, week wedhie, yak wethook pieeŋ, abak kuur aa wek ro kuɔɔr piny cieŋ cit man e lupɔ: Nhialic ee kɔc e ro tɔ dit ŋɛny, ku ye kɔc e ro kuɔɔr piny gam dhueeŋdepiɔu.
Yen kuɔɔr wek ro piny e Nhialic cin cin ril etor, ke bi we jat nhial ekooldɛn piɛth;
yak diɛɛrduon aa wek diɛɛr ebɛn cuat e yekɔu, luɔi ee yen diɛɛr ne kedun.
Yak ro tiit, yak yin: raan de ater ke week, yen aye jɔŋdiit rac, ee cool e ciɛɛth piny, cit man e koor e kiu, ke ye raan bi cuaal kɔɔr:
yak ŋɛny, abak aa kɔc ril ne gam, ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek en, yan, mithekɔckuon nu e piny nɔm aye katuc mane ke dhal kacit ka dhal week.

Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic de piɔu dhueeŋ ebɛn, Raan ci we cɔɔl ne kede dhueeŋdɛn e tɔu athɛɛr ne Kritho Yecu, miak, te ca wek kaŋ guɔ guum tethiinakaŋ, e we tɔ ye dikedik yen guop, ku tɔ we kaac, ku tɔ we ril, ku tɔ we lik piny.
Ne ye tɔu keke dhueeŋ ku riɛldit aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.

Yɛn e awarek ceke tɔ luethe week e Thiluano, raan ŋiɛc nɔn ee yen mɛnhkenedan adot, aca gaar week riɛɛt ɛn wepiɔth, ku ta rot e caatɔ ne cooke, yan, Kene ee dhueeŋ de Nhialic piɔu dhueeŋ yic, dhueeŋ kaac wek thin.
Wek thieec kanithɔ nu Babulon, kɔc ci lɔc ne week etok; ku wek thieec Mak wendi aya.
Thiecki rot wapac ne ciem de nhieer. E mat tɔu ke week wedhie wek kɔc nu e Kritho Yecuyic. Amen.
Yɛn Thimon Petero, lim de Yecu Kritho ku ya tunyde, wek gaar awarek wek kɔc ci gam de naamde yok, gam kit ke gamda ne piath e Nhialic piɔu keke Konydan Yecu Kritho;
E dhueeŋdepiɔu ku mat e ke lɔ ke ke ŋuak kenyiin tede week, ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek Nhialic keke Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda.
Acit man ci riɛldɛndiit bɔ nhial wo gam kerieec ebɛn ka ke wei ayi ka ke rieeu de Nhialic, ne ŋiny ŋic wok Raan e cool wook buk dhueeŋde yok keke piath de yenpiɔu.
Ku yen aa lek en wook kadit gook de naamden ka bi gam wook; ke ke bi we tɔ ye kɔc bi tau de Nhialic rom etok, te ca wek poth e dhiap nu e piny nɔm dhiap e biiye ŋɔɔŋ de kerac.
Yen ecook mane yen a ba wek cok e thɛm wek en alal, bak piɔn piɛth dɔm, matki keke gamdun; ku jaki ŋinydekaŋ mat keke piɔn piɛth;
ku matki domderot keke ŋinydekaŋ; ku matki guomdekaŋ keke domderot; ku matki rieeu de Nhialic keke guomdekaŋ;
ku matki maath e mith ke raan tok maath keke rieeu de Nhialic; ku matki nhieer keke maath ee mith ke raan tok maath.
Ku na nu kake e weyiic, ku lek e ke ŋuak rot, ka yek we tɔ ye kɔc cii rot e dak ku kɔc cie rool ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Ku raan cii cath ke kake ee cɔɔr, raan cii temec dueer woi, ku aci nɔm maar e wɛk waan cii e waak piɔu ne karɛckɛn thɛɛr.
Yen aŋuɛɛn e luɔi ba wek cok e kaar wek en nɔn ba wek cɔt e cɔɔle week ku lony e lɔce week tɔ ye yin egɔk: na luɔiki kake, ke we cii bi kɔth anandun:
ku yen abi we dap pal lɔ e ciɛɛŋ e Bɛnydiitdan Yecu Kritho Konydayin ciɛɛŋ e tɔu athɛɛr.
Yen a can tak bi pɔl, taŋ ban aa cool e tak ɛn weniim e kake, ciɛk, an, ŋiɛcki keek, ku yak kɔɔc aril ne loŋ yicic, loŋ tɔu ke week enɔɔne.
Yeka, e yapiɔu, an, ee kepiɛth, ten aa yɛn week jut ne taŋ aa yɛn week tak niim, nɔn ŋuɔɔt ɛn ke ya tɔu e keemɔyeyic;
ne ŋiny ŋiɛc ɛn en, yan, kool ban dhil pɔk woke keemɔdi e guɔ thiɔk, cit man ci Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho e nyuoth ɛn.
Ku aba ya cok e luɔi ɛn en e akooinyiin kedhie aya, na miak ca thou, ke we dueer ekake aa tak e weniim.
Acie kɔɔr ee paar ke e kuanyku cok, kɔɔr ci cak e pɛl, waan weet wok week e riɛldiit cath ke Bɛnydit Yecu Kritho ku bɛn ci en bɛn, wok ee kɔc ci dhueeŋdɛn dit tiŋ e wonyiin.
Aci rieeu ku dhueeŋ yok tede Nhialic Waada, kool ɣɔn bi rol yinya tede dhueeŋdiit lak, rol lueel en, an, Wendien nhiaar ki, Wen miɛt ɛn piɔu woke yen alal.
Erole acuk piŋ wook, ke bɔ paannhial, ɣɔn nu wok ne yen etok e kuurdit nɔm kuurdit ɣeric.
Ku wo cath ne jam de nebii aya, jam yic egɔk, jam war jame; ku apiɛth tede week te dɔt wek jame, luɔi ee yen ciet manyalath e riau tecol, a ru piny, ago cieer e runepiny ro jɔt e wepiɔth.
Ku kanki cooke ŋic, yan, acin jam toŋ de nebi jam de kacigɔɔr jam e lueel raan e kede nɔmde.
Jam e guiir nebi jam e bɔ ne kede piɔn e raan acinkedaŋ etaiwei: kɔc ɣerpiɔth kɔc ke Nhialic aake ye jam guiir, te ye Weidit Ɣer ke kuaath.

Ku nebii aluɛth aake nu e kɔc yiic ɣɔn, acit man bi kɔc aluɛth e kɔc wɛɛt nu e weyiic, kɔc bi looŋ e weet yalic bɛɛi thin ecueer, looŋ bi kɔc riɔɔk piɔth, arek abik Bɛnydit ci ke wɛɛr bei rɛɛc, agoki rot dap gɔn riaak.
Ku kɔc juec abik taudɛn ye kek kaŋ riɔɔk dɔmic; agoki kueer e yic tɔ lat e lan rac.
Ku kɔɔr ee kek weu juec kɔɔr, en a bi ke week aa cam ne jam erueeny: ku guieer bi loŋden guiir atuc, guieerdɛn thɛɛr, acie gaau, ku cii riaakden e nok.
Ku te kene Nhialic tuucnhial pɔl tuuc ɣɔn loi kerac, ku aci keek cuat e adhum thuthic mɛc kek e joth ke cuɔlepiny abik tɔu etɛɛn aɣet kool bi loŋden guiir;
ku te ken en piny thɛɛr pɔl, ee Noa raan e jam de piathepiɔu guiir, en e both etok keke kɔc kɔk kadherou, ɣɔn bii en amool e piny de kɔc reec Nhialic nɔm;
ku kuiith pɛɛnydit Thɔdom ku Gomora piny e mac abik aa ŋeth, guiir en loŋden, yan, bike dhuoor piny, ago ke tɔ ye ke ye kɔc bɛɛi diim, kɔc an, bik Nhialic aa rɛɛc rieu;
ku kony Lot raan piɛthpiɔu, raan e cool e jieth piɔu ne luɔi col ecut ee kɔc rac looi
(raan piɛthpiɔuwe ɣɔn reer en e keyiic, ago kaŋ aa tiŋ ku piŋ ke, aa ye piɔu jiɛth e akoolnyiin ne luɔiden rac ye kek loŋ yalic):
Te ci en kaŋ looi aya, ke Bɛnydit aŋic kɔc rieu en luok te ci ke them, ku ŋic kɔc racpiɔth mac aɣet kool e guieereloŋ ke ke bi kedɛn tuc yok;
ku kɔc bi kedɛn tuc dit yok kek aye kɔc e ka ke yac kɔɔr, ne dom ci ke dɔm e ŋɔɔŋ de luɔi col, ku yek bany baar nyiin. Ee kɔc dham gup, kɔc ril diim, ayek adhueŋ lat gup ku ciki e riɔɔc;
ku tuucnhial gup, kɔc ŋuan e keek ne riɛl ku bɛɛny, aciki keek e gaany e gɔny deyic lɛt e Bɛnydit nɔm.
Ku kɔcke, kɔc cit lai roor cin niim, lai ke piny tei, lai ci cak ne dom bi ke dɔm, ku ɣath bi ke ɣath, ayek ka kucki lat, ku abik maar etaiwei ne ɣathdɛn bi ke ɣath,
ku bik ariop de racdepiɔu yok. Thiai e kek kaŋ thiɔi akol yen aye kemit e kepiɔth, ayek kathii col ku yek kak e we tɔ gak, kɔc e ro tɔ kueth e capdɛn lueth te ye kek kamit cam ne week etok;
kɔc ci nyiin a pirpir ne kɔɔr ee kek dieer lei kɔɔr, kɔc cin nyiin pal dueer kek kerac pɔl; ayek kɔc weŋ kɔc ci piɔth alanlau ne jam; aciɛthki ne piɔn ci kajuec ŋic e kɔɔr. Mith de gup aciɛɛn ka!
Kɔc ci kueer lɔ cit pɔl, ku mɛɛrki, agoki kueer e Balaam wen e Beor kuanyic, raan ɣɔn nhiaar ariop de luɔi de kerac;
ku aci jɔɔny e wac ee yen loŋ woocic: mul cin thok jam aa jam e rol e raan, ago nebi pɛn luɔidɛn e miɔɔl.
Kɔcke ayek yith cin yiic piu, ku yek luaat kuɛɛth amaŋ; kɔc ci dueer adur tau keek aɣet athɛɛr.
Ne luɛl e ye kek jam juec ɣɔric lueel e keliep tei, ne ŋɔɔŋ de ka ke yac, ku ne luɔi e dhoom, en aye kek kɔc weŋ, kɔc, an, bɛnki eliŋliŋ ne kɔc e tɔu ke ke wac kaŋ;
ayek keek yɔɔk, an, We bi luony bei e himic, ku kek gup ayek liim ke dhiap de kaŋ; raan e yi tiaam, yen guop yen abi yi tɔ ye lim.
Ku na kɔc ci kɔn poth ne kacol ke piny nɔm, ne ŋiny ee kek Bɛnydit ŋic yen aye Konydan Yecu Kritho, te ci ke bɛ deep e keek ku tiam ke, ke taudɛn cieen jɔ rac awar taudɛn tueŋ waan.
Tee ke ken kueer e piathepiɔu ŋic ananden, adi ŋuɛɛn tede keek, ne luɔi bi kek e ŋic, ku jɔki rot bɛ thɛɛr bei e loŋic loŋ ɣeric ci yien keek.
Ku aci tic tede keek ke cit man ee kaaŋ lueel kaaŋ yic, yan, Jo e yenɔm bɛ dhuony ŋɔkke guop, ku ŋun e kudhur ci waak e bɛ lɔ dal e tiɔkic.
Yɛn ci awarek kɔn gaar week, wek kɔc nhiaar, ku renden ki; ku ne keyiic kaarou piɔthkuon awai aya ke pɔɔc abik yin, ne taŋ aa yɛn we tak niim e kaŋ;
ke we bi wel aa tak, wel ci kɔn lueel e nebii ɣerpiɔth, ku takki loŋda wok tuuc ke Bɛnydit ku ye Konydan e Wei.
Jaki kene kɔn ŋic, yan, Te ci thok de piny thiɔk, ke kɔc de gup agɛɛt abik bɛn e agɛɛtden, kɔc cath ne kede ŋɔɔŋdɛn e ke dɔm,
bik ku luelki, yan, Bɛndɛn, an, bi en bɛn akou? Te ɣɔn thouwe kuarkuɔ kaŋ atɔuki kedhie e taudɛn gɔle piny e cake.
Ku cooke acik baai ke ŋicki, yan, Tenhial anu ɣɔn thɛɛr, ku nu piny nɔm aya, biak ee tɔu biic ku tɔu biak e piu yiic, ne jam de Nhialic;
ku epiuke kek aa riak piny e nu ɣɔn ne mol ci en mol e piu.
Ku tenhial keke piny nu enɔɔne acike tɔɔu, ne jam mane, bik mac tht, ku ayeke muk aɣet kool e guieereloŋ de kɔc reec Nhialic, kool bi kek riaak eliŋliŋ.
Ku week, kɔc nhiaar, duoki cook toŋe bi baai, yan, Kool tok acit agum de run tede Bɛnydit, ku agum de run acit kool tok.
Bɛnydit acie gaau ne ke ci kɔn lueel, e gaau ee kɔc kɔk tɔ ye gaau; ku alirpiɔu ethuaat keke wook, ku acin piɔu luɔi bi raan tok maar, e luɔi bi kɔc puŋdepiɔu yok kedhie en anu e yepiɔu.
Ku kool e Bɛnydit abi bɛn cit man e cuɛɛr; ekoole tenhial abi nyai ne awuoou dit, ku lɛɛŋ kanhial ne tuoc de manydit, ku piny abi nyop keke ka ci looi thin abi lɔ kuith piny.
Ku enɔɔne, nɔn bi kake riaar kedhie, bak dhil aa kɔc cit ŋo ne reerduon ɣeric aa wek reer ku rieeuduon aa wek Nhialie rieu,
ku tiet aa wek bɛn de kool e Nhialic tiit, an, bak dap loor, kool bi tenhial ɣɔk mac, ago riaar, ku lɛɛŋ kanhial ne tuoc de many dɛp alal?
Ku wook, acit man ci en e kɔn lɛk wook, wok tit tenhial bi piac cak, ku piny bi piac cak aya, piny reere piathepiɔu thin.
Yen tede ka, wek kɔc nhiaar, ne tiet tiɛɛt wek ka cit ekake, yak cok e kaar wek luɔi bi we yok ke we rɛɛr ediu, ke we cin piɔth tethiin col, ku cin ke bi we gɔk e yenɔm.
Ku jaki liɛɛr e Bɛnydiitda piɔu tɔ ye kunydewei; acit man ci Paulo mɛnhkenedan nhiaar e gaar week, ne kede pɛlenɔm ci yinn en;

acit man ci e lueel e awareekke yiic kedhie, te jiɛɛm en e keyiic ne kake. Ku cok kɔk anuki thin cok cii e dap yok yiic, cok ye kɔc kene wɛɛt puk aye kerac, ayi kɔc ken lik piny e gam, cit man ee kek kacigɔɔr kɔk puk aya, lek rot gɔn riaakden.
Ku week, wek kɔc nhiaar, ne ŋiny ca wek kake kɔn ŋic, yak ro tiit, ke we cii bi thɛl wei ne kɔc reec loŋ gam etok, ne wac ee kek kaŋ wooc, aguɔki cuo wieek te waan kan wek aa kɔɔc aril.
Yak lɔ ke we lɔ tueŋ ne dhueeŋ de wepiɔth ku ne ŋiny ŋiɛc wek Bɛnydiitdan Yecu Kritho, yen aye Konydan e wei. E dhueeŋ e ye tɔu ke ye kede ayi enɔɔne aɣet athɛɛr. Amen.
Ke e nu ɣɔn thɛɛr gɔle kaŋ, ke cuk piŋ, ke cuk tiŋ e wonyiin, ke cuk woi, ke cuk dɔm e wocin, kede jam de piir
(ku piir aci tic egɔk, ka cuk tiŋ, ku yok caatɔɔ ne kede, agoku week aa guieer piir athɛɛre, piir e nu ke Waada, ku ci nyuoth wook);
ke cuk tiŋ ku piŋku, en a guiirku week, ke we bi abarɔ aa mat ne wook etok ayadaŋ: ku eyin abarɔdan yok mat yen aye abarɔ de Waada keke Wendɛn Yecu Kritho:
ku kake kek a gaarku, ke wo bi piɔth miɛt abuk piɔth a yum.
Ku kene ee thon cuk piŋ tede yen, ku guiirku week, yan, Nhialic ee ɣɛɛrepiny, ku acin cuɔl cath ke yen etaitai.
Na luelku yen, an, yok abarɔ mat ne yen, ku ciɛthku tecol, ke wo ye lueth toor, ku cuku yin e looi:
ku na ciɛthku teɣer, cit man nu yen teɣer, ke wok ee abarɔ mat wapac, ago riɛm e Yecu Kritho Wende wook aa waak ne kerac ebɛn.
Te lueel wok en, an, cin kerɛɛc cath ke wook, ke wok e ro math, ku acin yin cath ke wook.
Ku na gamku cawooc, ke yen Raan adot ku piɛthpiɔu, ka bi wo pal karɛckuɔ, ku jɔ wo waak piɔth ne racdepiɔu ebɛn.
Na luelku yen, an, cin kerɛɛc cuk looi, ka cuk tɔ ye alueeth, ku jamde aliu tede wook.
Wek niithkienthiike, kake a gaar ke week, ke we cii kerac bi aa looi. Ku na de raan loi kerac, ke wo de Raan e keda kuɔny e guieer e Waada nɔm, yen aye Yecu Kritho raan piɛthpiɔu:
ku yen aye ke ci Nhialic luk ne baŋ de karɛckuɔ; ku acie karɛckuɔ wapac, ee karɛc ke piny nɔm ebɛn ayadaŋ.
Ku don ee wo looŋke dot, en a ŋic wok en nɔn ci wok e ŋic.
Raan luel en, an, ŋic, ku cii looŋke e dot, ka ye alueeth, ku yin aliu tede yen:
ku na de raan e jamde dot, ka nhieer e Nhialic aci tɔ ye dikedik eyic e yeyic. Yen aŋicku ye nɔn nu wok e yeyic:
raan luel en, an, reer e yeyic, abi dhil tɔu e tau man ɣɔn ee yen tɔu.
We kɔc nhiaar, acin loŋ ci piac cak loŋ gaar week, ee loŋ thɛɛr loŋ e cath ke week ɣɔn gɔle jam: loŋ thɛɛr en aye jam cak piŋ ɣɔn thɛɛr gɔle jam.
Ku ye loŋ e piac cak ayadaŋ en gaar week, loŋ yic e yeyic ku weyiic; luɔi kɔɔr cuɔlepiny jal, ku jɔ ɣɛɛr yic de piny guɔ riau.
Raan luel en, an, tɔu teɣer, ku mɛɛn mɛnhkene, ka tɔu tecol aɣet ci enɔɔne.
Raan nhiaar mɛnhkene, ka rɛɛr teɣer, ku acin ke cath ke ye ke bi ye tɔ kɔth.
Ku raan man mɛnhkene, ka tɔu tecol, ku ciɛth tecol, ke kuc te le yen thin, e luɔi ci cuɔlepiny ye tɔ cɔɔr.
Wek gaar, wek niiththiiakaŋ, e luɔi ci karɛckun pal week ne baŋ de rinke.
Wek gaar, wek warken e mith, luɔi ca wek Raan ŋic Raan e nu te ɣɔn gɔle kaŋ. Wek gaar, wek dhuok, e luɔi ca wek raan rɛɛce tiaam. Aca gaar week, wek miththiiakaŋ, e luɔi ŋiɛc wek Waada.
Aca gaar week, wek warken e mith, e luɔi ŋiɛc wek Raan e nu te ɣɔn gɔle kaŋ. Aca gaar week, wek dhuok, luɔi riɛl wek, ku luɔi tɔuwe jam e Nhialic e weyiic, ku cak raan rɛɛce tiaam.
Duoki piny nɔm nhiaar, ayi ka nu thin duoki ke nhiaar. Na de raan nhiaar piny nɔm, ke nhieer e Nhialic acii cath ke ye.
Kerieec nu e piny nɔm, yi ŋɔɔŋ de guop, ku ŋɔɔŋ de nyin, ku dit ee raan rot tɔ dit e ka ke piir, aciki e ka ke Waada, ayek ka ke piny nɔm.
Ku piny nɔm akɔɔr jal, ayi ŋɔɔŋde aya: ku raan e kede piɔn e Nhialic looi ee tɔu athɛɛr.
Wek miththiiakaŋ, thaar e thok de piny ki: ku acit man ca wek e kɔn piŋ nɔn bi raan man Kritho bɛn, en a ci kɔc juec man Kritho ro guɔ yok enɔɔne; ku yen a ŋicku ye nɔn ee yen thaar e thok de piny.
Aake jel e woyiic, ku aake cii raan ne wook: te e ke raan ne wook, adi ŋootki ke ke rɛɛr ne wook; e luɔi bi kek lɔ gɔk nɔn e cii kek raan ne wook kek kedhie, en aa jel kek.
Ku we de tony ci we tɔc, tony e bɔ tede Raan Ɣerpiɔu, ku we ŋic kaŋ kedhie.
Acie kuny kuoc wek yic, yen e gaar ɛn week, e luɔi ŋiɛc wek yic, ku ŋiɛcki nɔn cin en luenh e bɔ tede yic.
Eeŋa ye alueeth? Cie raan e jai, an, cii Yecu e Kritho? Raan man Kritho ka, raan e jai Waada keke Wende.
Raan ebɛn raan jai Wende, ka Waada acii cath ke yen aya: ku raan gam Wende, ka cath ke Waada aya.
Ku na week, ke cak kɔn piŋ te ɣɔn gɔle jam, taki tɔu e weyiic. Na tɔu ke cak kɔn piŋ te ɣɔn gɔle jam, na tɔu e weyiic, ke we bi tɔu e Wendeyic, ku tauki e Waadayic aya.
Ku kene ee ke ci kɔn lueel, an, bi gam wook, yen piir athɛɛr.
Ku kake aca ke gaar week ne kede kɔc e week math.

Ku na week, tony cak yok tede yen atɔu e weyiic, ku acin raan daŋ kaarki raan dueer we wɛɛt; ku acit man ee tony mane we wɛɛt ne kerieec ebɛn, ku ye yic, ku cie lueth, ke we bi tɔu e yeyic, cit man e weet en week.
Ku enɔɔne, we niiththiiakaŋ, yak tɔu e yeyin; na miak, ci tuol, ke wo dueer nyiin riɛl, ku cuku yaar e yenɔm e bɛnde.
Te ŋiɛc wek en nɔn piɛth en piɔu, ka ŋiɛcki aya nɔn ee yen e dhieth raan ebɛn raan e kede piathepiɔu looi.
Tieŋki nhieer diit cii Waada wo nhiaar, bi wo ya cɔɔl mith ke Nhialic; ku kee wook. Yen a kuce kɔc ke piny nɔm wook, luɔi e kuc kek en.
We kɔc nhiaar, wok ee mith ke Nhialic enɔɔne, ku taudan bi wok tɔu rial aken guɔ tic. Ku aŋicku nɔn bi wo ciet en, kool bi en tuol; ne tiŋ bi wok e tiŋ tau tɔu en.
Ku raan ebɛn raan cath ke aŋɔthe aŋɔth ŋɛɛth en en, ee yepiɔu tɔ lɔ wai cit man le en piɔu wai.
Raan ebɛn raan e kerac looi ka ye loŋ dhɔŋic aya: kerac yen aye dhaŋ de loŋic.
Ku aŋiɛcki nɔn ci en tuol bi karɛckuɔ bɛn nyaai; ku acin kerɛɛc cath keke yen.
Raan e tɔu e yeyin, ka cii kerac e looi: ku raan e kerac looi, ka ken tiŋ, ku cii ŋic aya.
Wek miththiiakaŋ, duoki rot e tɔ mɛthe raan: raan e kede piathepiɔu looi, ka piɛthpiɔu, cit man piɛth en piɔu:
raan e kerac looi, ka ye kede jɔŋdiit rac; jɔŋdiit rac yen aa gɔl luɔi e kerac ɣɔn ciɛke kaŋ. Yen aa tule Wen e Nhialic, bi luɔi de jɔŋdiit rac bɛn riɔɔk.
Raan ci dhieeth e Nhialic acii kerac e looi, luɔi tɔuwe kau de wun e yeyic: ku acii kerac dueer aa looi, ne dhienh ci Nhialic e dhieeth.
Ken ee mith ke Nhialic lɔ dhek ki, ku lɔ mith ke jɔŋdiit rac dhek: raan cii kede piathepiɔu e looi, ka cie kede Nhialic, ayi raan cii mɛnhkene e nhiaar.
Ku kene ee thoŋ cak piŋ te ɣɔn gɔle jam, yan, buk rot aa nhiaar;
Ku cuku bi ciet Kain, raan e bɔ tede jɔŋdiit rɛɛce, raan ci mɛnhkene nɔk. Ku eeŋo e nɛk en en? E luɔi rɛɛce luɔide, ku piɛth luɔi de mɛnhkene.
Duoki e gai, wek mithekɔekuɔ, te mɛɛne kɔc ke piny nɔm week.
Aŋicku nɔn ci wo bɛn bei e thuɔɔuwic lok te nu piir, ne nhieer nhiɛɛr wok mithekɔckuɔ. Raan cii kɔc e nhiaar, ka tɔu e thuɔɔuyic.
Raan ebɛn raan man mɛnhkene, ka ye raan e kɔc nɔk: ku aŋicku, yan, acin raan e kɔc nɔk cath ke piir athɛɛr.
Ke ŋicku nhieer ki, gɛm ci en weike gaam ne biakda: ku wo dueer weikuɔ dhil gaam ne biak de mithekɔckuɔ.
Ku na de raan cath ke ka piire kɔc ke, ke jɔ mɛnhkene tiŋ aci kaŋ dak, go yic riɛl ke yen, ke nhieer e Nhialic cath ke yen adi?
Wek miththiiakaŋ, duku kɔc e nhiaar ne jam tei, ku ne liep tei; yok kɔc nhiaar ne luɔi ku ne yic.
Kee ŋic wok en nɔn rɛɛn wok ne yic ki, ku yen abi wok wopiɔth pal piny e yenɔm,
te de en ke jieenye piɔthkuɔ wook; luɔi diite Nhialic awar piɔthkuɔ, ku aŋic kaŋ kedhie.
Wek kɔc nhiaar, te ken piɔthkuɔ wo jɔɔny, ke wo dueer nyiin riɛl e Nhialic nɔm;
ku te de en ke lipku, ka yok yok tede yen, luɔi ee wo looŋke dot, ku yok kamit e yepiɔu looi.
Ku loŋde ki, gam bi wo rin ke Wendɛn Yecu Kritho gam, ku nhieer bi wok rot aa nhiaar, cit man ci en wo yien loŋ.
Ku raan e looŋke dot, ka ye reer e yeyic, ku yen e yeyic. Ku Weidit ci gam wook, yen aŋic wok en nɔn reer en e woyiic.
Wek kɔc nhiaar, duoki wei gam kedhie, ku yak wei them, nɔn e bi kek tede Nhialic: ade nebii aluɛth juec ci lɔ e piny nɔm.
Niny ŋiɛc wek Weidit ke Nhialic ki: yan, wei ebɛn wei e gam nɔn ci Yecu Kritho bɛn ke ye raan guop, ka ye ke bɔ tede Nhialic;
ku wei ebɛn wei cii Yecu Kritho gam, ka ye ke cii bɔ tede Nhialic: wei ke raan man Kritho ka, raan ca we kede piŋ nɔn bi en bɛn; ku ye ki e guɔ nu e piny nɔme.
Wek ee kɔc ke Nhialic, wek miththiaakaŋ, ku acak ke tiaam: luɔi diite Raan nu e weyiic awar raan nu e piny nɔm.
Kɔcke ayek kɔc ke piny nɔm; yen a jiɛɛm kek ne kede piny nɔm, ago kɔc ke piny nɔm keden piŋ.
Wok ee kɔc ke Nhialic: raan ŋic Nhialic ka ye keda piŋ; ku raan cie kede Nhialic ka cii keda e piŋ. Niny ŋic wok wei ke yic, ku wei ke lueth ki.
Wek kɔc nhiaar, yok rot nhiaar: nhieer yen aye kede Nhialic; ku raan ebɛn raan cath ke nhieer ee Nhialic en e dhieth en, ku ŋic Nhialic.
Raan cii cath ke nhieer ka kuc Nhialic; Nhialic yen aye nhieer.
Ecooke yen aa le nhieer e Nhialic dhek tede wook, tuoc ci Nhialic Wendɛn toŋ ci dhieeth tuooc e piny nɔm, luɔi bi wo piir ne yen.
Nhieer ki ekene, acie luɔi e nhiɛɛr wo Nhialic, ee luɔi nhiɛɛr en wook, ago Wende tuooc abi aa ke bi Nhialic luk ne karɛc cuk looi.
Wek kɔc nhiaar, te ci Nhialic wo nhiaar e nhieer cit ekene, ke wo dueer rot dhil nhiaar aya.
Acin raan ci Nhialic kɔn tiŋ anande: te nhiɛɛr wok rot, ke Nhialic arɛɛr e woyiic, go nhieerde tɔ ye dikedik e woyiic:
ŋiny ŋic wok en nɔn reer wok e yeyic, ku nɔn reer en e woyiic, ki, miɔc ci en wo miɔɔc ne Weike.
Ku acuk tiŋ ku yok caatɔɔ ne tuoc ci Waada Wende tuooc bi aa Kony bi kɔc ke piny nɔm kony wei.
Te de en raan luel gamde, an, Yecu yen aye Wen e Nhialic, ke Nhialic arɛɛr e yeyic, ku reer e Nhialicic.
Ku nhieer nhiɛɛre Nhialic wook acuk ŋic ku acuk gam. Nhialic ee nhieer; ku raan e reer e nhieeric ka ye reer e Nhialicic, ku rɛɛr Nhialic e yeyic.
Yen aye nhieerda tɔ ye dikedik, luɔi bi wo nyiin riɛl ekool e guieereloŋ: luɔi tɔu wok e pinye nɔm, acit man tɔu en.
Riɔɔc aliu e nhieeric: ku nhieer ci dikedik ee riɔɔc ciɛɛc wei, ne luɔi ee riɔɔc raan cuil guop; ku raan e riɔɔc aŋoot ke kene tɔ ye dikedik e nhieeric.
Nhieer ci en wo kɔn nhiaar, en a nhiɛɛr wok en.
Te lueele raan en, an, Yɛn nhiaar Nhialic, ku mɛɛn mɛnhkene, ka ye alueeth: raan cii mɛnhkene e nhiaar raan ci tiŋ guop, ke dueer Nhialic nhiaar adi, Raan ken tiŋ guop?
Ku loŋe a yokku tede yen, yan, Raan nhiaar Nhialic ke nhiaar mɛnhkene aya.
Raan ebɛn raan e Yecu gam, an, ee Kritho, ka ye dhieeth Nhialic; ku raan ebɛn raan nhiaar raan e dhieth meth ke nhiaar mɛnh e dhieeth aya.
Te nhiɛɛr wok Nhialic, ku dotku looŋke, yen aŋicku yen nɔn nhiɛɛr wok mith ke Nhialic.
Nhieer e Nhialic ki, don ee wok looŋke dot: ku looŋke aciki ril.
Ku ke ci dhieeth e Nhialic ebɛn ee ka ke piny nɔm tiaam: ku ye gamda yen tiem e ka ke piny nɔm tiaam.
Ku eeŋa raan e piny tiaam? cie yen raan ci Yecu gam, an, ee Wen e Nhialic?
Kene ee raan e bɔ ne piu keke riɛm, yen aye Yecu Kritho; aa cii bɔ ne piu kapac, ee piu ku riɛm.
Ku Weidit kek aye caatɔ, luɔi ee kek yith kek Wei. Ku caatɔɔ nu paannhial ayek diak, Waada, ku Jam, ku Weidit Ɣer: ku dieŋke ayek tok.
Ku caatɔɔ anuki kadiak e piny nɔm, Weidit, ku piu, ku riɛm: ku dieŋke amɛtki etok.
Te ye wok ke lueel kɔc gam kɔc ci aa caatɔɔ, ke ke lueel Nhialic yen adit e ke lueel kɔc: ku kene ee ke lueel Nhialic, ɣɔn ci en aa caatɔ ne kede Wende.
Raan gam Wen e Nhialic ke jam lueel caatɔɔ acath keke yen: raan reec Nhialic gam ka ye Nhialic tɔ ye alueeth; luɔi e reec en jam lueel Nhialic ne kede Wende.
Jam lueel caatɔ ki: yan, Nhialic aci wo gam piir athɛɛr, ku piire anu e Wendeyic.
Raan cath ke Wende ka cath ke piir; ku raan cii cath ke Wen e Nhialic ka cii cath ke piir.
Kake aca ke gaar week, ke bak ŋic nɔn cath wek ne piir athɛɛr, wek kɔc ci rin ke Wen e Nhialic gam.
Riɛl ee wo nyiin riɛl e yenɔm ki, yan, Te de en ke yok lip, ke roŋ ke kede yenpiɔu, ka ye keda piŋ:
ku te ŋic wok en nɔn ee yen keda piŋ, te de en ke yok lip, ka ŋicku nɔn e wo kaŋ yok ka yok lip tede yen.
Na de raan tiŋ mɛnhkene ke loi kerac, ku cie kerɛɛc e thuɔɔu bɛɛi, ke lip, ka bi gam piir ne kede kɔc loi kerɛɛc cii thuɔɔu e bɛɛi. Kerɛɛc e thuɔɔu bɛɛi anu: aca luel nɔn bi en lɔŋ ne kede.
Luɔi de kerac ebɛn ee kerac: ku kerɛɛc cii thuɔɔu e bɛɛi anu.
Cooke aŋicku, yan, Raan ebɛn raan e dhieeth Nhialic acii kerac e looi; raan e dhieeth Nhialic e ro dot, ke cii jɔŋ rɛɛce bi jak.
Aŋicku nɔn ee wok kɔc ke Nhialic, ku nɔn tɔuwe piny nɔm ebɛn e keracic.
Ku aŋicku nɔn ci Wen e Nhialic bɛn, bi ku gɛm wook ŋinydekaŋ, buk raan yin ŋic, ku wok tɔu e raan yicic, yen aye Wendɛn Yecu Kritho. Nhialic yic ki, ku piir athɛɛr ka.
Wek miththiiakaŋ, yak ro tiit ne eidool, (ka ye lam ku ciki e Nhialic). Amen.
Yɛn monydit awarek en gɛɛr tiiŋ diit ci lɔc keke mithke, kɔc nhiaar ne yin; ku acie yɛn atok, ee kɔc ci yin ŋic kedhie aya;
ne baŋ de yic, yic e tɔu ne woyiic, ku bi aa tɔu ke wook aɣet athɛɛr:
E dhueeŋdepiɔu e ye tɔu keke week, ku kokdepiɔu, ku mat, ne ke bɔ tede Nhialic Waada, ku tede Yecu Kritho, Wen e Waada, ne yin ku ne nhieer.
Yɛn e piɔu miɛt alal luɔi can mithkuon kɔk yok aciɛthki e yicic, acit man ci wo loŋ yok tede Waada.
Ku yin laŋ enɔɔne, yin tiiŋdit, ku yin cii cit ke gaar loŋ ci piac bɛɛi, ee loŋ ɣɔn cath ke wook te ɣɔn gɔle jam, yen gaar, yan, buk rot aa nhiaar.
Ku cath ee wok cath e looŋke cok, yen aye nhieer. Loŋ ki, cit man ca wek e piŋ te ɣɔn gɔle jam, yan, bak aa cath thin.
Kɔc juec e kɔc math acik bɛn cath e piny nɔm, kɔc reec Yecu Kritho gam nɔn e bi yen ke ye raan guop. Raan e kɔc math ki, ku ye raan man Kritho.
Yak ro tiit, ke wo cii ka cuk looi bi mɔɔr, ke wo bi ariop yok ebɛn acin ke liu.
Raan ebɛn raan e loŋ wooc, ku reec reer e weet de Krithoyic, ka cin nɔm Nhialic: ku raan e reer e weet de Krithoyic, yen ade nɔm Waada ku Wende aya.
Na bɔ raan tede week, ku cii weete bii, ke duoki gɛm ɣondun, ku duoki lek thieithieei.
Raan lek en thieithieei, ka mat keke yen ne luɔidɛn rac.
Yɛn de kajuec duɛɛr gaar week, ku yɛn cin piɔu gaar ban awarek gɔɔr ne miok e gaar: ee bɛn ban bɛn tede week, yen ŋaath, agoku jam e wo tuum woniim, ke wo bi piɔth a yum e miɛtepiɔu.
Yin thieec mith ke nyankui ci lɔc.
Yɛn monydit, awarek en gaar Gayo, raan nhiaar aret, anhiaar ne yic.
Mɛnh nhiaar, yɛn ee lɔŋ luɔi bi yin kerieec aa thŋic, ku ba tɔu e yi piɔl guop, cit man ee piɔndu tɔu apiɛth.
Yɛn e piɔu miɛt alal, waan ci mithekɔckuɔ bɛn, bik ku lekki yɛn yindu, cit man ee yin reer e yicic.
Acin ken e ya tɔ mit piɔu ke war piŋ can e piŋ nɔn rɛɛre mithki ne yicic.
Mɛnh nhiaar, yin ee luɔi ŋiec dot ne luɔidu ebɛn luɔi ee luoi mithekɔckuɔ ayi kamaan kɔk:
kek acik aa caatɔɔ lek kanithɔ nhieerdu: ku te ye yin keek nyuooc apiɛth ne kenyden ne nyuuc roŋ ke nyuuc e kɔc ke Nhialic, ke yin bi kepiɛth aa looi:
luɔi ee yen biak de rinke yen e keny kek, ku cin ke cik noom tede Juoor.
Yen a dueer wok kɔc cit keek dhil aa tɔ ye kamaan, ke wo bi aa kɔc e luui ne keek etok ne baŋ de yic.
Yɛn ci kanithɔ gaar awarek: ku Dioterepe raan kɔɔr luɔi bi en lɔ tueŋ e keyiic, areec keda gam.

Yen a ban anɔm tak e luɔidɛn looi, te can bɛn, ee wo lɛk jam rɛɛc ɣɔric: ku acie kuɛth e luɔiye, yenguop ee mithekɔckuɔ rɛɛc tɔ ye kamaan, ku jɔ kɔc aa peen aya, kɔc kɔɔr luɔi bi kek ke tɔ ye kamaan, arek abi ke ciɛɛc wei e kanithɔyin.
Mɛnh nhiaar, du luɔi rac e dɔmic, ee luɔi piɛth en ee dɔmic. Raan e kepiɛth looi ee kede Nhialic: ku raan e kerac looi aken Nhialic tiŋ.
Demeturio piathde aye lueel e raan ebɛn, ku ye yic lueel aya: yeka, ayi wook aya, wok ee caatɔɔ luel kede; ku we ŋic ke luelku nɔn ee yen yic.
Yɛn aa de kajuec ba gɔɔr, ku yɛn cin piɔu luɔi gaar ɛn yin ne miok de gaar ku agalam:
ku tiŋ ban yin dap tiŋ yen a ŋaath, agoku jam ke wo tuum woniim. E mat e ye tɔu ke yin. Yin thieec mathkuɔ. Thiec mathkuɔ ne rinken.
Yɛn Juda, lim e Yecu Kritho, ku ya manhe e Jakop, awarek en gaar kɔc ci cɔɔl, kɔc nhiɛɛr Nhialic Waada, ku cike muk e Yecu Kritho yic:
E kokdepiɔu, ku mat, ku nhieer, e ke ye lɔ ke ke ŋuak kenyiin tede week.

Wek kɔc nhiaar, waan aa yɛn cok e kaar ɛn gɛɛr gaar ɛn week awarek ne kede kunydewei kuny nu wok thin wodhie, ke ja ŋic e yapiɔu nɔn ban week dhil gaar jam riɛɛt ɛn wepiɔth ke we bi cok e teer ne kede gam, gam ci yinn kɔc ɣerpiɔth raantok.

Luɔi de en kɔc kɔk ci bɛn thin ecueer, kɔc ci kɔn meek ɣɔn thɛɛr, bik kedɛn tuce yok, kɔc reec Nhialic rieu, ku yek dhueeŋ de Nhialicda piɔu puk tɔki ye kede dhoom, ku reecki Bɛnydiit toŋ nu e woniim, Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho.
Ku yɛn de piɔu luɔi tak ɛn weniim, ciɛk an, cak kene kɔn ŋic, naŋ cii Bɛnydit kɔc reec gam nɔk, acakaa yen e ci kɔc kɔn kony bii ke bei paan e Rip.
Ayi tuucnhial tuuc ɣɔn reec tɔu e ciɛɛŋic ciɛɛŋ e ciɛke ke thin, ku jɔki paandɛn ee kek reer thin pɔl, keek aake cii Nhialic mac tecol ne joth bi tɔu athɛɛr bik kool diit e guieereloŋ tiit.

Cit man e Thɔdom ku Gɔmora, ayi pɛɛnydit e nu kec, te ci kek rot aa gam luɔi de dhoom, cit man e tuucnhialke, ku yek gup lei kɔɔr, ke ke jɔ taau e kɔc niim abi aa ke ye kɔc bɛɛi niim, ne yoŋ ci kek ketucden yok mɛɛc many tɔu athɛɛr.
Ku kɔcke aya, acit ke keek, kɔc e nyuoth e kerac, ayek kegup tɔ nhiany, ku yek bany kuoc rieu, ku yek adhueŋ laat e lɛɛt rac.
Ku Mikael tuny nu e tuucnhial niim, ɣɔn teer en keke jɔŋdiit rac, teerki guop de Mothe, aken nyin riɛl bi lat ɣɔn gɔɔny en en, aa lueel tei, yan, Ee Bɛnydit en bi yi jɔɔny.
Ku kɔcke, te de yen ka kucki ka yek ke lat; ku te de yen ka ŋicki ne taudɛn ci cak ke, cit man e lai cin niim, ka yek rot riɔɔk e kake.
Amawoou ne keek! acik cath e kueer e Kain, ku acik ro jaac lek wac ci Balaam kaŋ wooc kuanyic ne kede ariop, ku acik maar e ater e Kora.

Kɔcke ayek kuur ci thiaan ne kecamduon e nhieeric, te ye kek rɔm e week etok e kecam, ku yek keyac thiɔɔŋ ke ke cii riɔc; ayek luaat cin yiic piu, luaat ee yom kuaath; tiim ee mithken dap yom, agoki cuo lok, tiim ci thou raanrou, agoke woth bei ne meiken;
apiɔŋ e abapdit apiɔŋ ee ro miɔɔk abik ayarden gut cit man e amoth; kuɛl e tai, kuɛl ci dueer col ecut tɔɔu bi aa keden aɣet athɛɛr.
Ku Enok aya, raan e rem wen ee rɛm dherou gɔl Adam, yen aa kɔn jam guiir ne kɔcke, lueel, an, Tieŋki, Bɛnydit abɔ ke cath ke remdɛn ɣerpiɔu agum de kɔc kathieer ku thieer,

bi kɔc bɛn tɔ yok kedɛn tuc kedhie, ku bi kɔc reec Nhialic rieu bɛn jɔɔny ne luɔidɛn rɛɛc cik looi ebɛn ne rɛɛc reec kek Nhialic rieu, ku jany kɔc ne jam tuc cik lɛk en ebɛn, kek kɔc e kerac looi kɔc reec Nhialic rieu.
Kɔcke ayek kɔc e dok e keyac, kɔc e piɔth dap dit, ku yek ŋɔɔŋdɛn rac kuany cok (ayek jam diit ɣɔric lueel e kethook), ku yek kɔc kɔk kɔc nyiin nɔn de en ke bik yok.
Ku week, we kɔc nhiaar, yak weniim tak ne wel waan cii tuuc ke Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho kɔn lueel,
wel waan ci ke lɛk week, yan, Kool rial kɔc de gup agɛɛt abik dhil nu, kɔc bi ŋɔɔŋkɛn rac aa kuany cok.
Kɔcke ee kɔc e rot pɔc bei, kɔc e kepiɔth tuom ka ke piny, kɔc liiuwe Weidit tede keek.
Ku week, we kɔc nhiaar, yak ro yik e gamduon ca we gam, gam ɣeric ewic, ku yak lɔŋ ne Weidit Ɣer,
ku yak rot mɔk e nhieer e Nhialicic, abak kok de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu aa tiit a yɔk wek piir athɛɛr.
Yak piɔth kok e kɔc kɔk, kɔc ayeke paak;
ku yak kɔc kɔk kony ne riɔɔc riaac wek, abak ke ya dɔɔr bei mɛɛc; ayi lupɔ aya abak maan lupɔ ci nyuel ne rac de guop.
Ku enɔɔne, Nhialic Raan ŋic week gel ke we cii bi aa wiik, ku ŋic week taau e dhueeŋde nɔm ke cin ke bi we gɔk, abak piɔth a yum alal,
Nhialic pelnɔm, cin Nhialic ee kek rou, ku ye Konydan e wei ne Yecu Kritho Bɛnydiitda, e dhueeŋ e ye tɔu ke ye, ku dit, ku riɛl, ku bɛɛny, ɣɔn thɛɛr ya ayi enɔɔne, aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.
Nyuutii de Yecu Kritho, nyuuth cii Nhialic gam en, bi liimke bɛn nyuoth ka bi dhil dap tic: go tunydɛnnhial tuooc le limdɛn Jɔn lɛk:
raan ci aa caatɔ luel jam e Nhialic, ku jam yic de Yecu Kritho, ku ka ci tiŋ kedhie.
Thieithieei raan e wel kueen ayi kɔc e wel ke ka guiir enɔɔne piŋ, ku jɔki kacigɔɔr thin aa dot: e luɔi ci akool thiɔk.
Yɛn Jɔn, awarek en gaar kanithɔɔ kadherou nu Athia: E dhueeŋdepiɔu e ye tɔu ke week, ku mat, ne ke bɔ tede Raan nu, ku aa nu, ku abi bɛn; ku ne ke bɔ tede Wei kadherou Wei nu e thoonydɛn diit nɔm;

ku ne ke bɔ tede Yecu Kritho, ee caatɔ adot, ku ye raan ci dhieeth ke ye kɛɛi e kɔc ci thou yiic, ku ye bɛnydiit nu e maliik ke piny niim. Raan e wo nhiaar, ago wo waak ne karɛckuɔ ne riɛm de yenguop;
ku ci wo tɔ ye maliik ku bany ke ka ke Nhialic e Nhialic Wun nɔm; e dhueeŋ e ye tɔu ke yen ayi ciɛɛŋ aɣet athɛɛr ya. Amen.
Tieŋki, abɔ keke luaat; ku abi tiŋ e kɔc nyiin kedhie, ayi kɔc ɣon guut en aya; ku juur ke piny nɔm ebɛn abik dhuoor ne biakde. Ee yen. Amen.
Yɛn aye Alpa ku ya Omega, gɔl e kaŋ ku thok e kaŋ, kee lueel Bɛnydit Nhialic ka, Bɛnydiit nu, ku aa nu, ku bi bɛn, Raan e kaŋ leu ebɛn.

Yɛn Jɔn, mɛnhkenedun, ku ya raan e mat woke week etok ne ketuc e wo dhal, ku yok mat etok aya ne ciɛɛŋ de Yecu Kritho ku ne liɛɛr e yenpiɔu, yɛn aa nu tuur cɔl Patmo, ne baŋ de jam e Nhialic ku ne luɔi aa yɛn caatɔ ne kede Yecu Kritho.
Yɛn aa cath wo Weidit ekool e Bɛnydit; na wen, ke ya piŋ roldiit cit rol e kaaŋ e yakɔu cieen,

rol luel en, yan, Yɛn ee Alpa ku ya Omega, yɛn ee Tueŋ ku ya Cieen: Gaar ke ci tiŋ e awarekic, ku tɔ yine kanithɔɔ nu Athia kadherou: Epetho, ku Thumurua, ku Pergamo, ku Thuatira, ku Thardith, ku Piiadelpia, ku Laodikia.
Guɔ ro puk, tieŋ raan jam ke yɛn. Na wen, ca ro puk, ke ya tiŋ camadaan e adhaap kadherou;
ku kaac ke cit Wen e raan e camadaan yiic cii, aceŋ ahilut pek e yecok piny, ku ci thionh e adhaap duoot e yeteŋ.
Ku ɣeer nɔm e wic cit man e alanh ɣerewic, acit kɔɔi ɣeer e lony nhial paan hir e pinyde: ku cit nyin liem de mac;
ku cit cok malaŋ ci lɔ bilbil, cit malaŋ ci leeŋ e manyditic, abi lɔ wai: ku cit rol awuoou de pieeu.
Ku aa muk kuɛl kadherou e ciin cuenyde: ku bɔ abatau bei e yethok, abatau moth e thok kaarou: ku cit nyin akɔl te ruel en alal.
Na wen, aca ye tiŋ, ke ya jɔ wiik e yecok cit man e ke ci thou. Go ciin cuenyde taau e yaguop, yook ɛn, yan, Du riɔc: yɛn ee tueŋ, ku ya cieen,
ku ya raan piir; yɛn aaci thou, ku tiŋ, ya ki piire aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr, ku yɛn cath wo mukthɛɛr ke thuɔɔu ku paan e kɔc ci thou.
Yen gɛɛr yin ka ci tiŋ, ayi ka nu, ayi ka bi rot lɔɔk yok e kake cok:
cook ci thiaan, ki, cook e kede kuɛl kadherou kuɛl ci tiŋ e ciin cuenydi, ku camadaan e adhaap kadherou. Kuɛl kadherou ayek tuuc ke kanithɔɔ kadherou: ku camadaan kadherou ayek kanithɔɔ kadherou.
Gaare tuny de kanithɔ nu Epetho ale: Kake aluel raan keek, raan muk kuɛl kadherou e ciin cuenyde, raan cath e camadaan e adhaap kadherou yiic cil:
Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, ayi luɔiduon tuc, ayi liɛɛr e yinpiɔu, ku luɔi cii yin kede kɔc rac dueer guum, ku them ci yin kɔc them kɔc e rot tɔ ye tuuc ku ciki ye tuuc, ago ke yok aye aluɛth;
ku ŋiɛc guom ee yin kaŋ guum e liɛɛr e yinpiɔu ne baŋ de rinki, ku naŋ ee yin ro nak piny e luɔi ku cii bap.
Ku ade cook ban yin jɔɔny, e luɔi ci yin nhieerduon tueŋ pɔl.
Tak yinɔm e te waan loony yin thin, ku puk yipiɔu, ba luɔi tueŋ waan looi; be, yan, cii e loi, ke yɛn bi dap bɛn tede yin, ba ku nyaai camadandu tede, te ken yin yipiɔu puk.
Ku cooke ee keduon piɛth, man mɛɛn yin luɔi de Nikolaitai, luɔi maan aya.
Raan de yic, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ. Raan e tiam, aba pal cam e tim de piir, tim nu Paradeitho de Nhialic.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Thumurna ale: Kake aluel raan keek, raan tueŋ ku ye raan cieen, raan eci thou, ku be piir:
Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, ku ŋiɛc ketuc e yin dhal, ayi kuany ci yin nyin kuany (ku yin ci bany), ku ŋiɛc lɛɛt rɛɛc de kɔc ee ye lueel, an, yek Judai, ku ciki ye Judai, ku yek luaŋ de Catan.

Du riɔc etaitai ne ka ba guum. Tiŋ, jɔŋdiit rac akɔɔr luɔi bi en kɔc kɔk e weyiic cuat e aloocic, luɔi bi we them; ku we bi ketuc dhal week yok e nhi kathieer. E gamdu dot a thou yin, ke yin ba miɔɔc nɔm e gol e piir.
Raan de yic, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ. Raan e tiam acii thon ee yi rou bi nɔk.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Pergamo ale: Kake aluel raan keek, raan muk abatau moth e thok kaarou:

Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, ku ŋiɛc te tɔu yin thin, yen te nu thoony e Catan; ku yin ee rinki dot e muk, ku kɛne gam gɛm yin ɛn jai, acakaa kool ɣɔn nu Antipa caatɔdien adot, raan ci nɔk e weyiic, te ye Catan reer.

Ku yɛn cath wo cok liaakaŋ cok ban ke yi jɔɔny; cook tok ki, nɔn de yin kɔc etɛɛn kɔc e weet e Balaam muk, raan ɣɔn weet Balak, an, bi ke bi kɔc tɔ kɔth cuat kueer e mith ke Yithrael, yan, bi ka ci lam yinth aa cam, ku bik diaar aa kɔɔr.
Ku cooke aya, nɔn de yin kɔc e weet e Nikolaitai muk aya.
Yen puk yin yiniɔu; be, an, jai, ke yɛn bi dap bɛn tede yin, ba bɛn biok wo keek ne abatau de yɛnthok.
Raan de yic, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ. Raan e tiam, aba pal cam e mana ci thiaan, ku aba miɔɔc ne kɔi ɣer, kɔɔi cii rin e piɛc cak gɔɔr e yekɔu, rin cin raan ŋic keek, ee raan ci gam en etok.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Thuatira ale: Kake aluel Wen e Nhialic keek, raan cit nyin liem e mac, ku cit cok malaŋ ci lɔ bilbil:
Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, ku nhieerdu, ku kuny ee yin kɔc kony, ku gamdu, ku liɛɛr e yinpiɔu, ku ŋiɛc luɔiduon cieen nɔn wɛɛr en luɔiduon tueŋ.
Ku yɛn cath wo cook ban yin jɔɔny, pal ee yin tiiŋ cɔl Jedhebel pɔl, tiiŋ ee ro tɔ ye tiiŋ nebi; ku ye liimki wɛɛt, mɛth en keek, yan, bik diaar aa kɔɔr, ku bik ka ci lam yieth aa cam.
Ku aca gam akool, yan, bi yepiɔu yinn puk e kɔɔr ee yen roor kɔɔr; ku reec epiɔu puk.
Tiŋ, aba cuat e laŋgarep nɔm, yen keke roor e tɔu ne yen etok, bi ketuc ke dhal alal, te reec kek kepiɔth puk ne luɔidɛn yek looi.
Ku mithke aba ke nɔk abik thou; ku abi kanithɔɔ ŋic kedhie, nɔn aa yɛn raan e kɔc caath piɔth, wɔi ke nu e kɔc yiic thin: kuyɛn bi raan ebɛn gam ke roŋ ke luɔide week wedhie.
Ku wek yɔɔk, ku yɔɔk kɔc kɔk nu Thuatira, te de en kɔc cii weete e muk, kɔc kuc kathuth ke Catan, acit man ee kek e lueel, wek yɔɔk, yan, Acin kethieek daŋ ba taau e weyieth.
Ku ke cath ke week enɔɔne tei, yak muk aril aɣet te ban bɛn.
Ku raan e tiam, raan e luɔidi dot athooke kaŋ, yen aba gam riɛl e juoor niim:
ku abi keek aa cieŋ ne thieny weeth, ku abik thou abik e thoorthoor cit man e tony ke tiɔp; acit man e riɛl ca yok tede Waar:
ku aba gam cieer e runepiny.
Raan de yin, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Thardith ale: Kake aluel raan keek, raan de Wei ke Nhialic kadherou, ku kuɛl kadherou: Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, yin cath we rin cit man e ke piir, ku yin ci thou.
Ye ro tiit, ba ka ci doŋ tɔ ril, kak e ci thiɔk e thuɔɔu: luɔidu akɛn yok aci dikedik e Nhialic nɔm.

Yen tɛk yin yinɔm e yoŋ ci yin kaŋ yok ku piŋ ci yin kaŋ piŋ; ku jɔ ke dot, ku puk yipiɔu. Ku be, yan, rɛɛce ro tiit, ke yɛn bi bɛn tede yin cit man e cuɛɛr, ku thaar ban bɛn tede yin aba kuc eliŋliŋ.
Ku yin de kɔc tokiook Thardith, kɔc ken lupɔɔken tɔ col: ku kɔcke abik aa cath ne yɛn etok ke ke ceŋ lupɔ ɣer: luɔi piɛth kek.
Raan e tiam ka bi yink kɔu lupɔɔ ɣer aya; ku rinke aca ke bi cuoth bei e awarek de piiric, ku rinke aba ke gam e Waar nɔm, ku tuuckɛn nhial niim.
Raan de yin, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Piladelpia ale; Kake aluel raan ɣerpiɔu keek, raan yic, raan cath ke mukthaar e Dabid, raan e ɣot tueer, ku cin raan bi e thiook, ku ye ɣot thiook, ku cin raan bi e tueer:
Yɛn ŋic luɔidu (tiŋ, ɣon ci liep thok aca tuɛɛl e yinɔm tueŋ, ɣon cin raan dueer e leu e thiɔk), luɔi ciɛth yin we riɛl thiinakaŋ, ku ye jamdi dot, ku kɛne rinki jai.
Tiŋ, yɛn bi kɔc ke luaŋ de Catan tɔ bɔ, kɔc e rot tɔ ye Judai, ku ciki ye Judai, ku ye lueth en torki; tiŋ, aba ke tɔ bɔ bik ku gutki keniim piny e yicok, ku ta ŋicki nɔn can yi nhiaar.
Luɔi ci yin jamdi muk jam de ruot can apiɔu ruut, ke yin ba muk aya ne thaar e them, thaar bi dap bɛn e piny nɔm ebɛn, bi kɔc tɔu e piny nɔm bɛn them kedhie.
Ya ki, dap bɛne: ye ke cath ke yin cok e muk yin en, ke bi cien raan bi golduon e dhueeŋ noom.

Raan e tiam, aba tɔ ye men e luaŋditt e Nhialicdiyic, ku aci bi bɛ lɔ biic: ku aba gaar nɔm rin ke Nhialicdi, ku rin ke panydiit e Nhialicdi; yen aye Jeruthalem ci piac yik, a bɔ piny tenhial tede Nhialicdi; ku gaar nɔm rinkien ci piac cak.
Raan de yic, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ.
Ku gaar tuny de kanithɔ nu Laodikia ale; Kake aluel Amen keek, en aye caatɔ adot ku ye yic, gɔl e caŋ e ciɛke Nhialic kaŋ:
Yɛn ŋic luɔidu, yin cii lir, ku cii tuc: adi ca piɔu miɛt tee yi lir ku nɔn e tuc yin.
Ku enɔɔne, luɔi moor yin tei, ku cii lir ku cii tuc, yen a kaar ɛn luɔi ban yi ŋɔk bei e yathok.
Ne luɛl ee yin e lueel, yan, Yɛn ci bany e kaŋ, yɛn ci ro kuɛt weu juec, ku acin ke dak ɛn; ku kuc nɔn ŋɔɔŋ yin guop, ku ye raan rac, ku kuany nyin ku ye cɔɔr ku cine kɔu lupɔ:

en a lɛk ɛn e yin, yan, Ɣɔc adham ci mac tɔ lɔ wai tede yɛn, ke yi bi bany; ku ɣɔc lupɔɔ ɣer, ke yi bi kɔu dɛ lupɔ, go ayaar e cin cin yin kɔu lupɔ cuo tiec: ku jɔ yinyin tɔc e wɛɛl e nyin, ke yi bi daai.
Kɔc nhiaar ebɛn, kek aya nen ku ya ke wɛɛt cit mith: yen leth yin yic, ku puk yiniɔu.
Ya ki, kaac ɣot thoke, ke ya tɔŋ ɣot thok: te de en raan piŋ arol ku liep ɣot thok, ke yɛn bi bɛn ɣot tede yen, ku buk aa cam etok, yɛn woke yen.
Raan e tiam, aba tɔ nyuc keke yɛn etok e thoonydien ditt nɔm, cit man can tiam aya, aguɔ jɔ nyuc woke Waar etok e thoonyde nɔm.
Raan de yic, ke piŋ ke leke Weidit kanithɔɔ.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya jɔt anyin, guɔ paannhial tiŋ aci liep thok, ku rol ca kɔn piŋ acit rol e kaaŋ ke jam ke yɛn, lueel, yan, Ba nhial tene, ku yin ba nyuoth ka bi dhil lɔɔk tic e kake cok.
Na wen, ke Weidit e ke jɔ nyuc e yaguop enɔnthiine: ku jɔ thoonydit tiŋ aci tuɛɛl piny paannhial. ku rɛɛr Raan e thoonydit nɔm;
ku Raan rɛɛr acit nyin kuur thith cɔl jathpi ayi kuur cɔl thardiɔn: ku nu miit ee thoonydit geeu, ke cit nyin kuur tɔc cɔl thamarakdo.
Ku ade thony kɔk kathierou ku ŋuan ke ke ci thoonydit gɛɛu cil: ku yɛn e roordit tiŋ kathierou ku ŋuan ke ke rɛɛr, aceŋki lupɔɔ ɣer; ku ceŋki gool ke dhueeŋ e keniim gool ke adhaap.
Ku bɔ wiiedaŋ bei e thoonyditic ku maaredaŋ ku kɔc rot. Ku nu mɛckcalath kadherou ke ke dɛp e thoonydit nɔm tueŋ, kek aye Wei ke Nhialic kadherou;
ku nu ke cit wɛɛr acidhath e thoonydit nɔm tueŋ, cit kuur cɔl kuruthalo; ku lai kaŋuan anuki e kaam de thoonydit keke thony kɔk ee thoonydit geeu, lai ci gup thiaŋ e nyiin, tueŋ ku cieen.
Ku lɛn tueŋ acit guop koor, ku lɛn ee kek rou acit guop dau, ku lɛn ee kek diak acit nyin raan, ku lɛn ee kek ŋuan acit aduŋuɛɛt e riŋ nhial.

Ku laike kaŋuan adeki kɔɔth wok kadhetem kedhie, ku acik thiaŋ e nyiin biak biic ku keyiic thin; ku aciki e lɔŋ akol ayi wakɔu, ayek lueel, yan, Aɣeric, Aɣeric, Aɣeric, Bɛnydit Nhialic e Kaŋ Leu Kedhie, Bɛnydit e nu, ku nu, ku bi bɛn.
Ku te ye laike Bɛnydit leec ku rieuki ku luelki, yan, Thieithieei Bɛny rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm Bɛny piir aɣet athɛɛr,

ke roordit kathierou ku ŋuan ke ke ye rot jɔ cuat piny e Bɛnydit nɔm Bɛny rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm, ku yek Bɛnydit lam Bɛny e piir aɣet athɛɛr ya, ku yek goolkɛn e dhueeŋ cuat e thoonydit nɔm tueŋ, ku yek lueel, yan,
Ee ke roŋ ke yin, yin Bɛnydit, luɔi bi yin lɛc yok ku yok rieu ku riɛldit: e luɔi ci yin kaŋ cak kedhie, ku ne kede piɔndu yen anu kek, ku yen aa ciɛke ke.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ awarek e ciin cueny de Bɛnydiit e reer e thoonydit nɔm awarek ci gɔɔric ku gaar kɔu, ku ci boot ne kacit adɔk kadherou.
Ku ja tunynhial ril tiŋ, e thiec kɔc e rol dit, yan, Eeŋa roŋ ke liem dueer en awarek liep, ku ne kueŋ dueer en adɔkke kuɛk bei?
Ku acin raan nu paannhial, ayi piny nɔm, ayi piny thar, raan dueer awarek leu e liep, ayi wui woi en en.
Aguɔ dhiau aret, e luɔi cin en raan ci yok raan roŋ ke liem e awarek, ayi wui woi en en aya.
Na wen, ke ya yooke raan tok e roordit yiic, yan, Du dhiau: tiŋ, Koor e dhien e Juda, ee Meei de Dabid, aci tiam, ne liem bi en awarek liep ku ne kueŋ bi en adɔk kadherou kuek.

Na wen, ke ya tiŋ Nyɔŋamaal, ke kaac e thoonyin cil, ku lai kaŋuan yiic cil, ku roordit yiic cil, nyɔŋ cit ke ci nɔk, ku de nɔm tuŋ kadherou, ku nyiin kadherou, kek aye Wci ke Nhialic kadherou Wei ci tuooc e piny nɔm ebɛn.
Go bɛn, bi ku noom awarek e ciin cueny de Raan e reer e thoonydit nɔm.

Na wen, aci awarek noom, ke lai kaŋuan ku roordit kathierou ku ŋuan ke ke cuɛt rot piny e Nyɔŋamaal nɔm, ke ke muk thoom raan ebɛn, ku mukki athɛn e adhaap de yiic wɛl ee nyop agoki tumetum, kek aye lɔŋ ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth Nhialic lɔŋ.

Ku kitki din e piɛc cak, luelki, yan, Yin roŋ we luɔi dueer yin awarek noom, ku kuek adɔkke bei: e luɔi ci yi nɔk, ago wo wɛɛr bei ne riɛmdu ne kede Nhialic e dhien yiic ebɛn, ku thok yiic ebɛn, ku kɔc yiic ebɛn, ku juur yiic ebɛn,
ku tɔ wook e maliik ku bany ke ka ke Nhialicda, ku wo bi piny cieŋ nɔm.
Na wen, ke ya jɔt anyin, ku ja tuucnhial juec piŋ rot, tuuc e thoonydit geeu, ku geuki lai ku roordit; ku kuenden ee agum kathieer raanthieer e agum, ku agum juec raan juec;
ku luelki e rol dit, yan, Nyɔŋamaal en aroŋ ke luɔi bi en riɛldit yok, ku yok juecdekaŋ, ku pɛlenɔm, ku riɛl, ku rieeu, ku dhueeŋ, ku athiɛɛi.

Ku kerieec ci cak ebɛn, ayi ka nu paannhial, ayi ka nu e piny nɔm, ayi ka nu e piny thar, ayi ka nu e abapditic, ku ka nu e keyiic kedhie, aca ke piŋ, ke luelki, yan, Athiɛɛi, ku rieeu, ku dhueeŋ, ku riɛldit, e ke tɔu ne Raan rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm, ku ne Nyɔŋamaal, aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr ya.
Go lai kaŋuan lueel, an, Amen. Ku cuɛt roordit rot piny lamki.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ Nyɔŋamaal te wen kuek en adoŋ tok bei e adɔk yiic kadherou, ku ja lɛn tok e lai yiic kaŋuan piŋ ke lueel ne rol cit maaredeŋ, yan, Ba tiŋ.
Guɔ anyin jɔt, ku ja joŋgor akuur tiŋ, ku raan rɛɛr e yekɔu amuk dhaŋ; ku ci gam gol e dhueeŋ, go lɔ biic ke tiem, ku bi lɔ ke tiem.
Na wen, aci adoŋ ee kek rou kuɛk bei, ke ya piŋ lɛn ee kek rou ke lueel, yan, Ba tiŋ.
Go joŋgor daŋ bɛn bei, joŋgor aluɛɛl; go raan rɛɛr e yekɔu gam riɛl bi en mat nyaai e piny nɔm, ke kɔc e ke bi rot nɔk kapac; ku ci gam abatau dit.
Na wen, aci adoŋ ee kek diak kuɛk bei, ke ya piŋ lɛn ee kek diak alueel, yan, Ba tiŋ. Aguɔ anyin jɔt, ku ja joŋgor col tiŋ; ku raan rɛɛr e yekou amuk medhaan e yecin.
Guɔ rol piŋ e lai kaŋuan yiic cii, alueel, yan, Konh toŋ de agamɔ ee ya giric kadiak, ku ye koth ke barli kadiak aa giric kadiak; ku du miok e riɔɔk ayi wany.
Na wen, aci adoŋ ee kek ŋuan kuɛk bei, ke ya piŋ rol e lɛn ee kek ŋuan alueel, yan, Ba tiŋ.

Guɔ anyin jɔt, na wen, di, ke joŋgor kan linhakuur tul: ku rin ke raan rɛɛr e yekɔu acɔlke Thuɔɔu; ku biɔth cok e Paan e Kɔc ci Thou. Ku acike gam riɛl e biak toŋ de piny nɔm biak wen ee kek ŋuan, riɛl bi kek kɔc aa nɔk e abatau, ku ne cɔk, ku ne thuɔɔu, ku ne lai rɛc ke piny nɔm.
Na wen, aci adoŋ ee kek dhic kuɛk bei, ke ya tiŋ wei ke kɔc e yiŋ de lam thar kɔc ɣɔn ci nɔk e baŋ de jam e Nhialic ku ne luɔi ee kek caatɔɔ e loŋ dot:
agoki coot e rol dit, luelki, yan, Ee nɛn, yin Bɛnydit, ɣerpiɔu ku yic, en bi yin loŋ guiir, ku ba riɛmda guoor e kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm nɛn?

Go ke miɔɔc e lupɔɔ ɣer kedhie, ŋɛk ke kede, ku ŋɛk ke kede; ku aci lɛk keek, an, bik yok ke ke lɔŋ tethiinakaŋ, aɣet te bi kɔckɛn ee ke liim etok thok e nak, ayi mithekɔcken, kɔc bi nɔk cit man e keek.
Na wen, ke ya jɔt anyin, te wen kuek en adoŋ ee kek dhetem bei, go piny ro niɛŋ aret; go akɔl cuɔl ecut, cit cuaal ci cueec e nhim col, ku jɔ pɛɛi ciet riɛm;
ku loony kuɛl nhial piny, cit man e ŋaap ci mithke loony piny mith ŋoot e ke tɔc, te ci e niɛŋ e yom dit aret.
Go tenhial nyai cit man e awarek ci dolic; ku nyiɛɛiye kuurdit kedhie teden ayi tuoor.
Go maliik ke piny nɔm, ku banydit, ku kɔc juecekaŋ, ku banydit ke rem, ku kɔc ril, ku lim ebɛn ayi raan cath e kede yenhde ebɛn, agoki thiaan e kɔk yiic ku kur ke kuurdit yiic,
ku yookki kuurdit keke kuur kor, yan, Lɔɔnyki e woniim, thianki wook e Bɛnydit nyin, Bɛny rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm, ku ne agonhdiit e Nyɔŋamaal:
kooldiit e agonhdɛndit aci guɔ bɛn; ku eeŋa dueer kɔɔc leu?
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya tiŋ tuucnhial kaŋuan akɛɛcki e aguuk ke piny nɔm kaŋuan, ku mukki yom ke piny kaŋuan, ke bi cien yom bi pɔt e piny nɔm, ayi abapditic, ayi tiim niim kedhie.
Aguɔ tunynhial daŋ tiŋ, abɔ nhial ten ee akɔl thok bɛn, ke muk katim de Nhialic piir: go tuucnhial kaŋuan cɔɔl e rol dit, tuuc ci gam riɛl bi kek piny riɔɔk ayi abapdit,
lueel, yan, Duoki piny riak, ayi abapdit, ayi tiim, te ŋoot wok e wo ken liim ke Nhialicda gɔɔr nyiin tueŋ ne katim.
Ku yɛn e kuen e kɔc ci gɔɔr e katim piŋ, agum kabɔt ku thierŋuan ku ŋuan, kɔc ci gɔɔr e katim e dhien ke mith ke Yithrael yiic kedhie.
Dhien e Juda aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Ruben aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Gad aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin:
Dhien e Acer aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Naphthali aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Manathe aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin:
Dhien e Thimeon aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Lebi aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Yithakar aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin:
Dhien e Dhebulun aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Jothep aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin: Dhien e Benjamin aci agum kathieer ku rou gɔɔr thin:

Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya jɔt anyin, ku ja kut diit e kɔc tiŋ, kut cin raan dueer e leu e kuɛn, kɔc e bɔ bei e juooric ebɛn, ku dhien yiic ebɛn, ku thaiyic ebɛn, ku liep yiic ebɛn, ke ke kaac e thoonydit nɔm ku Nyɔŋamaal nɔm, ke ke ceŋ lupɔɔ ɣer, ku mukki yith ke akoot e kecin;
ku cotki e rol dit, yan, Kunydewei e tou ke Nhialicda, Raan rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm, ku tɔu ke Nyɔŋamaal.
Ku kaac tuucnhial kedhie ke ke ci thoonydit geeu, ku geuki roordit ku lai kaŋuan; goki rot cuat piny e thoonydit nɔm, ku gutki keniim piny, lamki Nhialic,
luelki, yan, Amen: Athiɛɛi, ku dhueeŋ, ku pɛlenɔm, ku thieithieei, ku rieeu, ku riɛldit, ku riɛl e kaŋ leu, e ke ye tɔu ne Nhialicda aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr ya. Amen.
Na wen, ke beere raan tok e roordit, thieec ɛn, an, Ee yina ekɔcke kɔc ceŋ lupɔɔ ɣer, ku ye tenou e bi ke?
Aguɔ lueel, yan, Bɛny, aŋic yin. Ago pɔk nɔm ɛn, an, Kɔcke ee kɔc e bɔ bei e ketucdiit e ke dhalic, ku acik lupɔɔken waak, tɔki ke ɣer e riɛm de Nyɔŋamaalic.
Yen a tɔu kek e thoonydiit e Nhialic nɔm; ku yek luooi akol ku wakɔu e luaŋdɛnditic; ku Raan rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm abi keemɔde petic e keniim.
Acii cɔk ke bi bɛ nɔk ananden, ku ciki bi bɛ yal ananden; ayi akɔl acii keek bi aa nɔk, acakaa atuoc ŋo, acii ke bi aa nɔk.
Nyɔŋamaal nu e thoonyditic cil abi keek aa tiit, ku ye ke kuaath te nu awɛŋ ke piu ke piir; ku Nhialic abi piu aa weec e kenyiin kedhie.
Na wen, aci adoŋ ee kek dherou kuɛk bei, ke piny lɔ lik paannhial te cit nhunh e thaar.
Aguɔ tuucnhial kadherou tiŋ, tuuc kaac e Nhialic nɔm; ku acike gam kɛŋ kadherou.

Ku bɔ tunynhial daŋ bi ku kɛɛc e yiŋ de lam nɔm, ke muk thaŋ e adhaap ee wɛɛl tum nyop thin; ago gam wɛl juec tum, bi ke mat ne lɔŋ etok lɔŋ ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth lɔŋ kedhie, ku nyop ke e yiŋ de lam nɔm yiŋ nu e thoonydit nɔm tueŋ.
Go tol e wel tum lɔ nhial keke lɔŋ e kɔc ɣerpiɔth etok, le nhial e Nhialic nɔm e tunynhial cin.
Na wen, ke tunynhial noom thaŋ wen ee wal nyop thin, ku jɔ thiɔɔŋ e many de yiŋ de lam, ku cuɛt e piny nɔm; go kɔc rot tuol, ku tul maaredeŋ, ku wiledeŋ, ku nieŋ ci piny ro niɛŋ.
Na wen, ke tuucnhial kadherou tuuc muk kɛŋ kadherou, ke ke coc rot bik kɛŋ kooth.

Go tunynhial tueŋ kaaŋde kooth, na wen, ke kɔɔi de deŋ bɔ, keke mɛc ci liaap e riɛm, ku cuɛte keek e piny nɔm: go baŋ toŋ de piny nɔm lɔ kuith piny e nyop, baŋ toŋ wen ee kek diak, ayi baŋ toŋ de tiim, ku lɔ wɛɛl tɔc kuith piny e nyop ebɛn.
Na wen, ke tunynhial ee kek rou koth kaaŋde, ku jɔ ke cit kuurdit gok dɛp e mac cuat e abapditic: go baŋ toŋ e abapdit baŋ wen ee kek diak jɔ guɔ aa riɛm;
go baŋ toŋ de ka ci cak baŋ wen ee kek diak ka nu e abapditic ka piir, goki thou: ku riaak baŋ toŋ de abeel baŋ wen ee kek diak.
Na wen, ke tunynhial ee kek diak koth kaaŋde, ku jɔ kuel diit gok loony piny nhial, ke dɛp cit man e kuthyui, go loony piny e baŋ toŋ de kiɛɛr niim, ku awɛŋ ke pieeu niim baŋ wen ee kek diak;
ku rin ke kuel acɔl Wɛɛlkec; go baŋ toŋ de pieeu ebɛn baŋ wen ee kek diak jɔki guɔ aa wɛɛl kec: go kɔc juec thou ne pieeu, ne kɛc ci ke tɔ kec.

Na wen, ke tunynhial ee kek ŋuan koth kaaŋde; ku jɔ baŋ toŋ de akɔl yup, baŋ wen ee kek diak, ku yup baŋ toŋ de pɛɛi, ku baŋ toŋ de kuɛl, baŋ wen ee kek diak; ago baŋ toŋ e keek ago cuɔl, baŋ wen ee kek diak, go piny cuo ɣer akol e baŋ toŋ de baŋ wen ee kek diak, ayi wakɔu ayadaŋ.

Aguɔ anyin jɔt, ku piɛŋ tunynhial ke riŋ e paannhialic cil, ke lueel e rol dit, yan, Amawoou, Amawoou, Amawoou, ne kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm, e baŋ de rot ci doŋ, rot ke kɛŋ ke tuucnhial kadiak tuuc bi kɛŋken lɔɔk kooth!
Na wen, ke tunynhial ee kek dhic koth kaaŋde, aguɔ kuel ci loony piny nhial tiŋ: ku aci gam mukthaar de adhum thuth cii thar tiec.
Go adhum thuth cii thar tiec tueer thok; go tol ro mɔc nhial e adhumic, cit man e tol e manydiit dɛp ejaŋjaŋ; go akɔl tɔ col ayi nhial ne baŋ de tol e adhum.
Ku bɔ kɔyɔm bei e tolic, lek e piny nɔm; goki gam riɛl cit man e riɛl cath ke mancieei ke piny nɔm.
Ku aci ke yɔɔk, yan, Duoki wɛɛl e piny nɔm nak, ayi ke tɔc ebɛn, ayi tiim ebɛn, an, Duoki ke nak, ee kɔcke kapac kɔc kene gɔɔr nyiin tueŋ ne katim de Nhialic.
Ku aci gam keek luɔi cii kek ke bi nɔk abik thou, ee luɔi bi ke leeŋ wei e pɛi kadhic: ku lɛŋ ee kek kɔc leeŋ wei acit cuil ee mancieei raan cuil guop, te ci en e moc.
Ku ne akoolke yiic kɔc abik thuɔɔu kɔɔr, ku aciki bi yok; ku abik piɔth da thuɔɔu aret, ku thuɔɔu abi kat e keek.
Ku tau de kɔyɔm gup acit tau de joŋgoor ci guik e kede tɔŋ; ku ceŋki ka cit gool e adhaap e keniim, ku acitki nyiin kɔc.
Ku adeki nhim cit nhim ke diaar, ku acitki lec kɔɔr.
Ku adeki kak e keyoth gel, ka cit ka ci cueec e weeth; ku awuoou de kekwok acit awuoou de abeel juec abeel thel joŋgoor, te riŋ kek e ke lɔ tɔŋ.
Ku adeki yɔɔl cit yɔɔl ke mancieei, ku nu wiɛth e keyɔɔl; ku aciɛthki ne riɛl bi kek kɔc aa nɔk e pɛi kadhic.
Ku adeki malik nu e keniim, yen aye tuny de adhum thuth cii thar tiec, rinke acɔl Abadon e thoŋ e Eberu, ku cɔlke Apoliɔn e thoŋ e Giriki.
Amawoou tok aci wan; amawoou kaarou ka, aŋootki ke ke bɔ e kake cok.
Na wen, ke tunynhial ee kek dhetem koth kaaŋde, guɔ rol piŋ rol bɔ tede tuŋ kaŋuan tuŋ ke yiŋ e adhaap yin de lam, yiŋ nu e Nhialic nɔm,
ke lek tunynhial ee kek dhetem, tuny cath ke kaaŋ, yan, Lony tuucnhial kaŋuan tuuc ci mac e kurdit Euparate.
Goke lony kek tuucnhial kaŋuan tuuc ci ro kɔn coc ne kede thaar ku akol ku pɛɛi ku run, e naŋ bi kek baŋ toŋ de kɔc nɔk abik thou baŋ wen ee kek diak.
Ku kuen e kɔc cath e joŋgoor kɔɔth ayek agum kathierou raan thieer e agum: yɛn ci kuenden piŋ.

Ku joŋgoor wen ca tiŋ e nyuothic, keke kɔc rɛɛr e kekɔɔth, aake tieŋ ke ke cath ne kak e keyoth gel ka cit mac ku wakintho ku thulpur: ku joŋgoor acitki niim kɔɔr; ku bɔ mac bei e kethook, ku tol, ku thulpur.
E karɛcke kadiak kek aa nɛk baŋ toŋ de kɔc abik thou baŋ wen ee kek diak, ne mac ku ne tol ku ne thulpur, kak e bɔ bei e kethook.
Wiriir de joŋgoor anu e kethook ku keyɔɔl: yɔɔlken acitki karac, ku adeki nim; ku ne keek aye kek kɔc nɔk.

Ku kɔc ci doŋ, kɔc kene jɔɔkke nɔk, aŋootki ke ke ken kepiɔth puk ne luɔidɛn yek looi e kecin, ke ke cii jɔɔk rac bi aa lam, ayi ka ci cueec e adhaap, ku ateek, ku malaŋ, ku kuur, ku tim; ka cie daai, ku ciki ye piŋ, ku ciki ye cath:
ku kenki kepiɔth puk ne naŋdɛn e kɔc, ku athuɛɛthden ee kek thueth, ku kɔɔrdɛn e diaar, ku kuelden.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ tunynhial daŋ ril, ke bɔ piny nhial, aceŋ luat cit man e lupɔ; ku ceŋ miit e deŋ e yenɔm, ku cit nyin akɔl, ku cit cok meen ke mac;
ku muk awarek thiin pɛtic e yecin: go cok cuec tuɛɛl e abapditic, ku tueel cok cam piny;
ku coot e rol dit, acit man e koor te kuu en: na wen, aci coot, ke deŋ maar raandherou.
Na wen, aci deŋ maar raandherou, ke yɛn, an, gaar: guɔ rol piŋ a bɔ nhial rol luel en, yan, Mony kak e lueel maaredeŋ kadherou, du ke gaar.
Na wen, ke tunynhial wen ca tiŋ ke kaac e abapditic ku piny, ke jɔ ciin cuec yaak nhial,
ku lueel guutguut ne Raan piir aɣet athɛɛr ya, Raan e cak nhial, keke ka nu thin kedhie, ku ciɛk piny keke ka nu thin kedhie, ku ciɛk abapdit keke ka nu thin kedhie, yan, Acin agaau bi bɛ nu:
ku ne akoolke yiic kool ke rol e tunynhial ee kek dherou, te bi en kaaŋ gɔl e kuoth, ke ke cii Nhialic moony abi thok, acit ɣɔn ci en e lɛk nebii liimke.
Go rol wen ca piŋ ke bɔ nhial, go bɛ jam ke yɛn, yan, Lɔ, nom awarek thiin pɛtic nu e tunynhial cin tuny kaac e abapditic ku piny.
Guɔ lɔ tede tunynhiale, la ku lɛk en, yan, Game yɛn awarek thiine. Go a yɔɔk, yan, Ŋo, cam, thol; ku abi yi tɔ kec yac, ku abi tametam e yithok cit man e kiec.
Guɔ awarek noom e tunynhial cin, ku ja cam thɔl; go tametam e yathok cit man e kiec: na wen, aca ye cam, ke ya jɔ yac kecekec.
Go a yɔɔk, yan, Yin bi jam dhil bɛ guiir e kɔc juec niim, ku juur niim, ku kɔc jam e thok mɛɛn niim, ku maliik niim.
Go ya gam aruoor cit wai: ku lueel, yan, Jɔt rot, them luaŋdiit e Nhialic, ku yiŋ de lam, ku kɔc e lam thin.
Ku kal nu e luak kɔu biic jɔ pɔl, du them; aci gam juoor: ku abik panydit ɣeric aa dum e kecok e pɛi kathierŋuan ku rou.
Ku yɛn bi caatɔɔki kaarou gam riɛl, ku abik keden aa guiir agum toŋ de nin ku bot kaarou ku thierdhetem, ke ke ceŋ lupɔɔ cuɛl.
Kɔcke ayek tiim ke olip kaarou ku yek camadaan kaarou, kaac e Bɛnydiit de piny nɔm.
Ku na de raan kɔɔr luɔi nɛk en keek, ke mac bɔ biic e kethook, ciɛm kɔc de kek ater: ku na de raan kɔɔr luɔi nɛk en keek, ka bi dhil nɔk aya, abi thou.

Kɔcke adeki riɛl bi kek tenhial thiook, ke cin deŋ bi tuɛny e akool ke guieerdɛn ee kek keden guiir: ku ciɛthki ne riɛl e pieeu niim puk kek keek abik aa riɛm, ku duiki piny e jɔɔk ebɛn, e duidɛn e kepiɔth.
Ku te ci kek kedɛn ee kek caatɔɔ thol e luɛl, ke lɛn rac lɛn bɔ biic e adhum thuthic ke bi tɔŋ yinn keek, ku jɔ ke tiaam, ku nɛk keek abik thou.
Ku gupkɛn ci thou abik dhɔt piny e caar e panyditic panydiit gok cɔl Thɔdom, ku cɔl Rip, e cɔt ci yal kɔu bei, ku ye te ci Bɛnydiitda piaat thinaya.
Ku kɔc kɔk e kɔc yiic ku dhien yiic ku thook yiic ku juur yiic abik gupkɛn ci thou aa woi e nhi kadiak ku nhuth, ku ciki gupken pɛl tau tɛɛuwe keek e raŋic.
Go kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm goki piɔth miɛt ne thonden, ku dɔlki; ku abik rot miɔɔc e kaŋ kapac; luɔi ci nebiike kaarou kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm leeŋ wei.
Na wen, e nhi kadiak ku nhuth, ke wei ke piir e ke bɔ tede Nhialic bik ku lek e keyiic, ku jɔki kɔɔc e kecok; go kɔc piɔth pau aret kɔc wen ci ke tiŋ.
Na wen, ke ke jɔ rol diit bɔ nhial piŋ, rol lueel en, yan, Baki nhial ene. Goki lɔ paannhial e luatic; ke ke woi kɔc de kek ater.

Ku e thaar mane guop ke piny nieŋ rot aret, go panydit biak tok wiik biak wen thieer kek; ku nak agum de kɔc kadherou ne nieŋ ci piny ro niɛŋ: na wen, ke kɔc ci doŋ ke ke riɔc, agoki Nhialic de paannhial leec nɔm.
Amawoou ee kek rou aci wan: amawoou ee kek diak ki, bɔye enɔɔne.
Go tunynhial ee kek dherou kaaŋde kooth; ku tul rot dit ke kɔc paannhial, luelki, yan, Ciɛɛŋ de piny nɔm aci guɔ aa kede Bɛnydiitda, ku ye kede Krithode: ku abi piny cieŋ aɣet athɛɛr ya.
Go roordit kathierou ku ŋuan roordiit rɛɛr e thoonyken niim, agoki rot cuat piny gutki keniim piny, lamki Nhialic,
ku luelki, yan, Aluelku, yan, Thieithieei, yin Nhialic Bɛnydit, Bɛny e kaŋ leu kedhie, Bɛny e nu, ku anu; luɔi ci yin riɛlduon dit noom, ku ceŋ piny.

Ku juoor acik gɔth, ku jɔ agonhdu bɛn, ku bɔ kool bi loŋ de kɔc ci thou guiir, kool bi yin nebii liimku gam ariopden, ayi kɔc ɣerpiɔth, ayi kɔc rieu rinku, kɔc kor ku kɔc dit; ku kool bi yin kɔc riɔɔk kɔc e piny riɔɔk nɔm.
Na wen, ke luaŋdiit e Nhialic liep paannhial; go thanduŋ de loŋ ci mac tiŋ luɛɛk; ku tul wiledeŋ, ku kɔc rot, ku maaredeŋ, ku nieŋ ci piny ro niɛŋ, ku gok de kɔɔi e deŋ.
Na wen, ke gokdiit gɛiye tiec paannhial; tik aceŋ akɔl cit lupɔ, ku nu pɛɛi e yecok, ku ceŋ gol e dhueeŋ e yenɔm gol de kɔu kuɛl kathieer ku rou;
ku amal guop, en etiiŋe: go dhiau, ne rɔp ci e rɔɔp, ku ne rɛm e dhienh dhieeth en.
Na wen, ke gok daŋ gɛiye tiec paannhial; ŋualdiit thith ka, ŋual de niim kadherou ku tuŋ kathieer, ku ceŋ dhor kadherou e niimke.
Ku thel biak toŋ e kuɛl nhial e yeyɔl, biak wen ee kek diak, go ke cuat e piny nɔm: ku kaac ŋualdit e tik nɔm tiiŋ kɔɔr dhiethe, ke bi mɛnhde cuaal, te ci en dhieth.
Go mɛwa dhieeth, mɛnh bi juoor cieŋ ebɛn e thieny weeth: go mɛnhde gap nhial leer te nu Nhialic, ku te nu thoonydɛndit.
Ku jɔ tik kat ke lɔ jɔɔric, jɔɔr de yic tedɛn cii Nhialic guik thin, ke bi muk etɛɛn agum toŋ de nin ku bot kaarou ku thierdhetem.
Na wen, ke tɔŋ biɔk paannhial: Mikael keke tuuckɛnnhial acik biok e ŋualdit; ku biɔk ŋualdit keke tuuckɛnnhial;
agoki ke cuo tiaam, ku acin tedɛn ci ro bɛ yok paannhial.
Go ŋualdit ciɛɛc biic, yen aye kerɛɛc thɛɛr, cɔl Jɔŋdiit Rac ku cɔl Catan, jɔŋ e piny math nɔm ebɛn; e ciɛɛc biic le e piny nɔm, ku ciec tuuckɛnnhial ne yen etok.

Guɔ rol dit piŋ, rol jam paannhial, lueel, yan, Kunydewei e bɛn enɔɔne, ku bɔ riɛldit, ku ciɛɛŋ de Nhialic, ku riɛl e Krithode; ne cuɛt wen ci raan e mithekɔckuɔ gaany cuat piny raan e keek gaany e Nhialicda nɔm akol ku wakɔu.
Goki tiaam ne riɛm de Nyɔŋamaal, ku ne jamdɛn cik lueel ke ke ye caatɔɔ; ku kenki weiken tak a thou kek.
Yen miɛt we piɔth, wek bɛi nhial, ku wek kɔc tɔu thin. Amawoou e piny nɔm ku abapdit: e luɔi ci jɔŋditt rac lɔ piny te nuo wek, ke ci gɔth alal, wen ŋic en en nɔn ci kool liaakaŋ doŋ tede yen.
Na wen, aci ŋual e tiŋ nɔn ci e cuat e piny nɔm, ke jɔ tiiŋ wen ci mɛwa dhieeth yɔŋ.
Go tik gam wuok kaarou, wuok ke gok e aduŋuɛɛt, bi en ke kat e ŋual nɔm, le jɔɔric, tede, te bi e muk thin e ruun tok, ku run kaarou, ku nhuth e run.
Go ŋual piu ŋɔk bei e yethok e tik cok cit man e amool, an, tɔ tik jɔte wei e amool.
Go piny tik kony, ku liep ethok, en piny, liek amool wen cii ŋual ŋɔk bei e yethok.
Go ŋual gɔth ke tik, ku jɔ jal le tɔŋ yien mithkɛn ci doŋ, kɔc e looŋ ke Nhialic dot, ku ciɛthki ne gam de Yecu Kritho.

Na wen, ke ya kaac e liɛɛt nɔm e abapdit yɔu: guɔ lɛn rac tiŋ ke bɔ bei e abapditic, acath ke niim kadherou, ku tuŋ kathieer, ku nu dhor kathieer e tuŋke kɔɔth, ku ci rin ke lɛt rac gɔɔr e niimke kɔɔth.
Ku lɛn rɛɛc wen ca tiŋ acit guop kuac, ku cit cok lɛndiit rɛɛc cɔl bcar, ku cit thok koor: ku ye ŋualdit en aa gɛm en riɛlde, ku thoonyde, ku bɛɛnydɛndit cath ke ye.
Ku yɛn e nɔm tok e niimke yiic tiŋ acit ke ci yup abi thook; na wen, ke be dem yen te wen ci yup abi thook: arek abi piny nɔm gai ebɛn e lɛn rɛɛce:
agoki ŋual lam, ŋual ci lɛn rac gam riɛlde, ku lamki lɛn rac, luelki, yan, Eeŋa kit keke lɛn rac? ku ye ŋa dueer biok ke ye?
Ku aci gam thok, thoŋ e kadit lueel, ku ye lɛt rac lueel; ku gɛm riɛl bi tɔu e pɛi kathierŋuan ku rou.
Go yethok liep bi Nhialic aa laat, ku lɛɛt rinke, ku keemɔde, ayi kɔc e tɔu paannhial.
Ku gɛm riɛl bi en tɔŋ yien kɔc ɣerpiɔth, ago ke tiaam: ku gɛm bɛɛny bi en dhien cieŋ ebɛn ku ceŋ kɔc ebɛn ku thok ebɛn ku juoor ebɛn.
Ku abi lam e kɔc tɔu e piny nɔm kedhie, kɔc kene rinken gɔɔr e awarek de piiric, awarek de Nyɔŋamaal ci nɔk te ɣɔn ciɛke piny thar.
Na de raan de yin, ke piŋ.
Raan e kɔc peec tɔŋ, ka bi peec tɔŋ aya: ku raan e kɔc nɔk e abatau, ke bi dhil nɔk e abatau aya. Ruot ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth kepiɔth ruut ki, ku gam ee kek gam ki.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ lɛn rɛɛc daŋ ke bɔ bei piny; ku ciɛth ke tuŋ kaarou cit nyɔŋamaal, ku ye jam cit man e ŋual.
Ku ciɛth ke riɛl e lɛn rɛɛc tueŋe e yenɔm, riɛl ebɛn, go piny nɔm keke kɔc rɛɛr thin tɔ lam lɛn rɛɛc tueŋ, lɛn waan ci tetok dem tetok e yupe yen abi thook.
Ku ye gookdit gaiye looi, arek abi mac tɔ bɔ piny nhial e kɔc niim.

Ku ye kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm math ne baŋ de gook gaiye ci gam en bi ke looi e lɛn rac nɔm; ee kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm yɔɔk, an, bik kedaŋ cueec ke cit guop lɛn rɛɛc waan ci yiek tetok ne abatau, ku aci piir.
Ku gɛme riɛl bi kecicueec ke cit guop lɛn rac yiekic wei abi jam, ku tɔ kɔc nak ebɛn kɔc reec kecicueec ke cit guop lɛn rac lam.
Ku tɔ kɔc gaar gup kedhie, kɔc kor ku kɔc dit, kɔc ci bany ku kɔc kuany nyiin, kɔc cath ne kede yenhden ku liim, nɔn gɛɛre cin cueecken ku nɔn gɛɛre kenyiin tueŋ;
ke cin raan dueer kaŋ aa ɣɔɔc ku ɣɛɛc kaŋ, ee raan de guop gaar etok, ku ye raan de guop rin ke lɛn rac, ku nɔn ee yen kuen e rinke, yen adueer aa ɣooc.
Pɛlenɔm ki. Raan ŋic kaŋ e kuen kuen e lɛn rac; luɔi ee yen kuen e raan: ku kuende ee bot kadhetem ku thierdhetem ku dhetem.
Na wen, ke ya jɔt anyin, ku jɔ Nyɔŋamaal tuol ke kaac e kuurdit Dhiɔn nɔm, ku kaac kɔc ne yen etok agum kabɔt ku thierŋuan ku ŋuan, ke ke cath ne rinke, ku rin ke Wun, ke ke ci gɔɔr e kenyiin tueŋ.
Guɔ kɔc piŋ rot, rot bɔ nhial, acit man e awuoou de pieeu, ku cit awuoou e maar diit e deŋ: ku piɛŋ dhi e kɔc ŋic thoom gut, agutki thoomken:
ku kitki dhi cit ke e piɛc cak e thoonydit nɔm, ku lai kaŋuan niim, ku roordit niim: ku acin raan dueer dhie yok, ee agum kabɔt ku thierŋuan ku ŋuan de kɔc kapac, kɔc ci wɛɛr bei e piny nɔm.

Kɔcke ee kɔc ken kegup tɔ rac ne diaar: ayek kɔc ken kɔn lɔ e diaar: Kɔcke ee kɔc e Nyɔŋamaal kuany cok, te de en te le yen thin. Kɔcke aake weere bei e kɔc yiic, bik aa kɔc cii piny kɔn luɔk e ke ne kede Nhialic ku ne kede Nyɔŋamaal.
Ku acin luenh ci yok e kethook: atɔuki e thoonydiit e Nhialic nɔm ke ke cin gaŋ dueere ke gɔk.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ tunynhial daŋ, ke riŋ e paannhialic cil, ke cath ke welpiɛth thɛɛr bi ke guieer kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm, ku guiir juoor ebɛn ku dhien ku liep ku kɔc ebɛn;
ku lueel e rol dit, yan, Rieuki Nhialic, ku lɛcki nɔm; thaar bi en loŋ guiir ki, ci bɛne: jaki Raan lam Raan e cak nhial ku ciɛk piny ku abapdit ku awɛŋ ke pieeu.
Na wen, ke tunynhial daŋ look bɛn, bi ku lueel, yan, Aci wiik, aci wiik, yen Babulon panydht diite, luɔi ci en juoor tɔ dek ebɛn ne wany e agɔth agɔnh e biiye bɛɛlde.
Na wen, ke tunynhial daŋ tuny ee kek diak look lɔ e kecok, ku lueel e rol dit, yan, Na de raan e lɛn rac lam, ku lɛm kecicueec ke cit guop en, ku gɛm gaar bi e gɔɔr nyin tueŋ, ayi yecin,
ka yenguop abi dek e wany e agonh e Nhialic, wany ci dhiim e abiny e agonhdɛnditic, ke cin ke ci liaap ke ye; ku abi leeŋ wei ne mac ku thulpur e tuucnhial ɣerpiɔth niim, ku Nyɔŋamaal nɔm:
ku tol e lɛŋ ee ke leeŋ wei ee lɔ nhial aɣet athɛɛr ya; ku acin lɔŋ ee kek lɔŋ akol ku wakɔu, kek kɔc e lɛn rac lam ku lɛmki kecicueec cit guop en, ayi raan ebɛn raan gam gaar bi e gaar guop rinke.
Ruot ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth kepiɔth ruut ki, kɔc e looŋ ke Nhialic dot, ku dotki gam ci kek Yecu gam.

Guɔ rol e raan piŋ rol bɔ nhial, lueel, yan, Gaar, yan, Thieithieei e kɔc bi thou e Bɛnyditic gɔl enɔɔne aɣet wadaŋ: Ɣɛɛ, ee yic, alueel Weidit, ne ke lɔŋ ne luɔidɛn tuc; ku luɔidɛn cik looi ee keek biɔɔth cok.
Na wen, ke ya jɔt anyin, ku jɔ luan ɣer tuol; ku rɛɛr raan e luat nɔm raan cit guop Wen e raan, aceŋ gol e adhaap e yenɔm, ku muk menyjel moth e yecin:
na wen, ke tunynhial daŋ bɔ bei e luaŋditic, ke cɔl raan wen rɛɛr e luat nɔm, cɔɔl e rol dit, yan, Bɛɛiye menyjeldu bei, ku tem: kool e tem ki, ci bɛne; dom de piny nɔm e guɔ luɔk ka ci riɛl.
Go raan rɛɛr e luat nɔm go menyjelde ɣaak e piny nɔm, ago piny nɔm thok e tem.
Na wen, ke tunynhial daŋ bɔ bei luaŋdiit nu paannhial, ke muk menyjel moth ayadaŋ.

Ku jɔ tunynhial daŋ bɛn bei te nu yiŋ de lam, tuny cath ke riɛl bi en mac cieŋ; bi ku cɔl tunynhial muk menyjel moth, cɔɔl e rol dit, lueel, yan, Ɣaake menyjelduon moth thin, ku ŋuithe mith ke enap de piny nɔm ka lɔ juanyany, mithke acik thok e luɔk.
Go tunynhial menyjelde ɣaak e piny nɔm, ku kut mith ke enap niim, enap de piny nɔm, go ke cuat e gok de kedaŋic ken ee mith ke enap nyiɛɛth thin aye wany, wany e agonh tuc de Nhialic.

Go ken ee mith ke enap nyiɛɛth thin duom piny e joŋgoor e panydit kec biic, ku jɔ riɛm bɛn bei e ken ee mith ke enap nyiɛɛth thin abi pek e joth ee joŋgoor mac thook, thieeŋ piny aɣet mail bot kaarou.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ gok daŋ gok diit e kɔc tɔ gai alal, tuucnhial kadherou tuuc cath e ka ye piny riɔɔk kadherou ka bɔ cieen, luɔi ci agonh tuc e Nhialic guɔ thok e keyiic.

Na wen, ke ya tiŋ wɛɛrdit ke cit acidhanh ci liaap keke mac; ku tieŋ kɔc wen ci lɛn rac tiaam, ku tiamki kecicueec ke cit guop en, ku gaarde, ku kuen e rinke, ke ke kaac e wɛɛrdit cit acidhath nɔm, ke ke muk thoom ke Nhialic.
Ku kitki din e Mothe lim e Nhialic, ku dhi e Nyɔŋamaal, luelki, yan, Luɔidu adit e kɔc tɔ gai, yin Bɛnydit Nhialic, e kaŋ leu kedhie; kuɛɛrku apiɛthki ku yek yith, yin Malik de Juoor.
Eeŋa cii dueer riɔɔc e yin, ku cii rinku e leec, yin Bɛnydit? Yin yitok yin aɣerpiɔu; Juoor abik bɛn kedhie bik bɛn lam e yinɔm; ne tic ci luɔiduon piɛth guɔ tic.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya jɔt anyin, ku jɔ luaŋ ɣeric tuol, ke ci liep thok, luaŋ de yin keemɔ de caatɔ paannhial:
go tuucnhial wen kadherou bɛn bei luɛɛk, tuuc muk ka ye piny riɔɔk kadherou, ke ke ceŋ lupɔ cɔl linon, lupɔ ɣer epak e lɔ riauriau, ku acik kepiɔth goi e thioth e adhaap.
Go lɛn tok e lai kaŋuan yiic go tuuc kadherou gam guol e adhaap kadherou guol ci thiaŋ e agonh tuc e Nhialic, Raan piir aɣet athɛɛr ya.
Go luaŋdit thiaŋ ke tol ne dhueeŋ de Nhialic, ku ne riɛldɛn dit: ku acin raan dueer lɔ luɛɛk te ŋoot e ka ye piny riɔɔk kadherou ke ke ken guɔ thok, kak e muk tuucnhial kadherou.
Guɔ rol ditt e raan piŋ, rol bɔ bei luɛɛk, yook tuucnhial kadherou, yan, Jalki, lak luooŋki ka nu e guol yiic e piny nɔm, guol ke agonh tuc e Nhialic.
Go tunynhial tueŋ lɔ, le ku luuŋ ke nu e guldeyic piny; go te rɛɛc tok alaldit tic e kɔc gup, kɔc de gup gaar e lɛn rac, ku yek kecicueec cit guop en lam.
Ku luuŋ renden gulde e abapditic; go ro tɔ cit riɛm de raan ci thou; go ka piir ka de yiic wei thou ebɛn, ka nu e abapditic.
Go dieeŋden gulde luooŋ e kiɛɛr yiic ku awɛŋ ke pieeu yiic; goki aa riɛm.
Guɔ tunynhial de piu piŋ a lueel, yan, Yin piɛthpiɔu, yin Raan nu, ku yin Raan e nu, Raan Ɣerpiɔu, ne guieer ci yin loŋ guiir ale:
luɔi e kek riɛm de kɔc ɣerpiɔth ku nebii luooŋ wei, ku ci ke gam riɛm dekki: yen aroŋ ke keek.
Guɔ yiŋ de lam piŋ rol, ke lueel, yan, Yeka, yin Bɛnydit Nhialic Leu Kerieec Ebɛn, looŋkuon ci guiir ayek yith ku ci ke tiiŋ yiic egɔk.
Ku luuŋ ŋuɛɛnden gulde e akɔl nyin; go gam nyum bi en kɔc nyop e mac.
Go kɔc nyop e tuoc dit. ku yek rin ke Nhialic laat Raan de riɛl e ka ye piny riɔɔke niim; ku reecki kepiɔth puk piɔnyki.
Ku luuŋ dhinyden gulde e thoonyditt e lɛn rac nɔm; go pinydɛn ceŋ cuɔl abi aa caar; goki liepken aa nyii ne rɛm reemeke gup,
ku yek Nhialic de paannhial laat ne baŋ de rɛm reemeke gup ku ne baŋ de tetookken; ku reecki kepiɔth puk e luɔidɛn rac.
Ku luuŋ dhetɛɛmden gulde e kiirditic, kiir cɔl Euparate; go piuke deu, ke kueer bi luoi maliik bɔ ten ee akɔl thok bɛn.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ atiptiip col kadiak, cit gup aguek, ke ke bɔ bei e ŋual thok, ku lɛn rac thok, ku nebi alueeth thok:
ayek atiptiip ke jɔɔk rac, atiptiip ee gook gɛiye looi; ku leki biic lek te nu maliik ke piny nɔm ebɛn, lek ke kut niim ne kede tɔŋ, tɔŋ de kool e Nhialic Leu Kerieec Ebɛn kooldɛn diite.
(Ya ki, bɔye cit cuɛɛr. Thieithieei raan e yin, ku ye lupɔɔke tiit, ke cii bi aa cath ke cin kɔu lupɔ, bi kɔc ayarde tiŋ).
Go ke kut niim te cɔl Armagedon ne thoŋ e Eberu.
Ku luuŋ dherenden gulde e yomic; ku bɔ rol dit bei luɛɛk, luaŋ de paannhial, bi bei e thoonyditic, rol luel en, yan, E jɔ thok:
ku jɔ deŋ wil alal, ku nu rot ke kɔc, ku maaredeŋ; ku bɔ nieŋ diit nieŋe piny rot, acin ke ci kɔn ciet en ecaŋɣɔn nu kɔc e piny nɔm, yen dit e nieŋ ci piny ro niɛŋ aretdiite.
Go panydit eyic tek e diak, ku wieek pɛɛnydit ke juoor: go Nhialic Babulon dit tak e yenɔm, bi gam biny deyic wany e tuoc e agonhdɛn dit.
Go tuoor kat kedhie, ku cin kuurdit be tic.
Ku loony kɔi dit piny nhial loonyki e kɔc niim; thiek de kɔɔi tok akit keke cuaal bɔɔric. go kɔc Nhialic aa laat ne baŋ de riaak de kɔi; riaak rieek en piny adit alaldiite.

Na wen, ke tunynhial bɔ, tunynhial toŋ de tuuc kadherou wen cath ne guol kadherou, bi ku jiɛɛm ke yɛn, hieel, yan, Ba ene, yin ba nyuoth guieer ci loŋ de akɔɔrroor guiir atuc, akɔɔrroor rɛɛr e pieeu juec niim;
yen akɔɔrroor e ye mahik ke piny nɔm thut, ku ye kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm tɔ wit wany e bɛɛl de yen.
Go ya jɔt leer ɛn e jɔɔric ne Weidit: ku ja tik tiŋ etɛɛn, ke rɛɛr e lɛn rɛɛc thith kɔu, lɛn ci kɔu thiaŋ ke rin ke lɛɛt rac, ku ciɛth ke nim kadherou, ku tuŋ kathieer.

Ku ceŋ tik lupɔ thiith amujuŋ ku lupɔ thith, ku ci ro kiir e adhaap ku kɔi lɛk tuc e ɣoocden, ku kɔi cɔl margariti, ku muk biny e adhaap e yecin biny ci thiaŋ e kanhiany ku ka ke bɛɛlde karac alaldhte,
ku ade rin ci gɔɔr e yenyin tueŋ, yan, KECIMOONY KA, BABULON DIITE KI, MAN AKƆƆRROOR KU YE MAN KANHIENY KE PINY NƆM.
Guɔ tik tiŋ aci wit e deŋ ee yen riɛm de kɔc ɣerpiɔth dek, ku riɛm de caatɔɔ ke Yecu. Na wen, aca ye tiŋ, ke ya gai e gai dit.
Go tunynhial a thieec, an, Eeŋo e yin gai? Yin ba lɛk jam ci moony, jam de tik, ku jam de lɛn rɛɛc e ye ɣaac, lɛn cath ke nim kadherou ku tuŋ kathieer.

Lɛn rɛɛc wen ci tiŋ aa nu, ku aliu; ku akɔɔr bɛn bei e adhum cii thar tiecic, le maar etaiwei. Ku kɔc rɛɛr e piny nɔm abik gai, kɔc kene rinken gɔɔr e awarek de piiric ɣɔn thɛɛr ciɛke piny thar, te woi kek lɛn rac, lɛn e nu, ku liu, ku abi nu.
Taŋ e pɛlenɔm ki: Nimke kadherou ayek kuurdit kadherou, kuur e tik ke reer e keniim:
ku yek maliik kadherou aya: dhic acik wiik, ku tok anu, ku daŋ aŋoot wei; na miak ci bɛn, ka bi dhil tɔu tethiinakaŋ.
Ku lɛn rɛɛce lɛn e nu, ku cii nu, yen aye bɛtden, ku ye toŋ de dherou yiic, ku alɔ maar etaiwei.
Ku tuŋ kathieer wen ci tiŋ ayek maliik kathieer, maliik ŋoot e ke ken paan cieŋki yok; ku acike gam biɔɔŋ bik aa maliik e thaar tok, ne lɛn rac etok.
Maliikke loŋden akit, ku yek lɛn rac yien riɛlden ku bɛɛnyden.
Ku abik tɔŋ yien Nyɔŋamaal, ku abi Nyɔŋamaal ke tiaam, luɔi ee yen Bɛnydiit e bany niim, ku ye malik e mahik niim; ku kɔc cath ne yen acike cɔɔl, ku cike lɔc, ku yek adoot.
Go lɛk ɛn, yan, Pieeu wen ci tiŋ, te reere akɔɔrroore, ayek kɔc, ku kuut ke kɔc, ku juoor, ku liep.
Ku tuŋ kathieer wen ci tiŋ e lɛn rac nɔm, kek abik akɔɔrroor maan guop, ku tɔki kuany nyin, ku cin kɔu lupɔ, ku abik riiŋde cuet, ku nyopki e mac.
E luɔi ci Nhialic loŋ taau e kepiɔth, bik kede piɔnde looi, ke loŋden bi kit, agoki ciɛɛŋden gam lɛn rac, a thooke wel ke Nhialic e luɔi.
Ku tiiŋ wen ci tiŋ ee gok de panydiit ceŋ mahik ke piny nɔm.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya tiŋ tunynhial daŋ ke bɔ piny paannhial, ke cath ke riɛldit, go piny riaau e dhueeŋde.
Go coot aret e rol dit, an, Babulon dit aci wiik, aci wiik, ka ci aa panɔm de jɔɔk rac, ku ye te ci atiptiip ke jɔɔk nhiany mac thin ebɛn, ku mɛce diɛt rɛc nhiany thin ebɛn aya.
E luɔi ci juoor ebɛn dek ne wanydɛn e agɔth, agonh e biiye bɛɛlde; ku maliik ke piny nɔm aake ye lɔ ne yen, ku ajaleep ke piny nɔm aake ci kuɛth e weu ne juec de kakɛn mit ee kɔɔr.
Guɔ rol daŋ e raan piŋ, rol bɔ paannhial, lueel en, yan, Baki bei thin, wek kɔcki, ke we cii bi mat ne yen etok ne karɛcke, ke we bi iiu e kakɛn riak en yiic;
karɛcke acik niim kut ka cik paannhial cuoop, go Nhialic enɔm tak e luɔidɛn rɛɛc ye looi.

Lɛc ee yen ro leec, ku kuɛth ee yen kuɛth e kamit, yen acit lɛŋ ba wek e leeŋ wei ku dhien ba wek e tɔ dhiau: ne luɛl ee yen e lueel e yepiɔu, yan, Yɛn rɛɛr ke ya ye malik tik, ku ca ye thuoom, ku yɛn cii dhieeu bi tiŋ anandi.
Ɣen abi ka bi e riɔɔk bɛn ekool tok, thuɔɔu, ku dhieeu, ku cɔŋdit; ku abi lɔ kuith piny e mac; luɔi rile Bɛnydit Nhialic Raan guiir loŋde.
Ku maliik ke piny nɔm, maliik waan e lɔ ne yen, ku cik kuɛth e kamit ne yen etok, abik en dhieu, ku biekki keyoth, te woi kek tol nyop en,
ke ke kaac temec ne riɔɔc ci ke riɔɔc e lɛŋ ci e leeŋ wei, ku luelki, yan, Amawoou, madinoou, gok de panydit Babulon, panydiit rile! e thaar tok en aa yok yin keduon tuc.
Ku dhieu ajaleep ke piny nɔm ku biekki keyoth, ne cin cin en raan e kaken bɛ ɣɔɔc,

kakɛn e adhaap, ku ateek, ku kɔi lɛk tuc e ɣoocden, ku kɔi cɔl margariti, ku lupɔ lɔ nip cɔl linon, ku lupɔ thiith amujuŋ, ku lupɔ cɔl ariir, ku lupɔ thith; ku tiim kithe ŋieerdenic, ku ka ye looi e leny akɔɔn ebɛn, ku ka ye looi e tiim lɛk tuc e ɣoocden ebɛn, ku malaŋ, ku weeth, ku kuur ril cɔl marmaro;
ku wɛɛl cɔl kinamonon, ku wɛɛl ee nyop go tumetum, ku miok tum, ku libano, ku wany, ku miok, ku agamɔ lɔ mot, ku agamɔ kene guoor, ku ɣɔk, ku thok; ku joŋgoor, ku abeelbiic, ku liim, ku wei ke kɔc.
Ku kamit ci luɔk kak e yin ke ŋɔŋ acike jɔt tede yin, ayi kamit cuai ku ka lak acike jɔt tede yin kedhie, ku acike bi bɛ yok anandu.
Ku ajaleep waan e kake ɣaac, kɔc waan ci tɔ kueth e weu, abik kɔɔc temec ne riɔɔc bi kek riɔɔc e lɛŋ bi e leeŋ wei, ke ke dhiau ku biekki keyoth; yan,
Amawoou, madhioou, gok de panyditt oou, panydiit waan ye linɔn lɔ mot cieŋ, ku ceŋ lupɔ thiith amujuŋ, ku lupɔ thith egoi, ku ye ro kiir e adhaap, ku kɔi lɛk tuc e ɣoocden, ku margariti!
E thaar tok tei en aa rieeke weu juec cit ekake. Ku bany ke abeel wiir kedhie, ku rem nu e abeel yiic ebɛn, ku kɔc ee ka ke abeel looi, ku kɔc e kaŋ ɣɔɔc e abapditic ebɛn, aake kaac temec,
ku cotki, te woi kek tol nyop en, luelki, yan, Ee panydiitou kit keke panydiite?

Agoki abuni dɛɛny e keniim, kiuki, ku dhiauki, ku biekki keyoth, luelki, yan, Amawoou, madinoou, gok de panydit oou, panydiit ci kɔc tɔ kueth e weu thin kedhie, kɔc de abeelkɛn e cath e abapditic, ne juec juec e weuke! E thaar tok tei en aa tɔ ye kuany nyin oou!
Jaki piɔth miɛt e yen, yin paannhial, ku wek kɔc ɣerpiɔth, ku wek tuuc, ku wek nebii; luɔi ci Nhialic we guoor ne guieer ci en loŋde guiir atuc.
Na wen, ke tunynhial ril alal kuany kuur cit kuurdiit ee guar, deeny e abapditic, lueel, yan, Dhuur bi gok de panydit Babulon dhuoor piny erup ki, ku cii bi bɛ tic eliŋliŋ.

Ku acin dhi e kɔc thoom gut, ku din e kut, ku luɔɔu e kɔc e kɛŋ thiike kooth, ku din e kɔc e kɛŋdit kooth, acin dhidɛn bi bɛ aa piŋ e yiyic etaitai; ku acin aten bi bɛ yok e yiyic etaitai, nɔn ee yen aten e luɔiyou; ayi dhien e kuur ee guar, acii bi bɛ aa piŋ e yiyic etaitai:

ku ɣɛɛr e manyealath acii piny bi bɛ aa riaau e yiyic etaitai; ayi rol e dhuŋ thiek keke nyan thiak acii bi bɛ aa piŋ e yiyin etaitai: ajaleepku aake ye banydit ke piny nɔm; ku e athuɛɛthdu en aa ye juoor math ebɛn.
Ku riɛm de nebii keke kɔc ɣerpiɔth aci yok e yeyic, keke riɛm de kɔc ɣɔn ci nɔk e piny nɔm kedhie.
Na wen, aci kake thok, ke ya piŋ rol diit e kut diit e kɔc paannhial, ke luelki, yan, Aleluya! Kunydewei, ku dhueeŋ, ku rieeu, ku riɛldit, ayek ka ke Bɛnydit Nhialicda:
looŋkɛn ci guiir ayek yith ku piɛthki egɔk; luɔi ci en loŋ de gok de akɔɔrroor guɔ guiir atuc, akɔɔrroor waan ci piny riɔɔk e bɛɛlde, ago riɛm de liimke guoor eliŋliŋ e yen.
Goki bɛ lueel, yan, Aleluya! Ku tolde ee lɔ nhial aɣet athɛɛr ya.
Go roordit kathierou ku ŋuan ku lai kaŋuan goki rot cuat piny lamki Nhialic Raan rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm, ku luelki, yan, Amen. Aleluya!
