Ku bɔ rol e raan bei e thoonyditic, lueel, yan, Lɛcki Nhialicda, wek liimke kedhie, wek kɔc e ye rieu, kɔc kor ayi kɔc dit.
Guɔ rol piŋ rol cit rol e kut diit e kɔc, ku cit awuoou de pieeu, ku cit rol diit e deŋ te mɛɛr en aret, ke luelki, yan, Aleluya! Bɛnydit Nhialicda Leu Kerieec Ebɛn, yen aceŋ piny.
Jɔku piɔth miɛt ku doorku, ku lecku nɔm, luɔi ci thieŋ de Nyɔŋamaal bɛn, ku tiiŋde aci ro guik.
Ku aci gam pioth bi en ro piɔth e linon lɔ mot, linon ɣer epak ku le riauriau: linon lɔ mot en aye luɔi piɛth ee kɔc ɣerpiɔth looi.
Ku yook ɛn, an, Gaar, an, Thieithieei kɔc ci cɔɔl e kecam de thieŋ de Nyɔŋamaal. Go lɛk ɛn, an, Wel ke Nhialic ka, wel yith.

Guɔ ro cuat piny e yecok, an, ja lam. Go ya yɔɔk, yan, Acie yen! yɛn ee lim wo yin etok, ku ya lim woke mithekɔckun etok kɔc ee ya caatɔɔ e jam de Yecu dot: ye Nhialic lam: Wei ke guieerewel kek aye caatɔ luel kede Yecu.

Na wen, ke ya tiŋ paannhial aɣɔɔr; na wen, ke joŋgor akuur tul, ku raan rɛɛr e yekɔu, acɔl Adot ku cɔl Yic; ku e piathepiɔu yen aye loŋ guiir ku yen aye tɔŋ lɛɛr. Ku acit nyin liem de mac, ku nu gool juec ke dhueeŋ e yenɔm; ku acath ke rin ci gɔɔr rin cin raan ŋic ke, ee yen ŋic ke yetok.
Ku aceŋ lupɔ e yekɔu, lupɔ ci juɔɔl e riɛm: ku rinke acɔlke Jam e Nhialic.
Ku kuany cok e rɛm ke tɔŋ, rɛm nu paannhial ke ke cath e joŋgoor akuur kɔɔth, ku ceŋki linon lɔ mot, ɣer epak ku le riauriau.
Ku bɔ abatau moth bei e yethok, bi en juoor kip: ku abi ke cieŋ e thieny weeth: go ken ee mith ke enap nyiɛɛth thin duom piny, aye wany, wany e tuoc de agondiit e Nhialic Leu Kerieec Ebɛn.
Ku acath ke rin ci gɔɔr e lupɔde kɔu ku gaar e yeɣam, yan, MALIK NU E MALIIK NIIM, KU BԐNYDIIT NU E BANY.DIT NIIM.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ tunynhial tok ke kaac e akɔlic; go coot e rol dit, yook diɛt e riŋ nhial ebɛn e kaam de nhial ku piny, yan, Baki, guɛɛrki e kecam diit e Nhialic;
bak riŋ ke maliik bɛn cuet, ku cuɛtki riŋ ke bany ke rɛm, ku riŋ ke joot ril, ku riŋ ke joŋgoor ku kɔc rɛɛr e kekɔɔth, ku riŋ ke kɔc kedhie, kɔc cath e kede yenhden ku liim, ayi kɔc kor ayi kɔc dit.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ lɛn rac, ku tieŋ maliik ke piny nɔm, keke rɛmkɛn e tɔŋ, acik keniim kut bik tɔŋ bɛn yien Raan rɛɛr e joŋgoor kɔu, keke remdɛn e tɔŋ.

Na wen, ke jɔ lɛn rac dɔm, ku dɔm nebi alueeth ne yen etok, nebi waan ee gook gɛiye looi e yenɔm, gook waan ee yen ke kɔc math kɔc ci ro tɔ gaar e gaar e lɛn rac, ku yek kecicueec cit guop en lam. Ku cuɛte ke kaarou ke ke piir, cuɛte ke e baaric baar e dep e thnipur.
Ku nɛk kɔc wen ci doŋ ne abatau de raan rɛɛr e joŋgoor kɔu, abatau bɔ bei e yethok: go diɛt kuɛth ebɛn e riŋken.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ tunynhial a bɔ piny paannhial, ke muk mukthaar de adhum thuth cii thar tiec, ku muk gok de kuat e yecin.
Bi ku dɔm ŋualdit, kerɛɛc thɛɛr, yen aye Jɔŋdiit Rac, ku ye Catan,

go rek thol agum de run ke mac, ku jɔ cuat e adhum thuthic, ku guur thin, ku boot adhum thuth thok, ke cii juoor bi bɛ aa math, te ŋoot agum de run e ke ken kɔn thok: ku te ci runke thok, ka bi dhil lony tethiinakaŋ.

Na wen, ke ya tiŋ thony, ku kɔc areerki e keniim, ku acike gam guieer bi kek loŋ aa guiir: ku tieŋ wei ke kɔc waan ci kiep niim wei ne baŋ ee kek caatɔɔ ke Yecu ku ne baŋ de jam de Nhialic, ku kɔc e lɛn rac rɛɛc lam, ku reecki kecicueec cit guop en lam, ku reecki gaarde gam e keniim tueŋ, ayi kecin; ku acik bɛ piir ku yek piny cieŋ ne Kritho etok e agum de run.
Ku kɔc kɔk ci doŋ e kɔc ci thou yiic akenki bɛ piir athooke agum de run. Jon tueŋ ee kɔne kɔc ro jɔt ki.

Thieithieei raan ku ɣeerpiɔu raan rom ke kɔc e jon tueŋic jon e kɔne kɔc ro jɔt: thon ee kek rou acin naamde tede kɔcke; ku abik aa bany ke ka ke Nhialic keke Kritho, ku abik piny aa cieŋ ne yen etok e agum de run.
Na miak, te ci agum de run guɔ thok, ke Catan abi luony bei tedɛn ci e mac thin,
ku abi lɔ biic le juoor math juoor nu e piny biak e yic ŋuan, Gok ku Magok, le ke kut niim ne kede tɔŋ: kɔc cit e kuenden liɛɛt e abapdit.
Goki lɔ ku thiaŋki piny nɔm, ku jɔki te tɔuwe rem e kɔc ɣerpiɔth tuɔɔk ku tookki panydiit nhiaar: na wen, ke mac bɔ piny paannhial, bi ku cuɛɛl keek.
Ku cuɛte jɔŋdiit rac e keek math e baaric baar e mac ku thulpur, te nu lɛn rac keke nebi aluɛth thin; ku abike leeŋ wei akol ku wakɔu aɣet athɛɛr ya.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ gok de thoonydiit ɣer, ku tieŋ Raan rɛɛr e yenɔm, Raan ci piny kat e yenyin ayi tenhial; ku acin tedɛn ci ro yok.

Guɔ kɔc ci thou tiŋ, kɔc kor ayi kɔc dit, ke ke kaac e Nhialic nɔm; na wen, ke awareek e ke pet yiic: ku pet awarek daŋic, awarek de piir: go loŋ de kɔc ci thou guiir ne ka ci gɔɔr e awareek yiic ne kede luɔidɛn cik looi.
Ku pal abapdit kɔc ci thou nu e yeyic; ku pal thuɔɔu ku paan e kɔc ci thou kɔc nu e keyiic: go loŋden guiir ŋɛk e kede luɔide ku ŋɛk e kede luɔide.
Ku cuɛte thuɔɔu ku paan e kɔc ci thou e baar e macic. Thon ee kek rou ki ekene.
Ku na de raan ci yok akene gɔɔr e awarek de piiric, ke cuɛte baar e macic.
Na wen, ke ya tiŋ paannhial ci piac cak ku piny ci piac cak; luɔi ci paannhial tueŋ jal ayi piny tueŋ; ku acin abapdit be nu.
Ku tieŋ panydit ɣeric, Jeruthalem ci piac cak, ke bɔ piny paannhial, bɔ tede Nhialic, aci ro guik cit man ee nyan thiak ro kiir ne kede monyde.
Guɔ rol diit e raan piŋ abɔ paannhial, lueel, yan, Tieŋki, keemɔ de Nhialic atɔu ke kɔc, ku abi reer ke keek, agoki aa kɔcke, ku Nhialic guop abi tɔu ke keek, ago aa Nhialicden:
ku abi piu ke kenyin weec e kenyiin kedhie; ku thuɔɔu acii bi bɛ nu, ayi jiɛthepiɔu, ku dhieeu, ku arɛɛm, aciki bi bɛ nu: ka tueŋ acik jal eliŋliŋ.
Go Raan rɛɛr e thoonydit nɔm lueel, yan, Tieŋki, yɛn nyɔk kaŋ e luɔi kedhie. Go ya yɔɔk, an, Gaar: luɔi le welke gɔk ku yek yith.
Go ya yɔɔk, yan, E thok. Yɛn Alpa ku ya Omega, gol e kaŋ ku thok e kaŋ. Raan ci yal aba miɔɔc e awaŋ de piu ke piir ne dhueeŋ.
Raan e tiam abi kaŋ lɔɔk lak kedhie; ku yɛn bi aa Nhialicde, ku abi aa wendi.

Ku na ariɔc, ku kɔc reec gam, ku kɔc nhiany piɔth, ku kɔc e kɔc nɔk akurki, ku kɔc e diaar kɔɔr, ku kɔc e thueth, ku kɔc e yieth lam, ku aluɛth kedhie, keden ee tau bi kek tɔu e baar e dep e macic ku thnipuric; yen aye thon ee kek rou.

Na wen, ke tunynhial bɔ tunynhial tok ne tuuc kadherou yiic tuuc wen cath e guol kadherou, guol ci thiaŋ e ka ye piny riɔɔk kadherou ka bɔ cieen; bi ku jiɛɛm ke yɛn, lueel, yan, Ba ene, yin ba nyuoth nyan thiak, tiiŋ de Nyɔŋamaal.
Go ya jɔt ne riɛl e Weidit leer ɛn e gok de kuurdit baar nɔm, ku jɔ a nyuoth panydit ɣeric Jeruthalem, ke bɔ piny paannhial tede Nhialic,
ke cath ke dhueeŋ de Nhialic; ku ɣɛɛrde acit kuur lɛɛk tuc e ɣoocde, acit kuur cɔl jathpi, e lɔ kir cit man e acidhath cɔl kuruthalo:
ku aci geeu e gok de kal baar; ku ade thok kathieer ku rou, ku kaac tuucnhial kathieer ku rou e thok ke kal, ku thok ke kal acike gaar kɔɔth rin, rin ke dhien ke wɛɛt ke Yithrael kathieer ku rou;
biak ee akɔl thok bɛn anu thok kadiak; ku biak lɔ rute anu thok kadiak; ku biak lɔ wowice anu thok kadiak; ku biak ee akɔl lɔ piny anu thok kadiak.
Ku kal e panydit ade keerkeer kathieer ku rou, keerkeer ci rin ke tuuc ke Nyɔŋamaal kathieer ku rou gɔɔr e keniim.
Ku tunynhial wen jam ke yɛn aa muk wai e adhaap bi en dit e panydit bɛn them, ku them dit e thok ke kal ku dit e kalde.
Ku panydit ade aguuk kaŋuan, ku bɛɛr de yenkɔu akit ke pau le yenic pauwau: go panydit them e wai, ago ya agum de mail ku bot kathierdhic: bɛɛr de yenkɔu ku pau le yenic pauwau ku bɛɛr bɛɛr en akitku
Go bɛɛr e kalde nɔm them, ago ya dhiraa kabɔt ku thierŋuan ku ŋuan, raan kaam en aa them en en, yen aye kam de tunynhial.
Ku kal aci yik e kuur cɔl jathpi: ku panydit yen aye adham awai, cit acidhanh awai.
Ku keerkeer ke kal e panydit acike kur e kuur kith yiic lak nyiin. Keerkeer tueŋ ee jathpi; ke ye kek rou, ee thapeiro; ke ye kek diak, ee kalkedon; ke ye kek ŋuan, ee thamaragdo;

ke ye kek dhic, ee thardonuk; ke ye kek dhetem, ee thardiɔn; ke ye kek dherou, ee kurutholith; ke ye kek bɛt, ee berilo; ke ye kek dheŋuan, ee tophadiɔn; ke ye kek thieer, ee kuruparatho; ke ye kek thieer ku tok, ee wakintho; ke ye kek thieer ku rou, ee amethuthuto.
Ku kalthook kathieer ku rou ayek margarith kathieer ku rou; thoŋ tok ee margariti tok, ku thoŋ tok ee margariti tok, aɣɔl keek kedhie: ku caar e panydit ee adham awai, cit man e acidhanh lɔ kir.
Ku acin luaŋdiit ca tiŋ thin: Bɛnydit Nhialic Leu Kerieec Ebɛn, keke Nyɔŋamaal, kek aye luaŋdɛndit.
Ku panydit acii akɔl e kɔɔr, ayi pɛɛi, lek ruɛl thin: dhueeŋ de Nhialic yen aa ye pinyde riaau, ku Nyɔŋamaal yen aye manyde.
Ku juoor abik aa cath e ɣɛɛrdeyic: ku maliik ke piny nɔm ayek dhueeŋden bɛɛi tliin ku rieeuden.
Ku thok ke kalde aciki bi aa thiook akol ananden; ku piny abi cien wakɔu etɛɛn;
ku abik dhueeŋ de juoor bɛɛi thin ayi rieeuden.
Ku acin kenhiɛɛny bi lɔ thin eliŋliŋ, ayi raan e kenhiany looi, ayi raan e lueth toor: ee kɔc ci gɔɔr e awarek de Nyɔŋamaalic awarek de piir keek kapac kek abi lɔ thin.
Na wen, ke nyuth ɛn kur e piu ke piir, kiir ee piuke lɔ kir cit man e kuruthalo, ke bɔ bei e thoonyditic thoonydiit e Nhialic keke Nyɔŋamaal, teek e caardeyic cil.
Ku tim e piir anu e kur nɔm lɔŋe ku lɔŋe, tim e luɔk e mith kathieer yiic ku rou, aye luɔk e pɛi nyiin kedhie: ku yith ke tim ayeke tɔ ye wɛɛl ee juoor tɔ dem.
Ku acin aciɛɛn bi bɛ nu: ku thoonydiit e Nhialic keke Nyɔŋamaal abi nu thin: ku abii liimke aa luooi;
ku abik tiŋ nyin; ku tɔu rinke e kenyiin tueŋ.
Ku acin wakɔu bi bɛ nu; ku aciki manyealath e kɔɔr, ayi ruɛl e akɔl; Bɛnydit Nhialic en abi pinyden riaau; ku abik piny cieŋ aɣet wadaŋ thɛɛr.
Go ya yɔɔk, yan, Welke alek gɔk ku yek yith. Ku Bɛnydit Nhialic de nebii ɣerpiɔth, yen aa toc tunynhialde, le liimke nyuoth ka bi dhil dap tic.
Ya ki, bɔye enɔɔne. Thieithieei raan e wel ci guiir dot wel ke awarekeyic.
Ku yɛn Jɔn yɛn e kake piŋ ku tieŋ ke. Na wen, aca ke piŋ ku tieŋ ke, ke ya cuat ro piny e tunynhial cok tuny e nyuth ɛn ekake.
Go ya yɔɔk, an, Acie yen! yɛn ee lim wo yin etok, ku ya lim woke nebii mithekɔckun, ku kɔc e wel ke awareke dot: ye Nhialic lam.
Go ya yɔɔk, yan, Du wel ci guiir bot thook wel ke awareke; piny aci thiɔk.
Raan racpiɔu, ke tɔu ke racpiɔu: ku raan nhiany piɔu, ke tɔu ke nhiany piɔu: raan piɛthpiɔu, ke tɔu ke piɛthpiɔu; ku raan ɣerpiɔu, ke tɔu ke ɣerpiɔu.
Ya ki, bɔye enɔɔne; ku yɛn cath wo ariopdien ba gam raan ebɛn ne ke roŋ ke luɔide.
Yɛn Alpa ku ya Omega, gol e kaŋ ku thok e kaŋ, raan tueŋ ku raan cieen.
Thieithieei kɔc e looŋke dot, ke ke bi dɛ riɛl bi kek lɔ te nu tim de piir, ku tekki e thok ke kal lek panydit.
Ku jɔk, ku kɔc e thueth, ku kɔc e diaar kɔɔr, ku kɔc e kɔc nɔk akurki, ku kɔc e yieth lam, kek atɔuki biic, ayi raan ebɛn raan nhiaar lueth ku ye lueth toor.
Yɛn Yecu, yɛn e tunydien nhial tooc bi week lɛk kake ne kede kanithɔɔ. Yɛn ee meei de Dabid, ku ya mɛnh dhiende, ku ya cieer e piny riaau cieer e run e piny.
Weidit ku Nyanthiak aluelki, yan, Ba. Ku raan piŋ, e lueel, an, Ba. Ku raan ci yal, e bɔ: ayi raan de piɔu keek, e nom piu ke piir youyou.
Yɛn lek raan ebɛn raan e wel ci guiir piŋ wel ke awarekeyic, yan, Na de raan bi welke ŋuak e wel kɔk, yen abii Nhialic ŋuak e riaak ci gɔɔr e awarekeyic;
ku na de raan bi wel kɔk jɔt e wel ci guiire yiic wel ke awareke, ke biakde abii Nhialic jɔt e awarek de piiric, ku panydiit ɣericic, ka ci gɔɔr e awarekeyic.
Caatɔ luel kake alueel, yan, Ee yin, ya ki, bɔye enɔɔne. Amen: ba, Bɛnydit Yecu.
E dhueeŋ de Bɛnydan Yecu Kritho piɔu e ye tɔu ke kɔc ɣerpiɔth kedhie. Amen.
